product_description:
Cod Liver Oil - 1000mg is a high quality source of Omega 3 which is rich in EPA (eicosapentaenoic acid) and DHA (docosahexaenoic acid).
Cod Liver oil contains 237mg of omega 3 per soft gel and has many beneficial properties within the body due to the action of EPA and DHA. These two long chain fatty acids help contribute to normal blood cholesterol levels and healthy cardiac function. Cod liver oil is high in vitamin A which contributes to normal vision along with the maintenance of normal skin and iron metabolism. Providing 1000% daily RI for vitamin D, myvitamins cod liver oil also contributes to the normal function and health of muscles and bones while both vitamin A and D supports the normal function fo the immune system.
Our high quality soft gel is a great way to get all the health benefits of Omega 3 fatty acids for those to lack fish in their diet. Cod Liver Oil also contains healthy levels of Vitamins A and D3, perfect for supporting normal function of the immune system. To be taken as part of a varied and balanced diet and a healthy lifestyle.
name: Liver Oil

product_description:
使用 Gatineau 沁爽柔和磨砂乳，扫除死皮细胞及杂质，展现健康亮泽的肌肤。 混合了丰富的可融蜡球，让肌肤变得更细致均匀。
Gatineau 沁爽柔和磨砂乳采用温和配方，能有效去除角质和暗沉杂质，让肌肤恢复亮泽青春。 富含可融蜡球，非常适合敏感性和干性肌肤。
使用说明：
name: 沁爽柔和磨砂乳 75ml

product_description:
Gatineau's Gentle Eye Makeup Remover effortlessly eliminates all traces of makeup whilst soothing and hydrating the delicate eye contour without greasy residue.
Enriched with Cucumber, Green Tea and Aloe Vera, the refreshing formula works to calm and comfort sensitive skin, banishing the most stubborn mascara and leaving lashes cleansed. Ideal as a rejuvenating, cooling eye treatment to refresh tired eyes and minimise puffiness.
name: Gentle Eye Makeup Remover (390ml)

product_description:
Renew your complexion with the Golden Snail Intensive Basic Set from Korean skincare brand, Skin79. Host to a potent Toner and hydrating Emulsion, arriving in both a full and travel size, the Basic Set contains the essentials for achieving youthful and radiant skin.
Golden Snail Intensive Toner (130ml and 20ml)
Restore a youthful glow with the Golden Snail Intensive Toner. Harnessing the powers of Golden Snail and Bird Nest Extracts, the anti-ageing formula delivers intense moisture and hydration, whilst helping to minimise the appearance of wrinkles. Housed in a pump bottle for effortless application, you can expect a smooth, refined and rebalanced complexion that is prepared for the next step in your skincare regime.
Golden Snail Intensive Emulsion (130ml and 20ml)
Treat your skin to the nourishing and renewing properties of Golden Snail Intensive Emulsion; an anti-ageing moisturiser enriched with the regenerative qualities of Golden Snail filtrate. Helping to slow down the ageing process whilst deeply moisturising, the brightening formula utilises seven patented active ingredients to replenish nutrients and moisture back into dry skin. Its dose of Red Korean Ginseng restores vitality, 24 carat gold performs an anti-wrinkle and brightening effect, and Golden Snail filtrate regenerates, relieves and rejuvenates to leave the complexion smooth and radiant. Protecting against dryness, the silky emulsion expertly softens skin and improves elasticity. Expect, brighter, younger, supple-looking skin.
name: Golden Snail Intensive Basic Set

product_description:
Gatineau Comforting Lily Cleanser是一款为干燥、缺水肌肤专门配制的丰富乳状洗面奶。 它可以温和地去除化妆品、污垢和杂质，同时它蕴含的软化肌肤的百合花瓣可以滋润肌肤。
除了让肌肤清爽，它还有助于补充水分含量，使您的肤色看起来很水嫩。
name: Comforting Lily Cleanser

product_description:
使用Gatineau 积姬仙奴颈部抗皱啫喱令您的颈部更加年轻。 有即时和长效提升效果。 富含肽，植物蛋白提取物，维生素，矿物质和向日葵。
Gatineau 积姬仙奴颈部抗皱啫喱不仅能使肌肤明显光滑，长期使用还能防止下垂和松弛。 麦芽油和维生素E等抗氧化剂能够滋养肌肤，令肌肤更加柔软。 凝胶有提升作用，能够减少皱纹，使您看上去更加年轻。
使用说明：
name: 积姬仙奴颈部抗皱啫喱 (50ml)

product_description:
Meet the needs of oily and acne-prone skin with the Skin Authority Ultra Clear Duo; a high-performance collection that takes skin to a new level of clarity and luminosity. The set boasts a calming face mask and a rebalancing concentrate, which work in synergy to eliminate congestion, minimise irritation and prevent future breakouts. Expect a clear and bright complexion.
Calming Mask (118ml)
Take a moment to relax and pamper with the Calming Mask. Ideal for use as an all over face mask or targeted spot treatment for oily skin, the clay-based formula works to gently exfoliate the surface layer and effectively unclog pores, while absorbing excess oil and minimising the look of redness and inflammation. Fortified with 10% Precipitated Sulfur and proprietary AOX Technology™, it infuses skin with essential moisture, antioxidants and vitamins, helping to clear congestion and prevent future acne breakouts. Perfect for treating oily T-zones and problematic areas, the aromatic mask leaves skin feeling purified, refreshed and balanced.   
Free from parabens, dyes and artificial fragrances. Not tested on animals.
Beauty Infusion™ Probiotics for Clarifying (30ml)
Treat your complexion to the benefits of the Beauty Infusion™ Probiotics for Clarifying; a rebalancing formula that works to target breakout-prone skin. Fortified with Shea Butter and multiple Probiotic Ferments, the fast-absorbing, non-greasy treatment helps to normalise the skin's pH balance, whilst minimising the appearance of inflammation, rosacea, dryness and enlarged pores. Skin is smoother and more refined with increased clarity. Can be used alone or mixed with foundation and skincare products.
name: Authority Ultra Clear Duo

product_description:
The Pure Clean Daily Facial Cleanser from Jack Black is a two-in-one cleanser and toner. Its lightweight formula with sulphate-free surfactants penetrates skin to remove the build-up of dirt and oil, revealing a clean, hydrated and refreshed complexion.
Formulated with the brand's PureScience® complex, the cleanser is enriched with soothing witch hazel and certified organic sage leaf and rosemary to heal skin and reduce redness. Prepares for shaving by preventing ingrown hairs, burns and irritation and lifts facial hair to allow a closer shave, whilst chamomile calms skin for long-lasting comfort. E.N.
name: Black Pure Clean Daily Facial Cleanser (473ml)

product_description:
Refresh and cleanse the skin using anti-bacterial essential oils. key ingredients: lavender, tea-tree and marine extracts.
Massage over face and neck with fingertips. Rinse off with warm water and refresh with Balance Skin Tonic. Follow with a thin layer of Balance Skin Conditioning Serum. Press in 3 to 4 drops of Balance Lavender & Ylang or Renew Facial Oil and/or finish with Balance or Renew Moisturiser.
Lavender, Tea-Tree, Natural Seaweed Extracts
name: Associates Deep Cleanse Face Wash 200ml

product_description:
Brighten up dull, lacklustre skin with the Erno Laszlo White Marble Face Mask; an innovative, dual-phase treatment that peels away to reveal a revitalised and radiant complexion.
The unique two-step formula activates when mixed together, seamlessly molding to every contour of your face to deliver brightening actives deep within. Extracts of Liquorice and Lemon naturally help to stimulate cell turnover, alleviating the appearance of dark spots and discolouration, while Jojoba Seed Oil seeks to sooth and hydrate to restore an optimum balance.
Ideal for an instant pick-me-up, the intensive mask reveals skin that feels clarified and revitalised, replenished with a healthy looking glow.
name: Laszlo White Marble Face Mask (Set of 4)

product_description: Shiseido Men's Active Energizing Concentrate是一款高效精华液，能快速减少岁月痕迹。 强效配方令肌肤活力十足、充满能量，同时防止岁月痕迹再现。 - K.R
name: Mens Active Energizing Concentrate (50ml)

product_description:
Repair and care for skin with the Grounded Coffee Scrub in Chocolate Orange; a gentle yet effective face and body exfoliator that transforms dry, sensitive or mature skin. The fragrant scrub is packed with an array of Vitamins and Minerals, alongside ground Robusta Coffee, which helps to boost circulation, whilst delivering a visible brightening effect to skin.
The innovative coffee scrub utilises Sea Salt, Himalayan Rock Salt and Brown Sugar, which work in synergy to slough away dead cells, as well dry and flaky patches of skin. Also infused with Vitamin C and E, Cacao and Sweet Almond Oil, the exfoliating scrub drenches skin in a veil of long-lasting moisture, which offers protection, whilst delivers reparative benefits.
The chocolate orange scrub envelops the body in a delicious scent. Dry and rough skin is instantly eliminated and the body is polished from head to toe. Expect skin to be youthful, refreshed and radiant.
name: Coffee Scrub 200g - Chocolate Orange

product_description:
With this three-step personalised at-home peel, you can have perfectly smooth, balanced skin that looks visibly younger, clearer and more radiant. The My Personal Peel System kit allows you to customise and fine-tune a professional treatment according to your own skin's concerns and changing needs, all while renewing overall skin texture and appearance.
In the My Personal Peel System, you will receive:
name: Formulations My Personal Peel Kit

product_description:
Shiseido Firming Body Cream能有效丰盈和紧致肌肤，令肌肤质地健康、线条优美，从而改善肌肤整体外观。 深入肌肤，锁住水分，令肌肤焕发清新亮泽的光彩。
本品质地不粘结，带有淡淡清新的香味，令肌肤幽香萦绕、恍如新生。 - K.R
name: Firming Body Cream (200ml)

product_description: Suki Concentrated Nourishing Toner (120ml) is infused with a blend of powerful botanical extracts that work to strengthen and fortify your skin. Enriched with shiitake mushroom and olive leaf extracts, it fights environmental stressors and free radicals, leaving your skin protected. Your skin will be left balanced, healthy and radiant.
name: Concentrated Nourishing Toner (120ml)

product_description:
使用AcnEase Rosacea Control Treatment - 5 Bottles让您的皮肤免受红肿的困扰。 非常适合那些有慢性或严重玫瑰红斑的患者使用，这款产品将有助于避免玫瑰红斑的重复出现。
本款产品的成分完全采用草本精华，可以恢复因内分泌失调、环境、压力、药物治疗和饮食而遭到破坏的体内平衡，从而从根本上解决皮肤问题（例如玫瑰红斑）。  绝对安全且无副作用， 非常适合男女青少年及成年人用以清洁皮肤。  
产品概述：AcnEase®是最有效的Botanical Therapeutic®（植物性治疗产品），可治疗已经形成的痤疮，防止新的粉刺和青春痘形成。此外，按照推荐方法使用后，AcnEase®所含的各种成分会让您的肌肤更清爽和更健康，同时能够去黑头和白头，并能消除红肿的症状。
AcnEase®可以恢复因为内分泌失调、环境因素、某些药物的使用、神经紧张、压力过度和饮食习惯而打乱了的天然内部平衡。痤疮其实是内部失调的外部体现。 AcnEase®的独特之处在于，它不仅可以治疗疾病的外部症状，同时还能解决痤疮和其他皮肤问题的根本问题（例如导致玫瑰红斑形成的身体内部原因）。
AcnEase非常适合有以下症状的人使用：青春痘、荷尔蒙痤疮、更年期痤疮（女性）、慢性粉刺、因辛辣和油腻的食物而加重的痤疮、吸烟、压力、酒精或其他药物、面部和Body痤疮，囊肿性痤疮。
name: Rosacea Control Treatment - 5 Bottles（套装）
formulations Critical Care Skin Repair Complex (30ml)

product_description: This ground-breaking triple action gel sculpts, firms and lift the chin and neck. Rodial chin & neck lift contains Essential Amino Acids which hydrates the skin to firm and strengthen while promoting elasticity and smoothing the appearance of wrinkles all in one. This innovative formula offers an immediate firming and lifting effect, sculpting the neckline for a visibly smoother and younger looking chin and neck.
name: Chin & Neck Lift 50ml
FORMULATIONS MOISTURE DEFENSE ANTIOXIDANT EYE CREME (15ml)

product_description:
A gentle, overnight regenerating serum ideally suited to dehydrated and prematurely aging skin. Enhances and supports the production of healthy collagen, leaving skin looking more youthful, firm, smooth and radiant.
0.5% Vitamin A (Retinyl Propionate) – accelerates cell renewal; repairs damaged cells; improves skin texture and smoothness. (Time released for optimum results).
name: Alpha A 0.5% 25ml

product_description:
发现来自Lookfantastic Beauty Box的令人难以置信的新推产品 - "我的肌肤解决方案"，为您带来完美护肤程序。 与Lookfantastic的顾问药剂师Hira合作，我们精心挑选适合您的具体肌肤类型的护肤产品。 该独有系列有3种特别版包装盒，专为干燥/敏感，中性/混合性和油性/易出现缺陷肌肤设计。  
油性/易生缺陷肌肤的特点是拥有多余的油脂或皮脂分泌物导致毛孔粗大和缺陷。 油性/易生缺陷肌肤版的产品利用专业知识经过精心挑选，并关注您的个性化肌肤问题。
油性/易生缺陷肌肤版包括以下产品：

name: FORMULATIONS VIT A PLUS ANTI AGEING EYE COMPLEX (15ML)
Formulations Facial Cleanser Gel Oily & Very Oily

product_description:
Bring your skin back to life with this revolutionary formula from Rodial, a complex formula that revitalises and hydrates your skin, fighting against the visible signs of ageing around your eyes.
Containing Arnica that reduces the appearance of dark circles whilst peptides and wheat protein visibly firms and lifts to smooth out the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles.
name: Glamtox Day SPF15 50ml

product_description:
使用 Dr Dennis Gross' Clinical 密集 Hydration 促进剂精华液提高您肌肤护理程序的效果，它是一款专业等级、定时释放浓缩液，可熟练地向肌肤注入水分，使您拥有一个饱满、柔嫩和健康的外表。
致力于提升肌肤的水分含量，同时消除衰老的迹象，抗氧化剂和透明质酸相融合并协同工作发挥滋润和舒缓的功效；透明质酸起到保湿和饱满肌肤的作用，可淡化细纹和皱纹，而西瓜提取物则会保护肌肤免受自由基攻击。 轻盈而无油腻的解决方案轻松融化到皮肤上，可在脸上的目标区域单独使用，或与您最喜爱的保湿或粉底结合使用以获得更佳的妆效。 Skin变得更光滑、柔嫩和足够保湿。
name: Dennis Gross Clinical 浓缩 Hydration 促进剂精华液 (30ml)

product_description:
This intensive anti-wrinkle night cream by Alpha-H is a fast acting remedy to fine lines, wrinkles and general tired or damaged skin. Day to day life can dry out your skin, whilst the sun can damage it also, leaving you with dry, collagen poor skin.
With this anti-wrinkle cream, packed with CHA (Combined Hydroxy Acids) and Vitamin A, you can treat your skin to a highly moisturising, nourishing and skin smoothing flawlessness. Fight all signs of ageing overnight, and wake up to youthful skin.
Please note:
name: AGE DELAY INTENSIVE ANTI-WRINKLE NIGHT CREAM (50ML)

product_description: 专为干燥至特别干燥肌肤配制，来自Garnier的  Moisture+ Nourish Daily Rich Moisturiser 可修复和滋养您的肌肤。 与Hydra+ Complex配合，该润肤霜提供强效滋润功效，同时欧米茄3和6的组合与锁住水分的牛油果脂混合。 加入山茶花油以舒缓和安慰肌肤，这款可快速吸收、不油腻滋润霜让您全体焕发活力。 适合敏感型肌肤。 E.N.
name: Moisture+ Nourish Daily Rich Moisturiser（50ml）

product_description: Dr Dennis Gross 阿魏酸视黄醇美白露有助于抑制色素的过度分泌，同时，专业添加自然提取的活性成分，有助于淡化因光感老化、荷尔蒙分泌变化或疤痕导致的色斑。适合任何肤质，可有效修复晒伤、暗黄肌肤。- L.M.
name: Dennis Gross 阿魏酸视黄醇美白露

product_description:
Revive tired, weary eyes with the Complete Eye Renewal Balm from ALGENIST; a clinical skincare brand who discovered the anti-ageing properties of Microalage as a result of renewable energy research.
Addressing key signs of ageing and fatigue, the multi-tasking eye cream delivers 360 degree treatment, targeting fine lines, wrinkles, crow's feet, dark circles and puffiness to promote a brighter, younger-looking eye contour. Rich and nourishing, it combines a host of powerful ingredients that work in synergy to combat signs of ageing and tiredness; Alguronic Acid delivers advanced anti-ageing properties to reduce the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles; Tetrapeptide-21 visibly tightens and firms; Caffeine reduces puffiness; and extracts of Cucumber, Aloe and Green Tea soothe, hydrate and nourish.
Eyes look transformed; dark circles are brightened, wrinkles are diminished and puffiness is alleviated. Expect radiant, revitalised and youthful results.
name: Complete Eye Renewal Balm 15ml

product_description:
Resurface the complexion with the REN Glycol Lactic Radiance Renewal Mask; a potent, bio-active peel mask with multiple skincare benefits.
Effortlessly smoothing over the visage, the luxurious face mask encourages results in just ten minutes. Whilst on skin, the formula is able to renew the complexion due to a hardworking cocktail of four AHA’s. Glycolic, Citric, Lactic and Tartaric Acid work in synergy to perform multi-action exfoliation on the face. This is able to eliminate dead skin cells, resurface the top layer of skin to visibly improve skin tone and reduce the appearance of enlarged pores. Acne scars, hyperpigmentation and areas of sun damage are also visibly reduced.
Once removed, the Radiance Renewal Mask reveals a brighter complexion that appears smooth, firm and uniform.
name: Glycol Lactic Radiance Renewal Mask

product_description:
Rejuvenate and brighten eyes with the Eye Catcher™ Smoothing Coconut Bio-Cellulose Second Skin Eye Mask from STARSKIN. The easy to use eye masks are infused with a revolutionary serum containing Bio Cellulose which effectively reduces the appearance of eye puffiness, fine lines and dark circles, resulting in a refreshed appearance.
Intelligently shaped to contour the delicate eye area, the Eye Catcher masks are formulated with a signature balance of naturally fermented, Vitamin rich Coconut Juice offering exceptional hydration. The masks drench skin with an advanced skincare serum containing Adenosine and Liquorice Root Extract, visibly smoothing wrinkles and brightening the appearance of the delicate eye area.
A blend of Allantoin and Chamomile work harmoniously to moisturise the skin and visibly relieve any irritation or puffiness. The skin is left luminous and rejuvenated whilst fine lines, dark circles and under eye puffiness is visibly eliminated.
name: Eye Catcher™ Smoothing Coconut Bio-Cellulose Second Skin Eye Mask (2 Units)

product_description:
Purify and refresh your complexion with Balance Me's Pure Skin Face Wash; a radiance-renewing, revitalising formula that expertly cleanses skin without stripping moisture.
Ideal for congested or combination skin types, the gentle wash blends Grapefruit, Frankincense and Roman Chamomile Oils to effectively remove make-up and impurities, whilst Spruce Knot Extract minimises blemishes and eliminates unwanted shine for a smoother, more refined finish. Skin is clarified and rebalanced with a bright, even tone.
name: Me Pure Skin Face Wash 125ml

product_description:
Treat slackening skin to the Vitamasques Pomegranate Firming Lifting Mask; a luxurious face mask inspired by Korean innovation to restore a smooth, supple complexion.
Developed with triple layer sheet technology for maximum effect and absorption, the treatment utilises extracts of Pomegranate to moisturise and condition, whilst delivering a tightening action for skin that appears refined and toned.
name: Pomegranate Firming Lifting Mask

product_description:
Lierac  豪华型柔滑日霜晚霜，可修复肌肤，使肌肤重焕光泽，恢复青春活力。科学专业知识证明：内含的高级植物活性成分，可打造高性能产品。
内含漆树果仁油和3.5％的D-Glyox（正在申请专利的，抗老化成分；混合了石榴花、合欢树和脂质体肽），可对抗糖氧化（糖化和氧化的组合；可改变皮肤蛋白质，使肌肤失去弹性、黯淡无光、不再柔软）。
专为干性皮肤配制，可被肌肤快速吸收，令肌肤紧致、饱满，可淡化细纹和皱纹；内含的玻尿酸可滋润肌肤；牛油果油可改善肤质。 为化妆打好肌肤基础，肤色也变得光滑亮泽。
name: 豪华型柔滑日霜晚霜（适合干性皮肤） 50ml

product_description: 小蜜蜂亮彩唇膏给唇部肌肤带来长效呵护，玫瑰香甜口味和天然成分滋养唇部，锁住唇部的水份，防止开裂，起皮的现象。
name: Bees小蜜蜂彩色唇膏（玫瑰）4.25g

product_description:
利用Sarah Chapman的Skinesis眼部修复霜对抗娇嫩眼部周围肌肤的衰老，这款多效配方富含维生素和抗氧化剂，可消除黑眼圈、浮肿和眼睛周围的细纹。
结合创新缩氨酸与化妆品技术，该眼部护理霜可有效减少细纹和衰老迹象，带来肉毒杆菌般的效果，瞬间获得丰盈肌肤并通过透明质酸填充球和光散射遮掩疲惫肌肤。 眼部肌肤将显得更年轻、光滑，活力十足。 - K.N.
name: Chapman Skinesis眼部修复霜 (15ml)

product_description: Catering for sensitive skin types, the Replenishing Rich Moisturiser from Simple works to nourish, replenish and hydrate your complexion for up to twelve hours. Infused with a skin-loving blend of Pro-Vitamin B5, Glycerin, Bisabolol and Allantoin, the fast-absorbing formula leaves skin smooth, supple and touchably soft.
name: Replenishing Rich Moisturiser 125ml

product_description:
Caudalie歐緹麗葡萄籽柔性潔顏乳，不僅是一款卸妝乳，能有效去除彩妝，更是一款護膚品：穩定的葡萄籽多酚遠離自由基傷害，甜杏仁油、荷荷巴油的成分令肌膚光滑柔嫩。 適合所有類型膚質，甚至乾性肌膚及敏感性肌膚。營養配方含有葡萄籽多酚，矢車菊和燕麥提取物等，適合臉部和眼部清潔卸妝。 
使用方法： 每天早晚使用，可直接用手指或化妝棉塗於臉部，輕輕按摩，並用水沖洗乾淨。

使用後皮膚看起來會更清透可人，可收縮毛孔，減少皺紋和平滑細紋，清潔、調理肌膚，用後擁有更明亮，更年輕的膚色。 
含有乳酸和乙醇酸，安全無害，建議每日使用。黃瓜和印度醋栗調理肌膚，檸檬皮提亮膚色。不含羥基苯甲酸酯類防腐劑、有害化學物質和染色劑。適合所有膚質，特別是敏感肌膚。
name: Aid Beauty去角质洁肤棉(60 片)

product_description:
Clarify and refresh your complexion with Caudalie's Micellar Cleansing Water; a multi-beneficial formula infused with Organic Grape Water and plant-derived Glycerin to expertly cleanse, soothe and hydrate skin.
Suitable for all skin types, including the most sensitive, the micellar water effortlessly eliminates dirt, make-up and impurities from the face and eyes to leave skin feeling fresh, comfortable and velvety soft. Imparts a delicate, uplifting fragrance of Watermelon, Mint Leaves and Orange and Lemon Blossom.
name: Micellar Cleansing Water Duo 200ml (Worth £30)

product_description:
使用 Me Clear 祛痘议, 适用于易生淡斑的肌肤，它是一台可充电的抗痘设备，利用蓝色LED灯和获专利的三行动技术（tri-action technology）来消除痘痘而不会使肌肤干燥或刺激肌肤。
愈合、消除瑕疵，同时防止痘痘在将来出现，该设备将蓝色LED灯与声波震动、温和加热结合起来即时发挥功效。 LED灯聚焦肌肤表面以消灭痤疮丙酸杆菌；声波振动促进微循环，缓解炎症，轻柔激活肌肤以使细菌暴露在杀菌灯之下；而过剩的光能则提供了一个温和的热感，帮助打开毛孔以消灭更多的细菌。
便携式设备可以随身携带，2分钟的治疗将有助于洁净您的肌肤，产生显著的效果。
Clinical结果： 
1次治疗后，减少了19％的斑点。
经过2次治疗，77％的瑕疵获得改善或得到彻底解决。
在24小时期间内进行3次治疗后，87％的瑕疵获得改善或解决。
改善的初步迹象可早在首次治疗后的几个小时看到。
name: Clear 祛痘仪 - 抗痘淡斑

product_description:
Discover boosted anti-ageing correction with Filorga NCTF-Intensive; a potent serum that tackles wrinkles and loss of elasticity, whilst leaving skin radiant.
The serum boasts an ultra-light texture, which effortlessly glides onto skin and absorbs quickly. Utilising NCTF®, a medicine-derived polyrevitalising complex, the potent fluid has a concentration that is equivalent to injectable anti-ageing treatments and so delivers similar benefits without the pain or expense. The potent serum combines Retinol, a DNA complex and Vitamin C to create a rejuvenating solution that severely reduces the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles, as well as combating loss of elasticity to leave the face visibly firm.
Working tirelessly, the serum reveals youthful skin that is energised and youthful.
name: NCTF-Intensive 30ml

product_description:
Skin Republic 亮白维 C 面膜让您重新焕发年轻的亮丽光彩，这款富含精华的面膜具有强效亮白作用，可为肌肤补充水份，均匀肤色。
通过近距离的持续接触，可为肌肤提供营养和强效补水，提亮肤色，令肌肤更加水润剔透。 这款面膜将咖啡豆萃取物与维他命 E 和玫瑰蔷薇萃取物完美结合，具有紧致肌肤和亮白效果，而不会导致肌肤的干燥，减少细纹和瑕疵，让肌肤显得更加年轻而有光泽；淡化皱纹，减少严重的雀斑和色斑。
它蕴含丰富的维他命和抗氧化剂，有助于防止自由基的损伤，淡化衰老的迹象。 其蕴含的尿囊素和甘草提取物可有效锁住水分，让肌肤恢复原有的丰盈与青春活力。
使肌肤更有光泽、肤色更均匀，焕发活力。
使用美白面膜的好处：
这款美白面膜采用透皮渗透系统，可确保营养成分和水分渗透到肌肤深层，让肌肤有效吸收。 透气度好，第二
与传统的面膜和面霜相比，肌肤可自然快速吸收。 它们也更卫生。
主要成分：
维他命 C——一种抗氧化成分，有助于减少自由基损伤。
维他命 E——一种强效抗氧化剂，具备抗氧化和滋润功效。
桑树皮提取物 ——一种天然亮白成分，具有抗炎作用。
甘草 ——帮助干燥的肌肤恢复柔软。
尿囊素 ——一种天然护肤成分，可舒缓肌肤，促进细胞再生，令肌肤更光滑。
 玫瑰蔷薇萃取物 —— 一种收敛剂，可缩小毛孔，祛除过多的油脂而不会引起肌肤干燥。
绿茶萃取物——一种抗氧化剂，可保护肌肤免受自由基的损伤。
咖啡豆萃取物——一种强效抗氧化剂，具有亮肤的功能，同时可淡化皱纹。
可可豆萃取物——一种强效抗氧化剂，可有效对抗自由基。
熊果精华——增强爽肤效果，有助于淡化暗斑和色素沉着的肌肤。
name: Republic 亮白维 C 面膜 25 毫升

product_description:
使用Sukin的Oil Balancing+ Charcoal Anti-Pollution Facial Masque温和地令肌肤焕然一新。 含有的纯净Bamboo木炭，柳草和路易波士茶能够深层清洁毛孔，清除尘垢、毒素和有害物质，令肌肤透亮清新。
收敛面膜含有抗氧化White茶，覆盆子和温柏，能够促进细胞更新，防止痘痘爆发，同时还能吸收多余的皮脂，令肌肤不再油腻，毛孔粗大。 Skin光滑饱满，散发健康的光泽。 适合油性至混合性肌肤。
name: Oil Balancing + Charcoal Anti-Pollution Facial Masque 100ml

product_description: 專為敏感皮膚類型而設計，First Aid Beauty潔面膏可溫和清潔頸部和肩部肌膚，淨化膚色，祛除髒污和雜質。 pH值平衡配方結合強效抗氧化劑，減少外界環境帶來的傷害，平滑肌膚，讓您的肌膚看起來更健康，更年輕。潔面膏質地豐富，享受舒適奢華使用感。為了達到最佳使用效果，可將潔面膏塗抹於濕潤肌膚，用指尖輕柔按摩。配合潔膚手套或潔膚棉布用清水擦拭乾淨。如需要可重複使用。建議每日早晨和睡前使用。
name: Aid Beauty洁面膏 (142g)

product_description:
NUXE 欧树神奇补水紧致眼霜让您疲惫暗沉的肌肤重现活力。 其配方旨在紧致肌肤、延缓衰老，恢复眼部的明亮和青春活力。
NUXE 欧树神奇补水紧致眼霜采用亮彩而不油腻的配方，有效补水和舒缓眼周围的肌肤，抚平细纹和皱纹。 95％ 的用户表示本品可有效舒缓肌肤，85% 的用户表示疲惫紧张的迹象不见了。 适合敏感型皮肤和隐形眼镜配戴者。
使用说明：
name: 欧树神奇补水紧致眼霜（15 毫升）

product_description:
Unveil a youthful looking visage with the Caudalie Resveratrol Lift Firming Set; an introductory selection of treatments to their advanced anti-wrinkle skincare regime. Harnessing a unique and proprietary blend of age-defying natural actives, the pair work in tandem to leave skin feeling soft, supple and smooth.
Resveratrol Lift Firming Serum (30ml)
Fortified with the brand's innovative vine-extracted Resveratrol and Micro Hyaluronic Acids, the oil-free treatment plumps and lifts skin from within to reveal a firmer, smoother look and feel. Suitable for all skin types, its nourishing and hydrating formula is infused with a peptide composition to stimulate collagen production and boost elasticity so you can experience a re-sculpted complexion and visibly defined facial contours.
Resveratrol Lift Eye Lifting Balm (5ml)
Rejuvenate tired eyes with the Resveratrol Lift Eye Lifting Balm. Developed using the brand's advanced vine resveratrol and plumping micro hyaluronic acids, the powerful anti-ageing treatment diminishes puffiness, dark circles and signs of fatigue, whilst smoothening the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles to reveal youthful-looking peepers.
Roller 
This free tool allows you to recreate a relaxing facial massage from the comfort of your own home. The device helps stimulate blood circulation and tone facial muscles, alleviating the look of puffiness for visibly firmer and smoother skin.
name: Resveratrol Lift Firming Set

product_description:
服用 Imedeen 伊美婷胶原蛋白片12个月，即可感受到衰老的迹象有所改善。 这一套装的量可服用12个月，采用独家配方，富含维生素C和锌，这些元素对肌肤健康和胶原蛋白的形成至关重要。 胶原蛋白片蕴含Imedeen 伊美婷独特的海洋胶原复合物，富含与肌肤支撑结构中相似的丰富鱼肉蛋白质和凝水性多糖。 经科学证明，番茄红素的抗氧化作用是 β-胡萝卜素的两倍，在抗自由基方面，是维生素E的100 多倍。
Imedeen 伊美婷胶原蛋白片（25岁经典型）会促使肌肤更健康，更有光泽，令肌肤更柔软细腻。 这款产品非常适合在出现衰老迹象时服用。 -SA
name: 伊美婷胶原蛋白片（25岁经典型）（12个月用量 - 售价390.00英镑）

product_description:
Discover the ultimate anti-ageing treatment with the Elemis Pro-Collagen Marine Cream SPF30; the same best-selling wrinkle cream that has been re-formulated with an innovative blend of sunscreen to offer essential broad spectrum protection.
Enriched with a potent blend of Padina Pavonica and Ginkgo Biloba, the rich cream smoothes over skin and reduces the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles to leave the visage youthful. The formula envelops the face in a veil of essential moisture, which ensures skin feels calm and comfortable, whilst visibly improving skin’s elasticity and suppleness.
Finished with a next generation micronised sunscreen, the face cream is fast absorbing and offers evenly distributed protection from UVA and UVB rays, without leaving behind unwanted white streaks. Expect suitable protection and skin that is nourished and youthful.
name: Pro-Collagen Marine Cream SPF30 50ml

product_description:
Erno Laszlo活力潤澤晚霜專為肌膚提供夜間不間斷水源，鎖水保濕而設計。也是明星夢露摯愛的美膚乳霜，提供輕盈綿密整夜呵護。 Phelityl是Laszlo醫師研究出的獨特保濕複合物，與皮膚pH值幾近相同，給予肌膚最溫和的滋養呵護；輕盈綿密的精純乳霜，可深層潤澤肌膚、夜間持續保濕補水不間斷，塗抹後能於肌膚上形成一道鎖水保濕膜，使肌膚柔嫩細白。依其輕盈綿密質地，又名“水柔豆腐霜”。 
 使用方法 ： 
夜間使用。潔膚和爽膚後，取適量本品用指尖輕輕從臉部中央往上和往外均勻塗抹，延伸至後頸部和肩部。  注意事項： 僅限外用。避免觸及眼睛。避免兒童抓拿。置於陰涼乾燥處保存。
name: Laszlo活力润泽晚霜(水柔豆腐霜)50ml

product_description:
经典的骨胶原海洋精华滋润霜可为您带来各种抗衰老好处，Elemis 艾丽美骨胶原海洋精华滋润霜含有丰富的营养物质，可增强干燥肌肤吸收水分的能力。 这款奢华的滋润面霜采用强效抗衰老配方，蕴含丰富的海洋粉团扇藻萃取物，可通过胶原蛋白支撑架构持续不断地改善肌肤。
仅需两周的时间，这款滋润霜就可改善肤色。经过独立临床试验证明，在两周的时间里，这款滋润霜可使皱纹的深度淡化 78%，使肌肤的含水量提升 45%。 - L.M.
使用方法： 将滋润霜涂抹在清洁的面部和颈部，然后向上和向外轻轻按摩。
name: 艾丽美骨胶原海洋精华滋润霜（50 毫升）

product_description:
 茱莉蔻玫瑰保濕抗氧化潔面乳帶給你全新的面孔和自由的想像。 multi-action成分努力撫平皮膚的紋理，去除多餘角質，和污垢! 
茱莉蔻玫瑰保濕抗氧化潔面乳能改善你的膚色。內含浮石粉末和玫瑰果油修護肌膚平衡肌膚,柳樹皮萃取物能夠清潔去除老化角質，讓你遠離乾燥肌膚. 
使用方法:
name: (80ml)

想要濃縮活性面部身體美膚產品，就選Hydrea London。採用純埃及柔軟棉花，溫和的同時能有效清潔面部。 
使用這款產品，能讓您容光煥發。將絲瓜絡浸濕，以畫圈的方式按摩肌膚，感受膚色和肌膚狀況的差異。手套背面使用的是最柔軟的埃及棉，帶來奢華的沐浴體驗。
name: London 羟基脲伦敦埃及有机丝瓜络脸扑 (10cm)

product_description: 使用氨基酸為肌膚保持水分，同時淬火公式幫助結合來自於布達佩斯溫泉有治愈效果的礦物質和天然的保濕活性成分，以及多聚醣幫助肌膚遠離環境的壓力增加肌膚自我修復屏障。這款產品使用了Hydro Mineral Transference™ 幫助使肌膚更加緊緻，使其散發年輕光澤。膠原蛋白和彈性使肌膚感到舒緩，鎮靜的同時達到完美的平衡。

product_description:
该手持包湿巾是 Australian Bodycare 产品，包含 24 片湿巾，可在任何地方使用。 这些湿巾配有 1％充当天然防腐剂的Tea Tree油，可清洁皮肤，去除表面的细菌。
它们有效、方便，适合所有的家庭。 K.D.
name: Bodycare手持包湿巾（24片装）

product_description:
Elizabeth Arden 高级美白夜用胶囊 ，可在夜间睡眠期间帮肌肤重新焕发自然光釆。本胶囊是一款封装的夜用精华素，可使肤色更均匀、更靓丽。
本品在皮肤的夜间（在其最易吸收时）自我修复过程中发挥功效。采用独家先进MIX浓缩技术，可减少皮肤色素沉着、黑斑、发红等现象。内含功效强大的烟酰胺和维生素C，令肤色亮泽清爽。 也包含了功效强大的植物萃取物及抗氧化甘草提取物等成分，可保护皮肤免受外界伤害、增加皮肤的天然胶原蛋白、提高肌肤弹性。令肌肤更亮泽、更年轻。
您将拥有更光滑、更靓丽的肌肤。
name: Arden 高级美白夜用胶囊（50粒装）

product_description:
Reignite a youthful glow with the Liquid Gold Ultimate Resurfacing Duo from Alpha-H. Combining two of the brand's best-sellers, the kit boosts tired, dull complexions to leave you with smooth, healthy-looking skin after use.
Alpha-H Liquid Gold (100ml)
Suitable for mature, sun damaged, ageing or acne-scarred skin, Liquid Gold can be used as a toner, exfoliator, serum or moisturiser. The award-winning solution works like an overnight facial to boost radiance and reduce the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles, revealing a youthful-looking complexion. Enriched with 5% Cosmetic Grade Glycolic Acid to remove dead skin cells and minimise pigmentation, whilst delivering intense hydration for smoother, decongested skin.
Alpha-H Liquid Gold Smoothing and Perfecting Mask (100ml)
A weekly treatment that works to improve skin tone and texture. Harnessing the powers of 15% Glycolic Acid, the face mask buffs away dead skin cells and impurities, whilst a nourishing blend of Manuka Honey, Macadamia Nut Oil and Lavender Extract leave skin looking dewy, fresh and radiant after use. Targets blemishes and pigmentation to reveal a rejuvenated, rebalanced and refined complexion with restored luminosity and a plump appearance.
name: Liquid Gold Ultimate Resurfacing Duo (Worth £80.50)

product_description:
能夠消除黑眼圈和有效滋潤眼周敏感肌膚。經眼科醫師臨床試驗，該眼霜能夠鎮靜疲勞的雙眼。 
使用伊麗莎白雅頓顯效保濕眼霜可以使眼周肌膚恢復平滑和充滿活力。所蘊含的溫和且擁有專利的視黃醇有助於減輕細紋，使肌膚重迴光彩照人的狀態。活水蛋白複合配方與植物萃取相融合，有助於促進肌膚的天然保濕因子,同時為脆弱的眼周肌膚提供充足的滋潤度。所蘊含的勝肽有助於提升肌膚彈力，彈性與緊實度並且促進膠原蛋白的產生與合成，幫助保持健康平滑的肌膚。提亮肌膚並使其重新恢復元氣，減少黑眼圈的產生。 
使用說明:
name: Arden 伊丽莎白雅顿显效保湿眼霜（15ml）

product_description:
Meet the needs of dry skin with the Elemis Your New Skin Solution - Hydrate; an indulgent collection of skincare essentials that work to hydrate and soothe the complexion. The set is host to a daily cleanser, effective exfoliator, hydrating day cream and facial oil in capsule form. Combined, the products are able to thoroughly moisturise dry skin, revealing a youthful and smooth complexion.
Rehydrating Rosepetal Cleanser (200ml)
The Rehydrating Rosepetal Cleanser works to visibly restore a youthful bloom to dehydrated and mature skin. The effective formula is rich in Vitamin E, boasts an Egg Yolk base and is complete with extracts of Rose Petal, which combine to replenish skin’s moisture levels whilst offering purifying action. Ideal for dehydrated, mature and sensitive skin, the cleanser is gentle and replenishing whilst effectively removing skin impurities and make up.
Gentle Rose Exfoliator (50ml)
The Gentle Rose Exfoliator boasts a gel formula with tiny exfoliating Jojoba beads that work to brighten and smooth skin for a naturally radiant glow. The exfoliator is gentle enough to use every day on all skin types- especially sensitive or mature. A hydrating blend of Absolute of Moroccan Rose, soothing Cucumber and smooth micro spherical Jojoba beads exfoliate very gently yet effectively, leaving your skin silky and soft to the touch. The exfoliator is ideal for using prior to a treatment mask or moisturiser as it improves the penetration of other moisture treatments; helping you to re-hydrate and replenish your skin.
Hydra-Boost Day Cream (20ml)
Intensively hydrating, the Hydra-Boost Day Cream will banish areas of dryness to leave skin feeling smooth and soft. Enriched with an expert blend of Hyaluronic Acid, Marsh Samphire extract and Starflower Oil to strengthen your skin's natural moisture barrier, it also contains organic Myrtle and Vitamin E to protect skin against free radical damage. Producing an instant moisturising effect, it's the perfect treat for dry skin that is in need of a boost of hydration.
Cellular Recovery Skin Bliss Capsules (14 capsules)
The Cellular Recovery Skin Bliss Capsules are the ultimate anti-pollution solution; containing potent age-defying anti-oxidants to refresh, nourish and distress skin. The capsules work to visibly repair signs of ageing as well as sweeping clean the skin cell matrix, ridding it of toxins to allow nutrients to be absorbed, thus renewing youthful skin vitality. Lavender and Rose Absolute provide a ‘bliss effect’, meaning skin appears de-stressed and thoroughly nourished. The Rose day capsule restores a youthful bloom to skin, whilst the Lavender evening capsule balances and repairs stressed skin.
name: Your New Skin Solution - Hydrate

product_description:
Specifically formulated for sensitive and dry skin, the alcohol-free Toning Lotion from NUXE works to eliminate remaining traces of make-up and impurities after cleansing.
Fortified with 95% natural ingredients, the delicate toner utilises soothing Damascena Rose water and calming Witch Hazel to refresh and revitalise your complexion without uncomfortable tightness, whilst Hyaluronic Acid and Allantoin maintain hydration levels to leave skin clear, smooth and clarified. The perfect finishing touch to make-up removal that won't dry out your skin.
name: Toning Lotion 400ml

product_description:
利用 First Aid Beauty面部Radiance贴片激发天然、健康光泽。 结合适量乳酸和乙醇酸，使贴片能够日常安全使用，它们可提高肌肤的清晰度，同时明显缩小毛孔并减少细纹，获得更亮丽、光滑和年轻的肌肤。
适合所有肌肤类型，即使是最敏感的肌肤，它的黄瓜和印度醋栗混合物可调理肌肤，同时柠檬皮和甘草让肌肤焕然一新，肤色亮丽，光彩照人。 - K.N.
name: Aid Beauty面部Radiance贴片（28片）

product_description: Treat and transform skin with the FOREO LUNA™ play , an ultra-portable facial-cleansing device designed to provide a professional standard of skincare with its invigorating one-minute ritual. Perfect for all skin types, the facial brush inspires healthier-looking skin; helping to clear and clarify for a more luminous complexion. The perfect introductory product for FOREO beginners, the travel-sized device is the smallest in the range, and requires just one full charge for up to 100 uses*. Combining T-Sonic™ Pulsation Technology from the LUNA™ mini 2 with FOREO'S signature, non-porous silicone touch-points, the device gently yet effectively cleanses and exfoliates with a single intensity, dual-zone range; its thicker touch points at the top perform an intense clean to help unclog pores and lift away dirt, oil and dead skin, whilst softer, thinner points at the bottom gently cleanse sensitive or normal skin, and larger areas such as the cheeks. Flexible and easy to use, the silicone ' bristles' are ultra-hygienic and resist bacteria build-up to keep skin fresh and clean. Easy to operate and super-portable, the device combines the high-tech power of the LUNA™ range with the ease of a single intensity. Experience simple cleansing without the need to recharge. Skin appears bright, refined and more even in tone. 100% waterproof, the device is safe for use in the bath or shower. T-Sonic™ pulsation technology (8,000 T-Sonic™ pulsations per minute) will remove 99.5% of dirt and oil (based on clinical trials) plus makeup residue. 產品特徵 : 非可再充電電池：高達 100 次使用壽命。 1 脈衝密度。 超衛生。 完全防水。 適合所有肌膚類型。 旅遊友好的大小 -   化妝棉同樣大小。 * 改裝置每天使用兩次可使用 1-2 個月。

Rose Moisture Plus Moisturising Lotion (50ml)
Discover a dual action hydrator with the Rose Moisture Plus Moisturising Lotion; a lightweight, replenishing formula that provides hydration and protection. The lotion envelops skin in a luxurious veil of long-lasting moisture, which eliminates areas of dryness, whilst softening and soothing the complexion. Utilising an antioxidant complex, the rose lotion fights also free radical damage to ensure skin appears radiant, youthful and healthy. Effortlessly absorbing into the visage, the lotion leaves skin comfortably hydrated, smooth and balanced.
Rosewater Balancing Mist (30ml)
Stay fresh-faced and fancy free with the Rosewater Balancing Mist, the only mist that rebalances and rejuvenates the skin in one, fresh and friendly sensation. product_description:
Foreo Luna露娜迷你洁面刷树立了面部清洁的一座新里程碑，结合FOREO突破传统的T-Sonic ™技术与创新硅胶刷设计，能更深层更温柔地清洁肌肤。T-Sonic ™ 透肤声波脉动通过光滑的硅胶触点导入肌肤深层，帮助清除会引起痘痘的污垢，比起使用双手洗脸有着显著的效果，使肌肤更加净透、明亮。深层清洁可疏通、收缩毛孔，净化光滑肤质。3天之内，肌肤即可焕发年轻健康的光彩。
露娜迷你洁面刷可以和其他洁面产品一起使用，每天早晚使用一分钟即可赋予肌肤自然健康光泽，使其恢复至平滑年轻状态。可有效清除彩妆、祛除肌肤细纹。LUNA™ mini 露娜™迷你独有的不具渗透性卫生表面设计可有效抵抗细菌滋生，这是其他声波洗脸刷无法匹敌的。每个露娜™迷你都有1300个光滑无磨损的硅胶触点，让您体验舒适自如地清洁。多功能的三区洁面刷头适用于各种肌肤类型，您完全无需担心适配问题。防水功能可以让你在沐浴时也尽情享用，充电式设计无需更换电池。
未来护肤领域突破性进步将由T-SONIC™透肤声波脉动技术来推动——它是一种更深层更轻柔的革命性新型清洁方式。露娜™迷你将声波脉动透过皮肤表层传递至深层，只需3天即可发现与感受肌肤焕然一新的状态。它可以彻底清理毛孔中的杂质，避免皮肤问题的产生。与此同时平滑美肌，净透肤质，为您带来意想不到的效果。小巧、精致的设计，再加上一次充电可使用300次的强大动力使露娜™迷你非常便于携带。它的防水功能可以让你在沐浴时也尽情享用，并且无需更换刷头。产品特性：
无需更换刷头
享有2年保修保障。
100%防水无渗透的设计可以让你在沐浴时也尽情享用。
柔软硅胶触点赋予肌肤最温和的护理。
LUNA™露娜™100%的环保设计让您在一次充电后可使用多达300次。
T-Sonic ™透肤声波脉动可帮助清除毛孔中的污垢、油脂以及化妆品残留，清理坏死角质细胞。
建议清洁面部不同区域时各用约 15 秒钟；露娜™迷你 T-Sonic ™脉动每过 15 秒钟后闪动以作提示。
1. 卸妆后，湿润脸部后涂上您的洁面乳，并湿润露娜™迷你的刷面。
2. 按中间键开启露娜™迷你，进入高频清洁模式。从下巴开始，沿着下颚向上轻柔抚动至耳朵，再逐步清洁更上面的区域，直至清洁完整边脸颊。
3. 重复步骤 2，清洁另一边脸颊。
4. 然后从额头的中间分别向两边轻轻抚动，直至清洁整个额头。
5. 清洁鼻子时用露娜™迷你在鼻子的一侧上下轻轻划动，然后以同样的方法清洁鼻子的另一侧。清洁眼睛以下部位时，建议按“–”键调低露娜™迷你的脉动强度，特别轻柔地向外抚动。
一分钟结束后，露娜™迷你的指示灯会持续灯亮。此时可用水冲洗面部完成一分钟清洁。请注意为了防止使用过度，露娜™迷你处于清洁模式三分钟后会自动关机。
针对不同类型的肤质而专业设计，露娜™迷你的刷头以特定的顺序排列，分为多功能的三区：正面的细型刷头可温柔清洁敏感型或干燥型肌肤；正面上端的粗粒刷头用于准确清洁手洗不易清洁到的区域，如鼻子、鼻翼两侧、耳朵和发际线周围；背面粗粒刷头可以将脉动更直接地传递到肌肤，进行深层清洁，适合清洁油性肤质。
T-Sonic ™ 透肤声波脉动通过光滑硅胶触点导入肌肤，带来每分钟8000次脉动，帮助清除毛孔中的污垢、油脂以及化妆品残留，清理坏死角质细胞，更促进皮肤血液循环，减少细纹和皱纹，让肌肤绽放青春活力。
T-Sonic™脉动能清除肌肤杂质，比手洗更有效地进行深层清洁。因为手指无法像露娜™一样具有硅胶质地可以深层净化毛孔和清理坏死角质细胞。此外，手指本身也经常具有油污、细菌和其他污染物。
不同于纤维性刷毛，硅胶刷头不会滋生细菌并且完全不具有渗透性。由于完全防水且不会吸收油脂、污垢或化妆品残留，清洗简单方便，可以在短时间内清洗干净，快速晾干。因此硅胶产品是更安全卫生的面部清洁设备。不仅如此，硅胶还具有温和抗敏功效，和市场上相似产品相比，硅胶光滑、柔软的质地更适合面部清洁。
请注意:
本产品的质保时间为自购买之日起两年，任何因产品制造或材料缺陷引起的质量问题均属于质保范围。如果您有任何此类质量问题并在质保期内请通知FOREO，FOREO将免费为您更换产品.
作为 FOREO 两年质保的延续，FOREO提供十年质保服务。
name: Luna露娜迷你洁面刷 - 海棠紫
