product_description:
Reveal fresh luminosity with the Elemis Your New Skin Solution - Iluminate; an indulgent collection of skincare essentials that work to revive a dull and lacklustre complexion. The set is host to a daily cleanser, hydrating balm, potent peel and facial oil in capsule form. Combined, the products are able to create a lit-from-within finish.
Pro-Radiance Cream Cleanser (150ml)
Discover an anti-ageing face wash with the Pro-Radiance Cream Cleanser. The deep cleansing formula utilises innovative solutions to thoroughly and effectively cleanse skin, whilst defending against daily pollutants. The cleanser thoroughly removes makeup and daily grime from the complexion. The wash leaves impurities cleansed, fine lines and wrinkles visibly smoothed and skin healthy-looking.
Pro-Radiance Illuminating Flash Balm (15ml)
Discover a new generation of moisturisers with the Pro-Radiance Illuminating Flash Balm. Carefully formulated, the balm takes hydration to a new level. With every use, skin is nourished and enhanced with its illuminating properties. Without leaving behind a sticky or greasy residue, the hydrating balm offers a fresh, natural-looking boost for your complexion, leaving skin smooth, dewy and luminous.
Papaya Enzyme Peel (50ml)
The unique, non-granular Papaya Enzyme Peel boasts 7 active ingredients that work to repair and protect skin. The natural exfoliating fruit enzyme action of Papaya and Pineapple visibly smooth, brighten and clarify the complexion. Ideal for sensitive or mature complexions, the formula gently and effectively exfoliates without causing irritation. Skin is treated with Seaweed Actives and Vitamin E, leaving you with smooth and moisturised skin.
Cellular Recovery Skin Bliss Capsules (14 capsules)
The Cellular Recovery Skin Bliss Capsules are the ultimate anti-pollution solution; containing potent age-defying anti-oxidants to refresh, nourish and distress skin. The capsules work to visibly repair signs of ageing as well as sweeping clean the skin cell matrix, ridding it of toxins to allow nutrients to be absorbed, thus renewing youthful skin vitality. Lavender and Rose Absolute provide a ‘bliss effect’, meaning skin appears de-stressed and thoroughly nourished. The Rose day capsule restores a youthful bloom to skin, whilst the Lavender evening capsule balances and repairs stressed skin.
name: Your New Skin Solution - Illuminate

product_description:
這款有機認證的玫瑰果油將滋潤您的肌膚。產品中含有保護細胞膜所必需的脂肪酸以及維他命E、β-胡蘿蔔素和強大的抗衰老抗氧化番茄紅素。這款果油為肌膚提供獨特的油和重要的營養成分，讓肌膚更加閃亮，打造健康膚色。這款護膚品因以幫助舒緩肌膚、促進肌膚再生、讓肌膚順暢呼吸而著稱​​。 
 Sukin 認為，皮膚和頭髮護理產品的最強大、有效的成分來自大自然。注重環保意識的Sukin 是一家來自澳大利亞的天然個人護理品公司。 
 “Skincare that doesn't cost the earth™”（護膚不以損耗地球為代價）— Sukin 的承諾遠遠超出了化妝品。這是一家100% 認證的碳平衡公司，旨在減少其業務對於脆弱環境的影響。 -SA
name: 玫瑰果油 (25ml)

product_description: Magnitone 奢華版絲滑潔顏刷（2 件裝）擁有羽毛般柔軟的刷毛，可為潔面乳打出豐富泡沫，是卓效毛孔淨化和肌膚保濕的理想選擇。可與Magnitone Lucid 和Magnitone Pulsar 潔顏產品搭配使用。 - LM
name: London 奢华版丝滑洁颜刷（一套 2 件）

product_description:
Treat spots and imperfections directly with Mizon Acence Blemish Out Pink Spot Treatment, a concentrated bi-phase formula that combines two solutions to expertly alleviate and prevent the formation of spots.
Rich in anti-inflammatory and anti-microbial ingredients, the multi-layered treatment offers two distinctive layers; the yellow solution combines Alpha and Beta Hydroxy Acids to effectively exfoliate and slough away residue, blackheads and dead skin cells, whilst the calming, Calamine-based pink powder reduces redness and relieves irritation. Working in synergy, the layers expertly protect and calm the skin, drying out targeted spots to promote a clearer, healthier-looking complexion come morning. Do not shake, the layers are supposed to be separate.
Please Note: The solution takes time to settle after travelling. It may be mixed when it first arrives but after letting it sit, you will see the pink sediment settle and separate from the translucent yellow top layer.
name: Acence Blemish Out Pink Spot Treatment 30ml

product_description:
幫助撫平眼周肌膚使用抗氧化密集三效眼霜，一款如藝術品的眼霜專門針對眼周脆弱肌膚。
三種針對性的功效,這款眼霜立即緊緻肌膚同時減少眼周皺紋的出現。

用Murad Clarifying湿巾清洁易现瑕疵的肌肤，令其焕然一新。 临床证明，这款柔软、预先湿润的湿巾可以清除污垢、油和细菌，能够平衡和调理肌肤，有助于最大程度地减少瑕疵的出现。
这款湿巾富含金缕梅、海藻提取物、葡萄籽提取物和维生素 E，可以收紧毛孔、调节皮脂和油生成，保护您的肌肤免受自由基损伤。 这些便利的湿巾 Perfect您在四处奔走时使用，可以舒缓您的肌肤，帮助清除现有的 瑕疵。 - L.M.
name: Clarifying 湿巾

product_description:
Elemis型前胶原补氧晚霜，可在睡眠过程中为肌肤重新补充氧气。 临床证明：此款豪华型、丰富而滋润的晚霜，可增加肌肤氧气含量，促进肌肤再生。　
成分具有强大的抗衰老功效，包括：海珊藻、掌状海带、红珊瑚、抗老化六胜肽等。 本品可延缓肌肤早衰、支持肌肤的天然胶原蛋白系统、提高肌肤弹性、补充肌肤水分。
Elemis型前胶原补氧晚霜旨在为肌肤补充氧气。这些氧气在白天直接遭受环境侵害因素的破坏，如压力、污染、自由基损伤等。 具有抗氧化保护功效和强大细胞凝聚力，可刺激细胞新陈代谢。
使用说明：

利用突破性的Jeunesse的Instantly Ageless抗衰老微粒滋润霜数秒内减少衰老迹象。 强大的抗皱微粒滋润霜立刻溶入肌肤，针对失去弹性的部位，调理、改善肌肤，重塑完美形象。
Instantly Ageless润肤霜拥有轻盈配方，含创新成分六胜肽，其作用类似botox但无需注射，以及一种均匀肤色的滋润调理化合物。 细纹和皱纹均明显减少，眼部下面的黑眼圈和浮肿被清除，毛孔变小。
位于抗衰老技术的前沿，Instantly Ageless令肌肤重获青春，恢复至最佳状态。 – E.W.
name: Ageless抗衰老微粒滋润霜

product_description:
Refresh your complexion with the Pixi Vitamin Wakeup Mist; a skin boosting toner designed to deliver an awakened effect.
Arriving in the form of a mist, the toner is effortless to apply and is ideal for taking to refresh skin whilst on-the-go. Boasting an Orange Blossom Water base that melts into a blend of Citrus Fruit extracts, Lavender and Arginine, the cooling mist works to revitalise and energise the complexion.
name: Vitamin Wakeup Mist

product_description:
The Evening Primrose Concentrate is an all-natural, multi-tasking treatment to tackle signs of premature ageing, developed by holistic cosmetic brand Weleda.
As we age, skin begins to lose elasticity and collagen production slows down, resulting in skin appearing dull and saggy. This advanced serum is powered by Golden Evening Primrose; a highly active extract that helps stimulate skin’s natural protective and regenerative abilities, as well as extracts of Aloe Vera and Centella Asiatica.
Combined, the lightweight formula creates a visible plumping and firming effect, smoothing the look of fine lines and wrinkles. The complexion is left feeling revitalised and replenished, without the need for harsh chemicals or abrasive treatments.
name: Evening Primrose Concentrate 30ml

product_description:
乳狀潔面液，溫和去除所有化妝和瑕疵痕跡，不去除肌膚的保護油。滋潤和抗菌活性麥盧卡蜂蜜和天然清潔Kumerahou 讓肌膚潔淨、水靈和柔軟。適用於正常和乾燥與成熟肌膚。肌膚是活體器官- 呵護它，它就會提供回報。 
使用前：早晚溫柔在臉上按摩，用溫水清洗或擦淨。用手拍幹，然後使用超級補水爽膚啫喱和保濕霜。 - SC 
 Living Nature 採用100% 天然成分製作而成，利用新西蘭獨特本地植物元素的精華、修復和滋潤功效，包括：新西蘭亞麻膠、桃拓酚、麥盧卡蜂蜜、麥盧卡精油、Hallo 粘土和海藻。 Living nature 從未使用動物做實驗，以後也不會。 
 關於Living Nature： 
 Living Nature 絕對不含合成原料和內分泌干擾物。全部系列均獲德國BDIH 天然認證，並且許多產品具備“全食高級身體護理”標準。 
產品經過獨立驗證，確保安全，而且擁有Skin Deep Cosmetic Safety 數據庫的最佳評級之一。 Living Nature 的政策：如果對原料安全性存在任何疑問，我們都不會使用該原料。 
相反，他們利用新西蘭本地植物的超強植物活性功效，獲得滋養、淨化和修復的肌膚效果。該品牌旗下護膚品高效且充滿活力，能夠增強肌膚固有的自然機能。產品效果經過持續獨立測試審核。
name: Nature 活肤洁面乳 100ml

product_description:
屡获殊荣的润唇膏采用先进的肌肤调理成分乳木果油和鳄梨油。易于吸收，可迅速舒缓干燥、开裂、发炎的唇部。SPF 25 提供全效防护，可抵御日晒、风吹和极端温度。
在暴露于阳光下 30 分钟前，厚厚地均匀涂抹在唇部，或者在感觉干燥或开裂时涂抹。也可在极端天气下外出时涂抹，抵御 UVA、UVB 射线、风吹和寒冷天气的伤害。
name: Black 杰克布莱克强效润唇膏 SPF25（含天然薄荷和乳木果）7g

product_description:
Instantly refresh and invigorate dry, dull and tired skin with the Coldtox Protecting Anti-Ageing Serum from skinChemists. Bursting with nutrient-rich botanical ingredients, the intensely hydrating treatment with age-defying benefits leaves you with a revitalised and glowing complexion.
Infused with Swiss Glacier Water, the innovative serum delivers concentrated spheres of intense moisture that penetrate deep into the epidermis, whilst Aloe Vera extract soothes and nourishes. Snow Algae helps to stimulate natural collagen reproduction, which lifts and tones as well as reinforcing a protective barrier to minimise the appearance of fine lines. Suitable for daily use, the cooling serum ensures brightened and reconditioned skin.
name: Coldtox Protecting Anti-Ageing Serum 50ml

product_description:
Purify and revitalise your skin with the Thalgo Plasmalg Gel. Suitable for the face and body, this soothing gel leaves skin hydrated and refreshed, and rebalances oily skin, relieves eczema, psoriasis and skin conditions.
Thalgo Plasmalg Gel combines the benefits of algae and pure water, mimicking the effects of the sea. By remineralising the skin and encouraging micro-circulation, this gel heals damaged skin on the face and neck.
name: Plasmalg Gel (150 ml)

product_description: DELAROM 推出的这款水盈润泽面膜将为肌肤注入丰盈的水分，特别添加了石榴固醇，这一天然成分能够为肌肤补水，加强天然屏障，形成一道有效对抗干燥的防护膜。 这款面膜具有滋润补水的功效，每周使用1-2次，可以让肌肤散发自然光彩，令人感觉神清气爽。 - K.N.
name: 水盈润泽面膜（50ml）

product_description:
skinChemists 视黄醇抗衰老保湿霜可以深入滋润您的肌肤，还具有抗衰老的功效，让您拥有更年轻的肌肤。
配方含有抗氧化剂视黄醇，可减少粉刺和黑头，对付死亡皮肤细胞和修复自由基损伤，该润肤霜会让您的肌肤更光滑，肤色更均匀。 您的肌肤将健康而有光泽。 - L.M.
使用说明：日常洁面后涂抹于面部和颈部。
name: 视黄醇抗衰老保湿霜（50ml）

product_description:
CODAGE推出的这款爱慕修复活肤精华液由法国制药专家团队精心配制而成。 这款产品富含抗氧化成分，令肌肤散发迷人的均匀光泽，能够滋润并修复肌肤结构，促进表皮生成，以抵御各种天气状况。 混合了多种有效成分，为肌肤提供深层净化，重现活力，防止瑕疵和阳光造成的色素沉着问题。 真正做到为肌肤注入活力，排出毒素。 适合所有肌肤类型。 - K.N.
Hy3 - 具有补水锁水的滋润功效。 这种成分还能够促进胶原蛋白，丰盈并紧实肌肤，令肌肤更年轻。
Ao3 - 这一富含抗氧化因子的成分具有修复和保护功效功效，可以保护肌肤抵御自由基和紫外线的伤害，并修复肌肤已有的损伤。
Po2 - 这一成分具有保护效果，能抵御污染物。 它可以增强肌肤的自然净化，同时保护抗氧化剂并防止细胞死亡。 促进角质细胞的生长，为肌肤增添保护屏障。
Re3 - 除了抗菌消炎，这一成分还具有深层修复的作用，能够促进细胞新生，修复受损的组织。
Dx3 - DX3能够刺激肌肤自然排毒，修复蛋白质并去除毒素，令肌肤焕发活力光泽。
Ec3 - 这一成分具有抗氧化性，能够为细胞注入能量，令肌肤持久保湿，焕发迷人光彩。
Tc3 - 这一成分能够促进细胞再生，改善肤质，修复色斑瑕疵，提亮并均匀肤色。
name: 爱慕修复活肤精华液（30ml）

product_description:
Featuring a set of 7 creams and a small brush for application, Karin Herzog 7 Creams of the Week features a weekly skincare routine, that provides you with a different cream for each day. The set ensures you benefit from all skincare treatments. -SA
Monday - Rose 15ml: Gently hydrate your skin with Rose. The formula contains 1% active oxygen combined with rose extracts to energise the skin and bring luminosity.
Tuesday - AHA Cream 15ml: Revitalize the skin with AHA Cream. The cream is formulated with fruit acids (AHA) known for their gently exfoliating and illuminating effects.
Wednesday - Vita-A-Kombi 1 15ml: The Vita-A-Kombi 1 anti-ageing face cream contains 1% active oxygen combined with Vitamin A to fight against signs of ageing, deeply hydrate and illuminate the complexion.
Thursday – Additional Sweet 15ml: Working to comfort the skin , the nourishing cream Additional Sweet is rich in vitamins to nourish and protect the skin.
Friday - Oxygen Face 15ml: Oxygenate the skin with the 2% oxygen cream Oxygen Face. This cream will purify and deeply hydrate the skin.
Saturday - Essential Mask 15ml: The hydrating face mask Essential Mask with 2% active oxygen fights against signs of tiredness and tones the skin for a genuine boost and instant radiance.
Sunday - Vitamin H 15ml: Rest and nourish the skin with the extra nourishing cream Vitamin H.
name: Herzog 7 Creams of the Week

product_description:
CODAGE 11号终极去皱精华（15ml）专为消除衰老迹象而配制，针对细纹与皱纹，眼部倦容，并紧致肌肤。 这款产品由品牌的法国制药专家团队配制而成，混合了多种高效成分，令肌肤光滑柔软，健康年轻。 - K.R
Hy3 - 具有补水锁水的滋润功效。 这种成分还能够促进胶原蛋白，丰盈并紧实肌肤，令肌肤更年轻。
Ao3 - 这一富含抗氧化因子的成分具有修复和保护功效功效，可以保护肌肤抵御自由基和紫外线的伤害，并修复肌肤已有的损伤。
Ru3 - 这一抗皱成分混合了多种抗衰老因子。 减少面部微小的收缩，抚平并减少细纹与皱纹，一有迹象便立即作用。 具有抗氧化功能，防止肌肤衰老，同时刺激胶原蛋白生成，令肌肤丰盈紧致，呈现年轻魅力。
Ri3 - 这一成分专门针对细纹和皱纹，能够紧致并强韧肌肤结构，防止肌肤进一步衰老。
Fe3 - 这一具有紧致作用的特殊成分针对多种皮肤结构问题，能够促进胶原蛋白的生成，令肌肤丰盈，同时保持滋润光滑。
Lf3 - 立即提拉肌肤，令肌肤迅速由内而外地紧致，长久呈现年轻态。
Aa - 超级抗衰老混合物。 富含抗氧化因子，对抗已有的衰老迹象和倦容，防止其再次出现，这一成分可以增加肌肤的水分含量，调节色素沉着，令肤色更加均匀柔亮。
Tc3 - 针对肤色不均和黑斑等肌肤问题，淡化色斑，令肌肤展现迷人亮泽。 这一成分能够激活肌肤细胞再生，令肤质光滑，散发迷人光彩。
Cn3 - 针对色斑、明显的毛细血管和浮肿等肌肤问题，它可以舒缓眼周肌肤，减少双眸疲态并减缓肌肤衰老。
Pc3 - 这一成分的作用相当于浮肿双眼的排水口，增加肌肤弹性，减轻浮肿。 平滑眼周肌肤，均匀肤色。
name: 11号终极去皱精华（15ml）

product_description:
利用 Living Nature的Sensitive晚霜滋润您的肌肤；经过认证的天然、夜间保湿霜，建议用于干性及敏感性肌肤。
涂于清洁肌肤上，Sensitive Moisture霜提供夜间深层滋养，支持肌肤的天然细胞更新，而且无刺激性。 利用100％天然成分调制而成，这款日霜包含了一系列新西兰本地植物成分，包括有机维尔京椰子油、新西兰亚麻萃取物和鳄梨油。 – E.W.
name: Nature Sensitive晚霜（50ml）

product_description:
MONU Hydrating Moisturiser SPF15 适用于所有肌肤类型，一直被用于防止早衰迹象。 这款轻盈化妆水采用柔焦工艺，具备针对有害 UVA 和 UVB 射线的广谱防晒特性，可保持青春亮泽的肌肤。
透明质酸钠、月见草油和小麦蛋白的有效融合可恢复弹性，紧致肌肤，呈现更丰满、色调均匀的肤色。 强效抗氧化维生素 E 可舒缓炎症，而黑醋栗籽油富含必需脂肪酸，以滋润和平衡肤色。
name: Hydrating Moisturiser SPF15 (50ml)

product_description:
Developed by experts to deliver the highest level of effectiveness, the 'Skin Intervention' prescription kit from CODAGE offers a range of products to treat your skin before and after cosmetic procedures such as peels, lasers and injections. A complete programme, the collection helps prepare your skin pre-procedure, and treat and repair afterwards. Skin will feel completely soothed and regenerated. - K.N.
Micro-Peeling Mask (7ml):
To enhance the effectiveness of your aesthetic procedure, skin must be free of dead cells and impurities. Used once or twice a week beforehand, this mask will optimise the effect and results of the treatment to come, and make your skin more receptive to guarantee an even, uniform and radiant complexion.
SERUM N°01 (5ml):
This intensely moisturising serum nourishes skin on the surface and deep down to reveal a truly hydrated complexion. Skin battered by heat and sea salt will benefit tremendously.
SKIN RECOVERY (10ml):
The ultimate skin repair serum. Two or three days following the procedure, use morning and night to repair, calm and regenerate your weakened skin. Used at night, this powerful skin regeneration enhancer will make your complexion more uniform and radiant.
Night Cream (15ml):
A rich, moisturising emulsion dedicated to repairing skin overnight; a peak period for cellular regeneration. Purifying and nourishing, the cream with hyaluronic acid regenerates dermal stem cell activity whilst stimulating elastin and collagen production for smoothed-out wrinkles and a toned appearance. Expect healthy, moisturised, plump skin. Suitable for all skin types, including dry or ageing skin.
name: Prescription - Skin Intervention

product_description:
利用 skinChemists高级Bee Venom Duo Moisturiser对抗衰老的同时滋润肌肤，这款抗衰老配方能够充分发挥蜂毒的抗衰老、丰盈特性。
旨在焕发肌肤活力，该保湿霜既能够保湿又具有防皱特性；其所含蜂毒可促进血液循环，并主动丰盈肌肤，减少可见皱纹，同时麦卢卡蜂蜜和牛油果脂可滋养、安慰和软化肌肤。
帮助改善各层皮肤之间的营养输送，该焕发青春乳液可促进肌肤紧实，其所含透明质酸可刺激胶原蛋白的产生，获得紧致的肌肤。
肌肤获得滋补，重焕青春，肤色均匀、无油光，散发健康光泽。 - K.N.
name: Venom Duo Moisturiser（50ml）

product_description:
Regenerate and rejuvenate your complexion with the Eternal Snow Cream from Polaar. Fortified with nunatak, an arctic flower that survives extreme climatic conditions, the fast-absorbing cream reduces signs of ageing, minimises redness and erases imperfections to reveal a smoother, healthy-looking appearance.
Works to increase suppleness and elasticity, whilst restoring comfort and deeply moisturising skin to revive radiance. Improves the natural barrier function of the epidermis, delivers intense hydration and eliminates toxins to reignite a natural glow. Lightly fragranced, you can expect a transparent, luminous finish. E.N.
name: Eternal Snow Cream 50ml

product_description:
Enrich your skin with Karin Herzog Vitamine H, an intensely moisturising face cream that works to restore moisture and softness back into dehydrated or maturing skin types.
Suitable for those with dry skin, or those experiencing skin conditions such as rosacea, psoriasis and eczema, the super lightweight moisturiser blends detoxifying Beta-Carotene (which gives it its rich colour) with a Vitamin B-complex to deliver essential energy into skin. Its replenishing and nourishing properties leave skin feeling soft, refined and firmer-looking. Dryness is banished and moisture levels are rebalanced.
name: Herzog Vitamin H Day Cream (50ml)

product_description:
IOMA  纯粹活力洁肤水 ，使肌肤再现活力。 可消除污垢、祛除彩妆，不会令肌肤过度干燥，舒缓配方，即使是最敏感的肌肤，也可恢复活力、感觉舒适。
具有丝绸般的质地，可轻松上妆，不含香料，富含甘菊和蓖麻油等成分，可软化肌肤，使肌肤光滑柔软；富含抗氧化剂的锦葵精华，可保护修复肌肤。 使肌肤滋润、舒爽、得到净化。 E.N.
name: 纯粹活力洁肤水140ml

product_description:
利用来自PIXI的Nourishing 唇油修复和保护干燥、敏感的嘴唇。 该营养丰富的配方利用牛油果脂和甜杏仁、杏、月见草油的混合物令嘴唇光润顺滑。
该唇部去角质油配有一个按摩涂抹器，可促进血液循环，为您带来健康、丰满的翘唇。 – E.W.
name: Nourishing唇油

product_description:
IOMA温和爽肤水，配方轻盈，可轻柔地洗去杂质，使肌肤紧致。
这款泡沫爽肤水具有独特的通风质感，可有效地掉妆脸上化妆痕迹，保护肌肤的天然屏障（水脂膜），同时安抚肌肤，滋润保护肌肤。 采用微型胶原的活性成分 MATRIXYL™3000，使肌肤重新致密，促进成纤维细胞的新陈代谢；100％的天然糖张OSILIFT，可提升拉紧肌肤。 使肌肤干净、清爽、年轻。 - K.N
name: 温和爽肤水 150ml

product_description:
My PAYOT 亮白晚间护理霜 是 PAYOT 化妆品牌的一种 ，可在晚间促进皮肤排毒。 本豪华型护理霜含超果粒如，枸杞和巴西莓浆果。可对皮肤进行补水、深度修复、减少肌肤疲劳及压力。
本品含滋养型榛子油及活性双歧乳杆菌，可使肌肤再生、阻隔环境污染对皮肤的损害、恢复肌肤光采、促进皮肤血液循环、使用后的第二天早晨，肤色将会焕发光泽、清新明朗。 适用于所有肌肤类型。
name: PAYOT 亮白晚间护理霜 （50ml）

product_description:
Keep facial hair in tip-top condition with the Amber 54 Beard Oil from Carsons Apothecary; a brand who utilise traditional formulas to deliver high performance grooming products.
Enriched with a unique blend of oils, including Rosehip, Grapeseed and Sweet Almond, the non-greasy formula nourishes hair and skin, whilst its masculine fragrance (blended by master perfumers) imparts subtle notes of raw amber and relaxing lavender.
Housed in a pump bottle for mess-free application, hair is left soft and hydrated, and skin feels revitalised.
name: Apothecary Amber 54 Beard Oil

product_description:
IOMA柔和去角质乳液，可深层洁净肌肤，提升肤质。
内含二氧化硅颗粒，可轻柔擦洗，有效祛除肌肤死皮细胞，溶解黑头，调节皮脂分泌，使肌肤更洁净、更精致。 本款去角质乳液可深层清洁肌肤，有效去除污垢；内含的牛蒡，有助于收紧毛孔，使肤色光滑。 使肌肤紧实精致、干净平衡。 - K.N
name: 柔和去角质乳液 50 ml

product_description:
PAYOT AOX Riche 驻颜霜是一种抗衰老润肤霜，可深度补水、使面部轮廓更加鲜明、抚平面部深皱纹及细纹。
这种高性能驻颜霜拥有独家专利 AOX 系统，可使您感到舒适、皮肤得到滋养。同时还可对抗自由基。 该驻颜霜包含OMEGAS 3及6，可保持表皮厚度、使皮肤光滑、湿润（因其包含葡萄籽油、鳄梨油、 及牛油果油成分）、减少皮肤皱纹、细纹、色素沉着，使您拥有年轻靓丽的肌肤。
它包含光线反射成分，可提高皮肤亮度、隐藏皱纹、减少皮肤干燥区域及暗沉区域。 因此您将拥有更加光洁靓丽的皮肤、看起来更年轻、更精致。
该驻颜霜适合所有皮肤类型。
name: PAYOT AOX Riche 驻颜霜（适用于干性皮肤）

product_description:
PAYOT Crème Riche Dermo-Apaisante 润肤乳可缓解皮肤疼痛及敏感，同时舒缓肌肤、为肌肤补水。
本品超轻巧，可被皮肤快速吸收。配方具有护理功效，富含甘油、角鲨烷、藻聚糖醛酸，可为肌肤补充营养、修复肌肤，还您舒适的肌肤。 本品可每天使用，使皮肤红肿及疼痛最小化，令肌肤清爽、平衡、超柔软。为化妆提供一个平滑的肌肤基础。
name: Crème Dermo-Apaisante 润肤乳50ml

product_description:
Maximise the benefits of your skincare regimen with the UltraLuxe Seaweed Liposome Gel – Maintenance; a nourishing, protective formula that cares for skin.
Packed full of antioxidants and Vitamins B5, C and E, the Seaweed ‘power shake’ promotes a healthy-looking complexion, whilst acting as a primary delivery system for expediting and maximising the benefits of skincare products to follow.
A protective blend of Frankincense, Tangerine, and Rosewood extracts shields skin from damaging environmental aggressors and premature ageing, whilst offering the complexion a veil of long-lasting moisture. After use, the complexion appears firm, toned and purified.
name: Seaweed Liposome Gel - Maintenance

product_description:
Real Chemistry's Daily Serum is a lightweight, protein-rich serum that works to improve the appearance of skin and protect from environmental aggressors.
Fortified with a proprietary MTHV Complex®, the serum delivers a veil of invisible protection to keep skin safeguarded from oxidative stress whilst reducing the look of dark spots, fine lines and wrinkles.
Expect a brighter, more even-looking complexion.
name: Chemistry Daily Serum

product_description:
Catering specifically for acne-prone or oily skin types, the Oil-Free Nourishing Serum from Wilma Schumann  works to moisturize, hydrate and improve the appearance of skin.
Fortified with extracts from Salmon Caviar (rich in essential Omega-3), the fast-absorbing formula replenishes and revitalizes, while Allantoin softens and smoothens damaged skin to reveal a conditioned, rejuvenated complexion.
name: Schumann Oil-Free Nourishing Serum 30ml

product_description:
Re-energise tired, weary eyes with the Skin Authority Reviving Eye Brightener, a luxurious eye cream that combines a host of natural botanicals, vitamins and antioxidants to promote smoother, firmer, radiant-looking eyes.
Specially formulated for delicate skin around the eye, the cream utilises AOX Technology™ and delivers CoQ10 Enzymes and Vitamin E to expertly moisturise skin whilst reducing the appearance of puffiness, dark circles and fine lines. Its blend of Ginseng, Gingko Biloba and Olive Oil nourish and calm irritation. Skin around the eyes looks brighter, firmer and refreshed.
name: Authority Reviving Eye Brightener

product_description:
Improve the appearance of your complexion with Skin Authority Vitamin A Cell Renewal, a renewing cream that combines 7% Retinyl Palmitate with a host of vitamins and antioxidants to promote healthier, brighter, more even toned skin.
The gentle retinoid formula will help to reduce the appearance of blemishes and scars whilst smoothing skin's texture and brightening dull, discoloured patches. Its hydrating properties ensure the skin doesn't feel over dried, and AOX Technology™ leaves dry, rough skin looking softer and healthier.
name: Authority Vitamin A Cell Renewal

product_description:
Quench your skin with the Hydrating Facial Mist from Wilma Schumann, a refreshing spray that can be applied over make-up to revitalize dull, tired complexions.
Utilizing anti-aging and moisturizing ingredients, the lightweight mist delivers superior hydration to thirsty skin, whilst infusing a natural fragrance to uplift the senses. Suitable for all skin types, you can expect a radiant, rejuvenated complexion with restored luminosity.
name: Schumann Hydrating Facial Mist 80ml

product_description:
Treat dry, dehydrated skin to the Moisture Intensiv™ Restorative Crème from Wilma Schumann. 
Synergizing a unique blend of plant extracts, oligopeptides and pentapeptides, the super-rich cream delivers long-lasting hydration, while defending against environmental aggressors to reveal a radiant, youthful complexion. Infuses skin with a subtle, natural fragrance.
name: Schumann Moisture Intensiv™ Restorative Crème 50ml

product_description: Treat oily and acne prone skin to the Purifying Facial Mask from Wilma Schumann. The natural treatment contains antimicrobial and astringent elements and is designed to reduce the appearance of excess sebum in skin. Resulting in visibly cleaner and clearer skin.
name: Schumann Purifying Facial Mask 105ml

product_description:
Reignite a youthful glow with Skin Authority's Beauty Infusion™ Turmeric & Blueberry for Brightening; a radiance-reviving oil formula that works to restore a luminous complexion.
Synergising Tumeric, Curcumin and antioxidant-rich Blueberry, the fast-absorbing, non-greasy treatment helps to minimise the appearance of dark spots and discolouration, whilst delivering intense moisture to leave your complexion smooth, even and refined. Can be used alone or mixed with foundation and skincare products.
name: Authority Beauty Infusion™ Turmeric & Blueberry for Brightening

product_description: 60毫升的Jack Black Epic Moisture MP10 Nourishing Oil含有清爽的多种天然油脂，可以充分补水，具有多种必须营养素和有效的抗氧化剂，从而改善秀发和皮肤对的外观和触感，因此是一款多功效的精华产品。  本产品中含有多种植物提取物，例如坚果油、橄榄、和荷荷巴油，并采取先进的技术来增强其功效，同时， 配方中不含有苯甲酸酯类、硫酸盐或邻苯二甲酸酯，因此即使是干性或者敏感性皮肤，也适合使用。  - E.D
name: Black Epic Moisture MP10 Nourishing Oil （60ml）

product_description:
Shield and protect with Skin Authority's Hydrating Sunscreen SPF30; a fast-absorbing, water-resistant formula that works to minimise ageing effects caused by sun, stress and environmental aggressors.
Fortified with innovative AOX Technology™, the sunscreen utilises vitamins and antioxidants to hydrate and moisturise skin, whilst providing broad spectrum protection to defend against UV rays. Its unique Dry Finish Technology™ means you don't have to worry about greasy, sticky or white residue.
name: Authority Hydrating Sunscreen SPF30

product_description:
Wake up to a glowing complexion with this Ultra-Repair Overnight Regenerating Treatment from Dr Botanicals; a lifting, plumping night treatment that helps to reduce fine lines and wrinkles as you sleep. The overnight treatment moisturises dehydrated skin and repairs imperfections such as the visible signs of ageing on mature skin.
The lightweight regeneration serum is enriched with a range of botanical extracts including: Carrot Cells, which are rich in mineral salts and antioxidants that help to rejuvenate the skin; Olive Oil, which is full of fatty acids that help to plump and restore the skin; and Avocado Peptides, which encourage the production of Hyaluronic Acid that hydrates dry and stressed skin. – E.W.
name: Botanicals Ultra-Repair Overnight Regenerating Treatment (50ml)

product_description:
Quench skin’s thirst with the SOS Hydra Moisture & Radiance Mask from Mádara. The Hydra Mask is designed to provide immediate comfort to particularly dry skin that can appear tired and dull. Tightness will be visibly reduced and any itching prevented.
Formulated with a blend of moisturising sugars, Hyaluronic acid and nettle, the mask is designed to deliver comforting water-based moisture to skin and strengthen its protective barrier in order to prevent further dehydration. The lightweight formula boasts a soft and powdery scent and will leave skin looking hydrated and youthful.
name: SOS Hydra Moisture & Radiance Mask 60ml

product_description:
Revitalise tired eyes with Shiffa's Rejuvenating Eye Remedy; a lightweight, antioxidant-rich formula that utilises carefully selected ingredients to repair, hydrate and decongest the delicate eye area.
Harnessing the powers of healing Aloe Vera and calming Lavender, the fast-absorbing cream helps to smoothen the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles, whilst Spirulina (a blue-green algae found in alkaline-rich lakes) targets dark circles and puffiness. Sea Buckthorn delivers high levels of Vitamin C to nourish and brighten the eye area, leaving it refreshed, restored and youthful-looking.
name: Rejuvenating Eye Remedy 15ml

product_description:
For use with the DermaTx Facial Tool in DermaTx Microdermabrasion Systems.
The cleansing brush attachment can be used for daily deep cleansing. Can be used with a cleanser of your choice.
Please Note: It is recommended that the attachment heads are changed regularly, at least every three months.
name: Replacement Heads - Set 3

product_description:
Restore tired, ageing eyes with the PRAI PLATINUM Firm & Lift Eye Serum, an anti-ageing eye formula infused with firming Platinum, one of Earth's most highly coveted precious metals.

Working to reverse signs of ageing around the delicate eye area, the 'liquid eye lift' smoothens visible signs of ageing, including fine lines and wrinkles, and utilises NULASTIC™ SILK and PRAISOMES™ to build skin structure and release nutrients into skin. Rich in antioxidants, the formula defends against harmful free radicals and environmental aggressors. Its dose of PRAI Oil leaves skin feeling smooth, fresh and supple with restored youthfulness.
name: PLATINUM Firm & Lift Eye Serum 15ml

product_description:
Designed to inspire a relaxing slumber, Kiss the Moon's After Dark Balm - Dream releases a cloud of pure tranquillity to help you drift off to sleep.
Expertly blended with natural essential oils of Lavender, Bergamot, Cedarwood and Chamomile, its sleep-inducing fragrance allows you to wind down after a stressful day, whilst nourishing Shea Butter and White Tea Seed Oil absorb quickly into pulse points to leave you feeling deeply rejuvenated.
name: the Moon After Dark Balm 12g - Dream

product_description:
PRAI present the BLACK ORCHID Youth Activating Luxe Serum; a fast-absorbing, plant-based formula developed to target visible signs of ageing.
Fortified with revolutionary Epigenomyl® (derived from Calendula) and Collageneer® (extracted from White Lupine Seed), the silky serum helps to support collagen and elastin for a firmer, more refined complexion. Black Orchid Extract minimises the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles, whilst restoring suppleness to reveal soft, smooth skin with a youthful glow.
name: BLACK ORCHID Youth Activating Luxe Serum 30ml

product_description:
Conceal complexion imperfections with the PAYOT Uni Skin CC Cream. Suitable for all skin types, the colour correcting cream is designed to reduce and conceal the appearance of complexion disorders, including redness, dark spots and dullness.
Upon contact with the skin, the fine, melt-in texture transforms, adapting perfectly to the skin tone and delivering a subtle finish.
name: Uni Skin CC Cream 40ml

product_description:
Discover PRAI AGELESS Throat Peel & Reveal; a lightweight neck and décolleté treatment, that rewinds the years and reduces the visible signs of ageing.
Simply apply the formula to a cotton pad and sweep onto skin. Peel & Reveal will gently yet effectively, exfoliate and hydrate skin, whilst reducing the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles. Enriched with a potent blend of Lactic and Salicylic acid, the treatment leaves the neck and décolleté visibly tighter and thoroughly softened. After the peeling effect, expect youthful and glowing skin to be revealed.
name: AGELESS Throat Peel & Reveal 120ml

product_description:
Erno Laszlo逆時光密集璀璨精華素可減少細紋和皺紋的出現，直擊老化肌膚，明顯看見改變、天天感受青春肌齡。 ERNO LASZLO抗老實驗室團隊特別耗時數年研發，配合肌膚週期，連續4步驟全日密集賦予青春能量，提供肌膚維持健康的平衡狀態，由內而外啟動層層抗老機制、逆轉時光，再造青春無齡肌。 
獨特配方中含有BioCellessence，可最大限度地抑制被稱為早衰蛋白的毒蛋白的產生。同時RapidGen幹細胞技術可增加細胞更新，改善皮膚彈性，同時保護肌膚免受自由基的傷害。 
這款神奇產品可有效抗老化，減少細紋和皺紋，改善膚色和皮膚的彈性，富含甘油和橄欖天然潤膚，含有角鯊烷可在皮膚形成保護膜防止水份流失，增強健康膚色。含有透明質酸鈉，可深入滲透肌膚，保持肌膚水分，促進營養吸收，皮膚更柔軟光滑。適合所有肌膚類型。 
此款精華素可在28天中分四個階段令肌膚重煥活力：深層保濕、彈性修復、緊緻提拉以及最終的重塑肌膚。 
 Phase 1 (第一周):深層補水
 Phase 2 (第二週):補充彈性
 Phase 3 (第三週):緊緻提拉
 Phase 4 (第四周): 重塑肌膚
 包括4 個15ml/0.5oz 真空玻璃瓶。 
 使用方法 ： 
每天早晚使用，連續使用28天。每週使用一真空玻璃瓶
潔面和爽膚後，取少量塗抹於面部、頸部和頸下三角區。
name: Laszlo逆时光密集璀璨精华素旅行装(15ml)

product_description:
Gently and efficiently remove all traces of eye makeup with the Purity Eye Cleanser from AromaWorks. The powerful cleanser boasts the ability to remove even the most stubborn waterproof makeup, resulting in eyes that are free from makeup and impurities.
Infused with a blend of essential oils including Jojoba, May Chang and Roman Camomile, the formula is suitable for all skin types and seeks to condition the sensitive eye area, visibly soothing any irritation and redness.
name: Purity Eye Cleanser 60ml

product_description:
Nourish dry and dull skin with the IOMA Deep Care Moisturising Mask. With a refreshing gel formula, the soothing treatment works to restore optimum hydration levels and reinforce skin’s natural protective barriers.
Enriched with active mineral-rich Aquaxyl and Red Algae Extract, the lavish mask repairs and softens skin whilst Hyaluronic Acid works to improve texture and elasticity. Perfect for all skin types, the intensive mask transforms skin and leaves you with a revitalised and smooth complexion.
name: Deep Care Moisturising Mask 50ml

product_description:
Visibly plump your complexion with the pack of 8 Age-Adapt® Face Masks from SkinPointEight. Hydrating and soothing skin, the sheet masks deliver an array of nourishing ingredients to the face, transforming the complexion and leaving it youthful.
The masks boast a blend of antioxidant rich Ginseng and Astralagus, which work in synergy to improve micro-circulation and boost skin’s collagen production. Detoxifying on a cellular level, the innovative masks are crafted with highly absorbent Tencel® fibre and allow you to enjoy visibly firmer and calmer skin.
The anti-ageing masks are complete with a duo of age-reversing actives, Magnolol and Honokiol, which combine to target the visible signs of ageing, reduce the appearance of enlarged pores and leave skin smooth and hydrated.
name: Age-Adapt® Face Mask 8 Individual Tencel® Masks

product_description:
Transform the eye area with the Age-Adapt® Eye Serum from SkinPointEight. Visibly rewinding the years, the anti-ageing serum is specially formulated to revive tired looking eyes and deliver a youthful finish.
Boasting a sophisticated adaptogen blend, the eye serum utilises Chinese medicinal herbs and revolutionary western actives to gently and effectively penetrate the delicate eye area. Maintaining and reviving skin’s elasticity, the nutrient rich serum visibly plumps the skin and reduces the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles, including stubborn crow's feet.
The Age-Adapt® is able to protect skin against environmental damage and photo-ageing, leaving delicate eyes protected, hydrated and youthful.
name: Age-Adapt® Eye Serum 15ml

product_description:
Mizon Men'Er Energetic Power Skin Care Program combines a trio of must-have skincare products, designed specifically to treat men's skin. The cleanser, after-shave treatment and moisturiser work in synergy to promote smoother, softer, younger-looking skin.
Men'Er Energetic Charcoal Foaming Cleanser (30ml)
A foaming facial wash formulated specially for men. Performing a deep cleanse to remove sebum and impurities, the cleanser effectively decongests pores to help prevent blackheads and blemishes whilst moisturising and nourishing the complexion. Its dose of Oak Tree Charcoal gently removes dead skin to reveal a smooth, clarified and comfortable complexion.
Men'Er Energetic Fresh Water (150ml)
A revitalising and calming water solution to help alleviate feelings of irritation after shaving. Utilising a 3S Formula comprising extracts of Raspberry, Lavender and Hedera Helix, the soothing and astringent post-shave formula helps to relax and calm skin whilst controlling excess sebum to combat enlarged pores and shine. Infused with Panthenol, Allantoin and Hyaluronic Acid, it will replenish moisture and elasticity whilst imparting a delicate fragrance. Skin feels fresh and comfortable.
Men'Er Energetic Essential moisturiser (80ml)
An anti-ageing, oil-free moisturiser that works as an all-in-one treatment to restore hydration and softness whilst targeting signs of ageing. Delivering antioxidant and anti-fatigue properties, it diminishes the look of expression lines whilst banishing shine and dullness to leave the complexion healthy-looking and balanced. Lightweight and fast absorbing, it melts effortlessly into skin to recharge, moisturise and revitalise. Infused with a handsome fragrance.
name: Men'Er Energetic Power Skin Care Program

product_description:
The Phytomer Body Blur Shaka Shaka Ultra Smoothing Contouring Lotion is a pioneering treatment to instantly smooth the appearance of cellulite while combating visible excess fat.
The unique ‘shaker bottle’, three-phase formula combines water, oil and powder for unparalleled results, seeking to even the look of orange peel and dimpling with an ongoing corrective action. Layered Clay immediately works to visibly blur imperfections, with Brown Algae encouraging enhanced fat burning and ADIPO 3 to strengthen skin tissue.
With continued use, skin appears supple and smooth with redefined contours and a sleek silhouette.
name: Body Blur Shaka Shaka Ultra Smoothing Contouring Lotion 100ml

product_description:
Prove who is the fairest of them all with the Mizon Snow White Cream; a rich, nourishing moisturiser that brightens and softens for a more smooth and even looking complexion.
Fortified with an exclusive HydraTox™ system, the fluffy textured formula effortlessly melts into skin, delivering extract of Golden Pearls to improve high spectrum luminosity and depth while optimising moisture levels.
Enriched with purifying Lemon and Orange, the face cream leaves skin feeling sumptuously softened and hydrated, with the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles visibly reduced for a youthful looking glow.
name: Snow White Cream 50ml

product_description:
Transform tired and ageing skin with the Ocean Power Red Cream from South Korean skincare brand Mizon.
Fortified with a 65% concentration of Red Sea Cucumber extract – the ‘ginseng of the ocean’, the anti-ageing moisturiser has a unique, rubber-like texture that seeks to tighten and firm skin by improving natural elasticity levels.
The appearance of pores and fine lines are visibly softer, with enhanced efficacy due to the sticky formula that gently massages and refines the surface layer. Expect a smoother and revitalised complexion with a youthful looking radiance.
name: Ocean Power Red Cream 50ml

product_description: Boost moisture levels with the Barrier Oil Serum from Korean beauty brand Mizon. Ideal for dull, dry and wanting skin, the concentrated formula contains water-soluble Olive Oil and rapidly absorbs to deliver deep hydration and nutrients. Suitable for regular use, the luxurious serum quickly penetrates skin to form a protective barrier and leave your complexion looking refreshed, supple and positively glowing.
name: Barrier Oil Serum 50ml

product_description:
Reveal soft and supple skin with the SASCO Eco Body Aloe Vera Body Lotion; a rich moisturising cream that nurtures and nourishes skin, whilst enveloping the body in a refreshing fragrance.
Rich in organic Aloe Vera, the soothing formula glides onto skin and absorbs effortlessly. The lotion also boasts a skin-loving blend of Sunflower and Jojoba oils, which deliver intense hydration to skin in need. Skin is left smooth, supple and touchably soft.
name: Eco Body Aloe Vera Body Lotion 200ml

product_description:
FIT 超保湿精华露，具有保湿性能，用以护理脸部。 专为男士配制的精华露，可深度滋润肌肤、修复保护肌肤。
本款轻盈精华露包含了高性能活性成分如：维生素和氨基酸等，采用 OXY-FIT-10技术（一种独特的氧气输送系统），促进细胞再生、刺激肌肤天然修复机制，使肌肤充满活力、焕发光釆。 不油腻、深层渗透，更高效、更持久。 - K.N
name: 超保湿精华露30ml

product_description:
Dr Botanicals presents the Pomegranate Noir Advanced Natural Facial Scrub for Men, a rejuvenating exfoliator that’s bursting with vitamins, minerals and essential oils to leave skin feeling refreshed and clean.
Suitable for all skin types including sensitive, the natural scrub contains Volcanic Pumice to gently buff away dead skin and stimulate cell regeneration, improving tone and brightness. Glycofilm works to create a protective barrier to combat harmful environmental aggressors, whilst Aloe Vera helps moisturise and soften texture. Reveal firmer-feeling and healthier-looking skin.
name: Botanicals Pomegranate Noir Advanced Natural Facial Scrub For Men 50ml

product_description:
Target slackening skin with the Mizon Enjoy Vital-Up Time Firming Mask Set; an anti-ageing treatment that delivers lifting and tightening effects.
Harnessing the powers of Allantoin, Hyaluronic Acid and antioxidant-rich Pomegranate Extract, the face mask helps to improve firmness and elasticity, whilst infusing skin with long-lasting moisture and hydration to reveal a radiant, youthful-looking complexion. The unique microfibre sheet adheres to facial contours for maximum absorbency.
name: Enjoy Vital-Up Time Firming Mask Set 30g

product_description:
Hydrate and protect with the Advanced Derma Care Time Control Solution from Gentlemen's Tonic. Suitable for all skin types, the antioxidant-rich serum utilises Alistin Peptide to defend against pollution, environmental aggressors and free radicals, leaving skin clear and healthy.
Vitamin C slows down melanin production to combat dark spots and pigmentation caused by sun damage, whilst Alpha-Lipoic Acid delivers anti-ageing and anti-inflammatory benefits; minimising the appearance of fine lines, wrinkles and visible pores. Fast-absorbing, the solution helps to promote collagen production and boost circulation, revealing youthful, refined and rejuvenated skin after every use.
name: Tonic Advanced Derma Care Time Control Solution 30ml

product_description:
IOMA 亮白日用乳液，提升肤质、使脸部肌肤焕发光泽。 这款高亮护肤品内含美白聚合物，可彻底精确地净化肌肤，使肌肤再现活力、焕发光采。
由Revelation活性闪亮光学剂制作而成，配方轻盈，产品可与肌肤颜色匹配，优化改善肌肤表层颜色，使肌肤更洁净自然，从而加强肌肤护理、提升肤质。 C.R
name: 亮白日用乳液50ml

product_description:
Take a moment to relax and pamper with the Skin Authority Calming Mask. Ideal for use as an all over face mask or targeted spot treatment for oily skin, the clay-based formula works to gently exfoliate the surface layer and effectively unclog pores, while absorbing excess oil and minimising the look of redness and inflammation.
Fortified with 10% Precipitated Sulfur and proprietary AOX Technology™, it infuses skin with essential moisture, antioxidants and vitamins, helping to clear congestion and prevent future acne breakouts. Perfect for treating oily T-zones and problematic areas, the aromatic mask leaves skin feeling purified, refreshed and balanced.
name: Authority Calming Mask

product_description:
Rio Hydra-Masque使用电沙龙技术和全面面部年轻化治疗的极好玻尿酸Therapy Masque，致力于抗击天然衰老的迹象。
与Anti-Ageing Masque一起使用时，滚轮治疗有助于将面膜的有效成分、青春助推透明质酸从凝胶送入皮肤、保湿和激活胶原蛋白。
多年来，电镀技术在美容院被用作一种抑制面部衰老迹象的强大工具，而透明质酸目前出现在许多市场领先的皮肤护理
保湿剂、精华液和眼霜中。 得益于Rio美容专家这种令人印象深刻的治疗，Skin将感觉到青春焕发、更加水嫩。
name: Hydra Masque

product_description:
Catering for all skin types, including mature, the Gentlemen's Tonic Advanced Derma Care Hero Peptide Serum helps to firm, hydrate and strengthen skin.
Powered by Cocoa Extract (rich in antioxidant Vitamin E) and SNAP-8 (a natural ingredient that delivers a Botox-like effect), the fast-absorbing, anti-ageing serum works to relax facial muscles; reducing the appearance of fine lines and expression wrinkles.
Its highly concentrated formula utilises skin-firming agent Raffermine 2 to tighten and restructure, whilst Signal-10, derived from Sodium Salt of Hyaluronic Acid, has the ability to bind 1,800 times its own weight in water. Skin is soft, smooth and deeply moisturised.
name: Tonic Advanced Derma Care Hero Peptide Serum 30ml

product_description:
Sukin 敏感肌膚保濕霜是一款質地輕盈的柔和保濕霜，可舒緩、鎮定刺激性肌膚，即使最敏感的肌膚也能使用。這款柔和保濕霜內含具有保濕功效的乳木果油、可舒緩肌膚的蘆薈和玫瑰果，並融入了具有滋養功效的芝麻油和荷荷巴油，可瞬間被肌膚吸收且能顯著改善膚色。您的肌膚將倍感舒緩、鎮靜，光彩照人。 - RH 
 使用說明：潔面後，塗抹到面部、頸部和胸口。
name: 敏感肌肤保湿霜 (125ml)

product_description:
德國世家潤唇膏可軟化、滋潤和保護唇部脆弱的肌膚，有助於防止乾燥和開裂。富含軟化和細潤嘴唇的舒緩胡蘿蔔和洋絨毛花，還包含荷荷巴蠟和乳木果油，保護嘴唇不受惡劣條件的影響。 - LM 
 使用說明：需要時塗抹於嘴唇上。
name: Hauschka 德国世家润唇膏 4.9g

product_description: 使用 Sensitive Shave Cream（来自 Bulldog品牌），每一次剃须都会彻底而舒适。 以芦荟、Shea黄油、由Jojoba和葵花籽油组成的滋养混合物强化的保护配方可在敏感肌肤之上创建一个缓冲垫，为剃须做好准备，使剃须刀毫不费力地在肌肤上滑行。 滋润肌肤，减少因剃须造成的干燥。
name: Sensitive Shave Cream 100ml

product_description:
Benefit further from your moisturiser with the Advanced Hyaluronic Acid Formula Serum from skinChemists. The innovative serum contains Hyaluronic Acid, an effective ingredient capable of holding vast quantities of moisture and preserving skin cells, therefore using the serum before a moisturiser will improve its effectiveness.
The natural, non-invasive serum acts as an anti-ageing remedy. The increase in hydration visibly plumps and firms the skin, reducing the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles.
name: Advanced Hyaluronic Acid Formula Serum 30ml

product_description:
Lierac 豪华型柔滑日霜晚霜，可修复肌肤，使肌肤重焕光泽，恢复青春活力。科学专业知识证明：内含的高级植物活性成分，可打造高性能产品。
本品内含3.5％的D-Glyox（一种正在申请专利的，抗老化成分）；其他成分如：石榴花、合欢树、脂质体肽等，可对抗糖氧化（糖化及氧化均可改变皮肤蛋白质，使肌肤失去弹性、色素沉着、不再柔软）。
专为中性皮肤及混合性皮肤配制，可被皮肤快速吸收，使肌肤紧致丰满，淡化细纹和皱纹；内含的玻尿酸可使肌肤滋润柔滑。 肌肤会重换光釆、肤色亮泽、持久长效、无油光、打造完美底妆。
name: 豪华型柔滑日霜晚霜（适合中性皮肤及混合性皮肤） 50ml

product_description:
本品适用于敏感性肌肤。 内含的精油素以抗菌性和舒缓性著称，使清洗最有效、最温和。
本品的乳蛋白中含百里香、德国洋甘菊、羽衣草精油，令清洁变得温和舒缓。  Elemis Sensitive 洗液含量丰富，可调节滋润皮肤。
也可在男士剃须时使用，或女士剔除腿部或腋下毛发时当使用，使肌肤不会受到刺激。  非常适合清洗私处。
使用说明：
name: Sensitive 洗液（200ml）

product_description:
Burt's Bees 小蜜蜂特殊滋潤唇膏 
臨床實驗證明可以提供長達4小時的長效滋潤。小蜜蜂這款特殊滋潤唇膏注入了燭果、乳木果和可可脂等成分。 
這款唇膏比其他唇膏還有更多脂類成分，使用後雙唇更加柔軟並十分柔滑。它充分補充肌膚營養並不添加任何香精和香料，給肌膚帶來最大程度水潤。
name: Bees小蜜蜂特殊滋润唇膏4.25 g

product_description:
Nuxe 欧树温和玫瑰补水保湿抗敏爽肤水质地温和清爽，它含有纯天然收敛剂，可显著缩小毛孔，祛除杂质，持续保持肌肤清爽。
Nuxe 欧树温和玫瑰补水保湿抗敏爽肤水可呵护您的肌肤一整天，它富含有纯天然亲肤金缕梅水、大马士革玫瑰花瓣萃取物和可可果萃取物，这些成分共同作用可有效缩小毛孔，使紧肤保持水润，同时控制油脂。
使用说明：
name: 欧树温和玫瑰补水保湿抗敏爽肤水（200 毫升）

product_description:
Treat your complexion to the Peter Thomas Roth Mask Sampler Kit; six of the brand's innovative face masks that target a range of skincare concerns, including anti-ageing, dryness and enlarged pores.
Blue Marine Algae Mask (14ml)
A hydrating gel treatment mask rich with Blue Marine Algae, a soothing, nourishing seaweed that infuses skin with nutrients and humectants to help defend against dehydration and prevent future damage. The gel contains moisture energising Tea sourced from the Jeju Island of Korea to deliver deep nourishment and abundant moisture to skin, and Antarcticine, a unique glycoprotein sourced from Arctic glacial ice that helps skin retain water and protect against water loss in extreme climates or temperatures.
Rose Stem Cell Bio-Repair Gel Mask (14ml)
An innovative formula that utilises cutting-edge plant biotechnology to help repair the signs of ageing on all skin types. Combining five Rose Stem Cells with four Rose Extracts, the cooling gel replicates plant technology to perform an unrivalled anti-ageing process on the skin. Nurturing and hydrating, the synergy works to reduce the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles whilst eradicating dullness and sagging. Rebuilding moisture barriers and tightening pores, the strengthening mask will stimulate cell renewal and leave your skin soft and radiant with a youthful appearance.
24K Gold Mask (14ml)
A luxurious anti-ageing treatment fortified with pure 24 Karat Gold to lighten, brighten and firm the skin. Helping reduce the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles, the innovative formula is enriched with a unique blend of effective ingredients, including Colloidal Gold which bestows a radiant glow on the skin, Caffeine which lifts, tightens and firms and Peridot, a magnesium-rich gemstone that re-energises and reduces stress induced ageing. Deeply nourishing, the pampering mask delivers intense hydration with the addition of Hyaluronic Acid and Glycerin, humectants that contribute to the plumping and lifting of wrinkles.
Irish Moor Mud Mask (14ml)
Deeply cleanses and decongests skin without stripping moisture. Its unique formula contains 9,000 year old Black Moor Mud, harvested by hand from the Irish countryside to provide a high concentration of bio-minerals, vitamins and antioxidants to protect skin. Hijiki Seaweed hydrates skin, whilst Volcanic Ash helps to revitalise, purify and refresh. Enriched with Activated Charcoal, the rich mask effectively removes excess oil, dirt and impurities and minimises the appearance of visible pores for a smoother, more refined complexion. Experience renewed, youthful-looking skin with a natural glow.
Cucumber Gel Mask (14ml)
An ultra-gentle formula infused with cooling Cucumber Extract to nourish and hydrate skin, whilst vitamin-rich Papaya and Pineapple Extracts restore softness. Suitable for all skin types, the lightweight mask is enriched with Sugar Maple to encourage cell renewal and Orange and Lemon to invigorate skin and minimise the appearance of pores. Can be used after sun exposure, waxing, peels and facials to reveal moisturised, revitalised skin, or to reduce puffiness around the delicate eye area.
Pumpkin Enzyme Mask (14ml)
A triple-action treatment that exfoliates, peels and polishes the skin for a new lease of life. Effectively combating dull, ageing and congested skin, the innovative formula helps even out skin tone whilst smoothing fine lines and wrinkles for a youthful complexion. A powerful blend of ingredients help combat imperfections, including; Pumpkin Enzyme, a natural component that gently exfoliates; Alpha Hydroxy Acid, a peeling agent that eradicates dull surface cells and Aluminium Oxide Crystals, an emollient used in microdermabrasion treatments to polish the skin and impart a radiant glow.
name: Thomas Roth Mask Sampler Kit

product_description:
Trilogy 趣乐活高效滋养抗皱晚霜可在休息时修复肌肤，醒来时让您拥有明显充满活力的面容，其独特的配方蕴含有营养丰富的生物活性成分，有助于肌肤的自然再生过程。
Trilogy 趣乐活高效滋养抗皱晚霜有助于恢复肌肤的弹性和丰盈度，同时抚平细纹和皱纹，醒来时让您拥有明显充满活力的面容。 辅酶 Q10 和 GlycablendTM 与马鲁拉和透明质酸相结合，能够为肌肤补充营养，焕活和修复肌肤。
name: 趣乐活高效滋养抗皱晚霜（60g）

product_description:
Boost the natural exfoliation cycle with the Elemis Your New Skin Solution – Resurface; an indulgent collection of skincare essentials that work to smooth and refine the complexion. The set is host to a face wash, gel mask, night cream and facial oil in capsule form. Combined, the products are able to visibly transform and resurface the complexion.
Dynamic Resurfacing Facial Wash (200ml)
The award-wining Dynamic Resurfacing Facial Wash is designed to stimulate skin's natural cell renewal cycle, actively smoothing and refining whilst removing the dead skin cells. Elemis’ revolutionary Tri-Enzyme technology is the catalyst in this innovative formulation for resurfacing the upper layers of your skin. The wash has non-abrasive exfoliation ingredients from the Larch Tree and Babassu Oil, which replenish essential moisture levels. Moringa helps to protect skin against environmental damage, whilst White Truffle and Poria Cocos help to soothe and support skin. This is the ideal start to a resurfacing skincare regime.
Dynamic Resurfacing Gel Mask (50ml)
Effectively encouraging the resurfacing of skin, the Dynamic Resurfacing Gel Mask addresses the decline in skin renewal as skin ages. You’ll be left with instantly smoother, shine-free and more radiant skin. As we age, cellular renewal slowly declines resulting in dull, lifeless skin and premature ageing. This revolutionary gel-based Resurfacing Mask combines patented Tri Enzyme Technology with the Amazonian Acerola Cherry, Great Burdock and Amino Acids to encourage effective re-texturising of the skin’s surface and balance sebum levels without compromising the natural pH levels.
Dynamic Resurfacing Night Cream (15ml)
The Dynamic Resurfacing Night Cream stimulates the skin's natural cell renewal cycle, actively smoothing and enhancing skin whilst it’s most receptive to repair. Utilising Elemis’ revolutionary patent pending Tri-Enzyme technology, the innovative formula resurfaces the upper layers of skin. The night cream boasts anti-oxidant rich Rice Hull and Samphire, which protect against pollution as well as restoring clarity to skin. Existing lines and wrinkles are visibly reduced and younger looking skin is revealed. Expect skin that is ultra-soft and supple.
Cellular Recovery Skin Bliss Capsules (14 capsules)
The Cellular Recovery Skin Bliss Capsules are the ultimate anti-pollution solution; containing potent age-defying anti-oxidants to refresh, nourish and distress skin. The capsules work to visibly repair signs of ageing as well as sweeping clean the skin cell matrix, ridding it of toxins to allow nutrients to be absorbed, thus renewing youthful skin vitality. Lavender and Rose Absolute provide a ‘bliss effect’, meaning skin appears de-stressed and thoroughly nourished. The Rose day capsule restores a youthful bloom to skin, whilst the Lavender evening capsule balances and repairs stressed skin.
name: Your New Skin Solution - Resurface

product_description: Elemis 骨胶原水润啫喱眼膜已经过临床证明能够瞬间减少细纹和皱纹。 这款眼膜特别添加了强效的浮游生物提取物，借助海扇藻和小球藻的作用，瞬间亮白肌肤；富含透明质酸，为娇嫩的眼部肌肤补充水分。 为眼部肌肤注入充足的水分，瞬间打造光滑的质感。 -SA
name: 骨胶原水润啫喱眼膜（6片装）

product_description:
Chantecaille 花妍调理保湿霜 ，护理肌肤，使肌肤再现活力。内含大量精油、植物萃取物、海藻、维生素等成分，使肌肤更柔软、更年轻、容光焕发。
这款滋养霜主要由纯玫瑰水组成，内含丰富的抗氧化剂和保湿剂，可巧妙地舒缓安抚肌肤。 具有可覆盖的质地，为肌肤补充水化，对抗肌肤日常压力；含有丰富脂肪酸的琉璃苣油、榛子油、锁水的糖类同分异构体等成分，使肌肤更柔软、肤色更均匀；维他命B5和微藻等，确保舒缓肌肤*，使肌肤再现活力，焕发光釆。
营养滋润肌肤，使肌肤柔顺细嫩、健康自然。
name: 花妍调理保湿霜 50ml

product_description:
Organic Surge 日常护理系列极润霜专为成熟或干性肌肤设计，滋润肌肤，补充水分与营养，使肌肤柔嫩有光泽。
特别添加了乳木果油、荷荷巴油和洋甘菊提取物，采用易于吸收的配方，富含多种天然保湿成分，能够舒缓干燥，有机玫瑰天竺葵精油还能让肌肤重新恢复健康光泽。 适合日常护理和敏感型皮肤使用，期待重焕活力的平衡肌肤。
name: Surge 日常护理系列极润霜（50ml）

product_description: 可被快速吸收的Ultrasun 30 SPF 系列产品是针对非常敏感型肌肤的防晒霜。 轻盈的乳液非常适合全家人使用，采用该品牌的脂质体复合物，保护肌肤免受有害 UVA 和 UVB 射线伤害，且不会使其太粘或油腻。 其耐水性能意味着保持时间更长，所以您不必担心；便携的泵式喷瓶可实现有序涂抹。 E.N.
name: 30 SPF Family (400ml)

product_description:
Discover Jurlique’s bestselling mist with the Jurlique Rosewater Balancing Mist Intense Deluxe Edition; an intense version of the coveted Rosewater Balancing Mist, which arrives in a pastel-coloured bottle to add an additional touch of luxe.
Refreshing the complexion, the mist is enriched with a cocktail of flower extracts that work to balance skin’s pH levels. As well as delivering revitalisation, the mist treats skin to an intense veil of hydration, which is able to maintain healthy moisture levels and leave the face ultra-soft.
Ideal for awakening skin in the morning, as well as for refreshment throughout the day, the mist guarantees to leave skin fresh and pampered.
name: Rosewater Balancing Mist Intense Deluxe Edition 200ml

product_description:
使用 REN 平静舒缓红血丝修复精华 （原名为水嫩舒缓青春防护精华）净化净肤，为您的肌肤提供精心呵护。 要获得极致的护肤效果，无疑需要特别的呵护。这款精华可使肤色更均匀，让您的肌肤重获新生。
REN 平静舒缓红血丝修复精华采用适用于敏感肌肤的特殊配方，可保护肌肤，为肌肤提供营养，均匀肤色，显著改善肌肤，令肌肤紧致而有光泽。 牛奶蛋白可修复红血丝和抗炎，野生加拿大酸叶可淡化色斑，玻璃酸可增强肌肤的水合作用，这款精华可保护肌肤免受有毒物质和环境的损伤，同时减少衰老的迹象。
使用说明
name: 平静舒缓红血丝修复精华（原名为水嫩舒缓青春防护精华）

product_description:
小蜜蜂蜂蜡润唇膏一年四季保护您的唇部肌肤，恢复和维持唇部肌肤水润。
小蜜蜂神奇护肤系列都值得一选。这款蜂蜡润唇膏含有丰富椰子、蜂蜡和葵花籽油，舒缓型的润唇膏令唇部肌肤焕然一新。
name: Bees小蜜蜂蜂蜡润唇膏管装

product_description:
Achieve a radiant, flawless complexion with the Fade Out Extra Care Brightening Night Cream; a fast-absorbing, non-greasy formula that helps to reduce the production of Melanin - the brown pigment in skin.
Harnessing the powers of Rosehip Seed Oil (a source of Vitamin A), Sacha Inchi Oil (Omega 3) and Sodium Lactate, the moisturiser works with the skin's overnight renewal process to replenish, revitalise and restore an even skin tone. Naturally occurring Lactic Acid delivers a mild exfoliating action to minimise the appearance of pigmentation, fine lines and wrinkles. Expect a smoother, more refined complexion.
name: Out ADVANCED Even Skin Tone Night Cream 50ml

product_description:
Pack a powerful punch into your anti-ageing skincare regime with Vit C-30™ from The Hero Project; a powerful Vitamin C serum that improves the look of visible signs of ageing and helps protect from further damage.
Delivering an impressive dual tightening and brightening effect, the potent treatment contains a substantial 30% Ethylated L-Ascorbic Acid – stabilised Vitamin C – ensuring long-lasting effectiveness and maximum results. Brimming with antioxidant protection and skin brightening benefits, it works to improve tone, suppleness and clarity while combating the look of fine lines and wrinkles.       
Enriched with natural extracts of Grapefruit and Lemon, the lush serum is perfect for all skin types, especially skin that’s seen some action and is in need of a pamper. Plus, the luxurious bottle has been expertly designed with a smart base dimple, ensuring no product is wasted – ‘Gorgeous to the last drop®’. Achieve a replenished and positively glowing complexion.
name: Hero Project Vit C-30 Ultra Brightening Serum 30ml

product_description:
Improve skin tone and texture with Pestle & Mortar's Superstar Night Oil; a lightweight, silky formula that utilises cold-pressed ingredients to deliver the perfect cocktail of vitamins, nutrients and omega fatty acids.
Powered by Retinol, the quick-absorbing treatment delivers anti-ageing properties to help minimise the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles, improve elasticity and repair dry, damaged skin around the clock.
A blend of Rosehip and Grape Seed Oils help to tighten the skin and pores, whilst steam-distilled Black Cumin Seed Oil defends against the damaging effects of free radicals to reveal a smoother, younger-looking complexion come morning. Packaged in a pump bottle to minimise air and sun exposure for maximum effect.
name: & Mortar Superstar Night Oil 30ml

product_description:
AcnEase Severe Acne Treatment - 7 Bottles (Bundle)（七瓶套装）可以保护您的肌肤免受痤疮的烦扰。   本产品非常适合那些有慢性、严重皮肤问题或痤疮患者使用，仅需要一个月就可消除您的皮肤问题。  
本款产品的成分完全采用草本精华，可以恢复因内分泌失调、环境、压力、药物治疗和饮食而遭到破坏的体内平衡，从而从根本上解决痤疮和皮肤问题（例如玫瑰红斑）。  绝对安全且无副作用， 非常适合男女青少年及成年人用以清洁皮肤。  
什么是重度痤疮？ 较大的痤疮、某些囊肿、发炎且覆盖面部较大区域的丘疹，会持久出现且长期存在（3年或更长）。对于那些遭受3年或3年以上的中度至重度痤疮患者。 
产品概述：AcnEase®是最有效的Botanical Therapeutic®（植物性治疗产品），可治疗已经形成的痤疮，防止新的粉刺和青春痘形成。此外，按照推荐方法使用后，AcnEase®所含的各种成分会让您的肌肤更清爽和更健康，同时能够去黑头和白头，并能消除红肿的症状。
AcnEase®可以恢复因为内分泌失调、环境因素、某些药物的使用、神经紧张、压力过度和饮食习惯而打乱了的天然内部平衡。痤疮其实是内部失调的外部体现。 AcnEase®的独特之处在于，它不仅可以治疗疾病的外部症状，同时还能解决痤疮和其他皮肤问题的根本问题（例如导致玫瑰红斑形成的身体内部原因）。AcnEase非常适合有以下症状的人使用：青春痘、荷尔蒙分泌失调型痤疮、更年期痤疮（女性）、慢性粉刺、因辛辣和油腻的食物而症状加重的痤疮、吸烟、压力、喝酒或使用其他药物而出现的痤疮、面部和身体上出现的痤疮以及囊肿性痤疮。
name: Severe Acne Treatment - 7瓶 （套装）

product_description:
REN 驻颜美白抗皱眼霜的专业配方可显著减少眼周围衰老的迹象。 每天只需使用一点眼霜滋润肌肤，就能让肌肤更加顺滑紧致。
REN 驻颜美白抗皱眼霜独特的高级氨基酸肽复合物配方是淡化鱼尾纹和黑眼圈的终极方法。 六胜肽-11 技术旨在促进基因反应和胶原蛋白的形成，以紧致紧肤；而亚油酸可控制黑色素，淡化色斑。
使用说明：
name: 驻颜美白™ 紧致提拉眼霜

product_description: 适合所有肌肤类型，Caudalie的Make-Up清除清洁油可轻松去除化妆品，包括防水化妆品。 其100％纯天然配方加入混合精油，包括向日葵籽、甜杏仁和葡萄籽成分，深入清洁皮肤，而不剥夺水分或在肌肤表面留下油腻薄膜。 甚至可用来在最敏感的眼部溶解化妆品。 抗氧化剂维生素E深层滋润肌肤，并支持肌肤天然屏障，因此您可以体验到纯净、清爽和如丝般柔软的肤色。 E.N.

product_description:
Sukin 保濕霜含蘆薈、馬尾、蕁麻和牛蒡精華，可舒緩肌膚，而其玫瑰果、小麥胚芽、荷荷巴油和鱷梨油成分又為肌膚增添了養分，促進肌膚健康。這款日常保濕霜會讓您的肌膚倍感水潤、柔嫩。 
 Sukin 認為，皮膚和頭髮護理產品的最強大、有效的成分來自大自然。注重環保意識的Sukin 是一家來自澳大利亞的天然個人護理品公司。 
 “Skincare that doesn't cost the earth™”（護膚不以損耗地球為代價）— Sukin 的承諾遠遠超出了化妝品。這是一家100% 認證的碳平衡公司，旨在減少其業務對於脆弱環境的影響。 -SA

product_description:
Caudalie 欧缇丽葡萄籽滋养修复面膜可不断舒缓肌肤和为肌肤补充水分，令肌肤如丝绸般顺滑。 这款轻质的乳状配方适用于各种类型的肌肤，具有强化补水作用，蕴含的葡萄籽精油可为肌肤提供营养物质脂肪酸 6。 特殊的配方中含有有效成分玻璃酸，可维持肌肤的自然水份含量，让肌肤更加丰盈；而红酒酵母可增强肌肤对外界环境的抵抗能力。 E.N.
使用方法：取适量本品涂抹在面部和眼周围的区域，每周两次。 让面膜敷 15 分钟，然后用水清洗或用化妆棉擦拭干净。
name: 欧缇丽葡萄籽滋养修复面膜（75 毫升）

product_description:
Bliss最畅销的洁面乳！
这种二合一不含油去角质洁面乳适用于所有皮肤类型。本品清新，散发果味，内含玫瑰果提取物、水飞蓟、西番莲、洋甘菊等成分。为非剥离配方，即使是最容易变化的皮肤也可重新获得平衡。

专门针对各种肌肤而设计，  FOREO LUNA™ 斐珞尔露娜 在深层清洁肌肤的同时可减少老化的迹象。
采用 T-Sonic™ 技术设计，通过每分钟将 8000 次的透肤声波脉动导入肌肤来实现对肌肤的彻底清洁。该设备可打开堵塞的毛孔，祛除污垢、化妆品残留物和杂质，让肌肤更加紧致光滑。
圆形的硅胶接触点沿着面部轻轻滑动，柔软的 LUNA™ 露娜刷头可防止滋生细菌，其清洁度是普通刷头的 35 倍。 该设备为完全防水型设备，使用方便，其小巧轻便的设计，再加上超长的待机时间（每次充电可使用 450 次）是外出旅行的理想选择。
其独特的抗皱模式可直接将低频声波脉动导入到容易长皱纹的区域，有助于减少细纹和鱼尾纹，这款富有创意的洁面设备还具备紧致肌肤和均匀肤色的功效。 让您的肌肤更加亮丽、清透和健康。
name: LUNA™ 斐珞尔露娜——敏感/正常肌肤能量源泉

product_description:
Revitalise your skin through the night with Caudalie VineActiv Overnight Detox Oil, a dry oil that works with your skin during its natural, overnight renewal process.
Helping to detoxify, refresh and smoothen your skin, the 100% natural concentrate combines a cocktail of five essential oils and three 3 plant oils to purify, nourish and protect your skin; Lavender, White Sandalwood and Carrot essential oils calm, fight irritation and redness and detoxify; Rose Musc and Sweet Almond plant oils prevent wrinkles and boost radiance.
Melting effortlessly in with no greasy feeling, the oil utilises antioxidant-rich Grapeseed Oil to nourish and repair whilst protecting against pollution and free radical attacks. Skin feels detoxified, revitalised and comfortable come morning.
name: VineActiv Overnight Detox Oil 30ml

product_description:
這款化妝品含原膠原超級乳清，可促進膠原合成，減少衰老痕跡，恢復皮膚彈性，保持皮膚水潤，起到抗氧化作用。 
採用仙人掌果萃取物配方，乳清能有效緩解過敏肌膚，舒緩鎮靜精華可減少皮膚潮紅和不適。 -SA 
 “OSKIA 配方專門為提高肌膚細胞健康而設計，能帶來明顯的皮膚光澤功效。產品配方含廣譜營養素，包括維他命、礦物質、蛋白質和必需脂肪酸。這些營養素共同起效，能提高皮膚細胞的活性，使肌膚更健康。同時，採用先進的生物活性技術，包括植物根細胞技術和多肽複合物，對抗衰老、生活方式和環境帶來的肌膚問題。 
 OSKIA 產品獲得多項大獎，不含對羥苯甲酸酯、人工著色劑和香精以及其他可能有害的物質，將天然的方法貫穿始終。

product_description:
Lierac 特级修复精华露，令肌肤重新焕发青春活力。其抗老化配方含玻尿酸，可抚平肌肤细纹及皱纹。
本款豪华型，溶解精华液内含植物专利微球，可刺激天然DNA修复，促进细胞再生，使肌肤更年轻。 内含10％的玻尿酸及珍贵的黑花提取物，使肌肤饱满充盈、可保护肌肤，起抗氧化作用。 令肌肤光滑柔软、青春靓丽。

product_description:
Discover the secret to younger looking skin with the Elizabeth Arden Advanced Ceramide Capsules; the iconic skincare treatment now with triple the power to truly transform skin and reveal a visibly firmer and smoother complexion.
As we age, skin loses the ability to produce the essential youth factor of lipid ceramides, leading to a weakened and uneven texture with a dramatic increase in wrinkles and sagging.
The innovative anti-ageing capsules directly deliver a concentrated dosage of bio-engineered, skin-identical ceramides, helping to repair and strengthen the lipid barrier as well as support natural collagen renewal, resulting in a re-texturising and plumping effect to radically minimise the appearance of fine lines.
A Botanical Complex blend of Alfalfa, Olives and Coconut Oil infuses skin with hydrocarbons and lipids, while Omega-rich Tsubuki Oil restores elasticity, effectively optimising moisture levels. Expect skin to feel revitalised, soft and supple with an improved luminosity and healthy-looking glow.
name: Arden Ceramide Capsules Advanced (60 Capsules)

product_description:
Take control of your skin with Omorovicza Balancing Moisturiser, a cooling, gel-cream moisturiser specially developed to help balance and regulate oily to combination skin.
Promoting a smooth, healthy-looking complexion, the moisturiser absorbs quickly into skin; it strikes the perfect balance between hydration and sebum regulation to control shine and help prevent blemishes. Rich in Apple Pectin and Ruby Crystal, it moisturises skin whilst blurring the appearance of pores, fine lines and wrinkles, and utilises a Hydro Mineral Transference™ delivery system that facilitates mineral absorption for maximum benefit within the skin.
After use, skin feels supple and balanced; pores appear to disappear and the complexion is brightened thanks to its cocktail of exotic fruit extracts.
name: Balancing Moisturiser (50ml)

product_description:
德國世家爽膚水有助於補充肌膚能量，鞏固肌膚狀態，讓肌膚倍覺健康。它富含金縷梅，可均勻膚色、提高彈性並縮小毛孔，還含有洋絨毛花提取物，可平衡水分與油分含量。它非常適合中性、乾性和敏感型肌膚。 - LM 
 使用說明：
name: Hauschka 德国世家爽肤水 100ml

product_description:

润肤精油特别添加了巴西坚果油，富含多种维生素，有助于滋养和保护肌肤。 采用轻盈不油腻的配方，能够迅速吸收，不留痕迹或阻塞毛孔。 这款美黑霜经过皮肤和临床试验证明，非常适合敏感肌肤，让肌肤全年散发亮泽。 – N.P.

其蕴含有该品牌荣获专利的细胞水，具有超级补水功效，而所含的矿物质盐和微量元素可促进细胞活动，增强肌肤的重要日常功能，焕活肌肤，令其恢复应有的光泽。
这款轻质的喷雾既适合女士，也适合男士，即便是极为敏感型肌肤，也可使用本品。结合其他 Institut Esthederm 雅诗敦产品使用，可增强其他产品的效果，本品还有定妆功效。

product_description:
使用 Murad Blemish Control 30 天套装，展现靓丽肌肤。 该面霜结合了一系列必不可少的护肤产品，保证能预防皮疹，消除暗沉并舒缓受损肌肤。 可呈现拥有自信光泽的健康肌肤。 - K.N
Clarifying Cleanser (45ml):
这款洁面霜致力于预防痤疮和皮疹，融合了封装水杨酸和柠檬酸银，全天为肌肤提供深度、高效的抗菌防护。 冷却的薄荷醇舒缓皮肤，而绿茶提取物则减少红肿和炎症。
Blemish Clearing Solution (23ml):
有助于防止皮疹，并减少皮肤红肿。 其高效配方含有活性成分，包括水杨酸和旋果蚊草子提取物，可去除角质和死皮，同时疏通毛孔，呈现更健康的肤色。 提升亮泽的精华液含有茶树精油，有助于净化肌肤，并提供必要的维生素，以舒缓发炎或受损肌肤。
Oil-Control Mattifier SPF 15 (18ml):
控油配方有助于降低面部光泽并控制油脂生成，融合了柳树皮提取物和摩洛哥坚果提取物，以控制皮疹并清除皮肤上的杂质。 皮肤的外观和手感更柔软。 油脂的生成将被调节且光泽受控制，时长可达 8 小时。
Blemish Spot Treatment (7.5ml):
这种速效淡斑护理乳液适用于所有年龄群体，从十几岁到三十多岁，以及年龄更大的群体。产品致力于加快接触面淡斑的愈合并防止出现新的瑕疵。 富含抗氧化剂的配方将硫和舒缓的甘草提取物及维生素 C 和 E 相结合，可迅速抑制淡斑产生，平复肌肤之下的瑕疵，并可即刻舒缓红肿和刺激感。 确保肌肤看起来光滑、均匀、健康。
Clarifying Mask (30g):
这款清爽面膜含多种稀土黏土，旨在取出堵塞毛孔的杂质并吸收多余油脂，实现无光泽、美观洁净的肤色。 甘草和葡萄籽提取物共同发挥作用，令肌肤感觉舒适而平静，减轻红肿，同时防止自由基损伤。 其强效配方能深层清洁肌肤，减轻瑕疵的严重程度并去除潜在的污垢，实现真正容光焕发的肌肤。

本款创新型啫喱面膜结合Eijitsu 玫瑰芽提取物及Benoitine（来自海洋浮游生物）成分，可去角质、缩小毛孔、令肌肤精致，肤色重焕光釆。

product_description:
LieracHydragenist保湿护肤啫喱，可深度滋润肌肤。科学专门知识证明：内含的高级植物活性成分，可打造高性能产品。
专门为中性皮肤及混合性皮肤配制。内含浓度为7％的Hydra O2聚合物，结合玻尿酸、仿生氧气、斑鸠叶，使肌肤饱满充盈、减少细纹和皱纹；内含的微粒粉可去油光、使肤色柔和。

Elemis Balancing Lime Blossom Cleanser 是一款拥有独特质地和清新香味的乳液，富含莱姆花的活性成分。 该产品有助于自然平衡和修复肌肤。

product_description:
使用 This works "镜头零死角"多效美肤霜准备好您的特写。 这款产品是一个手提包大小的宝石，使您的皮肤平缓、丰满和发亮。作为一款面膜、润肤乳和集多功能于一身的底层乳液，该产品包含各种有效的修复植物油以及有刺激作用的咖啡因，消除疲劳迹象，让您的皮肤看起来容光焕发。 - E.D

product_description:
Keep skin happy with this delectably scented Face Sunscreen SPF50 from Mimitika – a French-based brand developed by and created for dedicated sun lovers.
Offering high level, broad spectrum defence against UVA and UVB rays, the lightweight formula rapidly absorbs into skin without leaving behind any greasy residue or white cast, while it remains water-resistant for up to 80 minutes and works to stimulate natural melanin production for a more even and healthy looking tan.
The addition of antioxidant-rich Vitamin E helps neutralise free radicals and deeply moisturise, leaving skin feeling fresh and soft. Ideal for daily use alone or as a base for makeup, it’s an all-round, must-have addition to your skincare regime for a protected and hydrated complexion.
name: Face Sunscreen SPF50 50ml

product_description: Elemis 艾丽美骨胶原极致抗皱精华 是一款抗衰老精华液，可显著淡化细纹和皱纹。 其独特的营养配方中蕴含有非洲桦树皮、红枣和海扇藻，可增强肌肤的弹性，紧致肌肤，让肌肤青春焕发。 强效的玻璃酸和富含脂肪酸的亚麻油混合物可高效保湿，盈润补水，使肌肤更柔软顺滑。 E.N.
