product_description: 使用Original Shave Cream（来自 Bulldog品牌），每一次剃须都会彻底而舒适。 富含芦荟和亚麻芥油，其丰富泡沫的配方创建一个缓冲垫以软化肌肤并为剃须做好准备，使剃须刀毫不费力地在肌肤上滑行。 滋润肌肤，减少因剃须造成的干燥。
name: Original Shave Cream 100ml

product_description:
不要错过Trilogy Rosehip Oil AntiOxidant +的神奇效果，此款经过100％认证的产品经证明，仅需数滴就可以让皮肤恢复天然的美丽色彩。
使用多种精油和红莓的先进配方使Trilogy Rosehip Oil AntiOxidant +成为最有效的全天然皮肤喜爱产品... 经过精心调配的配方能够合力补充皮肤养分，修复肌肤，从而让皮肤格外光彩照人——同时，抗氧化剂可以抵御外界的侵害。
使用说明：
name: Organic Rosehip Oil Antioxidant（30ml）

product_description:
Discover a new level of skin protection with the Murad City Skin Age Defense Broad Spectrum SPF 50 PA ++++; a revolutionary sunscreen that shields skin from the main causes of damage.
The mineral sunscreen effortlessly glides over the visage and décolletage, absorbing quickly without leaving behind an unwanted greasy residue. The effective formula boasts 100% mineral broad spectrum PA++++ and SPF 50, which protect skin from UVA/UVB rays, infrared radiation, pollution and blue light from devices. Each of these accelerates visible signs of ageing and therefore protecting against them encourages a youthful complexion.
The innovative formula can be worn alone or is just as effective when paired with makeup. Arriving in a soft peach tint that is suitable for all skin tones, the multi-tasking formula offers instant colour correction, whilst a dose of Vitamin C visibly brightens skin. The cream completes the complexion by delivering a luminous veil with a radiant, pearlescent finish.
name: City Skin Age Defense Broad Spectrum SPF 50 PA ++++

product_description:
木瓜和凤梨的天然水果酶提取物可舒缓肌肤，让您拥有亮白清爽的肤色。 Elemis 艾丽美木瓜酵素去角质霜独特的非粒子配方中含有 7 中活性营养成分，可修复和保护肌肤。
这款舒缓的去角质霜非常适合敏感型肌肤或老化的肌肤，能温和地祛除角质而不对肌肤造成任何损伤。 所蕴含的海藻活性成分和维他命 E 可对肌肤起到护理作用，补充肌肤所需的矿物质元素，让您的肌肤更光滑滋润。
这款温和的去角质霜可祛除坏死的肌肤细胞，而不对肌肤产生损伤，让肌肤看起来更光滑白亮。它还可对肌肤提供抗氧化和防辐射保护，因为非常适用于老化和脆弱的肌肤。
这款面膜含有 7 种活性成分；木瓜、菠萝、紫球藻（单细胞海藻）、Bladderwack（海藻提取物）、牛奶蛋白、向日葵油和维他命 E。
使用说明：
name: 艾丽美木瓜酵素去角质修护面膜（50 毫升）

product_description:
歐緹麗極致完美凝白晚霜，在您睡眠時修復肌膚，滋養排毒，極致舒緩疲勞肌膚。細化肌膚紋理，重現奪人光彩。 
歐緹麗極致完美凝白晚霜也適合敏感肌膚，蘊含的Viniferine 可預防黑斑和其他令肌膚黯淡的老化和疲勞痕跡。木瓜酵素和葡萄籽油滋養配方溫和不刺激，適合敏感肌膚，可溫和去除死皮。煥活肌膚，令肌膚柔嫩細滑，宛若新生，綻放年輕光澤。 
使用說明：
name: 欧缇丽极致完美凝白晚霜 (40ml)

product_description: 使用 Bulldog 泡沫 Sensitive Shave 啫喱，每一次剃须都会彻底而舒适。 专为敏感的皮肤类型设计，其无香料配方结合燕麦油、柳草和猴面包树精油营造出丰富的泡沫以软化面部，为顺畅的剃须做准备，使剃刀轻松滑过肌肤，减少划痕。 滋润肌肤，减少因剃须造成的干燥。
name: 泡沫 Sensitive Shave 啫喱 200ml

product_description:
REN旗下的Vita Mineral Omega 3 Supreme Skin Face Oil适合所有皮肤类型使用，是一种创新性的改造油，可以强化皮肤上重要的油性隔阻层，让您的肤色看起来更为饱满和健康。 这款油不油腻、不粘腻，可重振皮肤细胞活性，提高水分含量。
该产品可以改善皮肤的整体健康程度，让您的肤色看起来自然健康，容光焕发。 同时还可以减少皱纹的出现和早衰的迹象，是皮肤护理的必备之品。 K.D.
name: Vita Mineral™ Omega 3 Optimum Skin Oil

product_description:
这款活性精华液着重于通过护理来最大化减少肌肤受损伤的时间，祛除黑眼圈。 Elemis 艾丽美植物浓缩眼部精华液可提亮、细致和保护眼部肌肤，让您的肌肤清爽而容光焕发。
活性成分红木、舒缓的紫草、薰衣草和甘菊可调理娇嫩的眼部肌肤，并为其提供营养，而木犀可使肌肤感觉清凉，缓解充血。
植物浓缩眼部精华液可维持肌肤的水份含量，让您的肌肤焕发青春活力。
使用说明：
name: 艾丽美植物浓缩眼部精华液（15 毫升）

product_description:
Elemis 型前胶原海洋霜是一款功能强大的抗衰老面霜，通过补充胶原逐步提升效果。 各种成分的动态组合可使您在15天内收到明显效果。 本款创新型面霜可减少高达78％的深皱纹，是日常皮肤护理的必备品。
型前胶原海洋霜用以将肌肤含水量提高45％。其配方丰富，使用后可获得快速明显的效果。 离开它，护肤将无从下手！ K.D.
name: 型前胶原海洋霜 100ml

product_description: Replenish and rejuvenate thirsty skin with the Water Volume Ex Mask from Korean brand, Mizon. Developed using unique Hydra ToX™ technology, the innovative face mask blends Moringa Extract and Snow Algae to infuse dry skin with intense moisture and hydration. Adhering perfectly to facial contours for maximum effect, you can expect a fresh, dewy complexion with a radiant glow.
name: Water Volume Ex Mask 30g

product_description:
使用 均衡快速清洁细胞水，温柔地让您的面部肌肤焕然一新。这一豪华配方旨在帮您清除面部污垢，而不会造成肌肤过度干燥或紧绷。
精制的配方有从Rosehip籽油、苹果氨基酸和Soapnut（一印度南部果）提取的天然表面活性剂强化作用，可以轻松溶解彩妆和多余皮脂，同时配以从手工采摘的有机英伦玫瑰中提取的玫瑰水，可舒缓和安抚您的肌肤。 您的面部肌肤变得白晰、柔滑和充满活力。
name: 智能清洁Micellar水200ml

product_description:
Embryolisse Lait-Crème Concentré 是一款三合一保湿乳液、粉底去除水和卸妆水。 其丰富的配方含有必需脂肪酸和维生素，降低刺激感（尤其是剃须后），令肌肤丰满紧致。
富含养分和水分，以平衡肌肤并促进细胞再生，令肌肤健康水嫩。 乳液可提供一层光滑薄膜，降低干性不适，形成柔亮肤色；适合用作修复面膜，以清洁肌肤，或作为婴儿护理产品。 E.N.
name: Lait-Crème Concentré (30ml)

product_description:
DECLÉOR 思妍丽香薰苦橙花夜间精华乳拥有奢华的速溶质地，让您尽享为肌肤量身定制的香薰夜间护理所有的益处。  一觉醒来，即可获得华丽、亮泽的肌肤。
这款修护霜可净化、平衡、软化和改善肌理，还可为即使是最缺乏光泽的肤色增添亮泽。
使用说明：
name: 思妍丽香薰苦橙花夜间精华乳——香薰精华（15ml）

product_description:
Reignite a youthful glow with Omorovicza's Instant Perfection Serum; an oil-free, anti-ageing formula that works to replenish and revitalise dull, dehydrated skin.
Harnessing the powers of the brand's patented Hydro Mineral Transference™ delivery system, the fast-absorbing formula delivers a firming and plumping effect, whilst Yeast Polysaccharides help to minimise the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles.
Ideal for dehydrated, stressed and unbalanced skin, its blend of Narcissus Stem Cells and Hyaluronic Acid lock in moisture and combat uneven skin tone to reveal a smoother, more refined complexion with restored luminosity. Skin is hydrated and awakened after use.
name: Instant Perfection Serum 30ml

product_description:
Experience a professional salon treatment from home with Pixi's Peel and Polish; a radiance-reviving formula that resurfaces skin to help improve tone and texture.
Utilising Natural Fruit Enzymes, Sugar Extracts and Lactic Acid, the skin-polishing peel gently exfoliates dead skin cells to reveal a smoother, more refined complexion. Combats dullness and restores brightness to reignite a healthy-looking glow.
name: Peel and Polish

product_description:
Caudalie歐緹麗清新卸妝水，可卸除臉部及眼部彩妝、睫毛膏, 是一款可改善膚色的微細胞修護潔膚水，無需再清洗。徹底清潔滋潤肌膚，令膚色亮麗動人。早晚使用，倒在化妝棉上，輕輕擦拭臉部及眼部，在進行潔膚護理的同時，散發出薄荷、葛縷子及白松香的提神香味。低刺激性，適合所有肌膚類型，包括最敏感的肌膚。
使用方法：
清潔時用面片沾濕，擦除面部殘妝眼角與臉部。

The yes to Tomatoes Detoxifying Charcoal Paper Mask is an innovative skincare treatment to refresh and purify dull, oily skin in need of a pick-me-up. Harnessing the powers of Charcoal and antioxidant-rich Tomato, the delicate mask works to unclog pores and balance excess sebum production for a more balanced and refined complexion. Skin feels tingly fresh and deeply cleansed.
name: To 番茄木炭解毒纸面膜

product_description:
Liftissime  系列 Lierac焕肤紧实精华眼霜，是一款创新型眼部精华液，可对抗眼睛及眼睑衰老。使肌肤重新焕发青春活力。
其浓缩配方含植物收紧剂，包括细胞结合体和玻尿酸等，可提升眼睑、减少浮肿和黑眼圈，使眼睛更有形。本产品可瞬间见效，也可持久长效。 其清爽、活性拉伸质地，瞬间提升肌肤。令肌肤更年轻、眼睛更明亮有神。 抚平淡化皱纹、令眼睛感到舒适放松。 针对敏感的眼部区域，所以本品不含任何香料。
name: Liftissime焕肤紧实精华液 15ml

product_description:
Discover a daily dose of anti-ageing with the PRAI BLACK ORCHID Youth Activating Luxe Crème. Designed for use as a daily moisturiser, the crème delivers luxurious hydration to skin, alongside multiple anti-ageing benefits.
Restoring a youthful appearance, the formula is enriched with Collageneer® and Epigenomyl®, which boast transformative anti-ageing properties. The crème promotes a visibly younger complexion by reducing dehydration, enhancing the absorption of nutrients and improving skin’s lipid barrier. Expect a renewed appearance that visibly glows.
name: BLACK ORCHID Youth Activating Luxe Crème 30ml

product_description: 配合使用Omorovicza专用洁肤手套，清洁更彻底，可有效卸妆，去除皮肤的杂质、多余油脂。100% 纯棉，温和洗去面部洁面膏、面膜，保持肌肤柔软，令洁肤过程更方便舒适。

Reveal an enviable complexion with the Intensify Facial Discs from Colbert MD. Offering a gentle microdermabrasion action, the discs effortlessly sweep across the face and assist in skin’s natural repair process, resulting in luminous skin.
Enriched with a blend of Bromelain and Lactic Acid, the exfoliating pads slough away dead skin cells and eliminate dull, lacklustre patches of skin. The facial discs are concentrated with Glucosamine, which contributes to a youthful appearance by hydrating the complexion and delivering a visibly ‘plumped’ look. Wrinkles and fine lines are visibly reduced.
Expect a healthy complexion that is youthful and radiant.
name: MD Intensify Facial Discs (Pack of 20)

product_description:
Reveal a refreshed and youthful complexion with the Gentle Foam Cleanser from SkinPointEight. Designed to eliminate impurities, the cleanser encourages the renewal of skin’s epidermal layer to leave the face revitalised.
The anti-ageing cleanser is both gentle and effective, utilising a cocktail of natural Fruit acids, Lactic acid and a Proteo-Lytic enzyme complex. Non-irritating, the formula delivers a boost to skin, helping to accelerate skin turnover and result in a younger looking complexion. The face wash cleanses away daily grime and impurities to leave skin clean, clear and fresh.
name: Gentle Foam Cleanser 150ml

product_description:
Transform tired, sagging and mature skin with the PRAI AGELESS Bust Crème; a rich, highly effective cream that restores a youthful vitality and delivers a toning effect.
Rich in emollients and conditioning agents, the advanced formula contains Adipofill’in™ for a plumping effect, smoothing the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles while lifting the look of droopiness. Suitable for use on the bust and décolletage, skin appears fuller and replenished with a youthful looking radiance.
name: AGELESS Bust Crème 60ml

product_description:
Awaken tired eyes with the Uplift Eye Serum from Colbert MD. Effortlessly melting into skin, the anti-ageing serum seeks to renew suppleness to the delicate eye area, as well as reducing the appearance of puffiness and dark under-eye circles.
Fortified with Horse Chestnut Extract Aescin, the formula delivers soothing and calming benefits to the eye area, resulting in reduced puffiness. Phytomoist hydrates the skin, whilst Glycyrrhetinic Acid visibly brightens the eye area for a youthful finish.
name: MD Uplift Eye Serum 15ml

product_description:
SkinChemists Wrinkle Killer Hand, Nail and Cuticle Cream 采用尖端配方，富含 Syn-Ake，软化滋养双手，抵御首次出现的肌肤衰老迹象：皱纹、细纹和黑斑。 维生素 B5 可提升肌肤弹性，深层滋养手部肌肤。
椰子油是一款必备保湿剂，适用于所有肌肤类型，尤其是干燥的手部。 一款保湿、防护和提亮乳霜，含角质氨基酸，使指甲更强健。 E.N.
name: Wrinkle Killer Hand, Nail and Cuticle Cream (50ml)

product_description:
Calm irritated skin with the SASCO Eco Body Aloe Vera Gel; a soothing formula designed to hydrate and refresh skin.
Concentrated with a high dose of organic Aloe Vera, the gel is a classic, universal product that is able to provide relief to exposed areas, such as sunburned skin, post-shaving irritation and insect bites. Expect skin that is thoroughly hydrated and feeling comfortable.
name: Eco Body Aloe Vera Gel 75ml

product_description:
Sukin 敏感型清潔啫喱是一款無皂潔面乳，質地柔和，即使最嬌嫩的肌膚也能使用，是敏感性皮膚的理想選擇。這款啫喱富含具有舒緩功效的甘菊、綠茶、清爽的黃瓜和鱷梨油，可舒緩肌膚疲勞，能夠完美的淨化、清潔皮膚。作為一款非干性潔面乳，該啫喱可全面滋潤肌膚，使肌膚倍感光滑，同時有效去除雜質和多餘油脂。 - RH 
 使用說明：取少量於濕潤的手上，然後加水以揉出泡沫。輕輕按摩於濕潤的肌膚上，徹底沖洗並將肌膚輕輕拍幹。每天使用一次或兩次。
name: 敏感型清洁啫喱 (125ml)

product_description:
Smooth, illuminate and refine skin with the Rose Quartz Hydrating & Illuminating Day Moisturiser from skinChemists. The ultra-smooth day moisturiser is designed to give the skin an extra boost, resulting in a vibrant and healthy looking glow. Infused with Rose Quartz, the moisturiser buffs away dead skin cells, revealing the soft, fresh and youthful looking skin beneath
The formula contains Phytocelltec Alp Rose, based on a Swiss flowering plant, and possesses the power to combat dry and stressed skin whilst protecting skin cells. Finished with a blend of Coconut oil, the cream deeply hydrates the skin keeping dry, itchy and sensitive skin perfectly balanced throughout the day.
name: Rose Quartz Hydrating & Illuminating Day Moisturiser 50ml

product_description: Dr Dennis Gross Extra Strength Alpha Beta Face Peel (30 Application Packettes) is perfect for achieving a professional quality treatment in the comfort of your own home. Combining Alpha and Beta® Hydroxy Acids and new anti-aging boosters, it smoothes and enriches your skin, helping to dramatically improve the appearance of blemishes, dark spots, enlarged pores, redness and signs of ageing. Your skin will be left looking radiant and youthful. - L.M.
name: Dennis Gross Alpha Beta Peel Extra Strength Formula (30 Packets)

product_description: LIFT + PERFECT™ Total Rejuvenation Cream is a multi-tasking breakthrough formula for complexion perfection. The results: reduced wrinkles and increased skin elasticity, even skin tone, reduced blemishes and minimized pore size. Intense moisturization levels infuse skin with radiance and glow to target the key signs of aging.Along with the highest concentration of Cell Protection Proteins® to dramatically increasing collagen and elastin production, active ingredients include: Gwennis & Belides™, to reduce irregular pigmentation by 36%, size of dark spots by 75% and even skin tone, Dermaclarine™, a blend of enzymes to refine skin, reduce blemishes by 61% and minimize pore size by 32%, plus Rubixyl, an anti-inflammatory peptide to stimulate production of a natural anti-irritant peptide, resulting in calmer skin.
name: LIFT + PERFECT Total Rejuvenation Cream

product_description:
Discover an innovative anti-ageing treatment with the Mizon S-Venom Wrinkle Tox Cream; a unique hydrator that is fast absorbed and suitable for all skin types.
Fortified with 4% SYN®-AKE, a tripeptide that mimics the effects of a peptide in viper snake venom, the rich cream reduces the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles, while visibly firming skin to offer a youthful finish. A skin-loving blend of Allantoin and Hyaluronic Acid, delivers a veil of luxurious and long-lasting moisture to the face, while Mango Seed and Shea Butter work in synergy to smooth skin’s texture.
Finished with a delicate scent, the calming cream leaves the face comfortably hydrated and younger looking.
name: S-Venom Wrinkle Tox Cream 50ml

product_description:
Treat your skin to Time Bomb's Complexion Cocktails to go, a trio of refreshing skincare solutions dedicated to combating the effects of dehydration, fatigue and pollution. Infused with a host of moisturising, replenishing and skin-loving ingredients, expect your skin to feel hydrated, invigorated and glowing.
Complexion Cocktail with a shot of H2Omega (30ml):
A refreshing fluid that helps to counteract dehydration by replenishing moisture and essential fatty acids. Perfect for dry, parched skin, the solution's fluid texture enables water soluble essential fatty acids to be instantly absorbed into skin which hydrate and quench to leave the complexion dewy, supple and fresh. Utilising a host of moisturising ingredients, the formula contains a proprietary Hyaluronic Acid Complex that helps attract and retain optimal moisture, and a shot of 'H2Omega' that combines Chia Oil with Coconut Oil to deliver rich omegas whilst intensely hydrating.
Complexion Cocktail with a shot of B12 (30ml):
An invigorating, anti-ageing formula to boost energy levels and minimise signs of stress or fatigue. Powered by Centella, Ginseng and Vitamin B12, the innovative treatment increases micro-circulation to fight dullness and uneven skin tone, whilst Amino Acids and two types of Hyaluronic Acid hydrate and plump. Your complexion is awake, fresh and glowing.
Complexion Cocktail with a shot of Chlorophyll (30ml):
A skincare solution that helps to protect, detoxify and refresh your skin. Working to counteract the effects of toxins, free radicals and environmental pollutants that can cause premature ageing and breakouts, the antioxidant-rich formula melts effortlessly into skin to promote a smoother, clarified, healthier looking complexion. Infused with naturally detoxifying Chlorophyll and a host of potent antioxidants known to help neutralise different types of free radicals, the formula expertly combats the effects of toxins that can cause spots, clogged pores and dry patches. Helping to soothe and calm your complexion, the detoxifying fluid will leave your skin feeling clean, dewy and decongested.
name: Bomb Complexion Cocktails to go 3 x 30ml

product_description:
Recharge tired skin with Time Bomb's Complexion B12 Cocktail; an invigorating, anti-ageing formula to boost energy levels and minimise signs of stress or fatigue.
Powered by Centella, Ginseng and Vitamin B12, the innovative treatment increases micro-circulation to fight dullness and uneven skin tone, whilst Amino Acids and two types of Hyaluronic Acid hydrate and plump. Your complexion is awake, fresh and glowing.
name: Bomb Complexion B12 Cocktail 100ml

product_description:
IOMA 终极抗衰老精华 ，使面部肌肤瞬间光滑，保护肌肤免遭对抗衰老，使肌肤重获年轻活力。
这款抗衰老精华，可对抗已出现的皱纹，延缓更多皱纹的出现， 深度滋养肌肤。采用 SYN-AKE 生物技术，放松肌肉，以减少皱纹和表情纹。MATRIXYL™3000，是一种由微型活性胶原蛋白组成的成分，使肌肤恢复致密、 促进纤维细胞的新陈代谢。 这款紧致精华，可作为皮肤张量，明显改善肌肤，使肌肤光滑，组织致密，看起来更年轻，肤质提高、焕发光采。 - K.N
name: 终极抗衰老精华15ml

product_description:
Dr Botanicals presents the Pomegranate Noir Advanced Natural Eye & Face Serum for Men, a multi-purpose serum bursting with vitamins, minerals and essential oils to leave the delicate skin looking brightened and smoother.
Suitable for all skin types including sensitive, the main active ingredient of Elderflower provides antioxidant-rich vitamins that help protect skin from free radical damage that often leads to signs of premature ageing. Extract of Red Algae enhances skin’s natural moisture barrier, whilst White Tea brightens and nourishes skin. Fine lines and wrinkles appear reduced and skin feels refreshed and restored.
name: Botanicals Pomegranate Noir Advanced Natural Eye & Face Serum For Men 30ml

product_description: IOMA 净肤磨砂膏 ，使肌肤精致光滑。去角质配方，可去除杂质，而不会剥离肌肤水分。 内含椰子油，可磨光肌肤表面，轻柔去除死皮细胞，软化皮肤；内含的小红莓和橙子的混合物，为肌肤提供抗氧化保护，使肌肤舒爽紧致。 提高其他护肤品的吸收率。 E.N.
name: 净肤磨砂膏 150ml

product_description:
Combat signs of ageing whilst you sleep with the Mizon Night Repair Melting Rich Cream; an intense night cream ideal for mature skin types. Utilising a ‘Capsule-Emulsifying’ method, the cream arrives as a solid balm that effortlessly melts into skin for a deep and instant anti-ageing effect.
Working on dull and lacklustre complexions, the rich cream is infused with Adenosine and Niacinamide, which work in synergy to visibly brighten the complexion, as well as reducing the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles. Vitamin C and E combine with a potent peptide to improve skin’s elasticity and reveal a firmer and more supple appearance.
Delivering a protective, silky veil, the Night Repair formula shields skin from harmful UV rays, pollutants and other stressors. Awake to a youthful complexion that is nourished and smooth.

product_description:

Suitable for all skin types, the advanced formula is fortified with Bio-Intelligent Micro Peptides that actively target areas of skin that need repair, delivering direct treatment for optimum efficacy up to 83% more than other products. The unique addition of Dehydrated Hyaluronic Acid Microspheres effectively fill the appearance of wrinkles and fine lines, while a selection of organic extracts, vitamins and adaptive emulsifiers work in tandem to firm, tone and hydrate. Elasticity levels are boosted with water retention levels enhanced, leaving skin feeling smooth and refined.

Utilising Bio-Intelligent Micro Peptides, the anti-ageing formula actively targets the cells that need it most for direct repair and regeneration of collagen, with a selection of fatty acids and adaptive emulsifiers improving skin’s natural barrier function and ability to adjust to the environment. Dehydrated Hyaluronic Acid Microspheres effectively fill the look of fine lines and crow’s feet, while Hyaluronic Acid Liposomes give a plumping boost, minimising the appearance of eye bags and sagging skin. The eye contour is left feeling hydrated and refreshed with a youthful looking visage.

product_description:
使用 Elizabeth Arden 伊丽莎白雅顿 PREVAGE® 城市智能防晒保湿隔离霜 SPF 护理您的肌肤，其保湿抗衰老配方采用三倍功效的保护功能，可有效保护肌肤免受污染、紫外线的伤害，减轻明显的衰老迹象。
使用 DAN 生物酶复合物™ 保护防止污染与紫外线，这款保湿防晒乳采用 100% 矿物质光谱防晒剂 SPF 50 专业地保护肌肤免受有害紫外线的伤害，支持肌肤的自然修复过程，有助于强化和保护自由基。 防污染技术可在肌肤表面形成一层明显的保护膜，有助于防止有害毒素渗透到肌肤内部，其普通的纯色肌肤和柔光功能可让肌肤看起来更加光滑、更有光泽。
其含有丰富抗氧化剂的配方有助于维持肌肤的最佳健康状态。
name: Arden 伊丽莎白·雅顿 PREVAGE® 城市智能防晒保湿隔离霜（SPF 50）40ml

product_description:
Specifically developed for all skin types from the age of 30 and beyond, the Perfection Ultime Retexturizing Beauty Cream from Gatineau is an advanced lightweight moisturiser that works to intensively hydrate while dramatically reducing the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles.
Balancing rejuvenating Caviar extract and age-defying Tripeptide-1, the velvet-smooth formula is brimming with proteins, nutrients and vitamins that rapidly absorb into skin, improving texture, tone and luminosity. The addition of Hyaluronic Acid provides essential moisture, while Wheat and Soy Proteins seek to strengthen and protect with an instant smoothing effect.
Suitable for daily use, the anti-ageing face cream effectively transforms the complexion, minimising the look of pores and leaving skin with a youthful-looking radiance and sumptuously softened texture.
name: Perfection Ultime Retexturizing Beauty Cream

product_description:
Discover the secret to younger looking skin with the Elizabeth Arden Advanced Ceramide Capsules; the iconic skincare treatment now with triple the power to truly transform skin and reveal a visibly firmer and smoother complexion.
As we age, skin loses the ability to produce the essential youth factor of lipid ceramides, leading to a weakened and uneven texture with a dramatic increase in wrinkles and sagging.
The innovative anti-ageing capsules directly deliver a concentrated dosage of bio-engineered, skin-identical ceramides, helping to repair and strengthen the lipid barrier as well as support natural collagen renewal, resulting in a re-texturising and plumping effect to radically minimise the appearance of fine lines.
A Botanical Complex blend of Alfalfa, Olives and Coconut Oil infuses skin with hydrocarbons and lipids, while Omega-rich Tsubuki Oil restores elasticity levels, effectively optimising moisture levels. Expect skin to feel revitalised, soft and supple with an improved luminosity and healthy-looking glow.
name: Arden Ceramide Capsules Advanced (90 Capsules)

product_description:
Working to prolong your tan and soothe your skin all in one go, the Sun Refreshing After-Sun Lotion for face and body (200ml) from NUXE is enriched with extracts of sun and water flowers to make a delicious, non-comedogenic face cream that hydrates skin.
Helping to leave your sun exposed skin soft, silky and perfectly moisturised, this satin-soothing lotion also leaves a summery fragrance on the skin whilst helping to repair it with a gentle, paraben-free formula. - E.D
- Apply onto the face and body after showering following sun exposure.
name: Sun Refreshing After-Sun Lotion (200ml) - Exclusive

product_description:
Refresh and revive your skin with Mavala's Clean & Comfort Caress Toning Lotion, a delicately scented toner formulated to remove impurities and makeup residue from dry skin.
Concentrated in pure Alps Water, Swiss Mallow Flower and Aloe Vera, the physiological pH toner expertly cleanses and hydrates whilst delivering soothing, moisturising and emollient properties. Makeup is removed without compromising skin's cutaneous barrier, and it creates a slight film that helps to maintain hydration and elasticity for a healthy-looking, supple complexion. Expect soft, soothed and comfortable skin. Housed in a PET transparent bottle with flow restrictor and aluminium seal ensuring first use.
name: Clean & Comfort Caress Toning Lotion 200ml

product_description: 奢華抗衰老潔面啫喱帶來愉悅的出色清爽體驗，使肌膚更加美麗、清新和年輕。高級的深入毛孔重塑作用可增強細胞更新，幫助消除細紋、皺紋和其他衰老痕跡。適合各種類型皮膚，敏感肌膚除外。溫柔掃除導致肌膚黯淡的死皮細胞和雜質，同時有效去除毛孔毒素、乳化油脂和改善肌膚紋理。乙醇酸和水楊酸與提亮植物性藥材可剝落死皮，使肌膚超級乾淨，細膩有活力。
name: Thomas Roth 彼得罗夫抗衰老清洁啫喱 250ml

product_description:
使用 Aurelia 益生菌润肤奇迹洁面乳清洁和改善您的肌肤，这款乳状的洁面乳可有效祛除杂质，增强肌肤的自然光泽。
这款植物香型的洁面乳含有令人精力充沛的精油，轻轻拂过肌肤，就可以专业地祛除化妆品残留物和日常堆积的污垢，让肌肤更加清爽。 结合抗菌的竹纤维棉布（随附）使用时，可温和地祛除角质，帮助脱落暗沉的坏死细胞，使肌肤更加润泽白亮。
将益生素和肽技术与生物有机植物和花瓣精华完美结合，这款智能洁面乳可为脱水的肌肤提供抗氧化成分和脂肪酸；让您拥有梦寐以求的柔软、清洁、焕然一新的肤色，并恢复肌肤的水合作用。
随附抗菌竹纤维棉布。
name: 益生菌润肤奇迹洁面乳 120 毫升

product_description:
Lierac特级护眼霜，可对抗皮肤老化，抚平敏感眼部周围可见的细纹。 
其质地为天鹅绒、不油腻。含大量有益成分，可轻松融入肌肤。其成分包括：玻尿酸，令肌肤饱满充盈；植物萃取物，可缓解眼部充血；黑色浆果，可消除黑眼圈。
本产品针对解决深皱纹、浮肿、黑眼圈、肤色暗沉等问题。可巧妙地淡化皱纹、对抗肌肤松弛。内含的高浓度活性成分和光反射颜料，一扫疲惫的眼神，使眼睛重焕青春风采。 内含10％的玻尿酸及珍贵的黑花提取物，使肌肤饱满充盈、可保护肌肤，起抗氧化作用。 令肌肤光滑柔软、青春靓丽。 修复娇嫩的眼部区域。
name: 特级护眼膏10ml

product_description: Caudalie 欧缇丽葡萄原液夜间精油（30 毫升）是一种植物萃物精华液，可平静干燥、敏感的肌肤。其所含的纯天然精油，可有效修复面部娇嫩的肌肤。 配方中含有荷荷巴油、橄榄油、葡萄、玫瑰草、芝麻和玫瑰萃取物，这款舒缓精油带有吸收机制，每次可让肌肤吸收正好剂量的精油。 - E.D
name: 欧缇丽葡萄原液夜间精油（30 毫升）

product_description:
专门为油型至混合型肌肤而设计，这款 KORRES 高丝红石榴控油收缩毛孔爽肤水是一种水果香型的收敛化妆水，可收缩毛孔，让肌肤看起来更光滑细腻。
这款不含油脂的 KORRES 高丝红石榴控油收缩毛孔爽肤水经过皮肤科专家的临床测试，利用自然环境的活化作用帮助控制肌肤的油脂。 柳叶和红石榴提取物可去除杂质和污物，控制油脂——尤其对易长皱纹的肌肤非常有用。
使用说明：
name: 高丝红石榴控油收缩毛孔爽肤水（200 毫升）

product_description:
Elemis 艾丽美细胞再生肌肤滋养胶囊是一种超强的防污染解决方案，含有强效的抗氧化防皱成分，薰衣草和玫瑰具有修复滋养、安神减压的作用。
这款肌肤滋养胶囊可修复明显的衰老迹象，清理肌肤细胞基质，排除毒素，促进肌肤吸收营养，让肌肤焕发青春活力。
薰衣草和玫瑰精油可提供内咖啡"兴奋效果"，让您的肌肤缓解压力，充足吸收营养。  肌肤滋养胶囊中所含的月见草、夏威夷果、荷荷巴油和辣木活性成分所具备的抗氧化作用可分别持续 5、20、40 和 80 小时。
从坦桑尼亚的"奇迹树"提取的辣木油拥有神奇抗氧化效果。  白天服用的玫瑰胶囊可让您的肌肤恢复青春亮丽的光彩，而晚间服用的薰衣草胶囊具有平衡减压的功效。
使用说明：
 
Elemis 艾丽美建议配合轻松舒缓的按摩技术：
name: 毫升——60 粒）

product_description: 硬汉强效保湿霜，专为男性朋友开发，长效保湿，修复肌肤，使肌肤放松舒适、再现活力。 内含八种精油，包括琉璃苣、杏仁、柠檬和亚麻荠等。可被肌肤快速吸收，用以滋养调理肌肤，软化肌肤，不油腻。 舒缓敏感肌肤、减少肌肤干涩，使面部及颈部肌肤更精致、更光滑。 E.N.

Erno Laszlo 滋润保湿护肤水专为干性和超干性肌肤配制，这款具有舒缓作用的护肤水能够在洁面后为肌肤补充水分并修复肌肤。 这款质地柔滑、不含酒精的护肤水采用舒缓的消炎配方，即使最敏感的肌肤也不会有刺激反应，它能够通过多种有效保湿剂为肌肤注入水分，同时还能促进细胞更新和组织修复，并去除肌肤起皮。 将这款产品加入您的日常护肤套装，让肌肤变得光滑、柔软水嫩。 - L.M.
使用说明：洁面后，将护肤水倒在棉球上，然后涂于面部，注意避开眼部区域。
name: Laszlo 滋润保湿护肤水（6.8oz）

product_description:
Shiseido的Ultimune眼部能量激活精华露亮白和活化娇嫩眼部区域。 该缎面质地浓缩液适合所有肌肤类型和年龄，可迅速被肌肤吸收，减少细纹、皱纹和黑眼圈，令肌肤紧致光滑。
采用独家技术配制，以强化和再生眼部区域，该浓缩液可增强肌肤天然免疫能力，改善肤质并带来更均匀的肤色。 其屡获殊荣的Ultimune Complex™与ImuMoisture提取物相结合，以促进肌肤的朗格罕氏细胞，该细胞在抵御衰老、环境侵害和情绪压力方面起着至关重要的作用。
这款革命性护肤霜可以防止进一步衰老迹象并对抗水分流失、肌肤逐渐粗糙或干燥，带来青春靓丽、容光焕发的肌肤。 适合提高眼霜的功效。 E.N. 
功效：
眼部周围肌肤变得柔软水嫩、光滑细腻
细纹和皱纹得到改善
黑眼圈得到缓解
肤色变得均匀，肌肤亮白，容光焕发
name: Ultimune眼部能量激活精华露 (15ml)

product_description:
欧缇丽甘醇酸撕拉面膜的工作原理是收紧毛孔，以增强光泽，让肤色更清澈、更明亮。 其温和配方适合所有皮肤类型，能去除角质，让暗沉的皮肤瞬间焕发光彩。 所含的葡萄蔓能减少黑斑，改善肤色，所含的木瓜酵素能去除表面的死皮细胞，令皮肤清新、清澈。 E.N. 
使用方法：搽到皮肤上并保留10分钟，每周两次。 用水清洗。

我们安全有效的护肤系统能满足你在孕期所有的护肤需求，使你的肌肤散发自然光泽。提亮眼周肌肤，缓解黑眼圈；保湿，提亮，帮助肌肤水油平衡。
焕颜平衡洁面乳将给你彻底的清洁，益生菌和帮助保湿的omega将会使你的肌肤更加美丽。更添加乳酸这款最安全和有效的天然去角质成分。绿茶提取物和含有丰富抗氧化剂的绿茶帮助肌肤看起来更加紧实有弹性。焕颜平衡洁面乳完全不含有皂基和十二烷基硫酸钠。相反，我们混合5种天然椰子提取物清洁剂，来制造一种淡香低泡沫，温和而有效的洁面，使你的皮肤清新绽放健康光泽;超洁净但不紧绷。
8种强大的活性成分帮助改善黑眼圈，天然的保湿和抗氧化维生素在舒缓的芦荟中帮助镇定和保湿肌肤。
丰富的Omegas和玻尿酸来帮助强化和滋润肌肤，益生菌和对于怀孕安全的乳酸，能够帮助保持肌肤明亮，再加上抗氧化剂来对抗衰老。乳酸是最好的天然去角质成分，在怀孕期间保持皮肤没有老废角质堆积，这是痤疮的主要成因。
name: Mio 焕颜3步曲套装

product_description:
Achieve a flawless contour with the Miracle Sculpting Sponge from Real Techniques. Specially designed to aid in creating shadows and highlighting, the pink sponge is an essential tool for your makeup bag.
The Miracle Sculpting Sponge boasts a small side for precision highlighting, whilst the large side is ideal for larger surfaces, specifically controlled contouring. Suitable for powder, cream and liquid makeup products, the sponge hosts six varying surfaces in order to create a professional sculpt.
name: Techniques Miracle Sculpting Sponge

product_description:
Treat your complexion to the benefits of PRAI's 24K GOLD Masque; an anti-ageing, radiance-reviving face mask that works to restore youthful vitality.
Harnessing the powers of 24K Gold, the luxurious treatment helps to minimise the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles, whilst defending against the damaging effects of free radicals and environmental aggressors. Precious PRAI Extract moisturises and softens to reveal a smoother, more refined complexion with a luminous glow.
name: 24K GOLD Masque 60ml

product_description: REN V-Cense 青年活力日霜是一种强效保湿面霜，有助于提高肌肤的活性和弹性，防止自由基损伤并平复任何细纹和皱纹。 这款焕彩日霜也旨在防止和削弱过早衰老的迹象，保护肌肤，使其滋润，焕发光彩。 - E.D
name: V-Cense™ 青年活力日霜

product_description:
Chantecaille排毒泥面膜，使肌肤精制细腻。本款高岭土面膜，可重新平衡肌肤水分水平、收缩毛孔。 
这款泥面膜主要由纯玫瑰水组成，内含创新型植物萃取物，以控制滋润肌肤；高岭土有助于吸收多余油脂；迷迭香具有天然净化性能；纯蜂蜜及润肤型含羞草花，可滋养软化肌肤。 其包含的糖精异构体可保持肌肤水分、减少肌肤干燥*；蘑菇提取物有助于细化毛孔*。
使肌肤看起来柔软光滑、洁净细腻。

Meet the needs of parched skin with the bareMinerals Skincare Starter Kit for Dry Skin; a three-piece collection that clarifies, replenishes and thoroughly hydrates the complexion. The set boasts a hydrating trio, which includes a creamy cleansing foam, anti-ageing serum and a silky soft moisturiser, each suited for normal to dry skin types.
Pure Plush Gentle Deep Cleansing Foam (50g)
Experience a refreshing cleanse with the Pure Plush Gentle Deep Cleansing Foam, a daily facial cleanser infused with an invigorating, naturally derived grapefruit fragrance. With a creamy formula that lathers into a velvety veil on skin, the cleanser works to gently lift away makeup and impurities to reveal a fresh, pure complexion. Its combination of softening Elderflower and Rosemary extracts and mineral-rich Sea Salts gently refine and revitalise the face for skin that feels clean, comfortable and smooth.
Suitable for all skin types. Ophthalmologist tested.
SkinLongevity Vital Power Infusion Serum (30ml)
Reignite your skin's youthful radiance with the SkinLongevity Vital Power Infusion Serum, an anti-ageing essence that utilises Skinmimetic Technology to empower, replenish, renew and fortify your complexion. Working to enhance natural luminosity and improve suppleness, the serum harnesses the power of patented Long Life Herb Extract and California Poppy to promote vitality; its hydrating and smoothing properties reawaken skin's youth and help diminish the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles. Skin is soft, smooth, resilient and naturally glowing. Infused with an uplifting Bergamot and Eucalyptus fragrance.
Suitable for all skin types.
Bare Haven Essential Moisturising Soft Cream (30g)
Intensely hydrate skin with the Bare Haven Essential Moisturising Soft Cream, a silky soft moisturiser specially formulated to treat normal to dry skin types. Delivering a veil of comfort and hydration, the relieving formula utilises Intuitive Mineral Moisture™ Technology to replenish the skin's moisture reserves and help diminish the appearance of dryness and signs of ageing. Its synergy of Peptides, Ceramides and Amino Acids soften rough patches and reduce the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles for a youthful looking complexion. Inspiring natural radiance, the moisturiser leaves dry skin feeling quenched and restored. Infused with the naturally derived fragrance of Bergamot and Eucalyptus.
Suitable for normal to dry skin.
name: Skincare Starter Kit for Dry Skin

product_description:
用Triumph and Disaster仪式Face Cleanser温和地清除肌肤的杂质。 它可以清除多余油脂和污垢，而不会令肌肤干燥或引起刺痛，因此那些肌肤敏感的人士可放心使用。 它的配方蕴含琼崖海棠与薄荷油，可温和去除肌肤的角质，令肌肤看起来光亮清爽、焕然一新。 主要成分：
使用说明： 适合日常使用，每天早晨和晚上揉搓起泡涂抹到面部，然后冲洗干净。
Triumph and Disaster 是新西兰的品牌，其名字来自吉卜林的诗《If》中的一行。 他们将科学与自然相结合，以生产出具有效果的高品质产品。 Triumph and Disaster 采用本土成分，旨在尊重自然、利用科学并打造仪式产品和准备工具。
name: & Disaster 仪式 Face Cleanser ( 150ml)

product_description:
Achieve a smooth, youthful-looking complexion with the Invisiblur Perfecting Collection from Murad. Housed in a gift box, the kit combines a refreshing cleanser, gentle exfoliator, firming eye treatment and skin-perfecting formula that work in tandem to restore and renew.
Refreshing Cleanser (200ml)
A gentle formula that expertly eliminates dirt, make-up and impurities to leave skin feeling silky smooth. Harnessing the powers of Algae, Cucumber and Hawaiian White Ginger Extracts, the lightweight cleanser refreshes and rejuvenates skin, whilst delivering essential moisture and hydration to reveal a soft, comfortable complexion after use. Helps to fight signs of ageing as it promotes clear, healthy skin.
AHA/BHA Exfoliating Cleanser (30ml)
Containing a trio of Salicylic, Lactic and Glycolic Acids, the cleanser effectively reduces the build up of dead skin cells to reveal a brighter, polished complexion with restored luminosity. Jojoba beads gently exfoliate and hydrate skin; helping to soften signs of ageing and reigniting a healthy glow. Suitable for weekly use, you can expect renewed and refreshed skin with an even tone.
Eye Lift Firming Treatment (5ml and 8 Pads)
An innovative anti-ageing formula that works to minimise the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles. Fortified with Hyaluronic Acid spheres, the powerful treatment penetrates deeply into skin to deliver superior hydration and combat dryness, whilst surface-filling technology delivers a plumping effect for a younger-looking and more refined eye contour. Complete with eye pads to improve absorption for optimal results.
Invisiblur Perfecting Shield SPF30 (30ml)
A multi-tasking formula that works to prime the skin, improve signs of ageing and protect from sun exposure. Invisible on application, the formula combines Mushroom peptides with a soft focus complex to soften the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles and blur imperfections. The broad spectrum moisturising blend will leave you with irresistibly soft, youthful-looking skin.
name: Invisiblur Perfecting Collection (Worth £94)

product_description:
REN 排毒细致毛孔面膜（50 毫升）可清理出皮肤的杂质，减少黑头和打开堵塞的毛孔。 这款排毒细致毛孔面膜的配方独具匠心，富含丰富的营养物质，结合 REN 皮肤科专家的配方——得益于从的热带螺旋藻中提取的蛋白质和从红茶萃取的必须脂肪酸——可有效减少肌肤的可见瑕疵，让肌肤更柔软，帮助改善肌肤结构，促进细胞更新。 从法国粘土中提取的矿物质可有效清理肌肤的杂质，减少过量的皮脂，解决坏死皮肤细胞堆积问题，可有效减少那些损害肌肤的主要因素。 净化肌肤，让肌肤更顺滑、更有光泽。
取适量 REN 排毒细致毛孔面膜涂抹在清洁的皮肤上，等待面膜干燥，直到能用指尖轻轻揭下面膜。
用温水彻底清洁肌肤。
name: 多元矿物质排毒清洁面膜（50 毫升）

product_description:
The Omorovicza Summer Value Set Bright Summer Duo combines a luxurious serum and lotion that work in tandem to promote revitalised and glowing skin – perfect for summertime. Harnessing opulent extracts and exquisite oils, the pair leave skin feeling smooth, supple and replenished with a youthful looking radiance. Housed in a sleek, branded gift box.   
Rose Lifting Serum (30ml)
Smooth and rejuvenate skin with the Rose Lifting Serum. The light formula contains natural ingredients, including Sea Mayweed and Wheat Polysaccharides, that work to effectively relax facial muscles so skin is left looking smooth, firm and radiant. Bursting with age-defying vigour, it acts to deliver an instant lifting and firming effect to leave skin glowing with youthful looking radiance. Ruby Crystals give the skin an instant youthful glow so the complexion is left looking radiant and revitalised.
Elemental Emulsion (50ml)
The Elemental Emulsion is a lightweight and oil free lotion that boasts anti-ageing effects whilst working to deeply moisturise into the skin's layers. Formulated with sodium hyaluronate to improve moisture retention and marine extracts with hyaluronic acid to deeply hydrate, this lotion will keep your complexion looking and feeling years younger.
name: Summer Value Set Bright Summer Duo (Worth £175.00)

product_description:
从 Chantecaille  超级防晒霜，是一款高效防晒霜，为肌肤提供抗老化保护。 主要由三种广谱、非渗透性防晒剂组成，可保护肌肤免遭有害的UVA/UVB 射线辐射。防晒保护性能高出45倍。
轻巧、无油质地，可舒缓肌肤，控制肌肤油光长达一整天。 本品内含舒缓植物萃取物和肌肽等成分，用以舒缓肌肤、使肌肤更紧实精致、肤色更好，明显软化皱纹和细纹。
name: 超级防晒霜 SPF 50 - 40ml

product_description:
使用  FOREO LUNA™ 斐珞尔露娜 2 男士净透舒缓洁面仪护理和改善肌肤，其设计旨在清洁肌肤，带给您更平滑舒适的剃须体验。 让您的肌肤看起来更加健康，LUNA™ 露娜 2 洁面仪将帮助您焕化出亮丽剔透的肤色，预防剃须损伤和刺激。
T-Sonic 透肤声波脉动与全新设计的接触点完美结合，使这款设备可针对肌肤细胞进行温和而高效地清洁，帮助打开堵塞毛孔，祛除污垢和油脂；其灵活的刷头能够适应面部轮廓，与面部贴合，以实现更深层的清洁。 硅胶"刷毛"超级卫生，可有效防止滋生细菌，以保持肌肤的清爽。
配备有高科技抗皱模式，这款洁面仪可直接将低频声波脉动导入到容易长皱纹的区域，以帮助淡化细纹，让肌肤看起来更紧致。
该设备为完全防水型设备，可在洗浴时安全使用。
name: LUNA™ 斐珞尔露娜 2 男士净透舒缓洁面仪

product_description:
凯莉·米洛（Kylie Minogue）和尤金伲亚（Eugenia Silva）特别喜欢 KORRES 高丝野玫瑰保湿霜！
野玫瑰全天候保湿霜营养丰富，质地柔软，散发着独特的花香。 KORRES 野玫瑰具有修复功能，可减少细纹和缓解肌肤的色素失调。
玫瑰的抗氧化功能既能抗衰老，又能使肌肤极致水润，确保肌肤能全天候保湿。这是因为沙漠植物白茅具备保水功能。
使用说明：
name: 高丝野玫瑰全天候保湿霜（适用于正常肌肤和干燥肌肤）（40ml）

product_description:
使用 Erno Laszlo 水疗记忆睡眠面膜（40g）对抗水分流失与衰老的迹象。富含24小时"智能补水因子"，采用丰富的配方，补充流失的水分，令肌肤全天水润亮泽。
在睡眠中即可发挥功效，通过充盈紧实肌肤实现抗衰老，减少细纹和皱纹，恢复肌肤弹性。 在睡眠中让丰富的配方充分吸收，发挥神奇魔力，醒来后便可拥有年轻、水分充盈的肌肤。 - K.R
name: Laszlo HydraTherapy 水疗记忆睡眠面膜（40g）

product_description: REN Evercalm Gentle Cleansing Gel（洁面凝胶）的配方温和，可有效卸妆、去除杂质，不会对皮肤产生任何刺激或紧绷感。 该产品适合敏感皮肤者使用，可以起到舒缓和醒肤的作用，让您的皮肤得以净化并重新焕发活力 。 - L.M.
name: Evercalm™ Gentle Cleansing Gel（洁面凝胶）

product_description:
Ultrasun Ultralip SPF 30是一款优质润唇膏，专门保护您的娇嫩双唇免受各种因素的侵害。
本品蕴含绝佳的黑加仑籽油，能减少发炎和皲裂，同时瞬间滋润干燥部位， 实为同类产品中的佼佼者；此外它不含香料，因此也可为口红打底。 它能适应任何温度和海拔，可全天反复使用，确保绝佳的持续保护功效。
name: Ultralip SPF 30 (4.8g)

product_description:
Murad慕拉Age Reform AHA/BHA去角質潔面乳(200ml) 
清潔潤滑肌膚。這款溫和高效的去角質潔面乳有兩重功效。一方面，水楊酸、乳酸和乙醇酸通過溶解堆積的肌膚細胞，而達到清潔和提亮膚色的效果。荷荷巴微粒進一步提亮改善膚質。而咯烷酮羧酸鈉和荷荷巴籽油也有助於抵禦肌膚乾燥，甘草萃取物能提供抗過敏和消炎物質。
name: 慕拉 Age Reform AHA/BHA 去角质洁面乳 (200ml)

product_description:
Re-energise your eyes with Lancôme Advanced Génifique Eye Serum Light Pearl, an illuminating eye serum that targets signs of ageing and fatigue around the delicate eye contour to help restore youthful radiance.
With a unique massaging 360° Light Pearl™ applicator, the multi-tasking serum delivers multiple benefits, including smoothing the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles, minimising the appearance of dark circles and reducing the look of under eye bags to reveal a brighter-looking, refreshed and well-rested eye contour.
name: Advanced Génifique Eye Serum 20ml - Light Pearl

product_description: 澳洲护肤品牌 Sukin 荣获奖项的 Sensitive Night Cream 是一款丰盈保湿霜，在睡眠中为肌肤补充水分。 这款丰盈晚霜采用能起舒缓作用的芦荟配制而成，以舒缓肌肤并带来持久舒适；亦含有能起镇静作用的黄瓜和甘菊，令肤色恢复活力。 富含玫瑰果、琉璃苣籽和鳄梨油，实现极致保湿并改善皮肤的弹性，一觉醒来即可获得更光滑的健康肌肤。 E.N.
name: Sensitive Night Cream 120ml

product_description:
Lierac豪华型护眼霜  ，专门对抗眼部浮肿和黑眼圈。 配有特别的眼刷，其端部可让您有针对性地涂抹本品。其抗老化配方，内含玻尿酸、红酒多酚、维生素E等成分，可使双眼清澈明亮、修复娇嫩的眼部区域。
内含 3.5％的D-Glyox，可强化产品功效。D-Glyox是一种正在申请专利的成分，混合了石榴花、合欢树、脂质体肽。本款功效强大的护眼霜可对抗糖氧化（糖化和抗氧化的组合）对皮肤蛋白质的改变，提升肌肤弹性、提高肌肤光泽、使肌肤柔软细腻。
本产品超轻盈，可被皮肤快速吸收。减少眼部细纹，使您拥有更光滑、更精致的眼睛轮廓。
name: 豪华型护眼霜 （针对眼部浮肿和黑眼圈） 4grs

product_description:
蒟蒻海綿撲（含法國粉泥） 
適合超級敏感、易受刺激肌膚的完美面部海綿。粉泥混合了柔軟的紅泥和白泥，建議用於疲勞、敏感和缺水的肌膚。幫助將粗糙硬化的肌膚變成柔軟有光澤的肌膚，恢復肌膚活力，還原肌膚的自然彈性。非常適合長時間日曬的肌膚。 
蒟蒻因1500 多年以來日本人用於增進健康而聞名，最早在六世紀用作藥材。 
自然潤澤植物纖維，具有天然鹼性，因此可平衡肌膚雜質和油脂的酸性。海綿的獨特網狀結構，輕輕按摩肌膚，並刺激血液流動和肌膚細胞新生。使肌膚乾淨舒適，自然清爽！除非您真正想要，否則無需使用其他潔面乳或潔面皂。如果您選擇使用其他潔面乳或潔面皂，您可以減少平時的用量，因為海綿將產生更多泡沫，可以更加深入清潔。

利用 Caudalie Resveratrol Lift Night Infusion Cream 在夜晚令肌肤获得新生，这是一款保湿润肤霜，可改善和修护面部轮廓，包括颧骨和下巴。 利用该品牌的专利藤蔓白藜芦醇配制，以紧致和收紧肌肤，该快速吸收护肤霜加入透明质酸以丰盈肌肤，抚平细纹和皱纹，令肌肤焕发青春。
具有不油腻、轻盈质地，该焕发光彩护肤霜富含具有滋养功效的牛油果脂和葡萄籽油，以便在睡眠时修复肌肤。 非常适合所有类型的肌肤，一觉醒来后您将拥有青春焕发、清爽自然、如丝般柔软的肌肤。 E.N.
name: Resvératrol Lift Night infusion cream (50ml)

product_description:
使用 Blemish Clearing Solution from Murad，预防粉刺，减少红肿。 其高效配方含有活性成分，包括水杨酸和旋果蚊草子提取物，可去除角质和死皮，同时疏通毛孔，呈现更健康的肌肤。 提升亮泽的精华液含有茶树精油，有助于净化肌肤，并提供必要的维生素，以舒缓发炎或受损肌肤。 E.N. 
使用说明：取本品于清洁的肌肤上，按摩直至吸收，可用于面部、颈部和胸部。
name: Blemish Clearing Solution 50ml

product_description:
Caudalie歐緹麗保濕霜40ml 
一款具有三重功效的高效護膚霜，適用於所有膚質，特別是年輕肌膚。強效保濕、深層煥膚和高效抗皺。這款面霜可持久滋潤肌膚，讓肌膚保持年輕光彩。讓您的肌膚保持青春活力、光彩照人。可在白天或晚上用於面部和頸部，適合敏感性皮膚。抗氧化和低致敏性。
name: 欧缇丽保湿霜 40ml

product_description: Bulldog Sensitive Face Duo 是敏感肌肤的理想产品。 含洗面奶和保湿霜，清洁和护理肌肤，同时不增加肌肤负担。 - L.M.
name: Sensitive Face Duo

product_description:
您一直喜爱的是经典的 Elizabeth Arden Eight Hour Cream Skin Protectant，但现在我们提供的是具备 SPF15 保护的日常保湿霜。 这款日常保湿润肤露令肌肤感觉柔软、光滑、滋润，长达 8 小时之久。
Elizabeth Arden Eight Hour Daily Moisturiser with SPF15 from Elizabeth Arden 采用经典 Eight Hour Cream 的完美融合和芳香配制而成，甚至可保护肌肤免受极端天气和气候变化的影响，而 SPF15 则可保护所有肌肤类型不受阳光的有害影响。
使用说明：
name: Arden Eight Hour Cream Intensive Daily Moisturizer For Face Spf 15 (50ml)

product_description:
Treat your complexion to the Caudalie Favorites Set; a collection of travel-sized skincare treats that will leave skin purified, hydrated and revitalised on-the-go.
Instant Detox Mask (15ml)
A 99.3% natural clay mask that works to draw out impurities and toxins, whilst treating all forms of free radical damage and tightening the appearance of pores. Suitable for all skin types, its gel-cream formula blends Pink Clay, Papaya Extract and antioxidant Grape Marc to deliver a deep pore-cleansing action, revealing a refined, smoothened complexion with a healthy glow. Subtly fragranced with soothing Lavender, Parsley and Chamomile Botanicals.
Micellar Cleansing Water (30ml)
A three-in-one make-up remover, cleanser and toner developed to gently diminish dirt and impurities from the face and eye area. Suitable for all skin types, including the most sensitive, the water soothes and moisturises skin to leave if feeling silky soft, whilst delivering a refreshing fragrance of Orange and Lemon Blossom, Watermelon and Mint Leaves.
Vinosource Moisturizing Sorbet (10ml)
Calm irritated and stressed skin with the luxurious sorbet; a gel-cream formula developed to deliver immediate soothing properties for long-lasting comfort. Infused with calming Chamomile and Organic Grape Water to hydrate skin, the refreshing sorbet is ideal for any skin type that experiences sensitivity. Experience smooth, soft and soothed skin with reduced redness.
Premier Cru The Eye Cream (5ml)
A powerful, anti-ageing eye cream developed to visibly correct wrinkles, dark circles and puffiness around the delicate eye area. Instantly transforms tired eyes and delivers intense hydration, whilst firming and smoothening skin to leave it radiant and youthful-looking. Fragrance free.
Beauty Elixir (30ml)
A powerful, radiance-reviving treatment developed to boost and illuminate dull complexions. Suitable for all skin types, its plant-based formula smoothens the appearance of fine lines, tightens pores and awakens skin to reveal a brighter, healthy-looking complexion. Favoured by make-up artists and celebrities, the versatile spray can also be used to set make-up in place.
name: Favorites Set

product_description:
Make painful extractions a thing of the past with the STARSKIN Sunset Strips™ 3-Step Advanced Pore Cleansing Expert System; a new-generation black head removal routine that works to eliminate trapped dirt, excess sebum and impurities from the nose.
Each treatment comprises three mask strips, which work in synergy to perform a deep cleanse of the pores. The first strip is designed to prepare the skin for extraction. The anti-microbial cotton strip is infused with Witch-Hazel, which softens excess sebum, whilst dissolving a build-up of debris.
After 10 minutes skin is ready for step two; the blackhead removal charcoal mask, which extracts blackheads, whiteheads and impurities from skin. Enriched with Charcoal extract, the second step seeks to purify pores and condition the skin on the nose.
Finally, the third step leaves pores tight and refined. The bio-cellulose strip boasts a proprietary herbal medley, which instantly soothes the pores after extraction. The addition of Eucalyptus ensures pores are visibly minimised and refined. Used regularly, the three step system promotes healthier and clearer skin. Simply strip your way to a smooth and refined nose.
name: Sunset Strips™ 3-Step Advanced Pore Cleansing Expert System

product_description:
Unlock the secret to gorgeous, glowing skin with Glow Drops® from The Hero Project; an ultra-silky, dry touch facial oil that seeks to brighten and nourish your complexion in one simple step.
Formulated with over 98% naturally derived ingredients, the pampering dry oil delivers an intensive dosage of nutrients and vitamins to leave skin looking and feeling as though it’s experienced an indulgent spa treatment.
Infused with a lush, moreish scent and instantly absorbed, the harmonic blend of ten botanic essential oils as well as Argan and Hemp Seed Oils work together to infuse skin with moisture and goodness, smoothing the look of imperfections and signs of fatigue. A potent shot of lipid, antioxidant-rich Vitamin C delivers free radical protection and generates a healthy-looking radiance.
The cleverly designed (and beautiful!) bottle features a push button dropper and smart base dimple, ensuring no product is wasted – ‘Gorgeous to the last drop®’. Give dull, stressed out and lacklustre skin some TLC with Glow Drops and unveil a lit-from-within complexion.
name: Hero Project Glow Drops Dry Touch Facial Oil + Vitamin C 30ml

product_description:
NIOD 弹性催化剂颈精华液是一个无创抗衰老配方，它利用一系列智能技术，以帮助提高和保护可见的皮肤弹性。
这款精华液集中提高和增强松弛肌肤中的弹性蛋白，针对颈部线条和下垂，有助于改善肌肤表面上方和下方的弹性和密度。
前弹性蛋白和弹性 - 光纤技术：
这些技术有助于提高和增强弹性。 它们支持细胞的凝聚力，增强弹性纤维并使弹性蛋白质合成得到恢复，使您的肌肤肤粘弹性明显增加。
抗弹性蛋白酶和抗早衰技术： 
弹性蛋白酶是一种能分解弹性蛋白的酶；这些技术抑制弹性蛋白酶的性能，有助于抵消因弹性蛋白分解而导致的肌肤松弛。
肌肤及皮下组织密度技术： 
这些技术起到提高肌肤表面及皮下可见皮肤密度的作用。 咖啡因、肉碱和苦Ginger创造一个"推拉"效应以使肌肤保持"活跃"。 这种反直观的方法在同时增加和减少液体流动的情况下提高了肌肤的可见色调；而这种"推 - 拉"动作则改善了皮肤密度和表面均一性，因为流体的分布变得更加均匀。

人手必备的Elizabeth Arden Eight Hour Cream Skin防护乳是一款经典的护肤品，能够修复、舒缓和有助于缓解干裂，皲裂和干性肌肤。 它能够有效地舒缓粗糙，红肿和轻微的肌肤不适。
这款顶级修复乳多年来在美容编辑、美妆大师和模特中拥有极好的口碑。 Elizabeth Arden Eight Hour Cream Skin防护乳创立于1930年，用于舒缓肌肤，面世以来马上获得了巨大成功。
凡士林（一种首次用于化妆品中的肌肤舒缓成分β-羟基）和维生素E的组合使用，使这种杏色润肤膏在解决紧急肌肤问题上非常有效。 雅顿小姐还因用它来舒缓纯种马的马腿而闻名！
使用说明：
name: Arden Eight Hour Cream Skin防护乳（50ml）

product_description:
Murad慕拉高效去痘潔面乳 
本品為第一個專利高效祛痘抗衰老護膚法，經臨床證明可減少瑕疵，同時消除細紋和皺紋，所以現在可同時對抗兩大頑固肌膚問題。此高效溶液包括一項創新祛痘護理技術，在清洗後甚至也能發揮作用。痘痘和皺紋決無可能！ 
 附加特性和成分： 
多元賦活祛痘體係採用壓縮水楊酸技術，持續釋放，即使在清洗後也能繼續祛痘。氨基酸和透明質酸鎖住肌膚水份，而抗氧化劑中和自由基，使肌膚更加年輕。 
 使用方法： 
取少量，按摩塗抹於濕潤的面部和頸部。用溫水沖洗乾淨並輕輕拍幹。 
 成分： 
水楊酸0.5% 其他成份：水（淺綠色）、椰油酰基二乙酸二鈉、甘油、鯨蠟醇、椰油酰胺丙基甜菜鹼、鯨蠟硬脂醇、酰基磺酸鈉、PEG-100硬脂酸鹽、甘油硬脂酸酯、丁二醇、透明質酸鈉、醋酸生育酚、辛酸/癸酸甘油三酸酯、視黃醇、白柳樹（柳樹）皮萃取物、抗壞血酸、殼聚糖、檸檬酸銀、酸鈉天然保濕因子、甜菜鹼、山梨醇、甘氨酸、丙氨酸、脯氨酸、絲氨酸、蘇氨酸、精氨酸、賴氨酸、谷氨基酸、葡萄糖酸鋅、刺阿幹樹仁萃取物、鋸葉棕萃取物、芝麻籽萃取物、黑升麻根莖提取物、互葉白千層（茶樹）葉油、椰油酰胺丙基二甲胺、玉米澱粉、水解玉米澱粉、水解玉米辛基琥珀酸鋁澱粉、檸檬酸、乙二胺四乙酸二鈉、沒食子酸丙酯、聚山梨醇酯80、薄荷醇、鯨蠟硬脂基葡糖苷、乙二醇二硬脂酸酯、硬脂醇聚醚-4、PEG-150 二硬脂酸酯、羥乙基纖維素、聚丙烯酸酯-13、聚異丁烯、聚山梨醇酯-20、乙二胺二琥珀酸三鈉、苯氧乙醇、辛甘醇、氯苯甘醚、香水（香精）
name: 慕拉高效去痘洁面乳 200ml

product_description:
德國世家玫瑰輕日霜是經典玫瑰日霜的輕量版，適合敏感肌膚或炎熱天氣使用。這款滋養霜採用專業配方，用於舒緩、平衡和滋潤肌膚。它含有珍貴的玫瑰花水、玫瑰蠟和玫瑰提取物，可保護並鞏固肌膚。 - LM 
 使用說明：每天早上潔面和爽膚後，溫柔按壓，在 ​​臉部、頸部和胸口均勻塗抹。

product_description:
Foreo Luna露娜迷你洁面刷树立了面部清洁的一座新里程碑，结合FOREO突破传统的T-Sonic ™技术与创新硅胶刷设计，能更深层更温柔地清洁肌肤。T-Sonic ™ 透肤声波脉动通过光滑的硅胶触点导入肌肤深层，帮助清除会引起痘痘的污垢，比起使用双手洗脸有着显著的效果，使肌肤更加净透、明亮。深层清洁可疏通、收缩毛孔，净化光滑肤质。3天之内，肌肤即可焕发年轻健康的光彩。
露娜迷你洁面刷可以和其他洁面产品一起使用，每天早晚使用一分钟即可赋予肌肤自然健康光泽，使其恢复至平滑年轻状态。可有效清除彩妆、祛除肌肤细纹。LUNA™ mini 露娜™迷你独有的不具渗透性卫生表面设计可有效抵抗细菌滋生，这是其他声波洗脸刷无法匹敌的。每个露娜™迷你都有1300个光滑无磨损的硅胶触点，让您体验舒适自如地清洁。多功能的三区洁面刷头适用于各种肌肤类型，您完全无需担心适配问题。防水功能可以让你在沐浴时也尽情享用，充电式设计无需更换电池。
未来护肤领域突破性进步将由T-SONIC™透肤声波脉动技术来推动——它是一种更深层更轻柔的革命性新型清洁方式。露娜™迷你将声波脉动透过皮肤表层传递至深层，只需3天即可发现与感受肌肤焕然一新的状态。它可以彻底清理毛孔中的杂质，避免皮肤问题的产生。与此同时平滑美肌，净透肤质，为您带来意想不到的效果。小巧、精致的设计，再加上一次充电可使用300次的强大动力使露娜™迷你非常便于携带。它的防水功能可以让你在沐浴时也尽情享用，并且无需更换刷头。产品特性：
无需更换刷头
享有2年保修保障。
100%防水无渗透的设计可以让你在沐浴时也尽情享用。
柔软硅胶触点赋予肌肤最温和的护理。
LUNA™露娜™100%的环保设计让您在一次充电后可使用多达300次。
T-Sonic ™透肤声波脉动可帮助清除毛孔中的污垢、油脂以及化妆品残留，清理坏死角质细胞。
建议清洁面部不同区域时各用约 15 秒钟；露娜™迷你 T-Sonic ™脉动每过 15 秒钟后闪动以作提示。
1. 卸妆后，湿润脸部后涂上您的洁面乳，并湿润露娜™迷你的刷面。
2. 按中间键开启露娜™迷你，进入高频清洁模式。从下巴开始，沿着下颚向上轻柔抚动至耳朵，再逐步清洁更上面的区域，直至清洁完整边脸颊。
3. 重复步骤 2，清洁另一边脸颊。
4. 然后从额头的中间分别向两边轻轻抚动，直至清洁整个额头。
5. 清洁鼻子时用露娜™迷你在鼻子的一侧上下轻轻划动，然后以同样的方法清洁鼻子的另一侧。清洁眼睛以下部位时，建议按“–”键调低露娜™迷你的脉动强度，特别轻柔地向外抚动。
一分钟结束后，露娜™迷你的指示灯会持续灯亮。此时可用水冲洗面部完成一分钟清洁。请注意为了防止使用过度，露娜™迷你处于清洁模式三分钟后会自动关机。
针对不同类型的肤质而专业设计，露娜™迷你的刷头以特定的顺序排列，分为多功能的三区：正面的细型刷头可温柔清洁敏感型或干燥型肌肤；正面上端的粗粒刷头用于准确清洁手洗不易清洁到的区域，如鼻子、鼻翼两侧、耳朵和发际线周围；背面粗粒刷头可以将脉动更直接地传递到肌肤，进行深层清洁，适合清洁油性肤质。
T-Sonic ™ 透肤声波脉动通过光滑硅胶触点导入肌肤，带来每分钟8000次脉动，帮助清除毛孔中的污垢、油脂以及化妆品残留，清理坏死角质细胞，更促进皮肤血液循环，减少细纹和皱纹，让肌肤绽放青春活力。
T-Sonic™脉动能清除肌肤杂质，比手洗更有效地进行深层清洁。因为手指无法像露娜™一样具有硅胶质地可以深层净化毛孔和清理坏死角质细胞。此外，手指本身也经常具有油污、细菌和其他污染物。
不同于纤维性刷毛，硅胶刷头不会滋生细菌并且完全不具有渗透性。由于完全防水且不会吸收油脂、污垢或化妆品残留，清洗简单方便，可以在短时间内清洗干净，快速晾干。因此硅胶产品是更安全卫生的面部清洁设备。不仅如此，硅胶还具有温和抗敏功效，和市场上相似产品相比，硅胶光滑、柔软的质地更适合面部清洁。
请注意:
本产品的质保时间为自购买之日起两年，任何因产品制造或材料缺陷引起的质量问题均属于质保范围。如果您有任何此类质量问题并在质保期内请通知FOREO，FOREO将免费为您更换产品.
作为 FOREO 两年质保的延续，FOREO提供十年质保服务。
name: Luna露娜迷你洁面刷 - 炫酷灰

product_description:
Sukin 眼部精華可減少細紋和皺紋。這款眼部精華內含具有舒緩功效的蘆薈、黃瓜和牛蒡成分，為嬌嫩的眼部肌膚提供深層滋養。這款高效的眼部護理產品在玫瑰果、月見草和琉璃苣油的幫助下，可改善皮膚的彈性和肌理。 
 Sukin 認為，皮膚和頭髮護理產品的最強大、有效的成分來自大自然。注重環保意識的Sukin 是一家來自澳大利亞的天然個人護理品公司。 
 “Skincare that doesn't cost the earth™”（護膚不以損耗地球為代價）— Sukin 的承諾遠遠超出了化妝品。這是一家100% 認證的碳平衡公司，旨在減少其業務對於脆弱環境的影響。 -SA

product_description:

本品散发香橙芬芳，不添加人工色素和人工香精，成年男女均适用。 - L.M.

product_description:
Revive tired, weary eyes with Caudalie VineActiv Energizing and Smoothing Eye Cream, a gentle cream that works to visibly reduce signs of ageing and fatigue around the delicate eye area.
Restoring a healthy glow, the eye cream combines Horse Chestnut and Liquorice to address dark circles and puffiness, and its patented ANTI CELL BURN-OUT COMPLEX™ reinforces skin's natural defences to help prevent against the impact of ageing. Delivering brightening and anti-wrinkle properties, the cream refreshes and revitalises whilst smoothing the eye and lip contours for younger-looking skin; Vitamin C restores a healthy glow and Vitamin E provides antioxidant protection. Melting effortlessly in, the cream comforts and restores to lend your skin a brighter, re-energised appearance.
name: VineActiv Energizing and Smoothing Eye Cream 15ml

product_description:
Combine your skincare regime into one convenient pad with the award-winning STARSKIN 7-Second Morning Mask™ 7-in-1 Miracle Skin Mask Pads; a new generation beauty innovation that delivers instant results. Ideal for busy lifestyles, the dual-texture pads are able to massage, exfoliate and tone skin using one side, whilst the other side functions as a serum, moisturiser, leave-in mask and primer.
The front side of the pad boasts an array of massaging and exfoliating beads that slough away dead skin cells, promote optimum circulation and leave pores refined. Complete with a dose of toner, the pad balances the complexion and visibly brightens skin for a radiant finish.
The back of the pad is soaked with a powerhouse cocktail of skin-boosting ingredients. Enriched with a potent blend of Niacinamide, Sodium Hyaluronate and Adenosine, also known as ‘topical botox’, the pad visibly plumps the complexion to eliminate the appearance of fine line and wrinkles. This side works as a nourishing and protective serum, as well as offering a veil of hydration to the face that maintains skin’s moisture levels. Similar to a leave-on face mask, the pad boasts a slow-release formula that ensures skin is treated to nourishment all day.
Ideal for use before makeup application, the pad prepares skin for the day and functions as a primer to enhance the wear and duration of makeup. Expect a bright and radiant complexion that appears healthy and nourished.
name: 7-Second Morning Mask™ 7-in-1 Miracle Skin Mask Pads

product_description:
茱莉蔻草本再生眼霜是一款高效眼部護理精華，精選澳大利亞本土花卉精華，有利於加眼部肌膚明亮感，緊緻眼部脆弱肌膚. 
有利於改善眼部浮腫和黑眼圈，茱莉蔻草本再生眼霜留住青春，展現眼部青春亮澤.

product_description:
Discover the secret to younger looking skin with the Elizabeth Arden Advanced Ceramide Capsules; the iconic skincare treatment now with triple the power to truly transform skin and reveal a visibly firmer and smoother complexion.
As we age, skin loses the ability to produce the essential youth factor of lipid ceramides, leading to a weakened and uneven texture with a dramatic increase in wrinkles and sagging.
The innovative anti-ageing capsules directly deliver a concentrated dosage of bio-engineered, skin-identical ceramides, helping to repair and strengthen the lipid barrier as well as support natural collagen renewal, resulting in a re-texturising and plumping effect to radically minimise the appearance of fine lines.
A Botanical Complex blend of Alfalfa, Olives and Coconut Oil infuses skin with hydrocarbons and lipids, while Omega-rich Tsubuki Oil restores elasticity levels, effectively optimising moisture levels. Expect skin to feel revitalised, soft and supple with an improved luminosity and healthy-looking glow.
name: Arden Ceramide Capsules Advanced (30 Capsules)

product_description: The yes to Coconut Ultra Hydrating Paper Mask is an innovative skincare treatment to rescue dry, uncomfortable and flaky skin. Rich in moisturising Coconut extracts, the delicate face mask seeks to quench skin with an intensive dose of hydration and exotic tropical goodness. Reveal a softened and nourished complexion.
name: to Coconut Ultra Hydrating Paper Mask

这款平衡霜特别添加了带有芬芳香味的苦橙叶、橙花和柑橘，共同作用，舒缓肌肤，为肌肤提供深层滋养，而且不会产生油腻感。 - L.M.

The Decléor Hydrotenseur Anti Fatigue Firming Eye Serum uses an anti-fatigue firming effect to redefine your eye area for greater firmness and suppleness, making your skin will feel more refreshed and revitalised.

 Oskia 復興面膜蘊含多種天然果酸(AHA's)，包括西番蓮、葡萄、和菠蘿果酸，可溫和去除死皮，清潔毛孔。乳酸可減少細紋和皺紋，令肌膚光滑柔潤，亮白清透。這款面膜質地柔潤，散髮美麗的玫瑰香氛，帶給您極致寵溺之享。

product_description:
Alpha-H 日用必备保湿防晒乳 Spf50+ 可有效防止肌肤提前衰老。 其轻盈而不易生黑头的配方可有效保护肌肤免受紫外线的伤害，它适用于各种类型的肌肤，可替代日用保湿霜。
Alpha-H 日用必备保湿防晒乳 SPF50+ 是一款质地极其轻盈的保湿霜，可有效保护肌肤免受中长波紫外线的伤害，适用于各种类型的肌肤。 许多明显的太阳晒伤，一旦发生，在很大程度上很难恢复。也就是说，对紫外线进行有效防护是防止提前衰老的唯一值得信赖的保护措施。 使用抗衰老、抗皱和保护胶原蛋白的三合一日常防晒产品可有效防止太阳晒伤，使肌肤保持健康。
使用说明：
name: 日用必备保湿防晒乳 Spf50+（50ml）

product_description:

Elemis 艾丽美薰衣草平衡爽肤水含有的贝蒂花萃取物，是一种天然的泡沫清洁剂，它取代了酒精和其他刺激性清洁剂。 这款极为温和的爽肤水可有效修复肌肤，帮助减少因痤疮或环境因素导致的发炎感染。
活性成分植物甘油和去离子水合物可让您的肌肤柔软水润，同时有助于吸收日霜和晚霜。

name: 艾丽美平衡薰衣草爽肤水（200 毫升）

product_description:
Get glowing this festive season with the Holiday Glam Set from Lancer Skincare. Combining a lush, moisturising primer and an innovative lip serum, the duo work to leave skin looking luminous and lips perfectly voluptuous.
Dani Glowing Skin Perfector (30ml)
A lightweight, illuminating cream infused with Oat Kernel Extract to help brighten and revitalise ageing skin. Enriched with an Asian botanical blend of Evodia Fruit and Buchu Leaf Extracts, the treatment delivers youth-inspiring benefits; perfecting all skin tones and working to firm for a visibly smoother, lifted effect. Imperfections and enlarged pores are blurred, and the cream's micro-fine, light-catching particles dance across the skin to enhance luminosity.
Volume Enhancing Lip Serum (15ml)
Achieve naturally fuller-looking lips with the Volume Enhancing Lip Serum; an advanced lip serum that works to smoothen the appearance of fine lines. Working immediately and over time, the treatment helps to volumise and define lip contours for a youthful look, and with continued use, lends you visibly fuller, supple lips. Its hydrating formula ensures your pout stays soft, conditioned and moisturised.
name: Skincare Holiday Glam Set (Worth £112)

product_description:
这款冷却净化面膜可治愈肌肤暗疮，缓解皮肤充血。  Elemis 薰衣草修复面膜适合油性皮肤或问题皮肤，使肌肤重新焕发活力。
这款强大的吸油型、肌肤再生面膜，含防腐的迷迭香、百里香、薰衣草精油等成分。
这些成分协同平衡，净化肌肤。尤其适用于暗黄皮肤、混合型皮肤、容易长痘或毛孔堵塞的青少年皮肤。
使用说明：
name: 薰衣草草本修复面膜（75ml）

product_description:
Infuse your skin with essential moisture. Mavala's Aqua Plus Multi-Moisturizing Intensive Serum is a replenishing formula that helps to restore lost moisture in dry and dehydrated skin.
When skin is dehydrated, wrinkles can appear prematurely. To help prevent this, the melting serum combines three molecular weights of Hyaluronic Acid that penetrate the epidermis and infuse skin which much needed hydration. Hyaluronic Acid is naturally present in skin, and can hold up to 1000 times its weight in water, creating a plumped-up, healthier-looking complexion. Suitable for even the delicate eye and lip areas of the face, the serum contains 100% Swiss Mallow Flower for a soothing effect. Skin is left feeling hydrated from the inside out; it appears smoother and plumper with restored comfort. Housed in an airless pump bottle to maintain product efficacy.
name: Aqua Plus Multi-Moisturizing Intensive Serum 30ml

product_description: Soothe sensitive skin with the Purimoist Lotion from Korean-based brand Skin79; a mild, gentle formula that seeks to improve moisture levels and alleviate redness. Free from artificial fragrance and oil, it contains natural extracts of Fig and Echinacea Flower with a Mild Sensi-Care System™ to leave your complexion feeling comfortable, refreshed and purified.
name: Purimoist Lotion 125ml

product_description:
Treat your complexion to the Skin79 Allancera Barrier Lotion; a lightweight, fast-absorbing formula that infuses thirsty skin with long-lasting moisture and hydration.
Harnessing the powers of a Multi-Matrix Barrier System™, the nourishing lotion helps to strengthen and replenish dry skin, whilst soothing Allantoin and replenishing Moringa, known as the tree of life, work in tandem to restore a smooth, supple and comfortable complexion.
name: Allancera Barrier Lotion 125ml

product_description:
Gatineau Collagene Expert终极Smoothing面霜是一款独特的日夜面霜，可以使您拥有容光焕发的肌肤，看起来更年轻。 这款面霜含有高浓度的弹性蛋白和胶原蛋白，拥有像纹理的凝胶，可以瞬间吸收减少皱纹出现、改善肤色。
这款面霜还富含抗氧化剂，可以抵御外界侵害，同时使肌肤恢复弹性和自然光泽。 K.D.
name: Collagene Expert终极Smoothing 面霜

product_description:
Experience unrivalled moisture with the Aragospa Aqua Lotion from Korean skincare brand, Skin79, an intensely moisturising formula that delivers long-lasting hydration.
Infused with mineral-rich Jeju Aragonite Thermal Water and Phyto Hyaluronic Acid, the water-binding solution creates a protective moisture barrier on skin, boosting and maintaining hydration levels to keep the complexion saturated and quenched. It utilises a Multi-Layered Water Holding System™ that preserves skin’s moisture, whilst improving elasticity for a healthier, supple-looking complexion.
name: Aragospa Aqua Lotion 125ml

product_description: 如果您的肌肤存在瑕疵且肤色缺乏光泽，则 Gatineau Microdermabrasion Cream 将是您的不二之选。 除了最敏感的肌肤以外，这款护肤霜适合所有肌肤类型，令毛孔张开并进行清洁，同时去除会造成暗哑肤色的死皮细胞。 令肌肤柔软、光滑，肤色更均匀。 - I.M
name: Microdermabrasion Cream (75ml)

product_description:
Help correct the ten most visible signs of ageing with Perricone MD Cold Plasma Super Size. Through Dr. Perricone’s patented proprietary delivery system, this powerful multi-tasking treatment offers essential nutrients and vitamins to help combat wrinkles, enlarged pores, dryness, redness, discolouration, uneven skin tone, impurities, loss of firmness, loss of smoothness and loss of radiance.
Powered by award-winning science and years of comprehensive research, the anti-ageing cream utilises Liquid Crystal Delivery Technology to penetrate skin at a deeper level for optimal results, with advanced Neuropeptides seeking to activate surface renewal to alleviate signs of ageing and problematic skin concerns.
Suitable for daily use, the innovative formula boosts the transferal of proprietary ingredients and results in a replenished, radiant and healthy-looking complexion.

product_description:
本品可改善肤色、深层清洁；以最简单、最快捷的方式为剃须做好准备。请赶快试试我们的MenScience微细洁肤磨砂膏吧。 内含专业生物去角质物质及微缓冲物质，其功效骄人。
MenScience微细肌肤磨砂膏，可用于更新肌肤、使肌肤光滑、深层清洁肌肤、抑制毛发向内生。 其配方独特新颖，使肤色亮泽、肌肤光滑，可减少细纹及肌肤粗糙。 可去除死皮细胞和暗沉积聚，令肤色均匀。 本款超细磨砂膏将清除肌肤杂质、软化肌肤、对抗毛发向内生长，为剃须做好准备，令肌肤更光滑。 使您的面部呈现出前所未有的光滑、柔软、洁净。
MenScience微细洁肤磨砂膏内含甘醇酸。通常由皮肤科和皮肤护理专业人员使用，可轻柔地使上层皮肤脱落。 水杨酸是一种功效强大的成分，可治疗痤疮、毛发向内生长、头皮屑，同时可对抗皮肤老化。 内含的尿囊素，是一种对抗刺激的舒缓剂，源于优质植物性芦荟提取物，具有公认的保湿性、护理性、抗炎性。内含的尿素，是一种保湿剂，能吸引并锁住水分。

product_description:
Weleda Pomegranate Firming Face Serum is the ideal companion to the skin’s natural ageing process. The intensive care serum is a real concentrate of natural active ingredients and boasts an immediate effect.
Used everyday, the Weleda Pomegranate Face Serum is a light, non-greasy serum which will fortify the skin's structure. It will activate cell renewal, reduce wrinkles and firm whilst intensely moisturising. This do-it-all cream also improves elasticity and tonicity and perfectly complements the Weleda Day and Night Pomegranate creams.
Dermatological tests shown that after 28 days of use depth of wrinkles reduced by 29%* and skin moisture levels increased by 39%**.
*Measurement of depth of wrinkles with PRIMOS, test with 20 subjects between 41 – 65 years of age, application of the product twice daily for 28 days.
**Measurement of skin moisture with a corneometer, test with 23 subjects between 41 – 70 years of age, 30 minutes after application.
Directions of use:
name: Pomegranate Firming Face Serum 30ml

product_description:
CODAGE推出的这款爱慕修复活肤精华液由法国制药专家团队精心配制而成。 这款产品富含抗氧化成分，令肌肤散发迷人的均匀光泽，能够滋润并修复肌肤结构，促进表皮生成，以抵御各种天气状况。 混合了多种有效成分，为肌肤提供深层净化，重现活力，防止瑕疵和阳光造成的色素沉着问题。 真正做到为肌肤注入活力，排出毒素。 适合所有肌肤类型。 - K.N.
Hy3 - 具有补水锁水的滋润功效。 这种成分还能够促进胶原蛋白，丰盈并紧实肌肤，令肌肤更年轻。
Ao3 - 这一富含抗氧化因子的成分具有修复和保护功效功效，可以保护肌肤抵御自由基和紫外线的伤害，并修复肌肤已有的损伤。 
Po2 - 这一成分具有保护效果，能抵御污染物。 它可以增强肌肤的自然净化，同时保护抗氧化剂并防止细胞死亡。 促进角质细胞的生长，为肌肤增添保护屏障。 Re3 - 除了抗菌消炎，这一成分还具有深层修复的作用，能够促进细胞新生，修复受损的组织。 
Dx3 - DX3能够刺激肌肤自然排毒，修复蛋白质并去除毒素，令肌肤焕发活力光泽。
Ec3 - 这一成分具有抗氧化性，能够为细胞注入能量，令肌肤持久保湿，焕发迷人光彩。 
Tc3 - 这一成分能够促进细胞再生，改善肤质，修复色斑瑕疵，提亮并均匀肤色。

product_description:
Ideal for dry mature skins for 1st time users or for morning application following 2% at night.

The addition of Sucrose provides energy and catalyses the beneficial action of the other ingredients, allowing Rosa Centifolia to envelop you with loving care.

BAKEL 贝蔻维塔亚滋养Oliy 精华 帮您修复暗沉、缺水的肌肤。 多种天然活性成分强化作用下，创新的配方中维生素A和E可抵御自由基引起的皮肤损害和过早衰老，同时促进皮肤更新和保护皮肤。 丰富的配方成分结合杏仁油以及甘菊和葵花籽油温和的润肤性能和抗氧化性能，有助于舒缓和镇静肌肤，恢复青春肤色。
Bakel 的所有产品均利用 100% 天然活性成分，确保接触肌肤的任何成分均具备高品质，且天然纯净。 Bakel 的每款产品均不含香料、酒精、人工色素、防腐剂或动物成分，且所有产品经过皮肤测试，过敏风险降到最低。 Bakel 产品建立在客观确认和科学证明之配方的坚实基础之上，适用于所有肌肤类型并可抵御肌肤衰老的主要原因。 - K.N

其轻盈的乳状质地可轻松融入肌肤，令肌肤散发迷人亮泽，自然完美。 凭借永久花、牛油果油和白茶叶等纯净成分，这款产品可提供保护、保湿和哑光效果，并提升光采。 其适用于所有肌肤类型，不含苯甲酸酯类，且不会致生粉刺。 LB

product_description: Embryolisse Rich Hydrating Cream 适用于干性和缺水性肌肤，是一款三效滋润霜，可提供持久舒适。 这款乳霜采用保湿甜杏仁油和丰盈透明质酸专门配制而成，可提升弹性，令肌肤水嫩柔滑。 天然麦蛋白和抗氧化维生素 A、E 和 F 的有效组合可促进细胞更新，呈现清新亮泽的肤色，同时蜂蜡可锁住水分，缓解肌肤干燥。 E.N.

product_description:
Keep your skin healthy and hydrated during cold seasons with the CODAGE Prescription 'Apres Ski' kit. Combining a range of nourishing, regenerating skincare products, the set will leave your skin feeling comfortable and pampered. - K.N.
Moisturizing Mask (7ml):
A rich emulsion that works to intensely nourish and hydrate your skin. Enriched with oils and plant-based waxes, the moisturising formula effectively regenerates and revitalises dry skin, strengthening the hydrolipidic layer whilst supporting and reconstructing the skin's natural barrier for skin that looks soft and healthy. Utilising an enzymatic peel, the mask stimulates cell renewal to leave your complexion looking radiant. Skin will be comfortable, supple and glowing.
SERUM N°01 (10 ml):
This intensely moisturising serum nourishes skin on the surface and deep down to reveal a truly hydrated complexion. Skin battered by heat and sea salt will benefit tremendously.
Oh My Cold (10 ml):
A moisturising and repairing serum. Ideal for all skin types and those particularly susceptible to dryness, the moisturising formula contains a blend of hydrating ingredients that work in synergy to protect and soothe skin that has been weakened by the cold. Deeply replenishing, the formula will restore natural moisture and lipids whilst protecting the outer layer from environmental nasties. The addition of a unique Antarctic glacier ingredient ensures your skin will be left soft and regenerated.
Night Cream (15 ml):
A rich, moisturising emulsion dedicated to repairing skin overnight; a peak period for cellular regeneration. Purifying and nourishing, the cream with hyaluronic acid regenerates dermal stem cell activity whilst stimulating elastin and collagen production for smoothed-out wrinkles and a toned appearance. Expect healthy, moisturised, plump skin. Suitable for all skin types, including dry or ageing skin.
name: Prescription - Apres Ski

product_description:
Experience next generation anti-ageing with skinChemists Advanced Pro-5 Collagen Marine Cream, an innovative cream that utilises bio marine extracts to improve skin's tone and elasticity.
The second step in your Pro-5 Collagen regime, the formula glides effortlessly across the skin, delivering age-defying benefits; two marine collagen derivatives combine to soften and smooth skin whilst hydrating, improving elasticity and reducing the appearance of wrinkles.
Skin looks plumped up and youthful, and 'Suberlift', a clinically proven ingredient, is harnessed to lift and firm the skin. Skin is protected from external aggressors, retains moisture and looks smoother and younger with improved tone. - K.N.

这款爽肤水除了具有清洁作用，还可使肌肤光滑紧致。 使肌肤再生、得到放松、重获平衡，调节油脂分泌，减少肌肤油光。 – E.W.

旨在主动紧致和丰盈肌肤，该轻质精华液可有效保湿，同时对抗皱纹；其所含蜂毒成分可促进血液循环，并主动丰盈肌肤，减少可见皱纹，同时具有保湿功效的麦卢卡蜂蜜可滋润、安慰和软化肌肤。
帮助改善各层肌肤之间的营养输送，青春焕发精华液可亮白肤色，减少老年斑和缺陷的出现。 您将获得年轻、光滑，光彩照人的肌肤。 - K.N.

Light on your skin, the oil leaves you with a repaired, protecting and healthy-looking complexion.
The Advanced Oil is enriched with a range of botanical extracts including: Blackcurrant Seed Oil, which moisturises, nourishes and strengthens; Cherry Kernel Oil, which acts as a UV absorber; and a blend of wild Plum, which has remarkable skin healing properties. – E.W.
name: Botanicals Advanced Anti-Oxidant Superfood Facial Oil (30ml)

product_description:
Rejuvenate your complexion with the Dr Botanicals Ultra-Hydrating Facial Serum; a luxurious formula that works to nourish, soften and protect skin.
Fast-absorbing and lightweight, its blend of blue lotus flower, red algae and elderflower moisturises and conditions skin, whilst anti-ageing white tea minimises the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles to maintain a youthful look.
Antioxidant-rich sweet almond oil shields from free radical damage and environmental aggressors to reveal an even skin tone and restore long-lasting comfort. Skin is left purified, revitalised and soothed with a radiant glow. E.N.
name: Botanicals Ultra-Hydrating Facial Serum (30ml)

product_description:
Chantecaille 视黄醇护肤霜  ，可滋润肌肤，使肌肤光滑、明显紧致。 该变革护肤霜采用活性纳米胶囊视黄醇技术，轻柔地改善皮肤外观，打造更紧致的肌肤。
内含强大的植物萃取物、乳木果油、葵花籽油等，滋润干性皮肤，使肌肤光滑、焕发青春光釆。
name: 视黄醇护肤霜 200ml

product_description:
可用 Dr. Nick Lowe 的 acclenz™ 深度清洁面膜拔出杂质；Nick Lowe 是国际公认的世界一流皮肤病学和护肤专家之一。
这种面膜特为易留瘢痕的皮肤配制，采用烟酰胺、锌和时控释放水杨酸，既能消除过多表皮油脂，促进细胞再生，又能减轻受损皮肤的痛苦，使其轻松舒适。
桉树叶提取物可作为抗微生物制剂，以抑制细菌的生长，从而使面部皮肤干净、清新、无油光。
name: Nick Lowe acclenz 深度清洁面膜 (50ml)

product_description: PAYOT Elixir LiftFace Regenerating and Tightening Serum中含有的特殊成分能迅速被肌肤吸收，防止和缓解衰老的迹象。 本款精华液特别为成熟肌肤而研发，和活性玻尿酸、少量元素、生物糖胶和摩洛哥坚果萃取物混合而成，能够迅速使肌肤紧致和顺滑。 Elixir为肌肤做好日夜的保湿护理，能够有效的抗衰老，使您的肤色年轻有光泽。
name: Elixir Lift Face Serum 30ml

product_description:
本品适合中性肌肤及油性肌肤 。  可温和地去除杂质而不会减少肌肤水分。
配方显示本品无需冲洗。含锌提取物，可轻松溶解彩妆、多余皮脂、污染物、消除充血，令肤色清新脱俗。 该面霜装在泵瓶式涂抹装置中，用起来极为方便。
name: PAYOT Puri Eau 洁面乳（200ml）

product_description:
Reveal a brighter, more radiant complexion with Skin Authority VitaD Fortified™ Topical Elixir, a lightweight, oil-free solution enriched with a Vitamin D compound and Retinol to brighten and protect your skin.
The multi-action formula utilises a host of vitamins, including D, A, E, and K, and Dry Finish Technology™ to quickly deliver nutrients into skin. Its brightening and firming properties promote a youthful complexion, and its dose of antioxidants keep skin safe from external aggressors. After use, skin feels silky to the touch with renewed clarity and radiance.
name: Authority VitaD Fortified™ Topical Elixir

product_description:
Regain a youthful-looking complexion with Skin Authority Wrinkle Reversing Serum, a lightweight, anti-ageing serum that works to restore even tone whilst reducing the appearance of wrinkles.
Utilising four naturally ocurring proteins, the formula promotes a smoother, fuller and plumper-looking complexion; its line-smoothing properties target wrinkles to leave skin with a firmer appearance. Helping to fade discolouration and enhance natural radiance, the non-greasy serum improves tone and texture to leave skin clarified, radiant and younger-looking. Won't clog pores.
name: Authority Wrinkle Reversing Serum

product_description:
Reveal a radiant complexion with the MÁDARA Exfoliating Oil-to-Milk Scrub in a convenient travel size. The rich oil-based formula transforms into a silky milk texture when applied to gently cleanse and soften skin without stripping away essential moisture.
Formulated with a nourishing organic blend, Apricot and Oat Oil molecules work to lift away dirt and impurities, whilst natural wax microbeads help unclog pores and buff away dead skin cells. Skin’s natural cell renewal is stimulated, unveiling softened, smoother and polished skin with a healthy-looking glow.
name: Exfoliating Scrub Oil-To-Milk Travel Size 12.5ml

product_description:
PAYOT提升型眼罩是一套抗老化眼部护理眼罩。可使疲劳的眼睛重新焕发活力、抗眼部衰老及疲劳现象。
该眼罩含大量活性成分，可针对整个眼部的皱纹、黑眼圈、浮肿，对抗眼部老化及疲劳。 眼罩成分包括：抗氧化维生素E、透明质酸、Acti-Lift 合成物。可提升眼部功效、抚平眼部细纹、减少黑眼圈，使您比同龄人看起来更精神、更年轻。
您会立即感到眼睛更清新、明亮、神采奕奕。

Achieve a close, comfortable shave with the Sheik's Musk Shaving Oil from Carsons Apothecary; a brand who combine traditional formulas with high performance results. Developed for use pre and post shave, the protective oil softens and lifts hairs, whilst hydrating and conditioning skin to prevent moisture loss.
Infused with a nourishing blend of Rosehip, Grapeseed and Sweet Almond Oils, its caring formula allows the razor to glide effortlessly over skin with minimised friction, nicks and burns, whilst delivering a masculine fragrance of musk and patchouli. Skin is left soft, smooth and restored.
name: Apothecary Sheik's Musk Shaving Oil

product_description:
Treat lack-lustre skin to the Lift & Plump Sheet Mask from Lancer Skincare. Utilising Apple Stem Cell Compounds and Palmitoyl Pentapeptide-3, the face mask is enriched with innovative anti-ageing ingredients that work to firm and tighten skin for a younger-looking appearance.
A revitalising blend of Rose Water, Centella Asiatica Extract and Sodium Hyaluronate deliver optimum, long-lasting hydration to quench thirsty skin, whilst improving suppleness and texture to reveal a refreshed, restored complexion. Includes four single-use sheet masks.

Achieve nourished skin with Men's Moisturising Cream from Natural Spa Factory. Ideal for the modern day man, the moisturiser is a rich cream designed to hydrate and soften skin. Infused with a blend of Neroli, sweet Almond and Wheat Germ oils, the velvety formula is ideal to use after shaving or whenever the skin is in need of some TLC.
Without leaving behind a greasy residue, the moisturiser works to reduce the appearance of blemishes and marks causes from scarring and spots as well as delivering instant hydration. Through use of the gentle cream, the face is left moisturised, smooth and thoroughly nourished.
name: Spa Factory Men's Moisturising Cream

product_description:
Combat the look of crow’s feet and dark circles with the AminoGenesis Counter Clockwise Under Eye Rescue. The advanced anti-aging serum has the consistency and concentration of a cream with the water-carrying abilities of a gel, allowing hydration and nutrients to be effectively delivered to skin.
Utilising the AminoGenesis<sup>™</sup> base formula, it contains the patented, breakthrough peptide Preventhelia™, which combats free radical damage and helps neutralize oxidative aggressors that both cause premature signs of aging. Brimming with vitamins and essential amino acids, the eye cream reduces the look of fine lines and discolouration. It quickly sinks in to leave skin feeling moisturised, refreshed and smoother.
name: Counter Clockwise Under Eye Treatment

product_description:
Revive dull skin with AromaWorks Nourish Face Exfoliate Mask, an anti-ageing face mask that sloughs away dead skin cells to promote brighter, smoother, rejuvenated skin.
Infused with Bamboo, Seagrass and Essential Oils, the formula gently exfoliates, tones and refines whilst improving the appearance of wrinkles and other signs of ageing. Harnessing the power of 14 BioActive ingredients, the mask delivers moisturising and firming properties to inspire younger-looking skin.
name: Nourish Face Exfoliate Mask 50ml

product_description:
Awaken to softened and restored skin with the AromaWorks Night Cream for Men, an anti-ageing moisturiser that works to penetrate skin overnight when it’s most susceptible to treatment.
Formulated with 15 BioActive ingredients, it hydrates and conditions skin to minimise the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles. Complex actives ActiMoist NMF and ActiGlow C balance and optimise moisture levels to soften and refine texture with long lasting results, whilst Aloe Vera encourages cell repair. Naturally fragranced with uplifting Bergamot and Lavender, the face cream leaves skin feeling nourished and rejuvenated.
name: Men's Night Cream 50ml

product_description:
Unveil visibly younger looking skin with the AminoGenesis Simply One 10-in-1 Skin Perfecting Treatment; an advanced, multi-tasking face cream that smoothes the appearance of fine lines, minimises the look of pores and revitalises dull skin.
Formulated with a complex scientific blend of peptides, antioxidants and botanical extracts, the lightweight cream can be used as a moisturizer or makeup primer, creating an even and refined texture that’s the perfect canvas with a shine-resistant, matte finish.
Hyaluronic Acid and Glucosamine help infuse skin with intense hydration, while Alpha Lipoic Acid is rich in vitamins and antioxidants to combat free radical damage that causes signs of premature aging. Suitable for daily use and all skin types, it’s the ideal product for achieving a radiant, flawless and revitalised complexion in one simple step.
name: Simply One 10-in-1 Skin Perfecting Treatment

product_description:
Freshly handmade in the UK with high-quality and natural ingredients, STEAMCREAM's 'Cheval A Bascule' Moisturiser is a lightweight whipped emulsion that can be used on the face, hands and body.
Developed with the brand's unique STEAM process, the finest ingredients have been fused together by a shot of steam to create a gentle, fast-absorbing emulsion that delivers long-lasting hydration.
Harnessing the nourishing powers of Orange Flower Water, Cocoa Butter and Almond and Jojoba Oils, the ultra-moisturising formula softens and replenishes, leaving skin smooth, restored and rejuvenated from top to toe.
Presented in a reusable, decorative tin crafted from recyclable materials to reduce energy use and respect the environment. STEAMCREAM follows a strict no-animal testing policy and is approved by the Vegan Society.
name: Cheval A Bascule Moisturiser 75ml

product_description:
使用Younger Pure Youth Serum消除老化的痕跡。使用創新的新型複合物強韌肌膚，吸收快速的血清能夠明顯改善膚色，同時最大限度地減少細紋的呈現，減少皺紋，改善受日光損傷的外觀。 
產品中註入了銅氨基酸和起保護作用的babchi提取物，其強大的配方可以使肌膚清爽、容光煥發並恢復光度。恢復如絲般光滑的年輕膚色。
name: Pure Youth Serum (30ml)

product_description:
Treat tired complexions to the yes to Cucumbers Calming Face Mask; a revitalising treatment developed specifically for sensitive skin in need of a gentle boost.
Harnessing the powers of cooling Aloe Vera and Organic Cucumber, the soothing, five-minute mask rejuvenates and refreshes, whilst delivering long-lasting hydration to leave you with a soft, supple and comfortable complexion.
name: to Cucumbers Calming Face Mask

product_description:
Refresh and rejuvenate tired, weary eyes with Borghese Botanico Eye Compresses, a cooling, hydrating eye treatment that helps to soften and soothe delicate, fatigued skin.
Combining antioxidant Green Tea with Goldenseal and Eyebright extracts, the saturated pads instantly cool and refresh skin around the eyes, softening and relieving to lend tired eyes an energised and wide awake feeling. After use, skin looks clarified and radiant.
name: Botanico Eye Compresses

product_description:
这款Triumph and Disaster 精华素包含三件令肤质清新、澄澈透明的精华产品，可令您的肌肤看起来和感觉起来如丝般柔滑。
该套装包括以下产品： 
Triumph and Disaster 仪式 Face Cleanser (150ml)Triumph and Disaster仪式Face Cleanser 可清除堆积在毛孔的污垢、油脂和杂质，而不会令肌肤干燥或引起刺激。 温和的去角质动作可清除死皮细胞，令肤色明亮、焕然一新，而天然油脂混合物可以滋养和呵护各种肌肤（包括最敏感的肌肤）。
Triumph and Disaster 老式 Shave Cream （90ml）Triumph and Disaster老式Shave Cream可帮助您重温传统湿剃的怀旧感觉。 它丰富细腻，可产生奢华的泡沫，这意味着您可以实现贴服、舒适、顺滑的剃须，减少刺激、向内生长的毛发和剃刀肿块的风险。
Triumph and Disaster 游戏面孔 Facial Moisturiser (90ml)用 Triumph and Disaster 游戏面孔 Facial Moisturiser滋养您的肌肤。 这款轻盈配方可轻易被肌肤吸收，保护肌肤免受恶劣环境的伤害，同时特别的保湿成分混合物可为肌肤提供必需的营养物质。
name: and Disaster 精华素

product_description:
Protect and nourish skin in one simple step with the Skin Authority Daily Defense Moisturizer SPF 30; a multitasking treatment ideally used beneath makeup.
Enriched with AOX Technology™ that combines Vitamins B5 and E as well as soothing Aloe extract, the lightweight and very water-resistant formula infuses skin with hydration while providing broad spectrum protection against harmful UV rays and photo ageing. Patented Dry Finish Technology™ ensures a smooth, matte base free from any greasy residue.
name: Authority Daily Defense Moisturizer SPF 30

product_description:
Reignite a luminous glow with PRAI's 24K GOLD Precious Oil Drops. Harnessing the powers of luxurious 24K Gold, the deeply nourishing treatment defends against free radicals and environmental aggressors to help maintain healthy collagen.
Synergising Avocado Oil, Chamomile and precious PRAI Oil, the fast-absorbing, anti-ageing formula infuses skin with long-lasting moisture and hydration, whilst restoring softness and suppleness for a youthful-looking complexion. Complete with a pipette for mess-free application.
name: 24K GOLD Precious Oil Drops 30ml

product_description:
茱莉蔻衡肤护理滋润油能改善肌肤的疲劳，暗沉，干燥等状况，质感轻盈使用时能有效深入肌肤, 达到提亮肤色，滋润肌肤的效果，内含鳄梨油，红花油，澳洲坚果籽油、玫瑰果油和乳木果油，可以保护皮肤免受环境伤害，抚平肌肤纹理，完美改善肤色
将2-3滴的衡肤护理滋润油滴在指尖,在脸部, 颈部四周,以手指点产品轻轻按压,  直至完全吸收为止
.

能夠為肌膚提供全面，有效且溫和的清潔。這款創新的玫瑰薔薇溫和去角質潔面乳含有荷荷巴油微細顆粒，起到了溫和的去角質作用，帶走毛孔中的污垢。含有100%純天然玫瑰萃取物，能夠調節膚色，鎮靜肌膚。這款潔面能夠使肌膚充滿活力，適合所有肌膚類型使用。 KD 
 使用說明:
name: 玫瑰蔷薇温和去角质洁面乳(150ml)

product_description: Jurlique 推出的玫瑰衡肤保湿乳液将带给肌肤舒缓、补水的呵护。 这款凝胶乳液由天然成分制成， 包括绿茶、葡萄籽和玫瑰果。 采用 Jurlique 独家配方，滋润肌肤，恢复自然光泽和柔嫩。 涂抹时取少量凝胶乳液，用指腹揉搓发热，然后轻轻按摩到脸部、颈部和前胸。 为了达到最佳效果，请每天使用这款活肤凝胶乳液。 这款活肤凝胶乳液属于玫瑰衡肤系列，采用50毫升瓶装，体积小巧，可以轻松存储在浴室或浴室壁橱内。
name: 玫瑰衡肤保湿乳液（50ml）

product_description:
Fight signs of ageing with PRAI PLATINUM Night Caviar Firm & Lift Serum, a powerful anti-ageing serum that works to combat visible signs of ageing.

Infused with Platinum, an antioxidant-rich precious metal known for its firming properties, and an Uplevity™ Peptide, the serum helps to counteract the force of gravity, tightening and firming the appearance of skin whilst fighting free radical attacks to promote a more youthful-looking complexion. Its blend of Argan and Avocado Oils deliver omega-3 fatty acids to help renew skin whilst you sleep for smoother, softer skin come morning. Expect a restored complexion that looks younger and energised.
name: PLATINUM Night Caviar Firm & Lift Serum 30ml

product_description: First Aid Beauty 強效修復保濕面霜可瞬效保濕滋養肌膚。吸收迅速，用後皮膚感覺如天鵝絨般柔軟，帶來舒適奢華的使用感。不含羥基苯甲酸酯類防腐劑、硫酸鹽、有害化學物質和染色劑。富含高濃度燕麥膠、乳木果油，白芒花籽油和甘草，溫和祛除污垢，保持肌膚天然水分。同時含有FAB抗氧化因子中和自由基，保護肌膚天然滋潤。每日早晚潔面後使用，效果更佳。
name: Aid Beauty 强效修复保湿面霜 (50ml)

product_description:
Natural Spa Factory's Illuminate Super Serum is a highly concentrated gel-serum that penetrates deep down to help re-energise skin and combat discolouration.
Formulated with smaller molecules than that of a traditional moisturiser, the face serum is able to delve deeper into skin, acting as a delivery system for larger molecules that sit on the surface from other skincare products; it carries the larger molecules from face creams and moisturisers deep within the epidermis to enhance efficacy and results. Enriched with Rice Bran, Vitamins and Antioxidants, the lightweight yet thick textured serum will melt effortlessly into skin, leaving it feeling hydrated and rejuvenated with a more even tone.
name: Spa Factory Illuminate Super Serum

product_description:
慕拉消炎净化爽肤水净化、调理肌肤。这款清透产品可以清除油性皮肤和问题皮肤中的杂质，温和无刺激。配方蕴含金缕梅，在收缩毛孔的同时不会令皮肤干燥紧绷，蕴含的尿囊素可镇静舒缓皮肤。
慕拉消炎净化爽肤水蕴含藻类萃取物，帮助抑制多余皮脂生成，令肌肤清爽不油腻。薄荷醇成分具有抗菌舒缓功效，抑制痘痘生成。
使用说明：
name: 慕拉消炎净化爽肤水 (180ml)

product_description:
使用 Garnier Skin Naturals Fresh 24H Day Cream 中的补水成分修复肌肤，本品为凝胶和面霜状保湿霜，富含维生素的配方能够提供持久保湿。
日霜利用天然衍生的葡萄水分和维生素E，舒缓肌肤，不油腻，滋润肌肤，使其免受环境侵害因素和自由基的损伤。
轻薄的配方使肌肤感觉清爽，果香型香氛清新宜人。 Skin感觉舒适饱满。 - K.N
name: Skin Naturals Fresh 24H Day Cream (50ml)

product_description:
Sukin 泡沫潔面乳是一款不含硫酸鹽的潔面產品，可溫和潔淨肌膚以去除雜質。該潔面乳將洋甘菊、蘆薈、金縷梅和綠茶精華與澳洲堅果和月見草油相結合，以淨化和平衡肌膚，讓肌膚倍感潔淨、柔嫩。 
 Sukin 認為，皮膚和頭髮護理產品的最強大、有效的成分來自大自然。注重環保意識的Sukin 是一家來自澳大利亞的天然個人護理品公司。 
 “Skincare that doesn't cost the earth™”（護膚不以損耗地球為代價）— Sukin 的承諾遠遠超出了化妝品。這是一家100% 認證的碳平衡公司，旨在減少其業務對於脆弱環境的影響。 -SA
name: 泡沫洁面乳 (125ml)

product_description:
Peter Thomas 彼得罗夫青瓜舒缓补水面膜采用无刺激配方，特别温和、补水效果明显且抗过敏，适合各种类型的肌肤，可在脱毛、剃须和电解刺激后有效舒缓肌肤。
Peter Thomas 彼得罗夫青瓜舒缓补水面膜蕴含丰富的青瓜、木瓜、甘菊、菠萝、甘蔗、枫树、柳橙柠檬和越橘萃取精华，深层补水，舒缓肌肤，亦可在肌肤受刺激后得到迅速舒缓，让肌肤焕然一新。
使用说明：
name: Thomas 彼得罗夫青瓜舒缓补水面膜（150 克）

product_description: Refresh your complexion and remove impurities with the Micellar Oil-Infused Water from Garnier. Ideal for ultra-efficient one step cleansing, the Micellar Water is enriched with Nourishing Oils that act as a magnet to capture dirt and impurities. Even waterproof makeup is effortlessly dissolved without the need to scrub or rinse. Ideal for dry and sensitive skin types, skin is cleansed, soothed and refreshed with no uncomfortable tightness.
name: Micellar Oil Infused Water (400ml)

product_description:
短短十分鐘，First Aid Beauty 強效修復瞬效燕麥麵膜即可深層補水修復，瞬效滋養肌膚。適用於所有肌膚類型（包括敏感肌膚）。此款面膜質地豐富，獨特配方強效保濕舒緩肌膚，用後感覺柔軟滋養，為乾燥、受損肌膚帶來舒適奢華的使用感。 
配方含有天然植物萃取抗氧化劑和修復成分，富含高濃度燕麥膠，舒緩臉部和身體的粗糙皮膚，保護肌膚在大風寒冷乾燥等惡劣天氣下不受傷害。 ，對於極度乾燥皮膚具有滋潤及修復損傷的功效，同時含有FAB抗氧化因子中和自由基，減輕刺激和炎症保護肌膚天然滋潤。 
適合所有肌膚類型，包括敏感肌膚。不含羥基苯甲酸酯類防腐劑、有害化學物質和染色劑。 
 使用方法： 
潔面後將面膜在面部塗上厚厚的一層。 
十分鐘後清洗乾淨。 
乾燥和受損肌膚每週使用2-3次效果更佳。
name: Aid Beauty 强效修复瞬效燕麦面膜 (56.7g)

product_description:
无泡沫，中性PH 值，能防止肌肤重要水分流失。 这款产品适合所有肌肤类型。
一款温和无泡沫洁面乳，中性pH值，其配方温和不干燥，有效维护肌肤的自然水分平衡，并去除面部表面堆积的污垢和化妆品，焕现柔滑饱满美肌。 蕴含的牛油果油和荷荷巴油有助于温和补水；檀香和柠檬则可以净化肌肤；金盏花具有修复功效；蔷薇木则维持肌肤的水份平衡。 适合所有肌肤类型。
使用说明：
name: Gentle Foaming Facial Cleanser (100g)

product_description:
