使用  Omorovicza 匈牙利温泉 奇迹面部精华油  焕化您肌肤的青春活力。。 独特的珍贵营养配方，本品蕴含有丰富维他命的海洋沙棘果精油，具有修复焕颜的功效，而从天然植物提取的补骨脂酚可有效淡化皱纹。
含有抗氧化海草提取物和快速吸收的甘油，可保护肌肤免受环境压力的损伤，促进胶原蛋白形成，增强肌肤弹性，使肌肤更加紧致。 玫瑰果油可抚平细纹，而甜杏仁油可为肌肤补充水分，让您的肌肤柔软丰盈，重新焕发活力。 E.N.
name: 匈牙利温泉奇迹面部精华油（30 毫升）

product_description:
Caudalie歐緹麗葡萄籽柔性潔顏乳，不僅是一款卸妝乳，能有效去除彩妝，更是一款護膚品：穩定的葡萄籽多酚遠離自由基傷害，甜杏仁油、荷荷巴油的成分令肌膚光滑柔嫩。
適合所有類型膚質，甚至乾性肌膚及敏感性肌膚。營養配方含有葡萄籽多酚，矢車菊和燕麥提取物等，適合臉部和眼部清潔卸妝。
使用方法：
每天早晚使用，可直接用手指或化妝棉塗於臉部，輕輕按摩，並用水沖洗乾淨。
Jurlique 推出的玫瑰衡肤保湿精华液是一款深度补水的舒缓凝胶，让肌肤恢复如丝般柔软的质感。 富含绿茶、葡萄籽和野玫瑰果等多种天然成分，为肌肤提供每日滋养，改善肌肤的自然光采。 K.D.
name: 玫瑰衡肤保湿精华液（30ml）

product_description:
REN 玫瑰蔷薇洁面啫喱可让您的肌肤更清爽舒缓，它与洁面乳相同，只是取了一个新名字！ 这款洁面啫喱采用不含硝酸盐的配方，蕴含从燕麦和玉米提取的野生清洁剂，可温和地祛除污物和污染物。
REN 玫瑰蔷薇洁面啫喱蕴含冷压玫瑰萃取物，可有效应对自由基，让肌肤更加清爽润滑。 REN 的这款日常必需品还含有芦荟汁提取物，可平静滋润肌肤。
REN 产品不含像石油化学产品、硫酸盐、对羟苯甲酸酯、合成香料、人造色素、T.E.A、D.E.A、甘油醇硅酮和稳定剂等人工合成原料。
使用说明：
name: 玫瑰蔷薇洁面啫喱 150 毫升

product_description:
德國世家潔面日用精華油幫助鎮靜和平衡油性、易長痘的皮膚，使膚色均勻。吸收快，配方含有舒緩和平衡天然成份，包括胡蘿蔔、洋絨毛花和印度楝，可去除過多油脂，細化毛孔，減少雀斑。 - LM 
 使用說明：
name: Hauschka 德国世家洁面日用精华油 30ml

product_description:
使用Sukin的Oil Balancing+ Charcoal Pore Refining Facial Scrub温和地去角质。 含有修复肌肤的Jojoba颗粒和Bamboo木炭能够深层清洁毛孔，清除尘垢、毒素和杂质，令肌肤透亮清新。
本款面部磨砂含有柳草、Coconut油和路易博士茶，能够促进细胞更新，防止痘痘爆发，而Coconut油为肌肤补水，甘菊舒缓不适，令肌肤持久舒适。 肤色将变得柔软饱满，散发健康光泽。 适合油性至混合性肤质。
name: Oil Balancing+ Charcoal Pore Refining Facial Scrub 125ml

product_description:
Shiseido Ultimune 红妍肌活精华液是一款功能强大的护肤产品，增强肌肤天然的抵御力，对抗衰老、 环境侵害因素和日常压力。 这款抗衰老护肤产品特别添加了Shiseido的Ultimune复合物以强韧肌肤，淡化皱纹，同时还能深度滋润肌肤，散发迷人光泽。
使用后肌肤瞬间变得更加柔滑；使用四周后，肌肤将变得更加紧致，富有弹性。 这款抗衰老面部精华液非常适合作为日常护肤使用。 - L.M.
*效果从超过200名女性参加的自评中得出。
如果同时使用其他精华液，请先使用Ultimune精华液，然后再用其他精华液和润肤乳。
name: Ultimune 红妍肌活精华液（30ml）

product_description:
使用几滴具有补水功效的Elemis Pro-Radiance Illuminating Flash Balm (50ml) ，你会立竿见影地感到效果。 本品属于新一代润肤霜，精心定制的产品可将补水功效升华到新的水平。  随着每一次使用，你的皮肤都会得到滋养，增强发质光泽。
使用后不会出现粘性油腻的感觉，只会感到清醒自然，同时提升你的肤色。 要享获得最好的结果，需按摩少量Elemis Pro-Radiance Illuminating Flash Balm到脖子和脸部。 本品可用作轻度滋润霜或打底霜。
name: Pro-Radiance Illuminating Flash Balm 50ml

product_description:
利用来自Sarah Chapman屡获殊荣的Skinesis 3D Moisture Infusion让肌肤重焕活力。 凭借结合低分子量透明质酸和玫瑰香水的强大配方，该面膜可抚平细纹和皱纹，并提供深层保湿，令肌肤丰盈水嫩，光彩照人。
其焕采Pentavitin®复合物补充水分含量，修复暗沉、干渴的肌肤，同时充满活力的锌、铜、镁混合物可支持细胞更新，缓解肌肤红肿。 适用于所有肤质，特别设计的护理面膜适合所有脸型，而其独特的折片可舒缓娇嫩的眼部肌肤。 E.N.
name: Chapman Skinesis 3D Moisture Infusion (4 x 25ml)

product_description:
Perricone MD's Pre:Empt Travel Kit combines a selection of anti-ageing products that work in synergy to promote smoother, younger-looking skin. The Pre:Empt Series utilises a naturally derived Nrf2 Antioxidant Support Complex™ to pre-empt first signs of ageing, noticeable pores, dullness and uneven texture; it helps improve skin’s natural ability to defend against oxidative stress and environmental aggressors.
Pre:Empt Exfoliating Pore Refiner (59ml)
A lightweight and refreshing solution that gently exfoliates skin to refine rough areas and minimise the appearance of pores. Smoothing and clarifying, it utilises the brand's Nrf2 Antioxidant Support Complex™ to help combat first signs of noticeable pores whilst its dose of DMAE firms skin for youthful-looking results. It gently resurfaces skin to promote a healthy, radiant glow. Skin is left soft, smooth and renewed with a more even texture.
Pre:Empt Skin Perfecting Serum (15ml)
A lightweight, oil-free serum infused with a high concentration of Nrf2 Antioxidant Support Complex™ to combat visible signs of ageing. Melting into skin, it delivers brightening and firming properties whilst targeting fine lines, pores and dryness to promote a healthier, younger-looking and refined complexion. Rich in antioxidants, the silky solution will improve the skin's natural barrier to help defend against external aggressors, and its dose of Alpha Lipoic Acid minimises the look of wrinkles and pores for transformed skin texture. Ideal as a makeup primer. 
Pre:Empt Oil-Free Hydrating Cream (30ml)
A lightweight, oil-free moisturiser that works to combat visible signs of ageing, including fine lines, dullness and uneven skin texture. Utilising an Nrf2 Antioxidant Support Complex™, the cream melts effortlessly into skin, hydrating and conditioning whilst delivering a host of antioxidants to keep skin safe from external factors. Helping to preserve a youthful complexion, it contains Vitamin C Ester for brightening and firming action. Skin feels nourished and protected. Won't clog pores.
Pre:Empt Brightening Eye Cream (7.5ml)
A re-energising eye cream infused with an Nrf2 Antioxidant Support Complex™ and gentle Avocado Oil to help diminish signs of ageing and fatigue around the delicate eye area. Nourishing and brightening, it contains light-reflecting pearls that help eradicate the appearance of dark circles and puffiness, whilst its firming properties combat the look of fine lines. Delicate skin around the eyes looks younger, wide awake and refreshed.
name: MD Pre:Empt Travel Kit (Worth £86.50)

product_description:
这款3合1洁面、爽肤及眼部卸妆乳是非常温和的，可以去除100％的污垢。  KORRES乳蛋白没有刺激作用，也会让您的肌肤呼吸。
这款优质的洗面奶中含有丰富的植物油和乳蛋白将会清洁、滋润肌肤，使您肌肤的色调健美，以去除所有您脸部和眼部的化妆、皮脂和污垢。
乳蛋白富含乳糖和必需氨基酸，使之具有滋补的特性，通过与水分子键合在肌肤表面形成一个水化膜。
使用说明：
name: Cleanser，Toner及眼部Makeup卸妆油（200毫升）

product_description:
Reignite a youthful glow with Murad's Resurgence Starter Set; a four-piece collection that delivers firming and hydrating properties for a smoother, more refined complexion.
Renewing Cleansing Cream (45ml)
A nourishing, radiance-reviving formula that expertly eliminates dirt and impurities acquired throughout the day. Infused with essential vitamins, minerals and powerful antioxidants, the luxurious cleanser dissolves dead, dull skin cells, whilst defending against environmental aggressors to leave skin fresh and healthy-looking after use.
Retinol Youth Renewal Serum (10ml)
A fast-absorbing formula that works to minimise the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles. Powered by Retinol Tri-Active Technology (a fast-acting Retinoid, a time-released Retinol and a Retinol booster), the lightweight serum delivers a firming effect to smoothen and refine skin, whilst Hyaluronic Spheres provide long-lasting hydration to reignite a radiant glow.
Renewing Eye Cream (4ml)
A powerful, anti-ageing formula that targets and addresses fine lines and wrinkles around the delicate eye area. Its Eye Brightening Complex is combined with Wild Yarn Extract and Soybean Sterols to minimise puffiness, dark circles and crow's feet, whilst helping to firm and hydrate to reveal a refined, refreshed and luminous eye contour.
Age-Balancing Moisture (18ml)
Ideal for dry, dehydrated and slackening skin, the deeply nourishing moisturiser delivers superior hydration as it provides broad spectrum protection to defend against UV rays. Utilising Resurrection Plant Proteins, Shea Butter and natural fruit oils, you can expect a brighter, smoother complexion with renewed radiance.
name: Resurgence Starter Set (Worth £66)

product_description:
利用Sarah Chapman的Skinesis Age Repair精华液享受无与伦比的护肤效果，这款屡获殊荣的抗衰老精华液，致力于对抗包括黑斑、细纹和皱纹在内的衰老迹象。
协同利用强效活性成分和创新缩氨酸混合物，该多效配方能够在细胞水平上丰盈和亮白肌肤，减少色素不均，同时促进胶原蛋白的产生，以紧致肌肤和缓解失控皱纹迹象。 该轻质精华液富含维生素和抗氧化剂，将滋润您的肌肤并专业改善肌肤光泽和肤色。 肌肤将更加年轻、紧致并焕发活力。 - K.N
name: Chapman Skinesis Age Repair精华液 (30ml)

product_description:
Energise the complexion with the STARSKIN The Diamond Mask™ VIP Illuminating Coconut Bio-Cellulose Second Skin Face Mask; an elite sheet mask that fits closely to the contours of the face and brightens the visage.
Instantly transforming skin, the premium face mask is created from naturally fermented Coconut Water and is soaked in a rich and creamy serum, which is formulated using the finest botanicals and precious gemstone extracts. The bio-cellulose mask boasts a base of Evening Primrose extract, which softens the complexion and ensures skin is smooth, whilst ultra-fine Diamond Dust lends an illuminated appearance.
Emerald and Tourmaline extracts work in synergy to re-energise the face and anti-oxidant rich White Mulberry Bark offers a flawless finish. Working continuously for fifteen to twenty minutes, the VIP mask reveals a crystal-clear complexion that is visibly bright and perfected.
name: The Diamond Mask™ VIP Illuminating Coconut Bio-Cellulose Second Skin Face Mask

product_description:
Treat yourself or a loved one to DECLÉOR's Recharge Your Life Serenity Box; a five-piece skincare collection that works to restore a smooth, supple complexion, whilst rejuvenating the mind and promoting well-being. Housed in a gift box, the kit includes a DECLÉOR phone pouch.
HYDRA FLORAL 24HR Hydrating Rich Cream (50ml)
Enriched with Rosehip Plant Oil, the velvety formula supplies skin with essential fatty acids, whilst Avocado and Soy Plant Oils restore softness and suppleness. Lightweight and fast-absorbing, the non-greasy cream helps to defend against pollution and environmental stresses for long-lasting comfort. Skin is smooth, hydrated and replenished around the clock.
AROMA CONFORT Moisturising Body Milk (50ml)
A fast-absorbing formula that works to envelop the body in a protective layer of moisture from top to toe. Lightweight and ultra-hydrating, the milk boosts elasticity and firmness to improve the skin's overall appearance, whilst conditioning and softening the body to leave it feeling rejuvenated and replenished. Suitable for all skin types.
HYDRA FLORAL Ultra Moisturising & Plumping Mask (15ml)
A replenishing mask that transforms from a luxurious cream to a fine oil to increase absorption of active ingredients. Harnessing the powers of Wild Pansy Extract, Hyaluronic Acid and Neroli Essential Oil, the ultra-hydrating treatment minimises the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles to reveal a smoother, more refined texture. Skin is radiant and revitalised with restored luminosity.
AROMA CLEANSE Micellar Oil (5ml)
A gentle formula that works deep into pores to dissolve dirt and even waterproof make-up, without over-drying or uncomfortable tightness. Its fine oil particles kick-start micro-circulation to boost radiance, leaving the complexion nourished and refreshed after use. Suitable for all skin types, the luxurious cleanser maintains hydration levels to reveal a deeply moisturised, supple and super soft complexion.
AROMESSENCE Neroli Hydrating Night Balm (2.5ml)
The lush balm effortlessly melts into skin, working at night when skin is most receptive to help rejuvenate and restore moisture levels. Containing active essential oils including Basil, Neroli and Chamomile, it helps purify and even skin tone, whilst Tonka Bean boosts micro-circulation. Bursting with nutritious plant extracts including Avocado, dry skin is left feeling softer and intensively hydrated.
name: Recharge Your Life Serenity Box (Worth £64.10)

product_description: 蒟蒻海綿撲（含法國紅泥） 法國紅泥適合乾燥和敏感肌膚： 紅泥含氧化鐵，清除肌膚的角質化死細胞，加速再生過程。據說可以改善血液循環，讓肌膚有光澤、水潤，減少皺紋和毛細血管破裂。非常適合需要活力法國綠泥的干燥或成熟肌膚。 蒟蒻因1500 多年以來日本人用於增進健康而聞名，最早在六世紀用作藥材。  • 100% 天然海綿 • 溫和剝落 • 100% 無染色 • 100% 無添加劑 • 100% 生物可降解 • 天然可持續 • 環保安全自然潤澤植物纖維，具有天然鹼性，因此可平衡肌膚雜質和油脂的酸性。海綿的獨特網狀結構，輕輕按摩肌膚，並刺激血液流動和肌膚細胞新生。使肌膚乾淨舒適，自然清爽！除非您真正想要，否則無需使用其他潔面乳或潔面皂。如果您選擇使用其他潔面乳或潔面皂，您可以減少平時的用量，因為海綿將產生更多泡沫，可以更加深入清潔。

Achieve a natural-looking bronzed glow with the St. Tropez Gradual Tan Sculpt & Glow; an advanced lotion that works to deliver a sculpted and sun-kissed appearance.
Quick-drying, the tanning lotion effortlessly glides over the body for quick and simple application. The intelligent formula is fortified with natural Sea Algae and Hyaluronic Acid, which work in synergy to deliver a hydrating veil to skin and visibly tone the body for a sculpted-looking finish.
Working on all skin tones and types, including sensitive skin, the hydrating lotion leaves the body visibly toned, tanned and drenched in moisture.
name: Tropez Gradual Tan Sculpt & Glow 200ml

product_description:
Vita Liberata 的仿晒晚间保湿面膜给暗沉、缺水的肌肤提供深层补充。 配方中的有机成分包括葵花籽，它提供维生素A、C和D，安抚和舒解肌肤。 维生素E保护肌肤免受环境侵害，让皮肤感觉柔顺，苹果提取物可消除细纹和皱纹。
用HyH2O™技术打造的这款丰富轻巧的面膜能平衡肌肤，呈现年轻、明显更光滑、更精致的肤色。 Vita Liberata产品保证终极的自生古铜色效果，让皮肤感觉舒适，泛出自然光泽。 E.N. 
使用指南：晚上轻轻涂抹到洗净的脸上及颈部。
name: Liberata仿晒晚间面膜（65毫升）

product_description:
Brighten and illuminate even the most dull and tired skin with the After Party™ Coconut Bio-Cellulose Second Skin Brightening Face Mask from STARSKIN. Formulated with STARSKIN's Vitamin rich Coconut Juice and Bio Cellulose, the After Party face mask hydrates, visibly revives and conditions the skin.
The transparent, cooling sheet mask contours closely to the face and delivers a boost of Vitamin C, which works to improve the appearance of dark spots and visibly correct uneven skin tone. The mask is also enriched with brightening Cowslip, firming Mallow Extract and healing Gentian Root, leaving skin fresh-faced and prepared for the day.
The mask is drenched in a skin revitalising Organic skincare serum, which transforms skin that has been up all night partying, visibly restoring luminosity and brightness.
name: After Party™ Coconut Bio-Cellulose Second Skin Brightening Face Mask

product_description:
使用 RMK润湿Cleansing Balm  ，这是一款豪华油制洁面膏，可转变成柔滑卸妆油，一经接触即可除去化妆物和杂质。
该洁面霜可瞬时融入肌肤，进行深层清洁，专业消除杂质和浓妆，同时提供起润肤作用的Avocado、Rosehip和橄榄油，以激发容光焕发、纯洁的肤色。 Shea和芒果脂软化和滋润，而其微量的Rose香氛使人神清气爽。 Skin感觉洁净、柔嫩和滋润。
name: Balm（100g）

product_description:
Chantecaille  水稻与天竺葵泡沫洁肤乳，可温和地去除肌肤角质层，使肌肤超级光滑柔软。 本款洁肤乳用来温和地卸妆、去除肌肤杂质。
配方细腻，含米糠和抗菌剂天竺葵等成分，可轻柔去除角质，同时呵护治疗皮肤，使肌肤超柔软、洁净如新。 天竺葵也因其芳香疗法而出名，使人身心平衡。 抗氧化剂大豆、绿茶及橄榄叶等成分，可保护肌肤免遭自由基的损伤。
name: 水稻与天竺葵泡沫洁肤乳 75ml

product_description:
Treat your skin to the intensely nourishing properties of Elemis Superfood Facial Oil, a 100% natural treatment that works to re-energise and 'feed' your skin with essential superfood nutrients.
Infused with a cocktail of aromatic essential oils, concentrated superfoods and naturally moisturising ingredients, the oil promotes a brighter, more radiant and youthful-looking complexion. Its combination of antioxidant and fatty acid-rich Broccoli Seed Oil and moisture sealing Flaxseed Oil work in synergy to hydrate and soothe the skin, whilst easily absorbed Daikon Radish melts deep within to nourish from the inside out.
Expect a soft, supple and revitalised complexion.
Enriched with:
Sweet Brazilian Orange Oil, Palmarosa Oil, Amyris Oil, Lavandin Oil Grosso, Lavender Oil, Tunisian Rosemary Oil, Sicilian Lemon Oil, Ylang Oil, Patchouli Oil, Vetivert Oil, Eucalyptus Oil, Carrot Seed Oil, Organic Cedarwood Oil, Galbanum Oil.
name: Superfood Facial Oil 15ml

product_description:
Brighten, revive and rejuvenate delicate eye areas with Oui Essential Hydrating Eye Serum from skinChemists. Infused with Vitamin E, renowned for its anti-oxidant and anti-inflammatory properties, the formula works to hydrate the skin, prevents skin damage and protect against environmental damage.
A balance of Aloe Vera and Allantoin work to soften, thoroughly moisturise and soothe the eye area leaving skin looking refreshed and revitalised. The serum is concentrated with Vitamin C which works to stimulate collagen production, visibly reducing the appearance of fine lines, for a more youthful looking eye area.
name: Oui Essential Hydrating Eye Serum 15ml

product_description:
Achieve a flawless complexion with the Dead Sea Spa Magik Diamond Range BB Cream SPF 15; a skin-perfecting, anti-ageing formula that works to combat uneven skin tone and conceal imperfections.
Combining Dead Sea minerals, pure plant extracts and antioxidant Vitamin E, the beauty balm applies and blends effortlessly for natural-looking coverage that adapts to suit individual tone, whilst stimulating collagen production and minimising the appearance of fine lines. Provides SPF 15 to protect and repair skin, leaving your complexion smooth, radiant and deeply moisturised.
name: Sea Spa Magik Diamond Range BB Cream SPF 15 50ml

product_description:
Burt's Bees 小蜜蜂芒果管裝唇膏 
小蜜蜂100%天然滋潤唇膏有效軟化並為雙唇補水。 
配方含有芒果油，這款唇膏可以舒緩、保濕、保護唇部肌膚，唇部肌膚更加順滑健康。 
唇膏充滿水果香味，雙唇肌膚更加柔軟滋潤。
name: Bees小蜜蜂芒果管装唇膏4.25 g

product_description:
用後感覺肌膚煥發新生。作為一款抗氧化保濕霜，特別適合用於塗抹於面部和身體，還有助於防止早衰症狀。 
本品含麥芽、鱷梨和杏仁油，能讓肌膚重現活力，同時抵抗可見的歲月痕跡。這款含70% 有機成分的保濕霜能讓肌膚保濕光滑，豐潤彈性。 
使用說明：
name: 杰森 5000Iu 维他命 E 再生保湿霜 (120G)

product_description:
Indulge, hydrate and protect your skin with Elemis Japanese Camellia Oil Blend, a nourishing body oil that intensely moisturises whilst helping to prevent stretch marks during pregnancy.
Japanese Camellia Oil has been used for centuries to care for nails, hair, scalp and combination skin. Blended with emollient Sweet Almond Oil and antioxidant Vitamin E, the luxurious cocktail feels lightweight on skin and melts in effortlessly to help prevent the appearance of stretch marks, improve elasticity and intensely nourish. Rich in Plant Collagen, it will leave skin feeling soft, supple and moisturised.
name: Japanese Camellia Oil Blend 30ml

product_description:
Ultra Sun Very High SPF50 Sports Spray Formula 专门为体育运动人士设计，提供快速防水保护，能够提供抗摩擦保护。
Ultra Sun Very High SPF50 Sports Spray Formula 采用纯净喷雾配方，只需一次使用，即可提供全面保护，这一切得益于其光谱广泛地UVA和UVB滤光因子。 含抗氧化物，本品是旅途中保护皮肤的完美防晒产品。
name: Very High SPF 50 Sports Spray Formula (150毫升)

product_description: 利用来自bliss的三重活氧焕采维生素C日霜恢复肌肤活力。 利用多功效C.P.R. 技术（清洁、保护和焕发）和维生素C强大成分配制而成，该焕采乳霜提供强效保湿，可抚平细纹和皱纹。 非常适合暗沉、疲惫的肌肤，该日霜富含抗氧化剂以抵御环境侵害因素，同时透明质酸可补充水份，让您获得光彩照人、健康自然和肤色均匀的肌肤。 E.N.

Achieve youthful looking skin with the Gold Hydrogel Face Mask from Skin Republic, an anti-ageing sheet mask treatment that’s brimming with vitamins and antioxidants to leave your complexion feeling hydrated and smooth.
Utilising the Transdermal Delivery System to ensure efficient absorption of beneficial ingredients, the luxurious face mask has been expertly formulated with plant extracts and minerals to help reduce visible signs of ageing. Delivering nutrients and intense moisture with close and continuous contact, the 20 minute treatment reveals healthier-looking, radiant skin with the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles minimised.
name: Republic Gold Hydrogel Face Mask 25g

product_description:
Alpha-H蘆薈三重潔面乳 
清爽抗菌、舒緩肌膚、卓效去除多餘油脂並解決痘痘問題。不含發泡劑、洗滌劑或硫磺。令肌膚光潔閃亮，充滿活力。 
 主要成分： 
蘆薈- 保濕舒緩黃瓜提取物- 清爽提神、亮膚活顏、減少發紅。 
 使用說明： 
適合中性、混合、油性和有痘痘的肌膚使用。
name: 芦荟三重洁面乳 200ml

product_description:
LieracMagnificence 试销套装，可对抗肌肤老化。本款肌肤护理三件套含：活力精华液、豪华型保湿霜、修复护理霜。 科学研究发现: 该套装内含高级植物活性成分，使肌肤更年轻，肤色和肤质均得到改善。
Magnificence 红色强力修护霜 (8ml) 
修复肌肤，使肌肤焕发青春活力。 本品内含7％的D-Glyox（一种正在申请专利的，抗老化成分），其成分包括：石榴花、合欢树、脂质体肽，可对抗糖氧化（糖化及氧化均可改变皮肤蛋白质，使肌肤失去弹性、色素沉着、不再柔软）。 本款功效强大的修护霜富含芙蓉花提取物，可深入渗透肌肤，淡化抚平皮肤细纹和皱纹；内含的玻尿酸可滋润肌肤、使肌肤柔软光滑。
Magnificence 全天柔滑面霜 (10ml)
专为干性皮肤配制，可被肌肤快速吸收，令肌肤紧致、饱满，可淡化细纹和皱纹；内含的玻尿酸可滋润肌肤；牛油果油可改善肤质。 高度浓缩的专利品D-Glyox合成物、富含滋养型植物油脂，为化妆打下极好的基础。
Magnificence 红色轮廓重塑美容护肤品 (15ml)
抗老化配方，使肌肤重新焕发青春光釆。正在为D-Glyox合成物申请专利（成分包括石榴花、合欢树、脂质体肽）可对抗肌肤失去弹性、色素沉着、肌肤不再柔软等现象。 其色调适合所有皮肤类型，内含玻尿酸、红色矿物颜料等，可渗透到皮肤深层，淡化细纹和皱纹、使肌肤紧致饱满、令肤色均匀。使肌肤更光滑、更亮泽。
name: Magnificence 试销套装

product_description:
Combat blemishes with the Bulldog Oil Control Blemish Targeter; concentrated spot treatment that works to visibly clear skin.
Enriched with a soothing blend of Witch Hazel, Willow Bark and Juniper, the spot corrector minimises the appearance of blemishes and redness. Simply apply to blemished skin and the targeted formula will transform the complexion.
name: Oil Control Blemish Targeter 15ml

product_description:
freezeframe Revital 活肤眼霜采用凝胶质地，能有效减缓娇嫩的眼部肌肤的衰老迹象，滋润肌肤，使其变得更光滑。 只需28天，便可消除高达63％的皱纹，同时还能消除黑眼圈和眼袋，集三重功效于一身！
效果卓著，对肌肤十分温和；这款眼霜能有效滋润肌肤，焕活肌肤组织以促进微循环，从而让眼周肌肤更明亮紧实，呈现年轻态。K.D.
name: Revital 活肤眼霜

product_description:
Catering specifically for combination and oily skin types, the Balancing Face Moisturiser from Balance Me helps to decongest and refine as it eliminates unwanted shine.
Harnessing the powers of Neroli Oil, Spruce Knot and skin-brightening Bergamot Oil, the lightweight moisturiser helps to minimise spots, blemishes and redness, whilst restoring a radiant, youthful glow. Expect a soothed, hydrated complexion with improved texture and tone.
name: Me Balancing Face Moisturiser 50ml

product_description:
The ALGENIST Genius Ultimate Anti-Ageing Eye Cream delivers targeted anti-ageing care for the delicate eye contour, seeking to hydrate, soften and nourish with age-defying effects.    
The rich formula contains ALGENIST’s exclusive biotechnology complex of Alguronic Acid and Microalgae Oil; a pair of sustainably sourced, marine-based actives that have been scientifically proven to demonstrate significant anti-ageing properties. Seeking to repair and protect cells while enhancing moisture levels, the pair work in tandem to alleviate the appearance of wrinkles and expression lines.
Providing 360° action, the addition of plant-derived Collagen and Persian Silk Tree extract help to firm and lift the upper eyelid, visibly reducing under-eye sagging, bags and dark circles. As a result, the eye cream leaves skin looking supple and refined with a more even and brightened tone.
name: Genius Ultimate Anti-Ageing Eye Cream 15ml

product_description:
歐緹麗卸妝潔膚水令肌膚清爽舒​​適。這款卸妝水溫和有效地去除彩妝、油脂和污垢，吸收並帶走雜質，同時不會摩擦皮膚。 
蘊含巴西灌木、蔬菜甘油和薄荷等天然提取物，舒緩鎮靜肌膚，即使是最敏感的皮膚也非常適用。 
 使用說明：早晚用棉片塗抹於臉部和眼部。
name: 欧缇丽卸妆洁肤水 (200ml)

product_description:
茱莉蔻玫瑰滋潤加抗氧化因子麵霜帶給你全新容顏和自由的想像，短期和長期使用都能對肌膚產生絕妙的效果,有效對抗缺水衰老問題! 
散發玫瑰油迷人香味茱莉蔻玫瑰滋潤加抗氧化因子麵霜富含維生素含有綠茶，葡萄籽，大豆蛋白萃取物不僅滋養皮膚,更能保護肌膚對抗環境損傷. 
使用方法:
name: (40ml)

product_description:
专门针对混合型肌肤而设计， FOREO LUNA™ 斐珞尔露娜 在深层清洁肌肤的同时可减少老化的迹象。
采用 T-Sonic™ 技术设计，通过每分钟将 8000 次的透肤声波脉动导入肌肤来实现对肌肤的彻底清洁。该设备可打开堵塞的毛孔，祛除污垢、化妆品残留物和杂质，让肌肤更加紧致光滑。
圆形的硅胶接触点沿着面部轻轻滑动，柔软的 LUNA™ 露娜刷头可防止滋生细菌，其清洁度是普通刷头的 35 倍。 该设备为完全防水型设备，使用方便，其小巧轻便的设计，再加上超长的待机时间（每次充电可使用 450 次）是外出旅行的理想选择。
其独特的抗皱模式可直接将低频声波脉动导入到容易长皱纹的区域，有助于减少细纹和鱼尾纹，这款富有创意的洁面设备还具备紧致肌肤和均匀肤色的功效。 让您的肌肤更加亮丽、清洁和健康。
name: LUNA™ 斐珞尔露娜——混合型肌肤的能量源泉

product_description:
Sculpt, bronze and highlight the face and body with the St. Tropez 3-in-1 Bronzing Powder; a versatile powder palette that can be used to enhance facial features, or deliver a natural-looking, sun-kissed complexion.
Housing three complimentary tones, the compact boasts multiple uses. Use each hue alone to visually enhance features, or blend shades together to achieve an overall, holiday glow. Suitable for use on the face and body, expect to be beautifully bronzed.
name: Tropez 3-in-1 Bronzing Powder 22g

product_description:
利用 Garnier Skin Naturals Pure Active Energising Gel Scrub 擦出容光焕发的肌肤，这款焕发活力去角质膏旨在通过脱去死皮细胞，让暗沉肌肤焕发亮丽光彩。
富含水杨酸和温和去角质颗粒，该磨砂膏深层渗透肌肤，清除杂质并疏通堵塞毛孔，葡萄柚、石榴和维生素C提取物可消除缺陷，改善肌肤光泽。
通过强效净化，该磨砂膏可对抗多余油脂及毛孔粗大，令肌肤焕然一新，清爽、洁净。 加入水果香气。 - K.N.
name: Skin Naturals Pure Active Energising Gel Scrub (150ml)

product_description:
Shiseido 资生堂的新艳阳夏臻效水动力防护乳采用独特的 WetForce 水动力防护技术配方，当接触水时，防紫外线能力会增强。 这种先进的技术与 SuperVeil 360 多方位防护技术相结合，以在肌肤表面创造一层保护膜，防止因防晒霜涂抹不均匀而造成的意外损伤。 抗衰老成分 Profense Cell 可温和地为肌肤补充水分，改善干燥的肌肤，让肌肤有充足的水份。
离子矿物质感觉器含有的负离子可与水和汗液中的正离子结合，这样就形成一层防水层，即便在阳光更强的时候也能有效防止紫外线。 这款轻质的防晒乳可用于面部、身体，以在您游泳、进行体育运动和日光浴时提供防晒作用，而不会粘附沙子。 E.N.
不含有任何刺激成分，通过了皮肤科专家的测试。
name: 资生堂新艳阳夏臻效水动力防护乳 SPF 50+ （50 毫升）

product_description: Jurlique中的Activating Water精华能够软化肌肤，令肌肤充满活力。 每一次护肤最核心之处在于独特的配方能够持续不断的软化肌肤，使肌肤容光焕发。 富含蜀葵根提取物的Activating Water精华使肌肤能最大程度的从精华液和保湿露中汲取营养。
name: Activating Water精华 150ml

product_description: Ole Henriksen 歐力漢瑞克森深層滋養潔膚棉是一包高檔緞面織物，可快速讓皮膚活力再現，深層清潔。這款潔膚棉浸有超溫和滋養成分，可溫和清潔皮膚，同時徹底清除包括防水睫毛膏在內的所有殘妝。 - ED
name: Henriksen 欧力汉瑞克森滋润湿巾

product_description:
Combat dark spots and uneven skin tone with the Extra Care Brightening Anti Wrinkle Cream SPF 25 from Fade Out; a brand that utilise natural active ingredients to reduce areas of hyperpigmentation caused by sun exposure, ageing and hormonal changes.
Combining Hyaluronic Acid, Liquorice Extract and Niacinamide (naturally occurring Vitamin B3), the plumping formula hydrates and nourishes all skin types, whilst protecting against harmful UVA and UVB rays. Expect a brighter, firmer complexion with a youthful glow.
name: Out Extra Care Brightening Anti Wrinkle Cream SPF 25 50ml

product_description:
Treat your complexion to the benefits of Skin Authority's Beauty Infusion™ Probiotics for Clarifying; a rebalancing formula that works to target breakout-prone skin.
Fortified with Shea Butter and multiple Probiotic Ferments, the fast-absorbing, non-greasy treatment helps to normalise the skin's pH balance, whilst minimising the appearance of inflammation, rosacea, dryness and enlarged pores. Skin is smoother and more refined with increased clarity. Can be used alone or mixed with foundation and skincare products.
name: Authority Beauty Infusion™ Probiotics for Clarifying

product_description: 让 Nuxe 蜂蜜洁面身体清洁凝胶带给您极致奢华享受。 这款凝胶带有蜂蜜的香味，非常适合干燥和敏感型皮肤日常使用，不损伤肌肤天然的保湿层。 这款丰富的清洁凝胶采用天然植物清洁配方，使用后，肌肤变得柔嫩不干燥，清爽舒适。 -SA
name: 蜂蜜洁面身体清洁凝胶（400ml）

product_description:
Experience a purifying cleanse with Balancing Cleanser Milk from Wilma Schumann, a hydrating cleanser that works to lift away dirt and impurities while balancing the skin's natural pH level.
Infused with a natural fragrance, the formula gently cleans and balances the skin whilst restoring moisture; its gentle formulation will not clog pores or upset the natural environment of your skin. Expect a fresh, pure and hydrated complexion.
name: Schumann Balancing Cleanser Milk 210ml

product_description:
Reveal a flawless complexion with the yes to Tomatoes Blemish Clearing Facial Wipes. Concentrated with tomatoes, the pre-moistened wipes boast antioxidant and anti-inflammatory benefits, which aid in protecting against environmental aggressors that are able to clog pores and cause breakouts. Tomatoes also contain fruit acids that help to control oil production at the skin’s surface.
Containing blemish-fighting Salicylic acid, the face wipes work to eliminate surface skin cells and open the pores. This helps to break down any blackheads and other types of acne, leaving skin visibly clean and clear, free from breakouts.
name: to Tomatoes Blemish Clearing Facial Wipes (Pack of 30)

product_description:
Freshly handmade in the UK with high-quality and natural ingredients, STEAMCREAM's 'Original Silver' Moisturiser is a lightweight whipped emulsion that can be used on the face, hands and body.
Developed with the brand's unique STEAM process, the finest ingredients have been fused together by a shot of steam to create a gentle, fast-absorbing emulsion that delivers long-lasting hydration.
Harnessing the nourishing powers of Orange Flower Water, Cocoa Butter and Almond and Jojoba Oils, the ultra-moisturising formula softens and replenishes, leaving skin smooth, restored and rejuvenated from top to toe.
Presented in a reusable, decorative tin crafted from recyclable materials to reduce energy use and respect the environment. STEAMCREAM follows a strict no-animal testing policy and is approved by the Vegan Society.
name: Original Silver Moisturiser 75ml

product_description:
Hydrate and rejuvenate with Skin Authority's Oil Nutrient for Face, Hair & Nails; an innovative, ultra-nourishing formula that delivers multiple benefits from top to toe.
Enriched with a blend of natural oils, including Avocado, Rosehip, Grapeseed, Sunflower and Jasmine, the fast-absorbing, non-greasy treatment conditions dry, brittle nails, whilst softening and moisturising skin to leave the face and body with a radiant, healthy-looking appearance. Ideal for flaky scalps and damaged hair, its reparative properties help to combat split ends, restore vitality and enhance shine.
name: Authority Oil Nutrient for Face, Hair & Nails

product_description:
Transform skin with the DermaTx Brighten Microdermabrasion System; a hand-held device with a targeted specialist cream that has been expertly designed to help correct uneven skin tones and hyperpigmentation caused by sun damage.
The DermaTx Facial Tool utilises advanced micro-pulsing vibrations to deeply massage and exfoliate skin, resulting in a smoother and more refined looking surface layer, while the foam brush head optimises the transferal of the Brighten Microdermabrasion Cream.
This professional grade treatment contains Corundum Crystals to gently buff away dead skin cells that cause dullness, effectively stimulating microcirculation and cell renewal for skin that looks polished and revitalised.
Sabiwhite™ acts as a natural skin brightener, while antioxidant-rich Vitamin C seeks to fade discolouration and age spots. The addition of age-defying Retinol helps to accelerate natural collagen production levels, minimising the look of fine lines and wrinkles.
The advanced system is an at-home alternative to professional microdermabrasion treatments, delivering effective results to reveal a cleansed, rejuvenated and smoother looking complexion with a youthful-looking glow.
The Set Contains: 
1 x DermaTx Brighten Microdermabrasion Cream (75ml)
1 x Water Resistant Facial Tool
1 x Cradle
1 x Exfoliating Foam Head
1 x Manual
1 x FREE Cleansing Brush Head 
Please Note: It is recommended that the attachment heads are changed regularly, at least every three months.
name: Brighten Microdermabrasion System 75ml

product_description:
Baxter of California's Skin Upgrade Kit combines four advanced skincare essentials to leave your skin feeling repaired and protected.
Clay Mask (120ml):
A deep cleansing face mask designed to detoxify men's tough skin. Enriched with Bentonite and Kaolin Clay, the mask draws out impurities whilst nourishing and moisturising with a blend of Avocado Oil and Aloe Vera. Skin is left feel smooth, revived and revitalised.
Under Eye Complex (22.5ml):
An anti-ageing eye cream that addresses signs of ageing and fatigue to promote brighter, smoother eyes. The fragrance free formula delivers Caffeine and antioxidants to help re-energise skin, minimising the appearance of puffiness, wrinkles and dark circles for improved skin texture. Paraben free.
Hydro Salve Lip Balm (15ml):
A natural lip balm infused with Grape Seed, Coconut and Jojoba Oils to intensely nourish and protect lips from the elements. With an invigorating mojito flavour, the lip balm delivers natural moisturisers and vitamins to comfort dry, chapped lips. Lips are left soft, supple and hydrated. Paraben free.
Night Cream AHA (120ml):
A hydrating overnight cream that gently exfoliates skin with Alpha Hydroxy Acid to reveal a smoother, renewed complexion. Lifting away dead skin cells to smoothen skin's texture, the cream expertly refines skin whilst hydrates and nourishing with Glycerin and Sodium Hyaluronate.
name: of California Skin Upgrade Kit

product_description:
Trilogy 趣乐活野玫瑰果油补水保湿喷雾型爽肤水是一款淡雅香型的补水喷雾，可为缺水的肌肤持续补充水份。 这款补水喷雾含有玫瑰花瓣、薰衣草和天竺葵萃取物，令肌肤清爽水润，焕发活力。
Trilogy 趣乐活野玫瑰果油补水保湿喷雾型爽肤水非常适合在洁肤后或因长时间停留在空调房而导致的肌肤干燥或疲劳时使用。它是外出旅行的好伴侣，也是办公室的必备品。
使用说明：
name: 趣乐活野玫瑰果油补水保湿喷雾型爽肤水（100 毫升）

product_description:
Awaken to a revitalised and softened complexion with the AromaWorks Nourish Night Cream, an anti-ageing moisturiser that works to penetrate skin overnight when it’s most susceptible to treatment.
Formulated with 15 BioActive ingredients, it hydrates and conditions skin to minimise the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles. Complex actives ActiMoist NMF and ActiGlow C balance and optimise moisture levels to soften and refine texture with long lasting results, whilst Aloe Vera encourages cell repair. Naturally fragranced with uplifting Bergamot and Lavender, the face cream leaves skin feeling nourished and rejuvenated.
name: Nourish Night Cream 50ml

product_description:
Treat your skin to the multi-tasking benefits of Caudalie VineActiv 3-in-1 Moisturiser, a deeply hydrating formula that delivers anti-wrinkle, anti-pollution and brightening properties.
An essential daily treatment for urban lifestyles, the lightweight, velvety cream has been specially formulated to limit the quantity of pollutant particles deposited on the skin; its dose of Anti-Pollution Polysaccharides create a veil of protection against pollution to keep your complexion safe from harmful external aggressors. Deeply moisturising, it replenishes moisture and visibly smoothens the appearance of wrinkles. Its combination of ingredients work in synergy to promote brighter, healthier-looking skin: a patented ANTI CELL BURN-OUT COMPLEX™ reinforces skin's natural defences to help prevent against the impact of ageing; low weight Hyaluronic Acid moisturises and plumps out wrinkles; and antioxidants, Vitamins C and E, brighten and protect against harmful external aggressors.
Both moisturising and anti-ageing, the cream utilises Grape Polyphenols to help combat wrinkles, and soft focus and mattifying powders to create an instant glow effect for younger, naturally radiant-looking skin.
name: VineActiv 3-in-1 Moisturiser 40ml

product_description:
Restore skin’s youthful glow with the PRAI BLACK ORCHID Youth Activating Oil. The innovative formula arrives as a three layer oil, designed to combat ageing skin and deliver a younger looking complexion. Simply combine each layer using an empty dropper and apply to cleansed skin.
Targeting skin’s elasticity, the oil is concentrated with visible age intervening Epigenomyl™, which visibly smoothes the skin’s texture, consequently reducing the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles. The oil is enriched with the signature Black Orchid Extract, popular for its protective properties and aiding in combating environmental stress and free radicals, able to cause visible signs of ageing.
Delivering intense moisture, alongside multiple anti-ageing benefits, the Youth Activating Oil imparts luxurious softness, leaving the complexion, youthful, supple and smooth.
name: BLACK ORCHID Youth Activating Oil 30ml

product_description:
使用 Perricone MD 的 Neuropeptide Night Cream 重新找回青春活力。这是一款变革性的抗衰老产品，在夜间发挥作用，最大限度地补充水分并尽量减少面部和颈部的细纹和皱纹。
这款晚霜含有神经肽（促进肌肤表皮更新的高尖端技术）和紧肤二甲氨基乙醇 (DMAE) 专利配方，功效得以加强，旨在减少皱纹和肤色不均，帮助紧致和修复衰老的皮肤，重现青春活力。
这种高级配方利用牛油果油实现深层保湿，并提供专家级的抗衰老防护，同时提前一天打理肌肤。 可呈现健康、水嫩和色泽更均匀的皮肤。 - K.N
name: MD Neuropeptide Night Cream (74ml)

product_description:
體驗The Method: Cleanser Sensitive Skin舒緩的潔膚效果，這是一種溫和而無香料的潔面乳，可細緻地去除雜質並緩解受刺激的肌膚；所有這些過程均不會破壞肌膚的天然平衡。 
該潔面乳溫和而保濕，其中註入了燕麥和甘草植物精粹，可以輕柔撫去肌膚上每天產生的雜質；其奶油配方，有助於您的皮膚為下一步護膚程序做準備。用後皮膚有潔淨、再生和舒適的感覺。
name: Method: Cleanser Sensitive Skin (120ml)

product_description:
Soften and repair skin with the AromaWorks Day Cream for Men, a nourishing moisturiser that harnesses the power of 14 BioActive ingredients to deliver anti-ageing benefits.  
Formulated with extract of Kakadu and Actimoist Plus, the face cream works to stimulate natural collagen production and intensively hydrate, resulting in softer and smoother looking skin with the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles reduced. Scented with refreshing Bergamot and soothing Lavender, it leaves skin looking brightened and replenished.
name: Men's Day Cream 50ml

product_description:
Pamper skin from head-to-toe with the DECLÉOR Aroma Moments Discovery Kit; a selection of five indulgent treats to nourish and revitalise skin. Expertly developed using only the finest natural extracts and ingredients, the products work in synergy to leave skin feeling smooth, refined and replenished. An ideal starter set or gift for a loved one.
AROMA CLEANSE Clay and Herbal Mask (50ml) 
A gentle, purifying mask ideal for oily and congested skin types. The creamy clay mask has been fortified with nourishing fruit and plant extracts, delivering a dual phase effect to purify and soften. It absorbs excess oils and toxins while helping to heal the epidermis without drying out skin, resulting in a smooth and replenished complexion.
AROMA CLEANSE Alguaromes Toning Shower Gel (50ml)
Producing an invigorating foam, the Alguaromes Toning Shower Gel cleans and refreshes your skin, whilst combating the drying effects of hard water. Formulated with essential oils of lemon, lavender and seaweed extract, it gently washes away impurities whilst toning and invigorating your skin for a truly awakening experience. Suitable for all skin types, this vibrant shower gel will make the perfect pick-me-up, as it effectively uplifts both your skin and your senses. 
AROMA CLEANSE 1000 Grains Body Scrub (50ml)
A luxurious scrub to leave skin feeling silky soft. Its formula contains Grapefruit Essential Oil for an invigorating fragrance, and a combination of Pearl Sugar, Argan Shell and Fruit Acids to ensure skin is full of moisture. Easy to apply, the indulgent gel turns into oil when massaging, and changes into to a milky liquid upon contact with water for quick rinsing.
AROMA CONFORT SYSTEME CORPS Moisturising Body Lotion (50ml)
A fast-absorbing formula that works to envelop the body in a protective layer of moisture from top to toe. Lightweight and ultra-hydrating, the milk boosts elasticity and firmness to improve the skin's overall appearance, whilst conditioning and softening the body to leave it feeling rejuvenated and replenished.
name: Aroma Moments Discovery Kit

product_description:
Combat complexion disorders with PAYOT Uni Skin Jour Skin Perfecting Day Cream. Combining skin perfecting cream with a Uni perfect complex, Uni Skin Jour is ideal for daily use and is designed to reduce the appearance of dark spots, redness and dullness marks.
Boasting a unique, velvet foam texture, the formula protects the skin with a reinforced, anti-IVA SPF 15 filter, to protect against future damage to the complexion, as well as reducing the appearance of current damage. Expect skin to be soft and silky, with a visibly improved skin tone.
name: Uni Skin Jour Skin Perfecting Day Cream 50ml

product_description:
Combat uneven skin tone with the Tone Control Facial Discs from Colbert MD. Offering a brighter complexion, the facial discs target dark spots and pigmentation problems caused by sun damage.
The discs boast a SkinBright Triad Delivery System™, which is effective in reversing the visible signs of damage to skin, including hyperpigmentation. Effortlessly sweeping across the face, the pads deliver a blend of Inflacin and Phytomoist QuSome, which combine to offer intense moisture to skin and leave the complexion nourished and flawless.
Boasting built in UV protection, each Tone Control Disc replenishes essential fatty acids to skin, resulting in a visibly plump and youthful complexion.
name: MD Tone Control Facial Discs (Pack of 20)

product_description:
Reveal youthful skin with the PRAI AGELESS Throat Microdermabrasion Skin Resurfacer. The lightweight formula is designed for use as an exfoliator, resulting in dewy and firm looking skin.
The treatment works to transform dry skin that has lost elasticity. The gentle Resurfacer is enriched with Grape Seed and Oat Kernel extract, suitable for targeting the delicate skin at the neck and décolletage, and delivering a calming effect. Vitamin rich, the formula delivers essential moisture to skin, helping to improve and maintain elasticity, whilst also protecting against free radicals and environmental aggressors, known to age skin.
Finished with precious PRAI oil, the potent serum leaves the neck and décolletage thoroughly smoothed and softened.
name: AGELESS Throat Microdermabrasion Skin Resurfacer 118ml

product_description:
Rejuvenate the delicate eye area with Mizon's Intensive Skin Barrier Eye Roller; an ultra-hydrating serum with a massage tip applicator to deliver a lifting and smoothing effect.
Powered by low molecular Hyaluronic Acid and a moisturising blend of Sunflower, Rose and Olive Oils, the anti-ageing treatment helps to improve elasticity and suppleness, whilst minimising fine lines and dark circles for a brighter, more refined eye contour. Enhances the effectiveness of further eye products.
name: Intensive Skin Barrier Eye Roller

product_description:
Treat skin to intense moisture with the Mizon Nonstop Waterful Cream; an effective facial moisturiser that leaves the complexion drenched in hydration.
Rich in deep sea Minerals, Bioscharridegum-1 and NMF, the Nonstop Waterful Cream delivers a veil of long-lasting moisture to the face, which eliminates the possibilities of dryness. A potent blend of Collagen , Coppertripeptide-1, and Palmitoilpentapeptide-4 work to lock the luxurious hydration into skin and encourage improvements in skin’s elasticity.
Complete with Sea Plant extract, the moisturiser leaves the complexion feeling soothed, supple and hydrated.
name: Nonstop Waterful Cream 50ml

product_description:
Brighten and perfect dull, lacklustre complexions with the Bio Placenta Ampoule Serum from Mizon, a Korean beauty brand at the forefront of on-trend and innovative anti-ageing skincare solutions.
The ultra-lightweight formula rapidly absorbs into skin, penetrating the surface with a combination of Niacinamide, Palmitoyl Tripeptide-5 and mammal-derived Placenta Stem Cell extracts that work in synergy to stimulate cell regeneration and improve natural elasticity levels. As a result, skin feels smooth and supple, with the appearance of fine lines, wrinkles and discolouration visibly minimised.
Hyaluronic Acid and Glycerin ensure optimum moisture levels are maintained, helping to counteract dryness and irritation. Expect a revitalised and renewed complexion with a youthful looking luminosity.
name: Bio Placenta Ampoule Serum 30ml

product_description:
PAYOT Techni Liss 活性去深皱面霜是一种抗老化日霜。可软化肌肤、修复老化皮肤、减少深皱纹。
该款面霜含保湿剂及 LIss Process 合成物。配方模仿皮肤自我修复过程。可修复皱纹、令肌肤饱满充盈、明显改善皮肤皱纹。 天鹅绒般质地令肌肤舒适、软化滋养肌肤，使肌肤柔软，得到修复。 肤色亮泽、皱纹明显减少。
name: Techni Liss活性去深皱面霜（50ml）

product_description:
Delivering an instant tightening effect, the men's Zirh Repair Deep Wrinkle Concentrate works to fight signs of ageing around the eyes, forehead and lips.
Powered by Hydrolysed Wheat Protein and Tripeptide-10 Citrulline (a unique peptide that helps to support collagen production), the fast-absorbing, non-greasy treatment locks in moisture and hydration, whilst minimising the appearance of deep wrinkles and facial expression lines.
Provides antioxidant properties to defend against the damaging effects of free radicals and daily environmental aggressors, leaving skin smooth, firm and youthful-looking. Housed in a pump bottle for fuss-free application.
name: Repair Deep Wrinkle Concentrate 30ml

product_description:
PAYOT 冷霜SPF 30  可舒缓、保护皮肤。其配方功效强大。本品可被皮肤快速吸收，从而减轻刺激、炎症、瘙痒症状。
添加有抗氧化雪绒花提取物，使本品功效明显增强；含滋养型北极浆果及具有保湿功效的牛油果油，使肌肤免受自由基损伤、可阻隔有害的 UVA 和 UVB、及极端天气条件对皮肤的损害；可修复肌肤、减轻皮肤压力。 适合所有肌肤类型，包括敏感型肌肤。 令肌肤柔软温和，使肌肤得到深层滋润。
name: 冷霜 SPF 30 50ml

product_description:
Inspired by ancient Arabia, Shiffa's Tamanu Moisturising Cream synergises nurturing, carefully sourced ingredients to transport you on a journey of well-being and calm.
Fortified with nourishing Argan, regenerating Tamanu and antioxidant-rich Prickly Pear (grown in the semi arid regions of Tunisia, Morocco and Spain), the lightweight moisturiser absorbs quickly into skin to deliver superior hydration, whilst defending against free radical damage and environmental aggressors.
Catering specifically for dry, sensitive and mature skin, its dose of Pomegranate provides high levels of Vitamin C to brighten and revitalise your complexion, leaving it radiant, youthful and renewed.
name: Tamanu Moisturising Cream 50ml

product_description:
Illuminate skin whilst you sleep with Rose Quartz Age Defence Night Moisturiser from skinChemists. The ultra-smooth night moisturiser is designed to give the skin an extra boost, resulting in a vibrant and healthy looking glow. Infused with Rose Quartz, the moisturiser buffs away dead skin cells, revealing the soft, fresh and youthful looking skin beneath.
The formula contains Phytocelltec Alp Rose, based on a Swiss flowering plant and possesses the power to improve the skin's barrier function and boost regeneration throughout the night when skin is most receptive to repair. Renowned for its anti-oxidant and anti-inflammatory properties, Vitamin E works to repair damage to the skin from external aggressors, including UV rays and free radicals. Finished with a blend of Coconut oil, the cream deeply hydrates the skin keeping dry, itchy and sensitive skin perfectly balanced.
name: Rose Quartz Age Defence Night Moisturiser 50ml

product_description:
Skin Authority presents the Bright Skin Kit; a comprehensive set to transform dull and lacklustre complexions. Perfectly balancing advanced scientific technologies and nourishing botanical extracts, the products work in synergy to reveal radiant and healthier-looking skin.
Daily Cleanser (177ml)
Harnessing the power of sugar cane-extracted 3% AHA Glycolic Acid, the fragrance free facial wash gently dissolves dirt and impurities without disrupting skins natural pH balance. Ideal for sensitive and delicate skin, it leaves skin feeling clean, refreshed and perfectly prepped for further treatment.
Age-Defying Moisturizer SPF 18 (50ml)
Lightweight and rapidly absorbed, the dual-action daily moisturizer infuses skin with antioxidants, vitamins and hydration for a smoother and more refined complexion. Providing SPF 18 protection, it contains an exclusive AOX Technology™ to combat photo damage and lock in moisture for long lasting results with active ingredients 2% Abovenzone and 7.5% Octinoxate. Skin appears tighter, firmer and more even toned.
Brightening Serum (50ml)
Powered by an Oligopeptide Complex and 10% naturally-derived AHA Glycolic Acid, the lightweight serum gently exfoliates skin to help minimise the look of dark spots and discolouration for a more even and refined skin tone with a renewed radiance.  
Night Revitalizer (50ml)
Working while you sleep, the night cream seeks to soften the look of fine lines and eliminate dullness. Enriched with natural AHA exfoliant 8% Glycolic Acid, it gently polishes the surface layer of skin while infusing skin with essential moisture and vitamins to create a more youthful and glowing complexion.
Super-C Serum (30ml)
Featuring a 20% concentration of L-Ascorbic Acid (Vitamin C) and AOX Technology™, the powerful serum drenches skin with nutrients and antioxidants, stimulating cell renewal and helping to firm and tone skin texture while shielding it from free radical damage. Discolouration and fine lines appear visibly reduced and skin looks clarified and refreshed.  
Vitamin A Cell Renewal (50ml)
Proven to minimise the appearance of wrinkles and discolouration, the lightweight cream contains AOX Technology™ to infuse skin with vitamins and antioxidants. The gentle retinoid formula offers 7% Retinyl Palmitate, which helps to combat blemishes and prevent further scarring, promoting a healthy-looking and balanced complexion.
name: Authority Bright Skin Kit (Worth £385.00)

product_description:
Regularly care for skin with the Age-Adapt® Day Concentrate from SkinPointEight. Designed to deliver an array of hydrating and nourishing benefits, the rich Concentrate supports and boosts the complexion’s natural performance.
Fortified with an effective blend of Adaptogen Botanicals and Chinese Herbs, the potent formula transforms the skin’s appearance. Whilst encouraging microcirculation, it detoxifies and normalises the complexion, which delays the visible signs of ageing and maintains a youthful appearance.
The serum combines Phyto-Hydrating Actives and Plant Collagen, which work harmoniously to provide the face with an essential veil of hydration. The Concentrate also functions as a powerful protectant, defending skin against the damaging effects of environmental stresses.
Under the Concentrate’s care, expect skin in optimum condition.
name: Age-Adapt® Day Concentrate 30ml

product_description:
Lancer Skincare presents the Younger Revealing Mask Intense; an innovative, iron-based face mask treatment that combines an advanced anti-ageing formula with an interactive magnetic removal tool.
The silicone-encapsulated mineral powder mask serves as an ideal delivery method for Hydroxypinacolone Retinoate, which stimulates cell renewal and encourages natural collagen development for firmer, plumper looking skin and enhanced elasticity.
A small, electro-magnetic current is created when the magnet effortlessly removes the mask, resulting in the age-defying active ingredients being left behind to ensure maximum penetration. Skin is left feeling clarified, revitalised and refreshed with the look of fine lines and wrinkles visibly reduced.

Experience next generation anti-ageing with skinChemists Advanced Pro-5 Collagen Ultra-Rich Cream, an innovative cream that utilises bio marine extracts to improve skin's tone and elasticity.
The final step in your Pro-5 Collagen regime, the luxurious formula glides effortlessly across the skin, delivering age-defying benefits; two marine collagen derivatives combine to soften and smooth skin whilst hydrating, improving elasticity and reducing the appearance of wrinkles.
Skin looks plumped up and youthful; 'Suberlift' (a clinically proven ingredient) is harnessed to lift and firm the skin, and 'Proevium' prevents irritation. Skin is protected from external aggressors, retains moisture and looks smoother and younger with improved tone. - K.N.
name: Advanced Pro-5 Collagen Ultra Rich Cream (50ml)

product_description:
使用 MONUSKIN 男士舒适剃须膏，带给肌肤完美舒适的剃须体验。 让肌肤重新恢复活力，长效水润一整天。 富含芦荟、荷荷巴油和黑醋粟籽油等舒缓成分，剃须时不损伤肌肤，收获如丝般光滑的肌肤。
使用说明：涂抹在湿润的胡须上，轻轻按摩，然后顺着毛发生长的方向剃须。- K.R
name: 男士舒适剃须膏 180ml

product_description:
skinChemists COLDTOX Advanced BB  Cream - Medium (30ml) is a classic blemish banishing BB cream which  combines COLDTOX, Glacier Water, Marine Collagen and Snow Algae to help  you achieve a perfect complexion.
The BB cream works to soothe the skin and reduce the visibility of  lines an wrinkles whilst the cooling formula protects, firms and plumps  for younger looking skin. -SA
name: COLDTOX Advanced BB Cream - Medium (30ml)

product_description:
Detoxify your skin while you sleep, and wake up feeling replenished. This SkinChemists Night Detox Serum rejuvenates and provides intense hydration for your skin, with Vitamin E ensuring you are protected from daily wear and tear. The skin will be left feeling softer and purified thanks to the nutritious essential oils contained in the serum. E.N.
Directions for use: massage over the face or wipe with cotton pad before going to bed, then rinse well.
name: Night Detox Serum (30ml)

product_description: Treat your feet to the Magnitone London Well-Heeled Brush Head (Pack of 2). Featuring diamond-tough dermabrasion crystals to buff away dry, hard and rough skin, the brush head delivers a gentle exfoliating action to leave skin soft, smooth and perfectly pampered from heel to toe.
name: Pedi-Buff Brush Head (Pack of 2)

product_description:
Regenerate and repair skin while you sleep with the Advanced Snail Night Moisturiser from skinChemists. Suitable for daily use, the lavish yet lightweight formula is rich in nourishing vitamins, antioxidants and rejuvenating substances that aim to renew damaged tissue and help delay premature ageing.
Enriched with the unique active ingredient Snail Secretion and soothing Allantoin, the concentrated cream aims to combat signs of ageing by helping to reduce visible dark circles and minimising the appearance of fine lines. Creatine helps to stimulate cell renewal and boost moisture levels, whilst Vitamin E works to prevent UV damage. Infused with Coconut Oil to help purify and balance natural pH levels, you can awake to a revived and visibly younger looking complexion.
name: Advanced Snail Night Moisturiser 50ml

product_description:
LIFT + REPAIR™ Correct is formulated with the strength of CPP™ plus six additional proteins and peptides. This transformative Multi-Active Serum helps to reduce the appearance of fine lines, deep wrinkles, sun damage, and uneven skin tone. While promoting skin regeneration it also provides immediate hydration and, with regular use, aids in long-term skin repair at the cellular level.
Along with Cell Protection Proteins®, active ingredients include: Easyliance®, a botanical to firm and strengthen skin layers; Kolleran®, to rebuild skin's own collagen and elastin, plus Vitamins E, B5 and B3 to help protect from UV damage and even skin tone.
name: LIFT + REPAIR Multi Active Serum

product_description:
The Advanced Miracle Formula F Moisturiser from skinChemists is a luxurious moisturiser designed to hydrate and soothe the skin, resulting in a glowing and youthful looking complexion. Rich in the perfume oil Monoi Tahitian, the cream has highly moisturising, soothing and purifying effects.
The moisturiser also boasts anti-ageing qualities. Blended with the natural peptide, Peptamide™ 6 Plus with the power to visibly firm and plump the skin, helping to reduce the appearance of fine lines.
name: Advanced Miracle Formula F Moisturiser 50ml

product_description:
Perfect and purify skin with the Dust Clean Up Protect Cream from Korean beauty brand Mizon.
Working to shield skin from harmful environmental aggressors, the gel-textured face cream infuses skin with a nourishing blend of plant-based extracts including Olive and Jojoba Oils, resulting in a more even, smooth and supple surface texture.
A complex blend of Alpha Hydroxy Acids help unclog pores and gently exfoliate dead skin cells, while moisture-binding ingredients ensure optimum hydration levels. Skin feels refreshed and revitalised with a healthy looking glow.
name: Dust Clean Up Protect Cream 50ml

product_description:
IOMA 抗衰老晚霜 ，带您体验舒适抗老化。这是一款浓厚的修复型保湿霜，富含乳木果油及很多活性成分，可为肌肤补水，使肌肤紧实精致。
内含使肌肤饱满充盈的透明质酸，为肌肤深度补水，保护肌肤免遭自由基的损害。采用来自南极地区的一种糖蛋白Antarcticine，刺激胶原蛋白的合成，对抗细纹和皱纹的形成。 这款保湿霜内含水莲花萃取物，针对皮肤松弛，使肌肤紧致舒爽，能有效缓解拥堵，使肌肤感觉清爽舒适、得到滋养。 早上醒来后，您会发现肌肤更有弹性、皱纹减少，肌肤更致密。 - K.N
name: 抗衰老晚霜30ml

product_description: IOMA 丝滑美体霜 ，配方丰富，可修复肌肤，使整个身体如丝般柔滑舒适。 配方丰富，采用Idealift 生物技术，提高肌肤弹性，刺激细胞更新，发挥长效作用，改善肌肤整体外观。 配方轻盈，可被肌肤快速吸收，内含甜杏仁油和白羽扇豆萃取物，保湿滋润肌肤，避免环境对肌肤的侵害。 使肌肤更亮白，柔软光滑。 EN
name: 丝滑美体霜 150 ml

product_description:
DELAROM 青春紧致提拉面霜采用 IBR-Dormins® 和透明质酸的双重功效，能够顺滑并紧致肌肤，让肌肤呈现更年轻的状态。
这款面霜能够延缓皮肤衰老，防止色斑形成，让您容光焕发。 -SA
name: 青春紧致提拉面霜（50ml）

product_description:
Reignite your skin's natural radiance with Mizon Mela Defense White Capsule Essence, a brightening solution that addresses imperfections on skin, such as hyperpigmentation, dark spots, discolouration and acne.
Infused with a host of brightening and protective ingredients, including Sakura, Vitamins E and C, and Meadowfoam Seed Oil, the refreshing essence brightens and revitalises to promote a healthier, more even-looking skin tone. Targeting unwanted pigmentation, it will leave skin with a fresh appearance whilst intensely moisturising with its dose of Jojoba Oil.
name: Mela Defense White Capsule Essence 50ml

product_description:
Treat all skin types to the Nourish & Energise Vitamin Face Serum from You & Oil. Infused with a cocktail of beneficial ingredients, including Vitamins A, D and E, the silky serum absorbs quickly into skin to replenish and revitalise, whilst Wheat Germ and Sesame Oils restore softness and suppleness. An antioxidant-rich blend of Aloe and Pomegranate Seed Extracts defends against environmental aggressors and the sun's harmful rays to leave your complexion smooth, comfortable and hydrated without greasy residue.
Please Note: Formulated with Squalane that is plant derived.
name: & Oil Vitamin Nourish & Energise Serum for All Skin Types 30ml

product_description:
Dr Botanicals presents the Pomegranate Noir Advanced Natural Hydrating Facial Skin Oil for Men, a hydrating serum bursting with vitamins, minerals and essential oils, ideal for lubricating skin for an extra-close shave.
The main active ingredients of Sweet Almond and Olive Oils help moisturise and soften skin whilst forming a protective barrier, combating free radical damage and environmental aggressors. Starflower Seed Oil adds intense hydration to dry or damaged skin, restoring skin’s natural moisture levels. Suitable for all skin types including sensitive, this natural facial oil seeks to nourish and moisturise as well as help limit irritation and redness caused by shaving.
name: Botanicals Pomegranate Noir Advanced Natural Hydrating Facial Skin Oil For Men 30ml

product_description:
Give skin a little TLC with the IOMA Vitality Sleeping Mask; a powerful, multi-purpose treatment that works while you sleep to pamper and nourish.
Developed through rigorous skincare research, the cream-textured formula melts into skin overnight for optimum reception of benefits. On a daily basis skin is subject to stress, pollutants and free radicals that dull the complexion and lead to the emergence of fine lines – this face mask seeks to reverse the ageing process and stimulate cellular regeneration, fortified with a careful selection of vitamins, polysaccharides and Revitalin®.
Suitable for all skin types, the recharging face mask intensively hydrates and refreshes the epidermal layer, enabling you to awaken to skin that feels soft, supple and revitalised with a healthy looking radiance.
name: Vitality Sleeping Mask 50ml

product_description:
Address all signs of ageing with the Eve Rebirth Botanical Bright & Lift Serum and Bio-Intelligent Wrinkle Filler Cream. Utilising innovative, high-performance ingredients, the firming cream and wrinkle-fighting cream help to maintain a smooth, youthful-looking complexion.
Botanical Bright & Lift Serum (15ml)
A lightweight, quick-absorbing formula that works to improve skin tone and texture without greasy residue. Fortified with Organic Mullein and Olive Leaf Extracts, the innovative, anti-ageing serum provides antioxidant protection to deflect the harmful energy of UV rays, whilst its dose of Hyaluronic Acid delivers firming and plumping properties for a smoother, more refined complexion. Skin is healthy-looking, hydrated and revitalised with revived radiance.
Bio-Intelligent Wrinkle Filler Cream (50ml)
A revolutionary anti-ageing moisturiser that utilises Biointelligent Microingredients to target the source of ageing under the skin. Helping to combat fine lines, wrinkles and age spots, the cream contains dehydrated and cross-linked Hyaluronic Acid microspheres that perform a filling and plumping effect, whilst a combination of Vitamin C and E protect against free radicals and brighten the complexion.
name: Rebirth Botanical Bright & Lift Serum + Bio-Intelligent Wrinkle Filler Cream

product_description:
Combat dulling pollutants and signs of fatigue with the Adam Revolution Oxygen & Hyaluronic Boosting Moisturiser; a luxurious face cream developed exclusively for men with on-the-go or sporty lifestyles.
An advanced Oxygen Complex optimises the efficacy of oxygen levels already within skin tissue fibroblasts, made up of marine-derived bio-technical ingredients that stimulate metabolic activity to energise and refresh skin.
Formulated with ultra-hydrating Hyaluronic Acid and microlipids of stabilised Vitamin C, it helps enhance natural collagen reproduction and fight free radical damage for improved texture and a more even tone. Enriched with essential fatty acids, emollients and adaptive emulsifiers, the moisturiser leaves skin feeling hydrated and revitalised with the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles visibly reduced.
name: Revolution Oxygen & Hyaluronic Boosting Moisturiser

product_description:
Visibly even skin tone with the Moonflower Rose Beige Tinting Fluid from MÁDARA. The fluid conceals imperfections and fine lines, leaving the complexion radiant and more youthful looking. The tinting product acts as a lighter alternative to foundation, offering less coverage.
Infused with Northern Rose Hip extract and natural pigments, the formula moisturises the skin, offering hydration to any dry areas and perfecting the overall appearance.
name: Moon Flower Rose Beige Tinting Fluid 50ml

product_description:
Revitalise tired eyes with the Eve Rebirth Botanical Eye Contour Cream; a powerful, anti-ageing formula developed to restore a bright, supple and hydrated eye area.
Infused with a host of beneficial ingredients, including Mullein Extract, Organic Wheat Bran and Red Grape Peel, the antioxidant-rich formula defends against environmental aggressors and deflects harmful UV rays to create a luminous glow.
Absorbs quickly into skin to combat signs of ageing, whilst delivering firming benefits to reveal a smoother and younger-looking eye contour.
name: Rebirth Botanical Eye Contour Cream

product_description:
Discover superior hydration with the Adam Revolution Repair & Hydrate Luxury Kit; a duo of moisturisers, each with varying skincare benefits. The set is host to an Anti-Ageing moisturiser, which targets premature signs of ageing, whilst the Hyaluronic Boosting moisturiser is ideal for awakening the visage.
Bio-Intelligent Anti-Aging Moisturiser (50ml)
Tackle wrinkles with the Bio-Intelligent Anti-Aging Moisturiser; a ‘smart’ skincare solution specifically developed for men to address dryness and premature signs of ageing. Suitable for all skin types, the advanced formula is fortified with Bio-Intelligent Micro Peptides that actively target areas of skin that need repair, delivering direct treatment for optimum efficacy up to 83% more than other products. The unique addition of Dehydrated Hyaluronic Acid Microspheres effectively fill the appearance of wrinkles and fine lines, while a selection of organic extracts, vitamins and adaptive emulsifiers work in tandem to firm, tone and hydrate. Elasticity levels are boosted with water retention levels enhanced, leaving skin feeling smooth and refined.
Oxygen & Hyaluronic Boosting Moisturiser (50ml)
Combat dulling pollutants and signs of fatigue with the Oxygen & Hyaluronic Boosting Moisturiser; a luxurious face cream developed exclusively for men with on-the-go or sporty lifestyles. An advanced Oxygen Complex optimises the efficacy of oxygen levels already within skin tissue fibroblasts, formulated with marine-derived bio-technical ingredients that stimulate metabolic activity to energise and refresh skin. Formulated with ultra-hydrating Hyaluronic Acid and microlipids of stabilised Vitamin C, it helps enhance natural collagen reproduction and fight free radical damage for improved texture and a more even tone. Enriched with essential fatty acids, emollients and adaptive emulsifiers, the moisturiser leaves skin feeling hydrated and revitalised with the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles visibly reduced.
name: Revolution Repair & Hydrate Luxury Kit

product_description:
Experience a refreshing cleanse with Eve Rebirth Silky Skin Total Cleanser, a face and body wash that gently lifts away impurities whilst moisturising and energising skin.
Infused with a host of botanical extracts, including Echinacea, Achillea, and Calendula, the natural gel cleanser delicately washes away dirt and excess oil to leave skin feeling refreshed and revitalised. Mild surfactants gently cleanse and decongest pores, whilst an Oxygen Complex stimulates energy to promote a brighter, healthier-looking body. Protecting against premature ageing, it delivers firming and nourishing properties, and relieves irritation for comfortably clean skin. Infused with a revitalising scent.
name: Rebirth Silky Skin Total Cleanser

product_description:
Tackle wrinkles with the Adam Revolution Bio-Intelligent Anti-Aging Moisturiser; a ‘smart’ skincare solution specifically developed for men to address dryness and premature signs of ageing.
Suitable for all skin types, the advanced formula is fortified with Bio-Intelligent Micro Peptides that actively target areas of skin that need repair, delivering direct treatment for optimum efficacy up to 83% more than other products.
The unique addition of Dehydrated Hyaluronic Acid Microspheres effectively fill the appearance of wrinkles and fine lines, while a selection of organic extracts, vitamins and adaptive emulsifiers work in tandem to firm, tone and hydrate. Elasticity levels are boosted with water retention levels enhanced, leaving skin feeling smooth and refined.
name: Revolution Bio-Intelligent Anti-Aging Moisturiser

product_description:
利用 NEOM的完美夜间睡眠沐浴油缓解压力，这款奢侈沐浴油富含红花油，可舒缓精神，抚慰睡眠。
该镇静配方结合十九种诱导睡眠的精油，包括薰衣草、甜罗勒和茉莉花，提供强效滋养，以放松精神，让身体为睡眠做好准备。 只需添加到浴缸内，即可体验它的抚慰、治愈香气。
您的精神会感到平静，肌肤获得滋养和滋润。 - K.N.
name: Perfect夜间睡眠沐浴油 (10ml)

product_description:
Replenish the delicate skin at the eye contour with the Christian BRETON SOS Eye Balm; a reparative eye treatment developed to combat the effects of dry skin around the eyes.
Effortlessly smoothing over skin, the silky balm delivers a veil of instant and long-lasting moisture to the eye contour, which replenishes skin’s moisture barrier to eliminate signs of dehydration and fatigue. Once the delicate skin is drenched in hydration, fine lines and wrinkles are visibly reduced.
After use, eyes are refreshed and radiant. Skin feels calm, nourished and repaired.
name: BRETON SOS Eye Balm 8g

product_description:
The Ultimate Neck Cream from French skincare brand Christian BRETON has been specifically developed to treat the delicate neck and décolletage areas, prone to crepiness and uneven textures as we age.
Luxuriously silk-textured, the lightweight, anti-ageing formula melts into skin with exclusive SYN®-HYCAN Technology, which works to repair and re-energise with advanced Tripeptides that stimulate HAH biosynthesis.
As a result, wrinkles and fine lines are visibly reduced, and skin is left with a more smooth, balanced and refined surface texture.
name: BRETON The Ultimate Neck Cream 50ml

product_description:
Smooth the complexion with the Christian BRETON Anti-Wrinkle Facial Mask; a pack of three, anti-ageing sheet masks that fit closely to the contours of the face and rejuvenate skin in just 25 minutes.
The calming masks are soaked in an entire 20ml bottle of serum, which is infused with a potent blend of Collagen and Orchid to deliver anti-ageing benefits. This includes visibly smoothing the visage to reduce the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles, as well as firming and lifting the complexion for a youthful finish.
Cucumber Extract reduces the appearance of enlarged pores, whilst a soothing dose of Chamomile minimises and calms the look of redness. After use, the mask reveals a younger-looking complexion, with skin that is smooth, youthful and radiant.
name: BRETON Anti-Wrinkle Facial Mask 3 x 20ml

product_description:
Reverse visible signs of ageing overnight with the Christian BRETON Repair Sleeping Cream; a rich, powerful treatment that combines anti-ageing actives with plant-derived extracts designed to work in sync with skin’s natural recovery process.
The creamy formula works overnight to smooth the appearance of wrinkles and fine lines, with Matrixyl 3000 and Spilanthes Acmella flower extract enhancing skin density and firmness for a plumping and tightening effect. Awaken to a refreshed and hydrated complexion, renewed with an age-defying radiance.
name: BRETON Repair Sleeping Cream 50ml

product_description:
Remove makeup gently and effectively with the Christian BRETON Hydra Quick Cleanser; a quick-action cleansing milk developed for all skin types.
Effortlessly massaging over the visage, the cleanser is enriched with Flower and Fruit extracts, which work in synergy to eliminate daily dirt, excess oil and impurities from the complexion, whilst ridding skin of makeup. After use, the face feels refreshed, purified and rejuvenated.
name: BRETON Hydra Quick Cleanser 200ml

product_description:
Indulge skin with the Lancôme Absolue Precious Cells Night Mask; an opulent anti-ageing treatment to reveal youthful looking skin come morning.
Based upon a rich blend of Shea Butter and Palm Oil, the velvet-textured formulation is effortlessly applied onto skin with the soft-touch applicator for a luxurious ritual. It quickly melts into skin, infusing essential moisture and nutrients alongside a high concentration of Absolue’s patented Rose Freeze Distillate and Pro-Xylane™ powerhouse, working to create a visible plumping and firming effect.
As a result, skin appears fresher and revitalised, with the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles filled for a truly younger visage and radiant lustre.
name: Absolue Precious Cells Night Mask 75ml

product_description:
Plump up your pout with the Christian BRETON Lip XL; a powerful gel treatment that hydrates, volumises and nourishes.
Powered by a pioneering Swissium complex, the velvet-textured cream glides across the lip with a sheer, pearlescent finish, instantly working to create enhanced definition and a visible plumping effect. Suitable for use day or night, it can be worn alone for a natural looking satin shine, or underneath your favourite lipstick for amplified results.
Lips appear fuller, smoother and plush.
name: BRETON Lip XL 15ml

product_description:
The H<sub>2</sub> Elemental Energy Hydrating Booster Serum is an innovative new treatment from Perricone MD, developed to treat extreme dryness and dehydration.
It’s powered by the exclusive H<sub>2</sub> Energy Complex™, which harnesses Hydrogen, the smallest molecule in the universe, to deliver deep penetrating hydration to the surface layers of skin for 24 hour results.
The fluid, ultra-lightweight formula glides across skin and rapidly absorbs without feeling sticky or heavy, ideal for layering with further skincare products in the H2 line for maximum efficacy. Expect a refined and more even complexion, with a renewed radiance and optimum moisture levels.
name: MD H2 Elemental Energy Hydrating Booster Serum 30ml

product_description:
The Christian BRETON Diamond Pure Luxury Serum is a sumptuous beauty treatment with extraordinary anti-ageing capabilities to replenish moisture levels and visibly smooth premature signs of ageing.
The concentrated formula rapidly infuses skin with hydration and nourishment, harnessing extracts of Caviar and Collagen to deliver a firming and lifting effect while restoring the lipid barrier for long lasting results.
Pure particles of rare, powdered Diamond gently exfoliate the surface layer for enhanced efficiency and impart an instant radiance. Suitable for all skin types, the serum leaves the complexion looking smoother and more refined complexion with an ageless vitality and glow.
name: BRETON Diamond Pure Luxury Serum 30ml

product_description: Remove makeup and impurities with the Micellar Oil-Infused Wipes from Garnier. Ideal for ultra-efficient one step cleansing, the gentle wipes are soaked with clarifying Micellar Water and Essential Oils that work together like a magnet to capture dirt and impurities. Even waterproof makeup is effortlessly dissolved without the need to scrub or rinse. Ideal for dry and sensitive skin types, skin is cleansed, soothed and refreshed.
name: Micellar Oil-Infused Wipes

product_description:
Improve the appearance of your skin with the First Aid Beauty Coconut Skin Smoothie Priming Moisturizer, a 2-in-1 skin hydrator that intensely moisturises skin whilst perfecting the look of pores and blemishes.
Combining the benefits of makeup and skincare, the oil-free moisturiser intensely nourishes whilst brightening and smoothing skin. Its host of protein-rich superfoods, including Quinoa and Coconut Water, repair, fortify and revitalise, and light-reflecting micro-pearls inspire a dewy glow. Rich in minerals, it will visibly blur the appearance of pores and imperfections for smoother-looking skin, and its priming properties lock makeup in place for long-lasting wear. Skin is quenched, radiant and perfected. Can be worn alone or beneath makeup.
name: Aid Beauty Coconut Skin Smoothie Priming Moisturizer

product_description:
Replenish skin with the Christian BRETON Night Recovery Cream; a rich, soothing treatment that utilises advanced scientific research with luxurious, natural extracts to nourish, hydrate and repair.
Developed to act overnight while skin is at its most receptive, the moisturising formula envelopes skin with a host of antioxidants and vitamins, working to combat signs of ageing and fatigue while neutralizing free radical damage and environmental aggressors.
A Matrixyl® and 7-DHC® complex effectively improves elasticity levels to enhance firmness, smoothing the appearance of wrinkles for a visibly younger looking visage.
name: BRETON Night Recovery Cream 50ml

product_description:
Tackle stubborn eyeliner and waterproof mascara with the Christian BRETON Clear Eyes Make Up Remover.
Lightweight and oil-free, the gentle formula efficiently dissolves all traces of eye makeup, with soothing extract of Cornflower helping to alleviate the look of any redness and. Ideal for delicate and sensitive skin, the cleanser leaves the eye area feeling soft and comfortable. Store in the fridge for instant refreshment.
name: BRETON Clear Eyes Make Up Remover 200ml

product_description:
通过Sarah Chapman的Skinesis Morning Facial唤醒和护理肌肤，这款屡获殊荣的配方，旨在改善肌肤水分和光泽，令肌肤焕发青春光彩。
完美适合那些缺乏营养、承受压力或衰老肌肤，该富含维生素的精油结合强大的活性和抗衰老成分，促进胶原蛋白产生，令缺乏光泽的肌肤丰盈水嫩，并增强肌肤硬度和弹性。 它的易吸收质地融入肌肤，可防御光损伤、紫外线诱发的损伤和日常环境侵害因素，同时调节皮脂分泌，保持肌肤光泽并控制皮炎。
肌肤将容光焕发，散发健康光泽，而无油光残留。 肌肤将焕发青春、丰盈水嫩、光滑细腻。 通过该青春焕发配方体验全天面部护理功效。 散发茉莉和橙花油的活力焕发香气。
name: Chapman Skinesis Morning Facial (15ml)

product_description:
men-ü 的健康潔面乳適合剃須前或剃須後使用。獨特的無皂配方可深度清潔肌膚，並包含強效成分，包括防腐茶樹精油，可保護肌膚避免粉刺和剃須皮疹。舒緩的金縷梅可癒合肌膚並控制出油，尤其是T 區部位，而蘆薈和維生素B5 可滋潤肌膚，令肌膚水潤健康。方便的按壓瓶設計可簡化使用，適合緊湊式儲存。 EN 
 使用說明：將洗面乳擠到濕潤的手上，在濕潤的臉上按摩起泡。徹底清洗，並輕輕拍幹。
name: 健康洗面乳 100ml

product_description: 使用 Elemis Pro-Radiance Illuminating Eye Balm，亮白娇嫩的眼部区域并赋予其活力。 这款轻盈眼霜采用抗疲劳成分研制而成，减少细纹和黑眼圈，呈现清爽亮泽的双眸。其光度复合成分可恢复和滋养眼周区域，实现均匀的青春肤色。采用可挤压软管包装，配有球形封头，便于涂抹。 E.N.
name: Pro-Radiance Illuminating Eye Balm (10ml)

product_description:
KORRES 高丝野玫瑰亮泽维 C 面膜（16 毫升）让您的肌肤焕发出亮丽剔透的光泽。 这款面膜适用于所有类型的肌肤，它蕴含有丰富的野玫瑰精油，它是一种天然维他命 C， 有助于修复肌肤，淡化细纹和色斑。 同时，其特殊的草本植物萃取物可有针对性地改善肤色，让您的肌肤看起来更亮丽、更有光泽。
首次使用，您可感觉到肌肤的明显改变，因为这款面膜可瞬间让肌肤变得更年轻而有光泽。 使用说明：
name: C 面膜（16 毫升）

product_description:
Transform the complexion whilst most receptive to repair with the Elemis Peptide4 Night Recovery Cream-Oil; a luxurious formula that combines the hydration of a cream with the protective benefits of an oil.
Encouraging skin renewal, the night treatment utilises Elemis’ Tetra-Peptide, which supports skin’s natural circadian rhythm and therefore boosts repair during sleep. Perilla Seed and Night Scented Stock Oils work in synergy to ensure the complexion is balanced and restored to allow you to wake to a healthy and radiant visage. Expect intense replenishment.
name: Peptide4 Night Recovery Cream-Oil 30ml

product_description:
用丹尼斯·格罗斯博士阿尔法贝塔日常 Face 去角质霜（60包）减少皱纹和粗大毛孔的出现。 这款产品富含专利的两步系统，结合了 5  种α-β 羟基酸和Retinol、泛醌、白藜芦醇及多种抗氧化剂、维生素和舒缓性植物，可通过微磨砂令肌肤变得光滑、营养丰富，绽放出年轻的光彩。
暗疮、黑斑、毛孔粗大、皮肤发红和衰老的迹象就会大大减少，让您的肌肤看起来更洁净、肤色更均匀。 这款易用去角质霜适合所有肌肤类型，甚至是最敏感的肤色，您可以在自己舒适的家里取得专业品质的效果。 - L.M.

使用说明：
name: Face 去角质霜（60包）

product_description:
使用AcnEase Mild Acne Treatment - 3 Bottles，让您的皮肤不受痤疮的困扰。 非常适合那些少许皮肤问题或身体患有痤疮者使用，这款产品将有助于避免痤疮的重复出现。
本款产品的成分完全采用草本精华，可以恢复因内分泌失调、环境、压力、药物治疗和饮食而遭到破坏的体内平衡，从而从根本上解决痤疮和皮肤问题（例如玫瑰红斑）。  绝对安全且无副作用， 非常适合女性青少年及成年人用以清洁皮肤。  
产品概述：AcnEase®是最有效的Botanical Therapeutic®（植物性治疗产品），可治疗已经形成的痤疮，防止新的粉刺和青春痘形成。此外，按照推荐方法使用后，AcnEase®所含的各种成分会让您的肌肤更清爽和更健康，同时能够去黑头和白头，并能消除红肿的症状。
AcnEase®可以恢复因为内分泌失调、环境因素、某些药物的使用、神经紧张、压力过度和饮食习惯而打乱了的天然内部平衡。痤疮其实是内部失调的外部体现。 AcnEase®的独特之处在于，它不仅可以治疗疾病的外部症状，同时还能解决痤疮和其他皮肤问题的根本问题（例如导致玫瑰红斑形成的身体内部原因）。 AcnEase非常适合有以下症状的人使用：青春痘、荷尔蒙分泌失调型痤疮、更年期痤疮（女性）、慢性粉刺、因辛辣和油腻的食物而症状加重的痤疮、吸烟、压力、喝酒或使用其他药物而出现的痤疮、面部和身体上出现的痤疮以及囊肿性痤疮。
name: Mild Acne Treatment - 3 Bottles

product_description:
Balance the skin’s pH with the Mizon AHA and BHA Daily Clean Toner; a two in-one toner and exfoliant. Ideal for oily and blemish prone skin types.
Utilising a purifying blend of Plant Extracts including Papaya and Portulaca, the toner offers a superior cleanse, ridding skin of dirt, oil and impurities. The peeling formula is fortified with AHA and BHA’s, which effectively exfoliate the face, eliminate dead skin cells from the surface of the skin and unclog pores.
Expect a smooth and soothed complexion that is clear and even.
name: AHA and BHA Daily Clean Toner 150ml

product_description:
利用OSKIA微粒去角质膏恢复疲惫的肌肤细胞，展现白皙亮丽、容光焕发的肌肤。 具有滋补和增强肌肤健康成分，它可以让您神采奕奕。
OSKIA微粒去角质膏是一种细腻霜膏去角质配方，它经过精心研制，不但可以让您远离疲惫的肌肤细胞及杂质，而且可滋润脂质屏障，让您的肌肤柔软顺滑，焕发光彩，充满健康活力。 富含该品牌的标志性成分MSM，以及益生元、欧米茄3、6和9和甜杏仁油，这款霜膏可修复和再生表皮。
使用说明：

Experience a luxurious, spa-inspired exfoliating ritual with the Natural Spa Factory Pearl and Gold Facial Polish; a skin-refining formula that works to clarify and refresh your complexion.
Infused with Pearl particles, the radiance-reviving polish gently buffs away dead, dull skin cells, whilst antioxidant-rich Grape Leaf Extract helps to minimise the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles. Expect a smoother, younger-looking complexion with restored luminosity.
name: Spa Factory Pearl and Gold Facial Polish

product_description:
Visibly refine pores with the NIOD Mastic Must Mask; a transparent face masque that targets impurities and enlarged pores. Transforming skin in just ten minutes, the pH balanced mask is effortless to apply and rinses away quickly and easily.
Utilising highly-densified Sap from Greek Mastic Trees (a dense gum that binds to congestion), the rich mask purifies and visibly reduces the size of pores, without stripping skin of essential moisture. Both anti-bacterial and anti-fungal, the potent sap is sustainably sourced and boasts an extremely high purity.
Working tirelessly for ten minutes, the mask reveals healthy skin with less and visibly smaller pores. Suitable for all skin types.
name: Mastic Must Mask 90ml

product_description:
Transform a dry, red and irritated complexion into soft, supple and smooth skin thanks to the Elizabeth Arden Eight Hour Day & Night Set. The set ensures that your skin will remain hydrated throughout the day whilst the night cream works to soothe the skin as you sleep. The duo nourishes and protects the skin from environmental aggressors, guaranteeing that you will always look your best from day to night.
Eight Hour Cream Intensive Daily Moisturiser for Face SPF 15 50ml:
This daily hydrating lotion leaves skin feeling soft, smooth and moisturised for up to 8 hours. This Eight Hour Daily Moisturiser with SPF15 from Elizabeth Arden is formulated with the perfect blend and aroma of the classic Eight Hour Cream, it even protects skin from the effects of extreme weather and climate changes while SPF15 shields all skin types from the harmful effects of the sun.
Eight Hour Skin Protectant Night Time Miracle Moisturizer 50ml:
An intensely hydrating option that ensures you most certainly do get your beauty sleep, the Eight Hour Skin Protectant Night Time Miracle Moisturiser from Elizabeth Arden is perfect for use in the evenings if it's soft and supple skin you want to wake up to. Inspired by the original, award-winning formula with a lightweight update that is great for overnight use, this soothing cream is also formulated with lavender to relax and soothe the sense and is designed to deeply moisturise, protect and soothe dry skin throughout the night.
name: Arden Eight Hour Day & Night Essential Kit (Worth £62.00)

product_description:
LieracLiftissime营养倍润重塑面霜，是一款令人舒适的保湿霜，致力于重塑面部轮廓，同时滋润干燥皮肤和极干燥的皮肤。
本产品是该品牌抗衰老系列的一种，可作为日霜和晚霜使用。内含细胞合成物及玻尿酸，提升肌肤功效，修复肌肤使之再平衡、减少可见皱纹。
为橙色色调，熔融质地。内含牛油果油和可可豆脂，使肌肤舒适光滑、柔软细腻。  您将拥有超滋润的肌肤、脸部轮廓得到重塑。
name: Liftissime营养丰富的轮廓重塑面霜50ml

product_description:
Improve the look of your skin with ALGENIST Regenerative Anti-Ageing Moisturiser, a nourishing formula that works to minimise the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles whilst replenishing essential moisture.
Luxurious and nourishing, the moisturiser visibly restores radiance and smoothens skin's texture to leave it with a youthful, supple touch. Infused with Alguronic Acid (a patented compound that helps reduce the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles) Vitamin C and Apple Stem Cell extract, it delivers advanced anti-ageing properties, addressing imperfections and diminishing lines and wrinkles for a younger, hydrated and smoother-looking complexion.
Free from parabens, sulphates, phthalates and synthetic dyes.
name: Regenerative Anti-Ageing Moisturiser 60ml

product_description:
這是一款美容補充劑，有助於保持肌膚光滑緊緻，能使眼睛潤滑，關節靈活。本品具有香濃的生薑風味，男女皆可服用。這款透明質酸補充劑每2 湯匙中含130mg 植物親和型透明質酸。不添加人工染料和人工香精。採用天然木糖醇，使口感微甜，並且有益於口腔健康。 - LM 
 使用說明： 
 警告：
name: 透明质酸 (240ml)

product_description:
Omorovicza溫和潔面乳可有效卸妝及去除皮膚雜質，溫和潔面。含有豐富的礦物質和天然水果、植物提取物，溫和去角質，使用後讓您的肌膚柔軟舒適，膚色光滑明亮。
Omorovicza溫和潔面乳含有細微顆粒礦物矽藻土，能溫和去角質，輕柔地去除肌膚表層的污垢和油脂，改善面部毛孔粗大問題。菠蘿酵素和迷迭香提取物清潔和滋養皮膚，去除毒素和老廢角質細胞，恢復肌膚的柔軟光澤。
均勻塗抹於全臉並用打圈的方式按摩，重點按摩額頭，鼻子，臉頰和下巴。之後用清水徹底沖洗。乾性皮膚每週使用2-3次，敏感性皮膚每週使用１次。
