Experience a refreshing and moisturising cleanse with the yes to Coconut Cleansing Wipes, a pack of versatile wipes that work to cleanse and nourish the face, body and hands.
Safe to use from head to toe, the cleansing wipes are infused with Coconut Water and Kukui Nut extract to gently swipe away dirt and makeup, and are clinically proven to relieve dry skin. Sealing in moisture to keep skin soft and comfortable, the wipes will leave you feeling refreshed and purified from top to bottom.
name: to Coconut Cleansing Wipes (Pack of 30)

product_description:
Refresh and refine your complexion with the Caudalie Deep Cleansing Exfoliator; a purifying formula that works to cleanse and clarify skin without over-drying or uncomfortable tightness.
Harnessing the powers of natural Corn Beads, the exfoliating cream expertly eliminates excess oil, dead skin cells and impurities, whilst a revitalising blend of Menthol and Grape Pulp leave skin soft, smooth and moisturised. Expect a clear, healthy-looking complexion with renewed radiance and an uplifting aroma of Grapefruit, Mint and Sweet Orange.
name: Deep Cleansing Exfoliator 75ml

product_description:
拥有新一代配方的Lierac豪华型护肤油，可护理肌肤、对抗皮肤衰老迹象如：深皱纹、皮肤松弛、瑕疵、无光泽等。

本产品不油腻，内含稀有黑花提取物、珍贵油脂、独特的SIRT6助推合成物等，可轻松溶入肌肤、修复肌肤表层、使肌肤紧致；同时可对抗皮肤老化现象。 采用微乳液技术，使其质地如丝缎般柔滑，可深度滋养肌肤。同时可巧妙地减少皱纹、皮肤松弛及瑕疵等。 改善肌肤均匀度，恢复肌肤自然光采。

不含刺激粉刺成分， 不堵塞毛孔。
name: Premium Elixir 豪华型护肤油 30ml

product_description:
歐緹麗白藜蘆醇緊緻提拉精華重塑年輕肌膚， 加強的品牌革新白藜蘆醇成分結合玻尿酸，無油呵護使肌膚提拉緊緻，更順滑細膩。適合所有類型的肌膚，其中的滋養補水成分結合縮氨酸，刺膠原蛋白重生，使肌膚更緊緻，您可以看到肌膚重新煥發光彩，線條更緊實。 EN 
 不含對苯醌,硫酸鹽和鄰苯二甲酸鹽。不含有刺激粉刺成分。 .

Revive and transform your skin with ALGENIST Targeted Deep Wrinkle Minimizer, a concentrated gel formula that delivers advanced anti-ageing properties to promote smoother, flawless-looking skin.
The ideal primer for makeup application, the treatment instantly smoothens the appearance of wrinkles and fine lines, allowing makeup to glide on effortlessly with flawless results. Utilising Alguronic Acid Filling Spheres that swell on contact with skin, the gel camouflages fine lines and other imperfections, and will minimise the severity of deep wrinkles with continued use. Soy Protein, Echinacea and an active Peptide complex complete the formula to deliver unrivalled anti-ageing results.
Skin looks smoother and younger with improved texture.
name: Targeted Deep Wrinkle Minimizer 15ml

product_description:
使用Sukin 保濕修護晚霜，為皮膚搭建起水分平衡保護屏障。這款面霜富含玫瑰果、月見草和琉璃苣油，可增加皮膚彈性。 
 Sukin 認為，皮膚和頭髮護理產品的最強大、有效的成分來自大自然。注重環保意識的Sukin 是一家來自澳大利亞的天然個人護理品公司。 
 “Skincare that doesn't cost the earth™”（護膚不以損耗地球為代價）— Sukin 的承諾遠遠超出了化妝品。這是一家100% 認證的碳平衡公司，旨在減少其業務對於脆弱環境的影響。 -SA
name: 保湿修护晚霜 (120ml)

product_description: 为敏感肌肤设计的防晒霜，防水且不含香精。 Ultrasun's 50+ SPF Face Spray 是一款易吸收的轻盈喷雾，内含的抗氧化剂能够减轻衰老迹象并减少皱纹，同时恢复肌肤的天然水润。 E.N.
name: 50+ SPF Face (50ml)

product_description:
KORRES"Wild Rose高级亮白护脸油 ，可提升肤色，令肌肤重新焕发自然光采。具有舒适性、使肤色更均匀、更健康亮泽。
可被皮肤快速吸收、不油腻；内含必需脂肪酸和有效的抗氧化剂等成分，令肌肤瞬间滋润柔软。 本品含包括高浓度维生素C的野玫瑰等成分，令肌肤亮白、肤色均匀，可减少肌肤细纹。 可修复肌肤，令肌肤更光滑、更年轻。
 适合所有皮肤类型。 适合素食者和纯素食者。
name: Wild Rose高级亮白护脸油

product_description:
本品可美白眼部肌肤。内含玫瑰、薰衣草、含羞草、矢车菊、山茶花萃取物等成分。令肌肤紧致细密，可最大程度地减少黑眼圈。 Elemis纯粹眼膜，令双眼重新焕发活力。
其护理细致，可增强眼部组织功能、促进细胞更新、提高眼部肌肤色调。  该眼膜可对抗眼部无光泽现象、滋润眼部肌肤，令双眼传神动人、清澈明亮。
Lookfantastic 提示：您可能会感觉到轻微的刺痛感。
使用说明：

利用来自Sarah Chapman的 Skinesis Skin Insurance SPF 30 恢复青春肌肤。 利用光散射LipoLight®成分和抗氧化大叶醉鱼草植物配制而成，该护肤产品可防御UVA、UVB、热量和红外辐射，以恢复肌肤损伤，提高弹性。
Smart光散射粉与光学遮掩技术相结合，以减少色素沉着和色斑，获得肤色均匀、美白靓丽、焕发光彩的肌肤。 高级干细胞活性复合物可以防止出现皱纹和肌肤松弛，让您获得更紧致、光滑的肌肤。 E.N.
name: Chapman Skinesis Skin Insurance SPF 30 (30ml)

product_description:
慕拉大包裝隔離C 精華潔面乳富含抗氧劑，可鎮靜和舒緩皮膚，同時保持清潔。植物提取物的清新香味和維生素C 的中和作用讓您和您的肌膚感覺重獲新生。 
修護從這裡開始。植物提取物的清新香味和維生素C 的中和作用讓您和您的肌膚感覺重獲新生。 
使用說明：
name: 慕拉抵御外界维他命 C 洁面乳 (200ml)

product_description:
Trilogy 活力润肤乳质地轻盈，快速吸收，适用于所有肌肤类型，瞬间注入营养和水分，促进健康肌肤新生，帮助减少衰老的迹象。
适合大多数皮肤类型，这款超滋润的 Trilogy 活力润肤乳能够深层滋润并保护肌肤。 混合了12种最有益的天然植物活性成分，包括玫瑰、月见草和橙花，这款轻质润肤霜是 Trilogy 最热的一款日常润肤霜。
使用说明：
name: 活力润肤乳 - 瓶装（60g）

product_description: Treat and transform skin with the FOREO LUNA™ play , an ultra-portable facial-cleansing device designed to provide a professional standard of skincare with its invigorating one-minute ritual. Perfect for all skin types, the facial brush inspires healthier-looking skin; helping to clear and clarify for a more luminous complexion. The perfect introductory product for FOREO beginners, the travel-sized device is the smallest in the range, and requires just one full charge for up to 100 uses*. Combining T-Sonic™ Pulsation Technology from the LUNA™ mini 2 with FOREO'S signature, non-porous silicone touch-points, the device gently yet effectively cleanses and exfoliates with a single intensity, dual-zone range; its thicker touch points at the top perform an intense clean to help unclog pores and lift away dirt, oil and dead skin, whilst softer, thinner points at the bottom gently cleanse sensitive or normal skin, and larger areas such as the cheeks. Flexible and easy to use, the silicone ' bristles' are ultra-hygienic and resist bacteria build-up to keep skin fresh and clean. Easy to operate and super-portable, the device combines the high-tech power of the LUNA™ range with the ease of a single intensity. Experience simple cleansing without the need to recharge. Skin appears bright, refined and more even in tone. 100% waterproof, the device is safe for use in the bath or shower. T-Sonic™ pulsation technology (8,000 T-Sonic™ pulsations per minute) will remove 99.5% of dirt and oil (based on clinical trials) plus makeup residue. 產品特徵 : 非可再充電電池：高達 100 次使用壽命。 1 脈衝密度。 超衛生。 完全防水。 適合所有肌膚類型。 旅遊友好的大小 -   化妝棉同樣大小。 * 改裝置每天使用兩次可使用 1-2 個月。
name: Play - 暗黑

product_description: Designed to replenish and rejuvenate stressed and tired skin, the MONU Recovery Balm works to give immediate results. Containing pure ingredients which work together to hydrate, firm and nourish skin in need of some TLC, this balm is a must have addition to your skin care regime.
name: Recovery Balm (50ml)

product_description:
Achieve a natural-looking, sun-kissed glow with the Fabulous Self Tanning Tinted Lotion from Vita Liberata. Ideal for dry, mature and sensitive skin types, its lightweight formula glides effortlessly onto the body for a sheer, streak-free finish, whilst delivering instant colour to guide application.
Containing Odour Remove™ technology to eliminate the unpleasant fake tan smell, the fast-drying lotion is infused with certified organic botanicals and Moisture Lock™ for a tan that fades slowly and evenly. A dose of East African Marula Oil provides anti-ageing benefits and long-lasting hydration so you can experience deeply conditioned, radiant skin that develops over 4-8 hours.
name: Liberata Fabulous Self Tanning Tinted Lotion Medium 100ml

product_description:
用Elizabeth Arden Visible Difference Skin Balancing柔肤水 SPF15 保持肌肤的天然水分含量，令肌肤健康、平衡。 这款无油的柔肤水可镇静、护理和保护肌肤。
用Elizabeth Arden Visible Difference Skin Balancing 柔肤水提亮肤色和提升肌肤的纯净度。 α/β羟基化合物可以提升肌肤的质感和纯净度，而表皮中自然发现的透明质酸钠可以润滑肌肤，将水分吸引到肌肤。 Exclusive 的油酸酯可以温和地紧致肌肤、改善晒伤的外观，令肌肤光滑。 Skin更亮泽、更湿润，并受到保护，免受自由基的伤害。
使用说明：
name: Arden Visible Difference Skin Balancing 柔肤水SPF15 (49.5ml)

product_description:
使用Magnitone 敏感性肌膚清潔刷帶親膚刷毛（一套2 件），確保Magnitone 設備始終保持最佳工作狀態。刷頭可深層清潔毛孔中的污垢和雜質，同時幫助減輕脫毛後比基尼部位的刺激，是敏感性肌膚的理想選擇。親膚刷質地柔軟，呵護肌膚，非常適合用於脆弱和敏感肌膚區。可與Magnitone Pulsar 和Magnitone Lucid 潔顏產品搭配使用。 - LM 
 使用說明：在舊刷頭磨損後，將刷頭裝入Magnitone中。
name: London 敏感性肌肤清洁刷带亲肤刷毛（一套 2 件）

product_description:
Rejuvenate tired peepers with the Filorga Optim-Eyes Patch; a revitalising, triple-action treatment that works to combat dark circles, puffiness and wrinkles around the delicate eye area.
Powered by Witch Hazel and Cornflower, the textured patches help to decongest and eliminate eye bags, whilst a polysaccharide-rich active ingredient stimulates the blood capillary network to restore youthful luminosity. A black carrageenan gel minimises the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles to reveal smoother, more refined eye contour.
name: Optim-Eyes Patch (8 Pairs)

product_description:
Create supple and radiant looking skin with l'etoile infinie Enhancing Face Oil from ARgENTUM. The powerful elixir is designed for use as a protective, hydrating oil and can be used alone or applied to enhance la potion infinie.
The super light oil works as an anti-ageing formula for the face. Boasting antioxidant properties, the oil protects the skin’s elasticity whilst thoroughly nourishing. The enhancing treatment also aims to balance natural oil production, visibly unifying the complexion and leaving skin youthful and luminous.
name: l'etoile infinie Enhancing Face Oil 30ml

product_description:
Antipodes Hosanna 深層補水抗敏鎮靜精華液(30ml) 是一款經科學證明可促使膠原蛋白產生量提高達72％ 的護膚產品，可讓肌膚更顯閃亮、更加健康。配方中含有抗氧化劑和促使肌膚再生的成分，以及Vinanza 葡萄和瑪瑪庫黑蕨精華，為健康的細胞新陳代謝提供能量，保護肌膚免受自由基的侵害，並確保長久保濕。玫瑰和小荳蔻的怡人香氣，為您的感官和肌膚帶來雙重享受。 - KR 
 使用說明： 
 - 潔面後，塗抹於臉部、頸部和胸口處。
name: Hosanna 深层补水抗敏镇静精华液 (30ml)

product_description:
使用 Sarah Chapman 祛斑亮白细致精华液可让肤色更均匀细腻，有效防止肌肤的未来损伤。 非常适合色素沉着和色斑，让肌肤看起来更清爽均匀，荣光焕发。
Sarah Chapman 祛斑亮白细致精华液含有植物亮白精华，对紫外线晒伤、刺激性的肌肤护理和损伤有作用，还可淡化色斑和变色。 这款祛斑精华含有四种亮白精华，祛斑效果显著。 抗氧化剂和维他命 C 可精确祛除暗斑，增强肌肤的自然防护能力，促进胶原蛋白的形成，让肌肤更清爽剔透。
使用说明：
name: Chapman 祛斑亮白细致精华液（30 毫升）

product_description:
Bulldog's Travel Tin includes three of the brand's favourite products to cleanse, renew and hydrate skin. Made in the UK and housed in a branded tin, the trio is sure to leave you looking and feeling like a new man wherever you are.
Original Moisturiser (30ml)
Intensively nourish and condition your skin, without making it feel greasy or oily. Specially designed to care for male skin, the fast-absorbing cream is enriched with an expert blend of eight essential oils, green tea, green algae, konjac mannan and vitamin E to provide intensive hydration and protection. Ideal for use after shaving, it soothes skin, leaving it with a soft, smooth and supple texture.
Original Face Wash (30ml)
Infused with a unique blend of eight essential oils, the award-winning face wash delivers a refreshing fragrance of bergamot, lemon and lime layered over base notes of cedarwood and vetiver. Enriched with antioxidant green tea to gently remove excess oil, dirt and grime from your skin, leaving you feeling rejuvenated and ready to face the day.
Original Shave Gel (30ml)
Achieve a close, comfortable shave every time. Infused wth eight essential oils, including aloe vera, jojoba and konjac mannan (a plant grown in China, Japan and Korea), the lightweight gel softens the face to prepare for a smoother shave, allowing the razor to glide over skin and preventing razor burn and nicks. Hydrates skin and minimises dryness caused by shaving.
name: Men's Travel Tin

product_description:
Burt’s Bees 小蜜蜂的这款活肤保湿纯天然红石榴护唇膏蕴含有抗氧化剂红石榴精华油，它因其保护功能而深受青睐。 其活肤滋养和修复功能可让您的双唇看起来更加健康光滑。
Burt’s Bees 小蜜蜂红石榴护唇膏内置于一个可随身携带的便携管中，确保使您的双唇一直处于保护状态，免受环境侵害因素的损伤，使其整天整夜都保持诱人亲吻的颜色。 使用这款营养丰富的粉色唇膏涂抹您的双唇，使其更加光滑，色彩更加均匀。
使用说明：
name: Bees 小蜜蜂红石榴护唇膏

product_description:
借助强化滋养 SOS 拯救干燥的肌肤。 这款纯天然 DECLÉOR 思妍丽香薰高度防晒面部修复霜可有效作用于肌肤，能舒缓和修复接触过阳光的肌肤。
这款纯天然 DECLÉOR 思妍丽香薰高度防晒面部修复霜可有效作用于肌肤，能舒缓和修复接触过阳光的肌肤。 所蕴含的摩洛哥坚果油、荷荷巴油、鳄梨油和乳油木果脂可滋养和修复肌肤，有助于维持肌肤的亮泽度，持久享有日晒肤色。 天竺葵精油和乳香有助于减轻肌肤衰老的迹象，与这些滋养植物萃取物完美结合，可有效滋养、焕活和强化肌肤，为一整天的接触阳光做好准备。
使用说明：
name: 思妍丽香薰高度防晒修复霜——面部（15ml）

product_description:
Treat your complexion to the REN Flash Hydro-Boost Instant Plumping Emulsion; an ultra-hydrating formula that works to replenish thirsty, wanting skin.
Enriched with Hyaluronic Acid and Sugar-derived Xylitol, the fast-absorbing treatment locks in moisture and delivers a plumping effect, whilst helping to minimise the appearance of fine lines and dehydration lines for smoother, younger-looking skin. Protects against water loss to leave your complexion radiant and renewed.
name: Flash Hydro-Boost Instant Plumping Emulsion (40ml)

product_description:
歐緹麗葡萄籽尊貴時光逆轉眼霜專為最脆弱的眼部肌膚設計。這款奢華眼霜的配方中加入三種歐緹麗高品質抗老專利成分，可緩解黑眼圈，撫平皺紋、眼袋，消除暗沉，讓眼部重現年輕光彩。 
銀色、銅色亮彩成分迅速淡化黑眼圈，提亮膚色，令雙眸明亮，神采熠熠。 
 使用說明：  手指上取少量眼霜，從內眼角向外塗抹。沿眼部輕輕塗抹，按摩至太陽穴和上眼皮。
name: 欧缇丽葡萄籽尊贵时光逆转眼霜 15ml

product_description:
Restore luminous, youthful-looking peepers with the Balance Me Wonder Eye Cream; a skin-brightening formula that works to reduce puffiness, dark spots and protect against premature ageing.
Infused with refreshing Cucumber Oil, the fast-absorbing cream helps to banish signs of fatigue, whilst Hyaluronic Acid and Virgin Coconut Oil deliver intense hydration and combat dryness. Its dose of Arctic Cloudberry plumps and smoothens the appearance of fine lines and crow's feet for a soothed, lifted and radiant eye area.
name: Me Wonder Eye Cream 15ml

product_description:
奢华面膜，适合每周使用，焕活肌肤，打造健康亮白美肌，同时有效对抗岁月痕迹。适合所有肌肤类型。
蕴含认证有机玫瑰果油和芝麻油，将维生素和抗氧化成分直接输送到您的肌肤，激发肌肤活力。 添加的木瓜和芦荟舒缓、清新和滋润肌肤，焕发您的年轻活力。
使用说明：
name: Ageless Hydrating Mask (100g)

product_description:
Sukin 敏感型清潔乳溫和去除化妝品和污垢，同時舒緩皮膚潮紅和刺激，是脆弱肌膚的最佳選擇。配方具有鎮靜的功效，選用了黃瓜、蘆薈、純玫瑰果油、荷荷巴和鱷梨作為配料，這款保濕清潔乳液能讓你的肌膚柔軟豐盈，乾淨清潔。 - LM 
 使用說明：
name: 敏感型清洁乳 (125ml)

product_description: Purify skin with the yes to Tomatoes Detoxifying Charcoal Facial Wipes. Harnessing the powers of Charcoal and antioxidant-rich Tomato, the black face wipes deeply cleanse skin, working to unclog pores and eliminate dirt, makeup and impurities that can cause acne and dullness. Ideal for oily and combination skin types, the non-greasy wipes leave skin feeling clean, revitalised and fresh with a clarified tone.
name: to Tomatoes Detoxifying Charcoal Facial Wipes

product_description:
使用 First Aid Beauty Vitamin Hydrating Mist 改观疲倦、暗沉肌肤。这是一款旨在恢复水化与活力的喷雾，实现容光焕发的肤色。 其富含维生素的配方适用于所有肌肤类型（包括最敏感的肤质），为肌肤补水并恢复活力。
这款喷雾含有品牌抗氧化剂增强剂，保护肌肤免受环境侵害并缓和肌肤刺激，可用作活力恢复或化妆定型喷雾。 富含维生素 B5，提供充足的水分，令肌肤恢复健康状态。 E.N.
name: Aid Beauty Vitamin Hydrating Mist (59ml)

product_description:
LieracLiftissime强力修整精华液，是一种抗衰老精华液，可在短短30秒内提升肌肤3D效果。
其创新型的配方中含高浓度的细胞结合体和玻尿酸，可重塑面部轮廓；同时含胶原蛋白和弹性蛋白等重塑剂，可减少皱纹出现。
其活性拉伸质地，令肌肤舒适。瞬间提升肌肤功效，营养舒缓肌肤。 面部轮廓将得到重塑，您将显得更年轻。
name: Liftissime强力修整精华液 30ml

product_description:
Renew the complexion with Filorga NCTF-Reverse; an effective regenerating cream that tackles wrinkles and loss of elasticity, whilst leaving skin radiant.
Utilising NCTF®, a medicine-derived polyrevitalising complex, the potent cream boasts an ultra-concentrated formula that has an equivalent concentration as injectable, anti-ageing treatments. The rich cream is effortlessly absorbed, enriching skin with an anti-ageing cocktail of Hyaluronic Acid, Collagen and an array of Vitamins. The intelligent solution is able to visibly smooth fine lines and wrinkles, even skin tone and transform a dull complexion by offering enviable radiance.
Complete with a generous dose of Shea Butter, the hydrating cream delivers a veil of moisture to skin, which leaves the complexion youthful and matte. Suitable for all skin types, expect smooth skin that appears healthy, supple and energised.
name: NCTF-Reverse 50ml

product_description:
Refresh and purify stressed and fatigued skin with The Master Cleanser Kelp Mask from STARSKIN. The organic face sheet mask contours closely to the face, delivering a boost of hydration and exceptional results. The mask is drenched in a revitalising skincare serum which aims to boosts the skin’s health and visible firmness.
Formulated with a blend of Sea Kelp Leaves, Fenugreek Seed extract and Camellia Oil, the cleansing mask works to visibly reduce the appearance of blemishes and imperfections, whilst Cantella Asiatica helps restore youthfulness.
name: The Master Cleanser - Kelp Mask

product_description:
Elemis Luxury Ladies' Traveller Set combines a host of face and body products to keep you pampered and preened, wherever you are. Housed in a cosmetic bag designed by award-winning British designer, Misha Nonoo.
Pro-Radiance Cream Cleanser (30ml)
A luxurious, anti-ageing cleanser that works to lift daily grime and moisturise dehydrated skin. Helping to defend against daily pollutants and dissolve makeup and dirt, the rich cleanser has been scientifically formulated with skin-protecting Moringa Seed Peptide, balancing Burdock and antioxidant rich Fruits to leave skin feeling clean and refreshed. Essential Plant Extracts purify and intensely hydrate thirsty skin, combatting daily grime to reveal a radiant, youthful looking complexion.
Balancing Lavender Toner (50ml)
A gentle, purifying toner that helps to lift away last traces of makeup whilst toning and rebalancing skin's pH level. Formulated without alcohol or harsh detergents, the toner combines extracts of Lavender with Quillja Wood and Sweet Betty Flower to help soften, decongest and clarify the complexion.
White Flowers Eye & Lip Make-Up Remover (28ml) 
Gentle yet effective, this bi-phase makeup remover cleanses the delicate eye and lip area of makeup and impurities, including waterproof mascara. Working to cleanse whilst refreshing and conditioning, the gentle formula combines white peony with white tea and vitamin B5 to hydrate, soothe and condition lashes. Skin will feel cleansed and revitalised. Ophthalmologist tested. Suitable for sensitive eyes and contact lens wearers. 
Papaya Enzyme Peel (15ml) 
Exfoliate and brighten skin with this gentle cream exfoliator. Enriched with natural fruit enzymes of papaya and pineapple to remove impurities and dead skin cells, revealing a clarified, radiant complexion. Suitable for sensitive or mature skin types, the peel contains nourishing milk protein and vitamin E which effectively repair and protect skin, without stripping moisture.
Pro-Collagen Marine Cream (30ml)
An award-winning anti-wrinkle day cream clinically proven* to promote a smoother, younger-looking complexion. Rich yet lightweight, the cream melts effortlessly into skin, comforting, smoothing and hydrating. Infused with a host of anti-ageing ingredients, including Mediterranean Algae, Padina Pavonica and Ginkgo Biloba, it has been developed to reduce wrinkle depth and improve firmness, tone and hydration in 14 days. Inspiring a radiant, renewed complexion, it also contains Mimosa which delivers anti-inflammatory and astringent properties, and naturally fragrant Rose to calm and nurture. The ultimate anti-ageing cream, it will leave skin looking quenched, firm and youthful. Suitable for all skin types.
Frangipani Monoi Shower Cream (50ml)
Suitable for all skin types, the daily shower cream forms a luxurious lather that gently lifts dirt and impurities, without stripping moisture. Fortified with a powerful blend of Frangipani, Coprah and Monoi Oils, the cream refreshes and cleanses skin, whilst invigorating the body and senses for a truly awakening experience.
Frangipani Monoi Body Oil (35ml)
A multi-tasking treatment the helps ease stress and restore calmness to your body and soul. Infused with a delicate fragrance that helps melt away stress and tension, the luxurious formula intensely moisturises dry or mature skin to leave you feeling revitalised and moisturised. Use as a weekly ‘pick me up’ for your hair and enjoy the intoxicating aroma.
name: Luxury Ladies' Traveller 750g

product_description: 使用 Elemis BIOTEC Skin Energising Cleanser，温和地去除积聚的污垢和杂质。 采用琥珀酸、乳酸和阿魏酸三种能量酸专门配制而成，减少多余油脂，重新平衡肌肤，呈现清新、活力的肤色。 水洗式洁肤乳可激活该品牌的 BIOTEC 系统。该系统为肌肤获得最佳状态做好准备，使其恢复健康状态。
name: BIOTEC Skin Energising Cleanser 200ml

product_description:
LieracHydragenist保湿精华液，可深度滋润肌肤。科学专门知识证明：内含的高级植物活性成分，可打造高性能产品。
这款易于吸收的抗衰老精华液含15% 的 Hydra O2 聚合物（混合了玻尿酸、仿生氧和斑鸠菊叶）。每次使用可令肌肤恢复饱满；而水果果酸有助于最大限度地减少细纹和皱纹。
使用后散发玫瑰水、茉莉花和栀子花的清新芳香，令肌肤更柔滑、更青春、更精致。 配备了滴管，便于自由涂抹。
name: Hydragenist保湿精华液30ml

product_description:
'De-tire' your skin with Garnier's Miracle Indulge Gift Set. The duo of anti-ageing and anti-fatigue moisturisers work in tandem to infuse skin with moisture, energy and radiance. Expect a brighter, smoother and younger-looking complexion.
Miracle Morning Face Cream (50ml):
A rejuvenating, anti-fatigue day cream that instantly refreshes and revives sleepy skin. Often when you wake, skin can look overrun with fatigue, fine lines and dullness. This refreshing moisturiser delivers skin-smoothing effects to help banish signs of tiredness and ageing when you wake; its blend of Rice Micro-Peptides help to restore radiance and smoothness back into tired and weary complexions. Skin looks soft, smooth, fresh and youthful.
Miracle Sleeping Face Cream (50ml):
An anti-fatigue night-time moisturiser that works with your skin during its natural renewal process to help combat signs of ageing and fatigue. Infused with seven 'miracle' ingredients, including Lavender Essential Oil, Jojoba Oil and Hyaluronic Acid, the night cream expertly rehydrates skin, plumping with moisture to restore healthy bounce, and reducing the appearance of wrinkles. Its intelligent, self-smoothing texture cocoons skin, replenishing moisture and firmness to reveal a fresh, radiant and younger-looking complexion.
name: Miracle Indulge Gift Set

product_description:
Sukin 玫瑰果油日霜將呵護您的肌膚，這是一款抗氧化護理霜，富含玫瑰果油、石榴和卡卡度果成分，可深入滋潤肌膚，讓肌膚盡顯光彩。這款強效保濕霜專門抵禦乾燥並防止衰老跡象，讓皮膚看起來光彩照人，倍感柔滑。 
 Sukin 認為，皮膚和頭髮護理產品的最強大、有效的成分來自大自然。注重環保意識的Sukin 是一家來自澳大利亞的天然個人護理品公司。 
 “Skincare that doesn't cost the earth™”（護膚不以損耗地球為代價）— Sukin 的承諾遠遠超出了化妝品。這是一家100% 認證的碳平衡公司，旨在減少其業務對於脆弱環境的影響。 -SA
name: (120ml)

product_description:
这种透​​明的液体洁面凝胶具有很低的起泡能力，可恢复并深层清洁肌肤，而不会产生任何脱水反应。 KORRES White Tea 适合每种皮肤类型且应每天使用。
该产品采用源于蔬菜的肥皂替代成分和燕麦蛋白配制而成，能在肌肤表面形成保湿膜。 White tea 液体凝胶能形成细小泡沫，避免肌肤过度脱水。
100% 纯天然洁面凝胶确保双眼和肌肤拥有优异的耐受性。
使用说明：
name: White Tea Facial Fluid Gel Cleanser (200ml)

product_description: 玉兰油新生塑颜能量活肤霜特别添加皮肤亮白、再生和修复高效配方，可让您更显年轻魅力。这款活肤霜使用肌肽和氨基酸肽等抗氧化成分，可逆转老化问题，是一款可以每日使用的完美产品。
name: 玉兰油新生塑颜能量活肤霜 (50ml)

product_description:
这款平衡型轻盈 KORRES Pomegranate Balancing Moisturising Cream Gel with SPF 6 采用保湿蔬菜乳液制作而成。 这款保湿霜非常适合于油性或混合性皮肤，并保持肌肤的最佳状态。
KORRES Pomegranate Balancing Moisturising Cream Gel 通过长期补水带来即时保湿效果，平衡皮脂分泌​​，而石榴则能紧致毛孔。
使用说明：
name: Pomegranate Balancing Moisturising Cream Gel For Oily & Combination Skin (40ml)

product_description:
Look after your skin with Pixi's Sun Mist, a sheer sunscreen with broad spectrum SPF 30 to keep your skin safe from damaging UV rays.
Helping to prevent sunburn and premature ageing, the lightweight formula delivers a veil of expert protection onto skin; it combines extracts of extracts of Sunflower and Cucumber to condition, hydrate and cool, and can be applied before or after makeup, and continually throughout the day. Skin feels calm, protected and comfortable.
name: Sun Mist

product_description:
这款思妍丽Rose D'Orient晚Balm是呵护您刺激、敏感性肌肤的最佳选择。 在您的睡眠中发挥神奇功效，在一夜之间舒缓不适和紧绷的感觉。
Aromessence Iris Night Balm 拥有可融化的丰盈质地，提供量身定做的夜间芳香护理产品的所有功效。 它舒缓肌肤，有助于减少刺激的迹象，使肌肤舒适、得到休息并放松面部肌肉。
从大马士革玫瑰花瓣中提取的锦缎玫瑰精油是这款唇膏的精华，它有软化和保护性能。 它也含有橙花、甘菊、植物精油和杏仁蜡，以及黑加仑。
使用说明：
name: D'Orient 晚Balm - Aromessence波美德不眠之夜（15ml）

product_description:
Treat tired, weary eyes to the Christian BRETON Perfecting/Lifting Eye Mask, a rich, moisture-replenishing formula that targets signs of ageing and fatigue around the delicate eye area.
Infused with a host of skin-loving ingredients, including Aloe extract and antioxidant Vitamin E, the eye cream delivers a comforting veil onto skin; it intensely hydrates to restore lost moisture whilst visibly reducing the appearance of lines and creases, and protecting against external aggressors. Eyes feel smoother and refreshed.
name: BRETON Perfecting/Lifting Eye Mask 11ml

product_description:
Meet the needs of sensitive skin with the Christian BRETON Royal Orchid Cream; a gentle yet effective eye cream developed to slow down the effect time has on skin.
Smoothing over delicate eye skin, the fast-absorbing formula harnesses the age-defying powers of Royal Orchid Extract, which combats loss of elasticity to deliver a visible ‘lifted’ effect. The rich cream not only delivers anti-ageing benefits, but leaves skin feeling hydrated and thoroughly nourished.
The treatment is suitable for all skin types, but ideal for those with sensitive skin. With continued use, the luxurious Royal Orchid Cream reveals a youthful eye contour with skin that is supple and radiant.
name: BRETON Royal Orchid Cream 10ml

product_description:
Avoid invasive anti-ageing procedures with the Christian BRETON Liftox Face Cream; an advanced treatment that seeks to deliver age-defying results to lift, smooth and replenish.
Fortified with powerful peptides that seek to mimic the wrinkle-freezing, Botox-like effects of snake venom, the rich formula rapidly absorbs into skin, helping to optimise moisture levels and blur the look of fine lines with extracts of Caviar and Collagen.
Skin appears fresher, firmer and less fatigued, with a visible reduction in wrinkle depth and length* for a youthful looking vitality.
name: BRETON Liftox Face Cream 50ml

product_description:
Refine the complexion with the Christian BRETON Floral Lotion; a gentle yet effective toner develop for normal to dry skin types.
Formulated with 99.58% natural ingredients, the lightweight lotion smoothes comfortably over the visage, sweeping away traces of cleanser and leftover impurities. The mild, alcohol-free formula boasts a variety of Plant Extracts, which improve the appearance of skin’s texture, whilst leaving the complexion ultra-smooth and touchably soft.
name: BRETON Floral Lotion 200ml

product_description:
Provide skin with the protection it requires using Christian BRETON Skin Survival for Dry Skin; a 24 hour, micellar cream developed specifically for normal to dry skin types.
Effortlessly gliding over the visage, the lightweight formula provides a veil of protection, which shields skin from multiple factors that lead to visible signs of ageing. These include environmental pollution, temperature changes and damage from UV rays, which can contribute to dehydrating the skin on a daily basis.
Defending against both ageing and dryness, the survival cream offers skin instant and long-lasting moisture, which reduces the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles, whilst leaving the complexion visibly firm, supple and radiant.
name: BRETON Skin Survival for Dry Skin 50ml

product_description:
Rejuvenate the delicate eye area with Korean skincare brand Skin79's Golden Snail Intensive Eye Cream; a lightweight, regenerating formula that works to moisturise and hydrate.
Fortified with a nourishing blend of rare ingredients, including Golden Snail and Bird Nest Extracts, the fast-absorbing cream helps to minimise the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles, whilst Niacinamide combats dark circles and dullness to reveal a smoother, brighter eye contour.
name: Golden Snail Intensive Eye Cream 35ml

product_description:
Unique and effective, the Bliss Micro Magic is a gentle exfoliator which works to remove impurities and product build up off the face to leave you with a crystal clear complexion. Formulated with aloe and mushroom extracts to reduce inflammation, and peppermint to give an unbeatable refreshing feeling, this cream is a must have!
Clinically shown to significantly decrease dead skin buildup*
*Based on a clinical study of healthy females from 26-55 years of age
**In a consumer perception study of healthy females from 22-45 years of age
name: Micro Magic

product_description: Achieve a refreshed and purified complexion with the Waterful Deep Cleansing Water from Korean skincare brand Skin79. Enriched with natural extracts of Moringa and fruit-based Sapindus Mukorossi, the ultra-lightweight, mildly acidic formula sweeps away dirt and effortlessly removes makeup while infusing skin with essential hydration.
name: Waterful Deep Cleansing Water 500ml

product_description:
Perricone MD 裴礼康低过敏性紧致眼霜能够模仿肌肤自然更新过程，利用先进的科学技术，结合经过测试的疲惫肌肤护理成分，具有提拉眼部肌肤的作用，可补充娇嫩的眼部肌肤所需的营养成分。
真皮兴奋剂有助于增强肌肤弹性和密度，具有丰盈肌肤的效果，能有效减轻浮肿和细纹，而二甲基乙醇胺具有调节肤色和紧致肌肤的作用，使肌肤看起来更年轻、更清新。 使这款营养丰富而轻盈的眼霜蕴含有 Alpha 硫酸锌，能够改善肤质并最大化减轻瑕疵，让您的双眸看起来更清爽、更有活力。
name: MD 裴礼康低过敏性紧致眼霜

product_description:
Treat your pout to the bliss Fabulips Softening Lip Balm; a luxurious, spa-quality formula that works to soften, condition and replenish without greasy residue.
Harnessing the powers of Shea Butter, Vitamin E and Jojoba Oil, the reparative balm moisturises and hydrates lips, whilst protecting against dryness and environmental aggressors for long-lasting comfort. Expect smooth, supple and kissable lips after use.
name: Fabulips Softening Lip Balm 3.5ml

product_description:
Take care of your skin with the Allancera Barrier Essence from Korean skincare brand, Skin79, a calming and hydrating solution that works to protect and moisturise your skin.
Fortified with a Multi-Matrix Barrier System™, the essence helps to strengthen the skin's barrier whilst delivering hydration for long-lasting moisture. Its dose of naturally calming Allantoin relieves and softens skin, whilst a Multi-Ceramide preserves moisture to leave skin feeling soft, supple and replenished.
name: Allancera Barrier Essence 50ml

product_description:
This refreshing oil-free gel is ideal after shaving thanks to the anti-inflammatory properties of Rosemary and healing properties of Turmeric. Packed with antioxidants derived from Green Tea and Tomato, this after-shave gel soothes the skin while protecting against sun damage. Helps to control oil, penetrates immediately and does not leave any residue on the skin.
Alchimie Antioxidant Technologies:
Green Tea (Catechin, Quercetin, Epicatechin), Rosemary (Carnosic Acid, Rosmarinic Acid), Turmeric (Curcumin), Tomato (Lycopene).
name: Forever Antioxidant Skin Repair Gel

product_description:
Expertly apply cream foundation and liquid blusher with the STARSKIN Artist FX™ Silicone Puff Refill Pack; a pack of two puffs that are designed to fix onto STARSKIN’s Artist FX™ Auto-Patting Makeup Applicator.
The silicone applicators provide hygienic application of product, without the need to use hands Offering long-lasting coverage and flawless results, the heads are created with an ergonomic design, which boasts a tapered end that can perform precision applications around the eyes, lips and nose.
When cleaned regularly, each puff with last up to two months.
name: Artist FX™ Silicone Puff Refill Pack (Set of 2)

product_description:
Intensely nourish your skin with Skin Authority Ultra Rich Moisturizer, a botanical-rich cream that expertly hydrates skin whilst relieving signs of irritation.
Enriched with Mango Seed Butter, Cranberry Seed Oil and Shea Butter, the rich yet non-greasy moisturiser melts effortlessly into skin, delivering calming properties to help reduce puffiness and skin discomfort. Deeply hydrating, it will leave the complexion soft, bright and replenished.
name: Authority Ultra Rich Moisturizer

product_description:
使用这款来自 this works 的强大双效产品："  Deep Sleep枕头喷雾 "和"  No Wrinkles午夜Moisture  "体验放松的夜晚睡眠和柔软滋润的肌肤。
 Deep Sleep枕头喷雾（75ml） ： 
该Deep Sleep枕头喷雾是一款喷雾香水，旨在促进放松睡眠，它可以释放轻松氛围，让您吸入平静，呼出烦恼。 利用天然精油，包括薰衣草、香根、野甘菊配制而成，该睡眠解决方案完美适合那些希望放松的人。
No Wrinkles Midnight Moisture (48ml)：
利用这款超滋润晚霜消除疲劳迹象。 利用天然成分，帮助在睡眠时修护肌肤，该混合物富含透明质酸和具有舒缓功效的牛油果脂，以支持肌肤天然解毒过程，并提供滋润和丰盈功效，令肌肤光彩照人、明显紧致。
name: works Deep Sleep枕头喷雾(75ml)和No Wrinkles 午夜Moisture (48ml)

product_description:
Shiseido Pureness Moisturizing Gel Cream是一款轻盈啫喱霜，是混合性肌肤与中性肌肤的完美之选。 本品蕴含的Hydro-Balancing Complex水平衡复合因子能补水保湿，并激发肌肤的自然保湿功能；快速吸收，瞬间重塑肌理。 肌肤感觉水润清爽，肤质细腻。 - L.M.
使用说明：早晚洁面后使用。
name: Pureness Moisturizing Gel Cream (40ml)

product_description:
Polish the face and body with the Grounded Coffee Scrub in Coconut; a gentle yet effective exfoliator that reveals radiant skin from head to toe. The best-selling formula is packed with an array of Vitamins and Minerals, alongside ground Robusta Coffee, which helps to boost circulation, whilst delivering a visible brightening effect to skin.
The innovative coffee scrub utilises Brown Sugar and Himalayan Rock Salt, which work in synergy to slough away dead, dry and flaky skin. Also enriched with Coconut Oil, Vitamin E and Sweet Almond Oil, the exfoliating scrub ensures the face and body are comfortably hydrated and touchably soft.
Ideal for those with dry and sensitive skin, the coconut scented scrub eliminates areas of dry or rough skin to reveal a polished complexion and body. Expect to be refreshed and radiant and enviably smooth.
name: Coffee Scrub 200g - Coconut

product_description:
Revive, hydrate and illuminate your complexion with Mavala's Skin Vitality Vitalizing Healthy Glow Day Cream, a daily moisturiser that protects against external aggressors whilst inspiring a radiant glow.
Melting effortlessly in, the non-oily cream contains tiny pearls that add an instant glow to skin; it refreshes and energises dull skin, restoring radiance whilst protecting against external aggressors that can lead to premature ageing. Its dose of Swiss Apricot extract delivers antioxidant, toning and exfoliating benefits for brighter-looking skin, and a high concentration of stable Vitamin C revitalises and energises. Skin is protected and appears fresh, glowing and rehydrated. Doubles as a perfect makeup base for achieving a dewy finish. Non-sticky. Housed in airtight packaging to maintain efficacy. Delicately scented.
name: Skin Vitality Vitalizing Healthy Glow Day Cream 45ml

product_description:
Shiseido Benefiance WrinkleResist24 Night Emulsion能在您睡眠时帮助肌肤抵抗岁月痕迹。
这款驻颜霜质地轻盈不油腻，蕴含的无患子精华能抑制皱纹促生酶的活性，增强肌肤抵抗岁月痕迹再生的能力，同时淡化已有的细纹和皱纹。 本品能为中性至混合性肌肤提供卓效保湿，让您一觉醒来就感觉肌肤柔滑水嫩。 - L.M.
name: Benefiance WrinkleResist 24 Night Emulsion (75ml)

product_description:
Polaar 深层抗衰老霜专为男士配制，富含多种天然提取物，深度补水，让肌肤变得更加柔嫩。
质地轻盈不油腻，它可以抚平皱纹，提拉并紧实肌肤，恢复青春光泽。 日常护肤的必备产品，让您拥有柔软水嫩的肌肤。 K.D.
name: 深层抗衰老霜（50ml）

product_description:
Perfectly pamper skin with the Nourish Face Indulgence Gift Set from AromaWorks. Combining a luxurious candle, face mask and oil, the kit works to reignite a youthful glow. Complete with a soft embroidered headband and pair of mitts.
'Soulful' Candle (10cl)
Infuse an exotic, rejuvenating fragrance into your abode with the AromaWorks Soulful Candle; expertly crafted from the finest Soy and Beeswax. Blending pure essential oils of Frankincense, Juniper Berry and warming Patchouli, the luxurious candle creates a cloud of pure tranquillity to relax the mind and body, whilst releasing tension and fatigue.
Nourish Face Exfoliate Mask (50ml)
An anti-ageing face mask that sloughs away dead skin cells to promote brighter, smoother, rejuvenated skin. Infused with Bamboo, Seagrass and Essential Oils, the formula gently exfoliates, tones and refines whilst improving the appearance of wrinkles and other signs of ageing. Harnessing the power of 14 BioActive ingredients, the mask delivers moisturising and firming properties to inspire younger-looking skin.
Nourish Face Serum Oil (30ml)
Expertly formulated with 9 natural BioActive ingredients brimming with essential nutrients and vitamins, the serum works to repair and restore skin. Enriched with extracts of Bamboo and Seagrass, the treatment works as a gentle exfoliant, lifting away dirt, dead cells and impurities to smooth and polish skin texture. The addition of Neroli and Sandalwood encourages cell renewal, helping minimise the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles. Skin is left looking brighter and revitalised.
name: Nourish Face Indulgence Gift Set

product_description:
Karin Herzog 推出的 Vita-A-Kombi 3 面霜具有强大的抗菌和抗衰老功效，能够锁定并对抗暗疮、色斑、痤疮和粉刺，同时最大限度地减少色素沉着、疤痕、细纹和皱纹的出现。
添加3％的活性氧，维生素A和维生素E，这款快速吸收的面霜能够促进肌肤的自然修复，促进细胞新生，带给你更顺滑的肌肤，更细致更均匀的肤色。
这款护理产品带有轻微的按摩效果，能够去除杂质、毒素和会引发肌肤问题的细菌，让营养成分穿透毛细血管壁，渗入肌肤深层，令肌肤焕发光泽，清洁健康。
name: Herzog Vita-A-Kombi 3 面霜（16ml）

product_description:
Treat mature skin to the nourishing and multi-corrective properties of Lancôme Visionnaire Day Cream, an anti-ageing face cream that delivers a triple-correcting effect on the appearance of wrinkles, suppleness and dullness.
Ideal for dull, ageing skin, the silky, melting moisturiser combines Hyaluronic Acid with a unique, multi-correcting LR2412 molecule to help correct and diminish the appearance of wrinkles and fine lines. It feels instantly comforting and refreshing on application, and after three days of use, skin feels softer and replenished with enhanced luminosity. After four weeks, wrinkles appear visibly reduced and skin regains youthful suppleness.
Expect a smoother, brighter, younger-looking complexion.
name: Visionnaire Day Cream 50ml

product_description:
FirmX生长因子神经肽精华液是一款气血活化护理品，可改善面部亮泽度、肌肤质地、弹性、细纹及皱纹。 本款突破性精华液中含 52％ 的 GFx 神经聚合物，可刺激胶原蛋白、促进细胞再生、激活肌肤天然修复机制、减缓肌肉收缩速度。 呈现年轻有形的外貌。
——所有参与者均认为：该精华液可瞬间改善皮肤，令肌肤更紧致、更柔软、更光滑、更水润。
——所有参与者均认为：该精华液可减少细纹及皱纹。
* 研究对象为年龄在41-60岁之间的35名妇女，持续时间为4周，每天涂抹次数为两次。
name: Thomas Roth FirmX 生长因子神经肽精华液

product_description:
Protect skin from the sun's harmful rays with Riemann P20 Sun Protection Continuous Spray SPF30; a quick-drying and extremely water-resistant formula that promotes safe and gradual tanning, yet only requires a single application. The sunscreen spray is host to the same coveted formula, yet arrives in a new, easy-to-use continuous spray bottle, with a multi-angle function to ensure coverage from all angles.
Non-greasy, the protective solution sinks easily into skin, and the once-a-day application means you can enjoy days outdoors in the sun without the usual worry about burning or topping up sun cream. The sun spray effortlessly mists over the body, enveloping skin in a transparent veil of protection that boasts UVA and UVB filters to keep skin safe for up to ten hours.
Suitable for the face, body and scalp, the silky solution prevents burning and visible signs of ageing to leave skin comfortable and well cared for.
name: P20 Sun Protection Continuous Spray SPF30 150ml

product_description:
Wake up to regenerated skin with this Advanced Purifiying Overnight Masque from Dr Botanicals; a deeply nourishing and smoothing facial masque that works while you sleep. The creamy textured masque melts into your skin and nourishes overnight, leaving you with hydrated, cleansed and smooth skin in the morning.
The purifying night cream is enriched with a range of botanical extracts including: Papaya, which is rich in minerals and sugars and Vitamins C and B to condition and soothe the skin; Jojoba Oil, which enhances the skin’s natural suppleness and elasticity; and Sweet Almond Oil, which helps to smooth, soften and moisturise. – E.W.
name: Botanicals Advanced Purifiying Overnight Masque (50ml)

product_description:
RENU Soft Touch Toner丝滑的液体，在每日清洁之后轻轻恢复肌肤，同时保护肌肤天然屏障，令肌肤清洁、柔软、活力和清新，恢复舒适。
RENU Soft Touch Toner 含透明质酸钠令肌肤饱满，维生素C，多糖和芦荟促进肌肤天然光泽，防止干燥，维持弹性，同时维生素B5促进保湿平衡。
RENU Soft Touch Cleanser 属于 RENU Anti Ageing 系列，针对肌肤老化三大问题而设计：以皱纹为主要特征的自然、基因和慢性老化，因环境侵蚀如紫外线、射线伤害而失去紧致、光泽和光致老化，以及影响肌肤重获水润和弹性的激素老化。
使用说明：
name: Soft Touch Toner 180ml

product_description: Revitalise dull and lacklustre skin with the Fast Skin Toning Pads from Korean beauty brand Skin79. Delivering dual benefits in one simple sweep, each face pad features a textured surface to help gently exfoliate skin for a more toned and refined finish. Enriched with nourishing fruit and flower extracts, achieve a refreshed and glowing complexion.
name: 10 Fast Skin Toning Pad (Pack of 60)

product_description:
此款Menscience Essentials为三件套装，能够有效深入地清洁您的身体，让皮肤感到柔软清爽。 本三件套装中含有：Menscience's Advanced Deodorant，可以让您感到清爽，以及洁面磨砂和面霜产品，是您的必备之物！ K.D.
Menscience Advanced Deodorant 73.6g
这种具有突破性的配方完全无味，经过科学测试，可最大限度地防止和去除异味。  MenScience Advanced Deodorant让您体验积极的人生。
Menscience Advanced Face Lotion 100ml
此款高效的润肤产品中含有高级保湿剂、维生素、抗氧化剂和改善肤质的成分。 此款超轻盈和不含油的配方能够给您一个自然的哑光肤色。
Menscience Microfine Face Scrub 130ml
30秒就可以让您的肤色重新焕发活力！ 高效且具有令人满意的剃须效果。 改善肤色、准备剃须的最简单和最快方法。 含有专业去角质成分和微粒的独特配方（3％羟基，1％水杨酸）既温和又有效。

product_description:
深层清洁毛孔，同时用Weleda一步Cleanser和Toner调理您的肌肤。 该乳液适合中性至混合性皮肤，利用自然皂化的橄榄油深层洁肤，同时一步到位调理您的肌肤
深层清洁是任何年龄进行有效面部护理的基础。 Weleda一步Cleanser和Toner利用有机生长的原材料制作，可彻底清洁肌肤而不干燥，旨在满足不同皮肤类型的个性化需求。 其中榛子成分可舒缓和滋养肌肤，令肌肤焕发精神，恢复精致细嫩。
使用说明：

娜迪奧平衡潔面霜性質溫和不傷膚，無泡沫配方，賦予肌膚柔滑、光​​潔舒適效果。富含有機玫瑰果油、甜杏仁和芝麻，令肌膚卓然幻變，綻現臻至美肌。 
使用說明：

product_description: 使用这款超温和的洗面奶，让肌肤保持天然的水分平衡。 令肌肤保持清爽、洁净、舒适。 特别添加了北极杜松子提取物，发挥舒缓和抗炎功效，有助于减少红血丝和刺激。 富含芦荟和黄瓜精华，温和去除杂质及多余皮脂，同时保持肌肤水润。

product_description:
一涂上 skinChemists 瞬间提拉霜就会立即产生显著的紧致效果。 特别添加了具有保湿功效的维生素A和E，以及能够抑制胶原蛋白糖化的Eyeseryl®，以提升肌肤的紧实度和弹性，这款产品非常适合年纪稍大或肌肤开始衰老的人群。
它的紧实功效可以减少瑕疵的出现，促进眼袋区域的排水，防止水肿。 让您拥有更光滑、更紧实、更年轻的肌肤。 每次使用只需一点，30ml一瓶可以用非常久。 - L.M.

product_description:
本品可顯著淡化暗斑、老年斑、痤瘡疤痕痘印、孕斑和其他惱人的色素沉著。 
經過證明，本品可與領先的OTC 藥物成份相媲美，含一種正在申請專利的祛斑提亮複合物，其中蘊含21 世紀最高臨床試驗級別的成份。如持續使用，此強效配方還有助於防止以後出現色斑。 
使用說明：
name: Thomas Roth 彼得罗夫淡斑亮白精华液 (30ml)

product_description:
本品蕴含skinChemists的最新活性成分"Beautifeye!"，能在您睡眠时起到提升眼袋、消除鱼尾纹以及淡化黑眼圈的功效。
有效去除眼部倦容和浮肿，令您的双眸焕发青春水润的神采。 -SA

product_description: TANWORX Express Tan Liquid in Dark to Very Dark is a quick drying, non-sticky formula created using a blend of natural ingredients. Once applied the self-tan results in an instant deep colour that develops into a dark long-lasting tan. Perfect for those looking to create a healthy looking glow, the liquid provides a quick drying and steak-free self-tan. -SA
name: Express Tan Liquid 200ml - Dark to Very Dark

product_description:
After Shave Balm by Karin Herzog is a concentrated oxygen and vitamin cream especially for men. A mans skin is thicker than that of the fairer sex, and they need the concentrated 2% oxygen to enable the product to penetrate into the tissues, where it works to refine, heal, replenish, hydrate and normalise.
This exceptional After Shave Balm by Karin Herzog sterilises the skin after shaving, heals minor nicks and cuts, prevents in-growing hairs and stops razor-burn.
name: Herzog After Shave Balm

product_description:
CODAGE推出的这款保湿修复精华液由法国制药专家团队精心配制而成。 这一保湿配方富含多种补水成分，共同作用，保护肌肤免受寒冷侵蚀，适合所有肌肤类型，特别是易受干燥影响的皮肤。 这款产品能够深度补水，恢复肌肤的天然水分和油脂，并保护肌肤外层免受环境污染。 特别增加了独特的南极冰川成分，确保肌肤柔软光滑，活力新生。 - K.N.  
这款CODAGE产品包含： 
Hy3 - 具有补水锁水的滋润功效。 这种成分还能够促进胶原蛋白，丰盈并紧实肌肤，令肌肤更年轻。
Hy+ - 这一成分具有更强的保湿功效，它可以为干燥缺水的肌肤立即注入水活力，效果立竿见影。 富含具有锁水功效的透明质酸，提供持久保湿，面色润泽。
Ap3 - 这一成分具有舒缓和保湿功效，防止肌肤受刺激，加强肌肤对炎症反应的耐受程度。
Ao3 - 这一富含抗氧化因子的成分具有修复和保护功效功效，可以保护肌肤抵御自由基和紫外线的伤害，并修复肌肤已有的损伤。
Hi - 这一成分能有效抵御寒冷，令暴露在各种天气环境下的肌肤时时水分充盈，同时还能促进胶原蛋白合成。
Re3 - 这一强大的成分混合了多种修复因子，可以让受损的肌肤细胞重新恢复健康状态，并促进肌肤细胞的自然更新。

Anthony 推出的这款醒肤凝胶富含绿茶和仙人掌精华，能有效减少肌肤浮肿和炎症；这款产品不含苯甲酸酯类，可以完美融入日常护理。
特别添加了咖啡因成分，刺激并紧致肌肤；以及具有冷却作用的薄荷，唤醒沉睡的肌肤；这款保湿凝胶有助于缓解浮肿和炎症，让您精神焕发。 - E.D

product_description:
利用Weleda Pomegranate紧肤晚霜改善肌肤弹性和韧性，这是一款强效保湿霜，可促进细胞形成和表皮再生。
Weleda Pomegranate紧肤晚霜可防止发炎，并维持其彻夜激活天然再生过程的营养物质。 宝贵的石榴籽油、琉璃苣籽油和摩洛哥坚果油帮助肌肤更新。 这款润肤霜由92％的有机成分组成。
该抗氧化剂护理霜是应对肌肤自然老化的理想伴侣。 含有机生长的石榴和金色粟米等珍贵成份，它可减少皱纹，拉紧肌肤并激活其再生过程。 淡淡清香会激发所有感官。
皮肤科测试表明，经过28天的使用，皱纹的深度减少了35％***
***利用PRIMOS测量皱纹深度，2009年对21位年龄在42-69岁的受试者进行测试。
使用说明：
name: Pomegranate紧肤晚霜（30ml）

product_description:
體驗Lift Serum Intense的緊膚效果。幹細胞恢復複合物和電磁中性純24克拉黃金的協同作用，強有力的抗衰老血清有助於肌膚的天然循環，從而呈現平滑而又更加緊緻的膚色
純金成分保護皮膚使其免受自由基的傷害，同時干細胞複合物使肌膚獲得緊緻的效果。保濕分子和木薯根提取物為皮膚帶來保濕和明顯緊緻的效果，使皮膚看起來更光滑和年輕。

The Method: Nourish Moisturiser Sensitive Skin採用了溫和的抗衰老配方以滋養細膩的肌膚，使之不易受到刺激，從而獲得持久的舒適感。 
該保濕霜中註入了植物甾醇以防止自由基損傷，其無香料、超保濕的護理有助於重新煥發青春的光澤，同時獨特的二肽提高皮膚的保濕能力。 
最大限度地減少皺紋的深度以獲得一個更平滑、更柔順的膚色，其創新的融合效果將使您看起來更健康，恢復您肌膚狀態，使之煥發出光澤。

利用 Polaar Hydraforce滋润霜让疲劳、脱水的肌肤恢复活力，这是一款深层保湿、强化肌肤的滋润霜，可令肌肤恢复舒适和光泽。
利用北极蓝色微型藻成分配制，该滋润霜可迅速被肌肤吸收，促进细胞再生，增强肌肤的天然屏障，舒缓剃须灼伤并抵御环境侵害因素。 E.N.

IOMA保湿洁肤乳，使肌肤焕发光采。配方丰富，可去除杂质，避免肌肤过度干燥或紧绷。 配方温和，内含玻尿酸，使肌肤紧致，提升肌肤弹性，温可去除污垢和彩妆痕迹，令肌肤再现活力。
内含抗氧化维生素C，可保护肌肤免遭环境侵害；苹果酸，提高肌肤的天然屏障功能，每次使用都会让您体验到天鹅绒般柔软光滑的美肤效果。 本品可令肌肤舒缓凉爽，保持肌肤含水量，修复肌肤使之舒适。

采用创新型 APT-200™ 技术（一种正在申请专利的成体干细胞生长因子聚合物），可促进 皮肤的自然更新过程。本款护肤乳液不油腻，可滋养修复肌肤，恢复肌肤弹性，使肌肤柔软亮泽、焕发活力。
内含强大的抗氧化剂、多种维生素、黄瓜苹果萃取物等成分，以防止肌肤见光老化、使肌肤免遭环境侵害、光滑柔软、容光焕发。 修复全身受损肌肤、舒缓干燥的肌肤。 E.N.

product_description:
skinChemists 蜂毒眼部精华液能够抚平并紧致娇嫩的眼部区域。 这款精华液特别添加了真正蜂毒的活性成分，能够丰盈肌肤，防止皮肤下垂；另外还含有促进胶原蛋白生成的透明质酸、针对浮肿的四胜肽和抚平细纹和皱纹的淡化成分。 让双眸焕发年轻光彩。 - L.M.

体验 RMK 玫瑰草本喷雾的舒缓作用，令人舒爽的草本喷雾瞬间滋润您的肌肤。
喷雾中加入黄瓜和绿茶提取物，如同一张清新的面膜，可以帮助缩小毛孔，保持肌肤健康和妆容，给您带来完美的面部肌肤。 它的保湿配方是您妆前保湿，妆后保持清爽、容光焕发效果的完美选择。
肌肤顿觉宁静而又明亮。

PAYOT Crème Lavante Douce 身体清洁滋润护理液是一种2合1美白洁肤乳。使用它洁肤时，您会感到柔软、温和、舒适。
该洁肤乳含有大量滋补的活性成分，如：甜杏仁牛奶和甘油。此特效无皂配方可去污、使皮肤柔软水嫩。
您全身都会感到柔软、洁净、舒适。

product_description:
Synergising the brand's skincare expertise and the finest ingredients from around the world, Dr Botanicals present the Advanced Light Serum Essence; a revitalising formula dedicated to promoting a healthy-looking complexion.
Enriched with a powerful blend of botanical extracts, including soothing elderflower, nourishing sweet almond oil and brightening red algae, its silky smooth consistency absorbs quickly into skin to hydrate, revitalise and revive radiance.
Works to combat uneven skin tone, minimise pigmentation and improve skin texture, whilst delivering antioxidant protection to defend against UV damage and environmental aggressors. Complete with a pipette applicator. E.N.

product_description:
Achieve a close, comfortable shave with the Sir Nelson's Florist Shaving Oil from Carsons Apothecary; a brand who combine traditional formulas with high performance results. Developed for use pre and post shave, the protective oil softens and lifts hairs, whilst hydrating and conditioning skin to prevent moisture loss.
Infused with a nourishing blend of Rosehip, Grapeseed and Sweet Almond Oils, its caring formula allows the razor to glide effortlessly over skin with minimised friction, nicks and burns, whilst delivering an uplifting floral fragrance that stays on the skin for hours. Skin is left soft, smooth and restored.
name: Apothecary Sir Nelson's Florist Shaving Oil

product_description: Regenerate skin whilst you sleep with the Dr Botanicals Advanced 12 Hour Night Detox Cream; a hydrating, anti-ageing moisturiser developed to restore a healthy-looking, refreshed complexion. Infused with elderflower extract, its rich, radiance-reviving formula addresses and combats uneven skin tone, whilst fighting against fine lines and wrinkles to maintain a youthful appearance. Eucalyptus and peppermint essential oils are combined with antioxidant vitamin E to renew skin overnight so you can wake up to velvety soft, smooth and recharged skin. E.N.
name: Botanicals Advanced 12 Hour Night Detox Cream (50ml)

product_description:
使用 Triumph & Disaster's A+R Soap体验一个保湿的清洁过程，这款非干燥清洁皂可活化、改善和软化您的肌肤。
注入杏仁奶、Rosehip油和燕麦薄片，这款肥皂温和地呵护您的肌肤表面，在清除杂质的同时软化及保湿肌肤。 它的湿润性能可确保肌肤感觉密集补水和滋养，同时品牌定制的香氛会给人清爽的感觉。 适合于面部和身体使用。

product_description:
NAOBAY (Natural And Organic Beauty And You) 推出了软公差和眼廓霜；这是一种清新的液体配方护肤品，有使皮肤舒缓和舒适的作用。
这种面霜特为满足敏感型皮肤的需求而研制，有很大的抗氧化作用，可借助其高浓度白藜芦醇防止受到自由基的侵害，而积雪草和甘菊则可减轻环境侵害因素引起的痒痛。 眼部会不痒不痛、得到补水并恢复活力。

product_description:
可用有抗衰老益处的 NAOBAY 的抗氧化焕肤霜护理面部皮肤；这是一种高效配方护肤品，有防止细纹、皱纹和疲劳迹象出现的作用。
这种吸收迅速的焕肤霜已用白藜芦醇分子（是一种强效抗氧化剂）强化，可防止受到日常环境侵害因素的侵害，而有滋养作用的摩洛哥坚果和玫瑰果油的混合物，则可使细纹和皱纹看起来已得到软化，以显露出更光滑，更纯净的年轻红润面部皮肤。

product_description:
Chantecaille 香缇卡钻石乳液+ 是加强版的经典钻石乳液。 这款质地轻盈的抗氧化乳液适合各种肤质，可让您的肌肤拥有哑光妆效。 非常适合用作强效底妆涂抹在美妆产品下层，显著提高肌肤的光滑度。
这款保湿霜蕴含有植物萃取物的混合物，可有效应对潮湿，使您的肤色在阴雨天也不会油光。 钻石乳液+ 是经典配方的加强版，它采用最先进的植物萃取物，具有强化保湿作用，能显著地使肌肤恢复弹性。
name: 香缇卡钻石乳液+ 50ml

product_description:
Treat wanting skin to the Baby Quasar Hydraplenish Crème; a lightweight, intensive treatment that works to replenish and revitalise your complexion.
Infused with soothing Aloe Vera and a cocktail of vitamins A, C and E, the fast-absorbing, antioxidant-rich cream delivers long-lasting moisture and hydration, whilst fighting signs of ageing to help soften the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles. Improves skin tone and texture for a smoother, younger-looking and more refined finish.
name: Quasar Hydraplenish Crème

product_description:
Purify and balance congested, oily complexions with the Skin Authority Acne and Oil Control; a targeted treatment to gently exfoliate the surface layer of skin, optimise moisture levels and regulate excess sebum production.
Fortified with a multi-tasking active formula of 8% AHA Glycolic Acid and 2% Salicylic Acid, the lightweight liquid rapidly absorbs, working to exfoliate dead cells and unclog pores for a more smooth and refined texture. Enriched with soothing Witch Hazel and Aloe, it alleviates the look of redness and leaves skin feeling clean, clear and smooth.
name: Authority Acne and Oil Control

product_description:
Reveal a youthful complexion with the Skin Authority Moisturizing Lift Cream; an anti-ageing hydrator that combats visible signs of ageing. Boasting an exclusive, protein-rich formula with a unique ionic charge, the moisturiser is able to effectively hydrate and visibly firm dry and mature skin types in need of an elasticity boost.
The non-greasy veil of moisture works to soothe and relieve dull and flaky skin, whilst SGF-4 Technology™ visibly plumps the complexion to reduce the appearance of wrinkles and improve texture. Skin is left soft, supple and youthful.
name: Authority Moisturizing Lift Cream

product_description:
Treat your skin to the illuminating and nourishing benefits of Alchimie Forever Kantic Brightening Moisture Mask, a highly coveted face mask formula that blends natural botanicals to calm, protect and brighten dull skin.
Suitable for sensitive and post-cosmetic procedure skin, the creamy mask combines Oats with wild Pansies to help relieve and restore irritated skin, and delivers light-reflecting particles to leave the complexion with a healthy, glowing appearance. Resveratrol from grape extracts protects against environmental stress, and Blueberry counteracts signs of redness to promote a more uniform skin tone. The complexion feels nourished, comfortable and rejuvenated with a radiant glow. It also has anti-ageing properties to leave skin soft, smooth and supple.
name: Forever Kantic Brightening Moisture Mask

product_description:
Keep facial hair in tip-top condition with the Sir Nelson's Florist​ Beard Oil from Carsons Apothecary; a brand who utilise traditional formulas to deliver high performance grooming products.
Enriched with a unique blend of oils, including Rosehip, Grapeseed and Sweet Almond, the non-greasy formula nourishes hair and skin, whilst delivering an uplifting floral fragrance blended by master perfumers. Housed in a pump bottle for mess-free application, hair is left soft and hydrated, and skin feels revitalised.
name: Apothecary Sir Nelson's Florist Beard Oil

product_description:
This antioxidant cleansing gel is the first step to radiant skin. The natural extracts of Papaya and Grapefruit in this foaming cleanser rapidly dissolve makeup and excess oils from the skin's surface while gently exfoliating and removing deeper impurities from the pores. Cucumber softens and grapefruit refreshes and brightens the skin. This light formula preserves the skin's natural pH balance (so no toner is necessary), leaving it cleaner, softer and healthier.
Alchimie Antioxidant Technologies:Papaya (Papain), Cucumber (Pepsin, Vitamin E), Grapefruit (Naringin, Vitamin C).
100% made in Switzerland. Dermatologist-formulated and tested.
name: Forever Purifying Facial Cleanser

product_description:
通过 Garnier Skin Naturals Pure Daily Moisturiser 的净化功效护理您的肌肤，这是一款轻盈配方，24小时滋润保湿同时对抗肌肤斑点污痕。
拥有非油腻、可快速吸收质地，该保湿液可轻松融入肌肤，提供水杨酸和锌的去角质和净化功效；毛孔将获得疏通，造成污迹的杂质被清除，肌肤获得改善。
结果如何？ 强效抚慰和补水的更干净肌肤。 - K.N.
name: Skin Naturals Pure Daily Moisturiser (40ml)

product_description: Achieve an effortless gorgeous glow with the Skin Perfector Radiance Serum from ARK. Enriched with essential amino acids and oils, the nourishing elixir softens and brightens skin whilst reducing the appearance of age spots and dark pigmentation. Vitamin C helps to combat signs of premature ageing, whilst Velvet Flower Seed encourages cell repair and regeneration to minimise the look of fine lines. It’s the perfect treatment for a luminous, dewy complexion.
name: Skin Perfector Radiance Serum (30ml)

product_description:
Clarify and refresh your complexion with Wilma Schumann's Soothing and Balancing Toner; an alcohol-free formula to clear skin ready for moisturising.
Enriched with Aloe Vera, Witch Hazel and Cucumber Extracts, the lightweight toner delivers a subtle, natural fragrance, while rebalancing the skin's pH level without over-drying or uncomfortable tightness. You can expect soft, smooth and hydrated skin with a refined, improved texture.
name: Schumann Soothing and Balancing Toner 210ml

product_description:
Natio娜迪奧Paw Paw唇膏(20ml) 
日用護唇膏，保護雙唇，補水保濕。蘊含番木瓜和純蜂蜜混合物、荷荷巴油和可​​可油等珍稀提取物，深層滋養，令肌膚滋潤順滑。本護唇膏質地純淨，效果持久，輕輕一抹，淡淡光澤立現。專用於呵護乾燥或皴裂的雙唇，換季時節尤為如此。不含凡士林。

name: 娜迪奥 Paw Paw 唇膏 (20ml)

product_description:
Elizabeth Arden Eight Hour Cream Sun Face 防护霜SPF 50 有助于保护肌肤免受 UVA / UVB射线导致的晒伤、皮肤表面细胞损伤和过早衰老的迹象。
轻盈而不油腻，Elizabeth Arden Eight Hour Cream Sun Face 防护霜SPF 50确保滋润肌肤，它采用根本性的8小时配方来滋润皮肤，同时充当完美肌肤的保护剂，防止太阳暴晒所导致的不良影响。
使用说明：
name: Arden Eight Hour Cream Sun Face 防护霜 SPF 50（50ml）

product_description:
柑橘油可调节干燥的唇部，而 SPF 15 可为唇部最娇嫩的肌肤提供重要的保护，有助于修复和滋润唇部。 其神奇的天然配方非常适合干裂的唇部，所含的柑橘油可为肌肤深层补充营养，提供持久的呵护，为您的双唇提供额外保护。
清爽的 KORRES 珂诺诗野玫瑰润唇霜 SPF 15 主要含有乳油木果脂和向日葵蜡萃取物，赋予唇部完美的亮丽感，而深层补水可令双唇更加柔软诱人！ 橘子油能调理干燥嘴唇，而 SPF15 能为最脆弱的部位提供必要防护，有助于抚平和滋养唇部。

product_description:
Regain a youthful-looking complexion with Skin Authority Tri-Power Peptide Hydrator, a lightweight moisturiser that combines three advanced Peptides to fight visible signs of ageing.
Expertly hydrating, firming and evening out the appearance of skin, the moisturiser utilises AOX Technology™ (a combination of vitamins and antioxidants) and advanced Peptides to deliver Amino Acids for anti-ageing results. Its age-reversing properties target fine lines, wrinkles and loss of firmness to promote smoother, younger, brighter-looking skin. Gliding effortlessly across skin with no greasy residue, it will help the complexion retain moisture for a youthfully plump appearance.
name: Authority Tri-Power Peptide Hydrator

product_description:
L'Oreal歐萊雅男士勁能極速活膚液(50ml) 
繁忙的生活、高負荷的工作，昨夜，您的肌膚遭受持續攻擊，開始顯露疲態，進而缺水。補救行動從歐萊雅男士勁能極速活膚液開始。 
活膚液瞬息激活肌膚補水，配方極致豐富，富含維生素C，清爽不油膩，迅速沁融於肌膚，煥現最佳效果。

本品内含7％的D-Glyox（一种正在申请专利的，抗老化成分），其成分包括：石榴花、合欢树、脂质体肽，可对抗糖氧化（糖化及氧化均可改变皮肤蛋白质，使肌肤失去弹性、色素沉着、不再柔软）。
本款功效强大的修护霜富含芙蓉花提取物，可深入渗透肌肤，淡化抚平皮肤细纹和皱纹；内含的玻尿酸可滋润肌肤、使肌肤柔软光滑。 该面霜装在泵瓶式涂抹装置中，用起来极为方便。

茱莉蔻玫瑰保濕抗氧化面膜讓你綻放出嬌美容顏。強效滋養你的肌膚，高效鎖水保濕，保護你的皮膚免受環境侵害，讓你的皮膚回复年輕，重現自然光澤l. - LM

product_description:
Nourish, hydrate and protect skin with Oui Essential Hydrating Facial Serum from skinChemists. Infused with Aloe Vera, popular for its anti-inflammatory properties, the serum helps to soothe dry, irritated and blemished skin.
A balance of Vitamins and Anti-Oxidants work to protect the skin against exposure to environmental damage and aggressors, whilst also hydrating the skin and improving its visible firmness.
name: Oui Essential Hydrating Facial Serum 30ml

product_description:
使用适用于油性肌肤的 FOREO LUNA™ 斐珞尔露娜 2 修护和改善肌肤。这款产品旨在凭借其两分钟的快速爽肤功效提供专业标准的肌肤护理。 让您的肌肤看起来更加健康，LUNA™ 露娜 2 洁面仪将有帮助您幻化出更加亮丽剔透的肤色。
T-Sonic 透肤声波脉动配备有更柔软的非渗透性硅胶接触点，纤长刷毛设备可温和而有效地将声波脉动导入肌肤细胞，从而帮助打开堵塞毛孔，清除污垢和油脂。 硅胶"刷毛"超级卫生，可有效防止滋生细菌，以保持肌肤的清爽。
配备有高科技抗皱模式，这款洁面仪可直接将低频声波脉动导入到容易长皱纹的区域，以帮助淡化细纹，让肌肤看起来更紧致。 该设备为完全防水型设备，可在洗浴时安全使用。
name: FOREO Luna 斐珞尔露娜 2

product_description:
Trilogy 趣乐活柔韧洁面乳蕴含有纯植物精油和萃取物的混合物，让您拥有柔软、清爽而完全清洁的肌肤，可温和地卸除眼妆。 它所蕴含的营养丰富的玫瑰果和月见草油及芦荟可有效保湿和软化肌肤。
Trilogy 趣乐活柔韧洁面乳是一款纯正的美肤产品；它不仅可以卸妆，还能净化面部和眼部肌肤。 其润肤功效可使肌肤更加丰盈，能够为早晚护肤做充分准备。
Trilogy 趣乐活柔韧洁面乳蕴含有先进的天然成分，其中包括月见草、经过认证的有机玫瑰果油、荷荷巴和胡萝卜，非常适合用于爽肤、修复、软化、舒缓、调节和滋养肌肤。
使用说明：
name: 趣乐活柔韧洁面乳（200ml）

product_description:
這款產品紫花苜蓿葉綠素，可提高血紅細胞數量和血液中的氧氣含量，從而加速血液解毒和細胞修復，同時其中的海帶蘊含超過40 種礦物質，16 種氨基酸和11 種維他命，有助於促進內部組織保濕，有效地控制體重。 
本品具有香濃的奇異果風味，含有透明質酸，可調節和保存身體組織內水分。專門為提高身體素質，增強健康而設計，適合成年人使用。 - LM

 警告：

product_description: 使用具备防水性能的 Ultrasun 20 SPF Sports Gel，防止有害紫外线伤害。这是一款可快捷涂抹的轻盈、不油腻凝胶。 其可被快速吸收的特性非常适合于总在旅行的、活跃的体育爱好者，提供全天候防晒保护。 便携的泵式喷瓶提供有序涂抹，防止一次涂抹本品太多。 E.N.
name: 20 SPF Sports Gel (400ml)

product_description: Shiseido IBUKI Softening Concentrate蕴含强效成分，能帮您打造更光滑的肤色。 本品能充分补充肌肤水分，令肌肤柔滑润泽。 -SA
name: IBUKI Softening Concentrate (75ml)

product_description: 来自 L'Oreal Paris 的这款 Skin Perfection Cleansing Oil  专为深度高效清洁肌肤而设计，适合所有皮肤类型。 这款洗面奶可迅速溶解妆容，让您的肌肤倍感柔软和清新，还您不油不腻的面部肌肤。 创新的油配方，有助于重新平衡皮肤的天然油脂分泌，让您有一个水晶般透亮的肤色。
name: Paris Dermo Expertise Skin Perfection 15 Second Miracle Cleansing Oil - 适合所有皮肤类型 (150ml)

product_description:
Achieve a youthful complexion with Filorga NCTF-Reverse Mat; an effective regenerating fluid that tackles wrinkles and loss of elasticity, whilst leaving skin radiant.
Utilising NCTF®, a medicine-derived polyrevitalising complex, the potent fluid boasts an ultra-concentrated formula that has an equivalent concentration as injectable, anti-ageing treatments. The rich solution is effortlessly absorbed, enriching skin with an anti-ageing cocktail of Hyaluronic Acid, Collagen and an array of Vitamins. The intelligent formula is able to visibly smooth fine lines and wrinkles, even skin tone and transform a dull complexion by offering enviable radiance.
Ideal for oily and combination skin types, the ultra-lightweight texture glides onto skin, blurring the appearance of enlarged pores and delivering a matte finish that is free from unwanted shine.
name: NCTF-Reverse Mat 50ml

product_description:
使用素颜面部按摩器，复制独家Sarah Chapman Skinesis面部按摩的独特技术。 这种创新型设备，使您即使在家，也可达到专业级别的面部护理效果。
Sarah Chapman Skinesis 塑颜面部按摩器，采用精准的按摩技术，促进肌肤内营养物质与氧气的流动，使肤色健康红润。 本按摩器配有8个按摩头和48个粒状结构，可轻柔地重塑改善皮肤、排出毒素、缓解紧张、减少浮肿、促进血液流动，使肤色更好看，您的气质更超群。 本款按摩器设计完美，既可以用作毛孔深层清洁的终极清洁，也可用于晚间面部护理。提升面部光泽，使面部肌肤焕发光釆。
name: Chapman Skinesis 塑颜面部按摩器

product_description:
Burt’s Bees present Burt’s Bag of Treats Gift Set, a collection of must-have treatments to leave skin feeling nourished and refreshed. Expertly formulated with all-natural ingredients straight from the hive, the indulgent set contains a lip balm, body scrub and lotion plus a free sample of a night cream. Presented in chic reusable wash bag, it’s the perfect gift for a loved one.
Beeswax Lip Balm with Vitamin E & Peppermint (4.25g)
Nourish and condition sore, cracked lips with this indulgent natural lip balm, bursting with Coconut and Sunflower Oils as well as essential fatty acids and vitamins. Whilst Beeswax seals in hydration, extract of Peppermint adds a refreshing tingle. Expect a softened and hydrated pout with this best-selling balm.
Peach and Willowbark Deep Pore Scrub (110g)
This natural facial cleanser contains Ginger and Sea Algae Extracts that will leave your skin replenished and naturally nourished. The finely ground peach stone naturally and gently exfoliates skin, while the Willowbark and Golden Seal help to remove oil and clear clogged pores. Other ingredients include Hawaiian Ginger and Seaweed Extract to increase circulation and replenish essential minerals.
Milk & Honey Body Lotion (70g)
Suitable for normal to dry skin, this lightweight, fast-absorbing lotion delivers long-lasting moisture to the entire body. Nourishing Milk Powder and Honey soften skin, whilst an effective blend of Coconut and Grape Seed Oils provide essential nutrients so you can experience rejuvenated skin with a smoothened texture.
name: Bees Burt's Bag of Treats Gift Set

product_description:
MONU 的保濕膠原霜成份豐富，促進膠原產生，同時對抗細紋和皺紋，效果顯著。
使用玫瑰和天竺葵精油、月見草和黑加侖籽油與海洋骨膠原，舒緩皮膚，同時進行深層清潔，但不會使皮膚乾燥。 KD
name: 保湿胶原霜 (50ml)

product_description:
小袋裝(10ml x 4) Avojo Skincare 炭黑撕拉式面膜使用簡便，專門用於防止並祛除黑頭、污垢和粉塵，用後可使肌膚倍感柔滑，活力無限。這款面膜適合每週或隔週使用，是祛除T 區黑頭的完美產品。 - ED 
 使用說明： 
 - 在T 區（鼻子、額頭和下巴）塗抹一層厚實均勻的面膜，避免靠近眼部。 
 - 為達到最佳效果，等待25-30 分鐘或等到面膜乾結。 
 - 撕掉面膜並用溫水洗臉。 
 - 每週使用1-2 次。
name: 炭黑撕拉式面膜 - 小袋装 (10ml x 4)

product_description:
Zelens 广谱防晒霜 SPF 30 具备日常长波紫外线广谱防晒作用，可增强肌肤的自然抵抗性，有助于延缓衰老。
这款防晒霜采用微胶囊技术，具备内嵌在基于硅粒子的有机紫外线过滤器，可在肌肤表面形成一层无形的保护层，有效防止来自太阳和自由基损伤，淡化细纹和皱纹。 创新 Imudilin® 可增强免疫系统，蕴含的维他命 C 可提亮暗沉的肌肤，淡化色斑。 让肌肤柔软顺滑，起到保护作用的同时而不会有油腻黏着的感觉。
name: 广谱防晒霜 SPF 30（50 毫升）

product_description: Caudalie Premier Cru 系列 Elixir 是一款采用半油半精华液的特殊干性油。 elixir 可轻松融入肌肤，为涂抹护肤霜做好准备，因而您可获得最强的抗衰老保护，并实现更青春亮泽的肤色。 - I.M
name: Premier Cru The Elixir (29ml)

product_description:
茱莉活顏修復面霜專門為成熟肌膚設計，使肌膚重煥年輕光彩，一款必備的日常護理產品。它含有豐富的自然原料，使肌膚更有彈性，散發自然光澤，讓肌膚看起來更年輕。 
成分中含有迷迭香葉，糖原，薄荷葉，山葵，創新科技使肌膚立即感到清爽，獨有的嶄新技術Biosome5幫助提高肌膚質感。同時包含甘草精華, 高麗參，桑椹根提取物，使肌膚恢復活力。 KD 
 使用方法:

這款多功能神奇護理油清香淡雅，柔化肌膚，為肌膚提供悉心滋養。糅合乳木果油與多種獨特天然精油，按摩或沐浴時有效修護肌膚，尤其適合護理乾枯頭髮、指甲和皮膚。 
豐富的天然木槿油補水保濕，富含的摩洛哥堅果油調理強健皮膚細胞，令肌膚清爽滋潤。肌膚柔潤絲滑，散發花香和陽光的氣息，伴有清雅的木香，綻放健康光澤。
name: 欧缇丽尊贵美肌护理油 100ml

product_description:
Murad无油防晒霜SPF30，防止因肌肤暴露而造成过的早衰老化迹象，可提供高SPF保护，深层保湿，使肌肤粉嫩无油光。
Murad无油防晒霜SPF30含有纯石榴提取物及广谱防晒剂，保护肌肤免遭自由基损伤，在阳光下保护肌肤。 内含泛醇及钠PCA，可锁住水分，保持肌肤柔软细嫩；轻型微矿物质，使肌肤细腻无油光。
使用说明：
name: SPF30（50ml）

product_description:
使用AcnEase痤疮修护Treatment（1瓶），使您的肌肤免受痤疮的侵扰。 非常适合那些有慢性或严重皮肤问题或身体患有痤疮者使用，这款产品将有助于避免痤疮的重复出现。
采用全植物护理可恢复因内分泌变化、环境、压力、药物治疗和饮食而打破的体内均衡，解决痤疮和肌肤问题的根本原因，如酒渣鼻。 绝对安全且无副作用，它非常适合男性和女性青少年及成年人用来清洁肌肤。
关于品牌： AcnEase®是一个最有效的植物Therapeutic®，可治疗已有的痤疮，防止新的粉刺和青春痘的形成。此外，如果遵循指示使用，AcnEase®所含的各种成分会让您的肌肤更清爽和更健康，同时黑头、白头和红肿会减少。
AcnEase®可以还原由内分泌变化、环境因素、某些药物、精神紧张、压力和饮食习惯打乱了自然的内部平衡。痤疮被视为是内环境紊乱的外在表现形式。 AcnEase®是独特的，因为它不仅可以治疗疾病的外部症状，而且还解决痤疮和其他与肌肤有关的问题的根本原因，例如酒渣鼻的内在原因。
AcnEase非常适合有以下症状的人使用：青春痘、荷尔蒙痤疮、更年期痤疮（女性）、慢性粉刺、因辛辣和油腻的食物而加重的痤疮、吸烟、压力、酒精或其他药物、面部和Body痤疮，囊肿性痤疮。
name: - 1瓶

Premier Cru The Cream (50ml)

Its silky texture melts onto skin and replenishes moisture to reveal an even tone and defined facial contours.

A powerful, anti-ageing eye cream developed to visibly correct wrinkles, dark circles and puffiness around the delicate eye area. Instantly transforms tired eyes and delivers intense hydration, whilst firming and smoothing skin to leave it radiant and youthful-looking. Fragrance free.

Providing antioxidant, firming and wrinkle-fighting benefits, the elixir leaves skin looking smooth, radiant and refined.

Pure Hyaluronic Serum (30ml)
An ultra-hydrating formula with a convenient dropper applicator for mess-free use. Infused with a cocktail of beneficial ingredients, including Hyaluronic Acid and antioxidant Vitamin E, the quick-absorbing serum delivers intense moisture and hydration, whilst plumping and firming skin to reveal a smoother, younger-looking appearance. Can be used as a make-up primer to soften fine lines and restore a radiant glow.
Hydrating Moisturiser (50ml)
Powered by a cocktail of patented peptides, the anti-ageing moisturiser helps to minimise the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles for a smoother, more refined texture. During the ageing process, the skin's collagen production decreases, causing it to become thinner with visible signs of sagging. An antioxidant-rich blend of Pomegranate, Green Tea and Vitamin E work to firm, plump and soften skin naturally, whilst defending against the damaging effects of free radicals and environmental aggressors.
