product_description:
The Illuminator Brightening Serum from French skincare brand Christian BRETON combines advanced scientific technology with nourishing, plant-derived ingredients to tackle the look of discolouration and dullness.
Specifically developed for the delicate neck and décolletage, the pioneering formula is brimming with antioxidants, acids and emollients, which work in synergy to minimise the appearance of age spots and optimise hydration levels for a smoothing effect.
With continued use, it leaves skin feeling re-energised and supple, with a clarified and luminescent finish that defies premature signs of ageing.

product_description: 本品為一種獨特的面部提拉精華，含高強度DMAE，幫助緊緻和調理肌膚，同時顯著消除深紋和皺紋。配方還包含補水磷脂，幫助受損更多的肌膚。本品還可增強所有Perricone MD 裴禮康護理產品的效果。不含對羥基苯甲酸酯。 - SC

Experience a purifying cleanse with Mavala's Pore Detox Perfecting Foaming Cleanser, a soap-free micellar formula that gently cleanses away makeup, dirt and urban toxins from the face.
Transforming from a lotion to a light, airy foam, the face wash has a physiological pH (neutral for skin) and effectively refreshes and purifies the complexion. It contains sebum regulating Fleischer Willowherb, and Witch Hazel Water, a purifying and astringent ingredient that has the ability to decongest pores without drying skin. Performing a gentle yet effective cleanse, it will leave skin with a refined, fresh, naturally radiant appearance.

product_description: 配方含对眼睛最重要的十大成分，将其混合制作，成就了这款神奇眼霜。 除非您对下列某事物有癖好，如黑眼圈、鱼尾纹、眼睛浮肿、下垂的眉形，呃，被称为夫人等。我们建议您马上抢购此款修复型眼霜。

Relieve irritated skin with Skin Authority Redness Relief; a natural cream that works to visibly soothe irritation and inflammation, such as those resulting from minor sunburn, seasonal changes or superficial abrasions.
The botanical rich formula moisturises areas of redness, leaving skin feeling soothed and relieved. Expect redness to be visibly eliminated and the skin to appear happy and healthy.

Enhance the benefits of your skincare regime with the STARSKIN Artist FX™ Ceramic Stone Refill Pack; a ceramic head that is designed to fix securely onto STARSKIN’s Artist FX™ Auto-Patting Makeup Applicator.
The ceramic applicator expertly massages creams and serums into skin, which enhances the absorption of the product. Effortlessly attaching to the device, the stone head allows for hands-free application, which is more hygienic and better for skin. The ceramic stone refill head boasts an ergonomic design, which boasts a tapered end that can perform precision applications around the eyes, lips and nose.
When cleaned regularly, each stone refill with last up to two months.

Quench skin’s thirst with the anti-blemish Jeju Mayu Cream from Korean skincare brand, Skin79. Designed to deliver a dose of nourishment to skin, the moisturising cream is ideal for morning and night use, leaving skin calm and comfortable.
Absorbed quickly and effortlessly, the anti-ageing formula is enriched with a skin-loving blend of Shea Butter and Mango, which offers a luxurious veil of moisture to skin. Without leaving behind a sticky or greasy residue, the Jeju Mayu Cream is concentrated with Mayu, a naturally extracted oil of Horsehair, native to the Jeju Island. Expect skin to be hydrated and nourished.

product_description: Revitalise your complexion whilst you sleep with the Gatineau Age Benefit Regenerating Night Elixir. This high performance concentrate rejuvenates skin to leave it firm, toned and youthful. Formulated with high-performance agents, this Night Elixie is a comprehensive anti-ageing product that restores the youth of the complexion by combating wrinkles, sagging, fine lines and uneven skin tone.

product_description: May Lindstrom Skin present The Facial Treatment Brush; a must-have tool for applying and blending skincare products. Crafted with a natural, sustainable wood handle and recyclable aluminium ferrule, the brush features a slanted head fitted with vegan-friendly Taklon fibres that expertly distribute product, whilst remaining soft and gentle to skin. Finished with branding.

product_description:
Remove make up and impurities without affecting your skin's natural pH balance with Gatineau Gentle Silk Cleanser. Suitable for even the most sensitive skin, it won't cause irritation or stinging, so you can achieve wonderfully cleansed and refreshed skin without suffering discomfort.
Directions for use: Apply to face morning and night using your hands, then rinse with water.

Treat dry skin to Salcura's Bioskin Dermaserum; a lightweight, non-sticky gel formula that works to calm and soothe eczema and psoriasis on the face, including around the delicate eye area.
Harnessing the powers of Aloe Vera, Tea Tree and omega-rich Sea Buckthorn, the 98% natural serum penetrates quickly and deeply to relieve itching and inflammation, whilst promoting healthy skin growth and supporting the natural barrier function. Almond and Safflower Oils are blended with English Lavender to moisturise, hydrate and restore soft, comfortable skin.

product_description:
When you need a little help to dose off to sleep,
The Sleepy Head Stocking lets you get 40 winks.
Filled with relaxing delights that help you calm and unwind,
You’ll feel soothed and renewed and a lot more refined.
The exclusive Sleepy Head Stocking from Lookfantastic contains everything you need for a peaceful night’s sleep. Each product has been selected for its calming properties and ability to send you off into wonderful sweet dreams.

product_description: Shiseido Future Solution LX Concentrated Balancing Softener能令肌肤质地更为细致。 本品能为肌肤补充水分，令肌肤柔软水嫩； 还能磨净肌肤，促进吸收，同时均匀肤色； 其Skingenecell 1P成分则能抵抗岁月痕迹。 -SA

product_description: This antioxidant powerhouse delivers an intense surge of soothing moisture nourishment to relieve dry, flaky skin. After the first application, skin feels smooth, velvety soft and the complexion is restored to a vibrant rosy glow. This cream’s anti-aging properties work overtime to minimize the appearance of imperfections and wrinkles. It also acts as a great base, helping makeup glide on smoothly and evenly. - S.C

product_description:
Target slackening skin with The Jojoba Company's Absolute Serum; an anti-ageing, natural formula that works to minimise visible lines and wrinkles.
Harnessing the powers of Pure Australian Jojoba, a golden liquid wax similar to that produced by human skin, the lightweight, silky serum helps to restore a soft, supple and youthful-looking complexion.
A nourishing blend of Kakadu Plum, Hyaluronic Acid and Silymarin (a potent antioxidant derived from Milk Thistle) delivers firming and plumping benefits, whilst moisturising and brightening skin to reignite a luminous glow. Mature skin appears smoother and more refined with improved texture and tone.

product_description:
可用 NAOBAY 的男士活力须后膏使剃须后的皮肤不痛不痒；这是一种不油腻的须后膏，可使剃刀引起的发红和痒痛之处立即感到凉爽并得到舒缓。
其配方采用可使皮肤更有活力的薄荷、芦荟和银杏提取物，可使皮肤更有活力，有抗炎的益处，既能长时间恢复舒适感，又能巩固皮肤的天然保护层，以使面部皮肤恢复活力并得到补水。 可消除皮肤紧绷的现象并补充水分，以显露出柔软光滑的皮肤。
未对产品进行动物试验。 已得到森林管理委员会 (FSC) 认证。

product_description:
The Collagenesis Day & Night Lotion from Australian beauty brand freezeframe is an advanced, multi-tasking treatment that has been specifically developed to fight collagen loss – the number one cause of premature signs of ageing.
Delivering benefits over 24 hours, the powerful formula contains an exclusive combination of ingredients to replicate ‘AGE (Advanced Glycation End) breaker’ compounds that disrupt the cross-linking cycle of glycation. Sage extract and Niacinamide offer chemical properties close to ‘AGE breakers’, working to prevent the glycation process and cellular deterioration to leave skin looking brighter and revitalised.
Low-weight molecular level Marine Collagen Peptide delivers a plumping and tightening effect, smoothing the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles. Suitable for all skin types, the moisturiser leaves skin feeling lifted and revitalised, with optimum hydration levels and a youthful looking radiance.

product_description:
Treat your skin whilst you sleep with Mavala's Aqua Plus Multi-Moisturizing Sleeping Mask, a creamy face mask that delivers long-lasting hydration through the night.
Inspired by Korean sleeping packs, the leave-on mask creates a silky, lightweight and breathable veil on skin that restores moisture whilst delivering active ingredients for maximum benefit. It contains 100% Swiss Mallow Flower for a soothing effect, and three different molecular weights of Hyaluronic Acid to plump skin with much needed hydration. Whilst restoring moisture, it also reinforces skin's natural barrier for improved resilience. Upon waking, skin feels replenished, rehydrated and supple. Infused with a subtle fragrance.

product_description:
Revitalise dull and lifeless skin with the AminoGenesis Perfect Reflection Serum, an advanced anti-aging skincare treatment that helps combat fine lines and discolouration.
Lightweight and non-greasy, the concentrated, water-based formula features the signature AminoGenesis<sup>™</sup> base formula with 17 plant-derived amino acids as well as the patented, breakthrough peptide Preventhelia™, which combats free radical damage and helps neutralize oxidative aggressors that both cause premature signs of aging.
It also offers four powerhouse antioxidants in the form of Vitamins A, C and D plus CoQ10, ensuring skin feels rejuvenated and refreshed. Suitable for daily use, expect a radiant and healthy-looking complexion.

product_description:
Clear up your skin with AcnEase Body Acne Treatment - 8  Bottles (Bundle). This natural treatment is the  perfect remedy for  those who suffer with chronic or severe body acne.  Safe and free from side effects, the capsules are  specially formulated  with all-botanical ingredients to help both male  and female adults and  teens.
The six week treatment restores the internal balance that can be  disrupted by  endocrine changes, the environment, stress, medication and  diet,  addressing the underlying causes of skin conditions.
If you're below 180lbs, take 4 tablets with water, three times per day.  If you're above 180lbs, take 6 tablets, three times per day.
name: Body Acne Treatment - 8 Bottles (Bundle)

product_description:
Cowshed Bullocks美白面部磨砂膏可去除死皮和表面污垢，以确保剃须顺利而无划痕。 火麻仁油具有舒缓和愈合伤口的特性，有助于保持肌肤的水分含量而不会有油腻的感觉。
利用这款Cowshed去角质产品，为光滑剃须做好准备。
  Bullocks美白面部磨砂膏有助于防止毛发向内生长，其中还含有甘菊精油和雪松以愈合和平衡肌肤。 它不含苯甲酸酯，无石油化工产品，且不添加硫酸盐、人工香料和色素。 它适合素食者使用，并且没有经过动物测试。
使用说明：

product_description:
使用 Erno Laszlo Hydra-Therapy Refresh Infusion Serum，实现深层补水。这是一款轻盈、丝滑的精华液，用于护理和恢复干燥肌肤。 这一配方含有 Triple-Action Moisture Charge Complex，可渗透肌肤的三层组织，保护和保持最佳的水分含量。
"水分磁铁"可吸引和锁住水分，同时防止水分流失并保护益生菌；超级保湿成分可即刻舒缓和平滑肌肤表面及深处。 这款精华液可赋予著名的"拉兹洛光泽"，丰润肌肤，呈现青春容颜，让您感觉超级滋润，肤色充满活力。 - K.N

product_description:
A'kin Unscented 24 Hour Pure Moisture    
Restore moisture and suppleness to your skin with A’Kin Unscented 24 Hour Pure Moisture. Containing a blend of all-natural ingredients to safely and effectively care for your complexion, this unscented crème is an absolute must-have. A’Kin Unscented 24 Hour Pure Moisture relies on vitamins A, E, B5 and C and alpha lipoic acid, as well as echium oil, which is rich in omegas 9, 3 and 6 essential fatty acids. Suitable for all skin types, this incredible moisturiser offers nutrition, moisture and care for you complexion.
Directions of use:

product_description:
Drench dry complexions with the Polaar Skin Quenching Hydrating Mask; a gentle face mask that leaves skin feeling refreshed and revitalised.
Harnessing the brand’s exclusive IceSource system developed over years of extensive research, the creamy-textured formula penetrates skin with encapsulated Glacier Water that effectively absorbs into the epidermis for intense and long lasting hydration. Rich in minerals and trace elements, the face mask results in skin that feels smooth and supple with a clarified purity.

product_description:
使用 skinChemists 蜂毒面部精华液，让肌肤变得光滑，重现活力，呈现出更均匀的肤色和年轻态。 蜂毒有效成分能够促进血液循环，丰盈肌肤，淡化细纹和皱纹，同时Tegocosmo C250成分还能淡化老年斑和缺陷。
另外，它还特别添加了麦卢卡蜂蜜，能够深入滋养并滋润肌肤，这款精华液可以显著改善皮肤的整体肤色、质感和活力。 独立小组测试表明，100％的女性表示使用完这款精华液后她们可以感觉到皮肤重新焕发活力，同时99％的人认为肌肤的外观也得到了改善。 - L.M.

product_description:
Intensely purify skin with the Dust Clean Up Deep Cleansing Mask from Korean beauty brand Mizon. Enriched with nourishing plant extracts, the innovative sheet mask features micro-cushion bubbles that transfer upon application, working to dissolve dirt and effectively unclog pores without causing irritation.
Removing even the finest dust build up and dead skin cells with gently exfoliating Alpha Hydroxy Acids, it infuses skin with Moringa and Meadowfoam to hydrate and revitalise. Skin feels thoroughly cleansed with a more smooth, soft and even surface texture.

使用 skinChemists 眼部焕颜笔，减少疲态和压力，让双眼看起来神采奕奕。 利用光反射技术，对抗黑眼圈和暗沉肌肤，是熬夜后的终极救星。
这款多效焕颜笔质地为蜜桃色，可以涂于眉骨和颧骨，增加面部的立体感，甚至还可以作为修补化妆失误的遮瑕膏。 - L.M.

product_description: 这款清爽的磨砂膏含有去角质微粒，能够去除死皮细胞，让肌肤变得彻底洁净，柔嫩光滑。 富含地榆、生姜和肉桂精华，能有效去除表皮多余的油脂并缩小毛孔，防止细菌感染，缓解肌肤油光。

product_description: Ila Spa 莹亮面部磨砂膏将带给您容光焕发的嫩滑肌肤。 这款磨砂膏十分温和，用后不干燥，可以放心定期使用；添加了科茨沃尔德蜂蜜，滋润肌肤，吸附杂质；另外黑加仑去角质粒子富含欧米伽6，清洁肌肤，柔嫩顺滑。 这款去角质霜还包含大马士革玫瑰精油，能够促进皮肤细胞新生并逆转衰老的迹象；此外，檀木精华还能滋润肌肤，去除瑕疵。 使用后，肌肤将变得柔软水嫩。 - L.M.

product_description:
茱莉蔻柔潤保濕日霜完美滋養你的皮膚。蘊含金盞花、洋金菊等天然力量，配合珍貴的玫瑰果油及牛油果油，具高效保濕成份. 
茱莉寇品牌注重生命、活力、美麗，所有這一切都可以在柔潤保濕日霜發現。全面保濕重現光澤維持肌膚健康的平衡。乾性皮膚更舒適
使用方法:
name: (125ml)

product_description:
Meticulously formulated with French pharmaceutical expertise, CODAGE present the Spring Break "Detox and Skin Awakening" serum. Deeply moisturising and inspiring a bright and healthy complexion, the reparative treatment works to restore comfort in the skin and rebuild the skin's matrix; helping to defend against harsh weather changes. Packed full of antioxidants and energising agents which actively initiate cell vitality, the antipollution formula will leave your skin feeling fresh and looking radiant. Suitable for all skin types. - K.N.
Hy2 - A deeply moisturising property that restores and retains hydration, helping to reduce gradual moisture loss. Boosting collagen, this ingredient also plumps, tightens and firms skin for a younger complexion.
Ao2 - A reparative and protective ingredient that enhances the skin's natural defences whilst reducing free radical production. Protects against UV rays.
Po2 - A protective ingredient which defends against pollutants. Works to enhance the skin's natural purification process whilst preserving antioxidants and preventing cell death. The activation of keratinocyte growth reinforces the cutaneous barrier.
Re3 - With anti-inflammatory and antibacterial action, this deeply reparative ingredient boosts cellular renewal and helps rebuild injured tissue.
Dx3 - Stimulating natural detoxification, Dx3 works to repair proteins and eliminate toxins for energised skin that glows.
Ec3 - Providing a variety of skin beneficial results, this mix of ingredients helps to reveal overall radiant skin. Skin cell renewal is promoted, moisture is retained and antioxidant properties help to protect.
name: Spring Break Detox and Skin Awakening Serum (10ml)

product_description:
Specially combined to cleanse, calm and soothe normal skin types, the MONU Top Trio contains three products to enhance and revive the complexion and leave it feeling soft, nourished and refreshed.
The MONU Top Trio for Normal Skin contains:
Active Cleanser (180ml)
This milk cleansing lotion thoroughly cleans whilst leaving your skin well-balanced and soft. Calendula Extract helps to soothe inflammation, and the Jasmine Essential Oil leaves a fresh, clean scent on your skin.
Active Toner (180ml)
A refreshing toner that tightens pores and prevents breakouts with its Witch Hazel ingredient. Removes residue left from cleansing lotion and leaves your skin feeling fresh and toned.
Skin Perfector (50ml)
Smoothes and radiates skin to give it a perfected look. Make a fantastic makeup base.
name: Top Trio - Normal

product_description: The ARK Age Maintain Renewing Exfoliator will gently remove dead skin cells, so you can say hello to bright, radiant skin. Specially formulated for those in their mid 30s-50, it uses multi-fruit acids to slough away dirt and dry skin. Enriched with white clay which increases circulation to optimise exfoliation, it also contains prickly pear extract which speeds up the elimination of dead skin cells. - L.M.
name: - Age Maintain Renewing Exfoliator (75ml)

product_description:
Meets the needs of dry and dehydrated skin with the Flower Power Hydrating Sheet Mask from FACEINC by nails inc. Printed with an iconic flower crown, the sheet mask guarantees to quench skin’s thirst and restore a radiant complexion.
The mask is enriched with Botanical Flower Extracts and Vitamin E, which work in synergy to offer antioxidant protection and to deliver a veil of intense hydration. Complete with Hyaluronic Acid, Collagen and Cucumber Extract, the mask leaves the complexion thoroughly nourished, smooth and refreshed.
name: by nails inc. Flower Power Hydrating Sheet Mask - Nourishing and Smoothing

product_description: skinChemists Ultra Conceal+ Light (15ml) helps you to cover the evidence of sleepness nights, stress and late night partying. The concealer gently helps the eye area to appear more radiant and illuminated to leave eyes looking more defined and highlighted. The skincare product will help to reduce the appearance of wrinkles and leave you with a smooth, mattified finish. -SA
name: Ultra Conceal+ Light (15ml)

product_description:
Chantecaille  花妍水漾保湿露，含丰富的保湿和抗氧化植物萃取物，专门对抗多种肌肤老化。 添加的熊果苷，使肤色更均匀、更明亮，明显减少老年斑的出现。 配方独特，采用活性纳米胶囊视黄醇技术，轻柔地改善皮肤的外观质感，打造更紧致、更年轻的肌肤。 皱纹和细纹明显减少。
配方轻盈，内含越橘提取物等成分，具有保湿舒缓特性，使肌肤更光滑柔软、彻底滋润肌肤。

product_description:
Combat pigmentation issues with the Elemis Your New Skin Solution - Brighten; an intelligent collection of skincare essentials that work to brighten dull and pigmented skin. The set is host to a daily cleanser, potent serum, effective enzyme peel and facial oil in capsule form. Combined, the products are able to create a clear and uniform complexion.
White Brightening Even Tone Cleanser (185ml)
Formulated with a blend of Sophora and kiwi extract, the White Brightening Even Tone Cleanser targets fine lines and pigmentation to deliver more even looking skin tone. Utilising a White Brightening Complex, the effective cleanser includes Daisy extract and encapsulated Vitamin C to boost radiance and reduce excess oils, resulting in smoother skin. The gentle cleansing, lightweight foam removes impurities to reveal clean, refreshed skin.
White Brightening Even Tone Serum (10ml)
The White Brightening Even Tone Serum boasts intensive brightening properties and is clinically proven to reduce the appearance of uneven pigmentation through continued use. The potent serum intelligently combines Daisy and Pea extracts with encapsulated Vitamin c to help reduce the appearance of dark spots, age spots and other imperfections, resulting in a brighter, clearer and more even complexion.
Papaya Enzyme Peel (50ml)
The unique, non-granular Papaya Enzyme Peel boasts 7 active ingredients that work to repair and protect skin. The natural exfoliating fruit enzyme action of Papaya and Pineapple visibly smooth, brighten and clarify the complexion. Ideal for sensitive or mature complexions, the formula gently and effectively exfoliates without causing irritation. Skin is treated with Seaweed Actives and Vitamin E, leaving you with smooth and moisturised skin.
Cellular Recovery Skin Bliss Capsules (14 capsules)
The Cellular Recovery Skin Bliss Capsules are the ultimate anti-pollution solution; containing potent age-defying anti-oxidants to refresh, nourish and distress skin. The capsules work to visibly repair signs of ageing as well as sweeping clean the skin cell matrix, ridding it of toxins to allow nutrients to be absorbed, thus renewing youthful skin vitality. Lavender and Rose Absolute provide a ‘bliss effect’, meaning skin appears de-stressed and thoroughly nourished. The Rose day capsule restores a youthful bloom to skin, whilst the Lavender evening capsule balances and repairs stressed skin.
name: Your New Skin Solution - Brighten

product_description:
Karin Herzog 凯伦·赫容清新爽肤水可有效清洁爽肤，它是一款柔肤水，可有效清除肌肤的化妆品残留。
这款温和的柔肤水具有舒缓和爽肤功效，可为肌肤补充水分和改善肤色，与此同时祛除肌肤表面的任何污垢和化妆品残留。 让您的肌肤感觉清爽、丰盈而有光泽，并恢复 PH 值平衡。

 Perricone MD 裴禮康冷等離子代表了裴禮康目前最全面最有效的技術。對抗皺紋、增大的毛孔、乾燥、發紅、脫色、膚色不均勻、雜質、鬆弛、粗糙和無光澤，無論年齡如何，不論哪種肌膚類型，本品都可提供超凡效果。

Infused with a nourishing blend of Wheat Germ, Orange Oil and Avocado Oil, the fast-absorbing cream replenishes and restores skin to leave it smooth and comfortable. Inspires a radiant, glowing complexion with improved texture and elasticity.

Refresh your complexion with the Salcura Antiac Daily Face Wash; a pH neutral formula developed to eliminate breakout-causing bacteria without over-drying or uncomfortable tightness.
Harnessing the powers of Sea Buckthorn, Aloe Vera and Coconut Oil, the soap-free face wash soothes, cools and protects acne-prone skin, whilst regulating sebum production to reveal an even, rebalanced complexion. Oily skin is soft, smooth and expertly cleansed with a long-lasting matte finish.

本品含豐富的維生素，為無油和防水耐汗乳，提供超強的UVA/UVB 防護，快速吸收，不留油膩殘餘。配方針對極端情況設計，在肌膚表面形成保護層，水上或水中的劇烈體育活動期間依然保持有效。

外出前30 分鐘使用，防護效果最佳。嚴重出汗或用毛巾擦乾後或者日曬60-80 分鐘後重新塗抹。

product_description: Elemis 领先洁肤乳是一种新型抗衰老洁面乳。 该洁面乳包装是一个150毫升的瓶子，方便使用。 可去除污垢、抚平细纹和皱纹，令肌肤更健康、更年轻。 Elemis为庆祝其二十五周年纪念日推出这款领先洁肤乳。 本产品配备了一双100％纯棉面清洁手套，采用创新乳液清洁肌肤。 本品可清洁面部、颈部、肩部。 为了达到最佳效果，日常使用本品时，可用指尖轻柔地在肌肤上涂抹。 将本品在肌肤上保持一分钟，然后用温暖的手套洗去。 必要时重复擦拭。

利用KORRES Pomegranate Cleansing湿巾有效净化和滋润面部和眼睛。 适合所有类型的肌肤，这些清爽湿巾可从您的脸上清除灰尘和污垢。

name: Pomegranate Cleansing湿巾 - 油性/混合性Skin（25片装）

product_description:
Repair and rebuild skin with Oui Essential Hydrating Night Moisturiser from skinChemists. Infused with Aloe Vera, popular for its anti-inflammatory properties, the night cream helps to soothe dry, irritated and blemished skin. Monoi Tahitian, a perfume oil works to moisturise and soothe skin, visibly repairing damage and stress experienced by the skin whilst it is most receptive to repair, during sleep
A balance of Vitamins and Anti-Oxidants work to protect the skin against exposure to environmental damage and aggressors, whilst also hydrating the skin and improving its visible firmness. The moisturiser is finished with Coconut Oil, offering additional hydration, helping to balance dry, itchy and sensitive skin.

The serum boasts a revolutionary formula that combines award winning Snow Algae, Marine Collagen and Glacier Water to create a hydrating and nourishing serum. When applied to skin, the serum provides skin with a cooling sensation and will leave you with a matte-looking complexion. -SA

Omorovicza 黃金緊緻滋養面膜可瞬效提升肌膚，有效恢復肌膚能量。獨特配方可鎮靜、滋養肌膚，持久保濕，同時有效減少細紋和皺紋。 
特別適合敏感，乾性，混合和中性皮膚，此款免洗型面膜質地豐富細膩，吸收迅速，讓肌膚充滿彈性，豐潤飽滿，瞬效綻放年輕光澤。 
 主要成分和功效：
name: 黄金紧致滋养面膜

product_description: 重新獲得年輕的光澤通過使用葡萄反轉醇緊緻亮彩日霜SPF20來自歐緹麗 .這個品牌含專利成分葡萄反轉醇，緊實肌膚，增加肌膚彈性。使肌膚迅速吸收營養，不黏膩的乳液為肌膚提供一層保護，保護肌膚免受環境傷害。同時刺激膠原蛋白產生使肌膚充滿彈性，全天光彩照人。無油系列。

Jurlique 是一个提供最优质奢侈护肤品的品牌。使用该品牌的 Nutri-Define Eye Contour Balm，令娇嫩的眼部区域恢复活力。 丰盈乳霜采用正在申请专利的 Biosome5 技术配制，富含五种主要成分，包括迷迭香、薄荷、辣根、桑树根和糖原，旨在修复深皱纹、鱼尾纹和松弛的皮肤。 天然来源的脂质体可提供这些高效的活性物质，抑制衰老的迹象，呈现更紧致、光滑、年轻的肌肤。 E.N.

product_description:
Restore a radiant glow with Balance Me's BB Natural Perfection SPF 25; a lightweight, ultra-hydrating formula that works to plump, moisturise and protect skin.
Infused with a host of beneficial ingredients, including Hyaluronic Acid, Rosehip Oil and antioxidant Blackberry Leaf Extract, the BB cream firms and refines skin, whilst delivering natural-looking coverage with a hint of colour for a beautifully even tone.
Ideal as a primer beneath make-up, its innovative sun filter is combined with Spruce Knot, Lotus Flower and Violet Seed to defend against the damaging effects of UVA and UVB rays. Skin is bright, calm and comfortable with long-lasting moisture and hydration. Suitable for all skin types.
name: Me BB Natural Perfection SPF 25 40ml

product_description:
Tackle problematic, breakout-prone skin on-the-spot with the ESPADA™ Acne-Clearing Pen from Swedish beauty brand FOREO; a pioneering, at-home treatment that combines their renowned T-Sonic™ pulsations with powerful blue light technology to deliver unparalleled results.
The intelligent device utilises 415NM of blue light LEDs that penetrate deep below the surface layer of skin, clinically proven to kill acne-causing bacteria at the source without causing pain or discomfort, with targeted light application ensuring surgical-like precision to treat even the smallest blemish right from when it emerges for instant action.
The gentle T-Sonic™ pulsations activate upon contact with skin, working to diffuse the light into pores to enhance efficiency while stimulating micro-circulation to promote skin renewal and repair. With continued use, the overall complexion appears healthier looking and more refined with a noticeable decrease in breakouts.  
Ergonomically designed with the head coated in ultra-hygienic, 100% waterproof silicone, ESPADA™ prevents the spread of acne-causing bacteria and feels smooth to touch for optimum comfort even on sensitive skin, with one charge providing up to 60 2-minute treatments. With no need to replace cartridges, it provides a long-term investment for visibly clearer skin.
name: ESPADA Acne-Clearing Pen - Cobalt Blue

product_description:
L'Oreal Paris Revitalift Laser Renew Precision Eye Cream 有助于眼部周围细腻肌肤恢复活力。 三重作用配方能抚平皱纹，减少眼袋和紧致肌肤，只需四周就会有明显的效果。 获得神清气爽、青春的双眸！
使用说明：按压管体，挤出少许并涂抹于眼周肌肤，按摩直至吸收。
name: Paris Dermo Expertise Revitalift Laser Renew Precision Eye Cream - 三效合一 (15ml)

product_description:
The GLOV Hydro Cleansing Travel Set is an effortless, efficient and simple way to cleanse skin without the need for a cleanser, perfect for travel or as an everyday solution. Presented in a re-usable cosmetics storage case, the kit provides an innovative solution for refreshed and purified skin.
On-The-Go Hydro Cleanser
Utilising advanced microfibre technology, the cleansing glove contains refined fibres up to 30 times thinner than a cotton pad, which boast electrostatic properties to absorb makeup, dirt and excess oil like a magnet without the need for a facial cleanser. The delicate and naturally antibacterial glove delivers a light yet effective clean with a gentle peeling effect to unveil skin that feels fresher and revitalised.
Quick Treat Cleanser
Perfect for quick cleansing and fixes, the Quick Treat Cleanser is a compact version that fits in your purse for any-time any-place cleansing. The micro fibre tool effortlessly sweeps away mascara smudges or lipstick marks for clean and flawless results.
1 x Soap - to effectively clean the GLOV after each use for optimum efficiency and lifespan.
1 x Travel Hanger - with suction cup to hang the GLOV up after each use.
name: Hydro Cleansing Travel Set

product_description:
使用 NAOBAY Mattifying Face Cream (Natural And Organic Beauty And You) 实现无光泽肤色。
这种可快速吸收的配方含有大米淀粉、墨角藻和常春藤提取物，提供最佳的水合作用，同时消除多余的油脂，实现顺滑、完美无瑕的妆容效果。 非常适合粉刺暗疮或油性皮肤类型，可实现持久的哑光肤色和完美的彩妆粉底。

product_description:
Tackle a range of skincare woes with the skinChemists 24H Aqua Repair Facial Serum, perfect for dry, sensitive and problematic skin types.
A delicate blend of advanced active ingredients work in tandem to infuse skin with vitamins and antioxidants, working to minimise the look of uneven skin tone and redness while delivering deep hydration with long lasting results. Suitable for all skin types, it helps promote a more even and healthier looking complexion that feels firmer and more refined.

product_description:
Antipodes 長效保濕補水乳液(SPF15) 用於面部和身體保濕，抵禦紫外線。 這款高效的防曬用品可過濾和抵禦UVA 和UVB 射線，同時保持肌膚水潤，防止缺水。 - KR 
 使用說明：  - 暴露於陽光下之前，塗抹於面部和身體部位 - 需要時，可再次塗抹。

product_description: Get camera ready in a flash with the Double Blur® Skin Perfector from The Hero Project; an advanced, HD skin treatment that targets problematic areas to deliver a uniform, smooth and flawless looking complexion. The transparent, lightweight gel formula features Dual Diffusion Technology™  – polymer microspheres create an optical illusion on skin, working to scatter light and fill the appearance of wrinkles. The clever technology optimises light reflection, leading to a natural looking base with imperfections effectively blurred. An undetectable, silky smooth veil softens and corrects the look of blemishes and pores; with the addition of natural Glycerin keeping skin feeling softened and hydrated. Easy to use with a no-waste, airless pump, it’s an ideal makeup primer or foundation replacement – helping to minimise shine, even out redness and create an airbrushed, matte finish.
name: Hero Project Double Blur HD Ready Skin Perfector 30ml

product_description:
這款高強效型補充劑，有助於強身健體，延年益壽，內外兼修。本品具有香濃的石榴風味，每份5ml 的劑量能提供40mg 的白藜蘆醇（一種天然的苯酚，紅葡萄和日本虎杖中也含有同樣的物質），這種物質能減少卡路里的攝入從而達到延年益壽的功效，還能加快普通細胞分裂，提供最佳的抗氧化效果，還具有抗炎症的功效。 
水溶性白藜蘆醇配合獨有的補水系統，可獲得最佳的水分吸收效果，而植物親膚型透明質酸能使肌膚呈現年輕光彩。不添加人工染料和人工香精。這款補充劑男女均適用。 - LM 
 使用說明： 
 警告：
name: 美丽分子 (240ml)

product_description:
Care for skin with the Ultrasun Tan Activator for Face SPF30; a hydrating, water-resistant sun lotion that protects skin from harmful rays, whilst encouraging an even and golden tan.
Boasting broad spectrum SPF30, the sun cream shields skin from UVA and UVB damage, whilst an advanced active ingredients works to stimulate the production of melanin. This activates the tanning process and promotes a healthy glow. The hydrating formula delivers a veil of protective moisture to the visage, which restores skin’s optimum levels during sun exposure, as well as working to reduce the appearance of fine lines, wrinkles and enlarged pores.
Suitable for all skin types but ideal for those with sensitive skin, the lightweight lotion effortlessly glides over the face, absorbing quickly without leaving behind an unwanted, greasy residue. Expect to achieve a safe and natural tan.
name: Tan Activator for Face SPF30 50ml

product_description:
OSKIA 焕颜新生精油能够让肌肤重现活力，这款高效的精油混合了丰富的营养、芬芳精油和提取物，能够提拉并滋养肌肤。 这款不油腻的精油适合所有肤质，富含紧肤的非洲金钮扣花精华，让肌肤更加柔嫩；促进胶原蛋白生成并增加肌肤弹性的羽扇豆和海茴香精华；均匀肤色的抗炎姜黄精华，让肌肤焕发健康光泽。
特别添加了具有补水功效的星状花、葵花籽和月见草精油，含有丰富的亚麻酸，滋润肌肤并恢复天然的屏障。 具有抗氧化功效的玫瑰果油能够修复肌肤，使其免受自由基损伤；具有镇静功效的灯笼花藤精华，缓解肌肤不适，这款奢华的精油能够有效减少细纹，让肌肤更加柔嫩光滑。 E.N.
name: 焕颜新生精油（30ml）

product_description:
Aurelia Probiotic Skincare  夜间细胞修复油，在晚间睡眠期间使肌肤恢复活力。 这款夜间修复油适合所有肌肤类型，包括敏感肌肤。采用可拉哈里沙漠油和Mongongo油，使肌肤再生、强化肌肤；吊灯树可使肌肤紧致、更光滑精致。
抗氧化芙蓉花结合猴面包树（富含欧米伽 3、6、9），可对抗自由基及环境对肌肤的侵害；对抗暗沉脱水的肌肤，使肌肤再现活力、晶莹剔透。 散发出橙花、薰衣草、玫瑰、柑橘等的自然香味，使人早晨醒来后，肌肤充满活力、更显年轻。
name: Probiotic Skincare夜间细胞修复油50ml

product_description: Ole Henriksen 歐力漢瑞克森去油潔膚棉可快速讓皮膚恢復活力和潔淨。這款潔膚棉是一包有織紋的的織物，專門用於深層清潔皮膚並淨化毛孔，本品可祛除皮膚角質，同時含有乙醇酸、​​乳酸和檸檬酸成分可以徹底瓦解死皮細胞。這款潔膚棉還含有淨化桉樹精油，以便吸收堵塞毛孔的污垢和油脂，進而打造潔淨清爽的皮膚，產品採用不含苯甲酸酯類成分、硫酸鹽或鄰苯二甲酸酯成分的配方。 - ED
name: Henriksen 欧力汉瑞克森控油湿巾

product_description:
通过 Garnier Pure Matte Control Moisturiser 掌控您的肌肤，这是一款驱油乳液，旨在滋润肌肤，同时对抗多余的油光。
非常适合油性至混合性肌肤，该抚慰凝胶保湿液利用Airlicium™的吸收力量，和水杨酸的修复、去角质特性；结合两者功效共同控制皮脂和脂肪的产生，同时减少肌肤污迹。 肌肤获得强效滋润，肤质得到改善。 毛孔消失，通过控油，肌肤没有油腻斑块。 - K.N.

product_description:
Enhance your pout with Eve Lom's Kiss Mix Colour; an ultra-hydrating formula that can be applied under lipstick, over lip colour, or worn alone for a soft, pearlised sheen.
Infused with moisturising Beeswax and cooling Menthol, the luxurious lip balm softens and conditions, whilst defending against environmental aggressors and harsh weather conditions for long-lasting comfort. Lips are smooth and sumptuous with subtle colour.

skinChemists 丰唇精华能够让双唇更丰满，唇形更明显，无需整容手术便可实现。 这款精华添加了强效透明质酸，能够显著增加唇部的丰盈度，同时滋润双唇肌肤，使之柔嫩光滑。 瞬间便可拥有完美的娇嫩丰唇！ - L.M.
使用说明：直接涂于洁净干燥的唇部。

product_description:
Jurlique 推出的金盏花舒缓保湿霜是一款独特的强效保湿霜，专为恢复肌肤表皮防御力而配制。 除了持久保湿，它还具有抗刺激的功效，能够舒缓并滋润肌肤，让肌肤变得放松柔嫩。
这款精华液能够抵抗外界侵害，为肌肤补充水分，还能显著缓解红血丝。 这款精美的产品富含金盏花、洋甘菊、紫锥菊、夏枯草、金纽扣花和草芙蓉提取物，令肌肤焕然一新！ K.D.

Infused with moisturising Beeswax and cooling Menthol, the luxurious lip balm softens and conditions, whilst defending against environmental aggressors and harsh weather conditions for long-lasting comfort. Lips are smooth and sumptuous with subtle colour.

First Aid Beauty明星產品旅行裝包含FAB品牌的三種明星產品，可清潔、去角質與保濕肌膚。這三件便攜包裝的護膚必備產品方便隨身攜帶，潔面膏質地豐富，溫和清潔肌膚，祛除髒污和殘留物，享受舒適奢華使用感。去角質潔膚棉包含乳酸和乙醇酸，可清潔、調理肌膚，用後擁有更明亮，更年輕的膚色。強效修復霜具有超級滋潤配方，即使是最敏感的皮膚類型也適用。特別適合在戶外活動如海灘邊或徒步遠足後保養肌膚，包裝小巧輕便，也非常適合放在手袋及包中隨時隨地使用。 
 該套裝包括：

product_description:
The Perricone MD Brightening Eye Cream is a lightweight, non-greasy moisturiser that works to combat premature signs of ageing such as dark circles, puffiness and fine lines.  
Utilising advanced scientific technologies, the treatment features Dr. Perricone’s patent-pending Nrf2 Antioxidant Support Complex™, a naturally derived formulation that helps activate antioxidant pathways to enhance absorption, thus improving skin’s own natural ability to fight environmental aggressors and free radicals that cause premature ageing.
Infused with light-reflecting pearls, the eye cream balances essential hydration levels and brightens the overall area, leaving skin looking refreshed and more awake, with the appearance of wrinkles and discolouration reduced.
name: MD 裴礼康眼部亮白乳液

product_description:
Wave goodbye to visible signs of ageing with the Shine Bright Moisturising and Anti-Ageing Glove Masks from FACEINC by nails inc. Designed to revive hardworking hands, the glove masks reveal radiant and youthful skin.
Fortified with a skin-loving blend of Collagen and Multivitamins including Retinol, the gloves nourish the skin and work to reduce the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles. The glove masks also boast Hyaluronic Acid and Ceramide, which hydrate hands and leave skin smooth and supple.
name: by nails inc. Shine Bright Moisturising and Anti-Ageing Glove Masks - Deeply Hydrating, Brightening and Firming

product_description:
Murad Age Reform入门套装是致力于清洁、调养和滋润肌肤同时减少细纹和皱纹的三步护理方案，以获得年轻肌肤。 成熟肌肤的完美护理方案。 - K.N.
 Age Reform清爽清洁液  ： 
该泡沫清洁液超强清洁表面的杂质和化妆品，而不干燥肌肤；令肌肤柔软、光滑。 它含有黄瓜提取物，可舒缓和清爽肌肤，同时夏威夷白姜和海藻提取物可令肌肤柔软光滑。
 Age Reform快速胶原蛋白激活液 ： 
利用此胶原蛋白激活液恢复和滋润肌肤，该乳液旨在对抗衰老迹象。 配方含有胶原蛋白支持复合物，以减少细纹和皱纹的出现，而细胞锁水成分可水分含量，为您带来柔软、光滑的肌肤。
 Age Reform完美日霜SPF30  ： 
这款奢华精华霜提供最大程度的补水和防晒功效，同时恢复柔软度并提供强力抗氧化剂。 含有必需脂肪酸，以提供强效滋润；大豆花成分可保护肌肤弹性并抚平细纹；卵磷脂有助于锁住水分，恢复肌肤柔软度。

这种 Natio 男用脸部净化磨砂膏富含 100％ 的纯精油，是为剃须而将皮肤准备好的绝佳方式。 这种磨砂膏也可为获得理想的水分吸收效果而将皮肤准备好，是每项梳洗例行程序中最理想的第一步。

product_description: 利用 PIXI Makeup软化洁面巾轻轻去除甚至防水的化妆品。 化妆湿巾预先湿润，然后温和溶解杂质和化妆品。 完美适合外出使用。 加入洋甘菊和葡萄籽油，每片面巾均可舒缓肌肤，使其保持清洁和平衡。 – E.W.
name: Makeup软化洁面巾

product_description:
Discover all of your STARSKIN favourites in one convenient collection with the STARSKIN Hollywood Party™ Gift Set; a limited edition box that hosts six coveted masks and a bonus STARSKIN headband to help with application. With masks for that cover all occasions and facial features, the comprehensive gift set ensures skin is in optimum condition to go and party.
Glowstar Foaming Peeling Perfection Puff x 1
The Glowstar Foaming Peeling Perfection Puff offers the visible results of a skin peel with the convenience of a cost effective, at home treatment. Utilising innovative exfoliation technology, the puff lathers and gently lifts away dead skin cells and impurities, revealing a luminous, natural and soft complexion. The puff is infused with a balance of Fruit Acids, Carrot and Broccoli Extract, which work to slough away the dead cells, impurities and product build-up, promoting smoother and brighter skin whilst also visibly reducing the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles.
Red Carpet Ready Hydrating Bio-Cellulose Face Mask x 1
Restore dewy radiance to dry, dull and dehydrated skin with Red Carpet Ready Hydrating Bio-Cellulose Second Skin Face Mask. Ideal for prepping skin before a special occasion, the coconut mask contours close to the face and is designed with a powerful serum complex to deeply hydrate, smooth and rejuvenate skin. The innovative treatment utilises STARSKIN's exclusive Bio Cellulose, which is concentrated with vitamin-rich Coconut Juice and infuses the skin with a conditioning blend of Amino Acids and Brown Algae for visible anti-ageing results.
After Party Brightening Bio-Cellulose Face Mask
Brighten and illuminate even the most dull and tired skin with the After Party Brightening Bio-Cellulose Second Skin Face Mask. Formulated with STARSKIN's Vitamin rich Coconut Juice and Bio Cellulose, the After Party face mask hydrates, visibly revives and conditions the skin. The transparent, cooling sheet mask contours closely to the face and delivers a boost of Vitamin C, which works to improve the appearance of dark spots and visibly correct uneven skin tone. The mask is drenched in a skin revitalising Organic skincare serum, which transforms skin that has been up all night partying, visibly restoring luminosity and brightness.
Eye Catcher Smoothing Bio-Cellulose Eye Mask x 2 Pairs
Rejuvenate and brighten eyes with the Eye Catcher Smoothing Bio-Cellulose Second Skin Eye Masks. Easy to use, the masks are infused with a revolutionary serum containing Bio Cellulose, which effectively reduces the appearance of eye puffiness, fine lines and dark circles.  The masks are intelligently shaped to contour the delicate eye area, and are formulated with vitamin-rich Coconut Juice to offer exceptional hydration, whilst visibly smoothing wrinkles and brightening skin. The visage is left luminous and rejuvenated, whilst fine lines, dark circles and under eye puffiness is visibly eliminated.
Dreamkiss Plumping & Hydrating Bio-Cellulose Lip Mask x 2
No longer dream about enviable lips with Dreamkiss Bio-Cellulose Second Skin Lip Mask; a potent mask designed especially for the delicate skin of the lips. Formulated with naturally fermented, Vitamin-rich Coconut Juice, the ‘Dreamkiss’ lip mask closely follows the contours of the lips with a skin-tight fit, delivering innovative skincare serum to be absorbed into the skin. A blend of Sea Fern, Collagen and Hyaluronic Acid instantly work to visibly plump lips, improving the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles, resulting in a more youthful look.
VIP The Gold Mask Revitalizing Luxury Bio-Cellulose Second Skin Face Mask x 1
Lavish your skin in luxury with The Gold Mask™ VIP Revitalizing Luxury Bio-Cellulose Second Skin Face Mask; a rejuvenating sheet mask that delivers a star-like glow. Working to transform dull, dry and lacklustre complexions, the mask fits closely to the contours of the face and delivers a rich and creamy serum to skin, which acts like a decadent treat. The bio-cellulose sheet mask is drenched in a serum that comprises Evening Primrose extract to dramatically soften skin, whilst pure Colloidal Gold works to reduce the appearance of fine lines, wrinkles and sun damage. Working wonders in just fifteen to twenty minutes, the VIP mask reveals a replenished visage with an opulent and radiant glow.
name: Hollywood Party™ Gift Set

product_description: Caudalie Vinoperfect Radiance Moisturiser Broad Spectrum SPF20 是一款轻盈护肤霜，能有效地减少瑕疵、黑斑和粉刺，呈现健康亮泽的肤色。 这款无油脂保湿霜可提供防晒膜，避免肌肤受到阳光的有害紫外线的伤害，令肌肤水润。 适合用作肌肤打底霜，以去除多余的皮脂并实现控油效果，呈现均匀的肤色。 E.N.
name: Vinoperfect Radiance Moisturiser Broad Spectrum SPF 20

product_description:
Brighten and lift tired peepers with the Brightening Eye Mask from Skin Republic, an anti-ageing treatment that’s brimming with vitamins and antioxidants to minimise the appearance of fine lines and dark circles.
Utilising the Transdermal Delivery System to ensure efficient absorption of beneficial ingredients, the powerful serum has been expertly formulated with plant extracts and minerals to help reduce visible signs of ageing.
Vitamin C and B3 work to illuminate and even tone, whilst extracts of Coffee Bean and Green Tea re-energise and stimulate blood circulation to leave the delicate area looking refreshed and more awake. Delivering nutrients and intense moisture with close and continuous contact, the treatment minimises the look of fine lines and wrinkles, unveiling radiant and hydrated eyes.
name: Republic Brightening Eye Mask 18g (3 Pairs)

product_description:
NIOD低粘度清洁酯提供深层清洁，一步除去化所有妆品和杂质痕迹，而不会导致过度干燥或不舒服的紧绷。
利用分离的糖和鳄梨酯配制而成，它的肌肤友好方式可渗透肌肤，溶解灰尘和污垢，同时调节皮脂活动，以平衡干燥和油性肌肤。
富含抗氧化剂维生素E，该清洁液可修复和防止环境损害，从而让您获得水润、净化和改善的肌肤以及畅通的毛孔。 E.N.
name: (240ml)

product_description:
這款奢華面部護理油可極大地刺激膠原蛋白1 型在肌膚細胞中的生長，最多可增長51%，令肌膚更緊緻。配方中使用的鱷梨油富含抗氧化物質和維他命，可使肌膚得到最好的保護，免於環境侵擾，同時還添加玫瑰果油，令肌膚保持水潤柔滑。該款護理油散發出淡淡的茉莉花清香和甜橙香味，氣味芬芳，質感上乘。 - KR 
 使用說明： 
 - 潔面後，塗抹於臉部、頸部和胸口處。

product_description:
Omorovicza煥顏去角質面部磨砂膏可柔滑肌膚，讓肌膚充滿彈性和光澤。富含鈣和鎂，此款面部磨砂膏有效去角質，去除老化死皮細胞和雜質，深層淨化毛孔。礦物護膚導入系統能夠有效將礦物質導入深層肌膚，促進吸收。富含海洋微藻可提亮膚色。獨特配方中含有熱帶水果精華，有助縮細毛孔，調理肌膚，同時強韌肌膚，緊緻提升，使用後您的肌膚更潤澤水嫩富有彈力，重塑肌膚年輕動力。 
使用方法：將磨砂膏塗抹全臉，從鼻子向外以劃圈方式按摩，磨砂膏的顏色會從翠綠色變為灰色珠光。 2分鐘之後用溫水徹底沖洗。

可用 REN 特润日霜为干性皮肤补水。 这种日霜原名叫做"Phytostimulene 瞬时补水保湿霜"，其改良配方可使干性皮肤充满功效持久的水分，以使皮肤光滑、舒适、健康。
REN 特润日霜最适用于干性皮肤。 这种日霜不但可以立即提供水分，而且其渗透性调节剂还可以将水带到皮肤深处，从而在需要发挥更大水合作用时释放水分。 REN 特润日霜仍然含有 phytostimulene，既能滋养和保护皮肤，又能防止皮肤绷紧和不适。 皮肤会手感光滑、柔韧、舒适。

name: 特润日霜 (50ml)

p 适合所有皮肤类型。 适合素食者和纯素食者。

德國世家溫柏日霜採用特別配方，適合正常肌膚，可煥發肌膚生機，為肌膚提供保護。由溫柏蠟製成，可在皮膚上形成一個透氣層，達到保持水份平衡的作用，配方中還包含具有緊緻效果的天然混合油。 - LM

product_description:
每天早晨醒来后利用L’Oreal 胶原蛋白Wrinkle Decrease重塑丰盈晚霜让您的年轻肌肤与轻盈脚步相匹配。
您的每一个表情会使面部微微收缩。 L’Oreal胶原蛋白Wrinkle Decrease重塑丰盈晚霜了解在晚上治疗这些反应效果最佳，因为晚上大多数面部肌肉均在休息。 丰富的配方营养会慢慢渗入每一个肌肤细胞，为胶原蛋白提供充足的时间和空间发挥其魔力，让您早上醒来时处于最佳状态。
