product_description:
享受富含玫瑰的质感，从而改善皮肤的情况，同时不会让皮肤的天然油脂流失。 Nuxe Eau Démaquillante Fondant – Melting Cleansing Gel能够让您仅需简单的一步就可以清洁和滋润您的皮肤。
只需要简单地涂抹Nuxe Eau Démaquillante Fondant – Melting Cleansing Gel产品，就可以起到清洁、卸妆和滋润皮肤的功效。 富含椰子油和坚果油的皮肤可以同时得到放松和光滑的效果。
使用说明：
name: Gel Demaquillant Fondant - Melting Cleansing Gel（125ml）

product_description:
Deeply replenish thirsty skin with the Vitamasques Hydrogel Face Mask; an innovative treatment that has been clinically proven to keep your complexion hydrated for up to 120 hours.
Fortified with Rose of Jericho Extract and the patented AMF (Artificial Moisturising Factor), the Korean face mask enhances the skin's ability to retain moisture, whilst nourishing and conditioning to leave you with a soft, smooth and revitalised complexion. A weekly boost for dull, dehydrated skin.
name: Hydrogel Face Mask

product_description:
想找一款使用方便快捷、功效持久的高等级SPF防晒产品吗？ 不妨试试Ultrasun Clear Spray SPF30 - Sports Formula。
本品采用了方便的喷雾瓶设计，即使单手使用也游刃有余。 液质配方轻盈不油腻，哪怕是进行最剧烈的水上运动和户外探险时也能提供完美保护。  不含有任何有害的油成分、乳化剂或香料，非常适合娇嫩肌肤； 这些特性还能巧妙降低过敏风险，特别适合用于敏感型部位，例如可能有点少发的头皮上。
name: Clear Spray SPF30 - Sports Formula (150ml)

product_description:
Elemis presents the Pro-Collagen Super System, an advanced 5-step skincare programme that works to visibly reduce the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles whilst leaving skin feeling intensely nourished and moisturised. The anti-ageing set features 6 must-have treatments housed in an elegant gift box, making this a wonderful gift for a loved one or an indulgent treat for yourself.
Pro-Collagen Marine Cream (30ml)
Intensely hydrate skin with the anti-ageing moisturising cream, enriched with collagen-boosting marine extract Padina Pavonica to reduce the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles. Its ultra-rich, powerful formula is infused with Mediterranean Algae to moisturise skin, leaving it firmer with increased suppleness and an even tone.
Pro-Collagen Oxygenating Night Cream (15ml)
Wake up to a brighter, smoother complexion with this non-greasy night cream. Suitable for all skin types, the cream absorbs quickly into skin to support its natural regeneration process, revealing firmer skin and delaying signs of premature ageing. Fortified with a blend of Laminaria Digitata and Red Coral to condition skin, whilst Padina Pavonica boosts elasticity for a smoother appearance and antioxidant Avocado Oil provides free radical protection.
Pro-Collagen Marine Mask (15ml)
The luxurious face mask works to smooth, firm and tone the appearance of your skin. Enriched with marine active Padina Pavonica as well as natural extracts of Moringa and Argan Tree Oil, its deeply moisturising formula helps reveal a youthful-looking, refined complexion, plumping out skin to reduce the look of fine lines and wrinkles.
Pro-Collagen Neck and Décolleté Balm (15ml) 
The anti-ageing balm helps to increase the skin’s firmness and reduce the appearance of crepe-textured skin, leaving the neck and bust area smooth and more youthful-looking. It’s formulated with Omega-7 rich Sea Buckthorn oil and is expertly blended with the unique Mediterranean algae Padina Pavonica to help hydrate and nourish. Liftessence, a natural skin tightening material, forms an elastic, resistant and continuous lifting 3D network to help tighten the skin.
Pro-Collagen Super Serum Elixir (15ml x 2)
Powered by antioxidant African Birch Bark, Red Seaweed and Padina Pavonica, the serum’s unique formula boosts elasticity and firms skin to reveal a younger-looking complexion. A potent cocktail of Hyaluronic Acid and omega-rich Camelina Oil delivers intense moisture, plumping and hydrating skin for a smoother, softer texture.
name: Pro-Collagen Super System

product_description:
可用 Ultrasun 的 SPF30+ 眼霜保护娇嫩的眼部皮肤；这是一种可补水的轻质配方护肤品，有防止光致老化和防止受到 UVA 和 UVB 射线侵害的作用。
这种吸收迅速的眼霜已用 Biophytex® 和抗氧化剂强化，既能严密保护最薄最敏感的面部皮肤，又能最大程度地减少黑眼圈和细纹的出现，以显露出更光滑，更明亮，更细腻的眼部轮廓。
name: SPF30+ 眼霜 (15ml)

product_description:
Tackle problematic, breakout-prone skin on-the-spot with the ESPADA™ Acne-Clearing Pen from Swedish beauty brand FOREO; a pioneering, at-home treatment that combines their renowned T-Sonic™ pulsations with powerful blue light technology to deliver unparalleled results.
The intelligent device utilises 415NM of blue light LEDs that penetrate deep below the surface layer of skin, clinically proven to kill acne-causing bacteria at the source without causing pain or discomfort, with targeted light application ensuring surgical-like precision to treat even the smallest blemish right from when it emerges for instant action.
The gentle T-Sonic™ pulsations activate upon contact with skin, working to diffuse the light into pores to enhance efficiency while stimulating micro-circulation to promote skin renewal and repair. With continued use, the overall complexion appears healthier looking and more refined with a noticeable decrease in breakouts.  
Ergonomically designed with the head coated in ultra-hygienic, 100% waterproof silicone, ESPADA™ prevents the spread of acne-causing bacteria and feels smooth to touch for optimum comfort even on sensitive skin, with one charge providing up to 60 2-minute treatments. With no need to replace cartridges, it provides a long-term investment for visibly clearer skin.
name: ESPADA Acne-Clearing Pen - Magenta

product_description:
Counteract the signs of ageing with the Time Retreat Regenerative Night Cream from Eve Lom. Harnessing regenerative technologies and age-defying actives, the rich anti-ageing treatment works overnight while you sleep to deliver drastic results.  
Everyday, skin is subject to harsh environmental factors, pollutants and UV exposure that result in the production of stress hormone Cortisol, which effectively slows down cell reproduction and leads to premature ageing.
Widely used within Ayurvedic medicine, Wild Indigo Seed extract works to combat Cortisol and promote the release of beta-Endorphins. Combined here with Liposome Encapsulated Retinol, the advanced face cream boosts cell turn over and stimulates repair while your skin is at its most receptive to treatment.
Fortified with a wrinkle-smoothing Tripeptide and moisture-rich Shea Butter, the supercharged formula leaves skin feeling replenished and smooth with an enhanced protective barrier function and a visible reduction in wrinkles. Awaken to a more even and balanced complexion with a revitalised, healthy looking radiance.
name: Lom Time Retreat Regenerative Night Cream 50ml

product_description: Dr. Hauschka 明眸精华专为舒缓并呵护疲劳和受刺激的眼部肌肤而配制，让双眼焕然新生，神采奕奕。 特别添加了丰富的明眸提取物、疗伤绒毛花和洋甘菊，镇静肌肤；富含茴香提取物，明显消除浮肿。 这款精华液适合所有肌肤类型，有助于缓解发痒问题，让娇嫩的眼周肌肤恢复活力，解决眼部不适。 - L.M.
name: Hauschka 明眸精华（10×5ml）

product_description:
Soften and hydrate tired, weary-looking eyes with the Golden Snail Intensive Essence Gel Eye Patch from Korean skincare brand, Skin79.
Each golden, petal-shaped eye patch is infused with a patented complex, comprising Plant Extracts, Gold and regenerative Golden Snail Filtrate to expertly soften, replenish and moisturise delicate under eye skin. Helping to preserve moisture and smoothen skin, its blend of Niacin and Irish Moss boost moisture levels for long-lasting hydration, and its cocktail of oriental ingredients have a deeply nourishing effect. The gel masks allow for better penetration of active ingredients into skin, so moisture, nutrients and elasticity are restored.
name: Golden Snail Intensive Essence Gel Eye Patch

product_description:
Catering for all skin types, Caudalie's Gentle Cleansing Milk promises to leave your complexion refreshed and revitalised without over-drying or tightness.
Infused with Grape Seed Oil, Oat Extract and Organic Shea Butter, the luxurious cleanser expertly dissolves dirt, make-up and impurities, whilst soothing and nourishing the face and eye area. Its blend of Sweet Almond and Jojoba Seed Oils moisturises and softens skin for long-lasting comfort.
name: Gentle Cleansing Milk Duo 200ml (Worth £30)

product_description:
Alpha-H眼霜15g 
瞬間提神，淡化黑眼圈和眼袋。採用創新配方，隱退細紋上的光線反射，綻放更清爽、更迷人的魅力。以多種植物為原料，採用最新的護膚技術製成，緊緻肌膚，調亮膚色，除皺理紋，補充嬌嫩眼部肌膚的水分。 
 使用說明：
name: 眼霜 15g

product_description: Dr. Brandt 博瑞特醫生視黃醇煥彩眼霜讓雙眸綻放年輕光彩。此款眼霜採用頃刻煥彩配方，有效柔滑眼周肌膚，是淡化眼部細紋和皺紋的絕佳選擇。此外，本品還有助於改善眼周循環，消除眼部壓力、疲勞，有效緩解眼周炎症及紅腫。 - ED
name: Brandt Glow by Dr. Brandt 焕活视黄醇眼霜

product_description:
来自Elemis的"换肤Radiance系列" 包括该品牌的三种护肤产品，可焕发、亮白和完善您的肌肤。 实现丝般柔软的肌肤，令肌肤重现健康光泽。 E.N. 
活力焕肤洗面乳(200ml)
利用肌肤焕采洗面乳净化您的肌肤。 该屡获殊荣的清洁液采用专利技术Tri-Enzyme，通过消除死细胞和暗沉肌肤，令肌肤焕然一新，光滑水嫩，同时巴西巴巴苏油可补充水份，让您获得丝般柔软、亮白美丽的肌肤。 抗氧化辣木油可抵御缓解侵害因素，白色松露可舒缓肌肤，令肌肤焕发活力，光彩照人。
舒缓杏子爽肤水Toner (200ml)
这款不含酒精的爽肤水非常适合敏感型肌肤和脆弱型肌肤，可有效舒缓和平静肌肤，让您拥有更年轻亮丽的肤色。 其特殊配方蕴含：桃李萃取物，可舒缓肌肤；贝蒂花萃取物可起天然清洁剂的作用，能焕活肌肤，使肌肤恢复应有的平衡和舒爽。
焕采亮白Flash Balm (15ml)
适合所有肌肤类型，这款焕发活力的护肤膏可亮白和清爽肌肤，令肌肤晶莹剔透，散发健康光泽。 其强效配方富含维生素，可锁住水分，同时紫色兰花可对抗衰老迹象。 营养丰富的巴西莓具有抗氧化保护作用，使肌肤免受环境压力的影响。 可用作日常滋润霜、打底霜或亮肤霜。
name: 62.50 英镑）

product_description:
Recharge dull and wanting skin with the Polaar Moisturizing Cream; an invigorating face cream that’s ideal for all skin types from oily to sensitive.
Utilising an exclusive IceSource system developed through extensive skincare research, the gel-textured formula contains filtered Glacier Water to deeply hydrate and nourish while forming a protective barrier against harmful environmental aggressors. Suitable for daily use, the moisturiser leaves skin feeling sumptuously soft, comfortable and supple.
name: Moisturizing Cream 50ml

product_description: PMD混合White 焕肤去角质片（6 片装）旨在与您的 PMD 个人微晶焕肤仪-国际版一起使用，可以提供最低水平的去角质，令您的敏感型皮肤看起来光滑水嫩有光泽。  焕肤去角质片有两个尺寸可用于面部和身体，用后您的肌肤会呈现出颜色均匀的外观。 - L.M.
name: 焕肤去角质片（6 片装）

product_description:
Meticulously formulated with French pharmaceutical expertise, CODAGE present the Spring Break "Detox and Skin Awakening" serum. Deeply moisturising and inspiring a bright and healthy complexion, the reparative treatment works to restore comfort in the skin and rebuild the skin's matrix; helping to defend against harsh weather changes. Packed full of antioxidants and energising agents which actively initiate cell vitality, the antipollution formula will leave your skin feeling fresh and looking radiant. Suitable for all skin types. - K.N.  
Hy2 - A deeply moisturising property that restores and retains hydration, helping to reduce gradual moisture loss. Boosting collagen, this ingredient also plumps, tightens and firms skin for a younger complexion.
Ao2 - A reparative and protective ingredient that enhances the skin's natural defences whilst reducing free radical production. Protects against UV rays.
Po2 - A protective ingredient which defends against pollutants. Works to enhance the skin's natural purification process whilst preserving antioxidants and preventing cell death. The activation of keratinocyte growth reinforces the cutaneous barrier.
Re3 - With anti-inflammatory and antibacterial action, this deeply reparative ingredient boosts cellular renewal and helps rebuild injured tissue.
Dx3 - Stimulating natural detoxification, Dx3 works to repair proteins and eliminate toxins for energised skin that glows.
Ec3 - Providing a variety of skin beneficial results, this mix of ingredients helps to reveal overall radiant skin. Skin cell renewal is promoted, moisture is retained and antioxidant properties help to protect.
name: Spring Break Detox and Skin Awakening Serum (30ml)

product_description:
Restore a healthy-looking, radiant complexion with the Clear Daily Skin Clearing Treatment from Paula's Choice. Its unique, triple-action formula is infused with azelaic acid and salicylic acid (BHA) to address breakout-prone skin, eliminating acne-causing bacteria that causes redness, fading dark spots and minimising the appearance of wrinkles.
Hydrating and skin-refining, the treatment leaves a velvety matte finish and targets enlarged pores to leave you with a smooth, luminous complexion and even tone. Suitable for all skin types, including those with symptoms of rosacea and sensitivity. E.N.
Please Note: Those allergic to aspirin (acetylsalicylate) should not use products containing salicylic acid (Beta Hydroxy Acid, or BHA).
name: Choice Clear Daily Skin Clearing Treatment with Azelaic Acid (30ml)

product_description: 正在因缺乏营养的干燥肌肤而困扰？ DELAROM 水润平衡香熏精油由100％有机精油调和而成，能够为肌肤补充水分，达到平衡。 特别添加了荷荷巴油和柠檬精华，这款香薰精油是护理干燥、凹凸不平的肌肤，并恢复平衡的完美选择。 - K.N.
name: 水润平衡香熏精油（15ml）

product_description:
Ila Spa 雨林细胞新生眼部精华采用强效新生配方，具有强大的抗炎功效，让肌肤变得光滑，减少皱纹出现。
富含助胶原蛋白因子，紧实肌肤；还添加了能够快速减少浮肿和黑眼圈的核桃仁提取物和星实棕油；抗氧化成分能够保护肌肤免受自由基损伤。 适合所有肌肤类型，让双眸重现活力。 - L.M.
使用说明：清洁肌肤，涂抹爽肤水后，然后取少量涂抹于眼周外圈。
name: 雨林细胞新生眼部精华 15ml

product_description:
SkinChemists Hydro-Active Eye Serum 含特殊配方，非常适合眼周区域的娇嫩肌肤。
繁忙的一天令肌肤疲惫脱水，而这款精华液能够减少皱纹、细纹和浮肿。 木薯淀粉能够提升丝滑感受，再加上浓郁的红果芳香，为您新的一天做好准备。 E.N.
name: Hydro-Active Eye Serum (10ml)

product_description:
Revive your skin in 15 Minutes with this StriVectin Instant Revitalizing Mask. Promoting cell renewal, the deeply nourishing Mask boosts radiance and gives your skin a healthy glow. Alpha Hydroxy Acids (AHA), skin brighteners and patented NIA-114 combine to even out skin tone and to make your skin look younger by boosting cell renewal, giving a radiant glow and shielding against external aggressors. Smoothening your skin, this Mask is perfect if you want to look awake and healthy.
StriVectin’s results are all tried and tested as well as clinically proven in contrast to other skincare brands. 93% of users feel that their skin tone looks brighter, 89% feel that their skin tone is more even and 85% feel their skin looks immediately revitalized. LB
Apply a thin layer over clean, dry skin, avoiding the eye area. Leave on for 15 minutes or until dry. Rinse off thoroughly with warm water. Use 2-3 times per week or any time for an instant boost of radiance.
name: Instant Revitalizing Mask (50ml/1.7oz)

product_description:
MONUPLUS 的这款乳脂状 Beauty Balm 旨在赋予活力，唤醒肤色。 采用橙子和橙花精油的滋养共混物配方，可平复红肿和破裂的毛细血管，同时刺激感官。
这款轻盈软膏适用于所有肌肤类型，富含亮白和紧致蛋白质，令肌肤表面平滑紧实，减少细纹和皱纹，呈现容光焕发的青春肌肤。 强效抗氧化维生素 E 和甘油可放松肌肤；保湿透明质酸则让肌肤保持水润与活力。
name: Beauty Balm (50ml)

product_description:
Slim Cera 經典臉部按摩器可使皮膚重新煥發生機活力，本品採用鑽石切割工藝，可在皮膚表面滾動滑行，通過擠出污垢，祛除雜質堆積的方式使毛孔清潔通透。 
憑藉使用電氣石製作而成的專利陶瓷滾頭，該設備的功效與面部水療十分相似，滾頭的運動能夠刺激面部肌肉，有效收緊煥活肌膚，更具有能夠模擬美容師手部運動的五個獨立滾頭。 - ED
name: Cera - 经典脸部按摩器

product_description:
使用 The Method: Travel Bag 呵护您的肌肤，一套七件高性能旅行装产品，使您的肌肤恢复年轻的神采。 完美的旅游装产品让您可以随时随地对抗老化的迹象。 可存放在一个洗漱包里。
The Method: Polish (Travel 装，28 克)
温和去角质膏可以使皮肤亮丽、清新并焕发年轻的神采。 面部磨砂膏富含纯矿物质和植物酶，包括褐海藻，它所包含的均匀的氧化镁和碳酸氢钠非研磨去角质晶体可去除无光泽的死皮细胞；每个粒子的大小和形状都均匀一致，所以没有割伤或划伤皮肤的危险。 去角质膏在呈现更加柔和而亮丽的肌肤效果的同时，使皮肤做好准备以吸收其他滋养护理品。
The Method: Cleanse (Travel 装，60毫升)
一款轻度泡沫洁面乳，可以轻柔地去除皮肤的杂质并调节肌肤的pH值。 该洁面乳既温和又保湿，富含专用的复合氨基酸，在有效提高皮肤水分的同时去除杂质和死皮；其智能配方可以调节皮肤酸碱度，有助于在您的下一步护肤程序中最大限度地提高产品的吸收。 皮肤感觉洁净、再生和超级保湿。
The Method: Nourish (Travel 装，15 毫升)
使用 The Method Nourish Moisturiser 深度湿润您的肌肤；强有力的抗衰老配方有焕发青春神采的功效。 所含的独特二肽和葡萄多酚能够强韧皮肤，可被快速吸收的滋养特性可以使皮肤保持水分，减少皱纹的出现，以呈现一个更平滑、更柔顺的肤色。
眼部紧肤霜（豪华样品，5 毫升）
一个超滋养的眼霜，对抗并消除因老化、压力和疲劳而导致的黑眼圈和鱼尾纹的出现。 基于咖啡因的药物和强大的抗衰老肽系统，它们与纯粹的光扩散成分相结合，有助于保湿并加强皮肤屏障。 尽量减少细纹的出现，您的美目将会亮丽、清爽、青春焕发。
The Method: Body Polish (Travel 装，60克) 
该款去角质膏遇水会自动升温，细致的呵护使肌肤焕发出更加亮丽、清新、年轻的肤色。 在去除表面死皮细胞的同时，该磨砂膏利用水杨酸和纯石英水晶轻柔地为皮肤抛光而不会令皮肤因摩擦而受伤，既软化表皮又能够将营养物质注入到皮肤中。 它含有微量的沸石（一种天然矿物）成分，在接触皮肤时会产生温热感，用后肌肤感觉清爽、恢复神采和充满活力。 您的身体做好了准备，接受其他护理产品的呵护。
The Method: Body Cleanse (Travel 装，60 毫升)
全身肌肤护理，在去除杂质的同时软化皮肤并改善皮肤的外观。 该全身洁肤乳可实现专业清洁，在清洁皮肤表面和碎屑堵塞的毛孔的同时，它的微量乙醇酸和水杨酸成分会共同发挥作用以增进保湿，减少色变和老年斑。 该洁肤乳有助于皮肤对其他产品的吸收，从而提高您下一步护肤程序的的功效。
The Method: Body Nourish (Travel 装，60 毫升)
先进的抗衰老护理，旨在滋润皮肤的天然屏障功能。 利用乙醇酸（10％）和专有透明质酸基保湿化合物，HYLAPLEX™，以及富含抗氧化剂的保湿剂对皮肤进行护理，有助于在明显改善肤色和使肌肤平滑的同时软化细纹，并减轻变色和老年斑。 牛油树脂和卡哈拉日瓜子油的混合物可确保皮肤静美、舒适并得到相应的保护。 用后皮肤变得更柔嫩 、年轻和更新。
name: Method: Travel Bag

product_description: Achieve a flawless complexion with the NUDESTIX Blur Pencil, specially designed to diminish the look of fine lines, creases and enlarged pores for smoother, refined skin. Infused with soothing vitamin C and E and hyaluronic acid, the pencil melts effortlessly onto the face and delivers long-lasting hydration for a plumped appearance. Housed in a collectable tin with integrated mirror and handy sharpener. Buildable and blendable. E.N.
name: Blur Pencil

product_description:
Dr Botanicals   野生水薄荷胶束洁面乳 ，可去除化妆痕迹和杂质。 这款洁面水内含先进的清洁剂，可去除皮肤表面污垢，令肌肤再现活力，焕发光釆。
这款洁面乳富含植物提取物，包括：野生水薄荷和蜂蜜，避免剥离肌肤天然油脂，使肌肤感觉清新、充满活力；红藻，使肌肤亮白精致。 – E.W.
name: Botanicals 野生水薄荷胶束洁面乳（100 ml）

product_description:
使用巴黎欧莱雅Extraordinary Rebalancing Facial Oil为肌肤锁住水分。 本款修复面霜用来镇静舒缓肌肤，从内到外滋养肌肤，收缩毛孔。
膏体源自香味清新，来自八种平衡精油，能够滋润肌肤而不油腻，活力焕发。 C.R
name: Paris Extraordinary Rebalancing Facial Oil 30ml

product_description:
为获得在家水疗式的专业效果，尝试用蒸汽吸入器进行Rio面部桑拿，经专门设计，使用方便简单。 提供完整面膜，覆盖所有细嫩部位，这种豪华水疗直接打开毛孔，去除污垢和杂质。 两个可调整的蒸汽液位将控制的治疗蒸汽传送至肌肤，提供一个清洁和治愈病痛的灵活模式。
套装包括量杯、精油蒸发器和蒸汽吸入器附件。

PAYOT加强型倍润日霜 是一种紧肤润肤霜。它会使肌肤感到舒适、为肌肤补水、重塑面部轮廓、改善肤色，使您看起来更年轻。
该倍润日霜为熔化型、乳状质地。其乳液包含大量有益成分，令您的肌肤舒适柔软。其成分包括：抗氧化维生素E、透明质酸、Acti-Lift 合成物；可提升肌肤功效、抚平皱纹、修复肌肤结构、恢复皮肤弹性、使您的皮肤更致密。
皮肤清新、光滑、持久舒适、得到深层滋养。

This antioxidant cream cleanser glides on the skin to gently remove impurities and all traces of makeup from face, eyes and neck, while leaving the skin silky and luminous. Alchimie Forever's signature Blueberry extract brightens the skin and reduces redness, while Rose softens and enhances elasticity. Natural antioxidants derived from Cucumber and Mallow help to fight free radical damage and promote a youthful appearance. Hydrating and soothing, this pH-balanced face wash is gentle enough for the most sensitive skin. Gentle enough for even the those with sensitive skin or rosacea.
Alchimie Antioxidant Technologies:Rose (Essential Oils, Gallic Acid, Proanthocyanidins), Cucumber (Pepsin, Vitamin E), Mallow (Vitamin A, Vitamin B Complexes, Proanthocyanidins, Flavonoids), Blueberries (Anthocyans, Quercetin, Resveratrol).
100% made in Switzerland. Dermatologist-formulated and tested.
name: Forever Gentle Cream Cleanser

product_description:
Boost your skin's hydration with Borghese CuraForte Moisture Intensifier, an ultra-lightweight formula that can be applied before your favourite moisturiser to enhance efficacy.
Working to intensify the hydrating properties of your moisturiser, the sheer solution melts effortlessly into skin, delivering Hyaluronic Acid to attract and preserve moisture for a healthy, glowing skin complexion. Skin looks nourished, quenched and radiant.
name: CuraForte Moisture Intensifier (50ml)

product_description: This ultra-nourishing cream is rich in emollients such as jojoba and vitamin E, infusing the skin with moisture. Botanicals work to reduce redness, plump up the skin, and restore its youthful elasticity and resilience.
name: Forever Kantic+ Intensely Nourishing Cream

product_description: Cleanse and hydrate skin with the Soothing Cleanser Milk from Wilma Schumann. The gentle yet rich formula is ideal for dry, sensitive or mature skin. Formulated with a blend of Aloe, Jojoba and Green Tea, the cleaner is able to remove makeup and impurities and leave skin feeling nourished and smooth.
name: Schumann Soothing Cleanser Milk 210ml

product_description:
UriageHyséac 洁肤水 ，3合1功效可护理脸部。清洁肌肤、精华脸部、使肌肤无油光。
专门为混合性皮肤及油性肌肤配制，配方温和，可超快速清洁肌肤，消除杂质及多余皮脂，使肤色更干净清爽。 内含污染保护聚合物，使肌肤免遭空气污染；Uriage温泉水，可舒缓滋润肌肤、强化皮肤屏障。
保护净化肌肤。
name: Hyséac 洁肤水 (250ml)

product_description:
Developed specifically for the eye contour and ideal for sensitive skin, this lightweight anti-aging eye cream instantly penetrates to restore youthful vitality to this delicate area while protecting it against the effects of environmental stress. Jojoba and Cocoa Butter add a boost of much–needed moisture, increasing firmness and elasticity. Blueberries and the Vitamin K in Alfalfa act synergistically to reduce the appearance of dark under-eye circles, while natural antioxidants derived from Grape Seeds combat the effects of free radicals.
Clinically proven to be highly concentrated in antioxidants. Suitable for all skin types, including sensitive and rosacea prone.
Alchimie Antioxidant Technologies:
Jojoba. Blueberries (Anthocyans, Quercetin, Resveratrol), Alfalfa (Vitamin K), Grape Seeds (Anthocyanidins, Cathechin, Quercetin, Resveratrol), Cocoa Butter.
100% made in Switzerland. Dermatologist-formulated and tested.
name: Forever Rejuvenating Eye Balm

product_description:
Brighten and even the appearance of your skin with Dark Spot Correctiv™ Serum from Wilma Schumann, a highly concentrated formula that works to fade the look of hyperpigmentation with continued use.
Targeting dark spots, age spots and freckles on the hands, neck and face, the serum combines ß-White™, Biodynes® TRF® and Lumiesse™ to help reduce the appearance of unwanted marks; its brightening and smoothing properties lend the skin a radiant finish, and leave it feeling more toned and hydrated. Non-irritating and infused with a subtle fragrance.
name: Schumann Dark Spot Correctiv™ Serum 30ml

product_description:
Achieve a close, comfortable shave with Skin Authority's Anti-Aging Shave Serum; an innovative formula that can be used before shaving, or as an anti-ageing treatment.
Fortified with Aloe Leaf and a cooling blend of Tea Tree, Peppermint and Lavender Oils, the silky serum applies effortlessly to hydrate and smoothen, whilst delivering a plumping effect to reveal a tighter, younger-looking appearance. Helps to prepare skin for a clean, irritation-free shave.
name: Authority Anti-Aging Shave Serum

product_description:
Comfort and nourish dry skin with MÁDARA's Deep Moisture Cream, an intensely hydrating day cream that moisturises and protects your complexion.
Enriched with extracts of Northern Plantain and Sea-buckthorn to maintain optimal moisture levels, the cream delivers a veil of comfort onto skin, alleviating the discomfort of tightness whilst providing 24 hour hydration. Its nourishing and protective properties leave skin looking soft and supple.
name: Deep Moisture Cream 50ml

product_description:
Gently refresh your complexion with the Wilma Schumann Purifying Cleanser Gel; a luxurious formula developed for acne-prone or oily skin types.
Fortified with extracts of Witch Hazel, Green Tea and Cucumber, the revitalizing gel delivers a deep pore cleansing action to effortlessly dissolve dirt and impurities, without over-drying or uncomfortable tightness. Expect a clear, radiant complexion with improved texture and a subtle, natural fragrance.
name: Schumann Purifying Cleanser Gel 210ml

product_description:
Treat your complexion to the Natural Spa Factory Bamboo Facial Mousse; a microdermabrasion scrub that works to exfoliate, refresh and refine skin without stripping moisture.
Fortified with natural, ultra-fine Bamboo particles from female Bamboo stems, the luxurious treatment forms a creamy mousse upon contact with water to gently buff away dead, dull skin cells, whilst delivering a deep cleansing action to leave skin soft and clear.
name: Spa Factory Bamboo Facial Mousse

product_description:
This incredibly fresh gel stimulates microcirculation in the eye contour area. Thalgo Men Anti Fatigue Serum For Eyes contains powerful plant derived active ingredient that decongest unsightly puffiness and diminishes dark circles and micro wrinkles.
This transparent, soothing and calming gel is fragrance and preservative free. It is ideal to treat problems of puffiness and dark circles. Thalgo Men Anti Fatigue Serum is recommended for all men who suffer with tired eyes due to busy lifestyles. It’s perfect for long working hours and tiring business trips!
It contains a special algue bleue vitale algae extract that helps to calm your stressed skin by preventing fatigue in the skin cells. It also promotes anti-ageing as it stimulates cell renewal.
Directions of Use:
name: Men Anti-Fatigue Serum for Eyes 15ml

product_description:
Soothe eczema and extremely dry skin on the face and body with Salcura's Bioskin Junior Outbreak Rescue Cream; a repairing, 96% natural formula that caters specifically for children and babies aged 3 months+.
Fortified with Linseed and Jojoba Oil, the calming moisturiser helps to relieve redness and inflammation, whilst natural volcanic Zeolite protects delicate skin for long-lasting comfort. A soothing blend of Borage and Olive Oils hydrate and nourish, leaving your little one feeling soft, smooth and restored from top to toe.
name: Bioskin Junior Outbreak Rescue Cream (50ml)

product_description:
Reignite a youthful glow with Skin Authority's Beauty Infusion™ Quinoa & Avocado for Hydrating; an anti-ageing formula that works to replenish and rejuvenate thirsty complexions.
Synergising Quinoa Protein, Avocado Oil and Vitamin E, the fast-absorbing, non-greasy treatment helps to minimise the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles, whilst delivering intense moisture and improving skin texture to leave your complexion soft, smooth and refined. Can be used alone or mixed with foundation and skincare products.
name: Authority Beauty Infusion™ Quinoa & Avocado for Hydrating

product_description:
Utilise the powers of Coconut with the PRAI AGELESS Face & Throat Cleanser. Foaming into a luxurious, creamy lather, the cleanser is designed for use on the both the face and neck, thoroughly cleaning skin and leaving it nourished.
Enriched with Coconut, the anti-ageing cleanser helps to calm the complexion, whilst Glycerin creates a moisture reserve. Cleansing without stripping away essential moisture, the formula is finished with precious PRAI oil, which leaves behind a soft and smooth complexion, free from makeup and other impurities.
name: AGELESS Face & Throat Cleanser 120ml

product_description:
Polish your complexion with the Skin Authority Exfoliating Cleanser; an effective two-in-one product that works to leave the face feeling clean and touchably soft.
Suitable for all skin types, the formula gently and effectively sweeps away dirt and oils, whilst a hydrating blend of Micro Pumice and natural Botanicals exfoliate the skin. The rich cleanser ensures that skin isn’t stripped of its essential moisture and leaves the complexion feeling soothed and comfortable. Expect a clean, refreshed and radiant appearance.
name: Authority Exfoliating Cleanser

product_description:
Reignite your skin's youthful radiance with bareMinerals SkinLongevity Vital Power Infusion Serum, an anti-ageing essence that utilises Skinmimetic Technology to empower, replenish, renew and fortify your complexion.
Working to enhance natural luminosity and improve suppleness, the serum harnesses the power of patented Long Life Herb Extract and California Poppy to promote vitality; its hydrating and smoothing properties reawaken skin's youth and help diminish the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles. Skin is soft, smooth, resilient and naturally glowing. Infused with an uplifting Bergamot and Eucalyptus fragrance.
name: SkinLongevity Vital Power Infusion 30ml

product_description:
Freshen and calm with Witch Hazel, Aloe, and Citrusmint Essential Oils. Azeloglicina helps leave skin matte but hydrated.
Use Astringent Toning Pads morning and night. Wipe all over face after thoroughly cleansing, or after shaving but before moisturizing. Remove the safety seal. Close cap tightly. Use the flip-top for easy access and remember to close after each use.
This astringent, toning formula uses a combination of Alcohol and Witch Hazel to help eliminate impurities, tighten pores and control shine. A special blend of ingredients has a healing and calming effect, creates a soft, toned skin with oil control. Leaves skin matte and hydrated.
name: Astringent Oil Control Toner Pads

product_description:
Revitalise skin with the Peter Thomas Roth FIRMx™ Eyelid Serum; an advanced anti-ageing treatment to target fine lines, dark circles, puffiness and crêpiness that occur around the delicate eye area.
Fortified with a 35% Neuro Eyelid Complex, the concentrated formula infuses skin with essential nutrients, moisture and age-defying peptides, working to visibly lift and firm the upper eyelid area that’s often prone to drooping and sagging.
Soft focus ingredients and universally flattering colour correcting pigments effectively blur imperfections and fine lines, acting as a primer to create a smooth, even base for long-lasting makeup application. Suitable for daily use, eyes appear toned and more supple with a subtle matte finish.
name: Thomas Roth FIRMx Eyelid Serum

product_description:
Replenish and revitalise your complexion with the SASCO Eco Face Natural Day Cream; a lightweight, quick-absorbing formula that works to restore smooth, supple skin without greasy residue.
Enriched with Organic Aloe Vera and nourishing oils of Jojoba and Rapeseed, the luxurious moisturiser soothes and conditions skin, whilst antioxidant Vitamin E defends against the damaging effects of free radicals and environmental aggressors. Expect a hydrated, rejuvenated complexion with renewed radiance.
name: Eco Face Natural Day Cream 50ml

product_description:
Rejuvenate your peepers with the Intensive Skin Barrier Eye Care Set from Korean brand, Mizon. Combining two high-performance products, the kit works in tandem to combat common under-eye concerns and reveal firmer, smoother skin with restored youth.
Eye Roller (5ml)
An ultra-hydrating serum with a massage tip applicator to deliver a lifting and smoothing effect. Powered by low molecular Hyaluronic Acid and a moisturising blend of Sunflower, Rose and Olive Oils, the anti-ageing treatment helps to improve elasticity and suppleness, whilst minimising fine lines and dark circles for a brighter, more refined eye contour. Enhances the effectiveness of further eye products.
Eye Cream Pack (30ml)
An intensive, anti-ageing treatment that works to smoothen, strengthen and refine the thin, sensitive skin under the eyes. Infused with low molecular Hyaluronic Acid, the lightweight cream mask penetrates into the deeper layers of skin to deliver superior, long-lasting hydration, whilst Ceramides support the skin's natural barrier to lock in moisture. Expect lifted, plumped and revitalised eyes with a youthful-looking finish.
name: Intensive Skin Barrier Eye Care Set 15g

product_description:
Smoothen the complexion with the Mizon 24 Soft Milk Whipping Cream; an intense, anti-ageing moisturiser that pampers skin with a veil of hydration.
Combining Goat Milk extract and Antarcticine, the creamy formula transforms skin’s texture, making it softer and smoother by promoting hydration. Mountain Goats's Colostrum, Milk Protein and Hyaluronic Acid thoroughly moisturise the skin, keeping it comfortable and hydrated for up to 24 hours.
Suitable for sensitive skin, the lightweight hydrator visibly brightens the complexion and reduces the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles. Expect ultra-smooth skin that is vibrant and healthy-looking.
name: 24 Soft Milk Whipping Cream 90ml

product_description:
Shield skin against environmental damage with the Nutrify & Protect Day Lotion from Colbert MD. Functioning as a nourishing daily moisturiser, the lotion seeks to reveal refreshed, vibrant skin.
Boasting a cocktail of natural ingredients, the formula combines Tremellla Mushroom and Tibetan Goji Berry, which deliver essential hydration to the skin, as well as an anti-ageing handful of vitamins and antioxidants. The day lotion utilises Colbert MD’s unique Triad Delivery System™, which promotes the development of youth-providing cells, whilst an Environment Protective Complex replenishes fatty acids and defends against environmental damage.
Expect youthful skin that is nourishes and protected.
name: MD Nutrify & Protect Day Lotion 50ml

product_description:
Defend against complexion disorders with the PAYOT Uni Skin Yeux et Lèvres Perfecting Balm for Eyes and Lips. Combining a skin perfecting balm with a Uni perfect complex, the formula is designed to reduce the appearance of complexion issues including dark spots, redness and dullness, specifically for the delicate skin at the eye and lip areas.
Reviving the complexion, the daily cream boasts a silky balm texture and works to visibly fill fine lines, leaving eyes and lips youthful and radiant.
name: Uni Skin Yeux et Lèvres Perfecting Balm for Eyes and Lips 15ml

product_description:
Achieve maximum hydration with the Natural Spa Factory Day Cream; an ultra-gentle formula that infuses skin with moisture to leave it feeling refreshed and softened.
Free from any nasty chemical additives, the moisturiser contains an antioxidant-rich blend of Pomegranate, Sweet Almond and Grape Seed Oils to effectively combat free radical damage and deliver vital nutrients. Natural Beeswax extract works to prevent pores from becoming clogged, whilst Camelina Oil replenishes essential fatty acids. Suitable for daily use and as a post-shave balm, skin appears smoother, refined and polished.
name: Spa Factory Day Cream

product_description:
Awake to a youthful appearance with the Skin Authority Night Revitalizer; an anti-ageing formula that works whilst skin is most receptive to repair.
Utilising a natural AHA exfoliator, Night Revitalizer works to reduce the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles, as well as visibly brightening a dull complexion due to Vitamins C and E. The hydrating formula delivers a veil of moisture, which helps to alleviate rough texture and leave the face soft and smooth. Expect to wake up to a radiant and youthful complexion.
name: Authority Night Revitalizer

product_description:
Combat dry, lacklustre skin with the Barrier Oil Emulsion from Korean beauty brand Mizon. Fortified with plant-based ingredients and nutrients, the lightweight lotion effortlessly melts into skin, working to optimise moisture levels and draw out a natural radiance from deep within.
Suitable for all skin types, the emulsion seeks to form a protective barrier across skin with antioxidant-rich Olive Oil, resulting in a more even and refined complexion replenished with a healthy looking radiance.
name: Barrier Oil Emulsion 150ml

product_description:
Maintain skin's moisture with the Borghese Acqua Ristorativo Hydrating Concentrate, a moisturising solution that prevents loss of tone and texture commonly associated with dehydrated skin.
Replenishing and preserving moisture, which is vital for resilience and flexibility, the concentrate combines botanically-derived Cell Leaf Culture with two marine derivatives and Hyaluronic Acid to bind moisture and provide essential protection whilst softening and smoothing with natural, emollient butter. Hydrated skin is healthy skin.
name: Acqua Ristorativo Hydrating Concentrate (30ml)

product_description:
Perk up tired peepers with the Advanced Snail Eye Serum from skinChemists. Utilising an innovative age-defying formula, the elixir is rich in antioxidants, vitamins and essential oils to help smooth, lift and plump the delicate eye area.
Its unique formula is enriched with naturally protective Snail Secretion, which aims to combat signs of ageing by helping to reduce visible dark circles and to form a barrier against free radical damage. Hyaluronic Acid helps to boost moisture levels, whilst Starflower Oil is rich in fatty acids that aim to replenish skin tissue. Fine lines appear reduced and the sensitive skin around the eyes feels refreshed and firmer.
name: Advanced Snail Eye Serum 15ml

product_description:
CODAGE 10号抗衰老能量精华（15ml）专为消除衰老迹象而配制，针对浮肿、黑眼圈和细纹。 这款产品由品牌的法国制药专家团队配制而成，混合了多种高效成分，提亮眼周肌肤，均匀肤色，呈现年纪状态。 - K.R
Hy3 - 具有补水锁水的滋润功效。 这种成分还能够促进胶原蛋白，丰盈并紧实肌肤，令肌肤更年轻。
Ao3 - 这一富含抗氧化因子的成分具有修复和保护功效功效，可以保护肌肤抵御自由基和紫外线的伤害，并修复肌肤已有的损伤。
Ru3 - 这一抗皱成分混合了多种抗衰老因子。 减少面部微小的收缩，抚平并减少细纹与皱纹，一有迹象便立即作用。 具有抗氧化功能，防止肌肤衰老，同时刺激胶原蛋白生成，令肌肤丰盈紧致，呈现年轻魅力。
Ri3 - 这一成分专门针对细纹和皱纹，能够紧致并强韧肌肤结构，防止肌肤进一步衰老。
DX3 - 这一成分能够促进排毒，去除有害毒素，同时为肌肤增添一层保护屏障，防止其他有害物质进入。 修复受损的蛋白质，为肌肤细胞注入能量，令面色润泽。
Ec3 - 融合了多种对肌肤有益的成分，改善肌肤，效果卓著，令肌肤容光焕发。 促进细胞更新，滋润锁水，富含抗氧化因子，有助于保护细胞。
Cn3 - 针对色斑、明显的毛细血管和浮肿等肌肤问题，它可以舒缓眼周肌肤，减少双眸疲态并减缓肌肤衰老。
Pc3 - 这一成分的作用相当于浮肿双眼的排水口，增加肌肤弹性，减轻浮肿。 平滑眼周肌肤，均匀肤色。
name: 10号抗衰老能量精华（15ml）

product_description:
LIFT + FIX™ Restore Serum is concentrated to calm, eliminate and prevent inflammation. It offers instant relief from redness and irritation due to environmental factors, including sun exposure, extreme temperatures, pollutants, cosmetic treatments and even shaving. It reinforces the skin's protective barrier, alleviates sensitivity and addresses premature signs of aging.
Along with Cell Protection Proteins® active ingredients include: Abyssine 657 and NAB Arnica Extract to reduce redness and irritation, Sym Glucan to reduce sensitivity, Aquafill to lock in moisture, Osilift to provide immediate firming, plus Adenosine to help stimulate cell renewal.
name: LIFT + FIX Restore Serum

product_description:
PAYOTWhite ParfaiteClarté  是一种亮白5合1BB霜 。使您拥有完美无瑕的肌肤。
该款产品含矿物颜料、抗氧化剂、亮白维生素C。可轻松地涂抹于皮肤上， 使皮肤水润、肤色统一、阻挡自由基损害肌肤。 其通用配方可减少色斑、红血丝、瑕疵、及所有肤色问题。使您的肤色看起来更均匀、健康、完美无瑕。 可单独涂抹，也可作为底妆。两种方式均不错。 肌肤丝般柔软、容光焕发。
name: White ParfaiteClarté（50ml）

product_description:
Visibly improve the shape, texture and volume of lips with Rose Quartz Youth Defence Lip Plump from skinChemists.  Bursting with active ingredients, the formula aims to plump and nourish lips, resulting in a more supple and hydrated appearance.
Antioxidant-rich Vitamin E soothes against inflammation and protects against skin damage from UV rays and free-radicals. The treatment improves lip texture by synthesising naturally occurring Hyaluronic acid, popular for its ability to retain and increase visible firmness and plumpness of the lips. Finished with a blend of Peppermint Oil producing a fresh, invigorating aroma.
name: Rose Quartz Youth Defence Lip Plump 8ml

product_description:
使用 Tria's Age Defying Skincare 超级 C Brightening Moisturiser重燃肌肤的光采，专门开发的保湿乳液可软化和滋润肌肤，同时在您激光治疗的基础上提供增亮效果。
旨在作为您激光治疗的辅助护理手段，这款保湿霜为接受激光治疗后的肌肤注入各种增白和保湿成分；它所含的油基维生素C和己基間苯二酚协同发挥作用以消除和改善肤色暗哑和变色，保护肌肤免受自由基攻击，同时玻尿酸帮助肌肤保持其自身的水分，以获得一个饱满和容光焕发的外观。
name: Age Defying Skincare 超级C Brightening 保湿霜

product_description:
Hydrate your complexion with the Age-Adapt® Daily Moisturiser from SkinPointEight. Ideal for daily use, the moisturising face cream is created with a blend of adaptogen Herbal Botanicals and remedial Chinese Herbs, designed to hydrate skin with multiple anti-ageing benefits.
Working in synergy with moisture-capturing Phyto-Ceramide blends and an array of luxurious oils, the gentle yet effective moisturiser protects the skin against environmental damage, whilst reducing the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles.
Antioxidant rich, the anti-ageing product is host to a combination of Rhodiola, Ginseng and Goji Berries, which prevent the appearance of uneven skin tone as well as visible signs of ageing. Smoothing the complexion, the moisturiser leaves the face hydrated, supple and youthful.
name: Age-Adapt® Daily Moisturiser 50ml

product_description:
Warm and uplift the natural tones of your face with Time Bomb's Holiday in a Bottle in 'Suntanned', a unique 'liquid sunshine' formula that works to add a natural-looking, sunny bronze glow to your complexion.
The innovative formulation is different to a foundation or self-tan; it is infused with micro-pigments that 'burst' on contact with skin to deliver a sheer wash of translucent, glowing colour. Easy to apply and blend, the sunkissed formula spreads evenly over the face and enhances your natural colour; its intelligent pigments adapt to your individual skin tone to leave you with a natural-looking, sunless glow.
name: Bomb Holiday in a Bottle - Suntanned 30ml

product_description:
Visibly plump your complexion with the pack of 4 Age-Adapt® Face Masks from SkinPointEight. Hydrating and soothing skin, the sheet masks deliver an array of nourishing ingredients to the face, transforming the complexion and leaving it youthful.
The masks boast a blend of antioxidant rich Ginseng and Astralagus, which work in synergy to improve micro-circulation and boost skin’s collagen production. Detoxifying on a cellular level, the innovative masks are crafted with highly absorbent Tencel® fibre and allow you to enjoy visibly firmer and calmer skin.
The anti-ageing masks are complete with a duo of age-reversing actives, Magnolol and Honokiol, which combine to target the visible signs of ageing, reduce the appearance of enlarged pores and leave skin smooth and hydrated.
name: Age-Adapt® Face Mask 4 Individual Tencel® Masks

product_description:
Specially combined to cleanse, rebalance and mattify oily skin types, the MONU Top Trio contains three products to keep pores unblocked, oil production balanced and your complexion spot-free.
The MONU Top Trio for Oily Skin contains:
Clarifying Cleanser (180ml)
This light cleansing lotion thoroughly cleans whilst rebalancing the complexion and removing excess oil. Enriched with Camphot, Peach Kernal and Coconut Essential Oils, skin is brightened and radiant with a matt finish.
Clarifying Toner (180ml)
A mattifying and rebalancing toner that prevents breakouts with its Witch Hazel ingredient, while leaving skin with a refreshed, flawless matt finish. Removes residue left from cleansing lotion and leaves your skin feeling fresh and toned.
Mattifying Lotion (50ml)
The perfect moisturiser for oily, spot-prone skin. Enriched with Willow Bark Extract and natural Salicylic Acid, the formula helps to keep pores unblocked and keep excess oil at bay. Leaving a matt finish it makes the ideal makeup base.
name: Top Trio - Oily

product_description: Achieve a radiant complexion with the Barrier Oil Cream from Korean beauty brand Mizon. Ideal for rough, dry and dull skin, the rich and hydrating face cream delivers a double-layering effect, working to create a protective barrier on the surface layer while penetrating deep with essential nutrients. Water-soluble Olive Oil acts as the base of the formula, seeking to draw out a radiant sheen for a lit-from-within glow, effortlessly melting into skin to leave it feeling smooth, soft and supple.

product_description:
Improve the look of your complexion with Mizon Pore Refine Silky Essence, a pore-refining solution that works to minimise the look of pores whilst controlling excess sebum for a healthier, more balanced complexion.
Infused with Green Tea and Lotus extract, the refreshing and protective formula gently sloughs away dulling dead skin cells and debris to reveal brighter, more clarified skin. The nutritive silky essence effectively 'fill's in pores to visibly reduce their appearance. Skin looks smooth, clarified and refined.

product_description:

Fortified with a 54% concentration of Marine Collagen, the jelly-textured, anti-ageing formula deeply hydrates skin while effectively filling the appearance of fine lines with Collagen and Copper Tripeptide-1.
The addition of KFDA-certified Adenosine and Cacao extract help firm and refine the surface layer, seeking to restore optimum elasticity levels, while Hyaluronic Acid ensures maximum moisturisation. Suitable for all skin types, skin feels refreshed and smooth with the look of wrinkles and imperfections visibly minimised.

Placenta contains iron which improves skin cell oxygen absorption, and vitamins B6 and E which repair the skin and form antibodies.
Glycerine is excellent for hydrating and nourishing, known for its ability to retain moisture and limit water loss by creating a skin barrier. The Allantoin acts as a skin smoother, known for its therapeutic properties on the skin, and the Aloe Vera extract stimulates the immune system and healing process. E.N.

product_description:
使用AcnEase Rosacea Control Treatment - 5 Bottles让您的皮肤免受痤疮的困扰。 非常适合那些皮肤或身体具有中度问题的患者使用，这款产品将有助于避免痤疮的重复出现。
本款产品的成分完全采用草本精华，可以恢复因内分泌失调、环境、压力、药物治疗和饮食而遭到破坏的体内平衡，从而从根本上解决痤疮和皮肤问题（例如玫瑰红斑）。  绝对安全且无副作用， 非常适合男女青少年及成年人用以清洁皮肤，一个月内就可达到预期效果。  
什么是中度痤疮？ 多个或者/以及相对频繁出现的粉刺覆盖面部或额头较大部分的区域，并且通常更具有顽固性。 本产品也适合那些遭受2年或以上的轻度痤疮患者使用
产品概述：AcnEase®是最有效的Botanical Therapeutic®（植物性治疗产品），可治疗已经形成的痤疮，防止新的粉刺和青春痘形成。此外，按照推荐方法使用后，AcnEase®所含的各种成分会让您的肌肤更清爽和更健康，同时能够去黑头和白头，并能消除红肿的症状。
AcnEase®可以恢复因为内分泌失调、环境因素、某些药物的使用、神经紧张、压力过度和饮食习惯而打乱了的天然内部平衡。痤疮其实是内部失调的外部体现。 AcnEase®的独特之处在于，它不仅可以治疗疾病的外部症状，同时还能解决痤疮和其他皮肤问题的根本问题（例如导致玫瑰红斑形成的身体内部原因）。
AcnEase非常适合有以下症状的人使用：青春痘、荷尔蒙分泌失调型痤疮、更年期痤疮（女性）、慢性粉刺、因辛辣和油腻的食物而症状加重的痤疮、吸烟、压力、喝酒或使用其他药物而出现的痤疮、面部和身体上出现的痤疮以及囊肿性痤疮。  
定期使用的好处：
name: Moderate Acne Treatment - 5 Bottles（套装）

用这款 Elemis 保湿人参 Toner活化和滋补您的肌肤。  这种温和的爽肤水可刺激失去活力的肤色，使您的外观和感觉清新，活力倍增。
该爽肤水含有人参、皂树皮及甜贝蒂花提取物，可重振肌肤活力，彻底去除洁面乳的残留痕迹。
活性成分植物甘油和去离子水合物可让您的肌肤柔软水润，同时有助于吸收日霜和晚霜。
使用说明。

product_description:
The ALGENIST Genius Ultimate Anti-Ageing Vitamin C+ Serum transforms dull, lacklustre skin with a pioneering selection of exclusive, marine-based ingredients that deliver age-defying results.  
Based upon ALGENIST’s extensive biotechnological research, the award-winning serum combines the patented proprietary formulation of Alguronic Acid and Microalgae Oil with a stabilised Vitamin C derivative – renowned for it’s unparalleled antioxidant properties and anti-ageing benefits.   
The multi-tasking treatment seeks to balance moisture levels and combat discolouration, resulting in a more even and refined complexion with a revitalised radiance. Even the most fragile skin texture appears more resilient and replenished, with the look of fine lines and depth of wrinkles visibly reduced within as little as 28 days.
Ideal for daily use, the serum leaves skin feeling smooth, soft and supple with a youthful glow.

product_description:

胶冻的创新配方含有肌肤中的一种重要结构蛋白——胶原质，也是照相胶片中使用的一种关键成分。 FUJIFILM 已将纳米技术专长用于研发胶片的颜色，并将其应用于胶冻，使得高浓度的滋养成分可渗透至肌肤。 该品牌的图像分析技术知识也被用于开发可增强肤色的产品。 大马士革玫瑰可有效地丰润肌肤，呈现更青春的亮泽肤色。 E.N.

让肌肤瞬间变得更加光滑清爽，使其看起来更年轻。

Its dose of Meadowfoam Seed Oil decongests and clarifies to leave skin smooth, hydrated and illuminated with improved tone and texture.

product_description:
充分滋養眼部肌膚， First Aid Beauty排毒滾珠眼部精華幫助加快代謝眼周堆積的毒素，早晨醒來眼周肌膚煥然一新。特別適合有眼袋、黑眼圈和工作勞累人群，創新配方含有咖啡因、透明質酸以及多肽氨基酸等成分，可收縮眼瞼部位的毛細血管，顯著促進血液微循環，明顯改善黑眼圈問題。同時促進膠原蛋白的生成，平滑細紋。富含金縷梅，舒緩滋潤嬌嫩的下眼部肌膚。獨特的滾珠設計，清涼按摩眼周肌膚，促進血液循環，緩解眼部浮腫，緊緻眼周輪廓，改善眼部肌膚鬆弛狀況，有效舒緩眼睛疲勞。使用幾分鐘便讓雙眸回复奕奕神彩。

Placental Protein, Natto Gum and Sclerotium Gum work in synergy to deliver a protective veil to the face, which shields skin from environmental damage and prevents sensitivity.
Working whilst you sleep, the effortless mask leaves skin comfortably hydrated and ultra-bright.

Experience optimum standards of facial rejuvenation with the NuFACE Gel Primer 24K Gold Complex in Firm. The lightweight primer is an essential first step to using the NuFACE device.
Arriving with an integrated brush applicator, the primer is effortlessly to apply and allows the NuFACE device to glide across the skin easily, whilst ensuring maximum microcurrent conductivity for optimum results. The anti-ageing 24K gold complex boasts multiple firming ingredients and Alpha Lipoic Acid, which visibly tightens and tones the skin, creating a younger looking complexion. The formula can be left on all day or washed away after use of the device.

product_description: Elemis Deep Cleanse Facial Wash 融合了栎树皮、留兰香和薄荷等高效成分，起到恢复和醒肤的作用，同时去除多余的油脂、污垢和杂质。 乳蛋白提供必需的营养物质，促进健康皮肤，恢复更亮泽的肤色，并提拉胡须，让剃须剃得更光。 这款日常洁面乳拥有轻盈的凝胶配方，可渗透皮肤，让人整天感觉神清气爽，并避免环境侵害因素。 E.N.

product_description:
The ALGENIST Genius Ultimate Anti-Ageing Cream utilises advanced anti-ageing biotechnology to leave skin looking visibly younger, with the appearance of fine lines and deep-set wrinkles smoothed away.
The pioneering formula is the first of its kind to combine Alguronic Acid, a patented anti-ageing ingredient, with a new, sustainably sourced Microalgae Oil, a patent-pending, plant-based collagen, which work in synergy to enhance skin resilience and elasticity levels.
Even the most fragile skin appears strengthened and replenished, with the look of fine lines and wrinkles visibly reduced. Facial contours are nourished and revitalised, with your complexion left feeling toned, firmer and tighter. Suitable for daily use, the rich, luxurious face cream effectively reverses the impact of time on skin to impart an age-defying radiance.
name: Genius Ultimate Anti-Ageing Cream 60ml

product_description:
Treat your skin to MÁDARA Become Organic Starter Set, a trio of kind-to-skin formulas that work to cleanse, hydrate and renew the appearance of your complexion.
Purifying Foam Face Wash (150ml Full Size):
A rich cleanser that works to lift away makeup and impurities to leave the complexion clean and purified. Infused with Northern Yarrow Extract, the cleansing foam delicately eliminates dirt and grime from skin, removing makeup whilst regulating oily areas and hydrating dry patches. After use, skin will feel soft and refreshed. Gentle enough for use around the eyes. Suitable for all skin types.
Deep Moisture Fluid (20ml):
An intensely hydrating day cream that moisturises and protects your complexion. Enriched with extracts of Northern Plantain and Sea-buckthorn to maintain optimal moisture levels, the cream delivers a veil of comfort onto skin, alleviating the discomfort of tightness whilst providing 24 hour hydration. Its nourishing and protective properties leave skin looking soft and supple. Suitable for dry and very dry skin.
Regenerating Night Cream (20ml):
A rich formula that works while you sleep to promote softer, supple looking skin. Infused with host of antioxidants and natural plant essences, the night cream enhances the skin's natural ability to repair itself whilst combatting the onslaught of environmental aggressors. Melting effortlessly into skin, the rejuvenating cream will leave skin looking soft and youthful come morning. Suitable for all skin types.
name: Become Organic Starter Set (Worth £40)

product_description:
这款 Nuxe Creme Prodigieuse 晚霜是一种创新补充能力的晚霜，适合所有肌肤类型。 它可以抗击日常压力造成的损害，防止衰老，提高肌肤的光泽度和质感。
这款晚霜可以温和地协助细胞更新，一夜之间可以改变肌肤，令您在早上感到新鲜、精力充沛。
name: Creme Prodigieuse晚霜（适合所有Skin类型）

product_description:
Rediscover a younger, firmer-looking complexion with the NuFACE Trinity Facial Toning Device. Combining a facial toning device with a skin-prepping primer, the duo will contribute to a smoother, lifted and younger-looking complexion with regular use.
Trinity Facial Toning Device
An award-winning microcurrent treatment packed into an innovatively-designed device with interchangeable treatment attachments. Designed to combat visible signs of ageing, the device stimulates both the large surface areas and small contours of the face, creating similar results to a facelift, however the treatment is pain free and can take only 5 minutes. Mircrocurrent devices mimic the natural current of the body, which slows as we age. Going deeper than the surface, the device visibly tones the facial muscles, improving the contour, evening the appearance of skin tone and visibly reducing fine lines and wrinkles. Safe and effective for all skin types, it leaves the complexion looking youthful and visibly supple.
Gel Primer (59ml)
Prepare for the NuFACE Trinity device with the Gel Primer. The lightweight formula allows for the device to glide across the skin easily, whilst ensuring maximum microcurrent conductivity for optimum results. Suitable for all skin types, the formula is water-based and extremely easy to remove.
name: Trinity Facial Toning Device

product_description:
Experience unrivalled hydration with Time Bomb's Power Ball Intensive Moisturiser, an exceptional moisturising formula that works to replenish critical water and counteract acute to chronic dehydration.
Water is crucial for skin's health; it makes up 64% of skin's cell structure and ensures skin stays healthy, plump and well-functioning. Promoting intense hydration, the moisturiser saturates skin with 21 naturally hydrating agents and expertly delivers and retains essential water to leave the complexion soft, smooth and moist. Infused with Ectoin (a moisture holding protein that enables organisms to thrive in harsh desert environments), Bio-protectant Trehalose, Hyaluronic Acid and an Aqua Cell Complex (Lentil, Apple and Watermelon extracts), the formula helps preserve skin's internal fluidity for improved suppleness and elasticity, and refills essential moisture reserves to leave your complexion softer, smoother and plumper.
name: Bomb Power Ball Intensive Moisturiser 45ml

product_description:
Pai米糠&迷迭香生物親和柔膚水獨特之處在於含有提取自植物的純淨活水，富含維他命和礦物質，經常使用可以舒緩、滋潤乾燥和敏感肌膚，保護肌膚不受自由基影響。 
植物富含多種天然水溶性化合物，植物中循環的水分充分吸收了這些營養成分和多種氨基酸、維他命和微量礦物元素。這些植物水含有健康肌膚確切的PH值，​​恢復肌膚平衡，改善膚色和質地。 
一般的柔膚水是有惰性和去離子花卉水或對皮膚沒有多少益處的酒精組成，Pai產品不含任何酒精，甚至天然天然穀物成分（易使肌膚乾燥，帶走肌膚天然油脂，不適合敏感肌使用）。
Institut Esthederm 雅诗敦 Photo Reverse 防晒乳可显著提亮和均匀肤色，让您尽享灿烂的阳光。 这款防晒乳旨在预防黄斑，显著淡化色斑。 这款防晒霜具有抵御长波紫外线和中波紫外线的功能，防止严重的色素沉着、光照性肌肤老化和新色素沉着。
name: Esthederm 雅诗敦阳光卫士倍护防晒乳 50ml

product_description:

76％的人表示，使用后肌肤感觉清新和充满活力*

product_description:
适用于柔和阳光的 Institut Esthederm 雅诗敦古铜修复霜帮您缔造健康的古铜色日晒肌肤。 这款抗皱日晒霜专门针对面部和肩颈的肌肤而设计，旨在刺激产生自然褐色，最大化减少明显的衰老迹象，保护肌肤免受有害长波紫外线/中波紫外线的伤害。
多重独家专利确保古铜褐色日晒美肤效果，不对肌肤产生任何伤害：修复专利刺激细胞再生，美黑日晒可优化褐色，细胞水可为肌肤补充能量，以使这款面霜的功能发挥到极致。

product_description:

富含强效活性成分和芳香精油混合物，该日霜添加紫外线防护成分，可柔化、舒缓和调理肤质，提供一层抵御氧化压力的舒适、保护膜，帮助减少色素沉着、黑斑和皱纹。

product_description:
PAYOT紧肤面膜是一种抗老化面膜，可使皮肤恢复活力、重新焕发光泽、面部轮廓愈发紧致。
它包含了抗氧化剂维生素E、玻尿酸、Acti-Lift 合成物。敷此凝胶面膜可收紧皮肤、提升皮肤弹力、使皮肤线条饱满、 "重塑"肤色、使您看起来更年轻。 它含有滋养型凝胶，会让皮肤感到舒适、恢复健康活力。

裴禮康全效保濕乳霜採用質地輕盈的配方，幫助重現肌膚健康美麗。幫助減少細紋，為中性至乾性肌膚提供長效保濕。 
 Perricone MD 裴禮康全效保濕乳霜採用獨特配方，蘊含硫鋅酸、維生素C 酯和DMAE。這款肌膚調理產品在保濕的同時令肌膚容光煥發，再現年輕美麗光彩。 
獨立實驗室測試證實，連續4 週使用4 步套裝，87% 的女士肌膚煥發光彩，82% 的女士肌膚紋理更加細膩光滑。

product_description:
PAYOT 柏姿敏感专家舒缓洁肤水具有舒缓和清洁敏感肌肤的功效，这款无香型胶束水可清洁肌肤，而不会刺激敏感和易于过敏的肌肤。
这款温和而舒缓的半透明洁肤水采用温和的清洁剂和具有保湿作用的微量元素，可温和地清除杂质，舒缓受刺激的肌肤。 非常适合那些不适合采用水和传统清洁方法的肌肤。 让肌肤感觉清洁、舒缓和清爽。

product_description: 使用来自 PAYOT的这款 Sun Sensi Crème Visage Protective Anti-Ageing Face Cream SPF 20防止肌肤受损。非常适用于日晒程度较低的淡色或橄榄肤色，液体霜剂，可快速吸收，抵御 UVA 和 UVB 射线，同时让肌肤容光焕发。 这一不油腻配方采用 Cell Protect Complex 以及维他命 C 和 E 进行强化，防止肌肤受到环境侵害因素的损伤，还您健康、滋润的肤色。

使用PAYOT Hydra 24 + Daily Moisturising and Plumping Cream修复缺水肌肤，本品是一款能够深层补水和消除衰老的迹象的保湿产品。
丝滑的面霜含有保水成分，维生素C和E，能够轻松融化进肌肤进行24小时保湿，同时增加肌肤光泽，抚平脸部各种细纹。
Skin感觉柔软，饱满，持久舒适。

product_description:
Eliminate traces of makeup with the Talika Lash Conditioning Cleanser; a non-greasy makeup remover that is specially developed to gently melt away all types of mascara, including the most stubborn, waterproof kinds.
Enriched with natural cleansing agents, the conditioning formula effortlessly removes all kinds of eye makeup, whilst Blueberry Water and Silk Proteins work in synergy to nourish and strengthen lashes and brows. Complete with a healthy dose of Cornflower extract, the lash conditioning cleanser leaves the complexion feeling refreshed.

product_description: The yes to Cucumbers Daily Calming Moisturiser infuses sensitive skin with soothing and hydrating ingredients. Cooling and rejuvenating, the lightweight formula blends Organic Cucumber with Aloe Vera and Sweet Almond Oil to hydrate and condition for long-lasting comfort. Expect a soft, smooth and healthy-looking complexion with a luminous glow.
name: to Cucumbers Daily Calming Moisturiser

product_description:
This oil-free, tightening eye contour gel penetrates instantly to reduce puffiness and firm the eye contour area. Organic Apple extract minimizes the look of fatigue (think espresso for your eyes!) and protects from the effects of environmental stress. Alchemilla, a powerful astringent, minimizes under-eye bags and brightens the skin, while Jojoba increases firmness and elasticity. Natural antioxidants derived from Maté and the Vitamin K contained in Basil combine to minimize the look of fatigue and dark under-eye circles. Clinically proven to be highly concentrated in antioxidants.
Alchimie Antioxidant Technologies:
Alchemilla (Quercetin), Apple (Quercetin), Basil (Terpens, Vitamin K), Maté (Caffeine, Proanthocyanidins, Quercetin), Jojoba.
100% made in Switzerland. Dermatologist-formulated and tested.
name: Forever Tightening Eye Contour Gel

product_description:
Revive and rejuvenate your complexion with Mavala's Skin Vitality Vitalizing Healthy Glow Serum, a skin-enhancing formula infused with tiny pearls to create an instant glow.
Melting effortlessly into skin, the non-oily serum refreshes and energises dull skin, restoring radiance for a healthier appearance whilst protecting against external aggressors that can lead to premature ageing. Its dose of Swiss Apricot extract delivers antioxidant, toning and exfoliating benefits for brighter-looking skin, and a high concentration of stable Vitamin C truly revitalises and illuminates. Skin appears fresh, glowing and moisturised. Can also be used on the décolleté to create a light-catching, sensual glow. Non-sticky. Housed in airtight packaging to maintain efficacy.
name: Skin Vitality Vitalizing Healthy Glow Serum 30ml

product_description:
PAYOT 柏姿日晒妆效喷雾让您尽享日晒光泽的肌肤。 这款质地轻盈而使用方便的喷雾既适合面部肌肤，也适合身体的肌肤，它可快速被肌肤吸收，让您的肤色看起来更自然，并缓慢地增深肤色，让您尽享亮丽的金色日晒肤色。
这款逐渐变色的日晒妆效喷雾蕴含有创新型的 DHA 复合物和软化剂，能够均匀褪色，而不会再肌肤上留下痕迹，而其多部位喷雾可确保您能进行无效涂抹。 适合所有肌肤类型，你可以期待丝般柔滑的焕亮肌肤。

Developed around Clary Sage’s remarkable ability to capture and retain moisture, the creamy formula effectively removes dirt, oil and makeup while optimising hydration levels. Gentle enough for daily use, the cleanser leaves your complexion feeling refreshed and supple.

product_description: Ila Spa 细胞新生晚霜专为在睡眠中滋养和保护肌肤而配制，它能够渗透至肌肤最深处。 这款高效的面霜特别添加了从巴西榥榥木提取的脂肪酸，恢复肌肤弹性，改善肤色和肤质；富含多种抗氧化成分，保护肌肤免受自由基和环境侵害因素的损伤。 同时，内含的蜂王浆还能深层刺激细胞生成，减少细纹和皱纹的出现。 - L.M.

product_description: Institut Esthederm 雅诗敦晒后修复霜可平静接触过阳光的肌肤。 这款舒缓的抗衰老面霜可为肌肤补充水分，刺激真皮细胞的再生。 这款修复霜旨在舒缓和减少细纹和皱纹的迹象，让您的面部肌肤富有青春活力，同时让您持久地拥有褐色肤色。

product_description:
Treat dry skin to a holiday with the yes to Coconut Ultra Hydrating Facial Souffle Moisturiser. Working on dehydrated skin, the moisturiser delivers intense nourishment, without leaving behind a greasy residue.
Enriched with Coconut water, the soufflé protects skin against dehydration, whilst also restoring suppleness. Skin is left feeling hydrated and well cared for.

product_description: Prepare skin for a deep cleanse with the Purity Specialist Compress Concentrate from Jurlique. A unique blend of purifying extracts work to open pores and release any impurities. The formula is rich in antioxidants which help to purify skin, providing protection against pollution and premature ageing. Skin is left feeling revitalised.

Nourish your skin with the Japanese Orange Vitamin C Repairing Day Moisturiser from Dr Botanicals. The luxurious day cream is designed to provide you with a radiant complexion that will feel fresh all day.
Blended with Coconut oil, the moisturiser works to regulate dry and sensitive skin, whilst Neroli oil, provides nourishment for the complexion, resulting in smoother and firmer looking skin. Ideal for those living in city and suburban areas, the cream is enriched with Alpine Rose oil, boasting the power to make skin feel protected against environmental damage.
name: Botanicals Japanese Orange Vitamin C Repairing Day Moisturiser 50ml

product_description:
利用Weleda温和清洁乳液恢复肌肤天然油脂，令肌肤焕发光彩。 有效但温和的清洗，这款滋养乳液可令肌肤生机勃勃，恢复平衡。
深层清洁是任何年龄进行有效面部护理的基础。 Weleda温和清洁乳液利用有机生长的原材料调制而成，将彻底清洁肌肤而不干燥，旨在满足所有肌肤类型的个性化需求。 其中榛子成分可舒缓和滋养肌肤，细致毛孔，令肌肤恢复生机，而天然精油的微妙清香则令人神清气爽。
使用说明：

可用 IOMA 的 活力注射亮肤精华液恢复面部皮肤的活力。 这种创新型护肤品已用高科技亮肤成分强化，可迅速吸收到晦暗的皮肤中，以恢复皮肤活力并使皮肤明亮，而可使皮肤充满活力的 Revitalin® 则可使皮肤焕然一新，恢复年轻红润的肤色。
既含有维生素 E 和 B3，又含有已封装起来的维生素 C，可减少疲劳的迹象，并发挥抗氧化剂的保护作用，而 Pollustop®（是一种多聚糖基质）则可防止受到污染、压力和环境侵害因素的侵害。 有最大程度地减少细纹的出现的作用，预计面部皮肤会更光滑，更细腻，并且明亮如初。

product_description:
可用 NAOBAY 的美白霜 O'White 防止黑斑出现；这是一种新颖的面霜，有助于最大程度地减淡面部、颈部和双手上的瘢痕。
这种强效配方护肤品已用活性芒果提取物、玫瑰果油和摩洛哥坚果油强化，既能以不均匀的肤色和瑕疵为目标发挥作用，又能防止新老年斑的形成。 皮肤看起来会变得纯净、明亮和更加年轻。

product_description:
The Refinery 的这款面膜可以完美护理您的精致皮肤，帮您去除脸部瑕疵和杂质，甚至可以治疗因接触各种外部元素而导致的皮肤问题。
所含各种成分功能如下：
期待紧致、平滑和滋润的皮肤。

product_description:
利用Weleda Pomegranate紧致眼霜让您的眼睛恢复活力光采。 支持肌肤修复过程，该润肤霜可促进青春活力，而天然的抗氧化剂有助于保护娇嫩的眼部区域免受有害因素的侵害。
利用Weleda Pomegranate紧致眼霜减少皱纹并激活肌肤再生过程。 这款抗氧化剂护肤霜含有机生长的石榴和金色粟米的宝贵成分，可减少皱纹，同时拉紧肌肤，令肌肤焕发青春，光彩照人。 适合素食主义者。
皮肤科测试显示，经过28天的使用，皱纹深度减少29％*而肌肤水分含量增加了39％**。
*利用PRIMOS测量皱纹深度，测试了41-65岁之间20位受试者，每天使用产品两次，使用28天。
**利用皮肤水分测定仪测试肌肤水分含量，测试了41 - 70岁之间23位受试者，涂用后30分钟。
使用说明：
name: Pomegranate紧致眼霜（10ml）

product_description:
通过攻击因睡眠不足而累积的甘油毒素，减少皮肤疲劳和过早老化的迹象。
使用说明：
name: works 无皱纹 晚间修复（30毫升）

product_description:
Zelens微精华水双活性去角质霜是一种多用保湿去角质霜，作用是软化并再生皮肤，且不会夺走必需的水分。
酶去角质与二氧化硅颗粒的结合温和而有效，可对皮肤进行微晶磨皮，有效去除表面上的死细胞，让下面光滑闪亮的肤色露出真容。 这种水合物有助于重建皮肤的水脂屏障，让面部和颈部显得焕然一新，生机盎然，像天鹅绒一般光滑。 - K.N

NAOBAY 的平衡霜特为混合型皮肤和正常皮肤配制，有恢复面部皮肤平衡，对面部皮肤补水和滋养面部皮肤的作用。
这种吸收迅速的配方护肤品采用阿萨伊提取物、甜杏仁油和有机种植金盏花、芦荟和肉桂的混合物，含有大量维生素 C，既能防止环境侵害因素的侵害，又能巩固皮肤的皮脂膜。 面部皮肤看起来会纯净、光滑、健康。
name: 平衡霜 (50ml)

product_description:
利用来自NUXE的Splendieuse强效Anti Dark Spot精华液平衡您的肌肤，这款强效配方富含透明质酸，可滋润肌肤，同时均匀肤色并减少黑斑和色素沉着。
该精华液可被肌肤迅速吸收，它结合珍贵的花卉分子和仙人球果成分，可温和地去除角质，促进细胞再生，令肌肤容光焕发、美白亮丽，同时可积极削减肌肤黑斑的大小和颜色。 它不仅减少当前的肌肤缺陷，同时还防止新的黑斑的出现。 肌肤将变得美白亮丽、富有光泽、肤色均匀。 - K.N.

product_description:
The ALGENIST Genius Ultimate Anti-Ageing Foaming Cleanser gently purifies skin without stripping away essential moisture to leave your complexion feeling refreshed and comfortable, with additional anti-ageing benefits.
Developed through extensive biotechnological research, the mild formula dissolves daily dirt and makeup, with patented marine-sourced extracts of Alguronic Acid and Microalgae Oil working in tandem to infuse skin with Oleic Acid, Phytosterols, Tocopherols and Tocotrienols that deliver intensified hydration and nutrients.
As a result, the look of fine lines and wrinkles is visibly reduced, with skin appearing smoother, softened and brightened. Mild enough for daily use and can be used in conjunction with the ALGENIST Genius Ultimate Anti-Ageing Melting Cleanser for a deep, double cleanse.
name: Genius Ultimate Anti-Ageing Foaming Cleanser 150ml

product_description:
Treat your dull, lack-lustre complexion to the ALGENIST Algae Brightening Mask; a detoxifying, radiance-reviving formula that works to improve skin tone and texture as it cleanses and hydrates.
Harnessing the powers of nutrient-rich Algae and Sea Kelp, the revitalising treatment expertly exfoliates and polishes skin, whilst helping to combat uneven tone and enlarged pores for a smoother, more refined appearance and a fresh, dewy glow.
Alguronic Acid, the brand's patented, powerful compound, regenerates and shields skin; it absorbs quickly and creates a protective veil that defends against environmental aggressors and provides anti-ageing benefits to minimise the look of fine lines and wrinkles. Expect a bright, youthful-looking complexion with a pleasant, rejuvenating scent.
name: Algae Brightening Mask 60ml

product_description:
Polish the complexion with the Polaar Arctic Cotton Gentle Scrub; a gentle yet effective exfoliator that offers dual-action benefits.
The soft texture provides peeling and polishing action that sloughs away dead skin cells and leaves the complexion refreshed. Expect improved skin that is cleansed and healthy looking.
name: Arctic Cotton Gentle Scrub 75ml

product_description:
使用 Jack Black Face Buff，深层洁净肌肤。该品牌创造了您可以信赖并尽力执行和使用的产品。 其轻盈配方含环保型去角质粒子，可渗透肌肤，去除污垢、多余油脂和死皮细胞，呈现更光滑、神清气爽的肤色。
面部磨砂膏富含维生素 C 和甘草提取物，减缓衰老的迹象；尿囊素可软化和滋润肌肤。 做好剃须准备，防止毛发向内生长，避免灼热和刺激感；提拉胡须，以便剃得更光；同时薄荷醇可镇静和舒缓肌肤。 E.N.
name: Black Face Buff (88ml)

product_description:
科学发现夜间表皮细胞的更新速度更快，L’Oreal Revitalift 全效晚霜便是在此基础上设计配制，让肌肤更加美白，容光焕发。
L’Oreal Revitalift 全效晚霜富含海茴香提取物，能够促进皮肤的天然细胞更新，提供24小时保湿。 较深的顽固皱纹常常需要特殊呵护，这款面霜可以提供全天候的呵护，缓解皱纹。
使用说明：
name: Paris Dermo Expertise Revitalift 抗皱+紧致晚霜（50ml）

product_description:
The Menage Performance Pack provides practical anti-ageing skincare for men. The pack contains four coveted Menage invisible skincare products to help revitalise, hydrate and protect skin. Ideal as a starter kit to find new skincare essentials or even to take travelling.
Deep Pore Cleansing Face Scrub (20ml): The natural volcanic scrub revitalises and brightens the face, as well as giving it a smoother appearance. The low lather micro foam helps to thoroughly hydrates skin.
Hydrating Age Defence Gel (15ml): The ultra-light gel absorbs into the skin instantly, creating a fresh feeling and long lasting matte-look hydration. The powerful antioxidant-packed formula reduces visible signs of ageing by combating free radicals.
Anti-Ageing Moisturiser SPF15 (15ml): The fast absorbing moisturiser provides invisible hydration, creating a matte-look for everyday use. The treatment also combines 5* UVA protection to prevent skin ageing and Vitamin A’s including skin-repairing retinoid molecules, leaving skin nourished and smooth looking.
Daily Hand Repair (25ml): The non-greasy hand repair cream instantly absorbs to help rehydrate and visibly repair damaged skin, leaving hands ready to carry on working.
name: Performance Pack

product_description:
Revive your complexion with The Jojoba Company Skin Refining and Brightening Face Mask, a hydrating mask that works to visibly brighten the look of skin.
Formulated on a base of Ivory Clay, the face mask utilises 100% natural Australian Jojoba that mimics the skin's natural oils, absorbing below the surface to deliver vitamins and antioxidants deep down. Its cocktail of Bearberry and Vitamin A repair and boost radiance, helping to brighten the complexion whilst diminishing the look of age spots and pigmentation. Skin is left with a smooth and flawless appearance.
name: Jojoba Company Skin Refining and Brightening Face Mask 80ml

product_description: Crabtree & Evelyn 身体乳液能够深度滋润肌肤，并散发微妙的迷人清香。 这款丰富的滋润霜混合了清新的马鞭草和舒缓的薰衣草提取物，并添加了淡淡的柠檬清香，富含保湿甘油、泛醇和尿囊素，能够护理并滋润肌肤。 适合所有肌肤类型。 K.D.
name: & Evelyn 马鞭草 薰衣草 身体乳液（250ml）

product_description:
Su-Man 基本护肤品三件套，内含三种护肤产品，使肌肤清新自然、水嫩而富有活力。 这三种护肤品分别是：洁肤啫喱、去角质霜、精华液。内含有益成分，使肌肤更明亮、更柔软、更年轻。
洁肤啫喱 (40ml):
这是一款屡获殊荣的油水基洁肤啫喱，可深层清洁肌肤，而不会扰乱肌肤的自然平衡。 这款洁面乳可去除化妆品和杂质（包括防水睫毛膏），无残留。内含冬青、龙血竭提取物、玫瑰果油等成分，可净化滋养肌肤、加强皮肤天然屏障，保护肌肤免遭环境因素的侵害。 可深层清洁肌肤，而不失细腻，清理堵塞的毛孔，为肌肤补充营养，用后肌肤感觉清爽柔软。
去角质面霜 (40ml):
这是一款油基去角质面霜，为您展示更明亮、更光滑、更年轻的肌肤。 内含大量亮白和抗氧化成分，其中包括卡姆果、白百合、龙血竭提取物等。富含咖啡因的咖啡粒，可去除肌肤死皮细胞；这些颗粒，可细腻修复肌肤，瞬间让肌肤重焕活力，舒缓肌肤炎症。 是肌肤更光滑、富有活力、增强皮肤天然屏障、缩小毛孔，使肌肤紧致水嫩。
丝滑亮白精华 (15ml):
本品是一款抗衰老护肤品，使肤色明亮、肌肤舒适柔软。 本精华内含抗氧化剂、透明质酸、Traexamic酸、欧米伽、神经酰胺、龙血提取物等成分，使肌肤充满活力，加强肌肤天然屏障。内含的增白和抗老化剂等，帮助减少肌肤黑斑、抚平肌肤细纹和皱纹。

Sarah Chapman Lip Enhancer使您的嘴唇舒适、光滑，外观饱满，它是一款专门消除衰老迹象的创新的两步骤护理产品，同时起到保湿和呵护双唇的作用。
这款双端双色设计、抗衰老唇膏将Power Base与色调Balm结合起来，两种成分协同工作，在补水和滋养的同时重新塑造唇部轮廓，让您的嘴唇的外观既饱满又年轻。
第一步（Power Base 6ml）：
这款产品以其不油腻及快速吸收的配方护理您的嘴唇。 这款促进肌肤年轻的护理产品可进行密集补水，它富含高性能活性Neodermyl®（促进年轻活力的唇部填充物）、维生素A和透明质酸填充球，能使唇部明显丰满，去除细纹，同时软化、滋养唇部并对抗刺激和炎症 Lips变得平滑，看起来更加年轻。
第二步（色调Balm 6ml）： 
这一步可熟练地滋润和增加厚度，以提高您嘴唇的丰满度。 其丰满Volulip™、Sym3D™和智能自适应颜色的组合增强了您嘴唇的自然色，同时重新塑造唇部轮廓，促进补水。 富含由高性能活性物和阿比西尼亚油、可可和Shea果油的混合物，起到舒缓和滋养的作用。
您将获得恢复活力、外观健康的嘴唇，显得年轻、丰满，具有令人难以置信的滋润度。 充满了Rose奥托的清香。
name: Chapman Lip Enhancer

product_description:
使用 Bee Good 青春强化 Hydrate, Smooth 和优质面部精华液 重获青春活力，它是一个强效抗衰老浓缩液，致力于光滑、补益和保湿您的肌肤。
富含多种自然、高性能的成分，这款精华液熟练地减少细纹、皱纹和肤色不均。 它富含抗氧化剂的公式结合了英国的野花Honey和英国石油亚麻刺激胶原蛋白肽，提高弹性，水分和柔软度。 细纹和皱纹看起来更光滑。 Skin饱满、容光焕发和充分滋润。
name: Good青春强化Hydrate，Smooth和优质面部精华液（30ml）

product_description:
Polish the complexion with The Jojoba Company Jojoba Bead and Bamboo Facial Exfoliant; an effective facial exfoliator that is suitable for all skin types and gentle enough for sensitive skin.
Harnessing eco-friendly Bamboo and Jojoba beads, the formula thoroughly sloughs away dead skin cells from the surface of the face, leaving skin smooth and visibly radiant. The exfoliator is complete with a healthy dose of Australian Ivory Clay and Shea Butter, which combine to offer deep hydration and optimum nourishment.
Expect a revialised complexion.
name: Jojoba Company Jojoba Bead and Bamboo Facial Exfoliant 80ml

product_description:
Crabtree & Evelyn 护手霜将让双手保持柔软水嫩，采用超级滋润配方，富含没药提取物，能够滋养指甲和角质层，另外还特别添加了维生素C和E，具有出色的抗氧化功效。
这款丰富的护手霜非常适合日常使用，融合了雪梨和木兰花精华，让肌肤如丝般柔滑，散发芬芳的果香。 适合所有肌肤类型，不含苯甲酸酯类和矿物油。 K.D.
name: & Evelyn 雪梨 木兰花 护手霜（100g）

product_description:
利用Weleda Wild Rose Smoothing眼霜减少皱纹和眼袋。 这款轻盈滋润霜专为娇嫩的眼部区域配制，旨在舒缓疲劳、紧张的眼睛，同时令眼睛周围的肌肤和组织焕发活力。
生物动力小米和有机玫瑰果油的优雅组合，可舒缓眼部周围区域，而景天提取物有助于减少衰老迹象。 Weleda Wild Rose Smoothing眼霜所含天然玫瑰萃取物非常适合成熟肌肤，强效而又温和地恢复肌肤活力，有助于减少细纹，令肌肤柔软水嫩。
使用说明：
name: Wild Rose Smoothing 眼霜 (10ml)

product_description:
本款防护霜是一种高性能每日保湿霜。是皮肤护理最佳品，适用于敏感肌肤、刺激性肌肤、干燥肌肤、有瑕疵肌肤等。 Elemis Men SOS 防护霜可修护肌肤、改善肌肤色泽。
内含功效强大的海洋提取物、薰衣草、没药等成分。可瞬时舒缓皮肤问题部位，令肌肤深度滋润、舒适清爽。 运动后或进行户外活动后使用。
使用说明：
name: Men Sos防护霜（50ml）

product_description:
艾麗美骨膠原緊緻眼霜15ml 
這款抗老產品科學的蘊含著四種強大的海洋提取物: 粉糰扇藻，小球藻，藍綠微藻與硅樹脂。僅需28天，眼周的細紋與皺紋將有明顯的淡化.
name: 骨胶原紧致眼霜 15ml

product_description:
Smoothen and regenerate your eyes with Mizon Collagen Power Firming Eye Cream, an anti-ageing formula specially created to treat delicate skin around the eyes.
Infused with Copper Tripeptide-1 and 42% of highly concentrated Marine Collagen, the eye cream delivers a moisture-retaining veil that performs a firming effect to help reduce the appearance of wrinkles around the eyes. Effectively moisturising and improving elasticity, it contains a blend of Organic Argan Oil, Adenosine and Hyaluronic Acid to deeply nourish, promoting smoother, regenerated skin.
name: Collagen Power Firming Eye Cream 20ml

product_description:
The Konjac Sponge Company presents the Baby Face Sponge, a 100% natural product specifically designed for cleansing sensitive baby skin without the need for harmful chemicals or additives.
Delicately handmade purely from moisture-rich Konjac plant fibres and Volcanic Water, the compacted sponge is perfectly sized for newborns or premature babies and offers extra gentle cleaning. The innovative biodegradable sponge has a unique net-like structure that turns silky soft when wet and works to eliminate dirt, bacteria and impurities.
Konjac is a natural wonder – it’s been used in Southern Asia for over 1,500 years as a medicinal and beauty treatment, and it is alkaline based thus balances any acidity in skin and restores optimum pH levels.
Lasting for up to 3 months, the sponge is ideal for children suffering from eczema or inflammation to soothe and calm. Or you can even use it as an extra step at nappy changes! It’s the perfect choice for completely natural, pollutant and chemical free cleansing.
name: Konjac Sponge Company Baby Face Sponge

product_description:
最终抗老化设置，这款 Elemis 老化Skin Care套装是一款极致的抗老化三件套，所包含的神奇产品可令您的肌肤取得显著的护理成效。 这些乳霜可延缓肌肤衰老，其创新性成分可令您的肌肤光滑、无皱纹、水嫩润泽。 您会想知道没有这套护肤产品，您的日子是如何的黯淡无光！ K.D.
Elemis Pro-Collagen Cleansing Balm (100ml)用这款创新的ElemisPro-Collagen Cleansing Balm 清洁肌肤、放纵感官。 这款Cleansing Balm是一款接触到肌肤即融化的软化霜，可以深层滋养和清洁肌肤，令肌肤柔软饱满。
Elemis 海洋胶原蛋白护肤霜 (50ml)这款革命性的Anti-Ageing护肤霜使用海洋提取物海扇藻，在短短 2 周内即可令您的肤色焕然一新。 事实证明使用这款护肤霜，皱纹可以减少高达 78％，肌肤可以增加高达 45％ 的水分。
 Elemis Pro-Collagen石英提拉面膜 (50ml)这款面膜是革命性的Pro-Collagen系列的一部分，可以刺激、提拉和滋润皮肤，最大程度地减少衰老迹象，令肌肤看起来更年轻、更紧致。 利用海洋提取物海扇藻改变您的肤色、减少皱纹的出现、令肌肤更紧致、更富有弹性、更水润亮泽。
name: Care套装

product_description:
NUXE Merveillance Expert Serum可有效软化您的皱纹。 这款精华液能减少、缩短和淡化表情纹，同时赋予肌肤健康光泽，适合用于面部或眼廓区域的肌肤。
这款专业紧致精华液可有效填补纹理，凝固收紧，从而快速抚平细纹和皱纹，令肌肤倍感年轻。 -SA
name: Merveillance Expert Serum

product_description:
Sculpt and redefine facial contours with the Shiseido Bio-Performance LiftDynamic Serum; an advanced, anti-ageing treatment that seeks to support skin’s natural restorative processes for a youthful-looking visage.
Powered by TruStructiv™, the lightweight yet highly concentrated serum contains Bio-Renewal and Bio-Corrective Complexes that help improve skin resilience and combat the look of sagging and fine lines with a visible lifting effect.
Rich in Super Bio-Hyaluronic Acid N, it intensively restores moisture and elasticity levels for a smooth and refined surface texture. Unlock your skin’s potential and achieve a radiant and youthful-looking complexion.
name: Bio-Performance LiftDynamic Serum 30ml

product_description:
Boost sagging and dehydrated skin with the Erno Laszlo Firmarine Hydrogel Mask. Super lightweight with a gel-like texture, the mask moulds to your face and penetrates deep into the epidermis to nourish and moisturise whilst enhancing natural contours.
Enriched with concentrated botanical extracts and essential oils, it works to firm and tone whilst enhancing skin elasticity. Argan Oil seals in moisture and acts as a natural detoxifer, whilst Grapefruit Extract plumps and rejuvenates, helping to fill in the appearance of fine lines. Suitable for all skin types, the advanced anti-ageing face mask leaves skin looking revitalised, smooth and supple.
name: Laszlo Firmarine Hydrogel Mask (Single)

product_description:
使用 Gatineau Melatogenine AOX Probiotics 高级焕活眼部精华，让眼睛更显年轻。
Gatineau 的独家青春焕彩分子采用透明质酸、花果提取物和娇容再造乳液配制而成，使皮肤平顺，减少皱纹，紧致脸部肌肤，消除疲劳印记。 您的双眼将焕发光泽，更显年轻。
使用方法： 每日早晚洁面之后涂抹于眼部轮廓
name: Melatogenine AOX Probiotics 高级焕活眼部精华

product_description:
MenScience 抗老化配方包含医用的，治疗皮肤病级别的，最先进的成分。可显著减少并预防皮肤老化迹象。
本款抗老化配方含下列成分的专门组合：视黄醇、GABA、肽（乙酰六肽-3和棕榈酰寡肽）等。其长效、短效均显著。 超轻型MenScience 抗老化配方可确保具有实质性功效。
抗老化配方可保护细胞免受自由基破坏、改善皮肤整体结构、明显减少由生物和环境老化因素造成的肌肤伤害。从而对皮肤老化提供最全面的护理作用。
这款抗老化配方可显著减少皱纹和细纹、明显提高肌肤弹性。 也可促进胶原蛋白的产生、增加皮肤弹性；其包含的两种生物元素可促进细胞再生、改善肌肤质地及弹性。
使用说明
Lookfantastic 提示：
name: 抗老化配方（28.3克）

product_description:
The Neroli Restoring Facial Oil from Dr Botanicals is brimming with minerals and vitamins, working to regenerate and restore skin. Fast absorbing and non-greasy, the potent serum has been created using only the finest natural extracts, aiming to reveal a refined and healthier-looking complexion.
The main active ingredient of Neroli Oil aims to stimulate collagen production and improve elasticity, minimising the appearance of fine lines and firming skin texture. Nourishing Almond Oil helps brighten and moisturise, whilst antioxidant-rich Vitamin E combats environmental aggressors, one of the main causes of premature ageing.
name: Botanicals Neroli Restoring Facial Oil 30ml

product_description:
利用 Sarah Chapman Skinesis颈部和胸部焕肤复合霜恢复年轻肌肤。 利用海冬青干细胞、抗氧化剂和紧肤Dynamlift™成分配制而成，该乳液可迅速被肌肤吸收，修复明显衰老迹象和紫外线损害，包括色素沉着、胶原蛋白分解、细纹和折痕。
适合所有肌肤类型，该强力护肤液可提高肌肤弹性并紧致颈部和胸部，令肌肤更丰盈、圆润。 针对肤色不均而研制，其茉莉和橙花纯精油的微妙香气令肌肤和感官焕发活力。 获得柔软、光滑和改善的肌肤。 E.N.
name: Chapman Skinesis颈部和胸部焕采复合物 (40ml)

product_description: 专业研制以激发积极心态，来自NEOM有机的 Great Day™情绪改善Treatment 提供强烈、治愈香味，以焕发身心活力。 混合八种第一次压榨精油，包括野薄荷和柑橘，旨在平衡情绪，获得良好感觉。 只需滚涂到脉搏点，可获得在肌肤上持续长达三小时的清新香气。 E.N.
name: Day情绪改善Treatment

product_description:
Reignite a youthful glow with Trilogy's Rosapene™ Radiance Serum; a certified natural formula that works to hydrate, rejuvenate and revitalise your complexion.
Fortified with the brand's innovative Rosapene™ Complex of Rosehip Oil and potent antioxidants, the silky, lightweight serum nourishes skin and protects against free radical damage and environmental aggressors. Its soothing blend of Sea Algae and Aloe helps to moisturise skin whilst restoring luminosity without greasy or sticky residue.
name: Rosapene Radiance Serum 30ml

product_description:
Murad Environmental Shield入门套装是旨在清洁、保护和滋润肌肤和眼睛，令肌肤平衡，焕发青春的四个步骤方案。 针对所有肌肤类型，包括易生痤疮肌肤的完美护理霜。 - K.N.
Murad Essential-C Cleanser：
该抗氧化剂清洁液结合尿囊素和泛醇与维生素C、A和E，以舒缓肌肤环境压力并消除有害自由基。 该配方帮助面部恢复滋润，同时温和去除杂质，让肌肤受到抚慰、净化和保护。
 Murad高级焕采精华液 ： 
通过这款添加Resilient-C™的净化精华液让肌肤重现自然光采；这是一种不同寻常的新维生素C技术，可促进50X胶原蛋白产生，亮白肌肤以及提高普通外用维生素C对肌肤细胞的保护功效。 恢复弹性和光泽，重现因紫外线照射而失去的清新、年轻的肌肤。 基于Murad赞助的研究表明，1周内可获得更美白亮丽，容光焕发的肌肤。
Murad Essential-C Day Moisture SPF 30：
利用这款SPF 30白天保湿霜帮助肌肤抵御日常环境压力和来自有害紫外线的损害。 维生素C亮白和净化肌肤，令肌肤焕发青春，并通过强大的抗氧化剂配方减少衰老迹象。 柑橘香味会令肌肤感觉瞬间清爽、柔嫩。
Essential-C 眼霜：
这款专利抗老化眼霜含活性成分，可保护和滋润娇嫩的眼部区域，同时亮白肌肤，防御紫外线并瞬间遮掩细纹和黑眼圈。 Murad的创新"Skin Repair系统"可有效刺激胶原蛋白合成，令肌肤紧致、年轻。 将获得明亮、减压和增大眼睛的效果。
name: Environmental Shield入门套装

product_description:
呵護眼部肌膚， First Aid Beauty三倍功效眼部精華可瞬效減輕黑眼圈，撫平細紋。創新配方可立刻去除黑眼圈與眼部浮腫，同時還具有一系列抗衰老功效。精華配合不銹鋼滾珠雙重按摩，清爽舒適，同時減少手指和肌膚的粗糙接觸，促進吸收。內含的光影折射粒子可以有效修飾眼周問題，使用後眼周肌膚瞬間鎮定滋潤，光滑亮澤。富含咖啡因、珊瑚萃取物和甘草根複合物，可以有效抗擊肌膚衰老，擊退眼部浮腫和細紋。 
 *不含羥基苯甲酸酯類防腐劑、有害化學物質和著色劑。適合敏感肌膚。

product_description:
Revitalise skin whilst you sleep with the Murad City Skin Overnight Detox Moisturizer; an effective hydrator designed to allow you to wake to radiant skin.
Concentrated with Marrubium Plant extract, the moisturiser delivers potent antioxidants to skin, which are able to detoxify and neutralise pollutants, as well as improving skin’s natural defence system. The formula also boasts next generation Vitamin C, which visibly brightens the complexion and improves skin tone, whilst effective botanicals reduce the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles.
Working whilst skin is most receptive to repair, the moisturiser leaves the complexion youthful and healthy looking.
name: City Skin Overnight Detox Moisturizer

product_description:
REN微光洁肤乳，使肌肤焕发光泽。 这款洁肤乳拥有二合一配方，可深层清洁肌肤，轻柔地去除角质，使肤色更纯净、容光焕发。
REN微光洁肤乳，内含丝琥珀微粒，会产生轻柔的泡沫摩丝，去除死皮细胞 、污垢和杂物，使肌肤光滑、闪耀光泽，增加血液循环。 缩小毛孔和细纹，肌肤会更亮白、更有活力。
本品适合所有皮肤类型。
使用说明：
来自澳洲护肤品牌Sukin的发泡面部Cleanser提供温和、不干燥肌肤清洁功效，去除杂质和日常污垢。 混合洋甘菊、芦荟、金缕梅与绿茶、澳洲坚果和月见草油，该清洁液可有效净化和平衡肌肤，令肌肤洁净、柔软。 适合所有肌肤类型，特别是油性和混合性肌肤。 - K.N.

Unveil smooth, revitalised skin with the Rose Glow Peel Off Pod Mask from FACEINC by nails inc. Harnessing a powerhouse blend of moisture-boosting actives, vitamins and minerals, the rose gold-hued face mask seeks to lift away dead skin cells and impurities without stripping away moisture.
The unique, gel-like formula adheres to skin perfectly with a satisfying peel-away texture, helping stimulate natural elasticity levels and smooth the appearance of wrinkles for an anti-ageing effect. Suitable for use on the hands, face and body, the single use treatment leaves skin feeling sumptuously soft and smooth with a renewed radiance and vitality.
name: by nails inc. Rose Glow Peel Off Pod Mask 10ml

product_description:
保護兒童肌膚，抵禦日曬。該防曬霜SPF 指數更高，可提供額外的防曬保護，不含油脂、過敏性低，適用於大部分敏感肌膚。 
提供每日天然保護，抵禦日曬，能保護肌膚，抵禦太陽中有害射線的侵擾。該戶外必需品有助於防止曬傷。

product_description:
利用 Garnier Pure Active Anti-Blackhead Wash 体验深层清洁效果，这款净化洗面液旨在消除肌肤斑点、油光和缺陷。
加入去角质颗粒及深层渗透水杨酸，该洗面液深入肌肤内部，消除毛孔杂质，防止肌肤缺陷产生。 它的肌肤清洁配方控制肌肤表面的皮脂产生并防止斑点和黑头出现。
肌肤感觉清洁、干净和纯净。 - K.N.

product_description:
因松弛扁平的臀部感到困扰？ freezeframe 巴西提臀霜是一款创新的高效美臀霜，专为重塑臀形而配制，让臀部更加紧实、饱满挺翘。
它含有独特成分，促进臀部脂肪的生成和储存，改变因岁月流逝而变得扁平的臀部。 丰臀效果经临床证明，只需将巴西提臀霜涂于臀部中上部，便可获得更圆润的臀形。 K.D.
请注意：不要涂于臀部内侧、大腿或臀部两侧。

product_description:
大大您眼睛下方的眼袋和浮肿 – 祛眼袋而无需手术！ Skin Doctors突破性配方已被科学证明，可在短短15天减少眼袋和浮肿现象。 
Skin Doctors 祛袋眼霜包含获专利的成分"eyeseryl"，有助于通过减少该区域的水分淤积疏通"眼睛下方"眼袋部位的堵塞。 水分含量和弹性外观均获得显著增加。 
使用说明：
name: Doctors祛袋眼霜（15ml）

product_description:
Transform the look of your décolleté with Talika Bio Enzymes Mask - Neck, a serum-infused, biocellulose sheet mask saturated with a cocktail of beneficial ingredients to help lift and firm the appearance of skin.
Biocellulose is a natural nanofibre that is 100% biocompatible with skin; it has been traditionally used in surgery to aid healing, and in sheet mask form, harnesses a high concentration of active ingredients for optimal delivery and efficacy. Clinging comfortably like a 'second skin', the anti-ageing mask delivers a lifting and smoothing effect to promote a younger-looking neck area. Infused with four revolutionary active ingredients, including Hyaluronic Acid, Adenosine and a 17-plant complex, it plumps skin with moisture, reduces the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles, and energises for a youthfully radiant appearance.
Promoting a smoother, firmer-looking neck, the antioxidant-rich mask will protect against free radical attacks and revitalise for brighter-looking skin. Skin feels toned and smooth.
Sheet masks are an effective delivery system for ingredients, allowing nutrients and nourishment to penetrate deep down for maximum efficacy.
name: Bio Enzymes Mask - Neck 12g

product_description:
Elemis 活力换肤凝胶面膜能有效地促进表皮的更新，可解决皮肤更新随着皮肤变老而减慢的问题。 会使皮肤瞬间变得更光滑，无油光，更明亮。
我们变老时，细胞的更新会慢慢减速，从而使皮肤晦暗无生气，并且提前衰老。 这种革命性的三酶换肤面膜以凝胶为主要成分，含有已获专利的三酶技术、亚马逊针叶樱桃、白松露茯苓、牛蒡、糖芥和氨基酸，可促进有效的表皮更新，并使皮脂量均衡，却不会改变天然 pH 值。
使用说明：
name: 活力换肤凝胶面膜 (50ml)

product_description:
The Perricone MD Oil Free Hydrating Cream is a lightweight, non-greasy moisturiser that works to combat premature signs of ageing such as dryness, dullness, fine lines and uneven texture.
Utilising advanced scientific technologies, the treatment features Dr. Perricone’s patent-pending Nrf2 Antioxidant Support Complex™, a naturally derived formulation that helps activate antioxidant pathways to enhance absorption, thus improving skin’s own natural ability to fight environmental aggressors and free radicals that cause premature ageing. Suitable for all skin types, the cream leaves skin feeling softened and smooth with a youthful-looking radiance.
name: MD Oil Free Hydrating Cream

product_description:
Alpha H 芦荟平衡洁面乳是一款极其温和的洁面乳，可温和地为肌肤补充水分和清洁肌肤，让肌肤享有天鹅绒般的柔软。 它拥有奢华的乳状质地，可足够温和地清除所有化妆品残留。
芦荟具有保湿和焕活肌肤的作用，而维他命 E 能够中和自由基。 芦荟平衡洁面乳适合各种类型的肌肤，尤其适用于干燥、失水、敏感型肌肤和酒糟鼻。
它拥有不油腻的质地，可确保彻底清洁肌肤，能足够温和地卸除眼妆，而不会对肌肤产生任何刺激，令肌肤极致清爽与水润。
使用说明：
