product_description:
Rejuvenate tired eyes with Balance Me's Tinted Wonder Eye Cream; a 99% natural formula that works to combat signs of ageing and fatigue around the delicate eye area, including minimising the appearance of dark circles, reducing puffiness and blurring the look of fine lines.
Infused with antioxidant-rich Arctic Cloudberry, Rosehip Oil and Hyaluronic Acid, the lightweight, fast-absorbing cream helps to firm, plump and hydrate skin, whilst intelligent light-reflecting particles adapt to suit all skin tones. Delivers a hint of natural-looking colour to leave you with brighter, smoother eyes.

product_description:
Elemis 艾丽美三重酵素亮采平滑晚霜可有效刺激肌肤的自然细胞更新循环，活跃地舒缓和强化肌肤，使细胞修复至最佳状态。  让您的肌肤拥有极致的柔软和丰盈。
全球美容奖的获胜者，被誉为最佳再生晚霜。
Elemis 艾丽美正在'申请专利'的革命性三重酵素技术是创新型配方的催化剂，可有效修复表层肌肤。  其配方中蕴含有抗氧化剂丰富的稻壳和圣彼得草，可有效保护肌肤，防止污染，使肌肤恢复应有的清爽。
 
淡化现有的细纹和皱纹，让您的肌肤更加年轻。  让您的肌肤在吸收超级保湿复合物后瞬间感觉更加柔软。

product_description:
不用醫生，使用本品即可無痛實現顯而易見的效果。使用本套裝在家即可達到專業效果，去除肌膚的頂層暗淡肌膚，展現裡面全新有光澤的肌膚。 
本品可減少瑕疵、皺紋、雀斑、斑點、明顯的痘痘和痤瘡疤痕。此專業套裝可清潔肌膚，強效剝落肌膚的衰老表層，使肌膚煥發光彩。 
請注意：使用後可能會感覺有點刺痛，肌膚可能有點脫皮，這是正常的，而且這正是此程序的目標。根據肌膚類型，輕微紅腫可能持續半小時到一天。強烈建議使用後再使用SPF，因為肌膚可能會變得更加敏感。

淡隱細紋和皺紋，修復受損肌膚，提高肌膚自身抵抗力，均勻膚色和膚質，刺激細胞的天然恢復過程，為肌膚提供整夜呵護

product_description:

能溫和清潔，徹底溶解皮膚表面細胞，讓您感覺活力清爽。溫和打泡清潔化妝品、回城和多餘出油，而不會帶走緹娜然油脂，令肌膚乾燥。

product_description:
Treat skin to a superfood boost with the Paula's Choice Resist Anti-Ageing Omega+ Complex Serum; an intelligent, anti-ageing treatment that seeks to reveal youthful, replenished skin for all skin types.
Fortified with robust levels of Omega 3, 6 and 9, alongside an array of Ceramides, the serum smoothes over the complexion and delivers an anti-ageing veil of hydration. The serum also boasts effective fatty acids, which eliminate the appearance of dull and dehydrated skin, whilst reducing the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles, and restoring a supple finish.
Suitable for all skin types, the Omega+ serum delivers essential benefits that all skin requires, yet is ideal for those with ageing and fatigued skin.

质地细腻、为粉红色。令肌肤舒适光滑、柔软水嫩、饱满充盈。 您将拥有超滋润的肌肤、脸部轮廓得到重塑。

伊麗莎白雅頓顯效溫和補水面霜幫助維持肌膚獨特的天然水潤度。這款平衡滋潤面霜可以使您擁有柔軟，平滑的肌膚，遠離日曬傷害。 
伊麗莎白雅頓顯效溫和補水面霜能夠有效的使肌膚補水和緊實。混合了滋養的植物成分，有助於肌膚膠原蛋白合成，使肌膚看起來更緊實和緊緻。創新性的將高效能的成膜劑和保水劑融合（比如尿素，甘油,給肌膚提供長效保濕。成分中含有抵禦廣譜UVA/UVB的防曬成分。

Weleda杏仁清洁液充满大量的有机成分，是清除皮肤毛孔中污垢的完美选择。 素食友好成分的混合不刺激皮肤 - 即使是有点敏感的皮肤。
杏仁和李子油的精致结合，使Weleda杏仁清洁液完美适合镇静敏感和反应性皮肤。 以其天然软化和舒缓特点而著称，甜杏仁和李子油早已是有机美容解决方案的核心成分，甚至可安全地用于最敏感的皮肤。

product_description:
Achieve more youthful looking skin with the Japanese Orange Superfood Facial Oil from Dr Botanicals. Formulated with a Vegan friendly blend of botanical extracts that work to renew and invigorate the skin. Infused with Seabuckthorn Fruit oil, rich in several vitamins and essential fatty acids, the formula boasts the power to thoroughly hydrate the skin and nourish the complexion. Ideal for those with mature skin, dry skin or those concerned about damaged skin.

Powered by the brand's unique Hydra ToX™ technology, the lightweight gel moisturiser blends Moringa Extract and Snow Algae to help rebalance and refine skin, whilst combating dry areas caused by environmental aggressors and climate change. product_description:
Don’t let skin suffer from the ever-changing weather conditions. Combat dryness and eliminate dullness with Hyasoft® from The Hero Project; an oil-free, ultra-lightweight treatment that quenches dehydrated and fatigued skin with an intensive dose of hydration, ideal for use on its own or with your favourite moisturiser.
The non-sticky, clear gel formula instantly absorbs, fortified with a powerful blend of multi-molecular Hyaluronic Acid and Panthenol (Vitamin B5) to seal in moisture at the surface and deep down for a refreshed and plumper looking complexion that radiates an aura of health.
Ideal for tired, sensitive, stressed out and wanting skin, the pick-me-up powerhouse moisturiser leaves your skin feeling springy, nourished and revitalised.
name: Hero Project Hyasoft Instant Moisture Boost 30ml

product_description: Murad 极致补水Moisture 的配方足够温和，适合敏感型皮肤，它不油腻、如天鹅绒般柔滑。 它富含鳄梨、向日葵和橄榄果油，可以提升肌肤保留水分的能力，同时牛油果油可以改善肌理，令肌肤恢复细腻光滑。 Skin 整天都能得到滋润补水，饱满富有光泽、充满活力、舒适丝滑，看起来娇嫩欲滴。
name: Hydro-Dynamic™ Ultimate Moisture For Eyes (15ml)

product_description:
St. Tropez 经典脸部古铜色乳液，为您的肤色增添光芒，不会堵塞毛孔，也没有油渍残留。 其超保湿滋润配方，可滋润保护肌肤，展示阳光肤色，打造自然的妆容。
本款快干轻盈的乳液可轻柔地涂至脸上。为您打造完美均匀的美黑肤色。采用的创新Aromaguard™Fragrance技术，可去除人工美黑产品难闻的味道。 可每日涂用，缔造您想要的肤色，也可用作底妆乳液，打造光滑底妆。 E.N. 
通过了临床和皮肤科医生试验。
.
name: Tropez 经典古铜色面部乳液（50ml）

product_description:
Treat your skin to the nourishing and firming properties of Elemis Breast Cancer Care Pro-Collagen Marine Cream, an award-winning anti-wrinkle day cream clinically proven* to promote a smoother, younger-looking complexion.
Rich yet lightweight, the cream melts effortlessly into skin, comforting, smoothing and hydrating. Infused with a host of anti-ageing ingredients, including Mediterranean Algae, Padina Pavonica and Ginkgo Biloba, it has been developed to reduce wrinkle depth and improve firmness, tone and hydration in 14 days. Inspiring a radiant, renewed complexion, it also contains Mimosa which delivers anti-inflammatory and astringent properties, and naturally fragrant Rose to calm and nurture. The ultimate anti-ageing cream, it will leave skin looking quenched, firm and youthful.
Housed in a limited edition pink jar with embossed lid; designed exclusively to support Breast Cancer Care.
name: Breast Cancer Care Pro-Collagen Marine Cream 100ml

product_description: 使用 Garnier Pure Micellar Cleansing Water 清洁肌肤并使其保持清新，适用于混合性至油性和敏感性肌肤。 通过温和的皮肤过敏测试，卸妆水可洗去日常污垢和彩妆；同时只需一个简单的步骤即可舒缓肤色；令肌肤洁净清爽。 这款净化洁肤水不含香料，具备低过敏性，非常温和，可用于眼部和唇部周围肌肤。 无需冲洗。 - K.N.
name: Pure Micellar Cleansing Water (400ml)

product_description:
Perk up and protect lifeless skin with the Elizabeth Arden Eight Hour Miracle Mist Set; a selection of cult-favourite skincare treats to intensively hydrate and nourish. Utilising the brand’s renowned Eight Hour® formulations for long term benefits, the moisturiser, facial oil and mist work in tandem to impart a fresh and replenished complexion.
Eight Hour® Miracle Hydrating Mist (100ml)
Instantly refresh and revitalise with the Miracle Hydrating Mist; an ultra-refined facial spray powered by Elizabeth Arden’s exclusive superfruit blend, brimming with antioxidants and vitamins. Acai, Goji and Pomegranate to name just a few, alongside Apple Leaf extracts, combat free radical damage and help alleviate discomfort, leaving your complexion feeling soothed and supple. Perfect for on-the-go hydration.   
Eight Hour® All-Over Miracle Oil for Face, Body & Hair (30ml)
A multi-tasking oil for the face, body and hair. Enriched with hydrating Tsubaki Oil, the versatile oil delivers long-lasting moisture, melting effortlessly into skin and hair to soften, nourish and brighten. It intensely conditions hair, smoothing frizz and flyaways to promote sleek, healthy-looking locks. On skin, it deeply hydrates and is the perfect massage oil. Hair is left shiny and sleek; skin is radiant and supple.
Eight Hour® Cream Original Skin Protectant (15ml)
A smoothing and restorative formula that works to relieve and comfort dry, cracked skin with its blend of Vitamin E, Petrolatum and Salicylic Acid. Award-winning, its softening and hydrating properties help to calm and restore wanting skin, relieving signs of redness and minor skin irritations. Perfect for dry skin, sunburn and chapped lips, it's a multi-purpose balm that keep skins soft and protected.
name: Arden Eight Hour Miracle Mist Set (Worth £37)

product_description:
使用女士专用的 Works with Water 'Help: Clear Skin Soluble Supplement'，重获对肌肤的信心。该产品是英国首款 100% 纯天然的护肤营养品，可消除瑕疵，改善肤色。
这种可溶性配方适合所有肌肤类型，包括敏感型，以及受痤疮、皮肤色素沉着和酒渣鼻困扰的肌肤；含有经科学证明的成分，有助于减少皮肤瑕疵的出现和复发。
作用原理是什么？
该营养品含有 PravENAC™，这是一种富含高蛋白乳铁蛋白的专用营养成分。 乳铁蛋白是一种从乳蛋白中提取的经临床证明的生物活性物质，可减缓在皮肤上生成杂质的细菌繁殖。 其凭借强大的抗微生物作用，有助于减少瑕疵和疤痕的大小，同时加快当前粉刺的愈合时间。 该产品还含有芦荟，可舒缓和滋养发炎的肌肤。 可呈现更柔滑、更健康、更均匀的肌肤。
服用方法
这种可溶性营养品很容易融入日常的生活方式中，只需添加到您最喜爱的饮料或易消化的食物（无论冷热）中，这也是控制皮肤上粉刺的一种自然方式。
短短几个星期之后，皮肤看起来就会更健康，且发红、瑕疵和刺激感会减轻。 - K.N
name: with Water Women's Help: Clear Skin Soluble Supplement (28 x 3.5g)

product_description:
Enjoy the Dermalogica Cleanse & Tone Duo for Oily Skin and remove the day’s impurities to reveal fresh clean skin. This duo contains the Dermalogica Dermal Clay Cleanser and Dermalogica Multi Active Toner to cleanse and refresh your skin.
Treat your skin to a double dose of cleansing purity with the Dermalogica Cleanse & Tone Duo for Oily Skin. Banish oily and congested skin with the ivy and lemon infused Clay Cleanser and finish with spritz of aloe vera mist, designed to moisturise and repair the skin leaving you looking and feeling refreshed.
This pack contains the following products:
name: Cleanse & Tone Duo - Oily Skin (2 Products)

product_description: This Micellar Cleansing Water from Nuxe boasts an innovative formula that's designed to efficiently cleanse the skin of impurities. With a super fresh, non sticky 'water' texture, this cleanser also soothes and softens the skin, leaving you looking just as good as you feel. Completely alcohol free, this is suitable for all skin types, including sensitive skin. K.D.
name: Micellar Cleansing Water (400ml)

product_description:
Restore bright, healthy-looking skin with the yes to Grapefruit Pore Perfection Night Treatment; a radiance-reviving formula to help smoothen and refine overnight.
Synergising vitamin-rich Grapefruit, Tea Tree Oil and Lilac Extract, the lightweight, fast-absorbing treatment works to minimise the appearance of pores and dark spots, whilst combating uneven skin tone and texture. Expect a luminous, glowing complexion come morning.
name: to Grapefruit Pore Perfection Night Treatment

product_description:
您的眼睛如同您的感觉一样累吗？ 使用 KORRES Wild Rose Eye Cream SPF15，即可让您卸下这些恼人的包袱。 娇嫩眼部周围的肌肤取得更亮泽、更紧致的效果将需要几年的时间，赋予您极致自然的青春活力。
使用 KORRES Wild Rose Eye Cream SPF15 消除黑眼圈。这款草本眼霜具有防晒功能，使用了荷荷巴油、花竹柏萃取液和天然甜菜碱等有机成分，并含有维生素 C、E 和 B5，滋养脆弱的眼睛。 这款革命性的 KORRES 眼霜通过了皮肤过敏测试和眼用药品试验，确保可顺滑和重塑肌肤。
使用说明：
name: Wild Rose Eye Cream SPF15 (15ml)

product_description:
Elizabeth Arden旗下的PREVAGE® Anti-ageing Treatment Boosting Cleanser（抗衰老护理增强洁面液）富含水分，具有多种功效，可以迅速溶解杂质，改善皮肤外观，从而在各种不良环境下保护您的皮肤。
 
该日常使用的洁面液中含有竹纤维细微颗粒以及酶化去角质成分，从而可以改善皮肤外观，为达到护理的最佳效果奠定了基础，并且使皮肤看起来更加清洁、舒适、健康。 该产品能让敏感性皮肤感觉更为柔润，通过使用精心调制的专业配方，可以让PREVAGE® Anti-ageing serums（抗衰老精华液）发挥其最大效用，让您看上去更为年轻靓丽。  - E.D

product_description:
Shiseido Sun Protection Eye Cream是一款绝佳的眼部防晒产品，既能抵御阳光和自由基的侵害，还能卓效减少细纹和皱纹。
防水质地，具有SPF 25防晒能力和抗氧化功效，每时每刻令眼周肌肤保持健康、免于晒伤。 - K.R

product_description:
用Elizabeth Arden Visible Difference Skin Balancing去角质Cleanser 执行多项任务，拥有健康、平衡的肌肤。 这款洁面乳清洁、去角质二合一，可以温和地去除污垢，令肌肤镇静和洁净。
用Elizabeth Arden Visible Difference Skin Balancing去角质Cleanser Refresh肌肤，恢复肌肤的活力。 使用本品清洁肌肤时，温和、圆圆的微珠可以去除令肌肤显得暗沉的死皮细胞。 抗氧化剂和维生素 E 可以保护肌肤免受自由基的伤害，并舒适地护理肌肤，具有软化作用的甘油可以确保肌肤水润、焕然一新。

name: Arden Visible Difference Skin Balancing去角质Cleanser (150ml)

product_description:
Achieve a natural-looking, sun-kissed glow with the Fabulous Self Tanning Tinted Mousse from Vita Liberata. Ideal for normal, combination and oily skin types, its lightweight formula blends effortlessly for a streak-free finish, whilst delivering instant, fast-drying colour so you can dress immediately.
Containing Odour Remove™ technology to eliminate the unpleasant fake tan smell, the mousse is infused with certified organic botanicals and Moisture Lock™ for a tan that fades slowly and evenly. A dose of East African Marula Oil provides anti-ageing benefits and long-lasting hydration so you can experience a salon-style tan every time.
name: Liberata Fabulous Self Tanning Tinted Mousse Medium 100ml

product_description:
Tackle problematic, breakout-prone skin on-the-spot with the ESPADA™ Acne-Clearing Pen from Swedish beauty brand FOREO; a pioneering, simple and completely safe 'at-home' treatment that combines their renowned T-Sonic™ pulsations with powerful blue light technology to deliver unparalleled results.
The intelligent device utilises 415NM of blue light LEDs that penetrate deep below the surface layer of skin, clinically proven to kill acne-causing bacteria at the source without causing pain or discomfort, with targeted light application ensuring surgical-like precision to treat even the smallest blemish right from when it emerges for instant action.
The gentle T-Sonic™ pulsations activate upon contact with skin, working to diffuse the light into pores to enhance efficiency while stimulating micro-circulation to promote skin renewal and repair. With continued use, the overall complexion appears healthier looking and more refined with a noticeable decrease in breakouts.  
Ergonomically designed with the head coated in ultra-hygienic, 100% waterproof silicone, ESPADA™ prevents the spread of acne-causing bacteria and feels smooth to touch for optimum comfort even on sensitive skin, with one charge providing up to 60 2-minute treatments. With no need to replace cartridges, it provides a long-term investment for visibly clearer skin.
name: ESPADA Acne-Clearing Pen - Pink

product_description: 这款Alpha-H Clear Skin日常Face啫喱旨在清洁和净化肌肤，减少多余油脂和毛孔堵塞，并帮助您消除和预防粉刺而不会脱皮。 这款凝胶清洁剂的配方采用了抗菌解决方案，可以令肌肤焕发活力、变得纯净。 用后您的肌肤会变得洁净、光滑、焕然一新。
name: Clear Skin 日常Face 啫喱 (200ml)

product_description:
Fake Bake，这款Face Tanning仿晒黑乳液专为面部设计，含抗衰老缩氨酸和植物成分，它不会阻塞毛孔并令肌肤容光焕发，亮丽迷人！
来自Fake Bake的Face是市场上为数不多的拥有缩氨酸的仿晒液，可帮助对抗皱纹、预防细纹，增加胶原蛋白和弹性蛋白的产生，同时提供古铜色的肌肤。
 Face包含五环多肽-3000，这种来自法国最热门的新成分，可减少皱纹，而无视黄醇的副作用或刺激。 Fake Bake还含有植物成分，以确保肌肤如天鹅绒般柔滑。
使用说明：
name: Bake The Face Tanning (59ml)

product_description: 小蜜蜂敏感肌肤面部清洁湿纸巾（30 抽）超柔软的温和型湿纸巾，轻松卸妆，令肌肤丝般柔滑。由天然成份制成，清香四溢、轻柔洁面、水润活肤，确保肌肤重现健康光洁。

product_description:
Gently refresh your complexion with yes to Cotton Comforting Facial Wipes; a pack of pre-moistened, recycled cotton towelettes with a subtle, pleasant fragrance.
Infused with Cottonseed Oil, the soothing face wipes expertly sweep away dirt, oil and make-up, whilst calming and hydrating skin for long-lasting comfort. Ideal for sensitive, allergy-prone skin, you can cleanse on-the-go without stripping moisture or causing irritation.
name: to Cotton Comforting Facial Wipes (25 Pack)

product_description: Calm and cleanse your skin with this Anthony Algae Facial  Cleanser Travel Mini. Perfect for freshening up on-the-go or after a gym  workout, it refreshes, moisturises and soothes sensitive skin.  Containing a blend of aloe, azulene, lavender and rose, it also helps  prevent skin irritation caused by shaving.
name: Algae Facial Cleanser Travel Mini (56g)

product_description:
Refresh and refine your skin with Mizon Witchhazel 90% Toner, a purifying toner infused with 90% Witch Hazel extract to minimise the appearance of pores and balance skin pH after cleansing.
Promoting a balanced and healthy complexion, the solution combines Witch Hazel, Green Tea and Western Ivy to control excessive sebum, and Papaya Fruit to cleanse away dead skin and residues to leave skin clean and clarified. Naturally moisturising and balancing, the toner utilises Vitamins and Peptides to energise skin, and extract of Pine Tree to calm and relieve. Witness improved elasticity, texture and oil control.
name: Witchhazel 90% Toner 210ml

product_description:
Elemis－艾麗美清爽保濕乳液50ml 
獨特混合有玻里尼西亞綠瓊崖海棠油和仙人掌花，能夠舒緩剃須後肌膚，提升整體的皮膚狀態。 
同時柑橘油能夠舒緩和抵制自由基。 
植物成分栗子和竹能夠補充肌膚精華養分。有助於肌膚回复彈性，水嫩和潤滑。

product_description:
Build a natural, sun-kissed glow with the St. Tropez Gradual Tan Luminous Veil; an everyday, illuminating face cream.
Effortlessly to apply, the formula glides over skin, drying quickly and enveloping the face in a mood-boosting fragrance; not the usual tell-tale tan scent. The lightweight cream is infused with Camellia Flower extract, which protects skin’s natural defences, whilst Avocado Oil delivers a veil of essential and long-lasting moisture.
Ideal for use as a primer, the face cream boasts light reflecting pearls, which instantly even and brighten the complexion, whilst delivering an enviable golden glow.
name: Tropez Gradual Tan Luminous Veil 50ml

product_description:
Clarify and refresh your complexion with the Omorovicza Moor Cream Cleanser; a gentle, detoxifying formula that works to eliminate impurities without over-drying or uncomfortable tightness.
Harnessing the purifying powers of mineral-rich Hungarian Moor Mud (derived from the largest thermal lake in Europe, Lake Hévíz), the luxurious cleanser delivers a deep pore cleansing action; effectively dissolving dirt and make-up to reveal a smoother, more refined appearance.
A cooling blend of Camphor, Peppermint and Eucalyptus Essential Oils leave skin feeling soothed and revitalised, whilst the brand's patented Hydro Mineral Transference™ delivery system creates a firmer, younger-looking appearance with increased suppleness.
name: Moor Cream Cleanser 150ml

product_description:
Discover a hydrating skincare regime the Aragospa Aqua Skin Care Six Piece Set from Skin79. Meeting the needs of dry skin, the set contains a luxurious selection of moisture rich products seeking to alleviate parched skin. With an array of full and travel size products, the set ensures skin is nourished even whilst on-the-go.
Toner (180ml and 20ml)
Rejuvenate your complexion with the Aqua Toner; a lightweight, non-drying formula that works to soothe, refresh and replenish skin. Harnessing the powers of Aragonite Thermal Water (sourced from Jeju), the luxurious toner infuses skin with long-lasting moisture and hydration, whilst revitalising and rebalancing without uncomfortable tightness. Expect a smooth, radiant complexion that is prepared for the next step in your skincare regime.
Lotion (125ml and 20ml)
Experience unrivalled moisture with the Aqua Lotion; an intensely moisturising formula that delivers long-lasting hydration. Infused with mineral-rich Jeju Aragonite Thermal Water and Phyto Hyaluronic Acid, the water-binding solution creates a protective moisture barrier on skin, boosting and maintaining hydration levels to keep the complexion saturated and quenched. It utilises a Multi-Layered Water Holding System™ that preserves skin’s moisture, whilst improving elasticity for a healthier, supple-looking complexion.
Gel Cream (90ml)
Quench thirsty skin with the Aqua Gel; a revitalising, creamy formula that imbues skin with instant freshness and hydration with Aragonite Thermal Water sourced from Jeju. Ideal for dry and combination skin types, a Multi-Layered Water Holding System™ ensures long-lasting water retention, while natural extracts of Vitamin-C rich Neem Tree help support collagen synthesis to smooth the look of fine lines and imperfections. Delivering anti-bacterial and anti-inflammatory benefits, skin feels rejuvenated and replenished.
Deep Cream (Travel Size)
Ideal for combination, dry and mature skin, the Aqua Deep Cream works to soothe, refresh and replenish thirsty complexions. Harnessing the powers of Aragonite Thermal Water (sourced from Jeju), the lightweight, fast-absorbing cream delivers long-lasting moisture and hydration, whilst providing anti-ageing benefits to help minimise the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles. Expect a smoother, more refined complexion with a youthful glow.
name: Aragospa Aqua Skin Care Six Piece Set

product_description:
通过使用 Aurelia Probiotic 细胞复活日霜体验下一代护肤品，其轻质的混合物配方可让肌肤恢复原有的润泽，祛除暗沉和水肿。
这款智能精华液可使肌肤焕发亮泽剔透的光彩，它将益生素和缩氨酸技术与高度浓缩的生物有机营养成分纯植物萃取物相结合，可舒缓、滋润和焕活肌肤。 其含有丰富脂肪酸的琉璃苣油具有锁水功能；非洲炮弹树果和芙蓉花植物萃取物可紧致舒缓肌肤，有助于缓解氧化压力；猴面包树中富含的脂肪酸 3、6 和 9 具备专业焕活作用。
散发着茉莉花、缅栀花、夜来香和桔油的混合芳香，这款抗氧化配方的滋润面霜可让肌肤更加柔软水润，更有光泽。 因含有强效多肽，使其成为完美底妆，为肌肤补充水分，让肌肤更光滑，完美无瑕。
name: Probiotic 细胞复活日霜 60 毫升

product_description:
Shield and nourish skin in one simple step with the Water Wrapping Non-Chemical Sun Block SPF50+ PA+++ from Korean-based brand Skin79.
Providing broad spectrum protection with an advanced UV shield, the Non-Chemical Sun Screen Formula™ combats harmful sun damage while infusing skin with moisture. The lightweight formula quickly melts into skin without feeling sticky or greasy, helping to seal in hydration with water-wrapping technology for long lasting results.
name: Water Wrapping Non-Chemical Sun Block 50ml

product_description:
质地轻盈不油腻，富含维生素E和纯精油，能补水保湿，令肌肤柔软水嫩，焕发健康的年轻光彩。 适合所有肌肤类型。
轻盈不油腻，富含维生素E和纯精油。  能补水保湿，令肌肤柔软水嫩，焕发健康的年轻光彩。 添加了从小麦胚芽中提取的天然衍生维他命E，  同时蕴含荷荷巴油和杏仁精华，可平衡油脂，令肌肤柔嫩光滑。 适合所有肌肤类型，非常适合在化妆前使用。

Thoroughly cleanse without stripping the skin of essential moisture with the Phyto-Hyaluron Foam Cleanser from Korean skincare brand, Skin79.
Transforming into a luxurious foam upon contact with water, the cleanser effectively removes skin waste including oil, makeup and impurities. Alongside cleaning the complexion, the Phyto-Hyaluron formula delivers hydration to balance the moisture levels of the face, leaving skin comfortable.

product_description:
Cool the complexion with a Cactus Jeju Sandorong Jelly Mask from Korean skincare brand, Skin79. Delivering a hydrating jelly essence, the face mask is designed to provide a cooling and soothing sensation to the skin, helping to revitalise the complexion.
Enrched with Cupra Cellulose, the Jelly Mask moisturises the face, as well as creating a barrier to protect the skin against damaging free radicals. Meeting the needs of dry skin craving refreshment, the mask treatment will leave the face visibly plump, youthful and healthy looking.
name: Jeju Sandorong Jelly Mask 33ml - Cactus

product_description:
Improve the appearance of skin with Pore Kok Fresh Essence from Korean skincare brand, Skin79, a pore refining formula that helps to clear and refresh the complexion.
Working to control oil and sebum, the purifying essence utilises a Sebum Control Formula™ and Indian Herb to balance skin and minimise the appearance of pores. Regulating oils on skin that can cause blemishes, the solution will leave skin feeling clean, fresh and controlled.

product_description:
使用 Skin Doctors Skinactive 14 Intensive Day Cream，修复肌肤并重新补充水分。 设计用于保护肌肤细胞的寿命并促进胶原蛋白的自然再生，肌肤会更光滑、更具活力。
Skin Doctors Skinactive 14 Intensive Day Cream 适合所有肌肤类型，为想"强化"抗衰老进程的人士提供优越的补水功效，减少皱纹、肤色不均和毛孔扩张，并防止进一步发展。 这款丰盈保湿霜具备 SPF15，可强化脆弱的肌肤并提升光泽，使其恢复青春活力。

name: Doctors Skinactive 14 Intensive Day Cream (50ml)

product_description:
MONU Eye Essentials Gift Pack is a four-piece collection of the brand's favourite products that promise to leave you with a flawless complexion and younger-looking eye contour area. Synergising advanced technology with effective ingredients, you can experience smoother, hydrated skin with reduced signs of ageing.
MONU Illuminating Primer
Innovative soft focus and light reflective technology smoothen skin and reduce the appearance of imperfections to leave you with a flawless base for make-up application. Fortified with Mica to add a radiant glow, Zinc Oxide to protect from UV damage and Cassia Leaf Extract, which works to minimise premature ageing so you can experience a younger-looking complexion with restored luminosity.
MONU Collagen Eye Cream
Energise tired eyes with the eye cream, a soft and soothing formula to lift, plump and smoothen the delicate eye area. Enriched with Evening Primrose Oil, rich in essential fatty acids to nourish the sensitive skin around the eye, whilst Vitamin A boosts elasticity to reduce the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles. The weightless cream contains moisturising Shea Butter and forms a film on the skin to increase absorption of nutrients, whilst strengthening the skin's barrier. Antioxidants Wheat Germ Oil and Vitamin C work effectively to provide protection from exposure to UV rays and harmful environmental aggressors so you can experience brighter, youthful-looking eyes.
MONU Collagen Eye Patches
Transform dry, dehydrated skin with the relaxing eye patches. Gentle to the delicate eye area, they work to deliver hydration and plump the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles to reveal firmer, revitalised peepers. Infused with 99% concentrated Collagen to strengthen skin and boost elasticity, leaving skin soft, smooth and supple.
MONU Collagen Ampoules
With a unique molecular structure, the ampoules penetrate deeper into the epidermis to revive radiance and revitalise the eye area. Fortified with Marine Collagen to increase hydration and smoothen the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles, the ampoules can be used as boosters for the skin three times per year, or prior to special events for a naturally glowing complexion.
name: Eye Essentials Gift Pack

product_description:
这款 Bliss 必列斯排毒爽肤水超级清爽滋润，不仅能够提供肌肤所需的营养成分，还能排除毒素，净化肌肤，保护肌肤免受日常加快衰老因素的影响。
这款 Bliss 必列斯排毒爽肤水中所含的营养成分可排出毒素，减轻肌肤压力，增强肌肤对外界环境因素的抵抗能力，更好地吸收水分。 这款神奇的爽肤水不仅能补充水分，最大化缩小毛孔，它还适用于所有类型的肌肤，所含的玫瑰水可有效舒缓肌肤——非常适合男士剃须后使用。 每天只需关注一个小细节，就能给您的肌肤带来巨大的改善。
使用说明：
name: 必列斯排毒爽肤水（200 毫升）

product_description:
CODAGE推出的这款夏日保护活肤精华液由法国制药专家团队精心配制而成。 这款护理产品专为滋养、舒缓肌肤，增强肌肤天然防御力而打造，令肌肤极致柔软，肤色均匀。 这款精华液特别添加了活力美黑因子，可以激活黑色素生成，减少黑斑，令肌肤散发阳光的健康光泽。 适合所有肌肤类型。 - K.N.
这款CODAGE产品包含：
Hy3 - 具有补水锁水的滋润功效。 这种成分还能够促进胶原蛋白，丰盈并紧实肌肤，令肌肤更年轻。
MA1 - 这一成分能有效对抗斑点，预防细菌堆积，促进皮质平衡，还能缩小毛孔，均匀肤色。
Ap3 - 这一成分具有舒缓和保湿功效，防止肌肤受刺激，加强肌肤对炎症反应的耐受程度。
Ao3 - 这一富含抗氧化因子的成分具有修复和保护功效功效，可以保护肌肤抵御自由基和紫外线的伤害，并修复肌肤已有的损伤。
Po3 - 这一具有保护功效的成分能有效抵御污染物。 它可以增强肌肤的自然净化，同时保护抗氧化剂并防止细胞死亡。 促进角质细胞的生长，为肌肤增添保护屏障。
Et - 这一成分具有预防和修复功效，当肌肤暴露在高温环境和紫外线下时，能够保持肌肤水分不流失。
Br - 刺激黑色素生成，令肌肤散发阳光的均匀肤色。

Regenerate and repair skin whilst you sleep with Talika's Photo Hydra Night; a soothing, revitalising formula that absorbs quickly into skin to deliver intense moisture and hydration around the clock.
Infused with a host of beneficial ingredients, including Hyaluronic Acid, vitamin-rich Mango Butter and Hydra-Night Photo Beauty®, the lightweight, non-greasy night cream plumps and smoothens skin, whilst providing anti-ageing benefits to help minimise the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles. Neutralises free radical damage and environmental aggressors to leave your complexion soft, youthful and rejuvenated come morning.
name: Photo Hydra Night 50ml

product_description:
Purify the complexion with the MAGICSTRIPES Deep Detox Tightening Mask; a cleansing face mask with the ability to visibly shape skin, resulting in an overall tightened appearance.
Utilising advanced clay mask technology, the treatment provides skin with effective cleansing action, drawing out impurities and visibly improving the appearance of pores and blackheads.  The mask also boats anti-ageing qualities and is able to reduce the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles to leave the visage youthful and fresh-faced. Expect a radiant glow due to skin that is thoroughly moisturised and refreshed.
name: Deep Detox Tightening Mask (1 Mask)

product_description:
Anthony Logistics for Men薄荷白茶男士唇膏保持双唇柔润光滑。 SPF 25防晒配方，保护双唇娇嫩的肌肤，防止阳光中有害紫外线的损伤，这款润唇膏特别添加了能够滋养双唇的白藜芦醇，另外甜叶菊成分也可以让口气清新。 采用独特配方，令双唇散发自然的哑光光泽。 - L.M.
使用说明：根据需要，尽可能频繁地涂抹于唇部。
name: 薄荷白茶男士唇膏 SPF 25

product_description:
CODAGE 2号控油修复精华液（30ml）专为容易出现瑕疵的油性肌肤而配制，调节油脂分泌，去除表皮油光，展现完美无瑕的肤色。 这款产品由品牌的法国制药专家团队配制而成，混合了多种高效成分，具有抗菌功效，舒缓并修复受损肌肤。 - K.R
Ma3 - 这一带有祛斑功效的成分能够调节油脂分泌，缩小毛孔，防止细菌积累和毛孔堵塞，并去除油光。
Ac3 - 这一成分具有消炎、抗菌、调节皮肤细胞的三重功效，可谓是皮肤瑕疵的救星。 调节油脂分泌，防止毛孔堵塞，令肌肤更加清爽光滑。
Re3 - 这一强大的成分混合了多种修复因子，可以让受损的肌肤细胞重新恢复健康状态，并促进肌肤细胞的自然更新。
Dx3 - 这一成分能够促进排毒，去除有害毒素，同时为肌肤增添一层保护屏障，防止其他有害物质进入。 修复受损的蛋白质，为肌肤细胞注入能量，令面色润泽。
name: 2号控油修复精华液（30ml）

product_description:
利用 Australian Bodycare的主动Face润肤霜让肌肤焕发活力。 一款适合中性至干性肌肤的滋养面部保湿霜，含有茶树油以自然滋养和呵护您的肌肤。 主要成分包括芦荟以舒缓刺激迹象和以保湿功效著称的荷荷巴油，以便令肌肤焕发新生。 肌肤更加柔软水嫩，令人舒适。
使用指南： 取少量涂于洁净皮肤并按摩以便吸收。
name: Bodycare主动Face润肤霜（50ml）

product_description:
Rescue stressed out, dry skin with the MÁDARA SOS Hydra Repair Intensive Serum, a concentrated dosage of organic extracts and antioxidants that works to intensively hydrate and replenish skin.
Enriched with a potent natural blend of Northern Peony, Linseed and Hyaluronic Acid, the formula seeks to restore a youthful, healthier-looking radiance, protecting skin from external aggressors and free radicals that cause premature ageing. Absorbed quickly and suitable for all skin types, the age defying serum helps minimise the appearance of fine lines and your complexion is left feeling refreshed, revitalised and calm.
name: SOS Hydra Repair Intensive Serum 30ml

product_description:
Treat tired, lack-lustre skin to the benefits of MÁDARA's Superseed Radiant Energy Organic Facial Oil; 100% natural, certified organic formula that utilises nine nourishing oils, including Pumpkin, Borage and Blackberry to restore a healthy glow.
Infused with a radiance-reviving cocktail of Pumpkin, Black Cumin and Jojoba Oils, the fast-absorbing treatment revitalises and regenerates skin, whilst antioxidant-rich Blueberry, Cloudberry and Cranberry Seed defend against environmental aggressors. The versatile face oil can be used alone or blended with moisturiser to leave your complexion hydrated and rejuvenated. Complete with a pipette for mess-free application.
name: Superseed Radiant Energy Organic Facial Oil 30ml

product_description:
Chantecaille 香缇卡五月玫瑰护脸油，可洁净修复肌肤。 配方轻盈，只需数滴即可使肌肤得到营养和水分，焕发出纯粹的健康光芒。
因其独特的阵列而出名，内含100％的纯天然及强大的植物萃取物等成分，用以减少肌肤细纹、使肌肤更明亮、肤色更年轻。 来自世界各地的超滋养植物油，让肌肤明显柔软细嫩、晶莹剔透。
不含动物性成分、邻苯二甲酸盐、硫酸盐洗涤剂、矿物油、矿脂、棕榈油、合成色、合成香料、转基因生物等成分。 未作动物试验。 不含苯甲酸酯类。
name: 香缇卡 五月玫瑰护脸油 30ml

product_description:
Infused with botanical extracts RMK Cream Soap M won’t strip your skin of its own natural moistures and its subtly elegant lavender fragrance leaves skin supple and hydrated and clear.
Cleanse and plump your skin with RMK Cream Soap M, its foaming formula leaves skin velvety fresh to the touch improves its vitality and resilience. Infused with botanical extracts it won’t strip your skin of its own natural moistures and subtly fragrances it.
name: Foamed Soap M (160g)

product_description:
Discover a multi-function facial cream with the Mizon Gold Starfish All-in-One Cream; an anti-ageing treatment that tackles and transforms a dull complexion.
Combining extract of Starfish with Elm Leaf and pure 24-Carat Gold, the luxurious formula is able to restore lost elasticity to leave the complexion visibly firm and skin looking supple. Activating Collagen production, the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles are reduced to reveal ultra-smooth skin. The All-in-One cream also delivers a unique skin whitening effect. A dose of Niacinamide is able to control melanin formation, which ensures skin is visibly brighter and clear.
Complete with an array of skin-loving Plant extracts, the rich cream reduces the appearance of enlarged pores, visibly improves skin tone and leaves the complexion feeling soothed.
name: Gold Starfish All-in-One Cream 50ml

product_description:
AromaWorks' Delicate Face Serum Oil is a gentle formula infused with essential oils and BioActive ingredients to calm and smoothen the appearance of skin.
Targeting signs of ageing and loss of elasticity, the serum oil delivers a host of Vitamins and Antioxidants to help comfort and tone the skin whilst reducing visible signs of ageing. Infused with an aromatic fragrance powered by Orange, Jasmine and Neroli.
name: Delicate Face Serum Oil 30ml

product_description:
Treat skin to luxurious nutrition with Mizon The Pure Argan Essential Wrapping Oil; a hydrating Korean facial serum that transforms a lacklustre complexion. The lightweight formula glides onto skin and effortlessly melts into the surface to leave it glowing.
Boasting 99% natural Plant Oil, the silky solution is highly concentrated with organic Argan Oil, which delivers a veil of luminous hydration to skin. Expect an ultra-smooth complexion that is pampered with long-lasting moisture.
name: The Pure Argan Essential Wrapping Oil 30ml

product_description: Rejuvenate skin with the Advanced Caviar Facial Serum from skinChemists. Expertly formulated with the lavish active ingredient of Caviar Extract, the serum features a nutritious Marine Complex that works to protect skin from harmful UVA and UVB rays whilst antioxidant-rich Seaweed Extract seals in moisture for long-lasting hydration. Finished with Aloe Vera, the treatment soothes inflammation and leaves skin looking healthier and regenerated.
name: Advanced Caviar Facial Serum 30ml

product_description:
Wake to a rejuvenated complexion with the Mizon Good Night Wrinkle Care Sleeping Mask; an effective, anti-ageing night mask that transforms dull and mature skin.
Fortified with 50% Snail Filtrate, the creamy face mask boosts cell’s ability to regenerate, which visibly plumps the complexion and reduces the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles. Working determinedly while you sleep, the Good Night mask boasts a nourishing blend of Fruit Oils to condition and pamper skin.
Expect to wake to a refreshed complexion with ultra-smooth and brightened skin.
name: Good Night Wrinkle Care Sleeping Mask 75ml

product_description:
Experience a superior cleanse with the Mizon Real Soybean Deep Cleansing Oil; an effective solution from Korea that is able to remove makeup, dirt and excess oil from skin.
Infused with a skin-loving blend of Olive, Jojoba and Camellia oils, the cleanser penetrates deep into skin and sweeps away any build-up of dirt, including even the most stubborn types of makeup. Leaving pores clean and clear, the cleanser prevents the appearance of blackheads.  Not only offering cleansing action, the silky oil is rich in vitamins, which provide intense nourishment and anti-ageing properties.
Cleansing without stripping skin of essential moisture, the formula leaves the complexion clean and comfortably hydrated.

product_description:
Revitalise tired, lack-lustre skin with the Mizon Vita Lemon Sparkling Pack; an energising, cleansing treatment that works to purify and invigorate your complexion.
Infused with invigorating Lemon Peel Oil and Carbonated Water, the mineral-rich, creamy formula effortlessly eliminates dead, dull skin cells and dissolves pore-clogging impurities without over-drying or uncomfortable tightness. Skin is smoother and more refined with a luminous glow.

product_description:
Refine your complexion with Mizon Pore Control Peeling Toner, a refreshing solution that works to restore moisture, control oil and balance skin's pH.
Helping to sweep away any last traces of makeup, the toner gently cleanses the skin whilst sloughing away dead skin cells with its dose of Hydroxy Acids. Calming and relieving, it combines Chamomile with antioxidant Green Tea to soothe and protect, and expertly minimises pores and oil production for a more balanced complexion. It also contains Collagen and Cacao extract to promote firmer, matt-looking skin. Skin is left feeling clean, refined and balanced.

product_description:
Cleanse away spot-causing bacteria with Mizon Acence Anti-Blemish Foam Cleanser, a foaming face cleanser that gently removes impurities and excess sebum to help prevent future flare ups.
Formulated to treat blemish-prone skin, the cleanser works into a luxurious foam and is fortified with small granules to perform gentle exfoliation; it functions as a scrub to delicately lift away dead skin cells, dirt and oily residue to promote a smoother, clarified complexion. Its blend of unique patent ingredients and anti-inflammatory Pinosylvin and Rosemary work in synergy to relieve irritation and improve overall skin health without drying it out. After use, skin feels refreshed and moisturised.
name: Acence Anti-Blemish Foam Cleanser 150ml

product_description:
Experience a revitalising cleanse with Mizon Pore Refine Deep Cleansing Foam, a cooling facial cleanser infused with Kaolin and Charcoal to draw impurities out of skin.
Delivering a mild yet deep cleanse, the minty face wash transforms into a rich foam that effectively lifts away sebum, impurities and dead skin to reveal a smoother, brighter and refreshed complexion. Its cocktail of calming botanicals smoothen and hydrate skin whilst controlling oil. The complexion is left feeling clean and moisturised with refined pores.
name: Pore Refine Deep Cleansing Foam 120ml

product_description:
Douse your lips in glossy moisture with Mizon Collagenic Aqua Volume Lip Essence, a moisturising and plumping lip formula that intensely hydrates and promotes a fuller-looking pout.
Naturally restoring lost collagen for a plumping effect (without the tingling!), the essence-like texture glides effortlessly across the lips, delivering a veil of protection that locks in moisture and safeguards from UV rays. Its blend of Plant oils and ingredients moisturise and protect dry, sensitive lips, leaving them replenished and instantly hydrated. Absorbs quickly to deeply nourish.

product_description:
Regain a youthful-looking complexion with Mizon Deep Sea Marine Collagen Ampoule Serum, a moisturising solution that intensely hydrates and firms the appearance of skin.
Enriched with a host of beneficial ingredients, including Marine Collagen, Seaweed extract and Bamboo Tree Sap, the formula deeply nourishes and moisturises whilst relieving and protecting sensitive skin against external aggressors. Its collagen-boosting properties promote a firmer, suppler complexion, and its dose of Panthenol and Glycerin create the perfect balance between oil and moisture. Skin has improved elasticity with reduced wrinkles.
name: Deep Sea Marine Collagen Ampoule Serum 30ml

product_description:
Rejuvenate the delicate eye area with PRAI's 24K GOLD Wrinkle Repair Eye Crème; a fast-absorbing, anti-ageing formula that works to fight fine lines, wrinkles and crow's feet.
Fortified with revolutionary NULASTIC™ Silk and EYEDELINE™ (a unique marine ingredient), the eye cream helps to minimise dark circles and puffiness, whilst luxurious 24K Gold defends against free radicals and environmental stresses. Expect a smoother, younger and more refined eye contour with restored luminosity.

product_description:
The NuFACE Trinity Eye and Lip Enhancer (ELE) Attachment is designed to be used in conjunction with your Trinity Facial Toning Device.
The attachment's two small tips precisely target the hard-to-reach areas of the face that can be susceptible to visible signs of ageing, including eyebrow furrows, crow's feet and smile lines. The lip and eye attachment works to reduce the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles, for a younger-looking face. Ideal for using in the morning, revitalising tired eyes.

product_description:
Green People 推出 Age Defy+ Hydrate新生精华护肤液；这是用于面部和颈部的再生修复配方。 其再平衡功能植物性药材结合可刺激细胞代谢的山毛榉芽、清香宜人的柑橘、玫瑰天竺葵和薰衣草，令肌肤焕发活力，柔软滑嫩。
旨在提高弹性，令肌肤丰盈柔嫩，该快速吸收精华护肤液提供长效保湿并锁定水分，让您获得清新舒爽、活力十足的肌肤。 肌肤将更加光滑、紧致，焕发青春光彩。 E.N.

RMK Gel Scrub is specially formulated with natural ingredients to  penetrate deep into your pores. Cleansing and smoothing your skin the  refreshing scent of lemon, lime and herbal green leave you feeling  refreshed and invigorated all day long.
Directions of use:
name: Gel Scrub (100g)

product_description:
使用 Menaji 911 眼部护理凝胶（28g），去除熬夜带来的各种眼部肌肤迹象。 采用纯天然成分制成，这款凝胶具有类似冰袋的冰镇效果，有助于减少浮肿。
富含甘菊、芦荟、小米草和小麦蛋白富，它可以紧实眼周肌肤，增加弹性；另外，尿囊素还能促进健康组织的新生，并提高肌肤的水润度。 采用无油配方，低过敏性，即使最敏感的肌肤也适用。 使用说明：

product_description:
Hydrate thirsty skin with the Free-Radical Protecting Daily Moisturiser from Dr Botanicals. Fortified with AQUARICH®; a complex that combines black oat extract with soya to strengthen skin, whilst active elderflower extract revives radiance to leave you with a brighter, healthy-looking complexion.
Ideal for soothing inflamed, chapped skin, the fast-absorbing cream is infused with a cocktail of coconut oil, rose water, aloe vera and chamomile to deeply nourish, soften and restore long-lasting comfort. Antioxidant vitamin E provides protection against environmental aggressors all day long. E.N.

product_description:
Green People Day Solution 含有有机芦荟、洋甘菊和玫瑰天竺葵，是最受青睐的一款日霜，适用于所有肌肤类型，包括最敏感的肌肤。 本品具备抗衰老特性，为肌肤提供每日保湿、镇静和滋养。
Green People Day Solution 散发着玫瑰天竺葵的清香，是大自然赐予的一款最纯粹的日霜。 本品已通过有机认证，不含对羟基苯甲酸酯、羊毛脂、乙醇、人工香料和色素，令肌肤彻底清洁并给予温和滋养。
Green People 使用非空运的可回收包装。 产品只含有少量手工制作的纯天然有机成分，确保收到产品时尽可能新鲜。 本品也适用于严格素食者和素食主义者。
使用说明：
name: People Day Solution (50ml)

product_description:
Clarify your complexion with the Vitamasques Tea Tree Hydrating Moisturising Mask; a luxurious treatment inspired by Korean innovation to nourish and condition skin.
Developed with triple layer sheet technology for maximum effect and absorption, the face mask utilises extracts of Tea Tree to soothe and rejuvenate skin, leaving it soft, smooth and comfortable.

product_description:
晚上入睡前使用Intensive Night Treatment可深層滋潤肌膚；營養成分豐富的配方使皮膚得到滋潤，感到舒適並恢復神采。 
所含的Hylaplex™系統將交聯透明質酸與肽，以及滋養馬魯拉油相結合起到強韌皮膚的作用，這種強有力的呵護在皮膚表面形成了一個水分屏障，有助於保持一個持久保濕的健康水平，同時重要的脂肪酸和抗氧化劑起到滋養和保護作用。 
微量生物工程大豆提取物有助於呈現一個順滑、更新和有青春神采的膚色。

product_description: 娇嫩的眼周肌肤需要强效可靠的呵护，Elizabeth Arden 铂粹御肤眼部精华露是一款抗皱修复眼霜，可减少衰老的迹象，淡化鱼尾纹。 这款精华液专为促进肌肤的自然胶原蛋白基质而设计，让肌肤更紧实，更显青春。 - E.D
name: Arden 铂粹御肤眼部精华露

product_description:
The He-Shi Soufflé Moisturiser is the finishing touch that will prolong your tan and keep your skin glowing. The silky, hydrating formula absorbs easily into skin, working to moisturise and smoothes, whilst providing a delicious, uplifting fragrance.
Featuring moisturising ingredients Aloe Vera, Panthenol and Vitamin E, the Soufflé Moisturiser provides a low-shine, matt finish and can also be used as a daily moisturiser to keep skin in tip-top condition. The lightweight, revitalising moisturiser rehydrates the skin for a softer looking complexion and provides the perfect finale to your tan application routine.

product_description:
使用 Menaji 深度清洁面膜（100ml），净化肌肤，深度排毒。 它能够深入渗透毛孔，排出多余的杂质和污垢，非常适合去除难看的黑头。 富含维生素E、C和B6，紧实肌肤，并让肌肤重现活力，散发健康的年轻光泽。
这款产品专为解决男性肌肤多油的问题而配制，吸收多余油脂并缩小毛孔，让您拥有细致清爽的肌肤。 使用说明：
