product_description:
Combining everything you need to cleanse, hydrate and revitalise skin, the Time Bomb Starter Kit from Time Bomb will leave your complexion fresh and radiant every time.
Take-Off Time Cleansing Cream (30ml)
A skin-refining formula that works to refresh, exfoliate and revive radiance. Catering specifically for mature skin, its spherical cleansing beads and exfoliating granules gently buff away dead, dull skin cells without over-drying or uncomfortable tightness. Expect a smooth, refined complexion with a more even tone.
Take-Off Time Polishing Pads (Pack of 10)
Effortlessly wipe away cleanser with the double-sided pads. Featuring a soft side, the pads lift away dirt, make-up and impurities, whilst the textured, rougher side delivers a mild exfoliating action to banish dead skin cells. Achieve a clear, radiant complexion with a healthy glow.
Glory Days Day Cream (15ml)
A multi-tasking, 4-in-1 formula to moisturise, prime, brighten and tighten skin. Enriched with Borage, Glucose and White Flower Oils, the lightweight, anti-ageing cream delivers long-lasting hydration, whilst an innovative Hyaluronic Acid Complex works to plump and firm for a smoother, more refined appearance. Micro-reflective particles blur lines and even out skin tone to create a perfect canvas for make-up application.
Flashback Night Cream (15ml)
Rejuvenate skin whilst you sleep with the non-greasy, anti-ageing formula. Working like a paraffin wax hand treatment, the plumping cream utilises Rice Bran, Borage Oil and Hyaluronic Acid to hydrate and moisturise skin, increasing collagen and elastin production. Rich in antioxidants to defend against free radical damage, you can expect a smooth, dewy and revitalised complexion come morning.
name: Bomb Time Bomb Starter Kit

product_description: The Eyelid Lifting Stripes Trial Pack from MAGICSTRIPES is ideal for choosing the right size to obtain perfect fit for your eye. The Lifting Stripes offer the look of an eyelift without the expense of surgery. The skin-friendly silicone strips create a younger appearance instantly by lifting the lid, resulting in a fresh-faced, radiant look. Makeup can be applied as usual over the strip, for lifted eyes during every occasion. The strips are incredibly discreet so can be your secret weapon.
name: Eyelid Lifting Stripes Trial Pack

product_description:
This RMK Eye Balm has dual benefits in that it provides the pleasant and cooling sensation of a gel with the rich hydration that comes with a cream. Working to deeply penetrate into the skin, this creamy veil will help to smooth the surface of skin and guarantee long-lasting wear for your eye make-up. With a fresh scent and containing a stimulating formula, this eye balm also helps to reduce dark circles and puffiness for brighter looking eyes. - E.D
Directions of use:- After moisturising, apply a small amount and blend it by lightly massaging it around the eyes.- Use day and night.- As a final touch, press into the inner corner of each eye and your temples to maximise the massaging effect.
name: Eye Balm

product_description:
L’Oréal Men Expert Pure & Matte Anti-Shine Moisturising Gel 提供控油功效，滋润肌肤，而不会有任何多余的油腻感。 非粘性配方能被快速吸收，呈现清新健康肌肤。
前额光亮，鼻子油腻，肌肤不清澈！ 使用 L’Oreal Men Expert Pure & Matte Anti-Shine Moisturising Gel，采取行动防止多余油脂，呈现清新、健康的肌肤。 这是一款用于油性肌肤的有针对性的日常保湿乳，也可强化肌肤抵御未来断裂的能力，同时该保湿乳还能提供最佳的保湿性能。
使用说明：
name: Men Expert Pure & Matte Anti-Shine Moisturising Gel (50ml)

product_description:
本品为肌肤提供必需的水分，缓解肌肤压力。 内含药妆增压成分，使用后肌肤明显饱满丰盈，保护肌肤免遭环境侵害。
本款双效精华液，内含强大保湿磁铁、葡聚糖、β-葡聚糖、透明质酸、舒缓的玫瑰香水等成分，用以为肌肤补充水份，使肌肤瞬间饱满充盈。 配方可巧妙抵御空气中的细菌和刺激，为脆弱脱水的肌肤补水。 通过瞬间舒缓肌肤的水分，缓解肌肤压力，使肌肤清新而富有光泽。 每次一杯水，为肌肤补水。
使用说明：
name: Chapman Skinesis 强力保湿精华液（30 ml）

product_description: Jurlique 是一个提供最优质奢侈护肤品的品牌。使用该品牌的 Nutri-Define Essential Conditioning Lotion，为肌肤补充水分。含乳脂的轻盈爽肤水采用正在申请专利的 Biosome5 技术配制，富含五种主要成分，包括辣根、迷迭香、薄荷、桑树根和糖原，以减少细纹、皱纹和下垂。凭借如丝般柔滑的质地体验恢复活力的青春肌肤。 E.N.
name: Nutri-Define Essential Conditioning Lotion (100ml)

product_description:
使用 Nuxe Lait Démaquillant Confort – Comforting Cleansing Milk，清理最后一丝彩妆和日常污垢。这种终极敏感性肌肤混合液可清除肌肤上的杂质，且足够温和，适用于眼部和唇部。
享用精致的清洁乳液。这款产品对于整个面部的肌肤足够温和，无需格外留意眼部和唇部。 Nuxe Lait Démaquillant Confort – Comforting Cleansing Milk 是一款柔滑的玫瑰混合乳液，可用于早晚清洁和舒缓肌肤。
使用说明：
name: Lait Demaquillant Confort - Comforting Cleansing Milk (200ml)

product_description:
獨特而有效，Pai純淨補水鱷梨&荷荷巴補水日霜主打補水、滋潤、舒緩配方賦予乾燥敏感肌膚無比柔軟的質地。含有荷荷巴油和鱷梨等豐富維他命A,D和E和淡淡茉莉清香。不含任何引起過敏的化學物質，如。 。 
使用方法：

Enjoy the Dermalogica Age Smart Mature Skin Duo; a skin resurfacing cleanser and antioxidant hydramist for mature skin. Flash-firming properties improve the skin’s texture whilst intensely hydrating for a nourished, fresh feeling.
Achieve superior smoothness and ultra-clean skin after just one use with the Dermalogica Age Smart Mature Skin Duo. This combination of a cleanser and a hydramist will leave you feeling refreshed and hydrated, helping reduce visible signs of ageing by removing dulling surface debris and accelerating cell renewal. Encouraging firmness and elasticity it will help to lift, tighten and reduce the appearance of fine lines.
This pack contains the following products:
name: Age Smart Mature Skin Duo

product_description:
Elizabeth Arden Eight Hour Skin Protectant（皮肤防护霜）是一款在极端天气条件下使用的理想产品， 同时也是接触式补充水分的美颜产品。 此款优质的防护霜富含保湿因子，例如维生素E、beta-羟基以及植物油提取物。
同时该产品也适用于极为干燥的身体部位，例如手肘，长茧的部位以及由于旅游而导致皮肤干燥的部位。 只需取少许该产品，涂抹在相应部位，就可以体验到本产品的效果，同时不会带来任何的油腻感。
name: Arden Eight Hour Skin Protectant（皮肤防护霜） - Fragrance Free (50ml)（无香型）

product_description:
Jurlique Nutri-Define Rejuvenating Overnight Cream可提供整夜呵护，令清晨的肌肤清新舒爽、健康润泽，是您的日常必备。 这款成分奢华的护肤霜由独特的Biosome5技术制成，其中的抗衰老成分可还原肌肤的自然光彩；古布阿苏籽油能软化和平滑肌肤；
朝鲜蓟叶精华能令肌肤健康有形，让您每天醒来面色润泽饱满、活力重现。 K.D.
name: Nutri-Define Rejuvenating Overnight Cream (50ml)

product_description:
The Konjac Sponge Company presents the Facial Puff Sponge with Chamomile, a 100% naturally sustainable product delicately handmade purely from moisture-rich Konjac plant fibres and Volcanic Water. Enriched with soothing Chamomile, it’s perfect for sensitive skin and helps to calm irritations and even out redness.
The innovative biodegradable sponge has a unique net-like structure that turns silky soft when wet and works to deeply cleanse and gently exfoliate; eliminating impurities and stimulating blood flow and cell renewal. Konjac is a natural wonder – it’s been used in Southern Asia for over 1,500 years as a medicinal and beauty treatment, and it is alkaline based thus balances any acidity in skin, restoring optimum pH levels.
Lasting for up to 3 months, the sponge is suitable for use with or without a cleanser and can even be used around the delicate eye area. Just add water and experience an all-natural, rejuvenating cleanse that will leave skin feeling smooth, refreshed and calm.
name: Konjac Sponge Company Facial Puff Sponge with Chamomile

product_description:
Reveal a refreshed complexion with the Chantecaille Hibiscus Smoothing Mask; a re-texturising facial treatment that restores natural radiance to skin.
Enriched with Glycolic and Hibiscus Flower Acids, the mask effortlessly smoothes over the visage, quickly offering exfoliating action for skin. A hydrating dose of Sodium Hyaluronate and Saccharide Isomerate ensure the complexion is comfortably moisturised and visibly firm, whilst extracts of Papaya, Jasmine and Mimosa work in synergy to leave skin smooth and touchably soft.
The face mask is complete with a subtle yet uplifting rose scent, which promotes a sense of well-being. Working in three to ten minutes, the mask reveals fresh skin that is visibly bright, clear and enviably radiant.
name: Hibiscus Smoothing Mask 50ml

product_description: Treat and transform skin with the FOREO LUNA™ play , an ultra-portable facial-cleansing device designed to provide a professional standard of skincare with its invigorating one-minute ritual. Perfect for all skin types, the facial brush inspires healthier-looking skin; helping to clear and clarify for a more luminous complexion. The perfect introductory product for FOREO beginners, the travel-sized device is the smallest in the range, and requires just one full charge for up to 100 uses*. Combining T-Sonic™ Pulsation Technology from the LUNA™ mini 2 with FOREO'S signature, non-porous silicone touch-points, the device gently yet effectively cleanses and exfoliates with a single intensity, dual-zone range; its thicker touch points at the top perform an intense clean to help unclog pores and lift away dirt, oil and dead skin, whilst softer, thinner points at the bottom gently cleanse sensitive or normal skin, and larger areas such as the cheeks. Flexible and easy to use, the silicone ' bristles' are ultra-hygienic and resist bacteria build-up to keep skin fresh and clean. Easy to operate and super-portable, the device combines the high-tech power of the LUNA™ range with the ease of a single intensity. Experience simple cleansing without the need to recharge. Skin appears bright, refined and more even in tone. 100% waterproof, the device is safe for use in the bath or shower. T-Sonic™ pulsation technology (8,000 T-Sonic™ pulsations per minute) will remove 99.5% of dirt and oil (based on clinical trials) plus makeup residue. 產品特徵 : 非可再充電電池：高達 100 次使用壽命。 1 脈衝密度。 超衛生。 完全防水。 適合所有肌膚類型。 旅遊友好的大小 -   化妝棉同樣大小。 * 改裝置每天使用兩次可使用 1-2 個月。
name: Play - 紫色

product_description:
来自Sarah Chapman的Skinesis Exclusive Discovery 套装是四件套系列产品，可清洁、净化肌肤，增强肌肤光泽。 利用高级配方和抗衰老活性成分，可令肌肤更加年轻、紧致并焕发活力。 E.N. 
终极清洁乳 (15ml)
使用终极清洁乳 ，让您尽享超级清洁的体验，这款霜膏可融化成乳状的洁面乳，有效卸妆和清除杂质，同时具有软化亮白肌肤的功效。 拥有智能配方，该芳香清洁液结合富含欧米伽的精油和强大的抗氧化剂与抗衰老活性成分，温和地去除角质并深层清洁，可轻松融入肌肤和深入毛孔，以消除灰尘、污垢和化妆品。
Age Repair精华液 (15ml)
一款屡获殊荣的抗衰老精华液，旨在对抗黑斑、细纹和皱纹。 协同利用强效活性成分和创新缩氨酸混合物，该多效配方能够在细胞水平上丰盈和亮白肌肤，减少色素不均，同时促进胶原蛋白的产生，以紧致肌肤和缓解失控皱纹迹象。该轻盈精华液富含维生素和抗氧化剂，可滋润肌肤，并专业改善肌肤光泽和肤色。
Miracle面膜配搅拌器和抹刀 (2 Masks)
使用专为恢复柔软、弹性肤质的肌肤完善面膜焕发肌肤神采。 为肌肤注入保湿透明质酸、蛋白肌肤拉紧成分和摩洛哥熔岩粘土以提升和紧致肌肤，恢复青春光彩。 适合所有肌肤类型，该高性能面膜富含焕发肌肤光泽的维生素C、褐色海藻和娇嫩玫瑰，以尽量减少毛孔和缺陷，同时亮白和清爽肌肤。 配备搅拌器和抹刀，以进行简单、整洁的涂抹。
专业清洁手套
在自己家中利用这款洁面手套体验沙龙式护肤效果。 这款手套采用双效棉纤维双层设计，内层的海绵结构可有效保持高效洁肤所需的温度和水分，其舒适佩戴设计让护肤变得更轻松简单。 其略微粗糙的一面可温和地祛除肌肤表面的角质，吸出污垢和杂质，而带有细纹的另一面非常适合卸除眼妆。 适合所有类型的肌肤，让您拥有梦寐以求的亮白剔透，让您的肌肤活力四射。
name: Chapman Skinesis Exclusive发现套装（价值：£55.70）

product_description:
利用来自NUXE的Splendieuse Anti Dark Spot护肤液SPF 20平衡肌肤，这款具有防紫外线功效的保湿配方，可滋养干燥的肌肤，同时均匀肤色并减少黑斑及色素沉着。
该润肤液具有轻盈、丝滑质感，结合珍贵花分子和维生素C，可明显消减肌肤黑斑的大小和颜色，同时源自小麦和树木的糖分具有强效保湿功效。 肌肤将变得美白亮丽、容光焕发、肤色均匀。 它甚至会防止出现新的黑斑。- K.N.
name: Splendieuse Anti Dark Spot正常肌肤润肤液SPF 20 (50ml)

product_description: 利用 Australian Bodycare的洁面凝胶温和清洁娇嫩、易生暗疮的肌肤。 该水活化、低泡洁面乳可有效去除全天累积的污垢和杂质。 该洁面乳为非干燥，其泡沫配方容易冲洗。 富含1％茶树油，该成分以其抗菌特性而闻名，该清洁液特别适合油性肌肤。 – E.W.
name: Bodycare洁面凝胶（250ml）

product_description:
MONU Micro Exfoliant 是一款强大的双效微晶磨砂霜，可重新调理肌理，减少细纹和毛孔。 使用后肌肤健康宛如新生。
MONU 被专业理疗师使用，采用最纯净成分，具备独特美容保养效果，可提供肌肤保养所需的有益成分。 使用 MONU Micro Exfoliant，令肌肤重获新生。 富含滑肤成分，令肌肤焕然一新，活力再现。
使用说明：
name: Micro Exfoliant (100ml)

product_description:
Achieve shower fresh results with the 3 Step Shower Glow Mask from Korean brand, Skin79. Arriving with three separate compartments for each of the three steps, the mask acts as a complete basic care routine.
Step 1 contains a peeling pad which sweeps across the skin to slough away dead skin cells and other impurities. Step 2 boasts the Shower Glow sheet mask, which delivers gentle moisture to the complexion, as well as essential nutrition. The final step in the routine is a Tone-Up glow cream, which completes the process by visibly brightening the face. Expect a refreshed complexion that is visibly radiant.
name: 3 Step Shower Glow Mask (1 Piece)

product_description:
Peter Thomas Roth乙醇酸Clarifying爽肤水不含Fragrance及染料，是您T区、油性及问题肌肤的完美的补救措施。 进行Clarifying和磨砂，粗糙的肌肤会变得光滑并得到舒缓，同时细纹减少。
使肌肤恢复自然的酸碱平衡，Peter Thomas Roth甘醇酸Clarifying爽肤水帮助后续的护肤品更容易地渗入肌肤，获得良好的打磨和抛光效果。 含有羟基酸和抗氧化剂micellized（胶束化）维生素A和E，肌肤明显变得更清洁，显得非常健康。
使用说明：
name: Thomas Roth甘醇酸Clarifying爽肤水（250ml）

product_description:
Treat dull complexions to the Balance Me Radiance Face Mask; a multi-beneficial, five-minute formula that works to replenish moisture and restore a radiant glow.
Synergising Ground Walnut Spheres and a Fruit Acid Complex, the 99% natural mask delivers a gently exfoliating action to buff away dead skin cells and eliminate impurities, revealing a smoother, more refined complexion with enhanced luminosity. Kaolin Clay effectively clears pores, whilst Rosemary and Lavender Oils leave skin rejuvenated, revitalised and deeply refreshed.
name: Me Radiance Face Mask 75ml

product_description:
让娇嫩的眼部周围肌肤保持弹性，this works No Wrinkles眼部修复霜（15ml）将令您的眼睛光彩照人、青春焕发。 专门配制用于滋润和丰盈肌肤，利用时间锁延技术专业混合松香油、透明质酸、摩洛哥坚果油和海甘蓝油，为肌肤提供保护和滋润，同时铁线子叶可增强肌肤韧性和弹性。
它强效但不油腻，可最大限度地减少黑眼圈和皱纹，还包含反光特性，可消除熬夜造成的痕迹。 - L.M.

使用说明：
name: works No Wrinkles 眼部修复霜 (15ml)

product_description:
Rejuvenate your complexion with the Mizon Honey Black Sugar Scrub; an exfoliating treatment that works to transform a dull and lacklustre complexion.
Eliminating dead skin cells and daily dirt, the scrub is enriched with natural Black Sugar powder, which sloughs away lifeless skin and targets black heads. When used 2-3 times a week, the formula effectively reduces excess sebum production, as well as preventing the appearance of spots.
Complete with a hydrating blend of Olive, Grape Seed and Meadow Foam Seed oils, the Sugar Scrub delivers a veil of nutrients to skin, leaving the complexion radiant, renewed and ultra-smooth.
name: Honey Black Sugar Scrub 90g

product_description:
来自欧莱雅的这款 Age Perfect Cell Renew Day Cream 可刺激表皮细胞再生，让您的肌肤焕发健康光泽。 这款面霜将创新的细胞防卫技术与 Natecium® DHC 和透明质酸相结合，为肌肤注入水分，迅速带给您意想不到的效果。
使用说明：
name: Paris Dermo Expertise Age Perfect Cell Renew Advanced Restoring Day Cream - SPF15 (50ml)

product_description:
Elemis BIOTEC Skin 劲能日霜强力滋润您的肌肤 。 包括琥珀酸、乳酸和阿魏的特殊配方组合，补充面部肌肤水分，深入滋养肌肤，给您带来更加光滑、鲜嫩的面部肌肤。
利用专有生物能源™合成技术，合成锌、铜等元素，保湿霜增加细胞活力，而钙PCA和向日葵花有助于减少面部细纹和皱纹。 体验青春、健康、明显更加柔滑的肌肤。
name: BIOTEC SKin劲能日霜30ml

product_description:
專為全天候深度滋養肌膚而設計，Erno Laszlo活力平衡抗皺霜特別適合乾性和極乾性肌膚。 24小時集中呵護，滋養肌膚天然水分，密集保護肌膚，特別配方包含紅花籽油可柔軟肌膚，幫助修護、滋潤皮膚，即使在極端天氣的情況裡也可改善皮膚彈性，讓您的皮膚更柔軟、更年輕。 
 Phelityl是Laszlo醫師研究出的獨特保濕複合物，與皮膚pH值幾近相同，給予肌膚最溫和的滋養呵護。本品也可以使用在乾燥的手、腳和身體其他較粗糙的區域。 
使用方法:
name: Laszlo活力平衡抗皱霜50ml

product_description:
Experience a deep cleanse with the Mizon Rice Real Cleansing Foam; an effective face wash that thoroughly cleanses skin whilst offering exfoliation and microcirculation benefits. Formulated without parabens, the cleanser is gentle enough for sensitive skin and is ideal for oilier complexions.
Utilising an efficient blend of Rice Bran and Brown Rice (used in Korean skincare since the royal dynasties), the foaming formula protects and moisturises skin by delivering a film of acid to the complexion. The Rice Bran also offers exfoliating action, which sloughs away dead skin cells while a dose of Protein and Starch in the grains visibly brighten skin and leave the face radiant.
Transforming into a lightweight foam upon contact with water, the cleansing solution targets pores to leave skin feeling soft and ultra-smooth.
name: Rice Real Cleansing Foam 150ml

product_description:
使用 NAOBAY (Natural And Organic Beauty And You) 舒缓爽肤水令肤色清新宜人；这是一款四合一爽肤水，为肌肤提供多种好处。
温和配方富含甘菊和雷公根，消除了洁面后的化妆痕迹和杂质，同时起到爽肤和润肤的作用，令肌肤清新爽滑、细腻紧致。 令人振奋的柑橘香味，赋予肌肤娇柔芬芳。 您的肌肤看起来水润、舒适，滋养得当。
name: 舒缓爽肤水 200ml

product_description:
PAYOT 柏姿男士优化抗浮肿眼部走珠专门用于护理男士更强韧、更有弹性的肌肤，它可有效清爽和焕活眼部肌肤的功能。
这款强效眼部精华蕴含有人参萃取物、溴和盐，能最大限度地淡化细纹、消除水肿、淡化黑眼圈和眼袋，其独特的走珠涂抹器可刺激微循环，使眼部肌肤更加亮白，焕发活力。 这款眼部精华适用于各种类型的肌肤，具有修复肌肤的功能，保护肌肤免受自由基的损伤。
name: 柏姿男士优化抗浮肿眼部走珠 15ml

product_description:
Treat your complexion to Balance Me's Cleanse and Smooth Face Balm; a 100% natural, oil-based formula that works to exfoliate, polish and brighten skin without stripping moisture.
Infused with Fine Oat Powder, the luxurious cleansing balm gently buffs away dead, dull skin cells and dissolves all traces of make-up, whilst a nourishing blend of Shea, Mango and Cocoa Butters moisturise and hydrate for long-lasting comfort. Expect a smooth, refined complexion with renewed radiance.
name: Me Cleanse and Smooth Face Balm 125ml

product_description:
Treat dry, chapped lips to the Intense Therapy Lip Balm Lemon & Shea Butter from Jack Black. Harnessing the powers of ultra-moisturising Avocado Oil and Shea Butter, the emollient balm soothes and conditions lips, whilst an antioxidant-rich blend of Vitamin E and Green Tea defend against free radical damage.
Utilising UVA and UVB absorbers that provide broad spectrum sun protection, the non-greasy balm protects from windburn and extreme climate conditions to leave lips feeling smooth, comfortable and deeply revitalised with a refreshing fragrance of zesty Lemon.
name: Black Intense Therapy Lip Balm Lemon & Shea Butter 7g

product_description:
用KORRES Pomegranate磨砂膏 (16ml) Revive 您的肌肤。 这款产品温和而有效，可清除污垢和死皮细胞，而富含丹宁酸的石榴提取物有助于提亮肤色，令肌肤看起来亮泽动人、容光焕发。 其配方还含有希腊橄榄核，可细化毛孔的外观、去除多余皮脂，令肌肤看起来亮泽动人、容光焕发。
这款磨砂膏富含抗氧化剂，可令肌肤保持健康和年轻，还有助于促进血液循环，令肤色看起来容光焕发。使用说明：
name: Pomegranate 磨砂膏 (16ml)

product_description:
Garnier 超级营养滋润夜用啫哩霜，可修复肌肤，使肌肤焕发活力。 质地柔软光滑，内含令人放松的成分，可有效减少细纹、皱纹和疲倦的迹象，使肌肤得到修复、容光焕发。
具有敏感的抗疲劳性能，配方温和舒缓，涂抹后使肌肤充满活力，促进肌肤自然修复过程的启动。 C.R
name: 超级营养滋润夜用啫哩霜（50ml）

product_description:
這款娜迪奧抗老保濕防曬日霜SPF30+ 質地輕盈不油膩，幫助肌膚抵禦有害UVA 和UVB 射線。這款奢華日霜蘊含有機玫瑰果油、薰衣草和檸檬精華，幫助預防歲月痕跡，令肌膚盈潤柔滑。 
使用說明：
name: 娜迪奥保湿防晒日霜 Spf30+ (75G)

product_description:
Achieve a false lash effect with Christian BRETON Infinite Lashes; a lash-enhancing serum that restores strength and vitality to natural eyelashes.
Arriving with an integrated brush applicator, which boasts an ultra-fine brush head, the serum is effortless to apply. Simply sweep over the base of lashes and the Infinite Lashes formula encourages healthy growth, whilst strengthening the fiber and preventing eyelash loss.
Formulated with Christian BRETON’s exclusive XLash™ peptide and a super-protein blend, lashes are instantly revitalised. Expect thick and full lashes that are visibly longer.
name: BRETON Infinite Lashes 4ml

product_description:
Reignite a youthful glow with the Prevage® Perfect Partners Set from Elizabeth Arden. Presented in a gift box, the collection works to fight signs of ageing, whilst protecting from environmental aggressors and regenerating skin.
Prevage® Anti-Ageing Daily Serum (30ml)
Combat signs of ageing with the wrinkle-fighting daily serum, an innovative formula that reduces the appearance of fine lines, wrinkles, minor scars, redness and sun damage. Infused with antioxidants Idebenone and vitamin E, the fast-absorbing serum limits age spots and discolouration to leave you with a youthful-looking glow.
Prevage® Anti-Ageing Moisture Lotion SPF30 (15ml)
An award-winning lotion formulated to protect skin from harmful UVA and UVB rays, preventing premature ageing, smoothening fine lines and wrinkles and restoring an even skin tone. Replenishing and deeply moisturising, its hydrating formula is packed with Idebenone, a powerful antioxidant that works to neutralise free radical damage. Experience brighter, radiant skin with a touchably soft texture.
Superstart Skin Renewal Booster (5ml)
With a Probiotics Complex, the serum strengthens the skin's natural ability to repair and renew skin, restoring a brighter, youthful appearance. Enriched with sea fennel and flaxseed extracts to maintain the skin's barrier, whilst glasswort extract locks in moisture and reduces water loss in the surface of skin. The versatile booster can be used before a moisturiser to increase the effectiveness of skincare products or as a refreshing serum.
name: Arden Prevage Perfect Partners Gift Set (Worth £232.00)

product_description:
Sukin 純淨永恆煥膚晚霜可有效改善肌膚狀況，讓您重返年輕。這款晚霜富含澳洲堅果油（以其柔膚成分著稱）和荷荷巴油（可幫助增加肌膚彈性），可讓肌膚更加閃亮，重返光彩亮麗的年輕狀態，同時顯著減少皺紋。 - RH 
 使用說明：晚上潔面後使用，輕輕按摩到面部。
name: 焕肤晚霜 (60ml)

product_description:
使用The Method: Polish溫和去角質膏可以使皮膚亮麗、清新並煥發年輕的神采。 
面部磨砂膏富含純礦物質和植物酶，包括褐海藻，它所包含的均勻的氧化鎂和碳酸氫鈉非研磨去角質晶體可去除無光澤的死皮細胞；每個粒子的大小和形狀都均勻一致，所以沒有割傷或劃傷皮膚的危險。去角質膏在呈現更加柔和而亮麗的肌膚效果的同時，使皮膚做好準備以吸收其他滋養護理品。用後皮膚感覺柔軟，經過滋養。
name: Method: 磨砂膏 (赠送装 227克) (价值 £113.50 欧元)

product_description: 杰克⋅布莱克深层护理润唇膏西柚生姜味可提供广谱 UVA 和 UVB 防护，保护唇部免受风吹日晒损伤。该西柚和生姜味润唇膏富含上等肌肤调理成分和抗氧化物，可舒缓发炎的嘴唇，迅速修复缺水干裂嘴唇 - SA
name: Black 杰克⋅布莱克深层护理润唇膏西柚味

product_description:
使用革命性的 CULT51 Night Cream，提前做好护肤工作。这是一种高级科学的配方，促进更青春、更具活力的肌肤。 这款前所未有的晚霜在研究阶段花了两年时间，拥有 51 种抗衰老成分。此外，您还可获得持续的效果。
几次涂抹后，您会发现肌肤上的变化：细纹和皱纹减少，肌肤散发新的光彩。 使用时，涂抹于面部、颈部和上胸部。 您也可在一只手的手背上涂抹少量 CULT51 Night Cream。这是一种完美的方式，让您见证这种配方究竟对肌肤起到了何种功效。
name: Night Cream

product_description:
Transform dull, lack-lustre skin with the Mask a-'Peel' Radiance Revealing Rubberising Mask from bliss. Inspired by a luxurious spa facial, the weekly treatment works to restore a luminous glow, whilst improving skin tone and texture to reveal a smoother, more refined appearance.
Harnessing the powers of Vitamin C, Bilberry and Seaweed Extract, the innovative, easy-to-apply face mask transforms into a paste upon contact with water; creating a rubberised layer on the skin that is ready to peel off in just twenty minutes. Expect a youthful-looking, revitalised complexion with a bright, even tone.
name: Mask a-'Peel' Radiance Revealing Rubberising Mask

product_description:
Trilogy's Age Proof Line Smoothing Day Cream是延缓衰老的补水产品，专门用于补充皮肤的水分，同时可以减少细纹和皱纹的出现。
只需在皮肤上轻轻涂抹，这款浓缩植物配方中大量的有益成分就可以有效补水，让皮肤重新焕发青春的活力。 玻尿酸、 羟脯氨酸和Glycablend™的协同作用可以让皮肤容光焕发，展现水嫩的光泽；同时还可以实现补水的最大效果，平滑出现的皱纹。
会让您的皮肤光滑、柔顺、紧致。
name: Age Proof Line Smoothing Day Cream （50ml）

product_description: 使用資生堂新漾美肌清顏保濕啫喱減少粗大的毛孔和痘痘的出現。這款產品使用的獨特配方保護肌膚本身的水分，使皮膚看起來有彈性。特別的使用水楊酸，這款輕薄的保濕啫喱能幫助減少痘痘使肌膚更加順滑。使用這款產品使皮膚獲得水油平衡獲得更透亮的膚色。

德國世家潔面護理套裝專為滿足油性易長痘皮膚的需求，套裝內包含六個產品迷你裝，即使差旅在外，也可以進行全面的肌膚護理。此便攜套裝包含清潔、平衡和激活肌膚的所需要物品，也是送禮的絕佳選擇。 - LM 
 包含：
name: Hauschka 德国世家洁面护理套装

product_description: 质地轻盈的醒肤眼部凝胶。 咖啡因能有效减少浮肿和黑眼圈。 融合了多酚、二肽VW、脂肽Pal-GQRP和红茶精华，能有效柔嫩肌肤、减少肌肤干纹，增加弹性。
name: for Men - 眼部凝胶 25ml

product_description:
幫助暗瘡皮膚恢復鎮定，Pai完美平衡精華具有獨特配方調節油脂分泌，保證毛孔不堵塞，減少皮膚的油脂和暗瘡。試驗證明，使用後可減少65％的面部油脂，減輕皮膚暗瘡程度高達72%，並且可快速達到以上效果。 
配方中的鋅有助於減少皮膚的油光、黑頭及堵塞，營造更潔淨、更健康的肌膚。而玻尿酸深層滋潤肌膚，保持皮膚的色調和柔軟度。 Pai完美平衡精華針對問題皮膚，但並不會讓皮膚乾燥，含有玻尿酸深層滋潤肌膚，保持皮膚的色調和柔軟度。抗菌、消炎和抗氧化特性可以改善粉刺，溫和清潔和呵護堵塞型皮膚。 
 使用方法 ：
NUXE Sun Fondant Cream SPF50 for Face 适用于白皙敏感型肌肤，具备防晒功效，可保护肌肤免受有害射线的伤害，防止早衰。 采用 Kau Pe 向日葵专门配制而成，可减少过热；而水葫芦可保持滋润水平。 轻盈无粘性的面霜可用作理想的底妆，帮助您实现完美、均匀的棕褐色，尽可能减少黑斑的出现。 E.N.
name: Sun High Protection Fondant Cream for Face SPF 50 (50ml)

product_description:
LieracHydragenist 超级保湿修护香油，可营养修护肌肤。科学专门知识证明：内含的高级植物活性成分，可打造高性能产品。
内含浓度为10％的Hydra O2聚合体（玻尿酸、仿生氧气、斑鸠叶），可增强产品功效。被肌肤快速吸收、抗肌肤老化 、淡化抚平细纹和皱纹，令肤色更年轻。
适用于日常护理，或者作为高效面膜，有助于恢复神清气爽、滋润的肌肤，同时令肌肤散发玫瑰水、茉莉花和栀子花的芳香。 肌肤将会更饱满、更光滑、更精致。
name: Hydragenist 超级保湿修护香油 50ml

product_description:
Elizabeth Arden PREVAGE Eye Ultra Protection Anti-Aging Moisturizer SPF15可提供多重眼部防护，全天强效滋润保湿，同时蕴含防晒成分，能预防岁月痕迹，令双眸焕发年轻明亮的活力神采。
它是第一款混合了广谱SPF防护成分和革命性艾地苯醌技术的眼霜产品。 这款滋养眼霜可有效中和能导致岁月痕迹的自由基，全天滋润舒缓娇嫩的眼周肌肤。 试验发现，本品对100%女性使用者的眼周肤质有立竿见影的改善效果。 想拥有更年轻的肌肤？ 不妨从双眼开始。
使用说明：
name: Arden Prevage Eye Ultra Protection Anti-Aging Moisturizer Spf15 (15ml)

product_description:
Lavish your skin in luxury with the STARSKIN The Gold Mask™ VIP Revitalizing Luxury Coconut Bio-Cellulose Second Skin Face Mask; a rejuvenating sheet mask that delivers a star-like glow.
Working to transform dull, dry and lacklustre complexions, the mask fits closely to the contours of the face and delivers a rich and creamy serum to skin, which acts like a decadent treat. The bio-cellulose sheet mask is drenched in a serum that comprises Evening Primrose extract, which dramatically softens skin, whilst pure Colloidal Gold works to reduce the appearance of fine lines, wrinkles and sun damage. Enhanced by a potent blend of Ginkgo Biloba Leaf extract, Adenosine and Kudzo Root extract, the face mask boosts collagen production in skin, visibly smoothes its texture and lends an overall brightened look.
Working wonders in just fifteen to twenty minutes, the VIP mask reveals a replenished visage with an opulent and radiant glow.
name: The Gold Mask™ VIP Revitalizing Luxury Coconut Bio-Cellulose Second Skin Face Mask

product_description:
Revive your complexion with the Elemis Your New Skin Solution – Energise; an indulgent collection of skincare essentials that work to create healthy and energised results. The set combines a cleanser, day cream and night cream. Each product work in synergy to offer a skincare regime that guarantees to improve and revitalise skin.
BIOTEC Skin Energising Cleanser (50ml)
Kick-start the BIOTEC system with the BIOTIC Skin Energising Cleanser; an anti-ageing face wash that gently removes the build-up of dirt and impurities. Specially formulated with an energising trio of acids, including Succinic, Lactic and Ferulic to reduce excess oil and rebalance skin, revealing a refreshed, revitalised complexion. The wash-off cleanser activates the brand's BIOTEC system, which prepares skin for optimum performance, leaving it restored, youthful and healthy-looking.
BIOTEC Skin Energising Day Cream (30ml)
Intensely moisturise skin with the BIOTEC Skin Energising Day Cream. Enriched with an energising blend of Succinic, Lactic and Ferulic acid, the cream intensely hydrates and nourishes skin, revealing a smoother, replenished complexion. With the brand's Bio-Energy™ Complex of encapsulated Zinc and Copper, the lightweight moisturiser increases cell energy, whilst working to reduce the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles. Experience a youthful, healthy-looking complexion that is visibly smoother.
BIOTEC Skin Energising Night Cream (8ml)
Thoroughly hydrate the complexion whilst you sleep with the BIOTEC Skin Energising Night Cream. Fortified with a potent trio of acids, including Succinic, Lactic and Ferulic, the effective night cream deeply nourishes skin and assists in revealing a smoother complexion. Harnessing Elemis’ Bio-Energy™ Complex of encapsulated Zinc and Copper, the lightweight moisturiser increases cell energy, whilst Calcium PCA and Sunflower help to minimise the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles. You can expect a youthful, visibly smoother complexion come morning.
name: Your New Skin Solution - Energise

product_description: DELAROM 水盈滋润保湿霜具有强效保湿的功效，富含天然锁水分子透明质酸，它是和胶原蛋白同等重要，甚至更重要的成分。 这款带有淡香的保湿霜质地轻盈，特别添加了浓缩的矿物盐，这一自然成分能够让肌肤恢复活力。 这款深度滋润的面霜混合了芦荟和维生素A、C、E，具有抗老化的功效，强韧肌肤的表皮细胞，适合所有皮肤类型。 - K.N.
name: 水盈滋润保湿霜（50ml）

product_description:
Shiseido The Skincare Essentials Cleansing Massage Brush能给您深层强效的洁肤体验。 本品触感轻柔，适合所有肌肤类型，能让您的洁肤产品更深入毛孔，提高功效，确保彻底清除污垢和杂质。 本品配有细柔如丝的锥形刷毛和硅胶垫，能轻柔按摩肌肤，令肌肤更明亮光滑。 - L.M.
使用说明：每周使用一至两次，配合常用洁肤水使用。
name: The Skincare Essentials Cleansing Massage Brush

product_description:
Improve the appearance of your eyebrows with Talika Lipocils Eyebrow Conditioning Gel, an all-natural regrowth serum that combines five plant extracts to nourish and encourage hair growth.
Promoting denser-looking brows, the conditioning gel has been formulated with 97% natural ingredients and contains the brand's innovative Vegetal Complex comprising Witch Hazel, Horse Chestnut and St. John's Wort; it helps to stimulate growth to fill out sparse patches for thicker, fuller-looking eyebrows.
name: Lipocils Eyebrow Conditioning Gel 10ml

product_description:
Refresh and renew your skin with the yes to Blueberries Smoothing Daily Cleanser, a gentle and creamy face cleanser enriched with powerful antioxidants and natural Alpha Hydroxy Acids to brighten and refine skin's appearance.
Performing a gentle cleanse, the 99% natural formula contains Lemon Peel, a naturally derived cleanser to effectively lift away dirt and grime from skin, and a blend of antioxidant Blueberries, moisturising Coconut Oil and brightening Apple that work in synergy to protect, nourish and delicately exfoliate for a renewed and radiant complexion. Its anti-ageing properties help to reduce the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles whilst firming the look of skin.
name: to Blueberries Smoothing Daily Cleanser

product_description:
Elemis紧致塑颜日霜改善皮肤质地，紧致肌肤，恢复活力，非常适合激素旺盛的皮肤和更年期皮肤。 与晚霜对应，这款保湿霜在白天为老化的皮肤提供最恰当的护理。
它的活性成分有香根鸢尾和中国芙蓉的干细胞、榄仁树皮、鲁冰花以及琉璃苣油，能紧致肌肤，恢复柔软，提升弹性，改善皮肤质地和色泽，刺激胶原蛋白产生，深层滋养肌肤。 绝佳的日常护肤品。 LB
name: 50毫升

product_description:
獨特而卓效的泡沫型潔面乳既能舒緩肌膚，還能去除污垢。採用最精純的原料製成，確保肌膚絲般柔滑，光潔清爽。 KD 
 使用說明：
name: 温和滋养洁面乳 (100ml)

product_description:
Institut Esthederm 雅诗敦高效防护防晒身体喷雾让您尽享更多的阳光，它可最大限度地减少肌肤的不良反应。 这款防晒乳能够保护细胞 DNA，防止明显的光照衰老迹象，优化细胞的能量环境。
其高度保护配方蕴含有丰富的抗炎活性成分，能够刺激肌肤的适应能力，有助于降低超敏肌肤的敏感性，确保肌肤具备最佳阳光耐受力。
name: Esthederm 雅诗敦高效防护防晒身体喷雾 150ml

product_description:
Control breakouts with the Peter Thomas Roth Acne Kit; a comprehensive set to transform your skincare regime and help regulate sebum production for visibly clearer skin. Ideal for oily, acne prone skin, the kit leaves you with a cleansed, clarified and balanced complexion.
Acne Clearing Wash (57ml)
Imbued with an invigorating Citrus scent, the alcohol-free, deep clean face wash is fortified with maximum strength 2% Salicylic Acid to help disrupt the breakout cycle while effectively removing pore-clogging makeup and excess oil. Enriched with Allanotin and Pro Vitamin B5, it helps soothe the look of redness and leave skin feeling thoroughly cleansed.
Acne-Clear Invisible Dots (12 Clear Dots)
A targeted spot treatment, the Invisible Dots work to contain the affected area, with an advanced blend of blemish-fighting ingredients acting overnight to visibly reduce size and redness. Suitable for all skin types, each patch is saturated with 0.5% Salicylic Acid, Hyaluronic Acid and Tea Tree Oil, which work in synergy to refresh, hydrate and heal, effectively diminishing the appearance of acne.  
AHA/BHA Acne Clearing Gel (15ml)
The fragrance-free gel seeks to deeply clean and unclog pores with an advanced formulation of maximum strength 2% Salicylic Acid (BHA) working to reduce the look of pores, fine lines and acne scarring. Delivering intensive hydration and nutrients, the concentrated gel contains a 10% Glycolic Acid Complex (AHA), which chemically exfoliates the surface layer of skin to regulate excess sebum production and alleviate acne breakouts.    
Acne Spot and Area Treatment (7.5ml)
Ideal for moderate to severe acne, the high strength treatment helps control and prevent breakouts with a regulating blend of 5% Collodial Sulfur and 4% Glycolic Acid, which act in synergy to control oil levels on a topical basis. The addition of Aloe Vera, Allanotin and Vitamins work to minimise the look of inflammation and discolouration.
Max Complexion Pads (20 Pads)
Cleanse skin and clear up acne with these multi-tasking facial pads. Drenched with a potent formula of 2% Salicylic Acid and 10% Glycolic Acid plus advanced botanical extracts, the double sided pad delivers gentle cleansing action on one side with the reverse serving as a textured exfoliant. They effectively dissolve dirt, impurities and makeup while the complex blend refines the surface layer of skin to absorb excess oil and clear up active acne – plus the appearance of fine lines, wrinkles and pores are visibly reduced.
name: Thomas Roth Acne Kit

product_description:
Su-Man 洁肤啫喱 ，带您体验清凉舒适的肌肤清洁。这是一款屡获殊荣的油水基洁肤啫喱，可深层清洁肌肤，而不会扰乱肌肤的自然平衡。
这款洁面乳可去除化妆品和杂质（包括防水睫毛膏），无残留。内含冬青、龙血竭提取物、玫瑰果油等成分，可净化滋养肌肤、加强皮肤天然屏障，保护肌肤免遭环境因素的侵害。 可深层清洁肌肤，而不失细腻，清理堵塞的毛孔，为肌肤补充营养，用后肌肤感觉清爽柔软。
适合各种皮肤。
name: 洁肤啫喱125ml

product_description:
Revitalise the complexion with the Omorovicza Gold Rescue Cream; a gold infused, anti-ageing face cream developed for dry and sensitive skin.
The cream effortlessly smoothes over the visage, absorbing quickly to deliver intense nourishment to skin. Harnessing a potent, thermal water-in-oil barrier formulation with Colloidal Gold, the facial treatment offers essential hydration, whilst promoting a youthful appearance. A blend of peptides are able to visibly reduce fine line and wrinkles to leave skin smooth and radiant.
Allowing you to experience spa-like pampering from home, the luxurious Gold Rescue Cream transforms a dehydrated complexion, leaving skin revitalised and rejuvenated.
name: Gold Rescue Cream (50ml)

product_description:
Refresh your complexion whilst you sleep with Cocoa Noir Super Treatment Overnight Mask from Dr Botanicals. Rich in botanical extracts, the vegan friendly mask works whilst skin is most receptive to repair and is designed to supply provide a soothed feeling and visible lift to skin.
Formulated with a vitamin rich blend of Papaya, Jojoba oil and Sweet Almond oil, the purifying mask promotes skin hydration with the added benefit smoother, younger looking skin. The formula seeks to enhance the skin’s visible suppleness and elasticity creating a more youthful appearance, ideal for those seeking a firmer look.
name: Botanicals Coco Noir Super Treatment Overnight Mask 50ml

product_description:
The GLOV Expert Hydro Cleanser for Dry Skin is an effortless, efficient and simple way to cleanse skin without the need for a cleanser, perfect for travel or as an everyday solution.  
Utilising advanced microfibre technology, the cleansing glove contains refined, star-shaped fibres up to 30 times thinner than a cotton pad, which boast superior electrostatic properties to absorb makeup, dirt and excess oil like a magnet without stripping away moisture.
Suitable for all skin types and contact lens wearers, the delicate and naturally antibacterial glove delivers a light yet effective clean with a gentle peeling effect to unveil skin that feels fresher and revitalised. Simply use the tool with water for an instantly purified and smooth complexion.
name: Expert Hydro Cleanser for Dry Skin

product_description:
使用甜美的 KORRES Lip Butter Stick SPF 15 in Purple，令双唇滋润柔软。 其神奇的天然配方非常适合干裂的唇部，所含的柑橘油可为肌肤深层补充营养，提供持久的呵护，让您拥有丝般柔滑的双唇。
这款 Lip Butter Stick SPF15 in Purple 主要含有牛油果油和向日葵蜡提取物，令唇部肌肤焕发亮丽的紫色色泽，而深层补水可令双唇更加柔软诱人！ 橘子油能调理干燥嘴唇，而 SPF15 能为最脆弱的部位提供必要防护，有助于抚平和滋养唇部。
name: Lip Butter Stick Spf15 - Purple

product_description: Nourish your skin with the DNA Replenishing Serum from Wilma Schumann, a highly concentrated treatment formulated to treat dry and damaged skin. The serum is fortified with extracts from Salmon Caviar, which is rich in essential Omega-3 to help replenish moisture levels, whilst Vitamins A and E actively help combat signs of premature aging. Suitable for daily use, you can expect immediately softer-feeling skin with the appearance of fine lines reduced.
name: Schumann DNA Replenishing Serum 30ml

product_description:
Sarah Chapman Skinesis干细胞胶原两件套，见证了肌肤改变。它是一种创新型抗老化系统，该系统的工作原理为：在四周时间内改善皮肤密度和光滑度。
持续28天的提高肌肤活力计划，将细胞再生的植物干细胞技术与胶原蛋白肽提升技术结合在一起，令肌肤饱满紧实，使肌肤再生。 其独特的分配系统可以使产品在应用前混合搅拌。将内室的粉状干细胞搅拌进富含肽的精华液中，确保最大强度和有效性。
本产品具有多种功效，可祛除皱纹，保护并修复真皮层和表皮层，使肌肤容光焕发、更有弹性。 令肌肤更光滑、更顺畅，肤色更均匀、更亮泽。 富含怡人的茉莉香味。
name: Chapman Skinesis干细胞胶原两件套

product_description:
Experience the unrivalled results of Karin Herzog's Choco2, an anti-ageing face cream enriched with antioxidant-rich Swiss Chocolate and 1.2% Oxygen to help hydrate, protect and even out skin tone.
Suitable for both sexes, and especially beneficial to those experiencing hormonal fluctuations, the cream's dose of Calcium, Magnesium and Avocado Oils synergise with Vitamins E, C and D to help defend skin against signs of ageing whilst performing a balancing and healing effect. The indulgent moisturiser with rich chocolate scent expertly boosts moisture and radiance whilst evening out the complexion.
Skin looks softer, supple and revived.
name: HERZOG CHOCO2 OXYGEN BEAUTY CREAM (50ml)

product_description:
freezeframe 去皱精华经临床证明，只需10分钟便可丰盈肌肤，消除皱纹；无需手术，便可让肌肤恢复青春。 这款去皱精华融合了3种创新技术，从肌肤深层和表层对抗皱纹。
融合了有机硅填料、Hyalurfill™ 透皮透明质酸丰盈微珠和光散射技术，协同作用，能有效填充细纹、消除皱纹并在皱纹和瑕疵表面形成模糊效果，这款精华霜是您必备的抗皱产品。K.D.
name: 去皱精华

product_description:
PAYOT 柏姿紧唇抗皱眼唇膏可有效舒缓和保护您的双唇，它是一款修复型润唇膏，让您的双唇稍带珠母般的光泽。
它可有效舒缓和滋养您的双唇，其滋养配方中蕴含有人造油脂复合物、甜杏仁、覆盆子和白芒花籽油，能够强化和修复肌肤的皮脂膜。 这款眼唇膏可舒缓紧张和不适的肌肤，保护肌肤，防止干燥和受外界侵害因素的损伤。
让您的双唇感觉更加柔软、丰盈而舒缓。
name: 柏姿紧唇抗皱眼唇膏 15ml

product_description:
配有天然成分（包括维生素 E）的Men Rock胡须油旨在滋养和滋润胡须和它下面的皮肤。 这款胡须油的灵魂版具有有趣、愉快的香味，像淡淡的古龙水和胡须 软化剂。 适合所有肌肤类型。 - E.D
- 使用前摇匀。
- 滴几滴到手上，轻轻按摩到胡须上。
- 避免接触眼睛，不要咽下。
name: Rock 胡须油 - 灵魂 (Soul)

product_description:
PAYOT 柏姿全效焕颜日霜可有效保护和滋养您的肌肤，它是一款再生日霜，可有效在睡眠期间应对肌肤衰老的迹象，同时为肌肤补充水分。
其保湿面霜采用晶亮再生抗皱复合物（Youth Process Complex），能够增强肌肤细胞的抗氧化功能，有助于肌肤在一天中因外界侵害因素而导致的损伤；其所蕴含的具有丰盈作用的透明质酸和具有美白功效的维他命 C 有助于淡化皱纹，减轻严重的色斑。
这款晚霜具有"重塑"面部轮廓的功效，其如天鹅绒般柔软的质地使其能与肌肤完全融合，旨在淡化细纹，亮泽暗沉的肌肤，让您的肌肤看起来更加年轻、更有光泽。 使肌肤恢复应有的光泽度和舒适感。 散发着淡雅的花香。
name: 柏姿全效焕颜晚霜 50ml

product_description: LIFT + MOISTURIZE™ Moisture is an ultra-hydrating Daily Cream that is more than an everyday moisturizer. It goes beyond the surface to increase elasticity and correct visible fine lines to extend skin's youthful look.Along with Cell Protection Proteins®, active ingredients include: Hyalurosmooth to plump skin and visibly reduce the appearance of wrinkles, Syniorage to enhance radiance and to firm and strengthen skin layers, plus Gransil DMAM to create a silky barrier that fills in fine lines.
name: LIFT + MOISTURIZE Daily Cream

product_description:
Fight signs of ageing with PRAI's 24K GOLD CAVIAR Wrinkle Repair Serum; a lightweight, fast-absorbing formula that works to minimise the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles.
Fortified with 24K Gold, the silky serum defends against free radicals and environmental aggressors to improve firmness and elasticity. Pea and Bamboo Extracts blend with precious PRAI Oil to restore suppleness, whilst LineFactor™ (derived from Hibiscus Seed) helps to support the skin's regeneration process. Your complexion is smooth and youthful-looking with restored luminosity.
name: 24K GOLD CAVIAR Wrinkle Repair Serum 50ml

product_description:
Treat breakout-prone skin to the Mizon Acence Blemish Spot Solution Serum, a weightless treatment that works to treat and prevent blemishes whilst hydrating the skin.
Quickly absorbing into skin, the Actnatural Formula calms and relieves blemishes and delivers anti-inflammatory and moisturising benefits to a promote clearer, healthier-looking complexion. Applied directly to areas of concern, the preventative solution will help to alleviate angry spots whilst staving off new ones.
name: Acence Blemish Spot Solution Serum 30ml

product_description:
Target wrinkles and sagging skin with the Collagen Power Lifting Ex Emulsion from Korean beauty brand Mizon.
Suitable for all skin types, the lightweight anti-ageing lotion seeks to moisturise and nourish skin with a 54% concentration of Marine Collagen, which mimics human skin cells natural molecular structure to effectively fill in the appearance of fine lines.
An advanced blend of Copper Tripeptide-1 and Palmitoyl Pentapeptide-4 work in synergy to replenish skin elasticity to visibly firm and tone, while antioxidant-rich Raspberry combats free radical damage that can lead to signs of premature ageing. Expect a replenished and younger looking complexion with a more even and refined surface.
name: Collagen Power Lifting Ex Emulsion 150ml

product_description:
Enhance the skin’s natural glow with this Super Concentrate Radiance Boosting Serum from Dr Botanicals. The facial serum aims to boost the skin’s protection during the day and skin renewal at night. Rich in vitamins, antioxidants and soothing fatty acids, the serum leaves skin soft, bright and healthy-looking.
The Super Concentrate is enriched with a range of botanical extracts including: Blackcurrant Seed Oil, which hydrates, nourishes and strengthens; Cherry Kernel Oil and Vitamins A and E, which moisturise for silky soft skin; and Chamomile Extract, which heals and protects the skin from daily irritants. – E.W.
name: Botanicals Super Concentrate Radiance Boosting Serum (30ml)

product_description:
A beauty secret adopted from Polynesian women, Thalgo's Polynesia Sacred Oil is a luxurious dry oil that intensely nourishes skin whilst leaving a subtle golden pearl shimmer.

Infused with moisturising Plant Oils, the formula melts effortlessly into skin, enhancing and beautifying to leave skin nourished, regenerated and protected. Its hydrating properties ensure your body is left soft, supple and iridescent.
name: Polynesia Sacred Oil

product_description:
Premier Model Skin眼霜自然温和，立即提拉并抚平娇嫩的眼部轮廓，呵护柔软的眼部组织，让您时刻焕发神采，精神奕奕。
Premier Model Skin眼霜富含月见草油（提供丰富的必需脂肪酸）、可提拉并抚平皮肤的海洋胶原蛋白和多糖配方，减少细纹的效果十分显著。 不含苯甲酸酯类，富含山金车花提取物，可缓解下眼部浮肿。
使用说明
name: Model Skin眼霜（15ml）

product_description:
Omorovicza藍鑽高效亮膚面霜可提亮膚色，緊緻肌膚。蘊含獨特的混合物和豐富礦物滋養成份，能深層保濕，刺激膠原蛋白的生成，抗老嫩肌，重塑肌膚健康。有助喚醒疲憊肌膚，重拾動人光采。 
 主要成分： 
 使用方法： 
每日潔面後使用。

利用 skinChemists Bee Venom Treatment Set 体验极致抗衰老功效。 放于化妆盒内，该组合套装结合三种护肤产品，加入含紧致功效的蜂毒，令肌肤更加紧致、丰盈和年轻。 - K.N.
高级Bee Venom面部精华霜 ： 
可主动紧致和丰盈肌肤，该轻质精华霜可有效保湿，同时对抗皱纹，其所含大量蜂毒可促进血液
循环并主动丰盈肌肤，减少明显皱纹，而具有保湿功效的麦卢卡蜂蜜可滋养、抚慰和软化肌肤。 帮助改善各层肌肤之间的营养输送，青春焕发精华液可亮白肤色，减少老年斑和缺陷的出现。 您将获得年轻、光滑，光彩照人的肌肤。
高级Bee Venom Duo Moisturiser  ： 
旨在焕发肌肤活力，该保湿霜既提供滋润功效，又能够防止皱纹；其蜂毒成分可增强血液循环并
主动丰盈肌肤，减少可见皱纹，而麦卢卡蜂蜜和牛油果脂可滋润、抚慰和软化肌肤。 帮助改善各层皮肤之间的营养输送，该焕发青春乳液可促进肌肤紧实，其所含透明质酸可刺激胶原蛋白的产生，获得紧致的肌肤。 肌肤获得滋补，重焕青春，肤色均匀、无油光，散发健康光泽。
 Bee Venom眼部精华霜 ： 
这款青春焕发眼部精华液结合真实蜂毒与透明质酸抵御娇嫩眼部肌肤的黑眼圈和浮肿。 眼睛更显年轻，精神十足。
name: Venom Treatment Set（价值£228.77）

product_description:
使用 Dr. Brandt's XYY Power Dose D Sunshine Vitamin Face Serum Treat您的肌肤；这是一款能够被迅速吸收的护理产品，超强保湿，同时减少细纹和皱纹的出现。
与Green Tea，葡萄籽提取物，White茶和抗氧化剂混合的强效成分能够有效对抗环境侵害因素和自由基损伤，使肌肤容光焕发，更加年轻健康。 本款精华液模拟日照效果，产生的维生素D让您拥有更加紧致和光滑的肤色。
name: Brandt XYY Power Dose D Sunshine Vitamin Face Serum 17.7ml

product_description:
Shiseido Expert Sun Aging Protection Cream 采用独特的 WetForce 水动力防护技术配方。当接触水时，防紫外线能力会增强。 这种先进的技术与 SuperVeil 360 多方位防护技术相结合，以在肌肤表面创造一层保护膜，防止因防晒霜涂抹不均匀而造成的意外损伤。 抗衰老成分 Profense Cell 可温和地为肌肤补充水分，改善干燥的肌肤，让肌肤有充足的水份。
离子矿物质感觉器含有的负离子可与水和汗液中的正离子结合，这样就形成一层防水层，即便在阳光更强的时候也能有效防止紫外线。 这款轻质的防晒乳可用于面部、身体，以在您游泳、进行体育运动和日光浴时提供防晒作用，而不会粘附沙子。 E.N. 
不含有任何刺激成分，通过了皮肤科专家的测试。
name: Wet Force Expert Sun Aging Protection Cream SPF30 (50ml)

product_description:
使用 MONUPLUS 超级夜用精华液，告别细纹、皱纹和暗沉肌肤。 这款创新的抗衰老面霜具有提拉、抚平和滋润肌肤的功效。 富含视黄醇，让肌肤瞬感清爽；除此之外，还特别添加了多种天然成分。
肌肤将重现活力，呈现年轻态。
name: 超级夜用精华液 15ml

product_description:
this works 推出的这款深度护肤黄金精华液（120ml） 添加了多种强效的天然护肤成分。
这抗皱抗氧化精华液特别添加了能够促进胶原蛋白生成的24K黄金、促进肌肤新生的鼠尾草和具有舒缓功效的芦荟和洋甘菊。 蕴含丰富的维生素A，有效减少皱纹，让肌肤恢复年轻态。
使用说明 ：使用前先摇匀，然后均匀地涂抹在身上并按摩。 避免接触眼睛。- K.R
name: works 深度护肤黄金精华液（120ml）

product_description:
Illuminate your complexion with the Rose Quartz Lifting & Firming Serum from skinChemists. The ultra-light treatment is designed to give the skin an extra boost, resulting in a vibrant and healthy looking glow. Infused with Rose Quartz, the serum buffs away dead skin cells, revealing the soft, fresh and youthful looking skin beneath. Light-reflective crystals work to illuminate the skin, boosting radiance and softening the appearance of blemishes and flaws.
Concentrated with Vitamin C, the formula also boasts anti-ageing qualities. Vitamin C stimulates to production of collagen in the skin, producing a visible lifting effect and reducing the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles, leaving a truly radiant visage.
name: Rose Quartz Lifting & Firming Serum 30ml

product_description:
Treat sensitive skin to the SASCO Eco Face Sensitive Day Cream; a mild, unscented moisturiser that works to replenish and hydrate without greasy residue.
Fortified with Organic Aloe Vera and antioxidant Vitamin E, the caring formula absorbs quickly into skin to soothe and condition, whilst defending against the damaging effects of environmental aggressors. Nourishing Sunflower and Rapeseed Oils promise to leave you with a soft, supple and rejuvenated complexion.
name: Eco Face Sensitive Day Cream 50ml

product_description:
Rejuvenate the delicate eye area with Time Bomb's Smart Balm Eye Cream; a fast-absorbing, high-performance cream that works to create an immediate, temporary tightening effect.
Fortified with Centella and Borage Oil, the anti-ageing, moisturising formula helps to boost micro-circulation and strengthen thinning skin, whilst Liquorice Extract targets dark circles and puffiness. Smoothens the appearance of crow's feet, fine lines and crepey skin for a refined eye contour.
name: Bomb Smart Balm Eye Cream 15ml

product_description:
Peter Thomas Roth抗皱晚霜是一款畅销的夜间保湿霜，其中含有包括8种有效的抗衰老活性肽和大量维生素在内的独特混合物，形成了这个具有前沿配方的超强保湿晚霜。
Clinical研究显示使用Peter Thomas Roth抗皱晚霜后，在短短的28天内可使皱纹减少72%。 畅销的肌肤护理佳品，其已申请专利的配方中结合了神经肽、维生素A、乙醇酸和维生素，可促进胶原蛋白的产生，增加肌肤的紧致度。 旨在当您熟睡时帮助细胞再生，修复日常环境造成的损坏，最大限度地减小毛孔和活化肌肤，这款超丰富的乳液在初次使用时即可明显减轻深皱纹和细纹。
使用说明：
name: Thomas Roth 抗皱晚霜 (28g)

product_description:
RMK's Skintuner Conditioning is a medicated moisturiser that works to protect skin from sensitivity caused by environmental aggressors. Formulated with active ingredients, including Niacinamide*1 and Glycyrrhizic acids*2 to calm inflammation and prevent dry, dehydrated skin as a result of seasonal temperature change.
Extracts of Soy Bean, Tilia Cordata Flower*3 and Job's Tears*4 nourish and hydrate your complexion, whilst strengthening the skin's natural barrier and replenishing moisture. Subtly fragranced with rosewood essential oil. E.N.
name: Skintuner Conditioning (150ml)

product_description:
Treat skin post-shave with AromaWorks Calming Aftershave Lotion for Men.
Infused with 13 BioActive ingredients including Mandarin and Bergamot essential oils, the hydrating formula expertly cools and calms skin; it conditions and invigorates to leave the face and neck feeling cool and looking radiant after shaving. Infused with a handsome fragrance powered by Mandarin, Bay and Cedarwood.
name: Men's Calming Aftershave Lotion 100ml

product_description: SkinChemists Advanced Lip Nutrition Repair is the perfect way to get lovely lips. Lanolin holds 400 times its weight in water once it penetrates the skin, making it an important moisturising agent. Theobroma Cacao butter is full of protective antioxidants and is known for its quality of making the skin soft and supple. The lips are protected from dryness by Cera Alba Beeswax which acts as an emulsifier to keep lips luscious and silky smooth. E.N.
name: Advanced Lip Nutrition Repair (10ml)

product_description:
伊荷深層淨化面膜可深層清潔、調理肌膚。這款面膜富含潔淨成分，令肌膚柔潤清透。 
伊荷深層淨化面膜是一款富含礦物質的泥面膜，在深層清潔的同時具有調理功效，適用於易長斑、發炎和敏感肌膚。潔淨配方可幫助清除肌膚表面的毒素，同時溫和去除死皮並柔化肌膚。雖然具有收斂功效，但不像普通泥面膜那樣乾燥，可令肌膚柔潤、豐盈、清透。 
使用說明：
name: Herbology 伊荷深层净化面膜 75ml

product_description:
Dr. Brandt 推出 PoreDermabrasion ；这是一款毛孔完善去角质膏，旨在完善和平滑您的肌肤。 富含深层穿透晶体、鱼子青柠提取物和水杨酸，这款强效磨砂霜可减少污垢、化妆品和杂质，令毛孔畅通，肌肤焕发光彩。
扁豆种提取物可强化及收紧毛孔壁，同时改善肌肤整体外观，而不会令肌肤过度干燥或出现不舒服的紧绷。 有效控制油光，减少堵塞，以尽量消除毛孔粗大并对抗暗哑，带来洁净肌肤和均匀肤色。 E.N. 
4周后*：
100％报告肌肤整体外观改善

Free from irritating fragrances or dyes, the clear gel formula contains sugar-cane extracted 3% AHA Glycolic Acid, which works to effectively dissolve dirt, oil and impurities without stripping away essential moisture to leave skin feeling soft, smooth and perfectly prepped for further skincare treatment. The multi-tasking treatment is also suitable for use on scalp to help alleviate flakes and open hair follicles.

Refresh and replenish your skin with Lancôme Masque Hydra Intense Gel Mask, a moisturising face mask enriched with Imperata Cylindrica extract, a sub-tropical plant known for its ability to resist the worst droughts.
Working to revive and energise dull, lack lustre complexions, the fresh gel mask feels soothing on application and helps to diminish the appearance of dry lines whilst nourishing, relaxing and refreshing skin. Intensely hydrating, it helps to lock in moisture and will leave the face feeling soft, supple and smooth with renewed radiance.

product_description:
The DermaTx Clarify Microdermabrasion Cream has been expertly designed to be used in conjunction with the DermaTx Microdermabrasion Face Tool, which utilises advanced micro-pulsing vibrations to deeply massage and exfoliate skin. Ideal for oily, acne prone and congested skin types.
This professional grade treatment contains ultra-refined mineral crystals to gently buff away dead skin cells and unclog pores, effectively stimulating microcirculation and cell renewal for skin that looks polished and revitalised.
An advanced blend of Salicylic Acid and Retinol-rich Vitamin A works to absorb excess sebum production and clear away impurities, while the combination of Manuka and Tea Tree Oils seek to combat bacteria and decongest skin for a clarified finish.
The advanced system is an at-home alternative to professional microdermabrasion treatments, delivering effective results to reveal a purified, refined and more even complexion with the look of breakouts and blemishes reduced.
name: Clarify Microdermabrasion Cream 75ml

當你的皮膚進入休息狀態時，來自茱莉蔻有機農場的茱莉蔻菁萃复顏晚霜能夠促進肌膚的更新和再生。富含有機甘草和黑接骨木的生命能量，有助於淡化色斑，增加肌膚的明亮感及光澤度。藥蜀葵有助於為肌膚保濕和使肌膚柔滑，金盞花有助於舒緩和鎮靜肌膚.

Replenish the complexion with the Jurlique Rose Moisture Plus Deluxe Value Set; a four-piece skincare collection that arrives with a floral cosmetic pouch. The set combines a rich moisturising cream, anti-ageing serum, softening essence and a balancing mist, which work in synergy to hydrate and nourish skin. Expect a refreshed complexion with touchably soft, supple and dewy skin.
Rose Moisture Plus Moisturising Cream (40ml)
Discover a dual action hydrator with the Rose Moisture Plus Moisturising Cream; a rich replenishing formula that provides hydration and protection. The high-performance formula envelops skin in a luxurious veil of immediate and long-lasting moisture, which eliminates areas of dryness, whilst softening and soothing the complexion. Utilising an antioxidant complex, the rose lotion fights also free radical damage to ensure skin appears radiant, youthful and healthy. Effortlessly absorbing into the visage, the lotion leaves skin comfortably hydrated, smooth and balanced.
Herbal Recovery Advanced Serum (30ml)
Dramatically improve the appearance and texture of your skin with Herbal Recovery Advanced Serum. Helping to minimise the signs of ageing, this multi-tasking serum targets fine lines, increases elasticity, enhances radiance and boosts hydration, leaving your skin soft and supple. Formulated with Jurlique's exclusive Naturadiance PB18+ complex which delivers antioxidant protection to revitalise the skin and encourage its natural recovery cycle, it also contains natural extracts which smooth, regenerate and shield your skin against environmental aggressors.
Activating Water Essence (10ml)
Soften and revitalise skin with the Activating Water Essence. An essential step in every skincare ritual, the formula works to continuously soften and revitalise skin. Rich in Marshmellow Root extract, Activating Water Essence prepares skin in order to benefit most from your serum and moisturiser.
Rosewater Balancing Mist (30ml)
Stay fresh-faced and fancy free with the Rosewater Balancing Mist, the only mist that rebalances and rejuvenates the skin in one, fresh and friendly sensation. Providing the perfect little lift, the mystical mist contains Aloe Vera and Rose, renowned for their healthy healing properties, whilst Glycerin and Marshmallow work in synergy to provide a refreshing boost to the skins natural hydration system.
name: Rose Moisture Plus Deluxe Value Set (Worth £89)

product_description:
The men-ü D-Tox Facial Essentials Kit combines a duo of must-have skincare products for men. Men have more active sebaceous glands which results in more sebum and more oil. Combat this with a deep cleaning facial wash and absorbent face mask. Expect soft, revitalised and decongested skin.
Healthy Facial Wash (15ml):
Soap free and pH balanced, this deep cleansing facial wash is ideal for pre and post shave when your skin is most vulnerable. Fortified with antiseptic Tea Tree Oil, Witch Hazel and Aloe Vera, the refreshing blend helps to protect from spots and shaving irritation, whilst soothing and controlling excess grease. Working into a discreet lather, the cleanser will leave your face highly moisturised and free from irritation.
D-Tox ‘Deep Clean’ Clay Mask (15ml):
A fast drying, deep cleaning face mask that works to remove impurities and control excess oil, impurities and dead skin. Its unique formula contains powerful ingredients, including Kaolin Clay, Witch Hazel and Zinc Oxide to exfoliate and decongest clogged pores, revealing healthy-looking skin. Suitable for normal, combination and oily skin, the absorbent mask performs a deep clean to leave skin smoother and firmer looking.

因其清新、天鹅绒般的质地，涂在娇嫩的眼部区域会令您感到很舒适。

使用MONU 保濕面膜可使肌膚柔軟滋潤。此面膜營養豐富，含蜂王漿、月見草油和杏核油，可保持證肌膚柔軟，每週使用2-3 次最佳。 KD

product_description:
The GLOV On-The-Go Hydro Cleanser is an effortless, efficient and simple way to cleanse skin without the need for a cleanser, perfect for travel or as an everyday solution.  
Utilising advanced microtechnology, the cleansing glove contains refined, star-shaped fibres up to 30 times thinner than a cotton pad, which boast superior electrostatic properties to absorb makeup, dirt and excess oil like a magnet.
Suitable for every skin type and contact lens wearers, the delicate and naturally antibacterial glove delivers a light yet effective clean with a gentle peeling effect to unveil skin that feels fresher and revitalised. Simply use the make up removing tool with water for an instantly purified and smooth complexion.

L’Oreal Triple Active 日霜适合干性/敏感型皮肤，富含甘油、维生素E和紫外线过滤成分。 ceramide和维生素B5能够为肌肤提供保护，同时滋润并清洁肌肤，而且清爽不油腻。 每天使用可以素颜，提亮肤色，让肌肤呈现年轻活力。

LieracLiftissime轮廓重塑面霜，是一款舒缓的保湿霜，可重塑面部轮廓，同时滋润干性皮肤。
本产品是该品牌抗衰老系列的一种，可作为日霜和晚霜使用。内含细胞合成物及玻尿酸，可提升肌肤功效，使肌肤再平衡，减少可见皱纹。
产品为橙色色调，其质地为活性熔融型，包含康多尔花提取物等，令肌肤舒适、光滑柔软。 您将拥有超滋润的肌肤、脸部轮廓得到重塑。

JASON Ester-C Anti-Aging Moisturiser 由葵花子油、维生素 E 和 B5、洋甘菊、芦荟叶凝胶的混合物制作而成，适合在白天和晚上，或在皮肤感觉干燥的任何时候使用。 皮肤会明显变得柔滑而有光泽。

product_description: 使用 Elizabeth Arden PREVAGE® Anti-aging Neck and Décolleté Firm & Repair Cream，令时光倒流，防止衰老。 这款乳霜拥有奢华配方，含先进的艾地苯技术和蛋白恢复合成物，能够帮助改善颈部和肩部敏感肌肤。 这款抗衰老霜能够实现快速调节效果，深层水润肌肤，经常使用可减少衰老迹象，如黑斑和晒伤。 – I.M

利用Pai的Kukui 和Jojoba Skin Brightening磨砂膏柔和抛光肌肤。 该奢华霜膏转变为柔滑乳液，其微球去角质系统可去除鳞片、污垢和多余油脂，而不破坏肌肤细胞。 天然荷荷巴微珠在肌肤上微妙滚动，以疏通毛孔，同时欧米伽3和6成分可锁住水分。
该滋补霜膏富含具有异国情调的夏威夷油Kukui，可清洗杂质，获得明亮、清爽肌肤，并改善肤质和光滑度。 维生素A、D和E提供深层保湿以柔化肌肤。 该磨砂膏适用于敏感肌肤、红肿、湿疹和痤疮，可舒缓和镇静肌肤，令肌肤持久舒适。

product_description:
Perfect the complexion with the DECLÉOR Hydra Floral White Petal Targeted Dark Spots Skincare Treatment; a potent cream that combats areas of hyperpigmentation, dark spots and blemishes.
Precisely targeting areas of concern, the treatment is enriched with a potent blend of Roman Chamomile, Chamaemelum Nobile and Pea Extract, which is able to reduce the appearance of dark spots and skin blemishes to leave the visage clear and uniform.
Complete with an ultra-fine texture, the formula helps reveal a visibly even, smooth and radiant complexion.
name: Hydra Floral White Petal Targeted Dark Spots Skincare Treatment

product_description:
Target early signs of ageing with the bareMinerals Brilliant Future Age Defense and Renew Serum, a nourishing, triple action formula that helps combat first signs of ageing whilst renewing radiance and fighting environmental aggressors.
Promoting a radiant and youthful-looking complexion, the serum combines Magnanese, Vitamin C and extract of Chai Hu with a host of other high performance ingredients to help reduce the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles, replenish moisture and reignite skin's natural luminosity. Its protective and strengthening properties help support the skin's natural barrier function whilst re-energising the complexion and fending off external factors. After use, skin feels soft, supple, rehydrated and protected from everyday stresses.
name: Brilliant Future Age Defense and Renew Serum 30ml

product_description:
本款終極抗衰老煥膚霜不用激光或脫皮，即可實現驚人的煥膚效果！本品是強效但溫和的日用霜，提供煥膚技術的最新成果。 
肌膚表面累積的過多死細胞會讓肌膚變得暗淡、粗糙和長斑，讓人看起來比實際年齡老。本品蘊含豐富的果酸，可促進肌膚再生，細化肌膚紋理，讓肌膚具有新生光澤。 
加上乙醇酸、乳酸和水楊酸的協同作用，確保極致的煥膚效果。結合AHA 和BHA 的剝落作用，鬆開將死皮捆綁在角質層的“粘合劑”，加速此皮層的脫落。 
適合所有肌膚類型，尤其適合衰老、乾燥和油膩的肌膚類型。對於油膩膚質，其中的水楊酸可以減少黑頭和脂肪粒，改善表面瑕疵，同時疏通堵塞的毛孔，滲透肌膚表層，提供出色的煥膚效果，縮小毛孔，改善肌膚紋理和膚色，展現更年輕更健康的肌膚。 
使用本品數天即可開始感覺到膚色更年輕，更加水潤光澤。大約3-6 周可以看到皺紋深度、痤瘡疤和色素沉著過度部位有改善。 12 週內，應該可以感覺到肌膚明顯更緊緻更柔滑，具有新生光澤。 
使用說明：
name: Doctors 皮肤医生果酸焕肤霜 50ml

product_description: 本品提供多元酚的治療優勢，讓肌膚柔軟、舒爽，清潔補分，沒有殘餘物。有效去除污垢、油脂和化妝品，決不損失肌膚的自然油脂，或者讓臉部乾燥或緊繃。舒緩、滋潤和舒爽，使肌膚像嬰兒般柔軟。 - SC

product_description:
Magnitone London推出的这款The Stimulator Lift and Tone Massage Head质地柔软，按摩珠为无孔橡胶硅树脂材质，有效促进肌肤活动。

可与Magnitone所有洁面产品搭配使用。 该按摩头无需更换。

product_description:
HealGel 眼霜是一款先进的修正配方，旨在护理和提升娇嫩的眼部区域，同时减少黑眼圈和浮肿。 它还可以充当彩妆的完美底霜，是一款必备之物。
它包含一个双效透明质酸复合物，可将水分锁定在肌肤深处，同时令眼部轮廓变得紧致，而其他胶原蛋白激活有效成分（如具有强大肽和生物因素的脂质体）可以舒缓肌肤。 其效果是通过密集补水可以软化细纹、令肤色变得均匀、增加肌肤弹性。 K.D.

product_description:
Elizabeth Arden Ceramide Lift & Firm Night Cream 拥有长效配方，可恢复肌肤的天然保护屏障。 其具备新型细胞丰盈工艺和先进的保湿成分。
Elizabeth Arden Ceramide Plump Perfect Ultra Night Repair Moisture Cream 可提供深层保湿与抗衰老功效，恢复和柔化肌肤。 这种有针对性的长效配方为最需要水分的部位提供持续数小时的保湿功效；而强效的神经酰胺成分和抗氧化剂（包括维生素 C 和 E）有助于肌肤修复日间受损。
name: Arden Ceramide Lift & Firm Night Cream (50ml)

product_description:
这款 NUXE Reve De Miel Ultra Comfortable Face Cream 令干性和敏感型肌肤保持舒适。 含野生水果精油，包括覆盆子和蔓越莓、向日葵和芒果油，丰富肌肤天然油脂。
NUXE Reve De Miel Ultra Comfortable Face Cream for Dry and Sensitive Skin 配方含以舒缓特性著称的奥古曼树脂精华和植物复合精华，以及冷杉蜜，以修复肌肤微表面。 深层滋养干燥敏感肌肤，重获舒适感，同时缓解刺激和紧绷感，消除红脸蛋和粗糙感。干燥肌肤全年使用，一般肌肤深冬使用。
使用说明：
name: Reve De Miel - Ultra Comfortable Face Cream For Dry And Sensitive Skin (50ml)

product_description:
Target signs of ageing whilst you sleep with the Filorga Skin-Absolute Night Cream; an innovative anti-ageing treatment. Boasting a luxurious, black formula, the night cream effortlessly melts into skin and treats it to a blend of intelligent, anti-ageing technology.
Brown Seaweed and Meteorite extract combine to help regenerate skin cells at night, whilst a Botox-like active works to reduce the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles to leave the complexion smooth and youthful. Hydrating Hyaluronic Acid and a potent collagen peptide work in synergy to ensure skin is visibly firm with improved elasticity.
A brightening active tackles dark spots by visibly reducing their size and intensity, whilst Vitamin C reveals an even and uniform complexion. Expect to wake to radiant skin that is nourished and youthful.
name: Skin-Absolute Night Cream 50ml

product_description:
Soothe and nourish delicate skin with the Sensitive Cleansing Set from Erno Laszlo, a duo of skincare treatments expertly formulated with advanced technologies, antioxidants and essential vitamins to create a bespoke regime.
When combined, the cleansing oil and bar create a purifying mask that effectively sweeps away dirt, oil and impurities from pores. Suitable for daily use, the duo leave skin feeling calm, softened and superiorly clean.
Sensitive Cleansing Oil (60ml)
Lightweight and non-greasy, the gentle cleanser aims to eliminate dirt, oil and impurities at the same time as penetrating the skin’s surface and enhancing its texture without causing irritation or inflammation. It’s rich in essential fatty acids that work to reduce redness and stimulate cell regeneration, whilst Almond Oil provides deep moisturising properties to combat dryness.
Sensitive Cleansing Bar (50g)
Perfect for delicate and sensitive skin, the mild soap bar provides gentle yet effective cleansing without drying skin or stripping away essential moisture. It’s enriched with soothing Chamomile, which is renowned for its anti-inflammatory and antibacterial properties to reduce redness and even tone, whilst extracts of Calendula Officinalis Flower and Green Tea are natural anti-oxidants that work to protect skin from free radical damage and harmful pollutants.
Timeless Skin Serum Sample (2ml)
The Timeless Skin Serum works to restore, stimulate and lift skin for a noticeably younger look. It contains Pomegranate and Vitamins B, C and E repair and hydrate, whilst Yeast Extract, Glycosaminoglycans and Dermaxyl prevent collagen destruction. Skin will be left looking and feeling years younger with its elasticity improved and smoothness increased.
name: Laszlo Sensitive Skin Cleansing Set

product_description:
Dr. Brandt 推出氧气面膜 ，这是一款屡获殊荣、在家使用的护理产品，能够提供专业效果。 其创新配方加入脂质体微氧球，以促进循环和氧气吸收，同时活化疲惫、黯淡肌肤，令其充满活力，重新能够呼吸。
富含辣木籽提取物，该面膜可保护肌肤免受环境侵害，深层渗透以净化和修复肌肤，令肌肤更加亮白，得到修复，散发健康光泽。 肌肤焕发光采并获得再生，您将获得清新舒爽、恢复活力和滋润保湿的肌肤。 E.N.
name: Brandt氧气面膜（40ml）

product_description:
Target blemishes with the Skinesis Spot SOS Sticker from Sarah Chapman; an innovative, virtually invisible patch that works to decongest and soothe the affected area for a rapid recovery.
Suitable for all skin types, ages and genders, the completely transparent sticker is easily applied, creating a hygienic, protective shield that helps prevent you from touching and picking at spots. Each patch is infused with a concentrated dosage of skin-perfecting actives; Salicylic Acid effectively decongests and exfoliates, unclogging the affected pores, while P-Refinyl® reduces excess sebum production.
Vitamin C combats free radical damage and helps discourage dark marks, plus a soothing blend of Grape Seed and Soy Oils seek to balance moisture levels. Sytenol® efficiently calms irritation, inflammation and redness.
Ideal for breakout prone, oily skin, the ingenious spot stickers are an effective, easy and quick method of minimising and preventing blemishes for a clear and confident complexion. Presented with a chic, portable carry case to stash in your bag for on-the-go spot treatment. Suitable for use beneath makeup.
name: Chapman Skinesis Spot SOS Sticker - 20 Stickers

product_description:
Regain a youthful glow with Zelens Z Luminous Brightening Serum, a powerful formula that promotes a radiant complexion with a more even skin tone.
Infused with a host of potent ingredients, including Hyaluronic Acid, Pearl and Niacinamide, the antioxidant-rich serum melts effortlessly into skin, targeting dark spots and discolouration to leave the complexion clearer, brighter and younger-looking. Its refining properties improve skin's texture to visibly brighten, smoothen and hydrate skin.
name: Z Luminous Brightening Serum 30ml

product_description:
Recipe for Men - 去油保湿霜 75ml 
这款活肤凝胶采用革命性微珠系统，瞬间去除油性和混合型肌肤的油光，重现自然肤色。 光滑的超细粉末颗粒能够通过双向物理和光学功效减少肌肤油光：吸收多余的皮脂并减少反射。 植物提取物能够滋润并增加皮肤弹性，让肌肤紧实，散发青春魅力。
name: for Men - 去油保湿霜 75ml

product_description: Institut Esthederm 雅诗敦美黑防护身体喷雾为您的肌肤接触温和阳光做好准备。 这款褐色喷雾是一款快干型喷雾，可帮助肌肤更好地适应阳光的刺激，还可激活肌肤自然的黑色素的形成，以加深肤色。 这款创新型的身体喷雾可有效保护肌肤免受长波紫外线/中波紫外线的损伤和预防光照衰老。 非常适合容易感觉不适和很少感觉不适的褐色肌肤。

product_description:
Menage的抗疲劳眼部滚珠霜迅速被肌肤吸收，令疲倦的眼睛瞬间活力四射。 富含振奋精神的咖啡因以唤醒肌肤，同时减少细纹、黑眼圈和眼袋，展现精神焕发、活力十足的形象。
其独特的滚珠涂抹器的温度和压力可减少浮肿并带来冰凉感觉，令眼部得到抚慰和凉爽，而且大量该品牌强效铜PCA抗氧化剂可抵御自由基损伤，令眼睛重焕光彩，尽显青春亮丽。 E.N.
这款活肌抗皱保湿霜（50ml）是一款多效合一的终极保湿霜，它能够有效滋润肌肤，淡化皱纹，减少细纹再生。 采用创新的 Trylacel 技术，为肌肤提供重要的抗氧化成分，帮助舒缓肌肤，对抗自由基。 这款润肤霜能有效淡化肌肤色素沉着，富含白藜芦醇、咖啡浆果、阿萨伊和葡萄籽精华，为肌肤提供最好的保护，保持水润亮泽。 这款保湿霜是您不可或缺的护肤产品。 K.D.

product_description:
Purify and refresh your complexion with the Skin79 Jeju Sandorong Seaweed Jelly Mask; a revitalising treatment that works to cool, soothe and cleanse skin.
Fortified with Hijiki Seaweed and Red Algae, the face mask gently draws out dirt and impurities, whilst eliminating toxins and excess sebum to reveal a smoother, more refined complexion. Skin is rebalanced and rejuvenated after use.

Diminish all traces of make-up with Pestle & Mortar Erase Cleansing Balm; a lightweight, non-greasy formula that promises to purify and refresh skin without over-drying.
Infused with Pumpkin Enzymes, the luxurious cleanser expertly eliminates even the most stubborn eye make-up, whilst cold-pressed Meadowfoam, Prickly Pear Seed and Grape Seed Oils nourish and protect against free radical damage. Packed with vitamins, antioxidants and omega fatty acids, you can expect calm, balanced and rejuvenated skin after use.

product_description:
Ole Henriksen Nurture Me Crème is a soothing moisturiser that cushions the skin with nourishing vitamins and helps calm, protect and hydrate sensitive complexions whilst guarding the skin from environmental damage and strengthening natural defences.
Ideal for normal and sensitive skin types, Ole Henriksen Nurture Me Crème uses targeted ingredients like dimethicone to hydrate and bind moisture to the skin. Calming and soothing with evening primrose, this daily moisturiser is formulated with chamomile extract to improve the health of your skin, vitamins A, C, E and K to nourish and protect and wheat germ oil to regenerate and repair with powerful antioxidants.
Directions of use:
name: Henriksen Nurture Me Creme (50g)

Relax hard working hands with the Nourish, Breathe & Sleep Hand Balm from NEOM’s Scent To Sleep™ collection. Designed to hydrate fatigued hands, the nourishing balm leaves skin ultra-soft, whilst boasting an aromatic scent.
The luxurious hand cream comprises a natural fragrance that combines pure essential oils. Enriched with a blend of English Lavender, Sweet Basil and Jasmine, the skin-loving formula envelops skin in a calming aroma to help you to relax and prepare for sleep. Expect smooth and comfortable hands.

product_description:
Catering specifically for dry skin, the yes to Coconut Ultra Hydrating Cream Cleanser gently refreshes your complexion without over-drying or uncomfortable tightness.
Harnessing the powers of Virgin Coconut Oil, the delicate formula effortlessly dissolves dirt, make-up and impurities, whilst nourishing Avocado and Chia Seed (rich in omega 3) soften and condition skin. Expect a clean, clear and replenished complexion after use.

product_description:
Soothe irritated and blemish prone skin with the Behind The Scenes™ Coconut Bio-Cellulose Balancing Face Mask from STARSKIN. The Coconut infused mask contours close to the face and is designed with a powerful serum complex to restore flawlessness, smoothness and radiance to irritated skin types. Rich in skin balancing Vitamins and hydrating Coconut juice, the treatment visibly purifies, refines the complexion and eliminates the appearance of blemishes.
Chamomile and Heartleaf work in synergy to alleviate redness and visible pores by rejuvenating and renewing the skin, resulting in a calmer complexion. The face mask is drenched in a unique, high performance serum which leaves the skin looking incredibly fresh faced.
name: Behind The Scenes™ Coconut Bio-Cellulose Balancing Face Mask

product_description:
Lancer Skincare present The Method: Polish & Glow: a three-step regime that works to refine, refresh and hydrate your complexion. Combining a gentle exfoliator, lightly-foaming cleanser and nourishing moisturiser, you can expect a younger-looking, smoother appearance with enhanced radiance.
Lancer Skincare The Method: Polish (120g)
A gentle skin-resurfacing treatment formulated to improve skin tone and texture. Pure minerals are combined with magnesium oxide and sodium bicarbonate crystals to exfoliate the skin's surface, combating dullness, removing the build-up of debris and stimulating cell renewal for a refreshed, youthful-looking complexion. Fortified with pumpkin and pomegranate extracts, the anti-ageing polish works to break down dead skin cells, whilst brown sea algae replenishes moisture and boosts collagen production to reveal a smooth, supple complexion and healthy glow.
Lancer Skincare The Method: Cleanser (50ml)
A gentle, foaming cleanser formulated to eliminate debris and daily impurities, preparing skin for the application of further skincare products. Its rice amino acid complex is combined with hydrating and soothing ingredients to reveal a soft, smooth complexion and improved skin tone, without over-drying or uncomfortable tightness. Aloe vera stimulates cell renewal, whilst sodium PCA retains moisture to restore a healthy-looking glow.
Lancer Skincare The Method: Nourish Moisturiser (7ml)
An anti-ageing moisturiser that utilises an oxygen-boosting complex to enhance the diffusion of oxygen and enrich the skin. Deeply hydrating, the treatment enhances the skin's ability to retain moisture, boosting cell metabolism and collagen production for a healthy, youthful glow. Its blend of beneficial peptides expertly decrease wrinkle depth and improve cell function, so skin looks smooth, supple and healthy. Expect nourished skin with renewed radiance.
name: METHOD:磨砂&提亮套装（价值¥1000）

product_description:
Minimise the appearance of pores with the ALGENIST Multi-Perfecting Pore Corrector Concentrate; an oil-free formula with a unique lightweight texture.
The resurfacing serum is fortified with Alguronic Acid, Salicylic Acid and Oligosaccharides, which work in synergy to target enlarged pores. Redefining skin’s texture, the concentrate visibly reduces and tightens pores, as well as smoothing any roughess.
The skin perfecting formula also combats uneven skin tone to leave the visage flawless, uniform and radiant.
name: Multi-Perfecting Pore Corrector Concentrate 30ml

product_description:
利用来自NUXE的Splendieuse Anti Dark Spot护肤霜SPF 20平衡肌肤，这款具有防紫外线功效的恢复配方，可滋养干燥的肌肤，同时均匀肤色并减少黑斑及色素沉着。
该护肤霜具有丰润、抚慰质地，结合珍贵的花卉分子和维生素C，可明显消减黑斑大小和颜色，同时预防新黑斑出现。 干燥、缺乏滋润的肌肤将变得美白亮丽、容光焕发、肤色均匀。 对肌肤无油腻效果。 - K.N.
name: Splendieuse Anti Dark Spot 暗色肌肤润肤霜SPF 20 (50ml)

product_description:
Magnitone London presents The Clean Sweep Skin Brush for Men, a powerful gadget that delivers a deep pore-cleansing action for clear, resilient, stronger skin. Engineered by men specifically for men, it works to effectively exfoliate the skin's surface – even under facial hair – to eliminate excess oil, dead skin cells, dirt and impurities, to get your skin in shape.
The HydroPRO brush head works to lift stubble and detangle beards, helping to prevent ingrown hairs for a smoother shave. The innovative, double award-winning Vibra-Sonic™ Technology combines energising sonic oscillations and pulsed vibrations, to deep cleanse and boost micro-circulation for fresh, purified, conditioned skin. With a completely waterproof design, the brush features 2 speeds for a customised powerful skin workout in just 30 seconds a day.
Why do you need The Clean Sweep? If you live in the city, invisible micro-pollutants get trapped in your pores, causing breakouts, dull and dry or irritated skin. The Clean Sweep is 5x more effective at washing your face than your hands, removing the daily grime you can’t see.
Increasing blood flow to skin makes it healthier, stronger and more resilient, just like muscles after a workout. After 28 days of using The Clean Sweep, 100% of users felt they had better blood circulation*.
name: London The Clean Sweep Skin Brush for Men - Dark Grey

product_description:
Target signs of ageing with the ALGENIST Power Advanced Wrinkle Fighter Moisturiser; a lightweight, innovative formula that utilises high-quality, effective ingredients to restore the skin's firmness and elasticity.
Synergising breakthrough AlgaProtein and the brand's patented Alguronic Acid, the fast-absorbing emulsion delivers intense moisture and hydration to support the skin's ability to regenerate and recharge, allowing it to appear firm, plump and youthful-looking. Helps to minimise the appearance of deep wrinkles, whilst improving overall texture to reveal a smoother, more refined complexion.
name: Power Advanced Wrinkle Fighter Moisturiser 60ml

product_description:
作为一款创新的360度眼霜，L’Oreal Revitalift For Eyes可在短短两周内减少眼部浮肿和细纹。 该护理配方旨在作用于眼部周围，以减少眼袋，令眼睛焕发光彩。
要让眼部周围鲜嫩、富有弹性的肌肤24小时保持光滑柔顺和水嫩滋润，可尝试L’Oreal Revitalift For Eyes。 亲弹性蛋白和弹性纤维的独特混合重塑肌肤表面，令最敏感部位肌肤紧致、强健。

product_description:
富含活性矿物质，蕴含澳洲黏泥的滋养混合成分，洁肤活肤效果极佳。 这款面膜适合所有肤质。
一款深层清洁面膜，蕴含精油和黏泥，能有效吸收多余油脂，去除污垢，令肌肤柔软、洁净、焕现健康光泽。它在吸收污垢的同时其皂土成分还能帮助预防暗疮。 这款面膜能帮助疏通及收敛毛孔、复原疲劳肌肤以及改善肌肤的紧致度和肌理。同时，由熏衣草、花梨木、天竺葵和橙花制成的纯精油能温和地滋润、滋养和舒缓肌肤。 这款面膜非常适合油性肌肤及有暗疮的皮肤使用。

product_description:
Elemis 艾丽美深层滋润面膜可深层滋润您的肌肤；补水配方可有效改善暗沉干燥的肌肤。 这款奢华的面膜霜含有含羞草和蜂蜜的混合物，可舒缓、净化肌肤，让疲劳的肌肤重焕活力，提亮肤色，改善肤质。
适合敏感肌肤，圣彼得草可保护肌肤的自然锁水层，香柠檬具有抗菌作用，可有效防止肌肤过于干燥。 适合作为每周焕活面膜或作为夜间强效补水护理，让您获得梦寐以求的柔软、丰盈和水润，让您看起来更年轻。 还可用于身体干燥的位置，包括手、脚、肘部和膝盖。 E.N.

product_description:
Chantecaille修复乳液（木兰、茉莉花、百合花），用以舒缓放松干燥的受损肌肤。 这款保湿霜富含滋补型天然植物成分和人体必需的维生素等。可减少肌肤明显红肿、使肤色更均匀、抚平肌肤细纹。
采用芳香疗法，内含玫瑰和玉兰芬芳怡人的提取物，可提高人的幸福感、使人身心放松。 木兰活力聚合物包含了从玉兰树的树皮上提取的两种强效舒缓成分，可减少肌肤皱纹，使肌肤丰满充盈、更年轻靓丽。
CelluSoothe，受中国传统医学的启发，它融合日本金银花、苍耳子粉末、香附子等成分，具有舒缓抗氧特性；白百合球茎，用以滋润肌肤，使肌肤柔软细嫩。 适合所有肌肤类型，尤其适用于闪亮放松的肌肤。

product_description:
使用 Elizabeth Arden 抗衰老晚霜，滋养肌肤，在您睡眠时抵抗明显的衰老痕迹。 采用先进的技术艾地苯技术配方而成，提供强大的环境保护，同时，广谱防晒保护屏可以防止皮肤受到破坏性的 UVA / UVB 光线的损伤。
细纹、皱纹和变色将明显减少，让您的肤色更亮丽、更均匀、更显年轻。 此款面霜是完美的多功能产品，提高皮肤弹性，给肌肤以紧致的外观和感受。 使用说明：每晚将滋润霜涂抹在清洁的面部和颈部。

使用Elizabeth Arden 伊丽莎白·雅顿PREVAGE眼部高级抗衰老精华液可消除黑眼圈，细纹和皱纹。 含有艾地苯醌，被证明可以拉紧眼部肌肤并调整其周围的肤色，这款丰富的精华液可支撑皮肤的天然胶原蛋白，有利于明亮双眼，更加提升外观。

溫度療法是改善眼周細緻肌膚外觀的最有效方法。本品立即活化肌膚，淡化黑眼圈。 
使用十五分鍾立即活化肌膚，同時淡化黑眼圈、浮腫和鬆弛的肌膚。本品可改善眼部護膚品（例如眼部急救配方）的吸收，幫助鎖住水份和營養素。

product_description:
First Aid Beauty 急救美人保湿修复纯矿物质防晒乳 SPF40 可有效保护肌肤免受长波紫外线和短波紫外线的损伤，它可快速渗透到肌肤深层，有效防止因日光暴晒而引起的损伤。
其轻质丝滑的配方中含有二氧化钛和氧化锌（这些纯天然矿物质可有效抵御光老化和紫外线），可安全用于所有家庭成员，适合从头到脚的全身应用。
所蕴涵的胶态燕麦蛋白可有效应对肌肤瘙痒和干燥问题，为肌肤提供持久的舒适感，而具有软化功能的乳油木果脂和白芒花籽油具有软化肌肤、补充水分和增强肌肤抵抗能力的功效。 这款防晒乳含有该品牌独特的抗氧化剂，将甘草粉、野甘菊和白茶与自由基相结合，可为极其敏感的肌肤补充营养，具有舒缓肌肤的功效，而不会带给肌肤粘着、油腻的感觉，也不会在肌肤表面形成白色残留物。
name: Aid Beauty 急救美人保湿修复纯矿物质防晒乳 SPF40 56.7g

product_description: 这款革命性的护肤技术适合面部、颈部和肩部，它蕴含的艾地苯醌被证明是名贵护肤品中最强大的抗氧化剂，可产生最有效、最显著的抗衰老效果。 艾地苯醌的增强技术以及额外的抗氧化混合物可以增加益处，使护肤效果显而易见。  日常使用，这款高浓度精华液可为肌肤提供抗氧化保护。

product_description:
清新、洁净的肌肤由此而生。 一款用于深层净化的低发泡凝胶，非常适合油性肌肤和混合性肌肤，中性pH值为肌肤提供天然保湿。
天然肌肤净化器，有效控制油光。 蕴含的天竺葵可亮肤提色，焕活注能；葡萄籽则可净化保护肌肤；本品非常适合油性和混合性肤质使用。

product_description:
Treat your skin to the small but mighty Save Ya Own Skin Moisturiser from Mr Natty.
Utilising 100% natural ingredients (so it's safe for sensitive skin), the hydrating formula combines shea butter with olive oil and beeswax (a natural anti-allergenic) to nourish, soothe and relieve itchy, dry skin. Its anti-inflammatory properties help calm nicks after shaving and leave skin feeling soft, moisturised and conditioned. Infused with patchouli and bergamot oil to create a zesty, woody scent.
name: Natty Save Ya Own Skin Moisturiser 30g

product_description:
The Lifting Collagen Mask from MAGICSTRIPES offers the look of a facelift without the expense of surgery. The cooling mask is designed to visibly lift, tighten and define the lower half of the face.
Soaked with an effective blend of Collagen, Caffeine and Vitamins C and E, the mask works to visibly form and tighten the skin around the jaw and chin. The mask also aims to strengthen the skin in this area, resulting in a more defined facial contour and a youthful appearance. In addition to the cocktail of ingredients, use of a mask mirrors the qualities of a facial massage, popular for stimulating blood circulation and visibly tightening the skin.
name: Lifting Collagen Mask x 5 Sachets

product_description:
Green People Vita Min Fix 含有月见草、鳄梨和海藻，是中性、干性和疲惫肌肤的 24 小时解决方案。 各种维生素、矿物质和抗氧化剂令肌肤完美再生和滋养。
Green People Vita Min Fix 可促进新的肌肤细胞生成，赋予细腻、自然的香味，再生和滋养肌肤。 经有机认证且不含苯甲酸酯类、羊毛脂和着色剂，是大自然能提供的最纯净的保湿霜。
Green People 使用非空运的可回收包装。 产品只含有少量手工制作的纯天然有机成分，确保收到产品时尽可能新鲜。 本品也适用于严格素食者和素食主义者。
使用说明：
name: People Vita Min Fix (50ml)

product_description:
Reveal youthful skin with the MAGICSTRIPES Chin & Cheek Lifting Mask; an innovative, single use mask, which is designed to visibly reduce fine lines at the cheek and chin area.
The elastic, hydrogel mask not only provides skin with a cocktail of anti-ageing ingredients, but provides an essential boost that works to visibly tighten and lift loose skin. The lifting effect mirrors a stimulating facial massage, activating the natural blood circulation in the face and therefore promoting the absorption of the effective ingredients.
Working in just 40 minutes, the mask is able to reveal improvements in elasticity and skin that is supple and smooth.
name: Chin & Cheek Lifting Mask (1 Mask)

product_description:
Dr. Hauschka 透亮古铜光泽肌肤护理精油将带给您健康阳光肌肤。 这款质地轻盈的矿物油能够缓解肌肤瑕疵和缺陷，均匀肤色，焕发迷人亮泽。
特别添加了具有舒缓功效的橄榄油和蜂蜡，滋润肌肤；富含具有爽肤功效的疗伤绒毛花和金缕梅，紧实并强韧肌肤。 这款多功能的精油可以单独使用，也可以混合身体保湿霜和防晒霜使用，带给您古铜色的肌肤。 - L.M.
name: Hauschka 透亮古铜光泽肌肤护理精油 30ml

product_description: 使用 this works 去皱保湿晚霜（48ml），消除倦容痕迹。 这款超滋润的晚霜采用天然成分，让您在睡眠中修复肌肤。 面霜有助于滋润肌肤，让肌肤变得丰盈，更好地迎接明天。 - SA
name: works 去皱保湿晚霜（48ml）

product_description:
James Read 活性酶美黑去角质面膜 ，使肌肤为完美棕​​褐色做好准备。去角质配方，使肌肤光滑水润。
本款产品尤其适用于涂抹美黑产品之前或之后使用。，可轻柔去角质，为肌肤上好底妆，打造光滑完美的肌肤表面，使肤色均匀。 美黑后使用本品，光滑均匀的美黑肤色将会持续时间更长。 适合于所有皮肤类型。

product_description:
这款活性闪亮精华液，使肌肤焕发自然光采、洁净靓丽。采用弹性-C™ （极新的维生素C技术）技术，为肌肤提供50X，普通外用维生素C，使胶原蛋白再生、肌肤亮白、保护肌肤细胞。 使肌肤富有弹性、焕发光泽、保护修复肌肤免遭紫外线辐射。 。
每天洁面及爽肤后，涂抹一薄层于脸部、颈部和肩部，然后进行按摩。 为了达到最佳效果，等待1分钟，使肌肤最大量吸收本品后，再涂抹Murad保湿防晒霜。
水（水族）、乙醇酸、丁二醇、丙烯酸羟乙酯/钠丙烯酰牛磺酸钠、环戊硅氧烷、聚二甲基硅氧烷交联聚合物、油茶叶提取物、燕麦（燕麦）内核提取物、甘油、棕榈酰三肽-5、水解香桃木叶提取物、Enantia Chlorantha树皮提取物、齐墩果酸、ECTOIN、抗坏血酸磷酸钠、葡萄糖酸锌、维生素E醋酸酯、生物素、甘露醇、壳聚糖抗坏血酸、甘草酸钾、棕榈酸乙基己、石英二硅烷化、透明质酸钠、Tetrahexyldecyl抗坏血酸、PCA钠、甜菜碱、山梨糖醇、甘氨酸、丙氨酸、脯氨酸、丝氨酸、苏氨酸、精氨酸、赖氨酸、谷氨酸、甲基二异丙基丙酰胺、乙基薄荷酰胺、乳酸薄荷酯、月桂酸月桂酯、聚山梨醇酯20、乙基己基甘油、玉米淀粉改性、黄原胶、PPG-26-Buteth-26、 PEG-40氢化蓖麻油、氢氧化钠、乙二胺四乙酸二钠、苯氧乙醇、辛乙二醇、氯苯甘醚、苎烯、芳樟醇、香料（香水）、柠檬黄（CI19140）、橘黄 5（CI15510）等。

product_description:
使用 Embryolisse Anti-Ageing Re-Densifying Serum，重新焕发青春光彩。这是一种重现青春的配方，旨在刺激胶原蛋白的生成，实现更紧致、色调更均匀的肌肤。
这种富含抗氧化剂的配方采用透明质酸和海洋胶原蛋白配制而成，令肌肤锁住水分，并凭借白藜芦醇和维生素 E 实现丰满、顺滑的肤色，提升弹性蛋白，重新增密皮肤肌理。这款凝胶精华提供深层滋润功效，可重新界定脸部轮廓，减少细纹和皱纹，令面部妆容得以改善，散发青春光泽。 - K.N
不含苯甲酸酯类。

product_description:
Reignite a healthy glow with the Shiffa Floral Facial Toner; a luxurious formula developed using carefully selected ingredients to transport you on a journey of well-being and calm.
Harnessing the powers of Precious Rose Water and skin-brightening Vitamin C, the non-drying toner clarifies and rejuvenates maturing complexions, whilst anti-inflammatory Marshmallow Flower soothes irritated or sensitive skin. Expect a smoother, more refined skin texture and renewed radiance.

product_description:
Peter Thomas Roth Camu Camu Power Brightening Serum 含超级水果卡姆果浆果，可提供地球上最纯、浓度最高的维生素 C 之一。 维生素 C 致力于防止色素生成细胞中黑色素的产生，是一种强效抗氧化剂，可保护肌肤免受有害紫外线的伤害。
该精华液深入渗透至皮肤各层，赋予更亮泽、更顺滑的外观，并预防过早衰老的迹象，包括细纹和皱纹。 专门配制以促进胶原蛋白生成，实现更紧致的妆效和更青春、均匀的肤色。 E.N.

product_description:
Rejuvenate your complexion with the Shiffa Tri-Acid Radiance Peel; an exfoliating face mask that utilises marine extracts and fruit acids to reignite a natural glow.
Fortified with Glycolic, Salicylic and Lactic Acids, the renewing peel gently buffs away dead, dull skin, whilst softening dry, scaly areas and delivering a deep pore cleansing action to reveal a smoother, more refined appearance.
A nourishing, antioxidant-rich blend of Bilberry, Sugarcane and Liquorice Root work to lighten and brighten, whilst promoting a firm, plump and healthy-looking complexion. Skin is left luminous and revitalised with the ability to absorb other treatments effectively.
name: Tri-Acid Radiance Peel 60ml
Thomas Roth 彼得罗夫乙醇酸 3% 洗面乳 250ml

温和保湿无刺激，同时去除暗沉干枯皮肤，调理软化双唇。 具有保湿功效，有效减少唇围细纹，令双唇健康又有光泽。

product_description:
用 PAYOT夏缇精华恢复青春的光彩，这是一款保湿精华液，致力于恢复缺乏光彩的肌肤的水分和均匀度。
这款净化爽肤水适合所有肌肤类型，有助于恢复亮度，同时滋润肌肤；其维生素C和透明质酸混合物涂抹到肌肤上就会散开，可以滋润肌肤，同时处理色素沉着的迹象。 您的肤色会感觉舒缓、洁净并恢复了原有的光彩。 Skin为后续护理做好了完美的准备。
