product_description:
The H<sub>2</sub> Elemental Energy Hydrating Cloud Cream is the latest innovation from Perricone MD. Boasting a whipped, cloud-like texture, the moisturiser delivers intensive, long lasting hydration without feeling thick or heavy like traditional creams.
It’s powered by the H<sub>2</sub> Energy Complex™, which harnesses Hydrogen, the smallest molecule in the universe, to deliver deep penetrating hydration to the surface layers of skin for 24 hour results. The virtually weightless formula rapidly absorbs without leaving behind a heavy film or greasy residue, allowing skin to truly breathe while benefiting from optimum results.  
Ideal for dry and combination skin types that struggle with dehydration and lacklustre tones, the pioneering face cream leaves your complexion looking rejuvenated and revitalised with a truly radiant visage.
name: MD H2 Elemental Energy Hydrating Cloud Cream 50ml

product_description:
Perricone MD 冷等离子精致颈霜，可重塑肌肤、使肌肤紧实精致。非介入式护理，为肌肤补充必要水分，淡化颈部皱纹。
Perricone MD 冷等离子精致颈霜，内含一套重要的冷等离子输送系统，起到最佳护肤功效。 该配方包括DMAE，使肌肤明显紧致舒爽；浓缩咖啡因，使肌肤轮廓鲜明，为人体补充必需的氨基酸，舒缓肌肤、提亮暗沉肤色、使肌肤紧实，不再松弛。
使用说明：
name: Md 冷等离子精致颈霜 (59ml)

product_description: Achieve a hydrated, matte complexion with the Nutri-Define Hydrating Emulsion from Jurlique. The lightweight moisturiser is ideal for daily use, working to soften and restore skin, without leaving behind an oily residue. Infused with Biosome5 technology, the formula revitalises skin, resulting in a matte complexion and a more youthful looking appearance, perfect for those warmer days.
name: Nutri-Define Hydrating Emulsion 50ml

product_description: Achieve healthy and radiant looking skin with the Purity Specialist Treatment Mask from Jurlique. The creamy Kaolin clay mask works to deeply cleanse skin and lift away any impurities. Enriched with Apricot seeds which exfoliates the face and visibly smoothes skin, whilst Peppermint extract has a cooling effect, invigorating skin and leaving your complexion visibly radiant.

product_description:
Ideal for on-the-go, convenient cleansing, the Makeup Removing Wipes from Lancer Skincare effortlessly eliminate face and eye make-up, excess sebum and daily environmental pollutants, whilst soothing inflammation to leave your complexion refreshed and revitalised.
Individually wrapped, the pre-moistened face wipes are infused with non-irritating Bamboo Fibres, Vitamin E and a calming blend of Aloe, Cucumber and Marshmallow Extracts to banish impurities, heavy foundation and stubborn waterproof mascara in one effective swipe. Gentle enough for use around the delicate eye area, you can expect a soft, clear complexion that is prepared for application of other Lancer Skincare products.

由甜杏仁油和具有舒缓功效的李子油成分组成，Weleda杏仁舒缓面部乳液可温和护理肌肤，令肌肤清爽宜人。 不含Fragrance，它可保持皮肤油脂的自然平衡。
Weleda杏仁舒缓面部乳液可迅速被皮肤吸收，为即使最敏感的肌肤提供保护，确保肌肤保持平衡和清爽。 这款性质温和、无香料、保湿日夜润肤霜利用最优质的天然成分制成，这些成分可令您的肌肤重新焕发活力。 本产品适合素食者。
使用说明：

含有机麝香玫瑰油和有机玫瑰蜡，Weleda Wild Rose Smoothing面部乳液可防止肌肤干燥，持久保持肌肤滋润。 荷荷巴油和滋养植物提取物的有机融合可确保肌肤获得充分滋润，感觉清新舒爽。

product_description:
Zelens  的这款 Z 矩阵赋能保湿润肤乳 可瞬间滋润疲惫、暗沉的肌肤，令其立即恢复活力。其抗衰老配方结合 9 种活性营养成分，可焕活饱受压力的皮肤，使肌肤更加水润而富有弹性。
它采用奢华清爽的水乳状啫喱配方，为肌肤供应营养，增加肌肤活力，让肌肤更有光泽；深层补水，使肌肤犹如刚醒来一样清爽。 有助于补充水分，让肌肤恢复青春活力，玻尿酸强化了抗炎功能，肌肤中天然形成的组织可有效抚平皱纹，避免表皮萎缩。 改善肤色，活化肌肤，舒缓压力，让您看起来更年轻。 肌肤的水分含量将提升到 168%。 - K.N.

product_description:
Restore youthfulness to your smile with Talika Smile Code; a unique, double sided pen that hosts two effective skincare formulas, which work in synergy to deliver enviable results.
Affected by ageing and harmful influences such as smoking, the lips are prone to wrinkles and fine lines. The Smile Code duo combines an ‘Intense Volume’ Plumping Lip Care formula and a ‘High Definition’ Age-Defying Contour Care treatment in order to combat the signs of ageing.
Applied first, the plumping lip care solution works to visibly boost the volume of lips. The volumising formula envelops lips in a hydrating veil, which offers comfort and protection, whilst intensifying the natural lip colour. Once lips are volumised, contour care tackles wrinkles and fine lines by visibly smoothing skin. The formula is able to stimulate collagen synthesis to redefine the lip contour and leave skin supple and firm.
With continued use, the 2-in-1 treatment reveals youthful skin and full lips that are hydrated, plump and youthful.
name: Smile Code 2 x 2.5ml

product_description:
请用 Dr. Nick Lowe 的 acclenz™ 净肤焕肤发泡洁肤液使面部皮肤更有活力；Nick Lowe 是国际公认的世界一流皮肤病学和护肤专家之一。
水杨酸和烟酰胺混合物特为满足易留瘢痕的皮肤的需求而配制，有消除过多表皮油脂，刺激细胞再生，以及消除细菌的作用，以便最大程度地减少黑头、白头和可见的皮肤发红现象的出现。
维生素 A、C、E 可以发挥抗氧化剂的保护作用，以防止受到自由基的损害，而尿囊素植物提取物则可以使皮肤舒缓，不痛不痒，以实现持久舒适的目的。 会使面部皮肤干净、舒缓并恢复活力。 包装在无空气的容器内以防污染。
name: Nick Lowe acclenz 净肤焕肤发泡洁肤液 (150ml)

product_description:
The ALGENIST Genius Ultimate Anti-Ageing Bi-Phase Peel combines the powerful effects of a facial peel with the rejuvenating, age-defying properties of an oil to leave skin looking brighter, refined and more even.
Tested to ensure compatibility with even the most sensitive skin types, the multi-tasking formula contains an AHA blend of Glycolic and Salicylic Acids to deliver gentle yet effective exfoliation, while ALGENIST’s patented biotechnological Microalgae Oil provides intensive hydration with potent nutrients.
As a result, the appearance of pores and wrinkles is visibly reduced for a youthful looking vitality. Your complexion feels smooth and balanced, with enhanced radiance and minimal irritation.

product_description:
Re-energise your skin with Polaar Hydraboost Gel, a lightweight moisturiser that rehydrates skin whilst boosting its natural defences.
Combining Siberian Ginseng with Siberian Olive extract, the non-greasy gel melts effortlessly into the complexion, revitalising, protecting against free radicals and enhancing resilience for healthier-looking, more energised skin. Infused with a delicate fragrance, skin will be left glowing and comfortable.

product_description:
Reignite a youthful glow with Cowshed's Cranberry Seed Rejuvenating Facial Oil; a fast-absorbing formula that caters specifically for dry skin types.
Harnessing the powers of Rose Absolute, Cranberry Seed and Neroli Essential Oils, the lightweight, omega-rich treatment works to clarify and rejuvenate your complexion, whilst delivering an aromatic fragrance to revitalise the skin and senses. Your complexion is smooth, bright and restored. Complete with a pipette for easy, mess-free application.

product_description:
Designed to inspire a relaxing slumber, Kiss the Moon's After Dark Balm - Calm releases a cloud of pure tranquillity to help you drift off to sleep.
Expertly blended with natural essential oils of Jasmine, Chamomile, Ylang-Ylang and Sandalwood, its sleep-inducing fragrance melts away daily stress and tension, whilst nourishing Shea Butter and White Tea Seed Oil absorb quickly into pulse points to leave you feeling deeply rejuvenated.

product_description:
Hydrate and protect your skin from environmental damage with the Moisture Activ™ Gel-Crème from Wilma Schumann, a lightweight cream-emulsion that’s ideal for normal to combination skin with a cocktail of age-defying ingredients.
Lightly fragranced and non-greasy, it’s enriched with DMAE, which works to lift and firm sagging skin, while Marine Collagen reduces the appearance of wrinkles. Vitamin E and Alpha Lipoic Acid act as antioxidants, combating skin pollutants and visibly improving the look of fine lines. Suitable for daily use, you can expect a toned and moisturized complexion.
name: Schumann Moisture Activ™ Gel-Crème 50ml

product_description:
配有天然成分（包括维生素 E）的Men Rock胡须油旨在滋养和滋润胡须和它下面的皮肤。 这款胡须油的爵士版有着挡不住的生动气味，就像淡淡的古龙水及胡须 软化剂。 适合所有肌肤类型。 - E.D
- 使用前摇匀。
- 滴几滴到手上，轻轻按摩到胡须上。
- 避免接触眼睛，不要咽下。
name: Rock 胡须油 - 爵士 (Jazz)

product_description:
Su-Man丝滑润肤霜 ，用以护理肌肤。这款配方轻盈的超保湿护肤品，可迅速被肌肤吸收，补充肌肤营养，软化肌肤，重现肌肤光泽。
内含米丝、玫瑰果油、龙血竭提取物等，具有特级保湿功能，可减少肌肤细纹和皱纹、提高肌肤弹性、改善肤质，使肤色光滑年轻。

The Magnitone London Shower Holder stores your cleansing device and provides additional space for replacement brush heads. Both hygienic and practical, its simple, compact design is the perfect accessory for your bathroom. Finished with Magnitone branding. E.N.
name: London Shower Holder - White

product_description:
Rediscover the natural youth and vitality of your skin with A'kin Purley Revitalising Firming Night Crème, an anti-ageing moisturiser that works to brighten and even  
your complexion whilst diminishing signs of ageing.
Specially formulated as a targeted skincare regime for 40-65+ year olds, the intensely hydrating cream delivers moisture and nutrients deep down during your skin's nightly renewal process. Its blend of all natural ingredients and pure active botanics work in synergy to address lines, wrinkles, age spots and dullness. Antioxidant Camu Camu harnesses a powerful source of brightening Vitamin C which counteracts sallowness, whilst omega-rich Echium Oil and fragmented Hyaluronic Acid reduce the look of wrinkles.
Skin appears naturally brighter, firmer and more lifted when you wake. Youthful radiance and smoothness is restored.
name: Purley Revitalising Firming Night Crème

product_description:
使用 Tria品牌的 Age Defying Skincare 妆效精华液强化您的抗衰老激光治疗的效果，它拥有由皮肤科医生专门设计的配方，有助于您获得一个更光滑、紧致和年轻的肤色。
富含多种抗衰老成分，这款精华液将Retinol与海茴香（一种天然抗氧化剂）和橄榄提取物，以及Avocado油混合以软化、舒缓和为肌肤补水。 其紧致和增强弹性的特性有助于减少细纹、皱纹和色素沉着。
Skin变得亮白、光滑和年轻。
name: Age Defying Skincare 妆效精华液

product_description:
Achieve a smoother, more refined complexion with the Exfoliating Facial Serum from Wilma Schumann, a revitalizing formula that works to restore a clear, fresh and radiant appearance.
Harnessing the powers of Glycolic and Salicylic Acids (Alpha and Beta Hydroxy Acids), the serum delivers a gentle exfoliating action to eliminate dead, dull skin cells without over-drying or uncomfortable tightness. Ideal for normal to combination, or oily skin types, you can expect a luminous, youthful-looking complexion with improved texture.
name: Schumann Exfoliating Facial Serum 30ml

product_description: 可用有多种益处的 NAOBAY 的摩洛哥坚果焕肤油护理皮肤。 这种有机配方护肤品含有 80% 的脂肪酸（45% 的油酸和 35% 的亚油酸），可用于防止出现衰老迹象，提高皮肤弹性，最大程度地减少细纹和皱纹的出现，或涂到痤疮疤痕上。 由于富含维生素 E，因此预计面部皮肤会得到深度滋养，会变得光滑，瑕疵大幅减少。
name: 摩洛哥坚果焕肤油 (30ml)

product_description:
非常适合成熟或中性至干性肤质，Organic Surge 加倍Care Nourishing Rose 日霜 在致力于最大限度地减少细纹的同时可保湿和滋补您的肌肤。
富含锦缎Rose，天竺葵和坚果油，这款轻质乳霜可迅速被肌肤吸收以滋润和保护并增加肌肤弹性，自然舒缓红肿，获得持久的舒适。 适合敏感肌肤，其活肤配方使肌肤水嫩、容光焕发，为下一步的化妆做好准备。
name: Surge加倍Care Nourishing Rose日霜（50ml）

product_description: Crabtree & Evelyn 马鞭草薰衣草古龙喷雾混了多种奢华果香和提神芬芳，完美融合，打造出这款迷人的香氛，可在任何场合使用，而且男女均适用。 这款独一无二的香水前调混合柠檬、绿熏衣草和白色葡萄柚的果香，中调混合茉莉和马鞭草的花香，后调延续着雪松木、黑香豆和琥珀的芬芳。 K.D.
name: & Evelyn 马鞭草 薰衣草古龙喷雾（100ml）

product_description:
Target spots and breakouts with The Jojoba Company's Spot-On Pimple Control; a unique spot treatment that helps to restore a clear, fresh and healthy complexion.
With a mineral-rich, clay-based formula. the innovative treatment works to draw out dirt, impurities and breakout-causing bacteria, whilst Pure Australian Jojoba mimics the skin's natural oils to leave your complexion rebalanced and rejuvenated. Ideal for use overnight.
name: Jojoba Company Spot-On Pimple Control 25ml

product_description:
Rediscover your skin's natural luminosity with Elemental Herbology Cell Nourish Radiance and Vitality Facial Serum, a complexion-enhancing formula that works to boost radiance and brightness in dull, under-nourished skin.
Infused with a host of vitamins, antioxidants and proteins (including Kombuchka™ which is clinically proven to improve radiance, and Co-Enzyme Q10 to help fight external aggressors), the skin-boosting solution expertly soothes and calms sensitive skin whilst delivering strong antioxidant properties to improve vitality, brightness and radiance. Its powerhouse of ingredients work in synergy to revitalise skin, stimulating cellular renewal to maximise radiance and luminosity.
Expect a brighter, healthier complexion with restored energy and freshness.
name: Herbology Cell Nourish Radiance and Vitality Facial Serum

product_description:
Protect and nourish your skin with Big Boy SPF20 Moisturizing Cream, a lightweight moisturiser that delivers a much needed hydration boost whilst keeping skin safe from harmful UV rays.
Calming, moisturising and relieving, the day cream combines antioxidant rich Vitamin E with Olive and Argan Oils to intensely nourish and safeguard skin. SPF 20 provides a barrier against sun-induced skin ageing, and its nourishing properties leave the complexion feeling soft, smooth and quenched.
name: Boy SPF20 Moisturizing Cream 50ml

product_description:
skinChemists 瞬间提拉精华可以让肌肤瞬间变得更加光滑紧致。 这款精华液添加了许多高效紧致成分和淡化成分，以提拉肌肤，减少瑕疵的出现，初次使用便能看到效果。 这款产品非常适合因疲倦和压力导致肌肤状况变差的人群使用。 - L.M.
使用说明：洁面后涂抹于洁净干燥的面部和颈部。
name: 瞬间提拉精华（15ml）

product_description:
使用Elemis 骨胶原石英紧致面膜使您的肌肤光滑。 这是一个豪华的乳霜面膜，可以瞬时紧致您的肌肤，有助于减少老化迹象，同时产生面部提拉的效果，使您的外貌更年轻。
将石英的功效与padina pavonica、调和剂诺丽、辣木和阿甘树精油结合起来，Elemis骨胶原石英紧致面膜可每周使用两次，令您的肌肤更年轻、更紧致。 自然的本质，由科学做引导。
使用说明：
name: Pro-Collagen石英提拉面膜 (50ml)

product_description:
通过这种有健康恢复作用的护肤品，可使皮肤受到保护、不痛不痒并且恢复活力，还可以防止环境污染物造成的损害。  这种 Elemis SOS 急救霜护肤品也是绝佳底妆。
敏感和皮肤痒痛往往是因为激素失衡，压力增大，饮食习惯差和运动后脱水。 环境状况也会使皮肤状况恶化，如有空调的环境和污染。
这种有健康恢复作用的 SOS 护肤霜含有柳树、没药树、氨基酸和薰衣草，可共同发挥独特的护肤作用，以使皮肤得以舒缓、得到保护，并使皮肤的天然平衡得以恢复，从而使这种护肤霜的使用成为病态、激素失衡或痒痛皮肤的最佳解决方案，因为这种护肤霜既能使皮肤得以舒缓，又能使皮肤得到保护。
Elemis SOS 急救霜有六种主要活性成份：氨基酸、柳树、绣线菊、积雪草、薰衣草净油和没药树精油。

product_description: Pamper sensitive skin with the yes to PrimRose Oil Mud Mask; a luxurious face mask that contains the naturally soothing ingredient of Evening Primrose Oil to calm and moisturise skin. Simply sit back and indulge in a spa-like experience as the relaxing mask works its magic to unveil a radiant and even toned complexion.
name: to PrimRose Oil Mud Mask

product_description:
Directly target discolouration with the SAMPAR Spot Lighter; a potent, concentrated treatment with a unique massage-tip applicator for precise and unparalleled results.   
The fluid formula contains an advanced blend of Subtilisin Enzymes and Citrus-based Flavonoids, which work in tandem to activate skin’s natural exfoliation process and melanin synthesis, alleviating the appearance of discolouration and delivering a visible lightening effect.  
Complete with the proprietary Urban Advance Complex to neutralise free radical damage, the brightening serum leaves skin tone looking more even and refined. Perfect for leveling age spots and hyperpigmentation on the face, décolletage and hands.
name: Spot Lighter 1.8ml

product_description:
利用this works的 ‘Light Time Open Eyes’ 修护疲惫、萎靡的双眼，这款轻松涂抹配方旨在亮白、紧致和清爽您的眼部肌肤。
这款柔滑乳霜加入富含维生素的藻类、具有焕发活力的波斯合欢树提取物、具有舒缓功效的芦荟和摩洛哥坚果油，具有保湿特性，并有助于对抗随时间推移产生的疲劳，同时在睡眠后消除眼睛浮肿。 双眼将获得安慰，焕发活力，精神十足。
name: works Light Time Open Eyes (15ml)

product_description: Combat signs of aging with the Skin Bleaching Solution from Wilma Schumann, a skin lightening gel that works to reduce the appearance of brown age spots and discoloration. Gentle enough for daily use, the potent active ingredient of 2% Hydroquinone effectively minimizes the look of acne scars and liver spots over time, whilst Kojic and Glycolic Acid help to brighten dull skin.
name: Schumann Skin Bleaching Solution 59ml

product_description:
Achieve a smooth, flawless complexion with Balance Me's Instant Lift Primer; a skin-refining formula that helps to minimise the appearance of enlarged pores.
Infused with Hyaluronic Acid, the lightweight, ultra-hydrating primer delivers a plumping and lifting effect, whilst tightening and blurring visible pores for a smoother, more refined finish. Its dose of Acemlla Oleracea Extract (known as 'Nature's Botox') works to soften fine lines and wrinkles to reveal a firm, youthful-looking complexion with improved texture and tone.
name: Me Instant Lift Primer 15ml

product_description:
Visibly improve skin’s tone and texture with the ALGENIST Triple-Action Micropolish and Peel; a skin-brightening formula with resurfacing benefits.
Utilising biotechnology, the microdermabrasion peel is developed with an effective blend of Alguronic Acid and Glycolic Acid. The 10% acid formula works in synergy with a 10% fruit enzyme complex and micro polishing crystals to smooth away rough skin and visibly correct imperfections.
Expect the peel to reveal a renewed visage with smooth, healthy and uniform skin.
name: Triple-Action Micropolish and Peel 60ml

product_description:
澄淨的霧化細膩在噴霧煥活肌膚的同時清爽的柑橘香味立刻讓人振奮，梅金縷梅和藥蜀葵，橙子精油檸檬精油的有機結合，平衡肌膚、調和油脂分泌. 
茱莉蔻致力於將生活，能源和美感，這些都可以在柑橘噴霧中找到，油性皮膚在使用後會有柔軟，光滑的美妙感覺. 
使用方法:
name: (100ml)

product_description:
skinChemists 除皺蛇毒精華可滋潤和平滑肌膚，幫助減少皺紋和皺紋。使用類蛇毒製成，這是一種模擬在蛇毒中發現的多肽活性的多肽，通過抑制肌肉收縮來減少皺紋。 
此精華不僅讓肌膚看起來更年輕，還包含麥氨酸，是一種來自小麥蛋白質的氨基酸化合物，將水份鎖定在肌膚上。膚色看起來柔滑、緊緻、有光澤。 - LM 
 使用說明：
name: 除皱蛇毒精华 (30ml)

product_description:
Catering specifically for men, the ManCave Borage Moisturiser is a fast-absorbing, non-greasy formula that works to hydrate, mattify and energise skin.
Fortified with stimulating Caffeine, Organic Borage Oil and Shea Butter, the lightweight emulsion delivers intense, long-lasting moisture, whilst antioxidant Vitamin E shields from free radical damage and environmental aggressors. Skin is smooth, rejuvenated and protected.
name: Original Moisturiser 100ml

product_description:
Shiseido Benefiance Pure Retinol Express Smoothing Eye Masks能令双眸瞬间焕发年轻神采。它的浓缩液护理膜能在短短15分钟内起到减少皱纹的效果。 本品能紧致肌理，改善肌肤弹性，令眼周肌肤重现活力。
它采用的纯视黄醇微量注入技术能令成分深入肌肤；而Benefiance的强效抗皱技术能有效防止皱纹新生。 该眼膜能全天保湿、丰润肌肤，令肌肤立现明亮光彩。 -SA
name: Benefiance Pure Retinol Express Smoothing Eye Mask x 12 Sachets

product_description:
使用The Method: Polish Sensitive Skin恢復皮膚的自然光采，該款溫和去角質產品對皮膚的呵護使皮膚看起來清新、亮麗，更顯年輕。 
敏感皮膚的去角質膏富含純礦物質，它包含超細級的去角質珠去除無光澤的死皮細胞；均勻的氧化鎂和碳酸氫鈉非研磨去角質晶體輕柔地為皮膚拋光，而沒有割傷或劃傷皮膚的危險。去角質膏在呈現更加柔和而亮麗的肌膚同時，其配方使皮膚做好準備以吸收其他滋養護理品。塗在臉上使肌膚有柔軟和舒適的感覺。

product_description: Crabtree & Evelyn 摩洛哥没药剃须皂替换装富含充满异域风情的没药、黑胡椒、佛手柑和琥珀，带给您清爽彻底的剃须体验。 这款剃须皂是 Crabtree & Evelyn 摩洛哥没药剃须皂盒套装的替换装，能够产生丰富浓稠的泡沫，带给您舒适的剃须体验，具有卓越的补水护肤功效。 - K.N.
name: & Evelyn 摩洛哥没药剃须皂补充装（100g）

product_description:
Omorovicza水潤亮膚乳CC霜SPF20可亮化膚色，改善暗沉皮膚，澹化瑕疵和色斑，破解色素沉澱的問題。獨特配方保護肌膚免受UVA 和UVB 有害紫外線傷害，利用匈牙利溫泉水極強的皮膚修復功能和礦物護膚導入系統，有效將礦物質導入深層肌膚，促進吸收。紅寶石水晶澹化細紋和皺紋。此款CC霜具有保濕、打底、防曬三合一的功效，含有豐富維生素C，可促進膠原蛋白的生產，增加皮膚彈性，同時有效改善皮膚發炎和紅腫狀況。使用後能有效修飾肌膚問題，妝感貼服自然，營造自然亮採膚色。
潔面後塗抹於臉部，提亮膚色。
name: （30ml）

product_description:
使用Sukin的Super Greens Nourishing Chia Seed Oil+Treat您的肌肤，这是一款日常面部精油，有补水、平衡的作用，令肌肤重现健康光泽。
奢华产品吸收迅速，含有奇异子、火麻仁和橄榄油，具有抗氧化保护作用，能够抵御环境侵害因素的伤害，而omega、氨基酸和维生素可滋润肌肤，增加肌肤弹性。 适合所有肌肤类型，含有的"Super Greens"，包括羽衣甘蓝，欧芹，绿藻和螺旋藻等令您的肤色更加柔软、滋养。
name: Super Greens Nourishing Chia Seed Oil+ 25ml

product_description:
First Aid Beauty presents the Ultra Repair® Vanilla Citron Cream, an updated formula of the cult-classic skincare treatment with a subtle sweet scent.
The rich, emollient-textured face cream works to penetrate skin with a concentrated dosage of hydration to soften and smooth. Fortified with a repairing blend of Collodial Oatmeal, Shea Butter and Eucalyptus Oil, it’s ideal for dry, sensitive and damaged skin, including those who suffer from irritation and itching from conditions such as eczema or psoriasis.
The Antioxidant Booster helps protect against free radical damage, fighting premature signs of ageing and combating dull tones. Naturally fragranced with zesty notes of Orange Essential Oil layered over comforting Vanilla extract, the lush face cream leaves skin feeling moisturised, calm and replenished.
name: Aid Beauty Ultra Repair® Vanilla Citron Cream (170g)

product_description:
Transform dull and discoloured skin with the White Marble Double Cleanse Travel Set from Erno Laszlo, a duo of skincare treatments expertly formulated with advanced technologies, antioxidants and essential vitamins to create a bespoke regime that targets hyperpigmentation and uneven tone.
When combined, the cleansing oil and bar create a purifying mask that effectively sweeps away dirt, oil and impurities from pores while working to improve radiance and lustre. Suitable for daily use, the pair work in tandem to leave skin feeling superiorly clean with a revitalised glow.
White Marble Cleansing Oil (60ml)
The luxurious oil-based formula works to dissolve makeup and impurities and minimise the appearance of pores without leaving skin feeling uncomfortable or tight. Enriched with astringent Lemon Peel Oil, it effectively exfoliates the surface layer of skin and stimulates cell renewal for a refined and more even texture, while Coconut and Sunflower Seed Oils deliver essential fatty acids to enhance the natural lipid barrier.
White Marble Treatment Bar (50g)
Creamy and lavish, the innovative soap bar does more than just clean. The exclusive nano-encapsulated LumiWhite Complex blocks excess melanin to help fight discolouration and reveal a natural, long lasting radiance, plus active enzymes help to even out tone and minimise the appearance of sun spots. Its Fruit Acid Complex, derived from citrus and natural sugars, breaks down dirt and exfoliates deep within pores to eliminate impurities and excess oil, whilst extract of Willow Bark acts as an anti-inflammatory ingredient to soothe and nourish.
name: Laszlo White Marble Double Cleanse Travel Set

product_description:
使眼部肌膚重新恢復活力使用-白藜蘆醇提升緊緻眼霜來自歐緹麗 .獨有專利抗皺組合：葡萄藤白藜蘆醇結合微透明質酸複合物，有效增加肌膚細胞內的天然透明質酸生產。減少浮腫和黑眼圈的產生，同時撫平眼角細紋使肌膚看起來更加緊緻。適合敏感的眼部肌膚，平滑眼周肌膚，令雙眸顯得更年輕有神。 
 不含香精。經過眼科醫生測試。
name: 欧缇丽白藜芦醇提升紧致眼霜（15ml）

product_description:
使用针对干性皮肤的 Elemis Hydra-Boost 水润滋养日霜为肌肤密集补水，消除干燥缺水的区域，让肌肤柔嫩光滑。 这款产品将透明质酸、海蓬子提取物和七瓣莲精油巧妙地融合，以加强肌肤的天然保湿屏障；它还富含有机桃金娘精华和维生素E，能够保护肌肤免受自由基的伤害。 保湿效果明显，让肌肤瞬间水润，非常适合急需补水的肌肤。 - L.M.
使用说明：每天早晨洁面后，涂抹于面部和颈部。

product_description:
使用Zelens 極致面部護理精油使肌膚散發自然光澤,一款質地輕盈的產品混合了22種a精油幫助肌膚加強天然屏障的同時增加肌膚水分。 
有著不可思議的抗衰老的效果，含有特別的維他命和脂肪酸成分幫助保持肌膚彈性和膚色同時使肌膚更加有彈力，膚色更加明亮，使肌膚散發自然年輕光澤。使肌膚變得柔軟，膚色均勻充滿水分。

product_description:
弥合化妆品专柜与侵入性手术之间的差距...... 一种基于先进抗衰老技术的非侵入性护肤膏，使用旨在抵御衰老的低PH值传递系统，诱导肌肤改变。
作为Liquid Laser系列的基石，这款天鹅绒般的轻质凝胶精华液提供无重力长效保湿、紧肤功效以及植物提取物、有效抗氧化剂和天然果酸混合成分带来的示范性缓解色素沉着、亮白肌肤功效。
该方法中心是Juveleven，这是一种革命性的全新六肽，它模仿Hydra水母（一种绰号为"不朽水母"的淡水生物）的作用。 Hydranov-P天然源自斯堪的纳维亚红藻，促进透明质酸在肌肤中的实际合成，将其效率提高211%。
name: Liquid Laser Concentrate Refill (50ml)

product_description:
Treat your complexion to the Supreme Skin Face Serum from Mauli, an ethical cosmetics brand that seeks to unite traditional Ayurvedic values and practices with British refinery, creating a unique and luxurious product that nourishes and pampers skin.
Imbued with an uplifting aroma to calm and soothe the mind, the hand-blended formula contains sixteen botanicals that work in tandem to infuse skin with moisture, minerals and vitamins.
Opening with an invigorating bouquet of Rose Otto, Lime and Blood Orange, it helps to stimulate cell renewal and natural collagen levels for a firming effect, while essence of Jasmine Sambac and Himalayan Cedarwood provide essential free radical protection.    
The treatment settles on an opulent base of Moringa, Calendula and Argan oils, working to repair damaged tissue and soothe the look of redness. Skin feels sumptuously softened with a healthy-looking glow.
name: Supreme Skin Face Serum 30ml

product_description:
Uriage 天然减充血剂喷雾（适用于眼睛与鼻子），呵护婴儿和儿童，可疏通鼻子，舒缓鼻腔粘膜，清洗眼睛杂质。
适合日常使用，尤其是皮肤过敏或感染时使用。其配方温和，内含Uriage温泉水，富含天然铜、锌、锰、钙等成分，可加强皮肤自然防御能力，进行鼻子和眼睛的日常清洁。 定量喷涂、使用方便。

Experience exceptional anti-ageing care with the Filorga Absolute Day Set; a potent duo of anti-ageing creams that seek to reveal a youthful complexion. The luxurious set boasts a rejuvenating day cream and a youth-reviving night cream. Use each daily to achieve smooth, radiant and younger looking skin.
Skin Absolute Day® Ultimate Rejuvenating Day Cream (50ml)
Restore youthful vitality with the Skin Absolute Day® Ultimate Rejuvenating Day Cream; a radiance-renewing formula that works to revitalise, repair and deliver intense, long-lasting hydration. Powered by anti-ageing Extremozymes® and Photolyase (a restorative enzyme activated by daylight), the quick-absorbing cream expertly transforms damaging UV rays into energy to help minimise the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles. A dose of White Sapphire combats dullness and uneven skin tone to reignite a luminous glow, whilst Hyaluronic Acid plumps and moisturises for a firmer, smoother complexion.
Skin Absolute Night® Ultimate Anti-Ageing Night Cream (15ml)
Target signs of ageing whilst you sleep with the the Skin Absolute Night® Ultimate Anti-Ageing Night Cream; an innovative anti-ageing treatment. Boasting a luxurious, black formula, the night cream effortlessly melts into skin and treats it to a blend of intelligent, anti-ageing technology. Brown Seaweed and Meteorite extract combine to help regenerate skin cells at night, whilst a Botox-like active works to reduce the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles to leave the complexion smooth and youthful. Hydrating Hyaluronic Acid and a potent collagen peptide work in synergy to ensure skin is visibly firm with improved elasticity. A brightening active tackles dark spots by visibly reducing their size and intensity, whilst Vitamin C reveals an even and uniform complexion. Expect to wake to radiant skin that is nourished and youthful.
name: Absolute Day Set (Worth £128.70)

product_description:
Stay cool, calm and collected throughout your pregnancy with the Mama Mio Way to Glow Facial Spritz; a convenient, travel-friendly mist that hydrates and protects the visage with one simple spray.
Effortlessly spritzing over the complexion, the comforting formula is enriched with Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, which is the perfect remedy for hot, fatigued and hormonal skin. This delivers a cooling sensation that relieves feelings of irritation and leaves skin thoroughly revitalised. The facial spray is also infused with Hyaluronic Acid and Hibiscus Flower Extract, which work in synergy to hydrate the complexion, whilst calming and visibly smoothing skin for a plumped effect.
Fermented Bamboo Leaf Extract and Silk Proteins combine to shield skin from external agressors, providing a protective barrier to ensure the face is radiant and enviably glowy. Complete with Gravida, a blend of ten, pregnancy-safe natural oils, the spray is finished with a delicate scent, which is uplifting to even the most delicate of pregnant noses. Leaving skin radiant and dewy, the Way to Glow spray is perfect as an energising pick-me-up throughout the day.
name: Mio Way to Glow Facial Spritz 100ml

product_description:
Treat your complexion to the Eye Lift Firming Perfecting Collection from Murad. Combines a radiance-renewing cleanser, firming eye treatment and skin-perfecting formula, all housed within a gift box.
AHA/BHA Exfoliating Cleanser (200ml)
Containing a trio of Salicylic, Lactic and Glycolic Acids, the cleanser effectively reduces the build up of dead skin cells to reveal a brighter, polished complexion with restored luminosity. Jojoba beads gently exfoliate and hydrate skin; helping to soften signs of ageing and reigniting a healthy glow. Suitable for weekly use, you can expect renewed and refreshed skin with an even tone.
Eye Lift Firming Treatment (30ml and 8 Pads)
An innovative anti-ageing formula that works to minimise the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles. Fortified with Hyaluronic Acid spheres, the powerful treatment penetrates deeply into skin to deliver superior hydration and combat dryness, whilst surface-filling technology delivers a plumping effect for a younger-looking and more refined eye contour. Complete with eye pads to improve absorption for optimal results.
Invisiblur Perfecting Shield SPF30 (5ml)
A multi-tasking formula that works to prime the skin, improve signs of ageing and protect from sun exposure. Invisible on application, the formula combines Mushroom peptides with a soft focus complex to soften the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles and blur imperfections. The broad spectrum moisturising blend will leave you with irresistibly soft, youthful-looking skin.
name: Eye Lift Firming Perfecting Collection (Worth £88)

product_description:
Murad慕拉維生素C保濕晚霜 
本品為適用於臉部和頸部的晚間保濕露，蘊含維生素C 和抗氧化劑，不僅令肌膚清爽，還是美麗活力肌膚的關鍵。豐富的乳木果油立即補水，同時phytolipids 幫助鎖住肌膚水份，確保最佳效果。維生素C 還可促成膠原合成，改善彈性和緊緻性。肌膚看起來更明亮，感覺更平滑。 
維生素A 可促進細胞更新，同時葡萄籽萃取物和維生素E 提供強大的抗氧化保護。 
 使用方法： 
 成分： 
水（淺綠色）、鯨蠟硬脂基辛酸酯、羥基硬脂酸乙基己酯、硬脂酸、鯨蠟硬脂醇、丁二醇、甘油硬脂酸酯、PEG-100 硬脂酸鹽、鯨蠟醇磷酸酯DEA 鹽、聚山梨醇酯60、殼聚醣抗壞血酸鹽、賴氨酸月桂硫甲二磺酸鹽、稻米氨基酸、天冬氨酸鋅、磷脂質、醋酸生育酚、棕櫚酸視黃酯、抗壞血酸棕櫚酸酯、植物甲萘醌、亞油酸乙酯、泛醇、二甲聚矽氧烷、銀杏萃取物、葡萄籽萃取物、西番蓮花萃取物、水解石蓴提取物、天然海藻萃取物、牛油果（乳木果）、酸鈉天然保濕因子、異硬脂酸、甘油、卡波姆乙二胺四乙酸二鈉、三乙醇胺、苯氧乙醇、對羥基苯甲酸甲酯、對羥基苯甲酸丙酯、柚子（葡萄柚）皮油、甜橙（橙子）油、花梨（玫瑰）木油、斑點老鸛草油、狹葉熏衣草（薰衣草）油、百里香（麝香草）油、黃6 (CI 15985)
name: 慕拉维生素 C 保湿晚霜 50ml

product_description:
Boost dull, mature and fatigued skin with The Hero Project’s 30+ Set; a three-piece selection of coveted skincare treatments that work in synergy to intensively nourish, brighten and perfect for a visibly younger-looking and refined complexion.  Presented in a chic reusable wash bag.
Vit C-30™ (8ml)
A powerful Vitamin C serum that improves the look of visible signs of ageing and helps protect from further damage. Delivering an impressive dual tightening and brightening effect, the potent treatment contains a substantial 30% Ethylated Ascorbic Acid – stabilised Vitamin C – ensuring long-lasting effectiveness and maximum results. Brimming with antioxidant protection and skin brightening benefits, it works to improve tone, suppleness and clarity while combating the look of fine lines and wrinkles.
Double Blur® (10ml)
Get camera ready in a flash with the Double Blur® Skin Perfector ; an advanced, HD skin treatment that targets problematic areas to deliver a uniform, smooth and flawless looking complexion. The transparent gel formula features Dual Diffusion Technology™ – polymer microspheres create an optical illusion on skin, working to scatter light and fill the appearance of wrinkles. The clever technology optimises light reflection, leading to a natural looking base with imperfections effectively blurred.
Undo™ Bi-Phase Eye Make-up Eraser (50ml)
Eliminate all traces of makeup with the Undo™ Bi-Phase Waterproof Eye Make-Up Eraser. Suitable for all skin types, including those with sensitive skin, the cleansing formula removes makeup quickly and effectively. Enriched with skin-loving, natural Chamomile and Cornflower, the softening formula is able to soothe and nourish eyelashes, as well as the sensitive skin at the delicate eye area. Expect thoroughly cleansed eyes that are free from makeup and feel hydrated and comfortable.
name: Hero Project 30+ Set

product_description:
杏仁和梅仁油是有机天堂的绝配，经过精心调制将两者融入Weleda的杏仁舒缓面霜，以滋润干性或敏感性肌肤，令肌肤感觉柔软、丰盈并受到完善保护。
这款霜质保湿霜舒缓肌肤，帮助抵御环境的影响，支持天然再生。 Weleda杏仁舒缓护肤霜令您的肌肤恢复弹性，更加顺滑、柔嫩，享受仅含天然成分的产品带来的绝佳效果。
使用说明：

Freshly handmade in the UK with high-quality and natural ingredients, STEAMCREAM's 'Wonder World' Moisturiser is a lightweight whipped emulsion that can be used on the face, hands and body.
Developed with the brand's unique STEAM process, the finest ingredients have been fused together by a shot of steam to create a gentle, fast-absorbing emulsion that delivers long-lasting hydration.
Harnessing the nourishing powers of Orange Flower Water, Cocoa Butter and Almond and Jojoba Oils, the ultra-moisturising formula softens and replenishes, leaving skin smooth, restored and rejuvenated from top to toe.
Presented in a reusable, decorative tin crafted from recyclable materials to reduce energy use and respect the environment. STEAMCREAM follows a strict no-animal testing policy and is approved by the Vegan Society.
name: Wonder World Moisturiser 75ml

product_description:
Salcura's Bioskin Zeoderm Extra caters specifically for those prone to more severe cases of eczema, psoriasis, dermatitis, urticaria and dry skin conditions on the face and body.
Fortified with Linseed and Jojoba Oil, the 99% natural moisturiser helps to minimise redness and inflammation, whilst natural volcanic Zeolite defends against free radical damage for long-lasting comfort. A soothing blend of Borage and Olive Oils hydrate and nourish skin, leaving it soft, smooth and restored from top to toe.
name: Bioskin Zeoderm Extra (50ml)

product_description:
一款清爽型滋养眼霜产品，有效平整娇嫩眼部区域周围的细纹，显著减少环境侵害，激发肌肤弹性。
蕴含榛子和认证有机玫瑰果油，显著减少环境侵害，令肌肤盈润光滑。适合所有肌肤类型。 这款眼霜温和保湿，无刺激，明亮双眸，焕发年轻光彩！
使用说明：
name: Ageless Brightening Eye Cream (20g)

product_description:
本品為高效潤膚霜，配方使用高級鎖水劑和肌膚細化成份，幫助再生和恢復肌膚，同時提供滋潤保護。 
建議用於對抗干燥，平滑細紋，再生肌膚，對抗衰老。超輕薄無油配方立即吸收，刺激細胞再生機制，滋潤肌膚，不受自由基的損害影響，使肌膚具有自然隱形啞光。最終結果是恢復豐滿和彈性；消除細紋，柔滑肌膚。 
配方含乙醇酸，使肌膚更柔滑，減少細紋、幹斑和暗點；水楊酸，這是指定用於治療痤瘡、倒生毛和皮屑的強效專業成份，對抗衰老痕跡；透明質酸，皮膚病學級“超級保濕劑”；含氫矽，可保護肌膚，增加柔軟性和彈性，不形成油膩或油脂薄膜；甘油，具有驚人的保濕性，持續從環境吸收水份並鎖在肌膚中，提高肌膚的柔軟性、飽滿性和彈性；及維生素A、C 和E。 
使用說明：
name: 高级润肤露 100ml

product_description: Trilogy 推出的这款矿物质焕彩面膜经过专门配制，深度清洁、净化肌肤，使其再现活力。 富含玫瑰果、高岭土和圣诞红花等天然成分，调理并舒缓肌肤，让肌肤散发自然光采。 特别添加了月见草，深度滋润并补水，快将这款非常有效的护肤面膜收入囊中吧。 K.D.
name: 矿物质焕彩面膜（60ml）

product_description:
Prepare skin for summer with the Omorovicza Summer Value Set Balmy Nights Duo. Housed in luxurious gift packaging, the pair of treatments work in perfect harmony to leave your skin looking radiant and refreshed, powered by the age-defying properties of exquisite Collodial Gold. An opulent treat for your skin.  
Gold Night Drops (30ml)
Powered by the healing waters of Budapest, the anti-ageing treatment works throughout the night to repair and strengthen skin, leaving it refreshed and revitalised come morning. Vitamin A helps to reverse the effects of sun damage and minimise the appearance of fine lines, whilst Colloidal Gold and Vitamin C together boost the skin's immune system.
Gold Eye Lift (15ml)
Rejuvenate the delicate eye area with the ultra-nourishing, anti-ageing eye cream. Fortified with the brand's patented Hydro Mineral Transference™ system, the fast-absorbing formula delivers minerals deep into the skin to diminish dark circles and puffiness. Colloidal Gold provides anti-inflammatory benefits, whilst Vitamin A fights the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles to reveal a smoother, more refined eye contour.
name: Summer Value Set Balmy Nights Duo (Worth £295.00)

product_description:
freezeframe 美白祛斑精华霜专为均匀肤色而设计，能有效减少色素沉着、老年斑和痘疤。 这款面霜富含二氧化钛和荧光增白剂，只需10分钟便可见效；持续使用4周，便可显著改善肤色。
除此之外，还融合了仿生肽和酶换肤成份，协同作用，带给您更年轻、更均匀的肤色。 这是一款必备的护肤产品！ K.D.
name: 美白祛斑精华霜

product_description: Institut Esthederm 雅诗敦古铜色脉动面部和身体喷雾为您缔造日晒褐色肌肤做好准备，其配方可有效增强肌肤对阳光的自然抵抗能力。 这款喷雾通过激活着色过程使肌肤做好准备，具有保护肌肤和优化细胞能量环境的作用。 能更快的着色和增深肤色，并可以持久保持肤色。
name: Esthederm 雅诗敦古铜色脉动面部和身体喷雾 150ml

product_description:
伊荷盈潤保濕霜SPF8 可修復乾性成熟肌膚，令肌膚水潤豐盈。這款保濕液蘊含海洋活性物和植物萃取物，令肌膚更加健康，光彩照人。 
伊荷盈潤保濕霜SPF8 採用抗衰老配方，融合抗氧化物、海洋活性物和補水植物萃取物，幫助抵禦傷害、激活原膠原合成，令肌膚再現年輕光彩。 
使用說明：
name: Herbology 伊荷盈润保湿霜 SPF8 50ml

product_description:
Take control of your skin with StriVectin's Advanced Retinol Pore Refiner, a lightweight lotion that works to control shine and minimise the appearance of pores with both instant and long-term effects.
Visibly reducing the look of pores by 50%*, the silky formula glides effortlessly across skin and delivers superior anti-ageing results; its hydrating and smoothing properties purify and refine skin tone and texture whilst absorbing excess oil to control shine and leave skin with a mattified finish.
Your complexion looks smoother, fresher and more youthful in appearance.
*Based on technician evaluation at 8 weeks.
name: Advanced Retinol Pore Refiner 50ml

product_description:
体验 Astalift Regenerating Night Cream 的功效。这是一种丰盈的抗衰老配方，利用红色素"虾青素"，抵御自由基损伤并促进胶原蛋白的生成。 Astalift 由 FUJIFILM 打造，是一个屡获殊荣的美容品牌，采用类似于防止照片褪色的先进抗氧化技术，尽可能减少雀斑并减轻肌肤衰老。
这款晚霜可有效地锁住肌肤水分，防止水分蒸发，且有助于让休息中的肌肤实现隔夜再生 - 这是肌肤最容易接受的时间段。 这一配方非常适合于容易出现干燥、粗糙肌肤的人士，令肌肤柔滑而富于弹性，并减少细纹和皱纹。 可呈现拥有早上醒来时亮泽的更青春、更健康的肌肤。 - K.N
name: Regenerating Night Cream (30g)

product_description:
Cheat the clock with the 40 Winks Anti-Ageing Sheet Mask from FACEINC by nails inc. Ideal for skin in need of a youthful lift, the glamorous sheet mask is designed to visibly firm and brighten the complexion.
Fortified with Collagen and Multivitamins, the face mask visibly plumps skin and reduces the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles. The moisturising sheet mask is complete with a blend of Hyaluronic Acid and Ceramide, which combine to visibly even skin tone and leave the complexion uniform, supple and youthful.
name: by nails inc. 40 Winks Anti-Ageing Sheet Mask - Firming and Brightening

product_description:
Olay Regenerist Night Recovery Cream 含有真正有效的专用成分，用于晚间为肌肤补充水分，赋予肌肤活力。让人在清晨醒来时感觉神清气爽。
其目的是促进表面细胞再生，达到充满活力、自然亮泽的效果。 持续使用超过 3 周后，您定会对效果深感惊讶！ K.D.
name: Regenerist Night Recovery Cream (50ml)

product_description:
Moisturise and soothe skin with the Erno Laszlo Sensitive Hydrogel Mask. Suitable for all skin types yet gentle enough for even the most sensitive, this lightweight face mask is enriched with botanical extracts and works to hydrate and rebalance, leaving you with a refreshed and smooth complexion.
It’s expertly formulated with vitamin-rich Rose Oil and Peach Leaf, which aim to refine texture and reduce the appearance of fine lines, whilst Skullcap Root revitalises dull and dry skin and encourages cell renewal. Fortified with Honeysuckle extract that acts as a natural detoxifier and helps even out redness and irritations including rosacea, the cooling face mask reveals a brighter and more youthful looking appearance.
name: Laszlo Sensitive Hydrogel Mask (4 Pack)

product_description:
使用 Dr. Brandt 柏瑞特医生抗老化三肽眼霜可让您重现青春容颜。 这款强效眼霜采用超营养配方，可轻松融入肌肤，有效消除娇嫩眼部肌肤的衰老迹象，包括最大化抚平细纹和皱纹，消除水肿，淡化黑眼圈以及修复损伤的肌肤。
独特的乳木果油、神经酰胺 3 和磷脂质的混合物配方可增强眼部肌肤防御能力，为肌肤提供营养，而三肽复合物可刺激胶原蛋白形成，让肌肤水润而焕发活力。 通过深度滋养为您的眼部肌肤带来梦寐以求的活力与光彩。 E.N.
name: Brandt 柏瑞特医生抗老化三肽眼霜（15 克）

product_description:
Fake Bake 肌肤顺滑独特甘油蕴含有植物萃取物和精油的奢华混合物，具有保湿功效，可将 Fake Bake 褐色渗透到肌肤深层，以尽可能持久地保持肤色。
这款甘油质地的喷雾非常容易被肌肤吸收，使肌肤更加柔软而有光泽。 它带有百香果、玫瑰果和椴树花的芳香，使用后令肌肤感觉更加清爽丝滑。
name: Bake 肌肤顺滑独特甘油喷雾（236ml）

product_description:
使用 Aurelia 益生菌润肤奇迹洁面乳清洁和改善您的肌肤，这款乳状洁面乳荣获过多重奖项，可有效消除杂质，增强肌肤的自然光泽。
这款植物香型的洁面乳含有令人精力充沛的精油，轻轻拂过肌肤，就可以专业地祛除化妆品残留物和日常堆积的污垢，让肌肤更加清爽。
将益生素和肽技术与生物有机植物和花瓣精华完美结合，这款智能洁面乳可为脱水的肌肤提供抗氧化成分和脂肪酸；让您拥有梦寐以求的柔软、清洁、焕然一新的肤色，并恢复肌肤的水合作用。 内置于一个便利的液压瓶中。
name: 益生菌润肤奇迹洁面乳超大包装 240ml（售价 £76）

product_description:
Experience the ultimate anti-ageing eye treatment with Filorga’s Eyes-Absolute® Cream; a fast-acting product that works to reverse the look of wrinkles, dark circles and puffiness with pioneering scientific technologies in as little as 30 days.
Featuring an innovative Cryo-Applicator tip for an instant cooling effect, the lightweight serum rapidly absorbs into skin with an advanced complex of active ingredients that deliver Botox-like lifting and plumping effects.
Brimming with decongesting metalloproteins and peptides, it effectively restructures the appearance of sagging and fine lines while discolouration is alleviated with the power of White Pearl extract and soft-focus light reflecting pigments.   
Suitable for all skin types, the delicate eye area appears transformed and revitalised with a youthful looking radiance and smooth, supple skin texture.
name: Eyes Absolute Cream 15ml

product_description:
Deliver anti-aging moisture to your skin with the Blue Marine Algae Mask from Peter Thomas Roth; a hydrating gel treatment mask rich with Blue Marine Algae, a soothing, nourishing seaweed that infuses skin with nutrients and humectants to help defend against dehydration and prevent future damage.
The gel contains moisture energising Tea sourced from the Jeju Island of Korea to deliver deep nourishment and abundant moisture to skin, and Antarcticine, a unique glycoprotein sourced from Arctic glacial ice that helps skin retain water and protect against water loss in extreme climates or temperatures.
The mask helps to visibly reduce fine lines and dehydration effects on the skin, creating a smooth complexion with a healthy looking glow. – E.W.
name: Thomas Roth Blue Marine Algae Mask (150ml)

product_description:
Murad旗下的Balancing Moisturizer Broad Spectrum SPF 15 PA++能够在起到保湿、让皮肤柔软水嫩的同时，可以防止皮肤不受阳光的伤害，产品质地具有轻盈感，能够立刻让皮肤吸收。 本润肤霜含有日本桤木花提取物，可以防止黑头的形成，其中的乳酸和氨基酸能够起到轻盈的补水作用，含有维生素A、C和E的微粒能够促进皮肤再生，从而让皮肤更为健康和平和。
本产品采用创新配方，可以让您保持极佳的肤色、疏通毛孔、去除黑头和阻挡日晒的伤害。 无论进行何种皮肤护理，本款产品都是必不可少的产品。 K.D.
name: Hydrate Protect Pore Reform Balancing Moisturizer SPF15（50ml）

product_description: 使用 Embryolisse Essential Dry Skin Balm，舒缓干燥、刺激和敏感型肌肤，并提供持久舒适。 富含四种天然油脂，包括保湿牛油果油、滋润甜杏仁、具备镇静特性的棉籽油，以其可提供维生素 A 和 E 的杏子，令肌肤柔滑水嫩。 这款护肤霜富含脂肪酸和维生素，赋予肌肤天鹅绒般的质地，同时不会让肌肤油腻或太粘。 本品采用小盒子包装，对于干性肌肤的人士而言，是其手袋中或旅行期间的必备品。 E.N.
name: Essential Dry Skin Balm (15ml)

product_description:
Catering specifically for thirsty, parched complexion, the Indeed Labs Hydraluron Moisture Jelly utilises Hyaluronic Acid to deliver long-lasting hydration to dry skin.
Fortified with innovative Fucogel®, the ultra-lightweight, refreshing formula creates a protective veil over skin to defend against transepidermal water loss, whilst PatcH2O™ (a micro network moisture complex) restores the skin's natural barrier to leave your complexion soft, supple and replenished. Housed in a unique pump jar that dispenses the perfect amount each time.
name: Labs Hydraluron Moisture Jelly 30ml

product_description:
Boost sagging and dehydrated skin with the Erno Laszlo Firmarine Hydrogel Mask. Super lightweight with a gel-like texture, the mask moulds to your face and penetrates deep into the epidermis to nourish and moisturise whilst enhancing natural contours.
Enriched with concentrated botanical extracts and essential oils, it works to firm and tone whilst enhancing skin elasticity. Argan Oil seals in moisture and acts as a natural detoxifer, whilst Grapefruit Extract plumps and rejuvenates, helping to fill in the appearance of fine lines. Suitable for all skin types, the advanced anti-ageing face mask leaves skin looking revitalised, smooth and supple.
name: Laszlo Firmarine Hydrogel Mask (4 Pack)

product_description: Experience a clear, radiant complexion with the yes to Grapefruit Daily Facial Scrub. Utilising Lemon Balm and Grapefruit (rich in Vitamin C), the daily exfoliator gently buffs away dead, dull skin cells; it helps to combat uneven skin tone and texture for a smoother, more refined finish. Skin is touchably soft, bright and rejuvenated with restored luminosity.
name: to Grapefruit Daily Facial Scrub

product_description:
使用PAYOT Hydra 24 Daily Moisturising Cream滋润舒缓肌肤，本品含有多效保湿配方，令您持久舒适。
霜状质地能够轻松融化进肌肤进行密集补水，同时对抗最初衰老的迹象。 其肌肤水分调节成分和水分吸收功能协同工作，帮助维持水分含量，对抗最初衰老的迹象，令肤色更加年轻健康。
天然蜂蜜提取物能够舒缓和软化肌肤，恢复健康活力光泽。
name: 柏姿 24 小时补水霜 50ml

product_description:
这款珍贵的面油可促进肌肤在夜间的恢复活力和更新过程，并以最佳的天然抗衰老成分滋补肌肤。 采用最好的Rose油自然刺激肌肤自身的胶原蛋白生成，Rosehip油可帮助细胞再生并修复受损的肌肤组织，金盏花能舒缓和镇静肌肤，富含营养的胡萝卜油令肌肤活力得到调理以重现活力，Jojoba油滋养肌肤，而乳香油则会修复干燥皮肤和治愈肌肤瑕疵。 Radiance夜用精油是您的天然抗衰老佳品及稳睡美容觉的奥秘所在。 - SC
获奖情况："编辑选择奖"，2011 Green Parent Natural Beauty Awards 奖，同时刚刚荣获了2013 Oh Natural "最佳面油"奖。
使用说明： 每天晚上在洁面和保湿后，滴几滴在您的面部和颈部轻轻揉搓，特别是一些重点部位。 添加几滴至Nourishing晚霜、平衡夜用啫喱、Hydrating啫喱面膜或Ultra Nourishing面膜中可增加活肤效果。 几滴Nourishing Hand Cream让您获得夜间手部护理。
适合所有肤质，尤其是中性至干性和成熟型肌肤。
Living Nature由100％的天然成分制作。利用新西兰特有的原生植物，净化、修复、滋养肌肤。这些植物包括：Harakeke亚麻胶、桃拓酚、麦卢卡蜜、麦卢卡油、哈罗粘土及海带等。 天然有机系列从来没有，将来也不会在动物身上进行试验。
Living Nature绝对不含人工合成成分或内分泌干扰物。 全系列产品均已经德国 BDIH 认证。其中许多产品都已达到全食物高级护肤品的标准。
该系列产品的安全性已得到独立验证。此外，在深层护肤化妆品安全数据库中它们是评分最高者之一。  Living Nature 的政策：如果您对产品中任何一种成分的安全性持怀疑态度，我们将立即摈弃该成分。 
事实上，该系列产品利用新西兰本土植物强大的生物活性，来滋养、净化、修复肌肤。 其高效的护肤活力旨在增强肌肤自身的天然功能。 此功能与正在进行的独立测试同时接受审查。
name: Nature Radiance夜用精油10ml

product_description:
The GLOV Hydro Cleansing Bunny Ears Set provides everything you need for an effortless, simple and all-round cleanse without the need for a cleanser. Presented in branded gift packaging, the kit provides an innovative solution to leave skin feeling refreshed and purified – complete with a fun bunny-tie headband to keep hair out of the way.
On-The-Go Hydro Cleanser
Utilising advanced microfibre technology, the cleansing glove contains refined fibres up to 30 times thinner than a cotton pad, which boast electrostatic properties to absorb makeup, dirt and excess oil like a magnet without the need for a facial cleanser. The delicate and naturally antibacterial glove delivers a light yet effective clean with a gentle peeling effect to unveil skin that feels fresher and revitalised.
name: Hydro Cleansing Bunny Ears Set - White

product_description:
Dr Dennis Gross 推出了 阿魏酸和 Retinol 皱纹恢复面膜；一种抗衰老、多益处的配方，致力于促进胶原蛋白的生成，促进细胞更新，以及支持皮肤的天然修复过程。
该产品是拥有基于植物成分的抗氧化剂，内含临床剂量的Retinol和阿魏酸，它创新的晚间护理功效可减少皱纹的出现并消除肤色不均，同时温和地去除皮肤表面的角质以改善纹理，使您在早餐拥有一个更光滑、精致的肤色。 Skin变得紧致、肤色更均匀和亮丽。 独立包装，使用方便。
name: Dennis Gross 阿魏酸和Retinol 皱纹消除面膜（16片装）

product_description:
men-ü 保濕提拉乳液集備受讚譽的須後霜與保濕霜於一體，使用清爽不油膩配方，可補充肌膚內丟失的水分，縮小毛孔，在每次剃須後面部清爽自然。 
極致濃縮，即使極其小巧，也能滿足TSA 關於攜帶行李的要求，適合所有膚質使用，擁有多達165 次的用量。 men-ü 保濕提拉乳液採用全植物成分，不含刺激物質，消除肌膚油光，呈現完美啞光，而且包含蘆薈、甘油和矽酮，鎖住水分，使用後肌膚長久保濕。 — LR 
 使用說明：
name: 脸部提拉保湿霜 100ml

product_description:
Murad慕拉修顏保濕霜SPF15（對抗紅腫） 50ml 
為易受刺激的肌膚提供全天補水和UVA/UVB 防護。枸杞子和歐亞甘草萃取物中和刺激，其抗菌性可緩和發紅，同時膚色糾正可進一步消除發紅。 
 附加特性和成分： 
 使用說明： 
每天塗用後，均勻在臉部和頸部按摩。 
 主要成分： 
桂皮酸鹽7.5%、氧化鋅2.0%
name: 慕拉修颜保湿霜 SPF15（对抗红肿） 50ml

product_description:
使用芳香的 KORRES Lip Butter Stick SPF15 in Pink 浸润并柔滑唇部。 本品非常适用于干裂嘴唇。其出色的天然配方含橘子油，可提供深层滋养和持久呵护，令唇部娇嫩柔软。
这款 Lip Butter Stick SPF15 in Pink 含有乳木果油和葵花籽蜡等关键成分，赋予嘴唇微妙的粉色色调，同时给予强效保湿和防护，令唇部柔软、诱人！ 橘子油能调理干燥嘴唇，而 SPF15 能为最脆弱的部位提供必要防护，有助于抚平和滋养唇部。
name: Lip Butter Stick Spf15 - Pink

product_description:
使用 Bee Good 青春强化饱满和紧致 Moisturiser Moisturiser重新发现您肌肤的青春活力，这款每日抗衰老润肤霜富含明质酸，在密集补水的同时使细纹和皱纹变得平滑。
这款青春活力保湿霜适合所有肌肤类型，非常适合成熟的肤色，可使肌肤更年轻、亮白；其所含的Pepha-tight可产生提拉和紧致效果，使肌肤获得持久强化，而富含抗氧化剂的覆盆子籽油和英国的野花Honey有助于防止衰老迹象的出现。 玻尿酸熟练地保持水分，这有助于使肌肤丰满，减少细纹和皱纹，突显更年轻的肤色。
您的肌肤将会变得柔软、水嫩，恢复光采和补足水分。
name: Good青春强化饱满和紧致Moisturiser（50ml）

product_description:
Elemis动态焕肤精华 使您的面部肌肤焕然一新，创新的面部护理配方执行非研磨性的面部清洁，帮助您的皮肤变得光滑，同时缩小毛孔和减少皱纹。
临床证明可有效改善面部肌肤，该皮肤平滑配方将磨皮技术与四种植物阿尔法羟基酸相结合，可以溶解表面死皮细胞，促进细胞再生。 其Selastin™（海洋植物的成分）成分针对毛孔粗大，同时氨基酸和维生素C专门针对面部肌肤调色、光滑和亮丽您的肌肤。
期待一个焕然一新、完好如初的面部肌肤，让您的肌肤毛孔缩小，恢复青春的亮丽肤色。
name: 焕活换肤精华液 30ml

product_description:
使用Dr. Brandt的强效维生素C抗衰老Face精华素恢复肌肤光采。
本款抗衰老产品含有20％的浓缩维生素C，用于减少细纹、皱纹和黑斑，抗氧化剂还能对抗环境侵害因素，使肌肤光滑，洁净，纯净。 吸收迅速质感轻薄，使用后肌肤紧致，肤色年轻，散发无限光采。
name: Brandt强效维生素C抗衰老Face精华液16.3ml

product_description:
使用 MONUSKIN 男士须后修复霜，舒缓并滋润剃须后的肌肤。 这款质地轻盈的霜状凝胶富含海洋生物肽，能够舒缓因剃须受损的肌肤。 修复霜特别添加了黑醋粟籽油，让肌肤恢复最佳水润平衡。
使用说明 ：挤1-2下瓶嘴，涂于面部和颈部，按摩以促进吸收。
name: 男士须后修复霜 50ml

product_description:
Elizabeth Arden Flawless Future Caplet Serum Powered by Ceramide是一款独特的液质凝胶状精华液，使用时会和胶囊小珠混合生效，共同抵抗开始出现的岁月痕迹，非常适合忙碌一族。
本品能快速强效地补充肌肤能量；它亲附肌肤，吸收变干后能令肌肤光滑润泽、无负重感。
先进的护肤系统由支援性神经酰胺、保护性蛋白复合成分和强效肌肤蛋白混制而成，令肌肤每时每刻都看上去轻松无压力。
丝滑配方蕴含了Ceramide Skin Identical Matrix、Telosense™、肌肤亮白成分和毛孔细化成分，能快速渗入肌肤，巩固肌肤保护屏障，减少细纹和粗大毛孔，提亮不均匀和暗沉的肤色并滋润肌肤，让您重新焕发青春光彩。 - SA
name: Arden Flawless Future Caplet Serum Powered by Ceramide (30ml)

product_description:
本品為功效強大但溫和的溶液，清除導致臉部暗淡和毛孔堵塞的油脂殘餘、累積物和死皮細胞。 
含有效乙醇酸和蘋果酸，深層清潔肌膚，舒緩和治愈成份使臉部更柔滑，平衡肌膚水份。定期使用，使肌膚乾淨明亮，更加柔滑。不含酒精和油脂，無刺激。 
建議每天使用本品，以清潔油膩和易長痘肌膚，提供修復和改善，治療痘痘。獨特配方可清潔毛孔的油脂殘餘、累積物和死皮細胞，消除發紅、刺激和發炎；水潤、軟化和柔滑肌膚。 
使用說明：
name: 清痘爽肤水 177ml

product_description:
Uriage Hyséac 清爽洁肤霜，可清理净化皮肤。配方柔和，发泡型，适用于清洗易生斑点的敏感肌肤。
奶油泡沫配方，非常适合涂在脸上、背部、胸部和脆弱的皮肤上。净化肌肤、调节肌肤菌群，使容易发红敏感的肌肤感觉舒适，柔和地清洁肌肤。 内含 Cerasterol-2F 聚合物、甘氨酸和Uriage温泉水等成分，可舒缓修复肌肤。 
使受损肌肤得到深层滋润、去除肌肤多余皮脂，使肤色完美无瑕，无油光。
name: Hyséac 清爽洁肤霜（150ml）

product_description:
用Elizabeth Arden Visible Difference 水颜美妆精华露准备度过美好的一天。 这款产品融合了维生素 A和植物提取物，有助于光滑、均匀地化妆。
用Elizabeth Arden Visible Difference 水颜美妆精华露 重塑肌肤的纹理，视黄醇亚油酸酯可以温和有效地重塑肌肤的纹理，改善肤色、提升肌肤的清澈度。 强大的抗氧化剂葡萄籽提取物可以提亮肤色并随着时间的推移令肤色均匀。 Avocado和桦树皮提取物可以增加光泽，有助于肌肤保持健康，同时可以消除细纹。
使用说明：
name: Arden Visible Difference 水颜美妆精华露 (15ml)

product_description:
Aurelia Probiotic Skincare  细胞活肤滋润晚霜 ，在人体睡眠过程中，使肌肤再现活力。 这种晚霜尤其适合敏感肌肤，混合了补益性琉璃苣油，紧致性吊灯树，可滋润舒缓暗沉脱水的肌肤，使肌肤更亮丽、更精致。
本款滋润霜，可被肌肤快速吸收、不油腻，结合了抗氧化芙蓉和丰富的ω-猴面包树等成分，可对抗自由基对肌肤的损害及环境因素的侵害，对抗肌肤过早老化，使肌肤容光焕发、晶莹剔透。 散发出橙花、薰衣草、玫瑰、柑橘精油等混合在一起的特有香味。
name: Probiotic Skincare 细胞活肤滋润晚霜 60ml

product_description:
这款黄油般柔滑的KORRES番石榴润唇膏融化在您干裂的嘴唇上，留下天然色泽和香味，适合单独使用或涂在您最喜欢的唇彩之下以提供额外保湿。
这款KORRES 番石榴润唇膏所含的乳木果油与米蜡为您的嘴唇提供深层持久的保湿和保护，让您拥有楚楚可人、完美的柔软双唇。
10毫升

Shiseido 资生堂新透白美肌集中焕白眼霜（15 毫升）可有效祛除黑眼圈。 这款超滋润的眼霜采用 Shiseido 资生堂独特的亮白技术，可有效阻断黑色素，改善微循环。
这款眼霜通过阻断黑色素来解决黑眼圈问题，淡化黑眼圈，并改善微循环。 这款眼霜还含有具备光漫射功能的多向控光粉末，可让肌肤瞬间变得明亮生动。 -SA
name: 资生堂新透白美肌集中焕白眼霜（15 毫升）

product_description:
Purify the complexion with the Peter Thomas Roth Black and Gold Kit; a selection of coveted skincare products that work to offer a flawless complexion. Combining a cleansing gel, two face masks and a radiance cream, the collection boasts everything you need for healthy looking skin with a youthful glow.
Irish Moor Mud Purifying Cleansing Gel (120ml)
Clarify and refresh your complexion with the Irish Moor Mud Cleansing Gel; a purifying formula that expertly cleans skin without uncomfortable dryness or tightness. Synergising 9,000 year old Irish Moor Mud with Hijiki Seaweed, Volcanic Ash and Activated Charcoal, the cleanser effortlessly eliminates pore-clogging dirt, oil and make-up to reveal smooth, healthy-looking skin. Tea Tree Oil and Willow Bark help to minimise the appearance of visible pores, fine lines and wrinkles, whilst 0.4% Salicylic Acid gently exfoliates the skin's surface to improve tone and texture. Your complexion is left radiant, refined and deeply revitalised.
Irish Moor Mud Mask (50ml)
The luxurious face mask deeply cleanses and decongests skin, without stripping moisture. Its unique formula contains 9,000 year old Black Moor Mud, which provides a high concentration of bio-minerals, vitamins and antioxidants to protect skin. Hijiki Seaweed hydrates, whilst Volcanic Ash helps to revitalise, purify and refresh. Enriched with Activated Charcoal, the rich mask effectively removes excess oil, dirt and impurities and minimises the appearance of visible pores for a smoother, more refined complexion. Experience renewed, youthful-looking skin with a natural glow.
24K Gold Mask (50ml)
Achieve a youthful glow with the 24K Gold Mask; a luxurious anti-ageing treatment. Infused with pure 24K Gold and Colloidal Gold, the face mask is designed to visibly improve skin’s firmness and encourage radiant and supple skin. The mask also contains a blend of Caffeine and Peridot, which combine to visibly tighten skin, as well as reducing the appearance of stressed and ageing skin. Complete with a hydrating blend of Hyaluronic Acid and Glycerin, the Gold Mask delivers a veil of intense moisture to the face, leaving skin smooth, revitalised and youthful.
24K Gold Pure Luxury Lift & Firm Prism Cream (50ml)
Reveal a luminous complexion with the 24K Gold Pure Luxury Lift & Firm Prism Cream. Utilising 24K Gold, Colloidal Gold and Intelligent Shade-Sensing Sphere Technology, the cream seeks to create a lit-from-within glow. Optical diffusers offer a prismatic effect that scatters light on the face and is able to reduce the appearance of imperfections to leave the complexion visibly flawless. The formula self-adjusts in order to suit and complement any skin tone. Complete with advanced hydrators, the Prism Cream prevents moisture loss, leaving the complexion refreshed, dewy and glowing.
name: Thomas Roth Black and Gold Kit

product_description: 提供最佳的防曬補水保護，能讓肌膚從一早就開始補水，修復肌膚豐潤。帶來強效的抗氧化物質，內含多種必需氨基酸、大豆花和天然卵磷脂，共同起效，維持肌膚彈性，改善細紋，充分補水。
name: 慕拉岁月无痕日霜 SPF30 (50ml)

product_description:
利用来自this works的 "Light Time净化焕采清洁液 " 体验极致清洁效果，这款日常一分钟肌肤焕采清洁液可在洁净肌肤的同时提高水分含量。
这款强大的清洁液融合水活化维生素C与维生素E和荷荷巴油成分，构成一种遇水起效的清洁膏，帮助驱除疲劳迹象，清除杂质的同时令肌肤焕发青春光彩。  
肌肤将更加清洁、亮白和年轻。 - K.N.
name: works Light Time净化焕采清洁液（75ml）

product_description: Cleanse and soothe sensitive skin with the yes to PrimRose Oil 2-in-1 Facial Wipes. Harnessing the powers of calming Evening Primrose Oil, the gentle face wipes work to sweep away makeup and dirt while infusing skin with moisture and minimising the look of redness. Lightly fragranced and non-greasy, skin is left feeling refreshed and hydrated with a more even tone.
name: to PrimRose Oil 2-in-1 Facial Wipes

product_description:
这款 Nuxe Creme Fraiche 精华液可以提供 24 小时滋润，非常适合需要一些保湿的普通肌肤。 这款精华液具有舒缓、镇静的功效，其轻盈的质地很容易为肌肤吸收，使肌肤如丝绸般柔软。

这款精华液适合用于眼部轮廓区域，可有效舒缓剃刀烧伤，其配方蕴含透明质酸和海蓬子，可以提高水分水平，令肌肤整天都超柔软和水润。
name: Creme Fraiche霜（普通Skin） (30ml)

product_description:
用NUXE Nuxellence 青春修复精华露可明显改善肌肤的质地和外观。 该产品可令肌肤恢复能量，有助于您拥有无暇的肤色，同时该产品的抗衰老性能可以修复线粒体 DNA，令肌肤青春耀眼。
这款女性香味的液体拥有淡淡的花香气息， 其配方蕴含 87％的天然成分，可令肌肤看上去年轻、容光焕发，感觉柔滑。 -SA
name: Nuxellence 青春修复精华露 (50ml)

product_description:
Improve skin tone and texture with the Indeed Labs Fillume™ Volumising Serum; a powerful, anti-ageing formula that works beneath the skin's surface to counteract the forces of gravity.
Fortified with UPlevity™ and Syn®-Tacks, the multi-peptide serum absorbs quickly to help fight loss of elasticity and sagging skin, whilst delivering a firming, plumping effect to reveal smoother, more refined facial contours without the use of fillers or needles. Minimises the appearance of furrow lines, nasolabial folds and smile lines for a youthful-looking complexion.
name: Labs Fillume Volumising Serum 30ml

product_description:
BAKEL 贝蔻脸部和身体防晒霜 SPF 30   ，既抗衰老又防晒，为您的皮肤提供高度、全方位的保护，以防止皮肤过早老化和抵御自由基的侵害。
防晒霜富含植物油、金缕梅水和洋甘菊等滋养因子，易于涂抹，为您的皮肤提供一层保护膜，有助于舒缓、减轻皮肤发红和减少太阳光的氧化损害。
它的润肤成分和紧致功能令您的肌肤感觉柔软，其植物活性成分带给您健康棕褐色肌肤。 肌肤色调和弹性均改善。
name: SPF 30 150毫升

product_description:
Treat your skin to the Shaveworks Pearl Luxe Body Lotion; a deeply hydrating formula that works to soften, smoothen and condition skin from top to toe.
Infused with Allantoin and Aloe Vera, the lightweight lotion soothes, calms and restores long-lasting comfort, whilst Bisabolol provides anti-inflammatory properties to heal skin. Capislow™ reduces hair growth so you can shave less frequently and avoid razor bumps, leaving skin nourished, rejuvenated and perfectly pampered.
name: Pearl Luxe Hydrating Body Lotion

product_description: 专为男士设计， Menage Anti-Ageing Moisturiser SPF15 为肌肤深层提供水分，恢复健康肤色。 结合该品牌强大的铜PCA抗氧化剂，这款快速吸收配方能够对抗导致早衰迹象的自由基损伤和紫外线，同时通过哑光妆效提供长效保湿，令肌肤舒爽、柔嫩。 类视黄醇促进肌肤的自然修复过程，让您拥有焕发活力、光滑水嫩的肌肤并消除油光。 E.N.
name: Anti-Ageing Moisturiser SPF15（100ml）

product_description:
CODAGE 3号光泽活力精华液（10ml）专为疲倦的暗沉肌肤而配制，能够去除疲态和衰老迹象，令肌肤展现迷人活力。 这款产品由品牌的法国制药专家团队配制而成，混合了多种高效成分，防止肌肤进一步出现衰老的迹象，提亮肤色。 - K.R
Hy1 - 具有补水锁水的深层滋润功效，有助于减缓水分流失。 这种成分还能够促进胶原蛋白，丰盈并紧实肌肤，令肌肤更年轻。
Ao3 - 这一富含抗氧化因子的成分具有修复和保护功效功效，可以保护肌肤抵御自由基和紫外线的伤害，并修复肌肤已有的损伤。
Ru3 - 这一抗皱成分混合了多种抗衰老因子。 减少面部微小的收缩，抚平并减少细纹与皱纹，一有迹象便立即作用。 具有抗氧化功能，防止肌肤衰老，同时刺激胶原蛋白生成，令肌肤丰盈紧致，呈现年轻魅力。
Dx3 - 这一成分能够促进排毒，去除有害毒素，同时为肌肤增添一层保护屏障，防止其他有害物质进入。 修复受损的蛋白质，为肌肤细胞注入能量，让面色更加润泽。
Ec3 - 融合了多种对肌肤有益的成分，改善肌肤，效果卓著，令肌肤容光焕发。 促进细胞更新，滋润锁水，富含抗氧化因子，有助于保护细胞。
name: 3号光泽活力精华液（10ml）

product_description:
CODAGE推出的这款保湿修复精华液由法国制药专家团队精心配制而成。 这一保湿配方富含多种补水成分，共同作用，保护肌肤免受寒冷侵蚀，适合所有肌肤类型，特别是易受干燥影响的皮肤。 这款产品能够深度补水，恢复肌肤的天然水分和油脂，并保护肌肤外层免受环境污染。 特别增加了独特的南极冰川成分，确保肌肤柔软光滑，活力新生。 - K.N.  
这款CODAGE产品包含： 
Hy3 - 具有补水锁水的滋润功效。 这种成分还能够促进胶原蛋白，丰盈并紧实肌肤，令肌肤更年轻。
Hy+ - 这一成分具有更强的保湿功效，它可以为干燥缺水的肌肤立即注入水活力，效果立竿见影。 富含具有锁水功效的透明质酸，提供持久保湿，面色润泽。
Ap3 - 这一成分具有舒缓和保湿功效，防止肌肤受刺激，加强肌肤对炎症反应的耐受程度。
Ao3 - 这一富含抗氧化因子的成分具有修复和保护功效功效，可以保护肌肤抵御自由基和紫外线的伤害，并修复肌肤已有的损伤。
Hi - 这一成分能有效抵御寒冷，令暴露在各种天气环境下的肌肤时时水分充盈，同时还能促进胶原蛋白合成。
Re3 - 这一强大的成分混合了多种修复因子，可以让受损的肌肤细胞重新恢复健康状态，并促进肌肤细胞的自然更新。

CODAGE 6号终极抗衰老精华（30ml）专为修复并防止衰老迹象而配制，直击细纹、皱纹和肤色问题。 这款产品由品牌的法国制药专家团队配制而成，混合了多种高效成分，令肌肤更加紧致，光滑亮泽，还可均匀肤色。 - K.R
Hy3 - 具有补水锁水的滋润功效。 这种成分还能够促进胶原蛋白，丰盈并紧实肌肤，令肌肤更年轻。
Ao3 - 这一富含抗氧化因子的成分具有修复和保护功效功效，可以保护肌肤抵御自由基和紫外线的伤害，并修复肌肤已有的损伤。
Ru3 - 这一抗皱成分混合了多种抗衰老因子。 减少面部微小的收缩，抚平并减少细纹与皱纹，一有迹象便立即作用。 具有抗氧化功能，防止肌肤衰老，同时刺激胶原蛋白生成，令肌肤丰盈紧致，呈现年轻魅力。
Ri3 - 这一成分专门针对细纹和皱纹，能够紧致并强韧肌肤结构，防止肌肤进一步衰老。
Fe3 - 这一具有紧致作用的特殊成分针对多种皮肤结构问题，能够促进胶原蛋白的生成，令肌肤丰盈，同时保持滋润光滑。
Lf1 - 立即提拉肌肤，令肌肤迅速由内而外地紧致，长久呈现年轻态。
Aa - 超级抗衰老混合物。 富含抗氧化因子，对抗已有的衰老迹象和倦容，防止其再次出现，这一成分可以增加肌肤的水分含量，调节色素沉着，令肤色更加均匀柔亮。
Tc3 - 针对肤色不均和黑斑等肌肤问题，淡化色斑，令肌肤展现迷人亮泽。 这一成分能够激活肌肤细胞再生，令肤质光滑，散发迷人光彩。
name: 6号终极抗衰老精华（30ml）

product_description:
Rediscover your skin's youthful capacity with KORRES Castanea Arcadia Anti-Wrinkle and Firming Day Cream for Dry to Very Dry Skin.
Targeting deep wrinkles and loss of elasticity, the non-greasy day cream melts effortlessly into skin, delivering a host of skin-loving ingredients to help reduce the appearance of wrinkles while restoring firmness. Fortified with molecule Active HALupeol, Castanea Arcadia (Arcadian Chestnut tree) extract and brightening Vitamin C, the advanced moisturiser supports skin structure to leave it looking hydrated, smooth and renewed with improved resilience.
name: Castanea Arcadia Anti-Wrinkle and Firming Day Cream Dry to Very Dry Skin 40ml

product_description:
体验 RMK 茉莉草本喷雾的活化作用，清新的草本喷雾瞬间滋润您的肌肤。
喷雾中加入保湿橙花和绿茶提取物，就像一张新鲜的面纱，给年带来健康、柔软、如丝般光滑的肌肤。 它的保湿配方是您妆前保湿，妆后保持清爽、容光焕发效果的完美选择。
肌肤顿觉清新、明亮。
name: 50ml

product_description:
Green People Baby Salve 含有有机麻、金盏花和薰衣草，是一款最畅销的天然修护药膏，可舒缓宝宝的肌肤。 本品含 96% 有机成分，也可作为一款优秀的护乳霜，呈现敏感而细腻的肤色。
Green People Baby Salve 具备防水特性，且仅含纯天然成分，非常适合涂抹至宝宝的双手、面部、身体和臀部，在尿布疹发作期间防止潮湿。
Green People 使用非空运的可回收包装。 产品只含有少量手工制作的纯天然有机成分，确保收到产品时尽可能新鲜。 请注意，由于含蜂蜡，本品适用于素食主义者，但不适用于绝对素食者。
使用说明：
name: People Lavender Baby Salve (100ml)

product_description:
KORRES Black松树抗皱紧致Face 精华液（瓶子和滴管）有助于明显改善衰老的迹象，让您的肌肤看上去和感觉起来更年轻。 它营养丰富，具有滋养功效，可增加肌肤的弹性、减少细纹和皱纹。
它的紧肤和提升功效使得它非常适合熟龄肌肤，而九种有效成分可以保护、滋润和护理您的娇嫩肌肤。
使用说明： 使用滴管日常涂抹使用。 要特别注意细纹和皱纹出现的区域，包括眼部区域和嘴部区域。
name: Black 松树抗皱紧致 Face 精华液（瓶子和滴管） (30ml)

product_description:
Treat tired, maturing skin to the benefits of MÁDARA's Superseed Age Recovery Organic Facial Oil; 100% natural, certified organic formula that utilises ten nourishing oils, including Tomato, Strawberry, Rowanberry and Carrot Seed to restore a youthful glow.
Infused with an anti-ageing cocktail of Rosehip, St. John's Wort and Raspberry Oils, the fast-absorbing treatment works to minimise the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles, whilst antioxidant-rich Sea Buckthorn, Cranberry and Blackcurrant defend against environmental aggressors. The versatile face oil can be used alone or blended with moisturiser to leave your complexion hydrated and rejuvenated. Complete with a pipette for mess-free application.
name: Superseed Age Recovery Organic Facial Oil 30ml

product_description:
Revive tired eyes with the Wake Me Up Collagen Eye Patches from MAGICSTRIPES. The cooling eye masks are designed to offer an added boost to tired and mature eyes, whilst also possessing anti-ageing benefits.
The eye patches create a cooling effect, visibly reducing the appearance of swelling or puffiness around the eye area, as well as visibly brightening dark circles. Enriched with Collagen, the patches aim to improve the appearance of the skin’s elasticity, leaving younger looking skin with a youthful glow. Formulated with Hyaluronic Acid, the treatment offers moisture alongside anti-ageing qualities, nourishing the skin and deeply hydrating.
name: Wake Me Up Collagen Eye Patches x 5 Sachets

product_description:
Rejuvenate and revitalise with Mizon's Intensive Skin Barrier Eye Gel Mask; a specially shaped, hydrogel mask that adheres to the face for maximum effect.
Infused with Hyaluronic Acid, the powerful treatment infuses skin with intense moisture and hydration, whilst helping to combat signs of ageing around the eye area, including fine lines, under-eye bags and dark circles. Its dose of Ceramide strengthens and protects to reveal smoother, brighter and younger-looking eyes.
name: Intensive Skin Barrier Eye Gel Mask Set 8 x 15g

product_description:
Mizon’s UV Sun Protector Cream SPF50/PA+++ (Korea’s UVA rating system) is a moisturising sunscreen that delivers high protection against harmful UVA and UVB rays while addressing dryness and dehydration.
Boasting nutrient-rich, plant-based ingredients, the lightweight formula rapidly skins into skin without feeling greasy, providing a powerful shield from sun damage to help limit the appearance of premature ageing. Ideal for winter sport vacations when skin needs extra TLC and SPF protection, the cream leaves skin feeling softened, hydrated and replenished.
name: UV Sun Protector Cream SPF50+/Pa+++ 50ml

product_description:
Energise lack-lustre skin with the Mizon Vita Lemon Calming Cream; a lightweight, rejuvenating formula that absorbs quickly to combat signs of dryness and fatigue.
Synergising vitamin-enriched Lemon and Carbonic Acid, the non-greasy cream delivers intense moisture and hydration, whilst boosting and refreshing tired skin to reveal a brighter, smoother complexion with restored vitality. Skin appears radiant, nourished and invigorated after use.
name: Vita Lemon Calming Cream 50ml

product_description: Dr. Hauschka 更年期肌肤强效修复精华专为处于更年期的肌肤提供特殊呵护，平衡激素导致的肌肤变化。 特别添加了雏菊和玫瑰精油，配合阿根廷红宝石粉和和黑升麻，让暗沉肌肤重现活力，减少红血丝和色素沉淀。 镇静肌肤，均匀肤色，减少红血丝。 - L.M.
name: Hauschka 更年期肌肤强效修复精华 40ml

product_description:
Renew your skin with Mizon Black Snail All-in-One Cream, a premium moisturiser infused with 90% Black Snail extract, one of Korea's best kept beauty secrets for achieving smoother, younger-looking skin.
Working to replenish moisture, improve signs of ageing and diminish imperfections such as dark spots, blemishes and blackheads, the antioxidant-rich formula melts effortlessly into skin, delivering instant hydration whilst brightening and fighting signs of ageing with Niacinamide and Peptides. Enriched with 20 different plant extracts and a cocktail of Olive Oil, Panthenol and Shea Butter, the moisturiser will help to fade hyperpigmentation whilst smoothing the appearance of fine lines.
name: Black Snail All-in-One Cream 75ml

product_description:
Institut Esthederm 的 Repair System Restructuring Eye Contour Cream 可重塑、再生和强化脆弱的眼部区域。 其疏导和解除充血功效可最大限度地减少黑眼圈和浮肿。
使用 Institut Esthederm 的 Repair System Restructuring Eye Contour Cream，自然修复肌肤。 肌肤会呈现均匀色调与亮泽；皱纹、细纹和疲态都将明显减少，令双眸尽显青春。
专门技术：
使用说明：
name: Esthederm Eye Contour Youth Cream 15ml

product_description: Treat your skin to Archipelago’s Botanicals Boticario di Havana Body Lotion. Based on the Havana home fragrance that blends Ylang Ylang, Tobacco Flower and Bergamot, the richly moisturising lotion has a citrus finish that is suitable for both men and women. Containing high quality natural ingredients, rich in antioxidants and AHA’s, the body lotion will keep skin hydrated without a greasy residue, reduce redness and calm dry, rough skin and is suitable for daily use.
name: Botanicals Boticario Body Lotion

product_description:
Refresh your skin with Mizon Camomile 90% Toner, a calming and moisturising toner infused with 90% Chamomile extract to hydrate and balance skin pH after cleansing.
Lightweight and relieving, the solution delivers a veil of rich moisture onto skin, absorbing quickly to deliver nutrients deep down. Its dose of Hyaluronic Acid and Trehalose intensely moisturise, whilst Beta-Glucan improves elasticity. Deeply moisturising and relieving, the non-sticky toner will firm and protect skin to keep it safe from external factors. It balances oily and dry skin to leave it feeling revived, refreshed and optimised.
name: Camomile 90% Toner 210ml

product_description:
Treat your complexion to the Mizon Intensive Skin Barrier Emulsion; a lightweight, ultra-hydrating formula that works to replenish and rejuvenate skin.
Harnessing the powers of Hyaluronic Acid and Ceramides, the mild emulsion delivers intense moisture and hydration, whilst conditioning and protecting to defend against dryness caused by harmful environmental aggressors. Reinforces the skin's moisture barrier to leave it feeling soft, smooth and comfortable around the clock.
name: Intensive Skin Barrier Emulsion 150ml

product_description:
Regain a youthful-looking complexion with Mizon Natural Seed Bal-Hyo Ampoule Serum, an anti-ageing solution enriched with essence of Fermented Evening Primrose and Lotus Seeds to deliver high performance, anti-wrinkle action.
Promoting firmer, younger-looking skin, the serum combines anti-ageing actives with a host of moisturising and antioxidant ingredients, including Panthenol, Hyaluronic Acid, and Glycerin to perform a firming effect whilst nourishing, smoothing and retaining moisture. Its regenerative properties help to increase elasticity, and its dose of Cacao Tree and Barberry Root extract protect against external factors to keep skin healthy.
Wrinkles are diminished and skin appears firmer.
name: Natural Seed Bal-Hyo Ampoule Serum 30ml

product_description:
Clarify and refresh your complexion with the Radiance and Vitality Radiant Skin Set from Elemental Herbology. Combining a luxurious cleanser and night cream, the kit work in tandem to leave skin brighter, smoother and younger-looking.
Vital Cleanse Facial Cleanser (25ml)
Formulated with 10% Manuka Honey to help minimise breakouts and brighten skin, whilst exfoliating Papaya Extract diminishes dead skin cells and works to minimise the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles. Infused with antioxidant Green Tea, the cleanser protects skin from environmental damage so you can experience a healthy-looking, refreshed complexion with a natural glow. CellActive® HYDRO combines Seaweed and Apple Pectins to retain moisture levels, and innovative AQUAXYL™ delivers intense hydration to prevent over-drying skin.
Vital Glow Overnight Resurfacing Cream (15ml)
Fast-absorbing and lightweight, the anti-ageing moisturiser utilises Granactive Retinoid to help soften the look of fine lines and wrinkles, revealing a younger-looking, smoother complexion. Expertly blended with advanced levels of Plant C-Stem™ and natural Alpha-Hydroxy Acids (AHAs) derived from Apples, Sugar and Milk, the radiance-reviving cream defends against UV damage and environmental aggressors, whilst promoting brighter, glowing skin with a smooth texture and restored vitality.
name: Herbology Radiance and Vitality Radiant Skin Set

product_description:
Boost the benefits of your Trinity Facial Toning Device with the NuFACE Trinity Wrinkle Reducer, an FDA cleared attachment that works to reduce the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles around the eyes, mouth and forehead.
Compatible with your Trinity Facial Toning Device, the attachment is designed with an ergonomic shape to perfectly fit the contours of your face, and utilises photo light therapy to address wrinkles; it delivers a targeted combination of red, amber and infrared lights to help improve the appearance of skin. Its smart skin sensor enables lights when properly positioned on the face, and its three minute indicator and 21 minute auto-shut off make it easy to use. Regular and continued use is recommended for best results.
name: Trinity Wrinkle Reducer (TWR) Attachment

product_description:
Improve the appearance of blemish-scarred skin with the Mizon Acence Mark-X Blemish After Cream, a lightening and anti-inflammatory formula that works to minimise the look of stubborn blemishes and scar-related pigmentation.
Helping to even out skin tone and reduce discolouration from old spots, the after-treatment utilises antiseptic Propolis to effectively fight bacteria; it treats freshly squeezed pimples to reduce redness, size and discolouration. Delivering brightening properties, it will lighten signs of blemish imperfections and leave the complexion clear and healthy-looking.
name: Acence Mark-X Blemish After Cream 30ml

product_description:
利用 Green People的Age Defy+ 24小时Brightening霜获得更亮白、年轻的肌肤，这是一种加入活性成分的保湿霜，可滋润肌肤，同时减少衰老迹象。
利用三十三种促进年轻肌肤的活性成分，包括菠萝、山毛榉芽和黄瓜的功效，该保湿霜可带来一层水膜，同时可抵御色斑和老年斑。 它的抗衰老配方可增加水分含量和细胞代谢，减少细纹和皱纹，同时增白肌肤。 肌肤充满活力，肤色更加均匀，容光焕发，展现青春光彩。 加入有机香味。 - K.N.
name: People Age Defy+ 24小时Brightening霜（30ml）

product_description:
从内而外散发美丽。  Green People的Age Defy+ Green Beauty胶囊与虾青素是素食增补剂，加入提高免疫力的保健食品，具有解毒和净化细胞功效，以帮助对抗衰老迹象。
针对皱纹和肌肤弹性，该富含抗氧化剂的食品增补剂结合虾青素*、Seagreens®海藻、大麦草、小麦草、螺旋藻和小球藻，以恢复身体系统，令肌肤健康亮丽，充满青春活力。 其妊娠安全配方提供抗衰老营养物质，同时抵御外界侵袭，如污染、紫外线和免疫应激。 - K.N.
name: People Age Defy+ Green Beauty胶囊与虾青素（60粒）

product_description:
使用眼部緊膚霜恢復疲憊的眼睛；得到一個超滋養的護理，消除因老化、壓力和疲勞而導致的症狀，包括明顯減少黑眼圈、魚尾紋和眼袋。 
基於咖啡因的藥物和強大的抗衰老肽系統，它們與純粹的光擴散成分相結合，有助於保濕並加強皮膚屏障。 
盡量減少細紋的出現，您的美目將會亮麗、清爽、青春煥發。

使用 Dr. Brandt 柏瑞特医生细肤青春哑光露有助于延缓自然衰老，淡化细纹和皱纹，这款抗衰老乳液可快速吸收，不含任何油脂，能够有效控油亮肤。
本品蕴含高山植物萃取，有助于缩小毛孔，控制油脂和预防感染；苹果干细胞可帮助延长肌肤中干细胞的寿命和焕发细胞活力，延缓肌肤的自然衰老；木糖葡萄糖苷可增强肌肤的锁水能力，限制水分流失，提高保湿能力；微粒状的粉末可通过吸收肌肤表面的油脂润滑肌肤；松果油可增快细胞的更新速度，让肌肤更柔软平滑，淡化细纹和皱纹。Dr. Brandt 柏瑞特医生细肤青春哑光露有助于细致毛孔，控油焕颜。
使用说明：
name: Brandt 柏瑞特毛孔净透® 系列抗老化保湿乳液（50 克）

product_description:
Meet the needs of ageing skin with the Dermovia LACE YOUR FACE Compression Facial Treatment Mask - Rejuvenating Collagen; a hydrating sheet mask that sits on the contours of the face and provides anti-ageing benefits.
Fortified with Hydrolyzed Collagen and Hyaluronic Acid, the potent face mask delivers intense hydration to skin, which visibly plumps the complexion and creates a youthful look. The mask also utilises Swiss Apple Stem Cells, which work as a collagen booster, renowned for delivering anti-ageing benefits. Wrinkles and fine lines are visibly diminished and skin’s elasticity is improved and maintained.
Expect a long-lasting supple and visibly firm appearance.
name: LACE YOUR FACE Compression Facial Treatment Mask - Rejuvenating Collagen (4 Pack)

product_description:
个人旅行袋可收纳所有MenScience用品。非常适合旅行时使用，或在健身房使用。其高品质、微型波浪尼龙面料，可防水防污，既实用又耐用。
该款MenScience个人旅行袋，其尺寸正好可收纳所有洗浴用品，特别适用于旅行中或去健身房锻炼时使用。 中间袋易于放置物品，拥有全顶部拉链；较小物品可放在侧袋中，配有针脚致密的拉链，结实耐用。  防水衬里尺寸为：21厘米×14厘米；内含防溅防潮物质。
name: 旅行袋

product_description:
ChantecailleLa Crème A La 五月玫瑰润肤霜，这款精美高雅的凝胶霜，配方独特，内含世界上最稀有的一种玫瑰花的萃取物。可滋润营养肌肤，用后肌肤超级光滑柔软、晶莹剔透，正如新鲜的玫瑰花瓣上沾着的露珠那样纯净。
本款创新型润肤霜，散发出怡人而不失细腻的香味，富含植物细胞提取物如：具有强效抗氧化性的甜豌豆和覆盆子等，可中和舒缓泛红肌肤。  
包含独特的成分如：肽加五环多肽3000、野生三色堇提取物、益生菌聚合物等，可减少细纹、建立肌肤保护屏障、修复肌肤，使肤色光滑、肤质均匀。 开创性的抗衰老面霜，能完美地体现Chantecaille的精髓，适合每天使用。
name: La Crème A La 五月玫瑰润肤霜

product_description:
Combat hyperpigmentation with the Dermovia LACE YOUR FACE Compression Facial Treatment Mask - Brightening Bearberry; an effective sheet mask that sits on the contours of the face and transforms the complexion.
Enriched with a skin-brightening blend of Bearberry, Vitamin C and White Tea Leaf, the face mask is able to visibly diminish hyperpigmentation to offer a uniform complexion. The mask also utilises advanced Multi-Peptides. These Peptides seek to reduce skin’s production of melanin, which can cause visible damage such as discolouration. As well as correcting and preventing skin tone issues, the Peptides improve skin’s elasticity and restore a youthful glow to previously dull skin.
Complete with Natural Lemon and White Tea Leaf Extract, the face mask seeks to prevent premature signs of ageing, leaving the complexion refreshed and luminous.
name: LACE YOUR FACE Compression Facial Treatment Mask - Brightening Bearberry (4 Pack)

product_description:
Gatineau焕肤 3D 润肤乳（针对喉咙和前胸），使肌肤紧致，可护理肌肤，令肤色均匀年轻。
Gatineau焕肤 3D 润肤乳，内含植物蛋白的独特聚合物，在肌肤内建立3维微系统。 本配方可收紧肌肤、使脖子周围的肌肤紧实、肤色均匀。 内含山茶花油、尿囊素、维生素A、E、F等，可深度滋润肌肤，使肌肤水嫩舒爽。 也适用于脖子后面及胸部区域的皮肤。
name: 焕肤 3D 润肤乳（针对喉咙和前胸）50ml

product_description:
Experience a hydrating cleanse with Natural Spa Factory Illuminate Gel Cleanser, a multi-tasking cleanser and massage body balm that lifts away dirt and grime without stripping skin.
Infused with a Vanilla and White Flower fragrance, the versatile cleanser transforms into a milky solution when wet, and expertly removes makeup and oil from skin, helping to banish blemishes and ages spots for a fresh and revitalised complexion. Its dose of Oryzanol ensures skin feels smooth, supple and moisturised.
name: Spa Factory Illuminate Gel Cleanser

product_description:
利用来自Green People 的Gradual Tan Face Moisturiser 获得沐浴阳光的健康肤色。 适合所有肌肤类型，甚至敏感和易生痤疮的肌肤，它混合源自糖分的二羟基丙酮与氨基酸，带来自然、甚至棕褐色的肤色，让您的肌肤容光焕发。
加入有机玫瑰果和绿茶精华，这款非粘性润肤霜锁定水分，并拥有来自柑橘、橙子、芳樟的怡人清香。 非常适合日常使用，您可以塑造自己希望的肤色，而不会留下色痕。 E.N.
name: People Gradual Tan Face Moisturiser（50ml）

product_description:
Relax after false tan application with the Gold Label Jumpsuit from Bronzie. Gliding comfortably over freshly tanned skin, the jumpsuit is designed to reduce the possibility of unwanted tan lines, as well as preventing stains on clothing and bedding.
Ideal for general lounging but perfect for post tanning, the velour onesie is a deluxe, easy-wear garment that comprises an adjustable hood, zip fastening, breathable under-arm panel and a drawstring waist. Sit back, relax and enjoy your tanning experience.
name: Gold Label Jumpsuit - M-L

product_description:
Treat dry skin to the Salcura Bioskin Dermaspray Daily; a lightweight formula developed for those with eczema, psoriasis, dermatitis and rosacea.
Fortified with Aloe Vera, Tea Tree and omega-rich Sea Buckthorn, the 98% natural spray penetrates quickly and deeply to soothe and calm itching skin, whilst promoting healthy skin growth and supporting the natural barrier function. Almond and Olive Oils are blended with English Lavender to moisturise, hydrate and restore soft, comfortable skin all-over the body.
name: Bioskin Dermaspray Daily (250ml)

product_description:
Treat your skin to the Natural Spa Factory 23-Carat Gold Moisturiser; a luxurious, anti-ageing formula that works to smoothen and refine your complexion.
Harnessing the power of precious 23-Carat Gold and vitamin-rich Caviar Extract, the fast-absorbing face cream helps to increase elasticity of skin, whilst Hyaluronic Acid delivers superior hydration. Skin appears tighter and firmer with a youthful glow and subtle Amber fragrance.
name: Spa Factory 23-Carat Gold Moisturiser

product_description:
Infuse your skin with essential moisture. The So Much To Dew Day Cream from SAMPAR is an innovative moisturiser that delivers 24 hours of non-stop moisture** to help protect against dehydration.
Enriched with a host of active ingredients, the next generation formula instantly quenches skin; its dose of Hyaluronic Acid attracts and retains moisture, whilst Essential Fatty Acids strengthen skin's barrier to lock in hydration for hours. Delivering essential water to skin, it utilises a Smart Hydrating Complex that maintains vital water within cells, and an Urban Advance Complex to provide antioxidant protection. Skin’s comfort, tone and radiance is restored, and the complexion is plumped with moisture.
Housed in airtight packaging to protect the integrity of active ingredients.
name: So Much To Dew Day Cream 50ml

product_description:
Aromatherapy Associates Rose Infinity Eye Cream （15ml）可以让您的眼睛看起来更为明亮年轻。 此款滋润舒适的眼霜拥有三重紧致作用，可以让您眼部周围娇嫩的肌肤重新焕发光彩，打造完美的效果。
该产品配有羟脯氨酸，可以恢复皮肤活力并保持弹性，同时还有雪绒花干细胞和强效的低聚糖，可以显著减少细纹和皱纹的出现。 可以明显消除鱼尾纹，让您的眼睛会显得更为光滑紧致。 - L.M.使用说明：
name: Associates Rose Infinity Eye Cream （15ml）

product_description:
Rejuvenate your complexion with SAMPAR's Skin Quenching Mist; a weightless, ultra-hydrating formula that absorbs quickly into skin to refresh, soothe and replenish.
Infused with a host of beneficial ingredients, including Orange Blossom Water and Geranium Essential Oil, the clarifying toner expertly eliminates impurities without over-drying or uncomfortable tightness.
The brand's unique Urban Advance Complex of Shea Butter Serum, Mint Endorphin and Probiotic Sugar provides antioxidant properties; it creates a protective barrier to defend against free radical damage and environmental aggressors. Expect a smooth, supple and revitalised complexion with revived radiance.
name: Skin Quenching Mist 200ml

product_description:
Achieve a healthy glow without the need for sun or fake tan. SAMPAR's 3 Day Weekend is a facial moisturiser with tan activating and extending properties that lends your complexion a radiant, naturally sunkissed appearance.
Promoting a healthy, summer glow all year round, the fresh gel moisturiser contains extract of Cimicifuga Racemosa (a Native American medicinal root) to stimulate skin's natural melanin, encouraging a gradual, sunkissed complexion. Deeply moisturising and protective, it provides 24 hour hydration and utilises a Hydrocomplex that repairs and reinforces the hydrolipidic film to retain essential moisture, elasticity and suppleness. Helping to keep skin safe, it also contains Smart Sun Prevention (SSP) to reinforce skin's natural defence against harmful UV rays (to help prevent premature ageing), and an Urban Advance Complex for antioxidant protection.
Skin is bestowed with a healthy summer glow, and plumped with moisture. Housed in airtight packaging to protect the integrity of active ingredients.
name: 3 Day Weekend Face 50ml

product_description:
Restore a radiant, healthy-looking complexion with the Ila-Spa Face Serum for Renewed Recovery; a fast-absorbing formula infused with a powerful blend of ancient ingredients from the Amazon Rainforest to nourish and protect skin.
Harnessing the powers of Babassu and Cactus Oils, the serum works to repair and regenerate unbalanced, damaged and easily irritated skin, whilst the brand's unique Amazonian Elixir (a sustainable blend of four bio-active plant extracts) defends against the effects of stress, fatigue and environmental aggressors. Expect a smooth, comfortable and hydrated complexion with improve tone and texture.
name: Face Serum for Renewed Recovery 30ml

product_description: Institut Esthederm 雅诗敦美黑防护面霜为您的肌肤接触强烈阳光做好准备。 这款褐色面霜的配方可帮助肌肤更好地适应阳光的刺激，还可激活肌肤自然的黑色素的形成，以加深褐色。 这款创新型的防晒乳可有效保护肌肤免受长波紫外线/中波紫外线的损伤和预防光照衰老。 非常适合容易感觉不适和很少感觉不适的褐色肌肤。
name: Esthederm 雅诗敦美黑强烈阳光防护面霜 50ml

product_description:
Treat your skin to the nourishing and calming properties of Big Boy Soothing Drops, a luxurious fluid emulsion that works to moisturise and relieve the skin beneath your beard.
Produced in small batches in an artisan Sicilian laboratory, the solution combines Argan and Sweet Almond Oils with Calendula extract (considered a natural anti-irritant) to expertly soothe and calm skin after cleansing or shaving. Not just for skin beneath the beard, it can also be used as a post-shave treatment to leave the freshly shaven area feeling comfortable and conditioned. Equipped with a pipette delivery system for mess-free application.
name: Boy Soothing Drops 30ml

product_description:
使用甜美的 Clear KORRES Lip Butter Stick，令双唇滋润柔软。 其神奇的天然配方非常适合干裂的唇部，所含的柑橘油可为肌肤深层补充营养，提供持久的呵护，让您拥有健康柔软的双唇。
这款 Clear Lip Butter Stick 主要含有乳油木果脂和向日葵蜡，赋予唇部完美亮泽，深层补水并提供保护，令双唇更加柔软诱人！ 橘子油能调理干燥嘴唇，而天然蜂蜡能为最脆弱的部位提供必要防护，有助于抚平和滋养唇部。
name: Lip Butter Stick - Clear

product_description:
Clarify and refresh your complexion with the bliss Fabulous Make Up Cleanser Toner Duo; two of the brand's favourite skincare treats that work in tandem to refresh, hydrate and revitalise skin.
Fabulous Makeup Melt Cleanser (125ml)
With a gel-to-oil formula, the cleanser glides onto skin to eliminate all traces of oil, make-up and impurities. Experience nourished, silky soft skin thanks to its spa-powered blend of oils, including Mirabelle Plum Seed, Olive Oil and Lavender, which work to condition, soothe and protect against dryness.
Daily Detoxifying Facial Toner (200ml)
A refreshing, alcohol-free facial toner to hydrate and protect your complexion. Fortified with Malachite Extract (a copper compound), its gentle formula fights free radicals and shields from environmental damage to leave skin soft, smooth and purified. Calming Rose Water soothes all skin types.
name: Fabulous Make Up Cleanser Toner Duo (Worth £45.00)

product_description:
Olay 新生塑颜系列3点超级洁面套装将带给您更好的洁面体验。 这款抗衰老洁肤套装经过一组皮肤科医生实验证明，清洁效果是普通手动洁面四倍。
这款防水的洁面仪将让肌肤拥有光滑的触感，重现活力，更好地为之后的抗衰老护肤做准备。 -SA
name: 新生塑颜系列3点超级洁面套装

product_description:
Treat your complexion to the Triple Oxygen Cleanser Toner Duo from bliss. Combining two of the brand's best-sellers, the kit promises to clarify, hydrate and reignite a healthy-looking glow.
Triple Oxygen Instant Energizing Cleansing Foam (148ml)
Infused with Majus Leaf Flower, Aloe Vera and Soy Plant Proteins, the liquid-to-foam formula gently eliminates dirt and make-up, whilst boosting oxygen levels to hydrate and brighten dull skin. A cocktail of Vitamins A, C and E provides antioxidant properties, as Chamomile repairs and soothes for long-lasting comfort.
Daily Detoxifying Facial Toner (200ml)
A refreshing, alcohol-free facial toner to hydrate and protect your complexion. Fortified with Malachite Extract (a copper compound), its gentle formula fights free radicals and shields from environmental damage to leave skin soft, smooth and purified. Calming Rose Water soothes all skin types.
name: Triple Oxygen Cleanser Toner Duo (Worth £45.00)

product_description:
Witness a smooth and refined complexion with SAMPAR Poreless Magic Peel, a skin-refining solution that gently exfoliates skin to promote a smoother, softer and radiant complexion.
Infused with Glycolic Acid and restorative enzymes, the fluid delicately sloughs away dead skin cells via chemical exfoliation, and refines the skin's surface whilst improving its natural, self-repairing abilities.
