product_description:
Omorovicza present the Summer Value Set Golden Body Duo; a pair of harmonious skincare treatments to leave limbs perfectly prepped for summertime. Buff away dulling debris with the opulent scrub and deeply nourish with the luxurious body oil for skin that feels sumptuously smooth and positively radiant. Presented in an elegant, branded gift box.
Firming Body Oil (100ml)
Suitable for all skin types, the Firming Body Oil will intensively hydrate your skin, whilst reducing the appearance of stretch marks. Designed to tone skin and improve its elasticity, the nourishing formula boasts a delicate citrus scent to energise your senses. Gliding effortlessly over your skin, it quickly absorbs to leave your skin feeling smooth, soft and supple. It can also be used in small quantities on your hair to give it a lustrous, glossy finish.
Gold Sugar Scrub (200ml)
The Gold Sugar Scrub is a blend of cane sugar, ylang-ylang and small gold particles, working together to exfoliate and remove dead skin and reveal silky soft and beautifully buffed skin. Enriched with apricot and white pepper extract, skin is moisturised and circulation is stimulated to promote skin that looks healthy, glowing and truly refreshed.
name: Summer Value Set Golden Body Duo (Worth £103.00)

product_description:
Dermalogica's Active Moist Moisturiser is a fast-absorbing, oil-free formula that works to hydrate parched skin. Fortified with silk amino acids and a blend of plant extracts to improve the skin's texture, you can experience a super soft, smooth complexion without greasy residue.
Naturally-astringent lemon tightens pores and refines skin, whilst a dose of lavender and cucumber cool, soothe and restore long-lasting comfort. Catering for oily skin types, the lightweight lotion melts onto skin to eliminate unwanted shine, revealing a rebalanced, replenished complexion. E.N.
name: Active Moist Moisturiser (50ml)

product_description:
采用最纯净的补水方式，赋予肌肤活力。 Uriage's Eau Thermale Pure 温泉水 是一种在源头完成包装的绝佳化妆水，提供最纯净、最自然的解决方案。
这种水原产于法国阿尔卑斯山，天然富含矿物盐和微量元素。这意味着，该产品尊重肌肤的天然化妆，同时舒缓、保护、滋润和增强肌肤的天然屏障。
其最佳的适用范围使其非常适合所有肌肤类型，包括 6 个月以上的婴儿；其令人难以置信的舒缓特性提供了独特的保湿效果，令肌肤始终受到保护并保持健康。
name: Eau Thermale Pure 温泉水 (50ml)

product_description:
这款乳脂状桃色调洁面乳可快速温和地溶解彩妆和其他杂质。 Elizabeth Arden Ceramide Purifying Cream Cleanser 非常适合每日使用，能起到滋润洁面功效，令肌肤柔软亮泽。
这种独特有效的清洁系统富含水分，有助于舒缓和镇静肌肤，同时温和地进行清洁。 Elizabeth Arden Ceramide Purifying Cream Cleanser 通过保护必要的脂质，也有助于维持肌肤的水分平衡。这些脂质很容易随着年龄增长和环境暴露而遭到破坏。
Elizabeth Arden Ceramide Purifying Cream Cleanser 非常适合于干性肌肤。 本品已经过皮肤学、临床和过敏性测试。
使用说明：
name: Arden Ceramide Purifying Cream Cleanser (125ml)

product_description:
Clarify and refresh with the yes to Cotton Micellar Cleansing Water; a lightweight, no-rinse micellar water developed specifically for delicate, sensitive skin types.
Infused with Cotton Extract and Cottonseed Oil, the easy-to-use pump dispenses the perfect amount of cleanser to gently eliminate dirt and impurities without over-drying or uncomfortable tightness. Softens and hydrates to reveal a calm, radiant and soothed complexion after use.
name: to Cotton Micellar Cleansing Water

product_description: Institut Esthederm 雅诗敦美黑防护面霜为您的肌肤接触温和阳光做好准备。 这款褐色面霜的配方可帮助肌肤更好地适应阳光的刺激，还可激活肌肤自然的黑色素的形成，以加深褐色。 这款创新型的防晒乳可有效保护肌肤免受长波紫外线/中波紫外线的损伤和预防光照衰老。 非常适合容易感觉不适和很少感觉不适的褐色肌肤。
name: Esthederm 雅诗敦美黑温和阳光防护面霜 50ml

product_description:
Deeply hydrate your complexion with the Dead Sea Spa Magik Rich Moisturiser; a fast-absorbing, lightweight formula developed to nourish, protect and replenish skin.
Suitable for all skin types, the moisturiser utilises mud, salt and mineral extracts from the Dead Sea to soothe and revitalise, whilst providing UVA and UVB protection to shield against sun damage. Creates the perfect base for make-up application.
name: Sea Spa Magik Rich Moisturiser 75ml

product_description:
Murad慕拉防水防曬霜SPF 30 125ml 
長效、高SPF 防方配方通過三層活性防曬保護肌膚。石榴萃取物可增強防曬，防止自由基損傷。 
 附加特性和成分： 
 使用說明： 
暴露於太陽下前30 分鐘使用。在水中待80 分鐘後或大量出汗後重新使用。每天使用慕拉防曬護理補充劑，效果最佳。 
 主要成分： 
阿伏苯宗2.0%、胡莫柳酯6.5%、桂皮酸鹽7.5%、水楊酸鹽5.0%、氧苯酮4.0%
name: 慕拉防水防晒霜 SPF 30 130ml

product_description:
Clarify and refresh your complexion with ALGENIST Gentle Rejuvenating Cleanser; a luxurious face wash that utilises high-quality, effective ingredients to clean and revitalise skin.
Harnessing the powers of Witch Hazel and Oat Amino Acids, the lightweight, lathering formula expertly eliminates all traces of make-up and impurities without over-drying or uncomfortable tightness. Alguronic Acid, the brand's patented compound, softens and hydrates to leave your complexion radiant and healthy-looking after use.

product_description:
结合精心挑选的压力缓解系列产品，  NEOM基本De-Stress套装旨在帮助您放松身心，舒缓紧张情绪。
富含二十四种精油，包括薰衣草、茉莉和巴西紫檀木以舒缓身心压力，每种产品将帮助化解您的烦恼。 - K.N.
1 x De-Stress旅途喷雾 (5ml)：
一款旨在缓解压力和紧张的舒缓喷雾。 这款旅途压力缓解喷雾轻盈而强大，融合二十四种精油，以释放日常压力和烦恼。 直接喷在肌肤和面部。 应用少量即可取得强劲的效果，可使用一百多次。 - K.N.
1 x强效压力Relief Treatment (5ml)：
一款旨在为生活减压的强效脉搏点治疗产品。 这款舒缓配方轻质而强大，融合二十四种精油以释放压力和日常烦恼。 只需喷于手腕、耳后和脚掌，化解您的烦恼。 在肌肤上可保持长达三个小时。 - K.N.
1 x De-Stress Home喷雾 (5ml)：
一款旨在消除压力的舒缓、轻质喷雾。 它混合二十四种精油以释放压力和日常烦恼。 只需喷在靠垫、沙发和床上用品上，可让您的家中萦绕缓解压力的香气。

ALGENIST Regenerative Anti-Ageing Ultra Rich Cream is a restorative moisturiser that addresses signs of ageing whilst replenishing essential moisture.
Delivering visibly nourished results in just 10 days, the luxurious cream delivers a veil of hydration that softens and smoothens skin's texture whilst nourishing dry and damaged complexions. Infused with Alguronic Acid, Shea Butter and Vitamin C and H, the emulsion balances moisture whilst minimising the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles for younger, supple-looking skin. Skin is intensely moisturised and witnesses restored radiance.
name: Regenerative Anti-Ageing Ultra Rich Cream 60ml

product_description:
Perricone MD's H2 Elemental Energy Ultimate Hydration Starter Kit is the perfect introduction to the brand's Elemental Energy skincare range. The eye gel, serum and moisturiser are all powered by Hydrogen, the smallest molecule in the universe, and an H2 Energy Complex™ to deeply enrich skin with moisture, vitality and radiance.
De-Puffing Eye Gel (7.5ml)
A powerful eye gel that delivers maximum results without feeling thick or heavy. Part of the innovative new Elemental Energy skincare range, it’s based around a proprietary H2 Energy Complex™ that utilises Hydrogen to stimulate cellular energy and deeply penetrate the surface layers of skin with intensive, purified hydration. The ultra-lightweight formula is gentle yet effective, veiling the eye contour to provide an instant cooling sensation, helping to reduce the appearance of puffiness and fine lines. As a result, the delicate eye area appears brighter and replenished with a youthful looking vitality.    
Hydrating Booster Serum (15ml)
An innovative new treatment developed to tackle extreme dryness and dehydration. It’s powered by the exclusive H2 Energy Complex™, which harnesses Hydrogen to deliver deep penetrating hydration to the surface layers of skin for 24 hour results. The fluid, ultra-lightweight formula glides across skin and rapidly absorbs without feeling sticky or heavy, ideal for layering with further skincare products in the H2 line for maximum efficacy. Expect a refined and more even complexion, with a renewed radiance and optimum moisture levels.
Hydrating Cloud Cream (15ml)
A whipped, cloud-like moisturiser that delivers intensive, long lasting hydration without feeling thick or heavy. Powered by an H2 Energy Complex™, which harnesses Hydrogen to deliver deep penetrating hydration to the surface layers of skin for 24 hour results. The virtually weightless formula rapidly absorbs without leaving behind a heavy film or greasy residue, allowing skin to truly breathe while benefiting from optimum results. Ideal for dry and combination skin types that struggle with dehydration and lacklustre tones, the pioneering face cream leaves your complexion looking rejuvenated and revitalised with renewed radiance.
name: MD H2 Elemental Energy Ultimate Hydration Starter Kit (Worth £90)

Weleda鸢尾Hydrating面部润肤乳是由纯植物提取物构成的一款轻质清爽保湿液，可支持肌肤天然功能。 非常适合您的日常保湿需要，它能够被迅速吸收，令肌肤清新光滑。
有机荷荷巴油和生物动力鸢尾根为精致的Weleda鸢尾Hydrating面部润肤乳提供基础功效，而天然精油提清淡、优美的香味。 这种自然意识的乳霜感觉柔软干净，是化妆的完美基底，令您的肌肤健康、清爽、光滑。
使用说明：
可用  NAOBAY (Natural And Organic Beauty And You) 的补氧保湿霜保护面部皮肤并使面部皮肤焕然一新。 这种保湿霜适合各种皮肤，所含玫瑰果和甜杏仁油混合物既能巩固皮肤的皮脂膜，又能发挥最佳水合作用，以使面部皮肤柔韧光滑。 这种超轻质的透气配方护肤品吸收迅速，可作为完美的底妆。

product_description: Achieve an instant lift with the Hydra Lift Serum from MONU. Formulated with Hyaluronate Fraction and Galactoarabinan, which help provide an instant face lift and improve skin elasticity, Vitamin C, which helps brighten the skin, and Cassia Alata Extract, which helps to reduce the visible signs of ageing, the revitalising serum boosts radiance and protects the skin.

product_description:
通过Weleda的Men Moisture霜接受自然的馈赠。 非常适合在白天或晚上滋补肌肤，这种轻盈润肤霜容易被人体吸收，确保肌肤保持光滑、水嫩和并获得保护。
适合敏感肌肤，Weleda Men Moisture霜可快速渗入肌肤，令肌肤富有弹性、光滑柔顺。 精心挑选的精油滋润霜，可焕发和保护肌肤，让您感觉活力十足。 本产品适合素食者。

product_description:
使用本品在任何情況下都可獲取超強保護、安慰和治愈作用。多功能高級配方保護雙唇不受太陽、海水、風或雪影響。 
建議將本品用於對抗干燥、防曬和軟化、舒緩與再生肌膚。獨特配方含SPF，提供強效日曬，防止脫皮和龜裂，幫助釋放和治愈乾燥或開裂嘴唇導致的刺激。有效對抗環境曝露，例如風、寒冷和日曬，同時滋潤雙唇，形成無光啞面。

name: 高级护唇膏 SPF30 (5g)

product_description:
Enjoy the Dermalogica Cleanse & Tone Duo for Dry Skin and feel nourished. Containing the Essential Cleansing Gel and Multi Active Toner, this duet will gently cleanse and refresh your skin leaving you refreshed and renewed.
Treat your skin to a double dose of cleansing purity with the Dermalogica Cleanse & Tone Duo for Dry Skin. Removing your skin’s impurities without disturbing the skin’s natural balance, you are able to clear away toxins while gently toning your complexion.
This pack contains the following products:

MONU 的煥膚晚霜是一款創新面霜，可以撫平細紋，恢復緊緻，防止提早老化，讓您在次日清晨展現明媚膚色。此款煥膚晚霜包含海洋骨膠原和多醣，使肌膚更年輕、更柔軟、更豐盈。 KD

name: 焕肤晚霜 (50ml)

product_description:
Combat hyperpigmentation issues with the DECLÉOR Hydra Floral White Petal Skin Perfecting Hydrating Sleeping Mask; a lightweight, gel face mask that glides effortlessly onto the visage and works tirelessly whilst skin is most receptive to repair.
Fortified with a skin-loving blend of Sweet Orange, Citrus Aurantium Dulcis and with Pea extract, the mask is able to reduce the appearance of dark spots and skin blemishes to leave the visage clear and uniform. The skin’s texture is transformed and revived by morning.
Complete with a soothing dose of essential oil, the mask boasts relaxing benefits to promote a good night’s sleep. Expect to wake to a refreshed complexion where skin is visibly recharged, bright and dewy.

product_description:
使用 CULT51 Immediate Effects Serum，令衰老的肌肤再生。 使用产品仅揉擦一个小时，即可获得持续颠覆性效果，持续更长时间可消除面部所有衰老迹象，包括深层皱纹和黑眼圈。
其主要成分为 99% 纯骨胶原，质地轻盈，极易吸收，可增强肌肤免疫，防止松弛，平滑深层皱纹，提升活化娇嫩的眼部区域。 在 15 分钟内肌理得到改善；在一小时内肌肤提升弹性，丰润紧致，焕发青春光彩。
这款创新精华液含强效抗氧化剂共混物，可抵御自由基损伤及光致老化，同时提亮眼部，焕发青春光彩。 为获得立竿见影的效果和持续效果，应定期使用并不断改善肤色。
name: Immediate Effects Serum

product_description:
Elizabeth Arden Flawless Future Powered by Ceramide™ Night Cream 能深层滋润肌肤，一觉醒来还能呈现容光焕发的健康肤色。 采用灰毛豆提取物专门配制而成。这是一种矿物质含量丰富的植物，可促进健康和放松感，一觉醒来即可呈现水润肌肤。
蛇麻草提取物能提亮并有效均衡肤色，而 Telosense™ 蛋白复合物则可消除衰老的迹象，包括细纹和皱纹的出现。 轻盈保湿霜可转变疲劳、承压和暗哑的肌肤，恢复活力并重现靓丽的肤色。 E.N. 
使用四周后的效果*：
96% 的女性表示，皮肤感觉滋润、光滑、水嫩。
95% 的女性表示，皮肤看起来更加容光焕发、滋润。
93% 的女性表示，皮肤看起来更亮泽，暗沉得到最大程度的改善。
91% 的女性表示，她们的皮肤肌理得到改善。
87% 的女性表示，细纹有所减少。
name: Arden Ceramide Flawless Future Night Cream (50ml)

product_description:
Murad慕拉男士面部防禦乳霜SPF 15 50ml 
質地輕薄，無油配方，為肌膚注入源源水分，不閃油光，蘊含的廣譜防曬劑和抗氧化劑有效阻隔紫外線UVA/UVB 損傷肌膚。採用獲得專利的肌膚修復系統，乳液快速沁融於肌膚，令受環境壓力損傷的肌膚綿彈如初。 
 附加特性和成分： 
 使用說明： 
每天清潔後，在面部和頸部均勻按摩。首先使用慕拉剃須舒緩露，效果最佳。 
 主要成分： 
阿伏苯宗2.5%、桂皮酸鹽7.5%、氧苯酮2.0%
name: 慕拉男士面部防御乳霜 SPF 15 (50ml)

product_description: 使用 Gatineau Collagene Expert Smoothing Pads，获得更紧致、更青春的双眸。 凭借独特的胶原液，这款眼贴可滋润肌肤并赋予活力，同时对娇嫩的眼部区域温和无刺激。 舒缓的尿囊素令眼周区域倍感清新；而甘油能有效地滋润肌肤，减少疲态。 十分钟的护理能提升肌肤弹性，最大限度地减少细纹和皱纹，让您体验更水嫩柔滑的肌肤。 E.N.
name: Collagene Expert Smoothing Eye Pads

product_description:
This works 多效美肤霜含有 SPF 30并能阻挡其它环境压力，甚至对于敏感肌肤亦柔情似水，可以天天使用。 该深层保湿健肤水含有舒缓维生素 E、修复用抗氧化混合物 Bio Boost 与抗衰老及保湿玻尿酸，确实有助于您的皮肤保持年轻和鲜活的模样。 - E.D
使用说明：
- 每天使用清洁皮肤
- 全天定期重复涂抹
- 保持远离眼部区域
name: works 多效美肤霜（40毫升）

product_description: 豐富泡沫的潔膚霜能夠清除肌膚塵垢，含有玫瑰精華和Sophorae Radix 精華，鎖住肌膚水分，改善膚質，調理肌膚，使肌膚更容易吸收後續保養品。使膚色均勻亮採。

Rejuvenate skin with the Mizon Hyaluronic Acid 100 Serum; a lightweight formula that works to revive a lacklustre complexion.
Fortified with 50% Hyaluronic Acid, the potent solution delivers veil of long-lasting hydration that visibly plumps the complexion to leave skin supple and youthful. An anti-ageing blend of Copper Tripepetide-1, Cholesterol and Ceramide 3 improve the appearance of skin’s elasticity and promote firm skin.
Complete with Raspberry Fruit extract, the serum reveals a brighter appearance that is healthy looking and radiant.
name: Hyaluronic Acid 100 Serum 30ml

product_description:
Transform dull and tired eyes with the Talika Eye Quintessence Serum; a 2-in-1 dual-phase treatment containing both a protective day cream and regenerative night serum.
Expertly formulated to work alongside skin’s natural cycle, the anti-ageing products work in tandem to combat signs of ageing and fatigue, taking into account the effects of natural light energy and skin chronobiology for optimum results.  
Suitable for daily use, the day cream is enriched with Vitamin B3, Konjac fibres and pharmaceutical grade Aescin to help lift, hydrate and brighten the eye contour, effectively minimising the look of bags and dark circles. It’s fortified with a Light & Photo-Beauty Enzyme, which harnesses the energy in light to help shield DNA and repair UV damage.
The night serum combines extracts of St. Paul’s Wort and Silk Tree to tighten and firm tissue while protecting collagen and elastin levels from the degrading glycation process, with a Light & Photo Beauty Hydra deeply penetrating dermal cells with moisture.    
Suitable for all skin types, the duo of treatments leave the delicate eye area feeling replenished and revitalised, with the appearance of wrinkles, discolouration and puffiness visibly reduced.
name: Eye Quintessence 2 x 10ml

product_description:
使用 Astalift Replenishing Day Cream，呵呵肌肤。这是一种丰盈的抗衰老配方，利用红色素"虾青素"，抵御自由基损伤并促进胶原蛋白的生成。 Astalift 由 FUJIFILM 打造，是一个屡获殊荣的美容品牌，采用类似于防止照片褪色的先进抗氧化技术，尽可能减少雀斑并减轻肌肤衰老。
这款独特的日霜可有效地锁住肌肤水分，令肌肤全天保持滋润，非常适合容易出现干燥、粗糙肌肤的人士。 这一配方令肌肤柔滑而富于弹性，融合了一系列关键成分，在短短十天之内就能减少细纹和皱纹。 可呈现拥有明亮光泽的更青春、更健康的肌肤。 - K.N
name: Replenishing Day Cream (30g)

product_description:
Zelens Power C 浓缩护肤精华帮您重获靓丽肤色。 其配方高效抗衰老。含 20％的维生素C，可令肌肤亮泽光滑，保护皮肤。
浓缩的柔滑的质地下滑费力穿过皮肤，融化在提供其专有的植物混合物含有丰富的抗氧化剂提取物和维生素C包装油。 可令肌肤明显亮泽、肤色均匀、促进自然胶原蛋白的生产，使肌肤富有弹性、消除皱纹及细纹，使肌肤更光滑。
具有抗氧化性及保护性，使肌肤免受环境侵害及自由基的侵袭。 您将拥有更年轻、更光滑、更亮泽的肌肤。
name: Power C 浓缩护肤精华 (30ml)

product_description:
Calm and hydrate your skin with Mizon Snail Recovery Gel Cream, a hybrid textured moisturiser enriched with concentrated 74% Snail extract; one of Korea's hero ingredients for achieving smoother, younger-looking skin.
The lightweight gel-cream formula works to reduce the appearance of fine lines, acne scarring and dark spots whilst intensely hydrating with its cocktail of Hyaluronic Acid, Panthenol and Allantoin. Delivering a non-greasy veil of moisture, the cream combines a host of botanical and floral extracts to calm and relieve areas of irritation, and antioxidant Green Tea to safeguard against external aggressors. Skin feels replenished, smooth and youthful.
name: Snail Recovery Gel Cream 45ml

product_description:
Purify congested and oily skin with the best-selling Black Clean Up Pore Deep Cleanser from South Korean beauty brand Mizon.
The 2-in-1 cleanser and exfoliant contains refined Dead Sea Salt to gently buff away dirt, makeup and dead skin cells without causing irritation, while finely milled Charcoal powder absorbs excess oil and toxins.
Unclogging pores and balancing sebum production, the advanced formula can be used with or without water for a deeper exfoliation process, with water activating a moisturising lather that forms a protective lipid barrier. Pores and blackheads are visibly reduced and skin is left feeling clean, refreshed and supple.
name: Black Clean Up Pore Deep Cleanser 120ml

product_description:
使用Dani Glowing Skin Perfector加強皮膚光度；一個恢復容光的配方，旨在使皮膚煥發光澤、緊緻並消除老化的痕跡，從而呈現出年輕的膚色。 
該產品利用亞洲植物及超細的礦物光線映襯劑的卓著性能進行創新性的肌膚護理，有助於皮膚活力重現、改善光度和獲得完美的膚色，同時遮蓋缺陷，以呈現了皮膚光滑的外觀和自然光澤。 
非常適合用於突出臉部輪廓或作為化妝的基底，微量的燕麥內核提取物提供了一個即時提升的效果，調節油脂分泌，以產生啞光光澤。
name: Glowing Skin Perfector (30ml)

product_description:
Experience a rejuvenating cleanse with Mizon Snail Cushion Foam Cleanser, a rich, lathering face wash infused with Korea's best kept beauty secret, Snail Secretion Filtrate.
Rich in Protein and Glycolic Acid, Snail Secretion helps to diminish fine lines and scarring to promote smoother, younger-looking skin. Transforming into a sticky foam, the cleanser expertly lifts away dirt and impurities, washing away daily grime whilst reducing the formation of blackheads. Its dose of Hyaluronic Acid, Beeswax, Aloe and Macadamia Seed Oils hydrate and soften skin, and Red Ginseng enhances brightness and radiance. After use, skin looks healthy, smooth and balanced.
name: Snail Cushion Foam Cleanser 120ml

product_description:
使用 Green People Oy！，彻底清洁毛孔。 Foaming Anti-Bac Face Wash. 本品含茶树提取物，提供抗菌成分，有助于控制肌肤上的细菌。
The Green People Oy! Foaming Anti-Bac Face Wash 含 Ω 3 和 6，为肌肤输送养分，促进无瑕疵的肤色。 本品不含黏性物质，获得有机认证，适合所有肌肤类型，包括易生粉刺的肌肤和敏感型肌肤。
Green People 使用非空运的可回收包装。 产品只含有少量手工制作的纯天然有机成分，确保收到产品时尽可能新鲜。 本品也适用于严格素食者和素食主义者。
使用说明：
name: People Oy! Foaming Anti-Bac Face Wash (100ml)

product_description: 使用 Green People's Firming Eye Serum，令娇嫩的眼部区域恢复清新活力。这是一种;抗衰老配方，旨在紧致、顺滑和紧实肌肤。 这款高效精华液融合了有机菊苣、塔拉灌木、药蜀葵和爱尔兰苔藓，尽可能缓解浮肿，减少细纹和皱纹，刺激胶原蛋白的生成，呈现更青春、精致和明亮的双眸。 适用于敏感型肌肤。 E.N.
name: People Firming Eye Serum (10ml)

product_description:
PRAI's AGELESS Lip Line Filler is an anti-ageing formula that targets vertical lines on the lips and around the mouth to promote a smoother, younger-looking pout.
Enriched with Marine Filling Spheres and a host of protective vitamins, the moisturising formula expertly reduces the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles around the mouth, whilst intensely hydrating and protecting against photo-ageing. Its dose of Shea Butter locks in moisture to ensure skin is left looking smooth and rejuvenated.
name: AGELESS Lip Line Filler 4ml

product_description:
CODAGE Moisturizing Mask 采用法国制药专业知识精心配方，是一款丰盈乳液，可深层滋养滋润肌肤。
保湿配方富含油和植物蜡，可有效活化干燥肌肤，使之获得新生，强化皮脂层同时支持和重塑肌肤的天然屏障，令肌肤柔软健康。
该面膜利用酶促皮，刺激细胞更新，让您拥有亮泽肤色。 令肌肤舒适、柔软和亮泽。 - K.N
name: Moisturizing Mask (50ml)

product_description:
Catering specifically for acne-prone or oily skin types, the Tea Tree and Willow Leaf Peel-Off Face Mask from Natural Spa Factory decongests and purifies your complexion to leave it clear and clarified.
Fortified with Marine Algae, Tea Tree Oil and Willow Leaf Extract, the luxurious treatment helps to minimise excess sebum and reduce the appearance of pores, whilst combating blackheads and pimples to reveal soft, smooth and fresh skin. Invigorating Menthol cools and soothes the skin and senses.
name: Spa Factory Tea Tree and Willow Leaf Peel-Off Face Mask

product_description:
Transform skin overnight with the SAMPAR Nocturnal Line Up Mask; a powerful anti-ageing treatment that works while you sleep to boost collagen and elasticity levels as well as intensively hydrate for age-defying results.  
Developed through two years of extensive scientific research, the rich formula veils skin with a host of natural actives combined with advanced technology to deliver proven efficacy, including Adenosine, which works to counteract dermo-contractions that lead to expression lines, dramatically enhancing skin’s natural ability to reproduce collagen, elastin and hyaluronic acid through the night.
Biopeptides seek to minimise the depth and length of even the most stubborn set wrinkles, activating cellular renewal for a firmer and more even texture, while the proprietary Urban Advance Complex utilises Shea Butter Serum, Mint Endorphin and Probiotic Sugar to form an antioxidant shield that combats dulling free radical damage and cellular deterioration.
Suitable for all skin types, the face mask delivers an instant brightening and lifting effect, and wrinkles appear visibly reduced in as little as two weeks. Attain true beauty sleep with the Nocturnal Line Up Mask.
name: Nocturnal Line Up Mask 50ml

product_description:
Combat signs of ageing around the delicate eye area with Talika's Eye Detox Specific - Fair Skin; a unique formula with a steel ball applicator to decongest and massage skin.
Fortified with Chromadetox® (a Brown Algae Extract), the innovative, soothing eye treatment delivers intense moisture and hydration, whilst minimising the appearance of dark circles, puffiness and redness to reveal a brighter, smoother eye contour. Soft-focus powder expertly blurs imperfections to leave skin looking luminous and youthful.
name: Eye Detox Specific - Fair Skin 15ml

product_description:
Rejuvenate your complexion with SAMPAR's French Rose Mist; a weightless, skin-quenching formula that absorbs quickly to refresh, soothe and replenish thirsty skin.
Harnessing the powers of Orange Blossom Water and Geranium Essential Oil, the micro-fine mist can be applied throughout the day for essential moisture and hydration, or used over make-up to prolong and enhance wear.
The brand's unique Urban Advance Complex of Shea Butter Serum, Mint Endorphin and Probiotic Sugar provides antioxidant properties; it creates a protective barrier to defend against free radical damage and environmental aggressors. Expect a smooth, supple and revitalised complexion with a delicate Rose fragrance.
name: French Rose Mist 75ml

product_description:
使用men-u 便攜控油保濕霜使肌膚更加柔滑。無油無香味配方含油脂吸收劑，控製油光，去除肌膚的過多油脂，特別是T 形區周圍。男士皮膚厚，皮脂腺大，容易出現油膩肌膚，而本品是控油和去除油脂的實用解決方案。維生素E 屏蔽導致衰老痕蹟的自由基，增強彈性，使肌膚清爽。該體積小巧的管狀產品是忙碌奔波的男士的理想選擇。 EN 
 使用說明：將少量產品塗於臉部和頸部，溫柔按摩。讓其吸收。
name: 便携控油保湿霜 15ml

product_description:
Treat your skin to the replenishing properties of SAMPAR So Much To Dew Midnight Mask, a hydrating and concentrated face mask that instantly quenches thirsty skin.
Utilising a Smart Hydrating Complex, the mask mimics the skin's natural hydrolipidic film, helping to lock in moisture for long-lasting hydration. Its replenishing properties soften and refresh skin, whilst Hyaluronic Acid Capsules provide in-depth hydration to lend skin a supple, younger-looking appearance. Keeping skin safe from external aggressors, its Urban Advance Complex (comprising Shea Butter Serum, Mint Endorphin and Probiotic Sugar) provides an antioxidant shield, strengthening the skin's natural defences for maximum protection. Skin witnesses restored moisture and softness.
Housed in airtight packaging to protect the integrity of active ingredients.
name: So Much To Dew Midnight Mask 50ml

product_description:
Refresh your skin with Mizon Bulg Rose 90% Toner, a moisturising toner infused with 90% Bulgarian Rose extract to hydrate and balance skin pH after cleansing.
Lightweight and revitalising, the solution delivers a veil of rich moisture onto skin, absorbing quickly to deliver nutrients deep down. Its dose of Aloe Vera Leaf calms irritated skin and protects against external factors. Deeply moisturising, the non-sticky toner will leave skin feeling revived, refreshed and delicately scented with Bulgarian Rose.
name: Bulg Rose 90% Toner 210ml

product_description:
利用 Green People的Scent Free活肤眼霜抚慰护理您的眼睛，这是专门为敏感眼睛研制的含有机成分的抗衰老眼霜。
具有超温和及超级滋养特点，该富含脂肪酸的眼霜可带来一层保湿膜，并为肌肤提供具有焕发活力功效的维生素、矿物质和抗氧化剂，包括经证明可积极减少皱纹的黄芩苷。 双眼神采焕发，尽显青春气息。 - K.N.
name: People中性/ Scent Free活肤眼霜（10ml）

product_description:
Murad Invisiblur 完美遮盖霜 SPF30是一款多任务配方，可用于完善肌肤及消除老化痕迹，保护皮肤免受日晒损害，起到Treat，遮盖瑕疵和保护作用。
这款遮盖产品的配方将肽蘑菇和注重软化的复合物相结合，以减少细纹和皱纹的出现，帮助天然胶原蛋白的生成及遮盖缺陷。 这款广谱保湿混合物采用最先进的抗衰老技术，让您获得极具诱惑力的柔嫩而年轻的肌肤。 - K.N
name: Invisiblur完善遮盖霜超大号装50ml（价值£91.50欧元）

product_description:
BAKEL 贝蔻脸部和身体防晒霜 SPF 15 滋养和保护您的肌肤，既抗衰老又防晒，为您的皮肤提供中度、全方位的保护，以防止皮肤过早老化和抵御自由基的侵害。
防晒霜富含植物油、金缕梅水和洋甘菊等滋养因子，易于涂抹，为您的皮肤提供一层保护膜，有助于舒缓、减轻皮肤发红和减少太阳光的氧化损害。
它的润肤成分和紧致功能令您的肌肤感觉柔滑，其植物活性成分带给您健康棕褐色肌肤。 肌肤色调和弹性均改善。
不含香水、PPG、PEG、酒精、有机硅、着色剂、MEA、DEA、TEA、EDTA、石油化工制品、硫酸盐，动物提取物和所有其他无用的物质。
name: 贝蔻脸部和身体防晒霜 SPF 15 150毫升

product_description:
Achieve a visible facelift with the MAGICSTRIPES Lifting Collagen Mask; an effective face mask that targets the cheeks, jaw and chin, particular problematic areas. Without the pain and expense of surgery, the mask seeks to lift and tighten the appearance of skin for profile optimisation.
The lifting mask is drenched in a skin-loving blend of Collagen, Vitamin E and Vitamin C, which offers skin essential moisture, seeks to combat loss of elasticity and reduces the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles. A potent dose of Caffeine encourages healthy blood circulation, whilst Macadamianussöl provides smoothing and regenerating properties. In addition to the cocktail of ingredients, the force of the mask provides massaging action to the face, which can also lead to a tighter appearance.
Strengthening the skin at the lower half of the face, the mask works tirelessly for 40-60 minutes, then reveals defined contours with supple, firm and youthful skin.
name: Lifting Collagen Mask (1 Mask)

product_description:
Enhance and protect skin with the Advanced Caviar Duo Moisturiser from skinChemists, an advanced dual technology formula that works to smooth and hydrate whilst encouraging regeneration overnight to leave you with a transformed and brightened complexion.
The main active ingredient of Wild Caviar is a highly nutritious Marine Complex, which repairs damaged cells at the same time as protecting skin from harmful UVA and UVB rays. Neroli Oil aims to improve tone, reducing the appearance of blemishes and redness, whilst Seabuckthorn Fruit Oil improves elasticity, enhancing skin’s texture and minimising the look of lines. Suitable for daily use, expect a radiant and healthier-looking complexion.
name: Advanced Caviar Duo Moisturiser 50ml

product_description:
Deeply hydrate your complexion with the Dead Sea Spa Magik Diamond Range 24 Hour Marine Miracle Moisturiser; a fast-absorbing, anti-ageing cream for dry and mature skin types.
Infused with Dead Sea minerals, pure plant extracts, Vitamin B5 and Shea Butter, the lightweight cream works to nourish and condition skin, whilst softening the appearance of fine lines to reveal a younger-looking, more refined complexion. Suitable as a day and night cream, skin is left radiant and revitalised with a healthy glow.
name: Sea Spa Magik Diamond Range 24 Hour Marine Miracle Cream Moisturiser 75ml

product_description:
Uplift the mind and body with the Aurelia Probiotic Skincare Brightening Botanical Essence; a lightweight facial mist that boasts the power to invigorate.
Mineral-rich, the mist combines filtered Volcanic Water with healing Magnesium Salts to detoxify all skin types. The formula is enriched with Quartz Crystal Water and an energising blend of precious Essential Oils, which work in synergy to promote inner healing and feelings of positivity, as well as assisting you in achieving your desired sense of self.
In one simple spray, the formula delivers a mist of happiness, helping to create a radiant, bright and balanced complexion.
name: Probiotic Skincare Brightening Botanical Essence 50ml

product_description:
Rediscover your skin's youthful capacity with KORRES Castanea Arcadia Anti-Wrinkle and Firming Day Cream for Normal to Combination Skin.
Targeting deep wrinkles and loss of elasticity, the non-greasy day cream melts effortlessly into skin, delivering a host of skin-loving ingredients to help reduce the appearance of wrinkles while restoring firmness. Fortified with molecule Active HALupeol, Castanea Arcadia (Arcadian Chestnut tree) extract and brightening Vitamin C, the advanced moisturiser supports skin structure to leave it looking hydrated, youthful and renewed with improved resilience.
name: Castanea Arcadia Anti-Wrinkle and Firming Day Cream Normal to Combination Skin 40ml

product_description:
Unveil glowing skin with the Erno Laszlo White Marble Essence Lotion; a brightening toner that is an essential step in your bespoke cleansing regime to target discolouration, hyperpigmentation and uneven tones.
Lightweight yet powerful, the liquid-textured formula works to rehydrate and firm with natural moisture-magnet Glycerin, while extract of Comfrey Root stimulates cell renewal and repair for a visible plumping effect.
The addition of whitening Daisy extract helps combat age spots and lighten pigmentation for a more refined and balanced complexion. Suitable for daily use, skin feels refreshed and revitalised with a lit-from-within radiance.
name: Laszlo White Marble Essence Lotion

product_description:
Clarify and refresh your complexion with the Dead Sea Spa Magik Diamond Range Pro-Toner; a soothing formula developed to invigorate and restore skin, even around the delicate eye area.
Synergising extracts of Chamomile, Rosemary Leaf and Lemon Balm Leaf, the anti-ageing toner gently eliminates any remaining impurities after cleansing to prepare for application of moisturiser, whilst promoting cell regeneration and and leaving skin soft, smooth and supple. You can expect a hydrated, healthy-looking complexion with a youthful glow.
name: Sea Spa Magik Diamond Range Pro-Toner 260ml

product_description:
Aromatherapy Associates的Nourishing 擦脸油拥有独特配方，可以舒缓和滋润皮肤，同时防止外部因素损伤皮肤。 该搽脸油完美结合了多种重要营养素，可以深入地滋润皮肤。
这款不油腻的搽脸油含有补充必需脂肪酸的月见草油以及刺激血液循环的玫瑰，用后您会感到青春焕发、肤色靓丽。 K.D.
name: Associates Nourishing搽脸油 15ml

product_description:
Improve the appearance of your skin with Mizon Snail Repair Intensive Ampoule Serum, a concentrated, anti-ageing solution infused with 80% Snail Secretion Filtrate.
Utilising one of Korea's hero ingredients known for minimising the look of fine lines and acne scarring, the serum works to protect, hydrate and relieve skin. It addresses signs of ageing to promote a smoother, more even-toned complexion, and contains extract of Barberry Root to improve scars and hyperpigmentation. Leaving skin feeling silky smooth, its blend of anti-ageing peptides and five kinds of vitamins will lend your skin a youthful, revived appearance, whilst Hyaluronic Acid and antioxidant-rich Cocoa moisturise and protect.
name: Snail Repair Intensive Ampoule Serum 30ml

product_description:
Catering specifically for oily and combination skin types, the Balance Face Serum Oil from AromaWorks helps to clarify, hydrate and decongest your complexion, leaving it fresh and radiant.
Harnessing the powers of Jojoba Oil, Organic Sea Buckthorn and antioxidant Vitamin E, the rebalancing formula targets uneven skin tone and texture, whilst revitalising and rejuvenating to reveal a clearer, more refined complexion. Delivers a luxurious fragrance blended from notes of Mandarin and Myrtle, enhanced by floral accords of Rose, Geranium and Neroli, on a rich Patchouli base. Skin is soft, smooth and restored.
name: Balance Face Serum Oil 30ml

product_description:
Smoothen the appearance of skin with Mizon Collagen Power Lifting Cream, a firming moisturiser enriched with highly concentrated 75% Marine Collagen to plump up sagging skin.
Working to restore elasticity and enhance moisture, the cream combines Hyaluronic Acid with Copper Tripeptide-1 and extracts of Centella Asiatica extract Cacao to expertly smoothen and soften the skin; it combats signs of ageing whilst hydrating and relieving the complexion.
name: Collagen Power Lifting Cream 70ml

product_description:
Treat blemish-prone skin to the Acence Sebum Control Emulsion from Korean skincare brand, Mizon. 
The oil-free lotion has been specially formulated to control sebum and protect the skin against external aggressors. Helping to alleviate and prevent blemishes, it combines anti-inflammatory Pinosylvin and Rosemarinic Acid with a host of other safe and natural ingredients to effectively decongest pores, reduce blemish size and balance water-oil levels. Treating skin without drying it out, the lotion melts effortlessly in, moisturising and softening to leave your T-zone oil-free and healthy-looking.
name: Acence Sebum Control Emulsion 130ml

product_description:
Hydrate and renew your skin with Mizon Snail Repair Perfect Cream, an anti-ageing moisturiser infused with Snail Mucin, one of Korea's best kept beauty secrets for achieving smoother, younger-looking skin. 
Slightly denser than the All-in-One Snail Repair Cream, the rich formula locks in moisture whilst delivering anti-blemish and anti-ageing properties. Its dose of Snail Secretion helps to minimise skin imperfections whilst antioxidant-rich Willow Bark and Anise Fruit extract fight against free radicals and protect skin. The complexion is intensely hydrated with a smoother, more even toned and firmer appearance.
name: Snail Repair Perfect Cream 50ml

product_description:
Reignite a youthful glow with the PRAI 24K GOLD Wrinkle Repair Crème; a lightweight, anti-ageing formula infused with precious PRAI Oil to restore soft, supple skin and minimise the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles.
Harnessing the powers of 24K Gold, the fast-absorbing cream protects from the damaging effects of free radicals and environmental aggressors to help maintain healthy collagen. NULASTIC™ Silk works to strengthen the skin's structure, whilst innovative SYN-COLL™ aids cell turnover to reveal a smoother, more refined complexion.
name: 24K GOLD Wrinkle Repair Crème 50ml

product_description:
Achieve a superior cleanse with the Mizon No. 1 Moist King's Berry Cleansing Oil; a potent solution housed inside a large, pump bottle that is adorned with a playful King Kong design. Ideal for dry and combination skin types, the oil seeks to alleviate dehydrated skin and leave the complexion comfortably hydrated.
Infused with Black Chokeberries (A.K.A King’s Berries), the effective formula delivers a moisturising veil to skin, whilst natural Plant Oil thoroughly eliminates traces of makeup, daily dirt and excess oil. Rich in antioxidants and vitamins, the cleanser strengthens pores and protects skin from environmental aggressors.
Expect a thorough cleanse without stripping skin of essential moisture. After use, skin will be visibly brighter and healthier, as well as touchably soft.
name: No. 1 Moist King's Berry Cleansing Oil 410ml

product_description:
Experience a refreshing cleanse with PRAI's OXYGEN Foaming Cleanser.
Infused with Oxygen to help revive skin, the cleanser transforms into a gentle foam, delicately lifting away dirt, makeup and impurities to leave the complexion fresh, purified and comfortable. Pores feel clean and refined, and the skin is left comfortable revitalised.
name: OXYGEN Foaming Cleanser 148ml

product_description:
Treat your complexion to the Summer Skin Detox Kit from bliss. Combining three of the brand's best-selling products, the trio promises to cleanse and revitalise skin, whilst dissolving all traces of eye makeup. Complete with a branded bag.
bliss Daily Detoxifying Facial Toner (200ml)
A refreshing alcohol-free facial toner to hydrate and protect your complexion. Fortified with malachite extract (a copper compound), its gentle formula fights free radicals and shields from environmental damage to leave skin soft, smooth and purified. Calming rose water soothes all skin types.
bliss Clog Dissolving Cleansing Milk (200ml)
Effortlessly eliminate excess oil, dirt and impurities with the two-in-one formula. Suitable for use as a cleanser or five-minute face mask, its exfoliating enzymes delicately buff away dead ski cells, whilst antioxidant vitamin E and grapeseed extract protect from free radical damage. Skin is decongested, cleared and refined.
bliss Lid and Lash Wash Makeup Remover (110ml)
A soothing, oil-free formula that removes eye makeup in one simple sweep. Banishing even waterproof mascara, its dose of chamomile extract provides anti-inflammatory properties, ensuring the eye area is left calm, comfortable and fresh without irritation. Housed in a handy pump bottle for mess-free application.
name: Summer Skin Detox Kit (Worth £57.00)

product_description:
Combat premature signs of ageing with the PRAI AGELESS Eye D-Crease Crème; a potent, peptide-rich cream that works to moisturise and nourish the delicate eye area.
Fragrance free, the advanced formula balances anti-ageing complexes with essential vitamins and oils to aid in hydration and cell regeneration.
MATRIXYL® seeks to smooth the surface layer of skin, reducing the look of wrinkle density, while NULASTIC™ SILK helps to rebuild skin structure and replenish key nutrients. A blend of Avocado Oil and PRAI Oil leave skin feeling supple, firm and rejuvenated for eyes that appear more youthful and revitalised.
name: AGELESS Eye D-Crease Crème 15ml

product_description:
Visibly reduce the appearance of dark spots and imperfections with the Complex 27 C serum from Cosmetics 27 by ME Skinlab. The bio-perfecting and correcting serum luminates skin and evens tone to reveal a brighter, radiant complexion.
Suitable for all skin types, its unique formula with 58% active concentration and 94% natural ingredients promotes cell renewal and regenerates skin to leave it healthy-looking. Centella asiatica extract, derived from a tropical plant stimulates micro-circulation and strengthens the skin barrier, whilst vitamin C heals skin for long-lasting comfort. E.N.
name: 27 by ME Skinlab Complex 27 C (30ml)

product_description:
Feel confident wearing sleeveless tops with the PRAI AGELESS Upper Arm Crème; a specially formulated, targeted anti-ageing treatment to deliver a visible lifting and firming effect.
The proprietary complex balances essential oils with rich emollients, infusing skin with Caffeine to reduce the look of redness while toning and tightening the look of soft, loose skin.
Bamboo extract and precious PRAI Oil help soften and hydrate, sealing in moisture for a smooth and supple finish. The upper arm area feels revitalised, sleek and refined.
name: AGELESS Upper Arm Crème 110ml

product_description:
利用 Green People的爽肤Hydrating喷雾深层滋润肌肤，令肌肤焕发活力。 混合芦荟、玫瑰水和药属葵成分，该活肤滋养液可用于面部和身体，活化肌肤，或者作为调理液在洁面后清除杂质。
适合飞行旅行或繁忙工作后使用，其轻质、多功效配方可舒缓刚剃过的肌肤，在外出旅行中补充水分和补妆，同时可提供玫瑰和橙花的怡人香味。 本品适合所有肌肤类型。 E.N.
name: People爽肤Hydrating喷雾（100ml）

product_description:
使用Advanced C Radiance Cream重新讓容顏煥發青春的光采；不含水的配方可使皮膚恢復神采，復原紫外線輻射的傷害和並減少無光澤的外表和色素沉著。 
絲滑乳霜中加入了10％的維生素C、維生素A和牛油樹脂，有助於減輕皮膚上所呈現的色素沉著，如日光斑和黑斑，同時輕柔地去角質，除去皮膚表面的變色細胞，展現更均勻的膚色。用後皮膚亮麗而有光澤。
name: C Radiance Cream (50ml)

product_description:
Quench thirsty skin with the Aragospa Aqua Gel Cream from Korean brand Skin79; a revitalising, creamy formula that imbues skin with instant freshness and hydration with Aragonite Thermal Water sourced from Jeju.
Ideal for dry and combination skin types, a Multi-Layered Water Holding System™ ensures long-lasting water retention, while natural extracts of Vitamin-C rich Neem Tree help support collagen synthesis to smooth the look of fine lines and imperfections. Delivering anti-bacterial and anti-inflammatory benefits, skin feels rejuvenated and replenished.
name: Aragospa Aqua Gel Cream 90ml

product_description:
保護肌膚，抵禦日曬。該防曬霜SPF 指數更高，可提供額外的防曬保護，不含油脂、過敏性低，適用於大部分敏感肌膚。 
提供每日天然保護，抵禦日曬，能保護肌膚，預防太陽中有害射線的侵擾。該戶外必需品有助於防止曬傷。 
使用說明：
name: 杰森面部防晒 SPF20 (128G)

product_description:
Omorovicza黃金緊緻精華將強效抗老性能與有效抗炎成分相結合，是一款多效產品，締造神奇的護膚功效。這款無油精華可均勻膚色，重塑紋理，緊緻老化肌膚，同時修復損傷，令肌膚更加強健。 
質地豐厚的保濕配方深入滲透肌底，而不會阻塞毛孔或殘留油脂，令肌膚水潤，煥發健康光澤。 - KR 
 使用說明： 
 - 潔面後和保濕前均勻塗抹。  - 早晚使用，效果最佳。
name: 黄金紧致精华 30ml

product_description:
利用 Green People的Age Defy+皱纹消除唇部及眼部精华液对付唇部和眼睛周围失控的皱纹，这款有机抗衰老精华液利用植物干细胞技术改善肌肤形象。
旨在改善抚平嘴唇和眼睛皱纹，该创新配方利用二十二种强效活性成分，帮助肌肤焕发青春光彩。 它混合抗衰老黄芩苷和源自海冬青的干细胞活性成分，协同抚平皱纹，使用15分钟内紧致肌肤，同时提供长期效果，大大减少较深的皱纹。 肌肤的水分和弹性增加，而且该精华液的有机芳香成分可带来愉悦感觉。 - K.N
name: People Age Defy+皱纹消除唇部和眼部精华液（10ml）

product_description:
ARK's Skin Essential Pre Cleanse & Make-Up Remover is the first step in a powerful cleansing routine. Double cleansing is important for removing every last trace of makeup, grime and excess sebum from the skin. Dirt and makeup creates a filthy barrier which makes treating skin with serums and moisturisers potentially ineffective.
This innovative cleanser combines Omegas 3, 6 and 9 with a Multi-Fruit Lipid blend to lift all signs of dirt and makeup from the skin, including waterproof mascara, and fuses Grape Seed Oil with Avocado and Kiwi Oil to nourish and protect against dryness. Its dose of Margosa Leaf extract inhibits bacteria growth, and the herbal benefits of Zi Cao soothe and comfort sensitive skin.
Helping to free your skin of build-up and dirt, this pre-cleanser paves the way for ultimately cleansed skin. Follow with your regular cleanser.
name: Skin Essential Pre Cleanse & Make-Up Remover 150ml

product_description:
使用女士专用的 Works with Water 'Help: Clear Skin Soluble Supplement'，重获对肌肤的信心。该产品是英国首款 100% 纯天然的护肤营养品，可消除瑕疵，改善肤色。
这种可溶性配方适合所有肌肤类型，包括敏感型，以及受痤疮、皮肤色素沉着和酒渣鼻困扰的肌肤；含有经科学证明的成分，有助于减少皮肤瑕疵的出现和复发。
作用原理是什么？
该营养品含有 PravENAC™，这是一种富含高蛋白乳铁蛋白的专用营养成分。 乳铁蛋白是一种从乳蛋白中提取的经临床证明的生物活性物质，可减缓在皮肤上生成杂质的细菌繁殖。 其凭借强大的抗微生物作用，有助于减少瑕疵和疤痕的大小，同时加快当前粉刺的愈合时间。 该产品还含有芦荟，可舒缓和滋养发炎的肌肤。 可呈现更柔滑、更健康、更均匀的肌肤。
服用方法
这种可溶性营养品很容易融入日常的生活方式中，只需添加到您最喜爱的饮料或易消化的食物（无论冷热）中，这也是控制皮肤上粉刺的一种自然方式。
短短几个星期之后，皮肤看起来就会更健康，且发红、瑕疵和刺激感会减轻。 - K.N
name: with Water Women's Help: Clear Skin Soluble Supplement (14 x 3.5g)

product_description:
通过 skinChemists高级Wrinkle Killer眼部护肤霜体验创新抗衰老功效，这款高级配方加入Syn-Ake：一种模仿蛇毒效果的活性成分，以帮助防止眼部周围娇嫩的肌肤出现早衰。
利用保湿和防皱两种特性，该护肤霜所含Aquaxyl可促进透明质酸产生，保留肌肤水分，同时毒液复制成分Syn-Ake可限制肌肉收缩，让肌肤更紧致，皱纹更少。
尊重眼部周围肌肤的敏感度，该护肤霜还含有木薯淀粉，这种温和成分令肌肤柔软、水嫩和滋润。 - K.N.
name: Killer眼部护肤霜（8ml）

product_description:
Get your beauty sleep with the Bubble Burst Smoothing Hydro Night Mask from FACEINC by nails inc.
Perfect for dry, dull skin in need of a boost, the single-use, overnight treatment has a lightweight and refreshing formula brimming with fatty acids, vitamins and antioxidants to help form a protective barrier against free radicals and moisture loss.
The unique treatment utilises encapsulated bubbles to deliver instant hydration, working to smooth the appearance of fine lines, fatigue and wrinkles for a visibly lifted and re-energised visage. Awaken to skin that feels fresh and supple with a healthy looking glow.
name: by nails inc. Bubble Burst Smoothing Hydro Night Mask 10ml

product_description:
利用skinChemists高级10分钟Facelift重现肌肤青春光彩，这是一款创新的、抗衰老精华液，致力于在十分钟内减少面部细纹和皱纹。
利用硅酸镁铝的平滑特性，该年龄改善配方瞬间收紧肌肤，减少细纹和皱纹，同时提升功效令肌肤更紧致、年轻。
Ethylhexyglycerin和硅酸钠协同作用，以减少皱纹的深度，令肌肤光滑、拉紧，散发青春光彩。 - K.N.
name: (30ml)

product_description:
Pamper dry, dull and fatigued skin with the Golden Snail Intensive Cream from Korean skincare brand Skin79.
Balancing a refined blend of rare plant extracts and essential nutrients, the rich cream harnesses the restorative powers of Golden Snail in an advanced Multi-Complex, helping to optimise moisture levels and stimulate natural elastin production for a plumping effect. Fortified with Niacinamide (Vitamin B) and Adenosine, a yeast-derived extract, skin feels softened and nourished with the look of fine lines visibly reduced.
name: Golden Snail Intensive Cream 50g

product_description: Sweep away dirt and impurities with the Fast Cleansing Oil Tissues from Korean skincare brand Skin79. Delivering outstanding cleansing power, the mild face wipes effortlessly remove makeup and grime without leaving a sticky residue. Drenched in vitamin-rich Coconut Oil and soothing Aloe Vera Leaf, each wipe provides quick and easy cleansing for a refreshed, softened and nourished complexion.
name: 10 Fast Cleansing Oil Tissue 50 Pack

product_description: Clarify and refresh with the Eye:Fine Lip & Eye Remover from Korean skincare brand Skin79. Harnessing the powers of Moringa Oil, the mild formula effortlessly eliminates even waterproof make-up from the sensitive eye and lip areas, whilst Aloe Vera and Centella Asiatica deliver intense moisture and hydration to prevent over-drying or uncomfortable tightness. The make-up remover leaves lip and eye contours feeling cleansed, purified and regenerated.
name: Eye:Fine Lip & Eye Remover 150ml

product_description:
Combat signs of ageing around the delicate eye area with Talika's Eye Detox Specific - Olive to Dark Skin; a unique formula with a steel ball applicator to decongest and massage skin.
Fortified with Chromadetox® (a Brown Algae Extract), the innovative, soothing eye treatment delivers intense moisture and hydration, whilst minimising the appearance of dark circles, puffiness and redness to reveal a brighter, smoother eye contour. Soft-focus powder expertly blurs imperfections, as Vitamin B3 regulates melanin production to leave skin looking luminous, even and youthful.
name: Eye Detox Specific - Olive to Dark Skin 15ml

product_description:
Gently refresh your complexion with the A'kin Cleansing Micellar Water; a pH balanced, soap-free formula that soothes and cleanses skin without stripping moisture.
Harnessing the powers of Organic Coconut Water, Green Tea and Cucumber, the luxurious, no-rinse cleanser effectively dissolves make-up and impurities, whilst softening and hydrating to leave skin feeling calm, fresh and comfortable after use.
name: Cleansing Micellar Water 150ml

product_description:
UriageGyn-Phy 私密处舒缓清洁啫喱 ，呵护私密部位。本产品内pH值平衡，可产生泡沫，能温和清洁私处肌肤，而不会使肌肤干燥或扰乱敏感区域的自然平衡。
配方温和，尤其适用于敏感的粘膜，缓解肌肤不舒服感，修复私处菌群平衡。 碱性 olamine 配方、结合 GLYCO-GYN 聚合物，发挥温和清洗功效，不会使肌肤干燥。
使私密部位舒缓、放松、洁净。
name: Gyn-Phy私密处舒缓清洁啫喱（100ml）

product_description:
Improve the appearance of skin with the Egg Veil Face Mask from Korean skincare brand, Skin79, an intensely moisturising microfibre sheet mask infused with the nutrient-rich properties of Egg Shell Membrane.
Delivering long-lasting hydration, the breathable mask helps retain skin moisture whilst softening and nourishing the face. Egg Shell Membrane is rich in Collagen Hyaluronic Amino Acid which contributes to improved skin elasticity and smoothness; wrinkles appear reduced and hydration is enhanced. Helping to improve the look of skin, the balancing face mask will regulate oil and moisture for a supple, healthier-looking complexion.
name: Egg Veil Mask (1 Piece)

product_description:
Reveal a youthful visage with the NIOD Myrrh Clay Mask; a potent face masque with visible firming benefits. The rich clay formula is suitable for all skin types, but ideal for those experiencing loss of elasticity.
Enriched with Myrrh, a fragrant resin derived from tree sap, the mask is able to offer instant and long lasting firming action, which leaves skin lifted and supple. Without enveloping the face in a noticeable veil, the clay glides onto the visage and is effortlessly rinsed away after fifteen minutes. Working tirelessly, the mask reveals a youthful complexion with skin that appears firm, healthy and radiant.
name: Myrrh Clay Mask 50ml

product_description:
结合一系列精心挑选的情绪改善产品， NEOM基本情绪改善套装旨在增强幸福感和改善情绪。
富含八种精油，包括野薄荷和柑橘，以平衡您的情绪并促进积极心态，每种产品均让您达到个人理想境界。 - K.N.
 1 x情绪提升旅途喷雾 (5ml)  ： 
这款清爽喷雾旨在激发幸福感并改善情绪。 这款旅途情绪增强喷雾轻盈但功能强大，融合八种精油以平衡情绪，并促进积极心态。 直接喷在肌肤和面部。 应用少量即可取得强劲的效果，可使用一百多次。
 1 x强效情绪提升Treatment (5ml)  ： 
一款旨在让您更快乐的脉搏点治疗产品。 该舒缓配方轻盈但功能强大，融合八种精油平衡情绪，并促进积极心态。 只需涂于手腕、耳后和脚掌，以提振精神。 在肌肤上可保持长达三个小时。
1 x 情绪提升家庭喷雾 (5ml)：
一款旨在提振精神的清爽、轻盈喷雾。 它融合八种精油，以平衡情绪并促进积极心态。 只需在靠垫、沙发和床上用品上喷洒，即可为家中带来萦绕香气。

Erno Laszlo平衡淨採卸妝油具有獨特肌膚潔顏前導機制，平衡淨彩卸妝油，讓清潔與保護同時進行，洗出水潤清透肌。含高達13種珍貴植萃精油成分與維他命A、C、E，除具舒緩滋養肌膚功效，還能滋潤軟化干性肌膚層層堆積皮表的厚重老廢角質，提高後續潔顏皂的清潔效率；微細化精露分子能深入毛孔，溶解難以清除的油脂與污垢，使其在後續清潔步驟更容易被帶走。雙效齊下，兼具潤膚功能，幫肌膚在深層清潔前做最全面的滋潤打底與呵護。建議搭配潔顏皂，視肌膚狀況少量或局部使用，做為肌膚與皂之間的潤滑緩沖劑，幫助降低部分肌膚因深度清潔而產生的不適感。 
 使用方法 ： 
準備一盆清水，取適量或少量的平衡淨採卸妝油並局部輕柔塗抹於臉部乾燥部位，將在水中稍微浸濕的潔顏皂均勻塗抹整臉後，再以手輕輕按摩臉部與頸部，隨後使用
name: Laszlo平衡净采卸妆油200ml

product_description:
The bareMinerals SkinLongevity Vital Power Eye Gel-Cream is a pioneering treatment designed to combat visible signs of fatigue and premature ageing for stronger, younger looking skin.
The ultra-refined formula combines a unique Peptide Complex with Hyaluronic Acid and Long Life Herb, which work to alleviate the appearance of fine lines, sagging skin and discolouration while improving skin’s overall resilience and texture.
The addition of antioxidant-dense California Poppy seeks to defend environmental aggressors, while Lempuyang Ginger extract serves as a brightening agent to lift the look of dark circles. The delicate eye contour feels smoother and revitalised with a younger and healthier looking radiance.
name: SkinLongevity Vital Power Eye Gel-Cream

product_description:
Natural Spa Factory's Illuminate Toner is a lightweight solution that works to refresh and renew the appearance of skin.
The 'shake-to-wake' formula is infused with Rice Bran Oil to purify and renew, and it expertly lightens the appearance of blemishes and age spots to promote a more even-toned complexion. Ideal for oily skin, the gentle toner absorbs excess sebum to leave skin looking healthy and mattified.
name: Spa Factory Illuminate Toner

product_description:
Soothe eczema and extremely dry skin with the Salcura Bioskin Junior Daily Nourishing Spray; a lightweight, 92% natural formula that caters specifically for children and babies aged 3 months+.
Infused with omega-rich Sea Buckthorn, the fast-absorbing spray calms and relieves itching, delicate skin on the face and body, whilst Rosemary and English Lavender work to protect and moisturise for long-lasting comfort. No need to rub in, the spray is easy to apply on wriggly, unsettled children.
name: Bioskin Junior Daily Nourishing Spray (250ml)

product_description:
Murad 眼部紧致 Treatment™使娇嫩的眼部区域的皱纹得到舒展并恢复神采，它采用 一个创新的抗衰老配方，致力于最大限度地减少细纹和皱纹的出现。
内含透明质酸球强有力地作用到皮肤深处，提供无与伦比的润湿并缓解干燥，而表面灌装技术则会达到瞬时紧肤、紧致和丰盈的效果，呈现出一个更年轻和更精致的眼部轮廓。 最后使用眼部化妆垫以提高吸收，获得最佳妆效。
86％的使用者在一周后会注意到细纹和皱纹的减少*
93％的使用者会发现肌肤瞬间变得更加光滑*
2倍的使用者瞬时感到肌肤更加紧致*
name: 40片

product_description:
Murad慕拉強效抗皺眼霜15ml 
本品使用針對細緻眼部區域的特別配方，減少眼角魚尾紋，改善肌膚緊緻性，提亮眼部肌膚，看起來更加年輕。突破性配方結合慕拉最新的革命性抗老科技，Durian Cell Reform，增強活性抗衰老成分的滲透性。 
 附加特性和成分： 
 使用說明： 
潔面和爽膚後，將少量輕輕拍入眉骨和眼部下方。然後使用慕拉保濕霜。與強效去皺搭配，效果最佳。
name: 慕拉强效抗皱眼霜 15ml

product_description:
Turn back the hands of time with the Cocoa Noir Time Reverse Facial Serum from Dr Botanicals. Rich in botanical extracts, the anti-ageing serum is designed to visibly improve skin’s appearance and ensure the complexion is left looking youthful.
A complex blend of Geranium Flower Oil, Seabuckthorn Fruit oil and Neroli works harmoniously to even the appearance of skin tone and visibly reduce blemishes, whilst also promoting skin hydration. Skin is left visibly firmer and plumper with a youthful glow.
name: Botanicals Coco Noir Time Reverse Facial Serum 30ml

product_description:
本品效果強，容易吸收，幫助修復細緻眼部周圍出現的過早衰老痕跡。本品可提拉肌膚，明顯改善外觀，同時減少深紋。 
本品有效針對皺紋、深紋和眼袋。本高效產品具有裴禮康醫生的專利抗衰老成份DMAE 和磷脂，還有解決皮膚鬆弛和提亮肌膚的碧蘿芷，讓肌膚明亮有光澤。 
使用說明：
name: MD 裴礼康高效紧肤眼霜 15ml

product_description:
使用 NAOBAY（天然+有机美容产品，值得您拥有） 强效抗氧化眼霜可重新焕活眼部娇嫩的肌肤。 蕴含高度浓缩的紫罗兰萃取物、积雪草提取物和芦荟，可快速吸收，这种不含香料的配方可有效抚平细纹、淡化黑眼圈和消除疲惫的迹象。
其抗衰老配方中含有的白藜芦醇分子（一种强效抗氧化剂）效果显著，可保护肌肤免受环境的损伤，同时淡化细纹，消除水肿，以让您的眼部肌肤更光滑紧致。 促进微循环，以修复肌肤，重焕青春活力。
name: 强效抗氧化眼霜 20 毫升

product_description:
James Read 古铜色摩丝 ，可缔造自然阳光的肤色，适用于面部和身体。
彩色配方、方便涂抹、在60秒内可变干，持续3至5小时，肤色深度持续增加，缔造光滑完美的金色肤色。 配方富含芦荟、透明质酸、辅酶Q10等成分，可深度滋润肌肤，使棕褐色的肤色更持久、更均匀。 尤其适用于首次美黑产品使用者。
name: Read 古铜色摩丝 200ml

product_description:
利用其夜晚修复功效，让Weleda Wild Rose Smoothing晚霜在您睡眠时滋养您的肌肤。 这款强效滋润霜可支持肌肤再生，并有助于防止早衰。
作为Beauty Steals奖获得者，Weleda Wild Rose Smoothing晚霜由景天草、木贼和没药调制而成，共同保护肌肤，防止肌肤失去活力。 有机麝香玫瑰油和月见草油均富含必需脂肪酸，可支持细腻肌肤外层的再生，并有助于防止早衰。 早上起床后肌肤明显更有弹性，手感光滑柔顺。
使用说明：
name: Wild Rose Smoothing 晚霜 (30ml)

product_description: Crabtree & Evelyn 加勒比野花淡香水混合了花香和柑橘的基调，并融入丝丝海风的清凉，让人神清气爽，仿佛置身加勒比海的宁静海滩。 这款香水的前调散发着融合了海洋气息的热带柑橘清香，逐渐引出更丰富的中调，混合了蜘蛛兰、盛放的茉莉花和百香果的香气。 最后延续着让人放松的后调，混合了李子、浮木的沉郁芬芳。 - K.N.
name: & Evelyn 加勒比野花淡香水（100ml）

product_description: Crabtree & Evelyn 身体乳液能够深度滋润肌肤，并散发微妙的迷人清香。 这款丰富的滋润霜混合了香梨和木兰花提取物，并添加了茉莉和桂花的清新花香，富含保湿甘油、泛醇和尿囊素，能够护理并滋润肌肤。 适合所有肌肤类型。 K.D.
name: & Evelyn 雪梨 木兰花 身体乳（250ml）

product_description:
使用甜美的 KORRES Lip Butter Stick SPF 15 in Peach，令双唇滋润柔软。 其神奇的天然配方非常适合干裂的唇部，所含的柑橘油可为肌肤深层补充营养，提供持久的呵护，让您拥有超级诱人亲吻的双唇。
这款 Lip Butter Stick SPF15 in Peach 主要含有牛油果油和向日葵蜡提取物，令唇部肌肤焕发亮丽的桃红色泽，而深层补水可令双唇更加柔软诱人！ 橘子油能调理干燥嘴唇，而 SPF15 能为最脆弱的部位提供必要防护，有助于抚平和滋养唇部。
name: Lip Butter Stick Spf15 - Peach

product_description:
利用来自NUXE的Anti Dark Spot 完美面膜平衡您的肌肤，这是一套六个内含纯棉、预切割棉纸面膜的单独小包，可滋养肌肤，均匀肤色，减少黑斑及色素沉着。
每张面膜浸润21 ml 的产品，利用珍贵花分子和维生素C，明显消减黑斑大小和颜色，同时防止新的黑斑的出现。 该高性能面膜将令您的肌肤美白亮丽、肤色均匀，更加光彩照人。 每周使用一次或两次以改善肌肤。 - K.N.
name: Splendieuse Anti Dark Spot完美面膜（6×21ml）

product_description:
Improve the look of your skin with ALGENIST Regenerative Anti-Ageing Moisturiser SPF 20, a nourishing formula that protects skin against harmful UV rays whilst replenishing essential moisture and addressing signs of ageing.
Luxurious and nourishing, the moisturiser visibly restores radiance and smoothens skin's texture to leave it with a youthful, supple touch. Infused with Alguronic Acid (a patented compound that helps reduce the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles) Vitamin C and Apple Stem Cell extract, it delivers advanced anti-ageing properties, addressing imperfections and diminishing lines and wrinkles for a younger, hydrated and smoother-looking complexion. SPF 20 keeps skins safe during sun exposure.
name: Regenerative Anti-Ageing Moisturiser SPF20 60ml

product_description:
Refine the complexion with the ALGENIST Multi-Perfecting Pore Corrector Gel Moisturiser; a lightweight hydrator that targets pores and delivers a visibly brighter visage.
Enriched with a skin-loving blend of Alguronic Acid, Salicylic Acid and Oligosaccharides, the oil-free moisturiser effortlessly glides over the face, neck and décolletage, absorbing quickly and nourishing skin. The gel-cream hydrator envelops skin in a veil of essential moisture that works to smooth away areas of dry and roughness, whilst having a brightening effect.
Expect pores to visibly reduce and the face to appear soft, smooth and radiant.
name: Multi-Perfecting Pore Corrector Gel Moisturiser 60ml

product_description:
这是一款真正的干性皮肤救星，内含草莓和猕猴桃的活性提取物，使暗沉的肌肤重焕光釆。 本品会让您在特殊场合中，使所有人"眼前一亮"，确保极致美丽。
本质上看，本款丰富的深度清洁面膜，含科技成分，可拯救疲倦的肌肤，令肤色完美。 Elemis鲜果活肤再生面膜，内含清洁及净化的活性提取物，使肌肤光釆动人，促进肌肤血液循环。
使用说明：

Dr. Brandt推出的逆龄抗皱面霜将让肌肤恢复青春活力。 融合了多种强大的精油和乙醇酸，具有重塑、紧实和细致的功效；而且吸收迅速，能有效抚平细纹和皱纹，对抗下垂的肌肤，增加弹性。
这款抗衰老面霜采用品牌研制的 Juvenescence+ 化合物与逆龄铂金技术，协同作用，重塑并修复肌肤结构，促进新陈代谢；另外特别添加了高粱精华，能立即紧实并提拉肌肤，带给您更光滑水润的紧致肌肤。
name: Brandt 逆龄抗皱面霜（50g）

product_description:
Foreo Luna露娜™ T-Sonic ™舒缓及面部清洁仪将赋予肌肤自然健康光泽，使其恢复至平滑年轻状态。在舒缓模式下，露娜™温和地向皮肤表面以下传递T-Sonic ™脉动，有效清除彩妆、祛除肌肤细纹。露娜™的清洁模式比手洗更深层地清洁肌肤，从而促进肌肤更有效吸收化妆品。经常使用不仅令肌肤更清新更有光泽，而且为保持年轻与健康肌肤垫定最重要基础。
作为一款突破性的洁面和抗衰老居家肌肤护理仪器，露娜舒缓及面部清洁仪结合了T-Sonic ™脉动技术和软硅胶刷头两大尖端革新技术。相比尼龙材质，软硅胶刷头的柔软质感带给肌肤如羽毛抚面般的温柔感受，安全无磨损，圆润硅胶刷头在您肌肤上轻柔地滑动，赋予肌肤最温和的清洁，同时可以提高肌肤对护肤品的吸收。此外，它的T-脉动技术带来每分钟8000次脉动，T-Sonic ™ 透肤声波脉动通过光滑的硅胶触点导入肌肤，帮助清除毛孔中的污垢、油脂以及化妆品残留，清理坏死角质细胞，更促进皮肤血液循环，减少细纹和皱纹，让肌肤绽放青春活力。100%防水无渗透的设计使LUNA™露娜™比普通纤维刷毛更加安全卫生。LUNA™露娜™100%的环保设计让您在一次充电后可使用多达450次。它的刷头无需更换，跟同类商品相比，露娜舒缓及面部清洁仪更经济、卫生和温和。选择露娜™系列产品，也就是选择了润泽、自然、健康的年轻肤色。
无需更换刷头并且享有2年保修保障。
柔软硅胶触点赋予肌肤最温和的护理。
露娜™的抗衰老模式通过同心波纹的曲面传递脉动，从而放松面部紧张肌肉，让肌肤更光滑的同时淡化动态纹和表情纹，达到按摩抗老功效。
100%防水无渗透设计并有8档可调节强度变化功能。
LUNA™露娜™100%的环保设计让您在一次充电后可使用多达450次。
T-Sonic ™ 透肤声波脉动通过光滑硅胶触点导入肌肤，帮助清除毛孔中的污垢、油脂以及化妆品残留，清理坏死角质细胞。
建议清洁面部不同区域时各用约 15 秒钟；露娜™ T-Sonic ™脉动每过 15 秒钟后会短暂停顿以作提示。
1. 卸妆后，湿润脸部后涂上您的洁面乳。按中间键开启露娜™，进入清洁模式。
2. 从下巴开始，沿着下颚向上轻柔抚动至耳朵，再逐步清洁更上面的区域，直至清洁完整边脸颊。
3. 重复步骤 2，清洁另一边脸颊。
4. 然后从额头的中间分别向两边轻轻抚动，直至清洁整个额头。
5. 清洁鼻子时用露娜™在鼻子的一侧上下轻轻划动，然后以同样的方法清洁鼻子的另一侧。清洁眼睛以下部位时，建议按“–”键调低露娜™的脉动强度，特别轻柔地向外抚动。
一分钟结束后，露娜™的脉动会相继快速暂停三次。再次按中间键进入待机状态，此时可用水冲洗面部完成一分钟清洁。请注意为了防止使用过度，露娜™处于清洁模式三分钟后会自动关机。
露娜™的舒缓模式可改善明显的细纹和皱纹，重塑肌肤紧致与弹性。
在待机状态下，按中间键激活舒缓模式。建议舒缓模式下作用于下列每个区域的时间为 12 秒钟左右；露娜™的脉动每 12 秒钟会短暂停顿以作提示。在本模式下请闭上双眼，放松面部，然后将露娜™的舒缓面置于下列皱纹区域（这些区域的紧张肌肉最容易产生忧虑纹、鱼尾纹、笑纹等）：
1. 双眉之间
2. 右眼尾部
3. 右脸鼻唇间
4. 左脸鼻唇间
5. 左眼尾部
一分钟结束后，露娜™的脉动会相继快速暂停三次。请注意为了防止使用过度，露娜™处于舒缓模式三分钟后会自动关机。
露娜™的抗衰老模式通过同心波纹的曲面传递脉动，从而放松面部紧张肌肉，让肌肤更光滑的同时淡化动态纹和表情纹，达到按摩抗老功效。

T-Sonic™脉动能清除肌肤杂质，比手洗更有效地进行深层清洁。因为手指无法像露娜™一样具有硅胶质地可以深层净化毛孔和清理坏死角质细胞。此外，手指本身也经常具有油污、细菌和其他污染物。

name: Luna露娜舒缓及面部清洁仪 – 特别敏感性肌肤

product_description:
NUXE 欧树爽肤水具有爽肤功效，它采用温和的配方，旨在在洁面后祛除化妆品残留和杂质。
这款爽肤水质地清新而不粘着，利用从椰浆中提取的表面活性剂帮助温和地清除任何化妆品残留，同时软化和舒缓肌肤。 所蕴含的透明质酸具有保湿锁水功能，而金缕梅水可确保让您的肌肤感觉柔软、光滑和舒适。 它可让您的肌肤保持舒爽清洁，非常适合为日常护肤准备肌肤。 可安全地用于面部和眼部肌肤。
name: 欧树爽肤水 100ml

product_description:
REN Rosa Centifolia™ 洋蔷薇热布卸妆洁面乳是一种营养丰富、质地柔软的洁面乳，其配方旨在深度清洁肌肤，清除所有化妆品残留。其中的蔷薇玫瑰花瓣萃取物可帮助舒缓焕活肌肤，改善肤色。 这款洁面乳适用于所有类型的肌肤，配方中不含有任何防腐剂。它还含有可可油的提取物三酸甘油酯，可让肌肤更加滋润丰盈。 - E.D
——将洁面乳涂在面部，然后以画圈的方式按摩。
——用温水沾湿随附的洗脸巾，然后敷在面部，以打开毛孔。
——待洗脸巾冷却后，擦除洁面乳。
name: Rosa Centifolia™ 洋蔷薇热布卸妆洁面乳

product_description:
彼得羅夫愛爾蘭黑泥潔淨面膜深層清潔肌膚，並且不使肌膚因清潔而缺水。其獨特的配方中含有9000年的黑泥，經過愛爾蘭農民手工採集。提供了豐富的生物礦物質、維他命和抗氧化物質，以保護肌膚。 Hijiki海藻幫助肌膚補水，火山泥重塑年輕肌膚，使肌膚看起來更乾淨明亮。 
火山灰活性炭含高密度的修復性礦物質，吸附毛孔中的雜質和毒素和油脂，使肌膚看起來更加年輕，容光煥發。
name: Thomas Roth－彼得罗夫爱尔兰黑泥洁净面膜

product_description:
Ultrasun 50+ Anti Pigmentation Face 是一款不含香精的防水产品，为极度敏感肌肤提供抗衰老保护，免受紫外线损伤。
抗氧化剂结合抗色素沉积成分，帮助均匀肤色，减少明显的黑斑。 轻盈的不油腻质地利于恢复肌肤天然水润。 E.N.
name: SPF 50+ Anti-Pigmentation Sun Lotion (50ml)

product_description:
完美适合那些向往360度夜间眼部护理的人，  First Aid Beauty  Eye Duty三重补救隔夜Balm 是一款抗衰老眼部护理霜，旨在促进肌肤夜间的自然再生过程，紧致、光滑和滋润眼窝部位（包括上眼睑和黑眼圈）。
利用强大肽的混合物配制，以抚平细纹和皱纹，其丰富质地在睡眠的同时逐渐被肌肤吸收，提供健康剂量的水分，明显紧致和调理下垂眼睑同时消除黑眼圈。 它的烟酰胺和金纽扣花混合物能提高肌肤弹性，同时保湿黄油和蜡可深层滋润、软化和调理肌肤，获得更年轻、更大的双眼。
为整个眼窝部位，包括其上部和下部设计，并专门用于隔夜护理，以达到最大的效力。 - K.N.
name: Aid Beauty Eye Duty三重补救隔夜Balm (15ml)

product_description:
Gatineau present the Hand, Lip & Eye Trio; the perfect pampering treat for super soft, smooth and moisturised skin. Combining a nourishing hand cream, plumping lip treatment and refreshing eye roll-on, the kit is complete with a drawstring bag for use on-the-go.
Vitamina Suractivee™ Hand Cream (75ml)
The lightweight, non-greasy hand cream works to moisturise, smooth and condition dry, over-worked hands. With a protective, nourishing formula, its blend of collagen and vitamin E delivers long-lasting hydration whilst protecting from free radicals. Hands will feel soft and supple.
Defi Lift 3D™ Revolumising Lip Care (10ml)
Enriched with powerful active ingredients to instantly give your lips an irresistible gloss texture with a long-lasting defined,  plumped appearance. A high tech, smoothing balm, the formula moisturises and smoothens away fine lines with the Perfect Design formula. High concentrations of natural active ingredients shea butter, jojoba oil and lavender extract provide moisturising and comforting benefits.
Aquamemory™ Moisture Replenish Eye Roll-On (15ml)
Developed to revitalise the delicate eye area, whilst reducing fine lines and puffiness for a luminous, youthful-looking appearance. With exclusive Osmaporine™ and hyaluronic acid technology, its cooling, non-greasy texture absorbs quickly into skin to reduce signs of fatigue. Experience eyes that look rested, refreshed and luminous.
name: Hand, Lip & Eye Trio (Worth £81.00)

product_description:
NUXE Nirvanesque Eye Contour可有效消除开始出现的皱纹和黑眼圈。 这款快速起效的眼霜能迅速平滑肌肤，抑制黑眼圈形成，带给您更年轻、更明亮的双眸。
本品牌产品秉承了"天然"和"奢华"相结合的研制理念，不含矿物油、苯甲酸酯类和动物成分，确保您所用的产品成分天然、持久保质、配方奢华。 -SA
使用说明：用指尖涂抹于肌肤
name: Nirvanesque Eye Contour (15ml)

product_description: Crabtree & Evelyn 摩洛哥没药古龙沐浴露将带给您芬芳清爽的沐浴体验。 这款奢华的沐浴露融合了最优质的没药、佛手柑，配以具有保湿功效的甘油，在有效去除日常污垢的同时还能滋养秀发和身体肌肤。 沐浴露带有淡淡清香，融合了具有阳刚魅力的没药、苦橙叶和小豆蔻，并加入少许黑胡椒的辛香。 - K.N.
name: & Evelyn 摩洛哥没药沐浴露（300ml）

product_description:
Jurlique 菁萃复颜抗老紧致精华液能够对抗衰老的迹象。 这款精华液专为紧致肌肤而设计，淡化明显的衰老迹象，包括皱纹、松弛、缺乏弹性和肤色不均。
这款有效紧致的新产品混合了多种高效植物精华，包括燕麦核提取物、山毛榉芽提取物和木薯粉，密集补水，让肌肤更加紧致光滑，更显健康。 -SA
name: 菁萃复颜抗老紧致精华液

product_description:
Erno Laszlo海生奇肌蓝藻紧肤日霜SPF 30可帮助肌肤锁水保水、深度补水储水并防护阳光、紫外线及污染环境对肌肤的伤害。适合所有肌肤类型。
以手工采集只藏于天然深海纯净水源之Spirulina Maxima巨大螺旋藻，蕴含多达70多种养份：包含天然叶绿素及藻青素所组成的蓝色基因体、胺基酸、蛋白质、维他命B12及抗氧物等。提供肌肤最好的修复能力，并提升自体免疫能力，舒缓镇定抗敏并且全面紧致、抗老化、恢复肌肤弹性以及淡化细纹。死海活离子海水及绿茶、卢荟萃取液及长效玻尿酸可帮助肌肤锁水深度保湿。此款日霜保湿同时紧致肌肤，防止老化并提供肌肤全效滋润与呵护。 天天使用密集修护赋活，使用后肌肤柔软，充满弹力。
使用方法：
name: Laszlo海生奇肌蓝藻紧肤日霜SPF 30 （50ml）

product_description:
Cod Liver Oil - 1000mg is a high quality source of Omega 3 which is rich in EPA (eicosapentaenoic acid) and DHA (docosahexaenoic acid).
Cod Liver oil contains 237mg of omega 3 per soft gel and has many beneficial properties within the body due to the action of EPA and DHA. These two long chain fatty acids help contribute to normal blood cholesterol levels and healthy cardiac function. Cod liver oil is high in vitamin A which contributes to normal vision along with the maintenance of normal skin and iron metabolism. Providing 1000% daily RI for vitamin D, myvitamins cod liver oil also contributes to the normal function and health of muscles and bones while both vitamin A and D supports the normal function fo the immune system.
Our high quality soft gel is a great way to get all the health benefits of Omega 3 fatty acids for those to lack fish in their diet. Cod Liver Oil also contains healthy levels of Vitamins A and D3, perfect for supporting normal function of the immune system. To be taken as part of a varied and balanced diet and a healthy lifestyle.
name: Liver Oil

product_description:
暗沉干燥的肌肤已成为过去式；KORRES Wild Rose Exfoliating Cleanser 是您目前必不可少的日用品！ 温和清洁肌肤表面，让坏死细胞、杂质和多余皮脂"一去不复返"。
KORRES Wild Rose Exfoliating Cleanser 通过越桔、柑橘和羟基酸的自然融合配制而成；旨在促进细胞更新 - 只需使用一次，您的肌肤纹理就会重新焕发活力。 富含保湿多聚糖，保护肤色，避免红肿过敏现象。持续使用即可实现总体条件的重新平衡。
使用说明：
name: Wild Rose Exfoliating Cleanser (150ml)

product_description: 要获得更平滑、更均匀的肤色，非Dr. Brandt GlowDr. Brandt红宝石晶体Retinol 补水霜莫属。 这款补水霜可以立即令肌肤焕发健康光泽，它可以使用将光转化为能量的肌肤照明器、柔光镜和微粒化的红宝石晶体来恢复最佳保湿状态，打造更光滑、更均匀的肤色。 - E.D
name: Brandt Glow Dr. Brandt 红宝石晶体 Retinol 补水霜

product_description:
完美适合油性或易生暗疮的肌肤， First Aid Beauty Skin拯救无油哑光护肤膏是一款多功能肌肤拯救护理膏，致力于即时控制肌肤油脂并明显缩小毛孔。
该无油、不油腻配方可立即缩小毛孔，同时天然抗油成分调节油脂的产生，让您的肌肤没有油光。 深层滋润肌肤而不堵塞毛孔，它具有独特的破水质地，这意味着它可瞬间被肌肤吸收，带来瞬间、清爽体验。 油脂将会减少，肌肤瑕疵得到控制。
非常适合日常使用，肌肤将变得柔软、哑光和受到调理。 - K.N.

product_description:
Jurlique 茱莉蔻舒缓泡沫洁面乳让您的肌肤不再如此敏感。 它蕴含有丰富的具有平衡能量的紫草萃取物和知名的四川干胡椒，能够温和地祛除肌肤表面的杂质，有效舒缓肌肤。
Jurlique 茱莉蔻崇尚生命力、能量和美肤，这款舒缓泡沫洁面乳将会让您对此深有体会。 当您使用这款洁面乳并使其形成奢华的泡沫时，您就能体验到其平静功能，可有效清洁肌肤，重新平衡敏感的肌肤，让您身心舒爽。

name: 鳄梨润足霜（113g）

product_description:
Treat your complexion to the 24 Hour Skin Solutions Kit from this works. Combining five of the brand's best-sellers, the collection works with your bodyclock to restore a smooth, youthful appearance and help you achieve a restful night's sleep.
Deep Sleep™ Pillow Spray (5ml)
Designed to inspire a relaxing slumber, the pillow spray is a fragrant formula that releases calming vibes so you can exhale your worries. Formulated with natural oils, including Lavender, Vetivert and Wild Chamomile, the sleep solution is perfect for those who wish to wind down.
In Transit™ Skin Defence Moisturiser (20ml)
Suitable for sensitive skin, the daily moisturiser provides UVA and UVB broad spectrum sun protection and shields from environmental aggressors. The brand's Bio Boost and Vitamin E antioxidant blend is combined with hydrating Hyaluronic Acid to deliver intense moisture so you can experience soft, revitalised and smoother skin.
Light Time™ Skin Plumper (3ml)
Helping to smoothen the appearance of sleep lines and combat tired skin, the smoothing formula utilises Hyaluronic filling spheres to plump out wrinkles and skin creases, whilst its antioxidant properties and revitalising Persian Silk Tree Extract work in unison to make skin appear fuller and ultimately hydrated.
Light Time™ Cleanse and Glow (20ml)
A one minute daily skin illuminator that cleanses skin whilst boosting moisture. Working to banish signs of fatigue, the powerful cleanser blends water-activated Vitamin C with Vitamin E and Jojoba to create a rich balm that gets to work once combined with water, lifting impurities and inspiring youthful radiance.
No Wrinkles Midnight Moisture (15ml)
An ultra-nourishing night cream that works to combat signs of fatigue as you sleep. Harnessing the powers of Persian Silk Tree Extract and anti-ageing Retinol, the powerful formula penetrates deeply to hydrate and plump skin, revealing a firmer, younger-looking complexion.
name: works 24 Hour Skin Solutions Kit

product_description:
PAYOT加强型倍润日霜 是一种紧肤润肤霜。它会使肌肤感到舒适、深层补水、重塑面部轮廓、改善肤色，使您看起来更年轻。
该倍润日霜为熔化型、乳状质地。其乳液包含大量有益成分，令您的肌肤舒适柔软。其成分包括：抗氧化维生素E、透明质酸、Acti-Lift 合成物；可重塑肌肤、提升肌肤弹力、抚平皱纹、修复肌肤结构、恢复皮肤弹性、使您的皮肤更致密。
使用该产品后，皮肤清新光滑、持久舒适、得到深层滋养。 因此非常适合成熟型、疲劳型、脱水型皮肤。

KORRES木瓜润唇膏易于融合的质地会让您的嘴唇感觉香软诱人，得到充分调理，同时呈现出有光泽的精致粉红色色调，适合单独使用或涂在您最喜欢的唇彩之下。
KORRES木瓜润唇膏让您的嘴唇获得深层和持久保湿。 包括乳木果油和米蜡在内的调理成分让您拥有楚楚可人、完美的柔软双唇！
木瓜色是一种热情的粉红色色调，为您的嘴唇带来有淡雅光泽的色调。
10毫升

Shiseido Pureness Mattifying Moisturiser是油性肌肤的滋润佳品，可有效补水保湿，滋养肌肤，同时减少油光，呈现哑光肤色。
本品质地不油腻，富含牡丹根和迷迭香精华，可有效控制油脂生成，减少油光，并消除暗疮和黑头；还含有吸油粉，能减少肌肤表面的油光。
蕴含的Hydro-Balancing Complex水平衡复合因子能补水保湿，并激发肌肤的自然保湿功能，令肌肤柔软润泽。 - L.M.
使用说明：早晚清洁后涂于肌肤。
name: Pureness Matifying Moisturiser Oil Free (50ml)

product_description:
KORRES芒果润唇膏可融入您的嘴唇，呈现出有华丽光泽的彩色妆效。 这款含乳脂的润唇膏含有乳木果油和米蜡的混合物，可在恶劣条件下保护您的嘴唇。
由于具有保湿和愈合伤口的特性，芒果脂肪常常被用于美容产品中，旨在自然地防止水分流失。 无论您是站在白雪皑皑的阿尔卑斯山山坡上，或是试图在热浪袭击的夏季保持清凉，或是在空调风习习的办公室中投入地加班，使用KORRES芒果润唇膏会为奉献保湿的功效！
name: (10ml)

product_description:
Delivering fast and effective spot treatment, the Salcura Antiac Activ Gel Serum features a precision nozzle applicator for targeted use around the clock.
Synergising Sea Buckthorn and Eucalyptus, the 97% natural formula fights stubborn spots and blackheads, whilst a soothing blend of Aloe Vera and Tea Tree calm inflammation and combat breakout-causing bacteria. Ideal for oily and combination skin types, the tube is perfect for travelling or carrying in your bag.
name: Antiac Activ Gel Serum (15ml)

product_description:
独特配方可温和去除脸部皮肤多余油脂，细致收敛毛孔，使肌肤清爽洁净。Erno Laszlo轻柔爽肤水让油肌零负担，清爽再加倍，洁面之后让肌肤再度净化。再以细小分子的保湿成分导入水分赋活肌肤，让肌肤以水合作用达到油水平衡，规律油脂分泌，减少油光产生，还原健康无油肌底光采。
使用方法：
基础清洁之后，取适量于棉花球轻轻擦拭脸部，或轻拍全脸及欲调理部位，让爽肤水慢慢的渗入肌肤，直到完全吸收为止，接着再继续滋养的后续步骤即可，避开眼周。
name: Laszlo轻柔爽肤水200ML

product_description:
Murad的Clarifying面膜是针对易生粉刺肌肤的每周护肤产品。 其独特的配方加入粘土高岭土和膨润土，可清透肌肤，吸收灰尘和杂质，畅通毛孔，控制油脂分泌，以防止皮疹。
该轻质面膜加入硫元素，可促进肌肤清洁，同时具有舒缓功效的甘草提取物可镇静、缓解肌肤以获得持久舒适。 葡萄籽提取物可提供抗氧化保护功效，帮助肌肤抵御自由基损伤，令肌肤如丝般光滑。
name: Clarifying面膜（75ml）

product_description:
NUXE Merveillance Expert Face Normal Skin Cream可有效减少中性肌肤上的细纹和皱纹。 这款护肤霜含有功效可靠的植物成分，能帮助减少、缩短和淡化可见的表情纹。
本品富含天然成分，其中的坚果油能滋润平滑肌肤； 通过木槿花根强化的橡木精华能抚平皱纹，平滑肌肤；而金盏花花瓣和含羞草种子能令肌肤丰盈饱满。 -SA
使用说明：早间和/或晚间洁肤并使用精华液后，涂抹本品于面部和颈部。
name: Merveillance Expert Face Normal Skin Cream

product_description: Anthony 男士毛发内生护理膏可以让您告别令人头疼的向内生长的毛发。 这款产品融合了乙醇酸、水杨酸和植酸等成分，可以温和地去除死皮，对抗细菌，释放毛发。 另外，这款产品还特别添加了柳兰和薰衣草精华，可以舒缓并镇静肌肤，适合所有肌肤类型。 - L.M.
name: 男士毛发内生护理膏

product_description:
用Pai的Rosehip生物再生快速增彩面膜提升暗沉的肌肤并使其重焕生机。 这款增彩面膜富含高浓度OMEGA脂肪酸和抗氧化剂，将赋予皮肤光泽与活力，同时保护它免受自由基的侵害和环境刺激。 Rosehip精油改善皮肤的色泽和纹理，让皮肤光滑柔软，充满水分。 E.N. 
Pai 品牌产品最适合敏感型肌肤，其配方考虑到敏感和过敏性肌肤，确保只采用最优质的原料。 所有产品均不含刺激性化学品和酒精，且经土壤协会认证。
使用说明：涂抹于洗净的皮肤上并保留 5-10 分钟。 用湿布擦拭。
