product_description:
Enhance the look of your natural lashes with Christian BRETON Eye Lash Builder, a primer and serum specially formulated to help lengthen and thicken the appearance of your eyelashes.
Promoting noticeably thicker, intensified lashes, the formula features a spoolie applicator for easy use; apply in the day to prime lashes and protect against the drying effects of mascara, and use overnight as a serum to promote healthier, stronger, longer lashes. Enhancing volume and thickness, it will promote lush, lengthened lashes. It will also protect eyelashes from the damaging effects of the sun.
name: BRETON Eyelash Builder 5ml

product_description:
Specially combined to cleanse, calm and soothe dry skin types, the MONU Top Trio contains three products to hydrate the complexion and leave it feeling soft, nourished and refreshed.
The MONU Top Trio for Dry Skin contains:
Gentle Cleanser (180ml)
A gentle cleanser enriched with Wheat Germ, Peach Kernel, Coconut Oils and Aloe Vera to clean your skin and leave it feeling soft.
Gentle Toner (180ml)
A hydrating, soothing and refreshing toner that removes all traces of cleanser.
Moisture Rich Collagen Cream (50ml)
A luxurious hydrating cream that does wonders for skin's main problems. Plant flavonoids prevent premature ageing, Marine Collagen smooths out fine lines, and Shea Butter improve the skin's barrier.
name: Top Trio - Dry

product_description:
The GLOV Hydro Cleansing Silver Set is an effortless, efficient and simple way to cleanse skin without the need for a cleanser, perfect for everyday pampering. Presented in branded gift packaging, the kit provides an innovative solution to leave skin feeling refreshed and purified.
Comfort Hydro Cleanser
The Comfort Hydro Cleanser is an effortless, efficient and simple way to cleanse skin without the need for a cleanser, ideal for removing stubborn and heavy makeup in difficult-to-reach areas. Utilising advanced microtechnology, the ‘heavy duty’ cleansing glove contains refined fibres up to 30 times thinner than a cotton pad, which boast electrostatic properties to absorb makeup, dirt and excess oil like a magnet. The larger, square shaped design is perfect for the eye contour and covering larger surface area across the neck and décolletage.     
2 x Quick Treat Cleanser
Perfect for quick cleansing and fixes, the Quick Treat Cleanser is a compact version that fits in your purse for any-time any-place cleansing. The micro fibre tool effortlessly sweeps away mascara smudges or lipstick marks for clean and flawless results.
name: Hydro Cleansing Silver Set

product_description:
让 Dr. Brandt 青春常驻面霜抹去衰老的迹象。 Dr Brandts 的这款创新面霜融合了 A3 功效，即富含多种抗氧化、抗衰老、抗刺激成分组成的动态保护层，让您拥有水润充盈的肌肤。
它可以帮助肌肤抵御外界侵害，带给您12小时的保护。 - SA
name: Brandt 青春常驻面霜（50g）

product_description:
Shiseido Intensive AntiSpot Serum采用全新强效配方，专门针对顽固难祛的斑点，打造完美的均匀肤色。
本品不仅能祛斑，还能针对黑斑起到激光治疗的功效，从而净化平衡肌肤，延缓衰老。  -SA
name: Intensive AntiSpot Serum (30ml)

product_description:
Reignite a youthful glow with the Balance Me Radiance Face Oil; a silky, quick-absorbing formula that promises to hydrate, illuminate and target signs of ageing.
Fortified with Amazonian Buriti Nut, Camellia and Rosehip Oils, the radiance-reviving blend helps to soften the appearance of fine lines, scarring and discolouration for a smoother, younger-looking complexion. Nourishes and protects whilst delivering long-lasting moisture and hydration to reveal bright, even skin with a luxurious fragrance of Rose Otto.
name: Me Radiance Face Oil 30ml

product_description:
Weleda杏仁舒缓面油由全天然成分混合而成，这让它非常适合护理娇嫩的面部肌肤。 这款滋养护肤油可在夜间使用，或用来清洁肌肤，旨在为肌肤提供全天保护。
具有保护功效的甜杏仁油、李子油和具有舒缓功效的黑刺李与洋甘菊、金盏花萃取物巧妙融合，可在夜间重建过程中镇静敏感肌肤并再生极度干燥的皮肤。 Weleda杏仁舒缓面油不仅放松和平滑肌肤，还可以温和去除化妆品，让您的肌肤感觉清新和平静。
使用说明：

Erno Laszlo 的特效眼部緊緻精華旨在縮緊並調理嬌嫩眼部區域，同時減少黑眼圈，富含卓有成效的創新配方。配方包含維生素C 和棕櫚酸視黃酯，可加強肌膚，增強彈性，而葡萄、桑葚、虎耳草和黃芩提取物可抑制黑色素產生，令疲憊雙眸煥活新生。 KD 
 使用說明：
name: Laszlo 特效眼部紧致精华 (0.5oz)

product_description:
Cleanse and refresh your complexion with the Rice Bubble Cleansing Mask from Skin79, a South Korean based brand that’s at the forefront of Asian beauty trends. Ideal for dry, oily and combination skin types, the pioneering sheet mask creates fine carbonic acid bubbles when applied that work to deeply purify skin and unclog pores for an intensive cleanse.
Enriched with Echinacea extract and Milk Proteins, the moisturising treatment effectively stimulates collagen and elasticity levels while regulating excess sebum production for a more balanced and even finish. Skin feels hydrated and clean with a soft, supple texture.
name: Rice Bubble Cleansing Mask - 1 Piece

product_description:
L’Oreal Revitalift 面部颈部紧致霜专为最容易接触有害因子的肌肤区域而配制，能够支撑肌肤的脆性纤维，重塑完美轮廓。
L’Oreal Revitalift 面部颈部紧致霜能够快速吸收，浓缩了多种有效成分，包括弹性蛋白和活力纤维原，抚平皱纹，对抗肌肤松弛问题，让肌肤更加丰盈光泽，柔软水嫩。
使用说明：
name: Dermo Expertise Revitalift 面部颈部紧致霜（50ml）

product_description:
Transform skin with the Eight Hour Cream® All-Over Miracle Oil Gift Set from Elizabeth Arden. Harnessing the age-defying powers of the renowned Eight Hour® collection, the three-piece set leaves skin feeling smooth, supple and replenished with a youthful looking luminosity.
Eight Hour® All-Over Miracle Oil for Face, Body & Hair (100ml)
A multi-tasking oil for the face, body and hair. Enriched with hydrating Tsubaki Oil, the versatile oil delivers long-lasting moisture, melting effortlessly into skin and hair to soften, nourish and brighten. It intensely conditions hair, smoothing frizz and flyaways to promote sleek, healthy-looking locks. On skin, it deeply hydrates and is the perfect massage oil. Hair is left shiny and sleek; skin is radiant and supple.

Eight Hour® Cream Nourishing Lip Protectant Stick SPF 15 (3.5g)
Harnessing the protective properties of the Eight Hour® Cream, the moisturising lip balm replenishes essential vitamins, nutrients and minerals whilst providing broad spectrum UV and antioxidant protection. Its dose of Shea Butter, Lanolin and Honey extract help to seal in moisture and intensely nourish. Lips are left feeling soft, supple and moisturised.
Eight Hour® Cream Original Skin Protectant (15ml)
A smoothing and restorative formula that works to relieve and comfort dry, cracked skin with its blend of Vitamin E, Petrolatum and Salicylic Acid. Award-winning, its softening and hydrating properties help to calm and restore wanting skin, relieving signs of redness and minor skin irritations. Perfect for dry skin, sunburn and chapped lips, it's a multi-purpose balm that keep skins soft and protected.
name: Arden Eight Hour Cream All-Over Miracle Oil Gift Set (Worth £68.00)

product_description:
Cleanse and revive your skin with First Aid Beauty Caffeine Matcha Wake Up Face Wipes, a pack of pre-moistened towelettes infused with superfood Matcha Green Tea.
Hydrating and refreshing, the facial wipes effectively lift away dirt, oil and makeup whilst brightening, energising, moisturising and calming with a cocktail of Vitamin C, Caffeine, Hyaluronic Acid and Aloe Vera. Convenient for travelling and on-the-go, the wipes will cleanse and calm your skin whilst protecting against environmental aggressors.
name: Aid Beauty Caffeine Matcha Wake Up Face Wipes

product_description:
小蜜蜂亮彩柔肤水含有多种清洁和软化植物成分，可以去除残留洗面乳和多余油脂或残妆，肤色更加亮泽。
采用被誉为自然界最有营养物质之一的蜂王浆，有效改善肌肤亮泽度，肤色更加自然明亮。
经过皮肤科专家测试，使用于所有肤质类型。
name: Bees小蜜蜂亮彩柔肤水（175ml）

product_description:
Freshly handmade in the UK with high-quality and natural ingredients, STEAMCREAM's 'Blue Velvet' Moisturiser is a lightweight whipped emulsion that can be used on the face, hands and body.
Developed with the brand's unique STEAM process, the finest ingredients have been fused together by a shot of steam to create a gentle, fast-absorbing emulsion that delivers long-lasting hydration.
Harnessing the nourishing powers of Orange Flower Water, Cocoa Butter and Almond and Jojoba Oils, the ultra-moisturising formula softens and replenishes, leaving skin smooth, restored and rejuvenated from top to toe.
Presented in a reusable, decorative tin crafted from recyclable materials to reduce energy use and respect the environment. STEAMCREAM follows a strict no-animal testing policy and is approved by the Vegan Society.
name: Blue Velvet Moisturiser 75ml

product_description:
Green People Fruitful Nights 由 Natural Health & Beauty Magazine 票选为最优秀的护肤产品，是一款精致的果味晚霜，适用于中性、干性，甚至油性肌肤。 死皮细胞被去除，从而呈现出更青春、健康肌肤！
Green People Fruitful Nights 是一款优秀的晚霜，可尽量减少细纹并赋予肌肤均匀质感，呈现更柔滑的面部和颈部。 含有有机荷荷巴油、芙蓉和玫瑰果；粉刺和缺陷变得不那么明显，肌肤感觉得到全面滋养。
Green People 使用非空运的可回收包装。 产品只含有少量手工制作的纯天然有机成分，确保收到产品时尽可能新鲜。 本品也适用于严格素食者和素食主义者。
使用说明：
name: People Fruitful Nights (50ml)

product_description:
本品可洗去化妝品和每天的環境雜質。平衡潔面乳適合所有肌膚類型，淨化和舒緩肌膚，提供舒爽和不干燥的清潔體驗。 
薰衣草精油可舒爽和鎮靜肌膚，檸檬草和鼠尾草的提神芳香在清潔的同時，讓肌膚和心情都感覺清爽有活力。不含對羥基苯甲酸酯、石油化學產品、硫酸鹽和人工色素。
name: 薰衣草混合洁面乳 (250ml)

product_description: CODAGE Scrubbing Cream 利用法国制药专业知识配方，是一款丰盈滋养焕颜乳，提供终极去角质体验。 其独特配方富含精米颗粒，可有效减少杂质和死皮细胞，展现散发光泽、健康自然的肌肤。 这款轻盈乳霜足够温和，可用于最敏感的肌肤类型，增强肌肤弹性，支持细胞更新，同时让您拥有丝般柔滑肌肤和均匀肤色。 E.N.
name: Scrubbing Cream (50ml)

product_description:
專為中性和混合皮膚設計的特別配方，Erno Laszlo活力平衡防護乳SPF 15質地清爽，不油膩，輕盈防護肌膚。富含多種維他命和溫和天然植萃，可提供高度水合保濕力，修護、減少皺紋，同時提供光譜紫外線UV防曬保護，全面到位的深度潤澤，溫和呵護肌膚。 Phelityl是Laszlo醫師研究出的獨特保濕複合物，與皮膚PH值幾近相同，給予肌膚最溫和的滋養呵護。 
 使用方法 ： 
用指尖輕柔塗抹。 
從臉部中央往上和往外均勻塗抹，延伸至頸部和肩部，讓乳液和肌膚融合吸收。
name: Laszlo活力平衡防护乳SPF 15

product_description:
Cod Liver Oil - 1000mg is a high quality source of Omega 3 which is rich in EPA (eicosapentaenoic acid) and DHA (docosahexaenoic acid).
Cod Liver oil contains 237mg of omega 3 per soft gel and has many beneficial properties within the body due to the action of EPA and DHA. These two long chain fatty acids help contribute to normal blood cholesterol levels and healthy cardiac function. Cod liver oil is high in vitamin A which contributes to normal vision along with the maintenance of normal skin and iron metabolism. Providing 1000% daily RI for vitamin D, myvitamins cod liver oil also contributes to the normal function and health of muscles and bones while both vitamin A and D supports the normal function fo the immune system.
Our high quality soft gel is a great way to get all the health benefits of Omega 3 fatty acids for those to lack fish in their diet. Cod Liver Oil also contains healthy levels of Vitamins A and D3, perfect for supporting normal function of the immune system. To be taken as part of a varied and balanced diet and a healthy lifestyle.
name: Liver Oil

product_description:
使用 Madame LA LA West Coast Face Bronzing Serum，即刻焕发亮泽。 这款古铜精华液采用椰子水、绿茶和芦荟专门配制而成，可深层滋润肌肤，适应所有肤色并逐步呈现健康亮泽的妆容。
抗氧化维生素 C 与维生素 A 和 E 相结合，可抵御衰老迹象，提振细胞更新并促进胶原蛋白生成，以保持弹性并实现更光滑、更亮泽的肤色。 方便的泵式喷瓶让涂抹变得快捷而简单，非常适用于最后一刻晒黑。 E.N.
name: La La West Coast Face Bronzing Serum (100ml)

product_description: 适用于柔和阳光的 Institut Esthederm 雅诗敦防晒面部护理油可保护肌肤免受阳光照射的不良影响，让您拥有日晒黄褐色的肌肤。 这款防晒面部护理油采用指触干燥的无油配方，可对细胞提供三倍的保护，有效应对因长波紫外线/中波紫外线引起的肌肤损伤和老化问题，刺激和强化阳光日晒美肤过程。 这款护理油提取自植物，可补充肌肤和秀发所需的营养成分，使其拥有让人难以置信的顺滑。
name: Esthederm 雅诗敦柔和阳光防晒面部护理油 150ml

product_description:
Target sagging skin with the STARSKIN Lifting Lace™ Sculpting Face Mask; an elegant lace sheet mask that sits securely on the face and works to simulate a natural face lift. Woven with breathable, stretch cotton fibers, the mask delivers a tightening effect that visibly transforms sagging skin.
Arriving as the first waterless, lace face mask on the market, STARSKIN’s innovative sculpting treatment is designed to improve facial definition by visibly sculpting and reshaping the visage and jawline. The medical science inspired mask is drenched in a waterless serum, which is enriched with an array of anti-ageing, skin sculpting actives that target skin suffering from loss of elasticity.
The V-shape compression mask works tirelessly for fifteen minutes, then can simply be removed to reveal a more defined and toned appearance that is visibly firm and contoured.
name: Lifting Lace™ Sculpting Face Mask

product_description:
Experience exceptional anti-ageing care with the Filorga Absolute Night Set; a potent duo of anti-ageing creams that seek to reveal a youthful complexion. The luxurious set boasts a rejuvenating day cream and a youth-reviving night cream. Use each daily to achieve smooth, radiant and younger looking skin.
Skin Absolute Day® Ultimate Rejuvenating Day Cream (15ml)
Restore youthful vitality with the Skin Absolute Day® Ultimate Rejuvenating Day Cream; a radiance-renewing formula that works to revitalise, repair and deliver intense, long-lasting hydration. Powered by anti-ageing Extremozymes® and Photolyase (a restorative enzyme activated by daylight), the quick-absorbing cream expertly transforms damaging UV rays into energy to help minimise the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles. A dose of White Sapphire combats dullness and uneven skin tone to reignite a luminous glow, whilst Hyaluronic Acid plumps and moisturises for a firmer, smoother complexion.
Skin Absolute Night® Ultimate Anti-Ageing Night Cream (50ml)
Target signs of ageing whilst you sleep with the the Skin Absolute Night® Ultimate Anti-Ageing Night Cream; an innovative anti-ageing treatment. Boasting a luxurious, black formula, the night cream effortlessly melts into skin and treats it to a blend of intelligent, anti-ageing technology. Brown Seaweed and Meteorite extract combine to help regenerate skin cells at night, whilst a Botox-like active works to reduce the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles to leave the complexion smooth and youthful. Hydrating Hyaluronic Acid and a potent collagen peptide work in synergy to ensure skin is visibly firm with improved elasticity. A brightening active tackles dark spots by visibly reducing their size and intensity, whilst Vitamin C reveals an even and uniform complexion. Expect to wake to radiant skin that is nourished and youthful.
name: Absolute Night Set (Worth £128.70)

product_description:
这款活力去角质磨砂膏能够为肌肤补充能量，为顺畅剃须准备清洁的洁肤。 Elemis 艾丽美男士活力肌肤去角质磨砂膏可快速平滑、修颜和亮白肌肤，能够深层清洁肌肤，使其更加细嫩。
这款磨砂膏可在剃须前蓬松面部毛发，避免向内生产的毛发和损伤肌肤。 它采用海洋浮游植物为配方，含有维他命 E，能够有效祛除角质和深层清洁肌肤，与此同时具有恢复和修护肌肤的作用。
它还含有绣线菊属植物，具有强劲的抗炎功效，可减轻红肿、刺激感和敏感性。 Elemis 艾丽美男士活力肌肤去角质磨砂膏蕴含有乳油木果脂和蜂蜡，可有效滋养和调节肌肤，具有重要的保湿作用。
使用说明：
name: 艾利美男士活力肌肤去角质磨砂膏（75ml）

product_description:
Fight signs of ageing with the Murad Retinol Youth Renewal Serum; a fast-absorbing, breakthrough formula that works to minimise the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles.
Powered by Retinol Tri-Active Technology (a fast-acting Retinoid, a time-released Retinol and a Retinol booster), the lightweight serum delivers a firming effect to smoothen and refine skin, whilst Hyaluronic Spheres provide long-lasting hydration for a radiant glow. Swertia Flower Extract increases resilience to reveal a luminous, youthful-looking complexion.
name: Retinol Youth Renewal Serum

product_description:
茱莉蔻活肌再生煥肌滋養潔面乳給肌膚帶來深入滋養，修復和深層補水一系列的好處，讓你的皮膚格外幼滑. 
茱莉蔻活肌再生煥肌滋養潔面乳給肌膚額外的保護，撫平細紋和皺紋。奶油質地能溫和地去除導致肌膚老化的污垢，有助於加強和平滑肌膚，減少細紋和皺紋的出現. 植物配方溫和去角質，幫助保護皮膚免受環境侵害. 
使用方法:
name: (100ml)

product_description:
利用来自Elizabeth Arden的Ceramide Cleansing Face护肤油深层滋养肌肤。 与水接触后转变成奢华乳液，可轻松溶解化妆品、杂质、甚至防水睫毛膏而不剥离水分。
利用植物油的独特混合物配制，包括可提供欧米茄3、6和9以调理肌肤的橄榄油，以及富含维生素的红花油。 必要的脂类维持肌肤，令肌肤干净、柔软、光滑，同时抗氧化杏仁油可提供强效滋润。 E.N.
name: Arden Ceramide Cleansing Face护肤油(195ml)

product_description:
Elemis动态焕肤精华 使您的面部肌肤焕然一新，创新的面部护理配方执行非研磨性的面部清洁，帮助您的皮肤变得光滑，同时缩小毛孔和减少皱纹。
临床证明可有效改善面部肌肤，该皮肤平滑配方将磨皮技术与四种植物阿尔法羟基酸相结合，可以溶解表面死皮细胞，促进细胞再生。 其Selastin™（海洋植物的成分）成分针对毛孔粗大，同时氨基酸和维生素C专门针对面部肌肤调色、光滑和亮丽您的肌肤。
期待一个焕然一新、完好如初的面部肌肤，让您的肌肤毛孔缩小，恢复青春的亮丽肤色。
name: 焕活换肤精华液 30ml

product_description:
Restore a clear, clarified complexion with May Lindstrom Skin The Problem Solver Correcting Masque; a purifying, intensive treatment infused with soil nutrients, salts and exotic spices to improve skin tone and texture.
Transforming from a fine powder into a soft mousse upon contact with water, its unique blend of Activated Bamboo Charcoal and antioxidant-rich Raw Cacao delivers a deep pore cleansing action to eliminate dirt and impurities with a pleasant tingling sensation.
Formulated and hand-blended in micro-batches for ultimate freshness and efficacy, the radiance-reviving face mask detoxifies and tightens congested pores, whilst rejuvenating and regenerating skin to reveal a smoother, more refined complexion with a luminous, dewy glow.
name: Lindstrom Skin The Problem Solver Correcting Masque

product_description:
拥有天然油脂配方，BAKEL 贝蔻纯活力精油致力于精确祛除脸部及眼部化妆，带给您洁净、重新充满活力的面部肌肤。 精油不会改变表皮的生理pH值，因此能在不减弱皮肤免疫能力同时保持皮肤天然的保湿因子，后者在清洗过程中往往容易有所损伤 。 富含滋养成分和多种抗氧化的植物精油组合以及维生素E和维生素A，BAKEL 贝蔻纯活力精油深度清洁肌肤，抵抗老早期化迹象。 A.B.
Bakel 所有产品均使用 100% 天然活性成分，确保您肌肤接触的所有成分均健康、天然和纯净。 Bakel 的每款产品均不含香料、酒精、人工色素、防腐剂或动物成分，且所有产品经过皮肤测试，过敏风险降到最低。 Bakel 产品配方建立在客观和科学验证基础之上，适用于所有肌肤类型，可抵御各种致肌肤衰老各种主要问题。
name: 贝蔻活力精油面部和眼部区域卸妆水（150ml）

product_description:
質地輕盈不油膩，易於吸收，不傷膚，是一款純淨的保濕補水產品。專為易長痘和油性肌膚設計，非常適合化妝前使用，不堵塞毛孔。 
使用說明：
name: 娜迪奥清爽保湿乳液 (100ml)

product_description:
Elizabeth Arden Ceramide Plump Perfect Moisture Cream with SPF 30 是一款先进的产品，将超丰盈的肌肤保湿带到一个新的水平；赋予肌肤需要的一切养分，呈现更丰满、细纹更少、更放松的容颜！
Elizabeth Arden Ceramide Plump Perfect Moisture Cream SPF30 含有六胜肽，是一种高效的六肽，被证明能明显丰盈表面细纹，有助于消除明显的衰老迹象、压力和紧张。
使用说明：
name: Arden Ceramide Plump Perfect Ultra Lift & Firm Moisture Cream Spf30 (50ml)

product_description:
Reignite a youthful glow with the skin79 Extra Premium Gold Bird's Nest Mask; a luxurious face mask infused with 24K Gold to revitalise and rejuvenate dull, lack-lustre skin.
Harnessing the powers of Swiftlet Bird Nest Extract, the cotton sheet mask delivers anti-ageing benefits whilst promoting smoother, brighter skin with revived radiance. Expect a firmed, refined complexion with improved texture and tone.
name: Extra Premium Gold Bird's Nest Mask (1 Piece)

product_description:
Reveal a youthful looking vitality with the Peter Thomas Roth Anti-Ageing Buffing Beads; a rejuvenating treatment to balance uneven tones and smooth the look of fine lines.
Powered by a Glycolic Acid Complex (AHA) as well as Salicylic Acid (BHA) and natural Jojoba Beads, the scrub gently polishes the surface layer of skin through physical and chemical exfoliation, helping to unclog pores and remove dulling debris.
Extracts of White Oak Bark and Lemon help improve brightness and lustre, while Allantoin and Aloe Vera seek to soothe the appearance of redness and inflammation. As a result, skin is left feeling sumptuously smooth and more refined, with a clarified and younger looking glow.
name: Thomas Roth 抗衰老磨砂膏 250ml

product_description:
Meets the needs of hypersensitive eyes with the Talika Gentle Eye Cleanser; a thorough makeup remover specially developed for those with sensitive skin and/or contact lens wearers.
Refreshing the delicate eye contour, the cleansing formula is fortified with a soothing dose of Rosewater and an array of cleansing agents, which efficiently remove all traces of makeup, whilst rejuvenating skin. The gentle solution sweeps over skin, melting makeup and impurities to leave skin touchably soft and toned.
Arriving in an airtight container, the active ingredients are preserved until use, which avoids the possibility of irritation. Expect clean and healthy skin that is visibly refreshed.
name: Gentle Eye Cleanser 120ml

product_description: Uriage乳痂精华霜，可被婴幼儿肌肤快速吸收，缓解不适。 本款温和的精华霜，采用抗刺激的TLR2专利产品，及舒缓肌肤的Uriage温泉水可清洁净化宝宝头皮，重新平衡皮肤菌群，从而消除乳痂。 保湿成分牛油果油及甘油，使头皮放松舒适。

Purify skin with the Great Pure Cleansing Balm from South Korean-based beauty brand Mizon. Gentle and soothing, the lightweight facial cleanser has a soft sorbet texture that rapidly transforms into a silky oil to dissolve even the most stubborn make-up and leave skin feeling sumptuously softened.
Fortified with a delicate blend of Olive, Sunflower Seed and Evening Primrose Oils, it seeks to form a protective moisture barrier that seals in hydration without feeling tight, while Papaya Fruit extract helps refine the look of enlarged pores. Suitable for daily use, the cleansing balm boosts circulation and results in revitalised and refreshed skin.
name: Great Pure Cleansing Balm 80ml

product_description:
Drench dry and dehydrated skin with the Talika Photo Hydra Serum; a highly concentrated treatment utilising the power of light energy to offer intense hydration.
Lack of moisture leads to accelerated ageing and dullness – the Photo Hydra Serum has been especially designed to support skin’s natural restoration and water retention abilities. Lightweight yet potent, the formula contains Hydra Photo Beauty, an amino acid that recreates the effects of natural light on cellular activity to ensure long lasting results.
Hyaluronic Acid and anti-ageing Lipopeptides seek to optimise moisture levels and combat collagen deterioration to smooth the appearance of wrinkles, while Mango Butter infuses skin with Vitamins A, C and E for enhanced free radical protection. Suitable for daily use, skin feels rejuvenated and replenished with a smooth, plumped texture and youthful looking radiance.
name: Photo Hydra Serum 30ml

product_description:
Experience a brightening cleanse with Yum Yum Cleanser 'Lemon' from Korean skincare brand, Skin79, a radiance-boosting, mousse-textured face wash that swipes away makeup and impurities whilst enhancing luminosity. 
Delivering a skin-brightening effect, the pH 5 cleanser has a similar acidity to skin, allowing it to gently cleanse and hydrate without compromising the skin's natural protective barrier. Infused with 68% Lemon Juice extract sourced from the island of Jeju, and a host of botanical cleansing ingredients, the Vitamin C-rich cleanser gently lifts away dirt and grime whilst revitalising and refreshing dull, lack lustre skin.
name: Yum Yum Cleanser 100g - Lemon

product_description:
Reveal a flawless complexion with the DECLÉOR Hydra Floral White Petal Skin Perfecting Concentrate; a potent solution that glides onto clean skin and seeks to transform the visage.
The 98% naturally derived formula is enriched with an array of skin-brightening ingredients including Sweet Orange Oil, Pea Extract and a healthy dose of Hyaluronic Acid. These work in synergy to deliver an instant and essential veil of hydration to the face, whilst restoring a bright and radiant finish. Blemishes and dark spots are visibly reduced to reveal a clear and uniform visage.
The gentle yet effective concentrate is complete with Chamomile and Rose Floral Water, which combine to calm and refine the complexion. With continued use, expect the face to appear even, bright and radiant.
name: Hydra Floral White Petal Skin Perfecting Concentrate

product_description:
德國世家活力日霜是中性、黯啞、乾性或成熟肌膚的理想選擇，可為肌膚補充能量，讓肌膚煥發活力，使其盡顯透亮。這款日霜內含洋絨毛花、金縷梅和金盞花提取物，可平衡皮膚的油脂與水分含量，同時提亮膚色。 - LM 
 使用說明：早晨洁面及爽膚後，均勻塗抹在面部和頸部。
name: Hauschka 德国世家活力日霜 30ml

product_description:
使用 Murad 的强效 Age-Balancing Moisture SPF 30，恢复干燥、衰老的肌肤。 这款优质保湿霜不仅能完美滋润和滋养较成熟的肌肤，还可用作一种广谱防晒霜，保护肌肤免受有害紫外线伤害。
这款保湿霜含有 Resurrection 植物蛋白，为肌肤补充水分。 向日葵、葡萄籽和鳄梨油的共混物可提供长效保湿，而植物雌激素可柔滑肤色。 此外，铜肽复合物可刺激细胞更新和胶原蛋白的生成，从而呈现更水嫩的肌肤。 这款保湿霜可强化肌肤屏障，保护肌肤免受自由基损伤和外部影响。 同时，这款广谱 UVA/UVB 防晒霜具备 SPF30，可防止晒伤。 肌肤会变得柔软、丰满和健康！ – N.P.
name: Age-Balancing Moisture SPF 30 50ml

product_description:
Freshly handmade in the UK with high-quality and natural ingredients, STEAMCREAM's 'Freedom & Discipline' Moisturiser is a lightweight whipped emulsion that can be used on the face, hands and body.
Developed with the brand's unique STEAM process, the finest ingredients have been fused together by a shot of steam to create a gentle, fast-absorbing emulsion that delivers long-lasting hydration.
Harnessing the nourishing powers of Orange Flower Water, Cocoa Butter and Almond and Jojoba Oils, the ultra-moisturising formula softens and replenishes, leaving skin smooth, restored and rejuvenated from top to toe.
Presented in a reusable, decorative tin crafted from recyclable materials to reduce energy use and respect the environment. STEAMCREAM follows a strict no-animal testing policy and is approved by the Vegan Society.
name: Freedom & Discipline Moisturiser 75ml

product_description:
Experience a refreshing cleanse with MÁDARA Blackberry White Clay Clarifying Face Soap, a botanical cleansing bar that works to purify and clean the skin.
Formulated on a base of botanical soap, the cleansing formula delivers a blend of White Clay, Blackberry and Wheat Germ Oil to eliminate impurities whilst retaining skin's moisture. The soap gently lifts away dirt and grime to reveal soft, supple skin.
name: Blackberry White Clay Clarifying Face Soap 70g

product_description:
可用有益皮肤的 Gallinée 的  La Culture 面膜和磨砂膏护理面部皮肤；这是一种二合一配方护肤品，有使皮肤更有活力、恢复健康和肤色明亮的作用。
这种强效护肤品中既有高岭土、海洋矿物质和抗氧化剂维生素 E，又有该品牌已获专利的益生元、益生菌和乳酸复合生物制剂，既能拔出杂质，又能保持皮肤固有的 pH 值。 可体验到已恢复活力并且明亮红润的纯净面部皮肤。
name: La Culture 面膜和磨砂膏 (100ml)

product_description: 如果您想在醒来时拥有柔软丰盈的肌肤，那么这款 Elizabeth Arden 伊丽莎白雅顿八小时润泽夜间奇迹润肤霜是您理想的选择，它具有超级保湿功能，可确保您获得睡眠护肤的最佳效果。 受原始获奖配方的启发，这款轻质升级版的舒缓面霜非常适合夜间使用，它含有熏衣草，能够舒缓放松紧张的情绪，其设计旨在夜间为肌肤深层补水，保护舒缓干燥的肌肤。 - E.D
name: Arden 雅伊丽莎白雅顿八小时润泽夜间奇迹润肤霜 50 毫升

product_description:
Beauty圣经奖获得者，Weleda Wild Rose Smoothing日霜是一种滋养霜，完美适合保护正常至干性肌肤。 麝香玫瑰油、桃仁和杏仁成分可提供保护、恢复和滋补功效。
Weleda Wild Rose Smoothing日霜是一款营养丰富、强效护理和护肤日霜，非常适合干燥和承受压力的肌肤。 纯有机麝香玫瑰油和一系列补充作用植物油很容易被肌肤吸收，并搭配必备脂质。 防止肌肤持续水分流失，保持其自然弹性，使用后令肌肤光滑、柔软。
使用说明：
name: Wild Rose Smoothing日霜 (30ml)

product_description:
利用来自PIXI的Glowtion日露获得自然光泽；这是一款亮白乳液，可抚慰肌肤，掩盖缺陷，令肌肤光彩照人。 这款轻如羽毛的滋润露还可滋润肌肤，令肌肤更健康亮丽。
富含具有舒缓功效的薰衣草油、具有净化作用的高岭土和亮白功效的云母，该焕肤美容液每天为您带来滋润、亮白的肌肤。 – E.W.
name: Glowtion日露

product_description: 有了 Alpha-H 面霜，在家也可以享受沙龙级水疗护理，无需出行。 采用独特配方，融合了薏米、百里香、丝柏和山金车花等天然成分，让肌肤柔嫩光滑。 Alpha-H 面霜将让肌肤重现活力，水润亮白，焕发健康的年轻态。
name: 速效面霜（100ml）

product_description:
Zelens Z Pure-洗面奶是温和的洗面奶，富含精油，令皮肤柔软、光滑、纯净。 其强大配方中加入了紫苏油和植物提取物，起到抗氧化剂的作用，对抗自由基，加强皮肤的保护屏障。 洗面奶与水混合时变成轻如鸿毛的奶，可去除灰尘、化妆品和杂质，同时润湿皮肤。 泵瓶很容易挤出洗面奶，让皮肤瞬间变得更光亮柔软。 E.N. 
使用指南： 每天用画圈的方式敷在脸上和颈上。 用温水清洗干净，然后用手轻轻拍打，直至肌肤变干。
name: Z Pure-洗面奶（125毫升）

product_description:
The Alpha-H Fresh Skin Essentials Duo combines a triple action cleanser with a skin-refining face scrub to promote a smoother, refreshed and radiant-looking complexion. Infused with skin-loving ingredients, the products work in tandem to balance, decongest and cleanse the skin.
Triple Action Cleanser (200ml)
A non-foaming facial cleanser that gently but thoroughly lifts away dirt, makeup and impurities from the skin. Delivering 3-in-1 action, the mild cleanser contains Cucumber and Aloe Vera to help cool and comfort skin, whilst Thyme provides natural antibacterial properties to help calm and relieve the appearance of blemishes. Safe for use on the delicate eye area, the face wash respects skin's pH level and helps to cool and balance normal, combination and problematic skin types; it minimises excess oil to reduce the flare-up of breakouts.
Micro Cleanse Super Scrub (100ml)
A non-abrasive exfoliator enriched with 12% Glycolic Acid, eco-friendly Jojoba Beads and Caffeine for professional microdermabrasion at home. Supercharged with skin-loving ingredients, the face scrub gently sloughs away dead skin cells to refine and clarify the appearance of skin; its deep cleaning performance and antibacterial properties help to decongest pores, minimise the appearance of wrinkles and pores, and brighten and revitalise the overall complexion. Promoting a smoother, radiant canvas, it improves skin's surface whilst stimulating the senses with an aromatic blend of Peppermint Oil and Cucumber. Skin feels soft, smooth and supple. Exfoliating can help improve absorption and efficacy of subsequent skincare products. Suitable for normal/combination, oily/problematic and mature skin.
name: Fresh Skin Essentials Duo

product_description:
使用Dr Dennis Gross' Clinical 浓缩 Radiance 促进剂精华液提高您肌肤护理程序的效果，它是一款专业等级、定时释放浓缩液，可去角质和更新您的肌肤，使您获得一个即时和持久的成效。
致力于提升肌肤的自然亮度，抗氧化剂和透明质酸相融合并协同工作对抗暗哑的肤色和粗糙的纹理；丙酮酸可阻止暗斑的出现，而槲皮素则会提供一个增亮的效果。 轻盈的美白液轻松融化到皮肤上，柔和地去除角质，呈现出更光滑、亮丽和更精致的肤色而无任何刺激。
Skin变得更紧致、亮丽，肤色更均匀。 在有针对性的区域单独使用，或与您最喜爱的保湿霜或粉底混合使用，以提高其功效。
name: Dennis Gross Clinical 浓缩 Radiance 促进剂精华液 (30ml)

product_description:
Elemis 日用抗敏感乳霜是一款舒缓性抗敏感护理保湿霜，可减少肌肤红肿和血色肌肤。
这是款了不起的产品，包含强大的抗敏感聚合物，可降低毛细血管破裂引起的面部潮红。 内含玫瑰净油、蜂蜜、舒缓性Phytoamine 生物聚合物，富含 Gentella 和绣线菊等，可减缓肌肤敏感和刺激，血色肌肤等。
使用说明：
name: 日用抗敏感乳霜 (50ml)

product_description:
Tackle problematic skin with Burt's Bees Anti-Blemish Pore Refining Scrub; a gentle yet effective treatment to unclog pores and regulate sebum production without causing irritation.
Scientifically proven to help prevent future breakouts, the naturally-based formula contains Willow Bark-derived Salicylic Acid, Jojoba Beads and a Fruit Acid Complex, which work in tandem to exfoliate the surface layer of skin and dissolve blemish-causing bacteria without stripping away moisture. Suitable for all skin types, the scrub leaves your complexion feeling clear, refined and balanced.
name: Bees Anti-Blemish Pore Refining Scrub 110g

product_description:
Discover an instant pick me up with the Cat Nap Brightening Sheet Mask from FACEINC by nails inc. Most suited to normal to dry skin types, the face mask is designed to revitalise the complexion. Printed with a cat’s face, the mask is playful yet effective.
Infused with a skin-loving blend of Green Tea and Botanical Root extracts, the mask delivers hydration to meet the needs of dry skin, as well as cleansing and balancing the complexion. Complete with Chamomile, Propolis Wax & Rice Bran Extract, the sheet mask awakens skin and leaves the face nourished.
name: by nails inc. Cat Nap Brightening Sheet Mask - Revitalising and Skin Energising

product_description:
本品為輕薄乳液，專門為普通和易敏感肌膚設計，採用舒緩配方，內含蘆薈和芝麻籽油，能快速舒緩滋養肌膚。適合每日使用，可用於全身，帶給肌膚持久保濕，令肌膚富有彈性。無香味，無對羥苯甲酸酯。 KD 
 使用說明：
name: 日常温和身体乳 (500ml)

product_description:
Trilogy 活力润肤乳 SPF15 具有滋润肌肤的功效，保护其免受日常晒伤。 这款滋润霜富含天然有机成分，令肌肤展现完美肤色。
Trilogy 活力润肤乳 SPF15 提供肌肤每日所需营养和水分，还具有天然防紫外线保护。 特别添加了月见草油、玛鲁拉油和经认证的有机玫瑰果油，滋润并重塑肌肤，抚平表面细纹和皱纹，展现健康迷人的肤色。 采用不油腻配方，吸收快，使之成为完美的化妆底妆。
使用说明：
name: 活力润肤乳 SPF15（50ml）

product_description:
Refresh and cleanse the skin using anti-bacterial essential oils. key ingredients: lavender, tea-tree and marine extracts.
Massage over face and neck with fingertips. Rinse off with warm water and refresh with Balance Skin Tonic. Follow with a thin layer of Balance Skin Conditioning Serum. Press in 3 to 4 drops of Balance Lavender & Ylang or Renew Facial Oil and/or finish with Balance or Renew Moisturiser.
Lavender, Tea-Tree, Natural Seaweed Extracts
name: Associates Deep Cleanse Face Wash 200ml

product_description:
The British Barbers' Association Face Wash is a mild yet effective facial cleanser that efficiently dissolves dirt and excess oil without leaving skin feeling tight or uncomfortable.
Suitable for daily use, the refreshing formula contains the natural exfoliant Kaolin, a mineralised white clay powder known for its highly absorbent properties, which works to draw out impurities from clogged pores and buff away dead skin cells that lead to ingrown hairs. The additions of Panthenol and English Chamomile deliver essential vitamins and anti-inflammatory benefits, leaving skin feeling refreshed, balanced and clear.
name: Barbers' Association Face Wash 150ml

product_description:
这款 Limes Skin Food 由 Geo 出品。 F. Trumper 是一款以甘油为基础物质的保湿产品，让您活力四射、心情愉悦，专为舒缓肌肤、唤醒感官而设计，迷人的柑橘花香让您的肌肤香味怡人。 每次使用这款肌肤面霜都可以焕发活力四射的清香，让肌肤重新振奋。
这款 Trumpers Limes Skin Food  含鲜榨西印度柠檬的天然汁液，让你品闻异域热带情调，滋养和保湿皮肤。 完美适用于剃须前后，确保保护您的皮肤，是您每日剃须的绝佳搭档。 用这款奇香异浓的保湿产品唤醒你的身体、头脑和灵魂，带着热带天堂的气息走出家门。
name: Limes Skin Food - 200ml 旅行装

product_description:
Treat your skin to Cowshed's Neroli Nourishing Daily Moisturiser; a deeply hydrating formula enriched with powerful essential oils and plant extracts to soften and rejuvenate.
Fortified with Olibanum, Peach Kernel Oil and Jojoba Oil, the lightweight cream delivers intense moisture, whilst an expert blend of Neroli, Rose and Jasmine impart a luxurious floral fragrance. Ideal for all skin types, especially dry skin.
name: Neroli Nourishing Daily Moisturiser 50ml

product_description:
Relax after false tan application with the Classic Jumpsuit from Bronzie. Gliding comfortably over freshly tanned skin, the jumpsuit is designed to reduce the possibility of unwanted tan lines, as well as preventing stains on clothing and bedding.
Ideal for general lounging but perfect for post tanning, the leopard trim velour onesie is a deluxe, easy-wear garment that comprises an adjustable hood, zip fastening, breathable under-arm panel and a drawstring waist. Sit back, relax and enjoy your tanning experience.
name: Classic Jumpsuit - M-L

product_description:
頑固粉刺阻擊手，專為油性/極油性/混合肌膚而設計，Erno Laszlo抗痘潔面啫喱清爽去油光，舒緩修護痘痘肌。清新不含油脂的抗痘洗顏膠，富含海藻萃取物可為肌膚作深層排淨，水楊酸可去除粉刺加速角質更新代謝。本品可減少面部多餘油光，紓緩肌膚。 
 注意事項 ： 
含水楊酸。僅限外用。使用本品時，避免觸及眼睛。如不慎入眼，請用水徹底沖洗乾淨。若在同一時間或時期使用其他外用抗痘產品而出現皮膚不適現象，應只使用一種產品，除非另有專家建議。請放置在兒童無法觸及的地方。 
 使用方法 ： 
在水盆裝滿清水，擠取適量或約1元硬幣大小的量於指尖，與適量的水稀釋，兩手雙合搓揉，再用指尖按摩臉部和頸部。 
接著按照Dr.Laszlo “Splashing 潑水法”用盆內處理過的水潑濺臉部20次以清潔與刺激皮膚，然後用舒適溫熱的流動清水潑濺臉部10次以沖洗乾淨。
name: Laszlo抗痘洁面啫喱200ml

product_description:
Unlock the secret to younger looking skin with the Time Retreat Radiance Boost Treatment from Eve Lom; a multi-tasking, concentrated serum that can also be used as an intensive mask to deliver unparalleled results.
A careful selection of naturally-derived Alpha Hydroxy Acid’s work to gently exfoliate the surface layer of skin, buffing away dulling debris and dead cells, while stimulating cellular renewal to instantly refine and refresh. The addition of advanced Liposome Encapsulated Retinol activates collagen production, resulting in fine lines and wrinkles appearing visibly reduced with a plumping effect.
Fortified with Vitamin C-rich Kakadu Plum and Pink Grapefruit, it helps combat oxidative stress and environmental damage while minimising the look of discolouration. Suitable for all skin types, the powerful anti-ageing treatment reveals smoother and firmer looking skin, delivering deep down hydration and a rejuvenated luminosity.
name: Lom Time Retreat Radiance Boost Treatment 30ml

product_description:
使用 PAYOT Homme Soin Réveil Energising Care Gel，令肤色恢复清新活力。这是一种醒肤乳脂-凝胶配方。
铁、锌、咖啡因和可可的融合适合所有肌肤类型，可唤起能量并刺激肌肤，同时提供最佳的滋润效果，以恢复舒适的肤色。 非常适合在洁面和剃须后使用，令肌肤焕发生机和活力。
name: Homme Soin Réveil Energising Care Gel 50ml

product_description:
Soothe eczema and extremely dry skin on the face and body with Salcura's Bioskin Junior Outbreak Rescue Cream; a repairing, 96% natural formula that caters specifically for children and babies aged 3 months+.
Fortified with Linseed and Jojoba Oil, the calming moisturiser helps to relieve redness and inflammation, whilst natural volcanic Zeolite protects delicate skin for long-lasting comfort. A soothing blend of Borage and Olive Oils hydrate and nourish, leaving your little one feeling soft, smooth and restored from top to toe.
name: Bioskin Junior Outbreak Rescue Cream (150ml)

product_description:
Purify and refresh your complexion with the SAMPAR Urban Express Mousse; a luxurious cleanser that works to eliminate pore-clogging impurities without over-drying or uncomfortable tightness.
Fortified with Rose Extract and Geranium Essential Oil, the cleansing foam expertly dissolves all traces of dirt and make-up, whilst promoting soft, smooth and refined skin with a healthy-looking glow.
The brand's innovative Urban Advance Complex of Shea Butter Serum, Mint Endorphin and Probiotic Sugar provides superior antioxidant properties to neutralise free radicals and defend against the damaging effects of environmental aggressors. Expect a calm, comfortable complexion after use.
name: Urban Express Mousse 150ml

product_description:
適合所有肌膚類型，Erno Laszlo奢華巨星完美修護賦活霜倍速潤澤修護，提升肌膚日常防禦。能為肌膚提供日常所需滋養成分，迅速滲入肌膚深層，保濕補水、高效抗老修復，促進肌膚新陳代謝、賦予年輕活力。含有培養自覆盆子葉萃取物，具有高度抗老、防禦與保護等功效；萃取自南非瑪乳拉果的油脂，賦予肌膚豐富的滋養潤澤效果；瓊崖海棠油能保護肌膚減緩外界環境傷害，維持肌膚活力；更含有豐富維他命A、C、E與B3、B5，提升肌膚保護力、維持肌膚彈潤嫩滑。 
 使用方法 ：
name: Laszlo奢华巨星完美修护赋活霜 50ml

product_description:
Dr. Brandt的Laserfx亮白精华液是家庭护肤解决方案，旨在令黯淡、缺乏光泽的肤色重新焕发光采。 利用封装的维生素C配制，旨在淡化黑斑，抑制黑色素的生成并修复肤色不均，同时透明质酸可让肤色更加亮白，调理均匀。
加入植物成分两耳草萃取物，该深层渗透精华液可抵御因红外线和热暴露引起的衰老，有效防止对胶原蛋白和弹性的损坏并减少太阳斑、变色和皱纹。 E.N.
name: Brandt Laserfx亮白精华液（30ml）

product_description:
Improve skin tone and texture with SAMPAR's Equalising Foam Peel; a high-performance treatment that delivers the benefits of a mask, peel and cleanser in one unique formula.
Utilising Probiotic Enzymes, the skin-refining exfoliator performs a deep pore-cleansing action that expertly dissolves dirt and impurities, whilst softening the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles for smoother, younger-looking skin.
The brand's innovative Urban Advance Complex of Shea Butter Serum, Mint Endorphin and Probiotic Sugar provides superior antioxidant properties to neutralise free radicals and defend against the damaging effects of environmental aggressors. Skin is soothed, balanced and clarified thanks to a blend of Lavender, Sage, Thyme and Geranium Essential Oils.
name: Equalising Foam Peel 50ml

product_description:
这款强效柏姿精Pure White治愈深层清净精华液（强效多种维生素Radiance精华液）配有维生素C和真皮-白莓复合物，可以明显改善甚至是最暗沉的肤色。
柏姿精Pure White治愈深层清净精华液是一款创新的高效多种维生素Radiance 精华液，致力于纠正色素沉着缺陷和平衡整个肤色的外观 - 并最终帮助肌肤显得更年轻。 它能防止有害紫外线，使脸部感觉清爽柔和、感觉光滑从而显得容光焕发。
使用说明：
name: 3×10毫升

product_description:
Transform your skin with the Genius Ultimate Anti-Ageing Cream from ALGENIST; a clinical skincare brand who discovered the anti-ageing properties of Microalage as a result of renewable energy research.
Utilising bioactive ingredients that are proven to deliver visible results in 10 days, the luxurious moisturiser works to nourish and condition the skin whilst addressing signs of ageing such as loss of elasticity, fine lines, wrinkles and dullness. Combining Alguronic Acid with Microalgae Oil and Plant Collagen, the cream intensely hydrates and softens facial contours to visibly minimise fine lines and deep wrinkles, and improves firmness and elasticity for a youthful look. Weakened skin witnesses restored radiance and resilience. Fragile skin looks stronger and smoother with a more toned appearance.
name: Genius Ultimate Anti-Ageing Cream 30ml

product_description:
Awake to a visibly clearer complexion with the SAMPAR Nocturnal Rescue Mask; a clarifying facial treatment that is designed to be worn overnight, whilst skin is most receptive to repair.
Enriched with Horse Chestnut and Lentil extract, the face mask effortlessly smoothes over the visage and works to halt sebum production, which is ideal for those with oily and combination skin types. Working during sleep, the mask is able to reduce the appearance of clogged, enlarged pores, whilst eliminating excess oil to deliver a healthy-looking, matte finish.
The rich formula also boasts an Urban Advance Complex, which blends Shea Butter serum, Mint Endorphin and Probiotic Sugar together to act as an antioxidant shield. This protects skin from environmental aggressors, as well as strengthening the complexion’s natural defences.
Expect blemished skin to feel soothed and repaired, whilst boasting a touchably soft feel.
name: Nocturnal Rescue Mask 50ml

product_description:
Ila Spa 亮肤面部精油将带给您面色润泽的肌肤。 这款 Ila Spa 热销产品富含多种抗氧化成分和必需脂肪酸，能有效抚平皱纹并深层滋养肌肤。 特别添加了能够抚平肌肤的摩洛哥坚果油和玫瑰果籽油，缓解疤痕印迹；另外，大马士革玫瑰精油还能促进肌肤细胞再生并逆转衰老的迹象。
精油带有醉人的持久清香，深层滋润肌肤，使其柔软水嫩。 非常适合作为妆前乳使用，有效提亮暗沉的肤色。 - L.M.
name: Spa 亮肤面部精油 30ml

product_description:
Murad复活新生洁面乳，使成熟肌肤焕发光泽。 内含月见草、琉璃苣、杏油等，为肌肤补充水分；木瓜，可温和去除角质，使肌肤重新焕发光芒。
亮白 Murad 复活再生洁面乳，泡沫丰富，晶莹闪亮。  
内含的月见草油、琉璃苣油是人体必需的脂肪酸，可保持皮肤的屏障功能 复活新生洁面乳，呵护舒缓肌肤，确保肌肤滋润水嫩。
使用说明：
name: 复活新生洁面乳（200 ml）

product_description:
The Neroli 8-Hour Facial Moisturiser from Dr Botanicals has been expertly formulated with essential oils, vitamins and minerals to help you achieve a smooth and hydrated complexion.Lightweight and non-greasy, the face cream effortlessly melts in, seeking to balance skin’s natural pH levels for long-lasting results.
The main active ingredient of Neroli Oil works to restore skin elasticity, improving the appearance of skin texture, whilst Vitamin E combats premature ageing by protecting against environmental aggressors. The addition of Coconut Oil helps alleviate skin irritations and improve natural moisture levels. Expect nourished and hydrated skin with a healthy-looking glow.
name: Botanicals Neroli 8-Hour Facial Moisturiser 50ml

product_description:
Illuminate dull and fatigued skin with the Institut Esthederm Radiance Face Cream; a rich, subtly iridescent formula that detoxifies, brightens and softens for a renewed vitality.
Working to stimulate microcirculation, it quickly melts into skin and seeks to drain dulling toxins and impurities, delivering essential oxygen to the epidermis. Packed with nutrients and moisture, it helps prevent and correct the look of premature ageing, blurring the appearance of wrinkles and discolouration. Suitable for all skin types, achieve a smooth, revitalised complexion with a healthy-looking glow.
name: Esthederm Radiance Face Cream 50ml

product_description:
KORRES旗下的此款奶油味润唇膏能够让您有在嘴唇上融化的感觉，同时让您的唇部具有淡雅的闪亮光泽。 乳木果油和米糠蜡的搭配可以起到深层保湿和柔软的效果。 非常适合干裂的嘴唇使用。 
两件套装，因此可确保您能全天随时保持双唇滋润，让其他人可随时感受您那诱人的嘴唇！
name: Lip Butter Pomegranate Duo

product_description:
Treat troublesome skin to The Jojoba Company's Redness Reducing Balm; a lightweight, quick-absorbing formula that works to restore a calm, comfortable complexion.
Infused with a host of beneficial ingredients, including Green Tea, Chamomile and Cucumber, the antioxidant-rich balm helps to relieve irritation whilst minimising the appearance of redness and soothing inflamed skin. Ideal after waxing, cosmetic or laser surgery. Can also be used as a daily moisturiser to replenish and rejuvenate.
name: Jojoba Company Redness Reducing Balm 50ml

product_description:
Clarify and rejuvenate your complexion with the Skin Authority Instant Perfection Peel Pads; innovative leave-on peel solution pads that work to improve skin texture.
Fortified with Fireweed Extract and AHA Glycolic Acid (derived from Sugar Cane), the face pads deliver a firming and brightening effect, whilst gently exfoliating the skin's surface to increase absorption of other skincare products. Your complexion appears smoother and more refined with restored luminosity.
name: Authority Instant Perfection Peel Pads

product_description: 使用 加倍 Care Ultra 细腻 Oil Control 乳液（来自Organic Surge品牌）使您的肤色均衡 以摩洛哥坚果叶萃取液和红花Essential Oil强化，这款轻盈配方滋养和柔滑肌肤，在使肌肤容光焕发和有健康外观的同时减轻衰老的迹象。 锦缎Rose油可舒缓和保湿正常至干燥或成熟的肤质，让您获得柔软、光滑和年轻的肤色而没有油光。
name: Surge加倍Care Ultra轻盈Oil Control乳液（50ml）

product_description:
skinChemists 蛇毒面膜具有多重功效，可平滑、滋潤和保護肌膚，使您看起來更年輕。除了為肌膚補水的透明質酸，以及用作抗衰老屏障、不受污染影響的聚多醣體，還包含類蛇毒，這是一種模擬在蛇毒中發現的多肽活性的多肽，通過抑制肌肉收縮來減少皺紋。 - LM 
 使用說明：
name: 蛇毒面膜 (50ml)

product_description:
Freshly handmade in the UK with high-quality and natural ingredients, STEAMCREAM's 'Glowflakes' Moisturiser is a lightweight whipped emulsion that can be used on the face, hands and body.
Developed with the brand's unique STEAM process, the finest ingredients have been fused together by a shot of steam to create a gentle, fast-absorbing emulsion that delivers long-lasting hydration.
Harnessing the nourishing powers of Orange Flower Water, Cocoa Butter and Almond and Jojoba Oils, the ultra-moisturising formula softens and replenishes, leaving skin smooth, restored and rejuvenated from top to toe.
Presented in a reusable, decorative tin crafted from recyclable materials to reduce energy use and respect the environment. STEAMCREAM follows a strict no-animal testing policy and is approved by the Vegan Society.
name: Glowflakes Moisturiser 75ml

product_description:
Reignite a youthful glow with Balance Me's Anti-Ageing Face Serum; a 100% natural formula that absorbs quickly into skin to help improve suppleness and elasticity.
Harnessing the powers of Bidens Pilosa Plant, the lightweight, silky serum works to soften the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles, whilst delivering intense hydration to leave skin looking plump and firm. Expect a smoother, more refined complexion with restored luminosity and an even tone.
name: Me Anti-Ageing Face Serum 30ml

product_description:
使用 Elemis White Brightening Even Tone Lotion，抵御衰老迹象。专为抗衰老，抚平细纹，打造光滑肌肤而研制。 White Brightening Complex 融合了雏菊精华和Marimoist™。这种成分可增强光泽，减少多余油脂，使肌肤纯净清新。 这款乳液质地轻薄顺滑，融合了苦参和猕猴桃精华，消除黑斑，使暗哑肌肤恢复亮丽健康肤色。 E.N. 
使用说明：取少量于掌心或化妆棉上，轻轻按摩至清洁的面部和颈部。
name: White Brightening Even Tone Lotion (150ml)

product_description:
Pai莲花&橙花生物亲和柔肤水独特之处在于含有提取自植物的纯净活水，富含维他命和矿物质，经常使用可以舒缓、滋润干燥和敏感肌肤，保护肌肤不受自由基影响。
植物富含多种天然水溶性化合物，植物中循环的水分充分吸收了这些营养成分和多种氨基酸、维他命和微量矿物元素。这些植物水含有健康肌肤确切的PH值，恢复肌肤平衡，改善肤色和质地。
一般的柔肤水是有惰性和去离子花卉水或对皮肤没有多少益处的酒精组成，Pai产品不含任何酒精，甚至天然天然谷物成分（易使肌肤干燥，带走肌肤天然油脂，不适合敏感肌使用）。

Instantly refresh and mattify the complexion with the Murad MattEffect Blotting Perfector Mattifier; a cushion compact that is ideal for touch ups on-the-go.
Utilising Soft Focus Mattifying Spheres, the perfector effectively absorbs excess oil from skin, whilst minimising the appearance of pores to leave the face visibly flawless. Marshmallow Powder assists in eliminating excess sebum, but is specially designed to selectively absorb oil and not water, ensuring skin remains healthy and hydrated.
Use the translucent liquid blotting formula to set makeup at the start of the day, or as a touch up when oil begins to breakthrough and skin begins to appear shiny. The perfector can be worn alone for a natural looking, matte look, as well as over makeup to ensure a mattified finish. Unlike blotting papers, the Murad compact doesn’t disturb makeup.
name: MattEffect Blotting Perfector Mattifier

product_description:
Illuminate the eye contour with the Manuka Doctor 24K Gold & Manuka Honey Eye Oil; a silky beauty oil that soothes fatigued eyes, whilst ensuring skin appears awakened.
Arriving with a convenient, integrated rollerball, the formula effortlessly massages into the eye area, instantly delivering a cooling effect. The eye oil is fortified with 24k Gold, Manuka Honey and a variety of luxurious Plant Oils, which work in synergy to visibly firm skin around the eyes, whilst delivering a veil of essential hydration. The precious Plant Oils, which include Marula, Inchi and Kukui, also reduce the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles to restore a youthful appearance to the visage.
Expect ultra-smooth skin that is touchably soft and naturally radiant.
name: Doctor 24K Gold & Manuka Honey Eye Oil 10ml

product_description:
溫和去角質， First Aid Beauty面部去角質磨砂膏讓您擁有自然、健康的膚色。包含具有天然去角質功效的乳木果果殼粉和柳樹皮提取物，這款去角質磨砂膏溫和去除表皮油脂、灰塵和污垢，讓您的肌膚更亮白，更順滑，更富光澤。深層清潔，強效淨化，提亮膚色，令肌膚柔滑清透，盡顯年輕光彩。 
 *不含羥基苯甲酸酯類防腐劑、有害化學物質和著色劑。適合敏感肌膚。
name: Aid Beauty面部去角质磨砂膏(100g)

product_description:
Awake to a youthful complexion with the Peter Thomas Roth Retinol Fusion PM; a potent formula that works whilst skin is most receptive to repair.
Effortlessly gliding over the visage, the non-irritating formula performs an exfoliating action overnight. The solution is infused with time-released 1.5% Microencapsulated Retinol, which gently yet effectively exfoliates the visage, whilst reducing the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles. Skin’s tone and texture are also enhanced.
Suitable for all skin types, Retinol Fusion is complete with Vitamins C and E to provide anti-oxidant benefits. By morning, skin is visibly smoother, refreshed and youthful.
name: Thomas Roth Retinol Fusion PM

product_description:
IOMA 防干燥面膜 ，可滋润干燥的肌肤，滋补配方，能修复保护肌肤。 该面膜质地舒适，富含透明质酸，使肌肤紧致丰满，能提高肌肤弹性，使肌肤更健康、充满活力。
内含的Aquaxyl可保持水分含量，以改善肌肤外观和质感；富含矿物质的红藻提取物，叉菜草，可增强肌肤的天然保护屏障，带您体验深度补水，使肌肤触感柔软、晶莹剔透。  E.N.

使用 RMK Clear Cleansing 洗面奶，体验一个舒缓的洁面乳效果，这是一款温和的洁面乳，可有效地去除化妆痕迹和死皮细胞，露出清新而明亮的肤色。
该款洁面乳柔和地洁净皮肤，专业消除化妆和皮脂的痕迹，激发自然亮度，同时其杏提取物成分可软化及润湿表皮。 注入Orange和香草的芬芳气味，该洁面乳将会使您的皮肤焕发光彩、清新亮丽，同时有放松的感觉。
name: Clear Cleansing奶（175ml）

product_description:
这款三合一洁面、爽肤及眼部卸妆乳非常温和，可去除 100% 的污垢。 KORRES 乳蛋白没有刺激作用，也会让您的肌肤呼吸。
这款优质的洗面奶中含有丰富的植物油和乳蛋白将会清洁、滋润肌肤，使您肌肤的色调健美，以去除所有您脸部和眼部的化妆、皮脂和污垢。
乳蛋白富含乳糖和必需氨基酸，使之具有滋养特性，通过与水分子结合在肌肤表面形成水化膜。
name: Milk Proteins 3 in 1 Cleansing Emulsion (16ml)

product_description:
Introduce your skin to an invigorating skincare routine with the bareMinerals Skincare Starter Kit for Combination Skin; a three-piece collection that clarifies, replenishes and thoroughly hydrates the complexion. The luxurious set is designed specifically to meet the needs of normal to combination skin types and contains a hardworking cleanser, anti-ageing serum and a lightweight moisturiser. Expect calm and comfortable skin with a visible radiance.
Clay Chameleon Transforming Purifying Cleanser (50g)
Experience next generation cleansing with the Clay Chameleon Transforming Purifying Cleanser; a clay-to-cream cleanser that transforms from a rich red clay into a soft, comforting cream. Enriched with purifying Brazilian Red Clay and refining, mineral-rich Sea Salts, the cleanser works to expertly lift away impurities whilst detoxifying and clarifying the skin. Its blend of Papaya and Bamboo extracts and naturally derived Mandarin and Bergamot fragrance uplift and revitalise to reveal a pure, supple complexion. Skin feels cleansed, comfortable and invigorated.
Suitable for all skin types. Ophthalmologist tested. 
SkinLongevity Vital Power Infusion Serum (30ml)
Reignite your skin's youthful radiance with the SkinLongevity Vital Power Infusion Serum, an anti-ageing essence that utilises Skinmimetic Technology to empower, replenish, renew and fortify your complexion. Working to enhance natural luminosity and improve suppleness, the serum harnesses the power of patented Long Life Herb Extract and California Poppy to promote vitality; its hydrating and smoothing properties reawaken skin's youth and help diminish the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles. Skin is soft, smooth, resilient and naturally glowing. Infused with an uplifting Bergamot and Eucalyptus fragrance.
Suitable for all skin types.
Smart Combination Smoothing Lightweight Emulsion (30ml)
Restore skin's hydration balance with bareMinerals Smart Combination Smoothing Lightweight Emulsion, an oil-free moisturiser specially formulated to treat combination to normal skin types. Enveloping skin in a lightweight, moisture-rich cocoon, the formula utilises Intuitive Mineral Moisture™ Technology to replenish moisture reserves and help diminish the appearance of dryness and signs of ageing. Its synergy of Peptides, Ceramides and Amino Acids soften rough patches and reduce the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles for a youthful looking complexion. Skin feels soft, supple and balanced. Infused with the naturally derived fragrance of Bergamot and Eucaplyptus.
Suitable for combination to normal skin.
name: Skincare Starter Kit for Combination Skin

product_description:
Rich in natural antioxidants derived from blueberries and grape seeds, this midweight cream hydrates, reduces redness, revives dull skin, and helps minimize signs of stress and fatigue, leaving the skin youthful and radiant.
Alchimie Antioxidant Technologies:Blueberries (Anthocyans, Quercetin, Resveratrol), Jojoba, Grape Seeds (Anthocyanidins, Catechin, Quercetin, Resveratrol), Vitamin E.
100% made in Switzerland. Dermatologist-formulated and tested.
name: Forever Kantic Calming Cream

product_description:
牛头犬天然美容超级 Moisturiser 套装旨在令肌肤柔软水润，是任何有形象意识男士的必备之物。 有了这款包含不同润肤乳的三件套，您永远不会遭受皮肤干燥之苦。 这款套装包括一件抗衰老润肤乳，可以消除衰老的迹象，令肌肤容光焕发、健康光泽。
该套装包括以下产品： 
牛头犬天然Skincare Original Moisturiser (100ml) 这款牛头犬天然Skincare Original Moisturiser是一种不含有害化学品的天然润肤乳，足够温和，可早晚使用。 使用这款独创性的润肤乳有助于滋养和滋润您的肌肤。 
牛头犬天然Skincare Sensitive Moisturiser (100ml)牛头犬天然 Skincare Sensitive Moisturiser 是一款全天然护肤品，旨在滋养和滋润肌肤。 这款润肤乳足够温和，适合用于各种肌肤（即便是最敏感的肌肤），可早晚使用。
牛头犬天然Skincare Anti-Ageing Moisturiser (100ml) 牛头犬天然 Skincare Anti-Ageing Moisturiser是一款全天然护肤品，旨在助您的肌肤变得焕然一新。 这款润肤乳有助于滋润您的肌肤，令肌肤营养丰富，看起来光滑，更加年轻。
日夜使用这些Skincare润肤乳可令肌肤水润、健康。 利用这三款呵护所有肌肤类型的不同配方，您一定会很快拥有丝绸般柔软的肌肤。

利用Sarah Chapman的Skinesis Age Repair精华液尽情享受无与伦比的肌肤护理，这款高性能、抗衰老精华液旨在修复衰明显老迹象，包括色素沉着、细纹和皱纹。
适合具有高效护肤体验的肌肤，该配方含有比Age Repair精华液浓度高两倍的活性成分，以及大量高级抗衰老成分，可促进胶原蛋白产生，抵御肌肤损伤和脱水。 该精华液可大幅改善肌肤，进行紧致肌肤、调理肤色并深层抚平皱纹，以获得光滑、焕发光彩的功效，令肌肤更紧致、年轻。
您将获得重焕光彩的年轻肌肤。
name: Chapman Skinesis Age Repair精华液(30ml)

product_description:
CODAGE 7号舒缓抗泛红精华（10ml）专为舒缓敏感型皮肤类型而配制，缓解发炎，减少泛红。 这款产品由品牌的法国制药专家团队配制而成，混合了多种高效成分，令肌肤舒缓镇静，神清气爽，容光焕发。 - K.R
Hy3 - 具有补水锁水的滋润功效。 这种成分还能够促进胶原蛋白，丰盈并紧实肌肤，令肌肤更年轻。
Ap3 - 这一成分能够舒缓肌肤，具有超强抗刺激功效，有助于镇静疮口和受损肌肤，并快速降低敏感性。
Ao3 - 这一富含抗氧化因子的成分具有修复和保护功效功效，可以保护肌肤抵御自由基和紫外线的伤害，并修复肌肤已有的损伤。
Re3 - 这一强大的成分混合了多种修复因子，可以让受损的肌肤细胞重新恢复健康状态，并促进肌肤细胞的自然更新。
Rg3 - 这一成分有助于保持血管畅通，修复并预防红血丝或其他可见的毛细血管。
name: 7号舒缓抗泛红精华（10ml）

product_description:
Achieve an opulent glow instantly and over time with the Un-Wrinkle 24K Gold Intense Wrinkle Sheet Masks from Peter Thomas Roth; all natural 100% cotton sheet masks pre-soaked with potent anti-aging actives to minimise the appearance of fine lines and deep wrinkles.
The Intense Wrinkle Sheet Mask adheres to the shape of the face, infusing skin with a blend of 18 age-fighting neuropeptides and peptides that help send signals to the skin to activate anti-aging mechanisms. Meanwhile, Hyaluronic Acid helps increase hydration levels by drawing and retaining water from moisture in the air.
Skin is immediately illuminated for a healthy-looking complexion, whilst deeper wrinkles and lines are smoothed over time. – E.W.
name: Thomas Roth Un-Wrinkle Sheet Mask

product_description:
Soothe eczema and extremely dry skin with the Salcura Bioskin Junior Daily Nourishing Spray; a lightweight, 92% natural formula that caters specifically for children and babies aged 3 months+.
Infused with omega-rich Sea Buckthorn, the fast-absorbing spray calms and relieves itching, delicate skin on the face and body, whilst Rosemary and English Lavender work to protect and moisturise for long-lasting comfort. No need to rub in, the spray is easy to apply on wriggly, unsettled children.
name: Bioskin Junior Daily Nourishing Spray (100ml)

product_description:
Contour Décolleté是一個革命性的配方，旨在提供即時和長期的改善效果，有助於減少在脖子、前胸及胸圍線部位的老化痕跡。 
在海洋錐形蝸牛毒液、紅海藻和五肽脂質體給藥系統的共同作用下，快速吸收血清，顯著軟化細紋、皺紋和乾皺的皮膚紋理，以呈現更加年輕、明顯更平滑和更精緻的胸部肌膚外觀。 
微量的超高分子量透明質酸可實現自內向外的豐滿和滋潤，同時無酸去角質混合物有助於獲得一個自然提升和緊緻的外觀。
name: Décolleté (50ml)

product_description: 这款去角质棉片模拟专业的换肤护肤，让您享受 DIY 美容护肤，且不刺激皮肤。 采用 UGL 复合物和烟酰胺配方，只需一步，便可去除肌肤角质，防止细纹和皱纹并改善肌肤紧致度。
name: Black DIY 去角质棉片（40片）

product_description:
UriageXémose 柔肤霜 ，营养滋润脸部肌肤。是一款配方丰富的保湿霜，可舒缓保护干燥肌肤及过敏性疾病多发的皮肤类型。
柔软熔融质地，使肌肤舒适；内含大量有益成分，可修复肌肤，加强肌肤屏障功效，24小时持久有效。内含的成分包括：cerasterol 2F 聚合物、Uriage温泉水等；采用了专门针对肌肤敏感的 TLR2-Regul 技术等。
内含正在申请专利的 Chronoxine，使肌肤柔软细腻、瞬间舒缓。 保护肌肤抵御外界侵袭，不紧绷、持久舒适。
name: Xémose柔肤霜（40ml）

product_description:
Wake up to a firmer, brighter and more youthful appearance with Perricone MD Concentrated Restorative Treatment. Formulated with NTP complex and DMAE this Perricone Power Product diminishes fine lines and wrinkles while you sleep.
Perricone MD Concentrated Restorative Treatment delivers maximum levels of vitamin C ester therapy in the restorative sleep hours, therefore promoting more efficient cell turnover. This treatment moisturiser minimises the appearance of enlarged pores with a marked reduction in puffiness and an improved skin tone.
Directions of use:
name: MD Concentrated Restorative Treatment 59ml

product_description:
Target slackening skin with the PRAI PLATINUM Firm & Lift Intensive Serum; a fast-absorbing, anti-ageing formula that works to restore a smoother, more refined facial contour.
Fortified with a blend of Chlorella, Platinum and Kombuchka (derived from the fermentation of Black Tea), the powerful serum fights free radicals and environmental aggressors, whilst helping to protect collagen and elastin for a youthful-looking complexion. The brand's precious PRAI Oil leaves skin soft, supple and deeply nourished with a tightened and toned appearance.
name: PLATINUM Firm & Lift Intensive Serum 50ml

product_description:
Transform dull, sagging and tired skin with the Collagen Power Lifting Ex Cream from Korean beauty brand Mizon.
Boasting a reinforced concentration of 75% Marine Collagen, the rich, anti-ageing treatment seeks to penetrate skin with a blend of plant-based extracts and Copper Tripeptide-1 to dramatically reduce the look of fine lines and sagging skin. Rapidly absorbed, the jelly-textured formula effectively fills the appearance of wrinkles while replenishing natural elasticity levels for skin that feels rejuvenated and softened.
The additions of Sweet Almond, Iris Flower and Cacaco extracts combat free radical damage, plus Hyaluronic Acid boosts moisture levels. Expect skin to feel smooth, firm and soft with a youthful looking visage.
name: Collagen Power Lifting Ex Cream 50ml

product_description:
bliss速效洁净哑光爽肤棉片，是毛孔堵塞T型区的终结武器。 最细小的微孔、战功赫赫的斗士，使肌肤明亮光滑、毛孔细腻完美！
内含各种美味水果的提取物，采用智能海绵技术、调节肌肤油脂、针对油性肌肤，而不会使肌肤干燥。 内含的菠萝、葡萄柚、柠檬等提取物，可轻松照亮肌肤，同时水杨酸，可减少毛孔皮脂堵塞，使肌肤更清新、更光滑。 Ta-da!
使用说明：

Protect and care for your skin with Time Bomb's Complexion Chlorophyll Cocktail, a skincare solution that helps to protect, detoxify and refresh your skin.
Working to counteract the effects of toxins, free radicals and environmental pollutants that can cause premature ageing and breakouts, the antioxidant-rich formula melts effortlessly into skin to promote a smoother, clarified, healthier looking complexion.
Infused with naturally detoxifying Chlorophyll and a host of potent antioxidants known to help neutralise different types of free radicals, the formula expertly combats the effects of toxins that can cause spots, clogged pores and dry patches. Helping to soothe and calm your complexion, the detoxifying fluid will leave your skin feeling clean, dewy and decongested.
name: Bomb Complexion Chlorophyll Cocktail 100ml

product_description:
这款强效隔夜抗衰老护理产品通过结合10％的维生素C与烟酰胺和乙酰基六肽-51修复肌肤并将肌肤护理提高到新的高度，乙酰基六肽-51灵感来自不朽水母；它可以帮助您获得更光滑、紧致和容光焕发的肌肤。
非常适合成熟、缺乏胶原蛋白并出现压力和疲劳迹象的肌肤，具有补水功效的澳洲坚果油、具有平滑功效的木槿和具有亮白功效的白桑椹成分融合在一起，帮助面部、颈部和前胸的肌肤焕发活力。
name: Liquid Laser超级Anti-Ageing Balm (30克)

product_description: 让 Radical Skincare 瞬效活氧面膜为肌肤注入水分，促进肌肤新生。 这款面膜富含天然保湿因子，有助于维持肌肤的天然水分平衡，还添加了蔊菜提取液，让肌肤保持最佳氧分布和消耗平衡。 这款舒缓面膜混合了多种蕴含丰富氧化剂的维生素，以及人参提取物和β-胡萝卜素，共同促进胶原蛋白的生成。 让您拥有容光焕发的健康肤色。 - L.M.
name: Skincare 瞬效活氧面膜 30ml

product_description:
Iluminage 活肤美容袜子能焕活和修复粗糙干燥脚部肌肤；这款轻质抗皱袜子采用创新的抗菌和荣获专利的铜离子技术，能够改善肤质，令肌肤更有弹性，功效持久。
这款防臭美容袜中含有铜离子（肌肤中含有的天然复合物，研究证明在肌肤自然更新过程中起重要的作用），经临床证明，能够使皲裂的脚跟更柔软光滑，同时补充指甲所需的营养，以让其看起来更加健康。 适合机洗，既可舒适地单穿，也可穿在鞋子里面。 使用安全，对肌肤没有任何刺激。
name: 活肤美容袜子 M/L

product_description:
Treat your skin through the night with StriVectin's Overnight Replenishing Moisture Mask, an intensely hydrating face mask that works during your skin's most receptive hours to restore lost moisture and promote radiant, healthy skin.
To be applied and left on through the night, the fast-absorbing mask will melt effortlessly into skin (without rubbing off on pillowcases) and expertly comforts and soothes whilst replenishing moisture and preventing dehydration. Utilising patented NIA-114™ technology, the formula helps strengthen the skin's barrier to maintain optimal moisture levels; dull skin appears fresher, brighter and healthier.
Skin is left glowing, radiant and supple come morning.
name: Overnight Replenishing Moisture Mask 90ml

product_description:
StriVectin 斯佳唯婷氧元素丝滑面膜能够修复和焕活暗沉的肌肤，它是一款增强光泽度的面部护理产品，可有效净化、改善和亮泽缺乏光泽的肌肤。
这款面膜所蕴含的氧元素有助于增加肌肤的光泽度，淡化明显的细纹和皱纹，能够温和地出去污垢和杂质，与此同时通过自身发泡技术为肌肤补充氧元素。 β羟基酸旨在祛除肌肤表面的死皮，让肌肤更加光滑亮泽，使其看起来更加年轻。
name: 斯佳唯婷氧元素丝滑面膜 50ml

product_description:
Treat your complexion to the Dr. Hauschka Hydrating Cream Mask; a deeply nourishing, regenerating treatment developed for dry, sensitive, tired and stressed skin.
Harnessing the powers of Rose Wax and Quince Seed Extract, the luxurious face mask soothes and moisturises skin, whilst protecting against environmental aggressors for long-lasting comfort. Almond, Avocado and Jojoba Oils replenish and hydrate to restore smooth, supple skin with a radiant glow.
name: Hauschka Hydrating Cream Mask 30ml

product_description: 使用 Shiseido Bio-Performance Glow Revival Serum，一次解决所有肌肤问题。 这款精华液有助于抵御红肿、暗沉、肤色不均和衰老迹象。 配方含 Advanced Multi-Capisolve 1124 ™，作用于皮肤毛细血管，改善皮肤均匀度、亮澈度和弹性。 精华液质地细腻轻薄，皮肤极易吸收。 这款精华液适合所有肌肤类型，是肌肤护理的必备单品，且经过了皮肤测试。 A.B.
name: Bio-Performance Glow Revival Serum (30ml)

product_description:
使用 Eucerin® Anti-Age Volume-Filler Concentrate，重新挖掘肌肤的青春潜力。这是一种经过皮肤测试的抗衰老配方，与 Volume-Filler Day or Night Cream 结合使用，重塑、丰盈和收紧松弛的肌肤。
随着年龄的增长，肌肤失去丰盈度和鲜明度。由于保持皮肤光滑而紧致的天然物质被消耗，导致面部轮廓下垂。 为了解决这一问题，高级晚霜结合了三种有效成分，旨在降低特定皮肤层的丰盈度和鲜明度：厚朴酚，提高增量丰盈细胞的大小*；寡肽，支持皮肤结构*；以及透明质酸，改善保湿，令皮肤变得丰满，并减少皱纹。
这一独特的配方与其他丰盈护肤产品每天使用一次，可刺激胶原蛋白的更新并锁住水分，实现更紧致、青春的肌肤，并减少皱纹。 - K.N
name: Anti-Age Volume-Filler Concentrate (30ml)

product_description:
Experience optimum standards of facial rejuvenation with the NuFACE Gel Primer 24K Gold Complex in Brighten; a lightweight primer that is an essential first step to using the NuFACE device.
Arriving with an integrated, mess-free brush applicator, the primer is effortlessly to apply and allows the NuFACE device to glide across the skin easily, whilst ensuring maximum microcurrent conductivity for optimum results.
The anti-ageing 24K gold complex utilises Hyaluronic Acid, Algae and Peptides to thoroughly hydrate the complexion, reduce the appearance of stubborn dark spots and restore naturally radiant skin. A brightening blend of Niacinamide and Licorice Root ensurea skin looks refreshed, bright and healthy. The formula can be left on all day or washed away after use of the device.
name: Gel Primer 24K Gold Complex - Brighten

product_description:
REN Sirtuin 植物激素补充霜是一种高级护肤保湿霜，特为防止衰老迹象（尤其是因为激素变动而出现）出现和处理衰老迹象而配置。
皮肤会给人以活力已恢复，并且得到深度补水的感觉，还会看起来更光滑，更紧致，更明亮。 生物活性成分包括有细胞寿命延长作用的 sirtuin 催化剂，有防止皮肤下垂作用的基底膜蛋白多糖催化剂，以及有激素补充作用的，从山药中获得的植物激素。
REN Sirtuin 植物激素补充霜含一种特有的全面保护复合物，有很大的抗氧化剂保护作用，而仿生 Hydra+ 复合物则可确保能发挥出最佳水合作用。
使用说明：
name: Sirtuin 植物激素补充霜 (50ml)

product_description:
Reveal youthfully radiant skin with Institut Esthederm's Wrinkle Correction Cream, an anti-ageing moisturiser dedicated to restructuring and refining the appearance of skin whilst enhancing natural luminosity.
Targeting wrinkles, fine lines and dullness, the lightweight formula feels delicate and refreshing on contact and expertly nourishes and corrects whilst instantly illuminating skin. Its combination of REPAIR technology and Tetrapeptide work in synergy to both prevent and correct wrinkles; skin is strengthened and regenerated to help diminish the appearance of fine lines and deep wrinkles while preventing the formation of new ones.
Promoting supple, firmer-looking skin, the cream also contains a unique blend of Citric and Salicylic Acid to leave skin feeling smoother, softer and refined.
Skin appears noticeably firmer and illuminated with improved texture.
name: Esthederm Wrinkle Correction Cream 50ml

product_description:
Take your favourite products on-the-go with the Omorovicza Essential Set; a four-piece collection of best-selling products in travel-ready sizes. The set combines a cleanser, moisturiser, night cream and mist, each working in synergy to deliver nourished and comfortable skin. Arriving with an ultra-soft, branded mitt and a cosmetic travel bag, the set makes the perfect gift, or is the ideal collection for introducing yourself to the brand.
Thermal Cleansing Balm (15ml)
The Thermal Cleansing Balm is the self-proclaimed ‘best cleanser you will ever use’. Its luxurious formula is infused with natural minerals and oils to detoxify and nourish the skin, which leaves the complexion glowing and silky soft. The cleansing balm is a black treatment made with Hungarian Moor Mud, which is brimming with Calcium and Magnesium Carbonates that act as a magnet to impurities and make-up. The addition of Almond Oil helps to further nourish and protect the skin. Skin is left looking and feeling soothed and cleansed.
Illuminating Moisturiser (20ml)
Rediscover youthful radiance with the Illuminating Moisturiser; an intensely nourishing cream that promotes a visibly brighter, smoother, younger-looking complexion. Infused with a host of vitamins, essential oils and natural ingredients, the moisturiser helps to restore suppleness and radiance back into dry, ageing skin. Rich in Apple Pectin and Plum Almond Oil, it delivers long-lasting hydration, whilst Ruby Crystal blurs the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles for a smoother, firmer-looking canvas. The moisturiser utilises a Hydro Mineral Transference™ delivery system that facilitates mineral absorption for maximum benefit within the skin. - Free from synthetic fragrance, colours and parabens.
Rejuvenating Night Cream (15ml)
Nourish and strengthen your skin with Rejuvenating Night Cream. The cream is enriched with natural fruit oils that provide skin with the vitamins it needs. Working to leave you’re the complexion looking and feeling hydrated and rejuvenated, Hazelnut Peptides firm and lift the skin whilst Carrot Oil boosts the production of collagen. Plum Almond Oil detoxifies and restores skin's suppleness leaving you with a smooth, hydrated, and glowing complexion.
Queen of Hungary Mist (30ml)
Give your skin the royal treatment with Queen Of Hungary Mist; a luxurious formula based on the Queen of Hungary water, which is the first perfume on record. A quick spritz of this will leave you feeling refreshed and energised. Blended with Orange Blossom, Rose and Sage Waters to purify and tone, whilst Apple Pectin restores hydration, the refreshing spray promises to give instant rejuvenation. Formulated with the power of the Hungarian thermal waters, it's a lavish must have.
name: Essential Set

product_description:
PAYOT修整调护霜拥有轻盈配方，可护理肌肤使其更光滑细腻、焕发神采。
本品尤其适合中性皮肤及油性皮肤。包含智利薄荷提取物、玫瑰果油、α-羟基酸等成分，具有轻柔温去角质功效，可明显减少皮肤瑕疵、调节皮脂分泌、改善皮肤质地。控油粉可使肌肤亮泽、洋溢青春靓丽，而不会显得油光。
name: 修整调护霜 30ml

product_description:
Achieve a clean and smooth complexion with the InstaMatte Oil-Control Mask from Murad. Ideal for oily and combination skin types, the innovative deep cleansing treatment works to draw out impurities and aims to prevent future breakouts by minimising excess oil.
The key active ingredient is 0.5% Salicyclic Acid, which penetrates deep into the epidermis and is clinically proven to help reduce systemic causes of acne. The Oil-Control Complex absorbs excess oil and ensures a long lasting matte finish, creating the perfect base for makeup to adhere to. Grapefruit Extract works to minimise the appearance of pores, whilst Jojoba Esters function as a soothing and hydrating emollient. The highly effective mask leaves skin clear, prepped and refreshed.
name: InstaMatte Oil-Control Mask 100ml

product_description:
Omorovicza黃金蜜糖磨砂膏富含大量金黃蔗糖，依蘭和黃金微顆粒，可柔滑肌膚，去除老廢角質，重現肌膚光澤感。 
黃金被視為抗發炎最強效的元素，可修補肌膚累積已久的微形傷口。辣椒勝肽可刺激肌膚微循環，杏核油高效保濕，提供肌膚水份同時也提升柔軟度，使肌膚柔細亮滑。 
 使用方法： 
沐浴時輕輕以打圈方式塗抹於皮膚。 
在乾燥區域特別加強，包括足部、膝蓋及手肘部位。 
之後徹底沖洗乾淨。

Refine and purify skin with the Dust Clean Up Peeling Toner from Korean beauty brand Mizon. Fortified with a delicate blend of Alpha Hydroxy Acid and Salicylic Acid, the lightweight formula gently exfoliates the surface layer of skin to effectively remove micro-dust and dead skin cells. Suitable for congested and problematic skin types, it thoroughly cleanses to reveal a brightened and replenished complexion that feels scrupulously fresh and detoxified.
name: Dust Clean Up Peeling Toner 150ml

product_description:
博瑞特醫生不老童顏頸部緊緻霜專門關注頸部肌膚問題，是一款緊緻頸部肌膚的專用產品。 
本品可讓頸部和胸口的肌膚更加緊緻，所含高級配方可幫助並持續為頸部深層補水，打造更加絲滑的效果。 - SA
name: Brandt 博瑞特医生不老童颜颈部紧致霜

product_description:
来自Jurlique的Aromatherapy舒缓喷雾能够带来愉悦感受，本款轻薄的保湿喷雾散发出的缕缕平静能够舒缓您每天的压力和紧张。
富含Lavender和葡萄柚Pure精油，本款焕发精神的喷雾可用于镇静和舒缓面部和身体，或作为室内香氛放松您的身心。 本款喷雾含有助睡眠成分，尤其适合希望在夜晚享受平静安稳睡眠的人群。
name: Aromatherapy舒缓喷雾（50ml）

product_description:
巴黎欧莱雅Age Perfect Cleansing Wipes Mature Skin含有舒缓镇静成分，专门针对暗沉，无生气的肌肤，修复疲劳细胞和毛孔。 随着年龄的增长，肌肤的修复过程自然放缓，但湿巾中的浓缩维生素C和杉毛榉萃取 精华能够修复肌肤，使肌肤年轻有活力。
面部湿巾由可再生资源中得天然衍生纤维制成，本着崇尚环境和有形物质的理念，产品使用后都能自然降解。 本品理念健康体贴。温和地将湿巾在肌肤上擦拭，含有的保湿分子令肌肤洁净滋润。 C.R
name: Paris Age Perfect Cleansing Wipes for Mature Skin (25 片)

product_description: Elizabeth Arden独有的三重肽复合物，蕴含维生素、植物性药材和睫毛滋养液，可以支持睫毛的天然更新周期，令睫毛看上去浓密、健康和充满活力，并且双眸也会显得比以前年轻。 Elizabeth Arden Prevage Clinical睫毛＆Brow增长强效精华液可用于上下睫毛，改善稀疏或稀薄眉毛的外观。
name: Arden Prevage Clinical 睫毛和 Brow 增长强效精华液

product_description:
Treat yourself or a loved one to DECLÉOR's Recharge Your Life Awakening Box; a trio of skincare formulas that work in tandem to refine and revitalise the face and body. Housed in a gift box, the kit includes a DECLÉOR notebook and yoga postures card.
AROMA CLEANSE Phytopeel Smooth Exfoliating Cream (50ml)
Smoothen and refine skin with the luxurious cream; an exfoliating formula to buff away dead, dull skin cells, whilst banishing dirt and impurities. Suitable for all skin types, the gentle cream promotes cell renewal to reveal a revitalised, regenerated complexion with a youthful glow and improved texture.
AROMA CLEANSE 1000 Grain Body Exfoliator (50ml)
A luxurious scrub to leave skin feeling silky soft. Its formula contains Grapefruit Essential Oil for an invigorating fragrance, and a combination of Pearl Sugar, Argan Shell and Fruit Acids to ensure skin is full of moisture. Easy to apply, the indulgent gel turns into oil when massaging, and changes into to a milky liquid  upon contact with water for quick rinsing.
AURABSOLU Refreshing Mist (100ml)
A refreshing spritz dedicated to revitalising your complexion. With a soothing essential oil complex, its lightweight formula stimulates cell renewal to refresh the look of tired skin, replenishing and illuminating to leave the complexion looking awake and naturally radiant. Perfect for using pre-makeup application, after cleansing or at any point during the day as an invigorating pick-me-up.
name: Recharge Your Life Awakening Box (Worth £57.50)

product_description:
Aromatherapy Associates雅容瑪香薰之家滋潤修復眼霜 
強大有效的抗衰老護膚品使用創新天然成份，確保最佳效果
 使用說明： 
早晚潔面和爽膚後使用，按壓一到兩次，輕柔在眼周按摩，著重於細紋。如果肌膚特別疲勞，請搭配強效肌膚護理精油使用。注意事項：避免直接接觸眼睛。放在兒童接觸不到的地方。存放時遠離光和熱。打開後，最好在6 個月內用完。
name: Associates 雅容玛香薰之家滋润修复眼霜 15ml

product_description: Enhance the effectiveness of your cleanser with Pestle & Mortar's Face Cloths. Crafted from pure cotton, the dual-purpose cloths feature a muslin side that gently exfoliates and buffs away dead, dull skin, and a soft, smooth surface that polishes and perfects to leave skin with a radiant glow. Brighten dull complexions and refine skin texture.
name: & Mortar Face Cloths (Pack of 3)

product_description:
Lift your spirits with the Nourish, Breathe & Smile Hand Balm from NEOM’s Scent To Make You Happy™ collection. Designed to hydrate hardworking hands, the nourishing balm leaves skin ultra-soft, whilst boasting an uplifting scent.
The luxurious hand cream comprises a natural fragrance that combines pure essential oils. Enriched with a blend of Wild Mint and Mandarin, the skin-loving formula envelops hands in a delicious aroma that guarantees to boost your mood. The balm is complete with a hydrating combination of Shea and Cocoa butter, which quench skin’s thirst and leave hands smooth.
name: Nourish, Breathe & Smile Hand Balm

product_description:
這是一款特殊護理精華液，專注於對抗低溫，深層補水和緊緻肌膚，令肌膚舒緩柔滑，為肌膚抹上保濕產品奠定基礎。 
使用說明：
name: 娜迪奥紧致抗皱精华液 (30ml)

product_description:
蘊含植物精萃，日常強效保濕，呵護遭受外界壓力和倦怠的肌膚，為肌膚輸送源源水分，提供全方位保護，適合化妝前使用，令肌膚光潔不油膩。蘊含芝麻、甜杏仁、杏仁及薔薇木、檸檬、檀香和薰衣草混合精油等植物成分，卓效滋養保濕，令缺水肌膚整日水潤舒適。適用於為中性至乾性肌膚。 
使用說明：
name: 娜迪奥强效保湿日霜 (100G)

product_description:
通过 L'Oreal Paris Dermo Expertise 三效夜间润肤霜，可以用强力滋润和保护措施治疗皮肤。 这种多效润肤霜成分丰富而奢华，可防止皮肤受到紫外线、污染、压力和疲劳的伤害，所有这些伤害都可以使皮肤变得没有光泽并脱水。
由于夜间是皮肤修复和恢复的最佳时机，因此这种润肤霜可以加强皮肤的天然屏障功能，还可以为皮肤彻夜补水。 这种润肤霜是不油腻的轻质润肤霜，可以毫不费力地融入皮肤，这样睡醒时皮肤能够既有光泽又柔顺。 三效配方：
使用说明：每晚涂到洗净的脸部和颈部上。
name: Paris Dermo Expertise 三效补水夜间润肤霜 (50ml)

product_description:
The Konjac Sponge Company presents the Facial Puff Sponge with Green Tea, a 100% naturally sustainable product delicately handmade purely from moisture-rich Konjac plant fibres and Volcanic Water with the addition of antioxidant-rich Green Tea extract.
The innovative biodegradable sponge has a unique net-like structure that turns silky soft when wet and works to deeply cleanse and gently exfoliate; eliminating impurities and stimulating blood flow and cell renewal. Konjac is a natural wonder – it’s been used in Southern Asia for over 1,500 years as a medicinal and beauty treatment, and it is alkaline based thus balances any acidity in skin and restores optimum pH levels.
Lasting for up to 3 months, the sponge is suitable for use with or without a cleanser and can even be used around the delicate eye area. Just add water and experience an all-natural, rejuvenating cleanse that will leave skin feeling revitalised and protected against free radical damage.
name: Konjac Sponge Company Facial Puff Sponge with Green Tea

product_description:
Refresh your skin with Real Chemistry Fresh-Start Foaming Cleanser, a revitalising cleanser that lifts away makeup, oil and impurities to leave skin fresh and revived.

Infused with a host of hydrating ingredients and deep cleansing Amino Acids, the cleanser expertly refreshes and moisturises skin whilst imparting a natural Grapefruit fragrance to invigorate the senses. Expect a smooth and soft complexion.
name: Chemistry Fresh-Start Foaming Cleanser 120ml

product_description:
Clarify and refresh your complexion with the Peter Thomas Roth Irish Moor Mud Cleanser; a purifying, decongesting formula that expertly cleans skin without over-drying or uncomfortable tightness.
Synergising 9,000 year-old Irish Moor Mud with Hijiki Seaweed, Volcanic Ash and Activated Charcoal, the cleanser effortlessly eliminates pore-clogging dirt, oil and make-up to reveal smooth, healthy-looking skin.
Tea Tree Oil and Willow Bark help to minimise the appearance of visible pores, fine lines and wrinkles, whilst 0.4% Salicylic Acid gently exfoliates the skin's surface to improve tone and texture. Your complexion is left radiant, refined and deeply revitalised.
name: Thomas Roth Irish Moor Mud Purifying Cleanser

product_description:
DECLÉOR 思妍丽海藻紧塑系列——去印修护紧致精华非常适合需要提拉紧致的成熟肌肤，它可用于为期三周的早晚强化紧致护理。 这款产品拥有轻盈而不粘着的乳质质地，不含任何人工色素和矿物质油，足够温和，适用于最敏感的肌肤。 - E.D
使用说明：——早晨，在涂抹日常护肤霜之前取四滴精华液于手中揉匀，然后均匀地涂抹在清洁的面部和颈部肌肤。——晚上进行日常洁面后在涂抹晚霜前重复上述过程。——连续使用三周，以实现强化护肤。
name: 思妍丽海藻紧塑系列——去印修护紧致精华（30ml）

product_description:
Not just an ordinary cotton, RMK Cotton is a fantastic massage and exfoliating tool with two different textures perfect for separate aspects of your skincare regime. Perfect for cleansing and exfoliation – this do-it-all cotton is perfect for the gal on the go.
With a gel texture that aids cleansing by gently massaging skin to lift make-up and grime, and a mesh netted side for exfoliation, RMK Cotton gently removes sebum and dead keratins to prepare skin for the next step of your routine. Pop it in your make-up bag and take it on the go – RMK Cotton the perfect partner to an efficient skincare regime.
name: Cotton (72 Pieces)

product_description:
HealGel Face Perfect对抗明显的衰老迹象，可以令肌肤变得娇嫩、紧致和光滑，看上去和感觉更加年轻。 这款精华液的配方蕴含欧米茄和种子油以及独特的三重阶段透明质酸复合物，具有瞬间丰盈效果，此外，它还可以在恢复肌肤弹性的时候为肌肤补充水分。
HealGel Face还蕴含山金车和羟基积雪草苷，以及具有非常强大的肽和生物因素的脂质体，可瞬间舒缓肌肤，令肌肤柔软水嫩。 K.D.
name: Face (50ml)

product_description:
使用 Murad’s Intensive Age-Diffusing Serum (30ml)，令肌肤恢复生机！ 这款丰盈的抗衰老产品拥有专利配方，可为肌肤补充水分，从而抵御明显的衰老迹象。 本品在短短两周内就可改善肌肤的弹性并减少皱纹，这也由 81% 的用户所证实。 肌肤会散发清新亮泽。
这款精华液具备 Resurrection 植物蛋白的保湿特性，提供最深层的滋润。 这些蛋白质结合 Murad 正在申请专利的 RepleniCell™，有助于收集和留住水分，实现光滑、丰满的肌肤。 植物雌激素可提升柔软度，而棕榈三肽-37 有助于减少皱纹。 芒果、香蕉和卡哈提取物的植物共混物可促进胶原蛋白的生成，促进细胞更新，从而紧致和强化肌肤。 Murad's Intensive Age-Diffusing Serum 是一款优秀的产品，令肤色柔滑而充满活力！ - N.P.
name: Intensive Age-Diffusing Serum 30ml

product_description: 这款 Alpha-H Moisture 面部喷雾旨在喷用一下就瞬间焕醒肌肤 。 Skin 看上去焕然一新、明亮而水润，因为这款喷雾采用了舒缓性的植物配方，保证瞬时焕醒和滋润您的肌肤。 用这款Alpha-H面部喷雾瞬间获得耀眼的健康光泽。
name: Moisture 面部喷雾 (100ml)

product_description:
Murad慕拉再生眼霜 
 Murad 慕拉再生眼霜增強水份，同時減少黑眼圈、虛腫和魚尾紋
 功效：
name: 慕拉再生眼霜 15ml

product_description: Catering specifically for men, Zirh's Mild Face Cleanser works to purify and refresh skin without stripping moisture. Powered by extracts of Sage Leaf and Matricaria Flower, derived from Chamomile, the revitalising, foaming face wash effortlessly eliminates dirt and impurities, whilst soothing and hydrating skin for long-lasting comfort. Skin is smooth, clean and invigorated after use.
