product_description:
Keep your skin protected and perfected with the First Aid Beauty Vital Greens Face Mist, a cooling facial spritz that instantly quenches skin whilst setting makeup in place.
Infused with a cocktail of green superfoods, including Kale, Spinach and Spirulina, the antioxidant-rich mist nourishes and protects the complexion, safeguarding against external aggressors and prolonging makeup wear for long-lasting, flawless skin. Rose of Jericho (known for its resurrecting abilities after extreme dehydration) effectively cools and soothes to leave the face refreshed and comfortable.
name: Aid Beauty Vital Greens Face Mist + Setting Spray

product_description:
來自慕拉的此款日常潔面泡蘊含創新型去角質配方，可令您的面部肌膚更加柔滑緊緻，倍感清爽。產品蘊含專業Energizing Pomegranate Complex™ 成分，令肌膚散發自然健康的光彩，另外添加金縷梅成分，可在祛除多餘油脂的同時保持皮膚水潤，這款潔面泡是肌膚保持年輕，重新煥發青春活力的理想產品。 KD 
 使用說明：
name: 慕拉 Pore Reform 日常洁面泡 150ml

product_description:
Garnier Miracle Skin 自然无瑕修颜全效BB霜（轻盈款）是最新的美容秘方，这款多合一超级BB霜结合了多种有效护肤成分与化妆遮瑕的功能，让您拥有完美的肌肤。
如果您正在寻找具有遮瑕和滋润功效，让肌肤更柔嫩光滑的多合一面霜，那么 Garnier Miracle Skin 自然无瑕修颜全效BB霜（轻盈款）将是您的不二之选。 采用SPF15防晒配方，保护肌肤免受紫外线侵蚀，实现24小时的水感润泽，还具有出色的遮瑕力，让肌肤焕发迷人光泽。 可以作为底妆，也可以单独使用，它能够深入肌肤深层，淡化瑕疵，抚平细纹，均匀肤色。
使用说明：
name: Original 轻盈BB霜（50ml）

product_description:
The GLOV Expert Hydro Cleanser for Oily and Mixed Skin is an effortless, efficient and simple way to cleanse skin without the need for a cleanser.
The make-up removing glove utilises advanced micro-fibre technology that is up to 30 times thinner than a cotton pad, with superior electrostatic properties to absorb makeup, dirt and excess oil like a magnet, deeply cleaning clogged pores with a gentle exfoliation process.   
Naturally antibacterial, it helps minimise and regulate sebum production without stripping away moisture for skin that feels fresh and balanced. Simply use the tool with water for an instantly purified and smooth complexion.
name: Expert Hydro Cleanser for Oily and Mixed Skin

product_description:
亮潔的肌膚稍經去角質和修飾便能綻放光潔之採，本品則用於改善肌膚質感和觀感。柔和的去角質配方有助於促進肌膚細胞再生，而不引起刺激；適合所有膚質。 
使用說明：
name: 娜迪奥面部温和去角质乳 (100G)

product_description:
UriageRoséliane红血丝修护面膜 ，可舒缓放松皮肤。多功效配方，可修复肌肤，使容易产生红血丝的肌肤感觉舒适。
本款保湿面膜内含大量活性成分，可有效减少红血丝和红斑痤疮。混合了人参和红藻提取物，可淡化皮肤表面的血管； Uriage温泉水，可滋润舒缓肌肤；cerasterol-2F，可重组皮肤屏障。
TLR2-Regul and SK5R 聚合物一起，可调节激肽释放酶-5（诱导炎症和血管问题的蛋白酶）的活性，使肌肤舒缓放松。 
滋润营养肌肤，使肌肤瞬间舒适、持久长效。
name: Roséliane 红血丝修护面膜 (40ml)

product_description:
Transform fatigued and dull complexions with the Bio Placenta Ampoule Mask from Mizon, a Korean beauty brand at the forefront of innovative anti-ageing skincare solutions.
The ultra-concentrated sheet mask is saturated with a gel formula, instantly penetrating skin with a combination of Niacinamide, Palmitoyl Tripeptide-5 and mammal-derived Placenta Stem Cell extracts that work in synergy to stimulate cell regeneration and improve natural elasticity levels. As a result, skin feels smooth and supple, with the appearance of fine lines, wrinkles and discolouration visibly minimised.
Hyaluronic Acid and Glycerin ensure optimum moisture levels are maintained, helping to counteract dryness and irritation. Achieve a revitalised and replenished visage with a youthful looking lustre.
name: Bio Placenta Ampoule Mask Set

product_description:
Encourage a more youthful, glowing appearance with a daily dose of Advanced Retinol Moisturiser from skinChemists. Renowned for its anti-ageing properties, encapsulated Retinol is released slowly and works to increase cell production at the top layer of the skin, leaving it visibly smoother and more youthful looking. An increase in collagen production helps to visibly plump the skin and reduce the appearance of hyperpigmentation caused by sun damage.
The moisturiser, infused with Hyaluronic acid aims to produce thoroughly hydrated and nourished skin whilst improving its visible firmness, aiding in reducing the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles. Finished with Coconut Oil, the treatment offers further hydration and assists in filtering the sun’s rays for additional protection.
name: Advanced Retinol Moisturiser 50ml

product_description:
本品為天然有機爽膚水，專門清爽、鎮靜和舒緩肌膚，為保濕作準備。以易用泵瓶包裝，採用包含具有舒緩性的薰衣草與甘菊和緊緻肌膚的香甜鼠尾草的獨特配方。適合每天用於正常或油膩​​肌膚，是不可缺少的護膚品。 KD 
 使用說明：
name: 有机复活爽肤水 (100ml)

product_description:
弥合化妆品专柜与侵入性手术之间的差距...... 一种基于先进抗衰老技术的非侵入性护肤膏，使用旨在抵御衰老的低PH值传递系统，诱导肌肤改变。
作为Liquid Laser系列的基石，这款天鹅绒般的轻质凝胶精华液提供无重力长效保湿、紧肤功效以及植物提取物、有效抗氧化剂和天然果酸混合成分带来的示范性缓解色素沉着、亮白肌肤功效。
该方法中心是Juveleven，这是一种革命性的全新六肽，它模仿Hydra水母（一种绰号为"不朽水母"的淡水生物）的作用。 Hydranov-P天然源自斯堪的纳维亚红藻，促进透明质酸在肌肤中的实际合成，将其效率提高211%。
name: Liquid Laser Concentrate (50ml)

product_description:
使用 Dr. Brandt XYY A3 Power Foaming Cleanser  温和地改善肤色；一款遇水即变为丰富泡沫的活性产品。
洁面乳中有提升作用的橙子Orange油，Green Tea、葡萄籽提取物和White茶混合而成的抗氧化剂，能够轻松去除尘垢、彩妆和杂质，同时对抗自由基损伤。
利用小麦氨基酸和甘油的作用进行保湿、软化和舒缓肌肤，使您的肤色更加有活力，不易受到伤害。每次使用后能让肌肤重新容光焕发。
name: Brandt XYY A3 Power Foaming Cleanser 150ml

product_description:
Skin Doctors Antarctilyne Plump3是胶原蛋白肌肤饱满剂，其三重功效配方中含有Trylagen™，它能够以3种方式发挥作用。 
Skin Doctors Antarctilyne Plump3 以 3 种方式使您的肌肤变得丰满：它促进胶原蛋白的产生，使肌肤更加紧致；令胶原蛋白保持均匀，使肌肤光滑；帮助保护胶原蛋白，使之不会随时间推移发生退化（皱纹得到"填补"，在一段时间后会变得越来越不明显）。
Trylagen™是变革性的、具有三重功能的成分，其中含有活性肽和蛋白质，它以年轻和成熟肌肤中的胶原蛋白为靶向。 
使用说明：
name: Doctors Antarctilyne Plump 3 (50ml)

product_description:
Cleanse and purify with the Purity Face Toner from AromaWorks. A luxurious blend of essential oils combine to visibly normalise the size of pores, whilst removing any traces of dirt and makeup that your cleanser may have left behind, leaving skin even cleaner.
Enriched with Aloe Vera and Marshmallow Extract, the toner seeks to visibly calm irritations, deliver hydration and condition skin. Anti-oxidant rich, the toner also works to tackle skin conditions such as eczema, psoriasis and acne by thoroughly cleaning skin. Suitable for even the most sensitive of skin types.
name: Purity Face Toner 100ml

product_description: Hydrate, rejuvenate and revitalise with RMK's Skintuner Treatment EX Moist, a fast-absorbing moisturiser to promote a healthy-looking complexion. Infused with a nourishing blend of ricebran, bilberry and acerola extracts, its innovative formula strengthens the skin's natural barrier, whilst marine collagen promotes elasticity to restore supple, touchably soft skin with a dewy, youthful appearance. Delicately fragranced with floral essential oils, including rose and geranium to calm and relax the skin and senses. E.N.
name: Skintuner Treatment EX Moist (150ml)

product_description:
Rejuvenate tired eyes with First Aid Beauty's Eye Duty Triple Remedy AM Gel Cream; an energising formula that works to refresh, revitalise and restore youthful vitality.
Fortified with a blend of Red Algae, Seaweed and Cucumber Extract, the powerful treatment absorbs quickly to minimise the appearance of fine lines and dark circles, whilst instantly hydrating and cooling the eye area for long-lasting comfort. Eyes are left brighter and smoother with reduced puffiness.
name: Aid Beauty Eye Duty Triple Remedy AM Gel Cream (15ml)

product_description:
Invigorate and deeply cleanse skin with the men-ü Shower Gel. Specially formulated with moisturising ingredients to prevent dryness, the lightweight gel instantly refreshes skin. The cool and uplifting mint fragrance energises skin, whether you use morning or evening skin will feel healthier and revitalised. The highly concentrated shower gel delivers up to eighty washes, because performance really does matter. E.N.
Directions for use: Squeeze a small amount into wet palms and generate a lather. Rinse thoroughly.
name: Shower Gel (100ml)

product_description:
利用The Method: Body Nourish的滋潤特性使皮膚得到護理；一個先進的抗衰老護理，旨在滋潤皮膚的天然屏障功能。 
利用乙醇酸（10％）和專有透明質酸基保濕化合物，HYLAPLEX™，以及富含抗氧化劑的保濕劑對皮膚進行護理，有助於在明顯改善膚色和使肌膚平滑的同時軟化細紋，並減輕變色和老年斑。牛油樹脂和卡哈拉日瓜子油的混合物可確保皮膚靜美、舒適並得到相應的保護。用後皮膚變得更柔嫩、年輕和更新。
name: Method: Body Nourish (325ml)

product_description:
Inspired by Queen Isabelle of Hungary’s famous elixir of youth, the Caudalie Beauty Elixir formula is a blend of tonic and serum. With grape extracts to promote radiance, you’ll notice your pores appear smaller while your complexion appears smoother.
An ideal treatment for skin lacking radiance, Caudalie Beauty Elixir acts as an anti-dull complexion treatment for smokers, a priming base for make-up and makes a great aftershave for men. Including refreshing extracts of grape, toning rosemary, astringent organic mint balm and uplifting mint essential oils this Beauty Elixir soothes and prepares your skin for further treatments.
name: Beauty Elixir Duo (Worth $98)

product_description:
Institut Esthederm 活颜密集精华露可为成熟肌肤提供特别呵护，它蕴含有焕活成分混合物，可有效修复肌肤，令肌肤更光滑紧致。
其轻质的液体配方采用创新型修复技术，可快速被肌肤吸收，最大化淡化皱纹和细纹，与此同时，调理和增强肌肤的支撑组织，让面部看起来更年轻。
name: Esthederm 雅诗敦活颜密集精华露 30 毫升

product_description:
NUXE 推出的这款防晒乳液 （50ml）采用 SPF 30 配方，有助于减缓肌肤早衰，使其呈现天然古铜色；这款面霜完美融合了向日葵和水中花提取物，香味迷人，不含致痘成份，保护肌肤免受紫外线损伤。
这款防水的面霜不含刺激粉刺生产的成分，质地轻盈，采用无酒精和羟基苯甲酸酯的配方，散发着夏日清香。 - E.D
使用说明：
- 接触阳光前，涂抹足量。
- 频繁补涂，特别是在游泳、毛巾擦拭后。
name: 防晒乳液 SPF 30（50ml）

product_description:
Protect against perspiration with the SASCO Eco Body Aloe Vera Deodorant; an aluminium and alcohol free formula that rolls on with ease.
Enriched with a nourishing blend of organic Aloe Vera and an array of hydrating vegetable oils, the gentle yet effective deodorant not only protects against sweat, but cares for skin.
name: Eco Body Aloe Vera Deodorant 60ml

product_description:
使用 Eucerin® Anti-Age Volume-Filler Eye Cream SPF15 UVB + UVA Protection 重新找到青春活力的肌肤。这是一种通过眼用药物测试、抗衰老的配方，致力于重新界定和收紧娇嫩眼部周围的肌肤，同时提供紫外线防护。
随着年龄的增长，肌肤失去丰盈度和鲜明度。由于保持皮肤光滑而紧致的天然物质被消耗，导致面部轮廓下垂。 为了解决这一问题，高级晚霜结合了三种有效成分，旨在降低特定皮肤层的丰盈度和鲜明度：厚朴酚，提高增量丰盈细胞的大小*；寡肽，支持皮肤结构*；以及透明质酸，改善保湿，令皮肤变得丰满，并减少皱纹。
丰盈配方专注于深层次和肌肤表面，能高效地柔滑肌肤，关注因脱水引起的细纹（尤其是眼角的细纹），并恢复丰盈度，重获容光焕发的青春肌肤。 - K.N.
name: Anti-Age Volume-Filler Eye Cream SPF15 UVB + UVA Protection (15ml)

product_description:
For use with the DermaTx Facial Tool in DermaTx Microdermabrasion Systems.
The foam attachment head features a carefully selected foam pad manufactured for use specifically with DermaTx Microdermabrasion Creams. The massaging action of the foam head allows the mineral crystals in the creams to gently remove dead skin cells, polish the skin, and stimulate microcirculation.
Please Note: It is recommended that the attachment heads are changed regularly, at least every three months.
name: Replacement Heads - Set 2

product_description:
该 FOREO LUNA™ 斐珞尔露娜男士净透舒缓洁面仪 可有效清除肌肤的杂质，同时保护锁水层，以提供最适宜的剃须环境。 通过宽面硅胶接触点将 8,000 次 T-Sonic™ 声波脉动导入肌肤深层，以实现温和的深层清洁功能，从而焕活肌肤，清除杂质。
只需一分钟，就能令剃须更平滑、舒适，实现更短剃须而最大限度地减少剃须刺激和损伤；背面可发出低频声波脉动，有助于淡化细纹和皱纹，让您拥有更年轻的面容。
这款洁面仪易于清洁，超级卫生，其完全防水设计可供您在洗浴时尽情享用。LUNA™ 斐珞尔露娜男士净透舒缓洁面仪适合早晨洗漱时轻松使用。
针对男性肌肤而设计
LUNA™ 露娜男士净透舒缓洁面仪的宽面圆形硅胶接触点将强劲的 T-Sonic™ 声波脉动导入更深层的肌肤，获得更直接的效果，祛除油脂，以使皮脂腺更活跃。
T-SONIC™ 技术是什么？ T-Sonic™ 技术是指通过柔软的硅胶接触点每分钟向肌肤导入高达 8,000 次的声波脉动，以祛除死皮细胞，打通堵塞的毛孔，清除污垢和油脂。
手动与 T-SONIC™ 
T-Sonic™ 清洁技术可提供手动清洁无法实现的更深层次的清洁。 这是因为手指经常携带油脂、污物、细菌和其他污染物，无法实现 LUNA™ 露娜男士净透舒缓洁面仪能做到的深度清洁或祛除坏死的细胞，因为 LUNA™ 露娜男士净透舒缓洁面仪具备清除肌肤的污物所需的理想质感。
刷毛 VS. 硅胶
与普通刷毛不同，硅胶刷毛不具备渗透性，可有效防止滋生细菌，不吸收污物和油脂，易于清洁，快速干燥，以打造一款超清洁的面部清洁设备。 硅胶不仅安全卫生，而且得益于其柔软、顺滑和不粗糙的质地，使其比市面上同类产品更温和。
name: LUNA™ 斐珞尔露娜适合男性肌肤的能量源泉

product_description:
Enhance your pout with Eve Lom's Kiss Mix Colour; an ultra-hydrating formula that can be applied under lipstick, over lip colour, or worn alone for a soft, pearlised sheen.
Infused with moisturising Beeswax and cooling Menthol, the luxurious lip balm softens and conditions, whilst defending against environmental aggressors and harsh weather conditions for long-lasting comfort. Lips are smooth and sumptuous with subtle colour.
name: Lom Kiss Mix Colour 7ml - Cheeky

product_description:
Soothe and nourish delicate skin with the Sensitive Cleansing Oil from Erno Laszlo, an advanced formula that utilises dual-performance technology and blends together effective cleansing ingredients with exquisite botanical oils.
Lightweight and non-greasy, the gentle cleanser aims to eliminate dirt, oil and impurities at the same time as penetrating the skin’s surface and enhancing its texture without causing irritation or inflammation. It’s rich in essential fatty acids that work to reduce redness and stimulate cell regeneration, whilst Almond Oil provides deep softening and moisturising properties to combat dryness. Suitable for daily use, you can expect a repaired and restored complexion that’s clean and touchably soft.

product_description:
利用来自 Green People 的 Age Defy+ Purify Cream Cleanser 净化您的肌肤。 富含二十三种活性成分，包括玫瑰果、石榴和酸果蔓，该配方可轻松溶解污垢、杂质和化妆痕迹，而不会导致过度干燥或不舒服的紧绷。
提供长效保湿，该奢华清洁液对抗肤色不均，促进细胞再生，并防御自由基损伤，带来天鹅绒般柔软、光滑的肌肤。 揉合有机柑橘、芳樟和依兰的精致香气，调理肌肤，令其焕发活力。 E.N.

product_description:
Experience a gentle cleanse with the INIKA Micellar Cleansing Rosewater; a natural solution that is ideal for removing makeup.
Effortlessly sweeping over skin, the Rosewater is suitable for all skin types, including sensitive skin. The Micellar formula instantly removes daily dirt, oil and impurities, as well as any traces of makeup. Without drying out the complexion, the Micellar Cleansing Rosewater provides a thorough cleanse that leaves skin clear and healthy-looking.
name: Certified Organic Micellar Cleansing Rosewater 100ml

product_description: Clarify and refresh your complexion with the 10 Fast Cleansing Water Tissue 50 Pack from Korean skincare brand Skin79. Fortified with a unique Herb Complex and natural cleansing agents, the mild face wipes expertly sweep away dirt, make-up and impurities without over-drying or uncomfortable tightness. Ideal for home, travelling or carrying in your gym bag, you can expect a clear, healthy-looking and hydrated complexion after use.

product_description:
采用 bliss Fabulous Make-Up Melt Gel-to-Oil Cleanser (125ml)，清洁和平衡肌肤。 该产品可温和清洁彩妆、表面油脂和污垢，配方独特，在涂抹时从凝胶状变成轻盈卸妆油。
该产品含有旨在滋养肌肤的强效混合油，如琼崖海棠油、海甘蓝、薄荷油和荷荷巴酯，极度亲肤。 这些油将在皮肤上分解并融化彩妆和其他杂质，包括防水睫毛膏。 因此令面部自然水分平衡完好，绝不会感觉肌肤干燥。 此这款洁面乳不含人工香料、色素、矿物油、肥皂、苯甲酸酯类、硫酸盐或邻苯二甲酸盐，适用于所有肌肤类型，令面部清洁健康、容光焕发。 – N.P.
name: Fabulous Make-Up Melt Gel-to-Oil Cleanser (125ml)

product_description: Treat sensitive skin to the Purimoist Cream from Korean brand Skin79. Harnessing the powers of an innovative Mild Sensi-Care System™, the lightweight, fast-absorbing cream blends extracts of Fig and Echinecea Flower to soothe and calm delicate skin, whilst replenishing moisture and hydration levels. Expect a refreshed, purified complexion with restored comfort.
name: Purimoist Cream 55ml

product_description:
men-ü Buddy Matt 'Skin Refresh' Gel Tube 可去除杂质，并控制多余油脂和光泽。 其独特的配方含有柳树皮提取物，可作为抗菌剂舒缓和镇静肌肤，尤其是在剃须后。
这款不含香料的凝胶富含水杨酸和金缕梅，以去除肌肤角质并疏通堵塞的毛孔，呈现健康肌肤。 这款凝胶适用于中性、混合性和油性皮肤，赋予肌肤色调并紧致肌肤。 E.N. 
使用说明：挤出少量凝胶于掌心，并用洁净干燥的手涂抹于皮肤上。 等待 30-60 秒直至干燥。 根据需要再涂抹一次。
name: Buddy Matt Skin Refresh Gel Tube (15ml)

product_description:
Tackle the day ahead with MONUSKIN for Men Leisure Pack, which contains all you need to boast fresh, clean and hydrated skin. The collection is packed with natural conditioning actives that comfort and calm the skin to restore hydration and enhance skin's vitality.
Complete with a body wash shampoo, comfort shave, skin salvage, eye gel and energy rub to help you achieve an invigorating start to your day.
name: for Men Leisure Pack

product_description:
使用男士专用的 Works with Water 'Help: Clear Skin Soluble Supplement'，重获对肌肤的信心。该产品是英国首款 100% 纯天然的护肤营养品，可消除瑕疵，改善肤色，而无需在浴室忙碌于繁琐的化妆过程。
这种可溶性配方适合所有肌肤类型，包括敏感型，以及受痤疮、皮肤色素沉着和酒渣鼻困扰的肌肤；含有经科学证明的成分，有助于减少皮肤瑕疵的出现和复发。
作用原理是什么？
该营养品含有 PravENAC™，这是一种富含高蛋白乳铁蛋白的专用营养成分。 乳铁蛋白是一种从乳蛋白中提取的经临床证明的生物活性物质，可减缓在皮肤上生成杂质的细菌繁殖。 其凭借强大的抗微生物作用，有助于减少瑕疵和疤痕的大小，同时加快当前粉刺的愈合时间。 该产品还含有芦荟，可舒缓和滋养发炎的肌肤。 可呈现更柔滑、更健康、更均匀的肌肤。
服用方法
这种可溶性营养品很容易融入日常的生活方式中，只需添加到您最喜爱的饮料或易消化的食物（无论冷热）中，这也是控制皮肤上粉刺的一种自然方式。
短短几个星期之后，皮肤看起来就会更健康，且发红、瑕疵和刺激感会减轻。 - K.N
name: with Water Men's Help: Clear Skin Soluble Supplement (28 x 3.5g)

product_description:
Aromatherapy Associates美白面部活肤油可帮助您肌肤本身的油脂达到均衡。 非常适合敏感型肌肤，这款轻盈的每日面部活肤油可以令肌肤舒适并得到调理。
结合薰衣草闻名的舒缓特性、玫瑰油、平衡油脂的依兰精油和保护性的维生素E，Aromatherapy Associates炼油美白面部活肤油可滋养您的肌肤，使它容光焕发和恢复活力。 这款活肤油容易被吸收，最好每天使用以获得最大的效果。
使用说明：
name: Associates美白面部活肤油（15ml）

product_description:
PAYOT TECHNI清洁修复晚霜是一种抗衰老面霜 。富含果酸，使肌肤舒适，可在肌肤的最佳吸收时间段抚平修复肌肤。
具有深度补水、淡化皱纹、滋养肌肤、去角质的功效。使肌肤亮泽、促进肌肤晚间的自我修复。 清洁修复晚霜富含抗皱活性成分及 Liss Process 合成物。可修复皱纹、使有皱纹的肌肤丰满光滑靓丽。 皮肤在修复后容光焕发。
name: TECHNI 清洁修复晚霜（50ml）

product_description:
使用PAYOT 的 Ultra Performance Reshaping Anti Water Body Oil 重新定义您的轮廓 。 这款创新干油注入了椰子油和姜汁精华，遇水后变成乳液，让肌肤柔软、丝滑，重新塑形。
适用于潮湿或干燥的皮肤，其独特的配方可减少保水量，刺激微循环，排除毒素，同时保湿，散发令人振奋的清香。 适合于所有皮肤类型，让身体光滑、舒适、轮廓更清晰。
PAYOT 未在动物身上进行模拟测试。
name: Ultra Performance Reshaping Anti Water Body Oil 100ml

product_description: Bliss三氧辐射防护焕采精华最适合想让自己的皮肤惊艳四射的10到20岁的青少年使用。 这款精华采用bliss经典的TO2技术，其革新的CPR技术，维生素C和氧气提升配方制成，可以通过促进健康细胞的功能，保护你的皮肤，改善肤色，甚至提亮肤色，让你的皮肤获得自动修护的能力。 您在等什么？ 使用这款精华液实现亮泽！ LB
name: Triple Oxygen Radiant Protection Energizing Serum (27ml)

product_description:
Murad慕拉Age Reform高效能保濕晚霜50ml 
休息時，使用本品，讓肌膚賦活新生。保濕晚霜強效滋養，補充缺失的水份，提高健康細胞的代謝速度，於夜間賦活細胞再生。 
此晚霜蘊含必需脂肪酸，保護肌膚屏障，預防水份流失；其中的葵花籽油可有效提升肌膚彈性和豐盈度；綠茶和維生素E 促進肌膚的賦活新生，預防肌膚受到傷害。 
 使用說明 
潔面爽膚後塗抹於肌膚上。均勻抹於面部、頸部和胸部並輕柔按摩。 
 成分 
水（去離子）、向日葵（葵花籽）油、馬來酸、甘油、角鯊烷、硬脂酸、異硬脂醇甘醇酸酯、甘油硬脂酸、PEG-100 硬脂酸酯、鯨蠟硬脂醇、鯨蠟硬脂醇聚醚-20、海藻萃取物、琉璃苣籽油、月見草油、 十六烷基磷酸酯二乙醇胺、泛醇、棕櫚酰羥丙基三甲基銨支鏈澱粉/甘油交聯聚合物、卵磷脂、葡萄籽提取物、生育酚、抗壞血酸磷酸酯鎂、水解大豆麵粉、燕麥仁蛋白質、視黃醇棕櫚酸酯、甜橙（橙子）果實萃取、丁二醇、榆繡線菊花萃取、蜂蜜精華、醣脂、透明質酸、卡波姆膠、三乙醇胺、雙咪唑烷基脲、羥苯甲酯、羥苯丙酯
name: 慕拉 Age Reform 高效能保湿晚霜 50ml

product_description:
bareMinerals' Skinsorials Cleansing Kit combines everything you need to achieve a clean, refreshed and revitalised complexion. The cleansing brush, daily cleanser and exfoliator work in synergy to promote smoother, brighter, clarified-looking skin.
Double Cleansing Brush
A patented cleansing brush with ergonomic, lightweight design. Sitting comfortably in the hand, its soft synthetic fibres and textured reservoir deliver a gentle massaging action to purify and refresh your complexion. When used in conjunction with your favourite cleanser, you can expect touchably soft, smooth and refined skin with a restored luminosity. Complete with a convenient hanging loop.
Pure Plush™ Gentle Deep Cleansing Foam Travel Size (50g)
A luxurious, daily cleanser that delivers a cushioning veil to gently lift away dirt, makeup and impurities for a soft and refreshed complexion. The creamy face wash is suitable for all skin types, and utilises a naturally derived Grapefruit scent to invigorate the senses. Combining Elderflower and Rosemary extracts with mineral-rich Sea Salts, the cleanser expertly cleanse and revitalises skin to leave the complexion feeling pure, smooth and comfortable. Dermatologist and ophthalmologist-tested. Non-comedogenic.
Mix. Exfoliate. Smooth™ Add-to-Cleanser Skin Polishing Grains (25g)
A face exfoliator with luxurious buffing grains that can be mixed with your favourite cleanser for a customised exfoliating experience. Fortified with mineral-rich Sea Salts and Black Rice, the add-to-cleanser grains gently polish the skin's surface to smoothen and refine texture, whilst a botanical blend of natural Chardonnay, Rose and Sweet Orange Peel improve clarity and radiance. Expect a purified, revitalised complexion with restored luminosity.
name: Skinsorials Cleansing Kit

product_description:
Infuse your skin with essential moisture. Mavala's Aqua Plus Multi-Moisturizing Featherlight Cream is a replenishing moisturiser that helps to restore lost moisture in tight, sensitive skin that's showing signs of premature ageing.
When skin is dehydrated, wrinkles can appear prematurely. To help prevent this, the fresh, lightweight cream combines three molecular weights of Hyaluronic Acid that penetrate the epidermis and infuse skin which much needed hydration for 24 hours. Hyaluronic Acid is naturally present in skin, and can hold up to 1000 times its weight in water, creating a plumped-up, healthier-looking complexion. Fortified with 100% Swiss Mallow Flower for a soothing effect, the cream comforts and replenishes skin whilst strengthening the natural barrier to lend skin better resistance. Skin is hydrated from the inside out; it appears smoother and plumper with restored softness. Housed in a tube with airtight pump to maintain product efficacy.
name: Aqua Plus Multi-Moisturizing Featherlight Cream 45ml

product_description:
使用 Skin Doctors T字区控油洗面奶（150ml），打造完美肤色，去除油光。 富含 Acnacidol 和 Evermat 有效成分，抗菌的特性有助于控制皮脂分泌过剩和油光。
这款洗面奶能够去除污垢及化妆品，净化毛孔，展现健康肤色。 - SA
name: Doctors T字区控油洗面奶（150ml）

product_description:
如果您的肌肤喑哑，需要保湿，这款StriVectin-SD 瞬间重整抗皱去角质磨砂是最适合您的去角质用品。 它不含苯甲酸酯类、不易生黑头粉刺，可令您的肌肤清爽舒适而不会有刺痛之感。
它蕴含荷荷巴微珠、葵花籽油和燕麦麸，可以去除肌肤的角质层、滋养和镇静肌肤，令肌肤光滑水润亮泽。 它去角质的功效格外温和，因此即使是最敏感的肌肤也可以安全使用。 在去角质的同时，它令肌肤做好准备，接受其他StriVectin®产品的进一步呵护疗理。 您会首先看到瞬时效果，随着时间的推移，更重大的效果会显现出来。
这款配方可与在癌症预防研究中发现的强大的 NIA-114™ 成分一起使用。 据临床证明，每周按时使用两次本品，您的肤色会变得均匀，肌肤的结构会得到改善。 LB
每周使用 2-3 次。 涂抹少量在湿手上。 轻轻按摩面部和颈部以便吸收。 彻底冲洗干净。 避开眼部区域。
name: SD Instant Retexturizing Scrub（100 毫升）

product_description:
专为50岁及50岁以上年龄的成熟肌肤研制，来自APK的 Age Defy Brightening Cleanser 是一款受到强烈推荐的抗衰老洁面液；是您获得柔软、洁净、年轻肌肤的解决方案。
专用于护理成熟肌肤，该霜质保湿洁面液结合维生素和抗氧化剂，有效滋养肌肤，同时清除污垢和杂质。 它混合富含脂肪酸的杏仁油和红藻，协同对抗早衰并亮白肌肤，减少老年斑和色素沉着。 皱纹和细纹被抚平，肌肤更加光滑，而其所含脂质可增强肌肤的质地和弹性。
肌肤将获得极致滋养，变得洁净、亮丽，尽显青春光彩。 - K.N.
name: - Age Defy Brightening Cleanser (200ml)

product_description:
LIFT + FIRM™ Illuminate is specifically formulated for our most delicate skin. This powerful treatment Eye Cream refines fragile skin to visibly firm and reduce the appearance of crow's feet, deep wrinkles, dark circles and puffiness. The result: ageless eyes.
Along with Cell Protection Proteins®, active ingredients include: Aquafill to lock in moisture and reduce wrinkles, Glucosyl Hesperidin and Niacinamide to help increase circulation to alleviate dark circles, Unirepair T-43 to protect and treat environmental aggressors, plus MDI Complex to help inhibit the breakdown of collagen.
name: LIFT + FIRM Eye Cream

product_description:
Transform the look of your décolleté with Talika Bio Enzymes Mask - Neckline, a serum-infused, biocellulose sheet mask saturated with a cocktail of beneficial ingredients to soothe and hydrate the décolleté area whilst combat signs of ageing.
Biocellulose is a natural nanofibre that is 100% biocompatible with skin; it has been traditionally used in surgery to aid healing, and in sheet mask form, harnesses a high concentration of active ingredients for optimal delivery and efficacy. Clinging comfortably like a 'second skin', the anti-ageing mask delivers a lifting and smoothing effect to promote a more lifted bust area. Infused with six revolutionary active ingredients, including Hyaluronic Acid, Collagen, Aloe Vera and a 16-plant complex, it plumps skin with moisture, reduces the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles, and relieves dehydrated skin. 
Promoting a smoother, firmer-looking décolleté area, the antioxidant-rich mask will protect against free radical attacks and revitalise for brighter-looking skin. Skin feels toned and smooth with improved elasticity; dark spots are diminished and visible results are witnessed instantly with long-lasting effect.
Sheet masks are an effective delivery system for ingredients, allowing nutrients and nourishment to penetrate deep down for maximum efficacy.
name: Bio Enzymes Mask - Neckline 25g

product_description: Daily Cleanser, Detox Mask and Gentle Exfoliant is a 3-in-1 treatment that gently refines skin as it foams away impurities and balances moisture levels. Featuring Aqualumine™, a proprietary blend of enzymes derived from red caviar – nature's alternative to chemical exfoliants — it lifts away dead skin cells, clarifies without irritation, and adds a touch of moisture as well. Cell Protection Proteins®, LIFTLAB's patented damage-reversing weapon from the Arctic, encourages cell turnover to reveal smoother, more radiant skin.
name: PURIFY + CLARIFY Daily Cleanser

product_description:
Refine and balance oily, blemish-prone complexions with Mavala's Pore Detox Perfecting Purifying Mask, a ten minute face mask that helps to regulate sebum whilst mattifying shiny skin.
Silky in texture, the treatment glides effortlessly onto skin, infusing it with sebum-regulating Fleischer Willowherb, and Perlite (an ultra-light mineral powder of volcanic origin) that delivers an immediate blotting effect; mattifying whilst leaving skin fresh, clarified and radiant in appearance. The refining mask minimises the appearance of pores and effectively decongests to promote a healthier-looking, balanced canvas. Skin prone to oiliness and imperfections is left cleansed, shine free and velvety soft. Non-drying.
name: Pore Detox Perfecting Purifying Mask 65ml

product_description:
CODAGE 5号抗衰老精华（10ml）专为修复并防止衰老迹象而配制，直击细纹、皱纹和皮肤细胞结构等问题。 这款产品由品牌的法国制药专家团队配制而成，混合了多种高效成分，令肌肤更加紧致光滑。 - K.R
Hy2 - 具有补水锁水的深层滋润功效，有助于减缓水分流失。 这种成分还能够促进胶原蛋白，丰盈并紧实肌肤，令肌肤更年轻。
Ao3 - 这一富含抗氧化因子的成分具有修复和保护功效功效，可以保护肌肤抵御自由基和紫外线的伤害，并修复肌肤已有的损伤。
Ru3 - 这一抗皱成分混合了多种抗衰老因子。 减少面部微小的收缩，抚平并减少细纹与皱纹，一有迹象便立即作用。 具有抗氧化功能，防止肌肤衰老，同时刺激胶原蛋白生成，令肌肤丰盈紧致，呈现年轻魅力。
Ri3 - 这一成分专门针对细纹和皱纹，能够紧致并强韧肌肤结构，防止肌肤进一步衰老。
Lf1 - 立即提拉肌肤，令肌肤迅速由内而外地紧致，长久呈现年轻态。
name: 5号抗衰老精华（10ml）

product_description:
CODAGE 4号美白淡斑精华液（10ml）专为美白肤色，淡化色斑瑕疵而配制，能够减少黑斑，平衡并美白肤色，安全可靠。 这款产品由品牌的法国制药专家团队配制而成，混合了多种高效成分，令肌肤美白亮泽，均匀肤色。 - K.R
Ao3 - 这一富含抗氧化因子的成分具有修复和保护功效功效，可以保护肌肤抵御自由基和紫外线的伤害，并修复肌肤已有的损伤。
Dx3 - 这一成分能够促进排毒，去除有害毒素，同时为肌肤增添一层保护屏障，防止其他有害物质进入。 修复受损的蛋白质，为肌肤细胞注入能量，令面色润泽。
Tc3 - 针对肤色不均和黑斑等肌肤问题，淡化色斑，令肌肤展现迷人亮泽。 这一成分能够激活肌肤细胞再生，令肤质光滑，散发迷人光彩。
Bl3 - 这一成分专门针对肌肤的天然色斑沉着，能够有效美白肌肤，不伤及肌肤健康。 减少黑色素生成，自然美白提亮肤色，安全可靠。

product_description:
Anthony Logistics for Men 基础旅行套装包含全套护发产品，提供从头到脚的呵护，是您外出旅行的完美套装。 这套简便的套装包含全身护理所需的所有产品。 - K.R
Anthony Logistics for Men 基础旅行套装包含：
乙醇酸洗面奶（2盎司）这款洗面奶不起泡，不含苯甲酸脂类，包含4.9％的乙醇酸，能够有效去除杂质，温和去角质，有助于清洁粉刺，防止再生。
剃须膏（2盎司）质地光滑浓稠，易于推开，带给您最服帖、最舒适的剃须体验。 这款剃须膏带有舒缓抗菌的功效，保证皮肤不发炎，软化粗糙的胡须，使其更易剃除。
提神清爽两用洗发沐浴液（3.4盎司） 这2合1洗液不含苯甲酸酯类，可以清洁并滋润秀发和身体，持久散发男人味。
全效面部保湿霜（2.5盎司） 这款轻型不油腻的保湿霜能有效滋润肌肤，减少面部细纹出现，且无残留。
强效唇膏 SPF 25（0.25盎司） 提供UVA和UVB射线防护，舒缓干裂嘴唇，同时软化并滋润双唇肌肤，使其散发自然光泽与清新香味。

product_description:
Uplift the mind and body with the Aurelia Probiotic Skincare Brightening Botanical Essence; a lightweight facial mist that boasts the power to invigorate.
Mineral-rich, the mist combines filtered Volcanic Water with healing Magnesium Salts to detoxify all skin types. The formula is enriched with Quartz Crystal Water and an energising blend of precious Essential Oils, which work in synergy to promote inner healing and feelings of positivity, as well as assisting you in achieving your desired sense of self.
In one simple spray, the formula delivers a mist of happiness, helping to create a radiant, bright and balanced complexion.

使用 Anthony Logistics for Men 即时修复控油乳液，告别油光，它可以立即吸收油脂，有助于缩小毛孔，使肤色自然，不泛油光。 这款护肤产品非常适合油性皮肤，采用天然配方，漫射光线，掩饰油光，还能减少粉刺和瑕疵。 - L.M.

product_description:
Rediscover your skin's youthful capacity with KORRES Castanea Arcadia Anti-Wrinkle and Firming Night Cream.

Targeting deep wrinkles and loss of elasticity, the rich, non-greasy night cream melts effortlessly into skin, delivering a host of skin-loving ingredients to help reduce the appearance of wrinkles while restoring firmness. Fortified with Castanea Arcadia (Arcadian Chestnut tree) extract, brightening Vitamin C and molecular weight Hyaluronic Acid, the advanced moisturiser supports skin structure to leave it looking hydrated, youthful and renewed with improved resilience.
name: Castanea Arcadia Anti-Wrinkle and Firming Night Cream 40ml

product_description:
使用德國世家遮瑕筆可遮住惱人的瑕疵和缺陷。此多效產品不僅可以遮瑕，還可以鎮靜和滋潤皮膚，讓膚色均勻。富含營養植物和鎖水精華油，還包含容易上色的天然礦物顏料。 - LM

Enriched with soothing ingredients such as Lavender Extracts and Rose Hip Oil, it provides a clean and calm surface that is touchably soft. - K.R

Hy3 - 具有补水锁水的滋润功效。 这种成分还能够促进胶原蛋白，丰盈并紧实肌肤，令肌肤更年轻。

IOMA  美肤日霜，可提亮肤色，保护肌肤不再长黑斑。 保湿霜可提亮肤色、减少黑色素的生成，也可防 UVA和UVB 对肌肤的伤害及肌肤老化迹象。
这款光滑日霜，使肌肤无油光，肤色不再暗沉。令肌肤焕发光采、得到保护，使肤色均匀。 – E.W.

IOMA 舒缓霜（日用兼夜用），使肌肤舒适，得到滋养，缓解肌肤发红，深度滋润肌肤。
轻型乳霜质地，可迅速融入肌肤，对抗肌肤发红，使肌肤瞬间舒缓。  内含壬二酸（天然存在于皮肤的健康成分），具有抗炎作用，可对抗自由基。 刺激胶原蛋白再生，使肌肤舒缓，得到保护。 - K.N

product_description:
Refuel your complexion with The Master Cleanser Foam™ Detoxing Sea Kelp Leaf Cleansing Foam​ from STARSKIN. The formula targets skin at a cellular level, resulting in a hydrated complexion with skin that is rejuvenated and radiant.
The foam gently yet effectively exfoliates skin, removing dead skin cells, daily dirt and even leftover makeup. Concentrated with Pure Glacier Water and Sea Kelp Leaves, the cleanser works to detoxify skin creating a visibly clear complexion. Ideal for all skin types.
name: The Master Cleanser Foam™ Detoxing Sea Kelp Leaf Cleansing Foam

product_description:
IOMA 抗皱保湿凝胶  ，这是一款创新型抗衰老凝胶，使肌肤饱满丰盈，抚平皱纹、令肌肤更年轻。将本品涂抹于脸部，轻轻拍打，至表情纹吸收。
凝胶质感配方，是天然皮肤张量，相当于在面部涂抹了抗衰老保护层，瞬间消除皱纹和细纹、促进胶原蛋白的产生、刺激细胞活性。 配方采用了减少皱纹的生物技术和光反射聚合物，使肌肤表面涂覆了一层白色颗粒，可遮盖肌肤瑕疵，使肤色均匀。 使肌肤瞬间更光滑、更致密、更饱满。 - K.N

product_description:

 作为Pro-5胶原蛋白护理方案的第一步，该奢华配方可轻松涂于肌肤上，其基于活性"Collasure"的海洋胶原蛋白提供抗衰老功效；它强效补水的同时提高肌肤弹性并减少皱纹的出。
为肌肤提供专业保护和紧致功效，该精华液结合"肌肤拉紧ST"和 'Matrixyl 3000' 瞬间提升和紧致您的肌肤，平滑细纹和皱纹，同时改善肤色并提高弹性。 肌肤将变得光滑、年轻。 - K.N.

product_description:
Revitalise your complexion with the Instant Miracle Booster from ModelCo. Ideal for all skin types but particular suited to those with mature skin, the anti-ageing Booster is designed to visibly brighten and tighten skin, resulting in a youthful and radiant complexion.
Effortlessly melting into skin, the potent serum is fortified with Vitamin C, which delivers intense hydration and visibly repairs skin, whilst Hyaluron reduces the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles to reveal a supple complexion.
Complete with antiseptic and anti-inflammatory properties. The protective formula revives dull, tired and stressed skin, to leave the face visibly healthy and luminous.

这款乳霜融合了三种抗衰老成分和滋养活性成分，利用透明质酸令肌肤光滑丰满；牛油果油和芦荟则可柔化和抚慰肌肤。 多种抗衰老成分协同作用，从深层和表层重构肌肤，实现重新界定的、更青春的肤色。 - K.N

Gatineau Melatogenine AOX Probiotics Essential Eye Corrector含有海洋胶原蛋白，可以抚平皱纹，滋润您的肌肤。 可以改善光泽的成分让皮肤看起来健康，光彩照人，仙人掌果提取物可以去除死皮细胞，消除暗沉和疲劳的迹象。 具有滋养作用的娑罗属油能够让皮肤柔软舒缓，印度的栗子提取物可以促进微循环，从而消除黑眼圈。

product_description: Magnitone London 推出超级保湿洗脸刷头，它是一款可替换刷头，适用于结合‘脉冲声波男士洗脸刷’使用。 它是由男士专门为男士设计的产品，可有效祛除肌肤表面的角质（甚至面部毛发以下的角质），以清除多余的油脂、死皮细胞、污垢和杂质，有助于避免向内生长的毛发，让您实现顺畅剃须。 这款超级保湿洗脸刷头可有效清洁胡茬，使肌肤感觉更加清洁、舒缓而有弹性。

product_description:
Hydrate your skin with Cucumber De-Tox Bouncy Cream from Peter Thomas Roth; oil-free moisturiser with bounce-back texture that instantly absorbs into the skin infusing it with potent anti-oxidants and hydrating actives that maintain optimal hydration levels throughout the day.
The lightweight gel hydrator creates an invisible matte veil of soft, supple, healthy-looking skin. The gel contains: innovative bouncy Bio-Mesh Technology that propels the delivery of moisturising actives and prevents water loss; Cucumber Extract that helps hydrate, detox and soothe the skin; Hyaluronic Acid that helps increase hydration levels by drawing and retaining water from moisture in the air; and Anti-Oxidant Vitamins C and E in a nurturing complex that helps protect against free-radical attack. – E.W.

这款独特的活力霜，配方主要为纯玫瑰水，结合强大的抗氧化剂、有效的植物萃取物、拉紧剂等成分，使肌肤更光滑、更年轻；其目标是抚平肌肤细纹、皱纹，对抗暗沉和脱水的肌肤，深层软化舒缓肌肤、滋润干燥的皮肤。 内含三肽和肽生物嫩肤因子干细胞提取物，可淡化细纹*；微藻提取物，使肤色更好，可减少肌肤泛红。
绷紧剂可在肌肤表面形成一层光滑的薄膜，明显减少细纹出现，长此以往也有会使肌肤紧致*。
使肌肤更光滑、更年轻、超级滋润。

让针对干性皮肤的 Gatineau 肌源重塑面霜为熟龄肌肤注入水活力。 经过长期使用，肌肤质感将显著提升，变得更光滑、更紧实、更亮泽。

name: 肌源重塑面霜 - 干性皮肤 50ml

浮肿消眼霜（15 ml） 
对娇嫩的眼部区域，进行每晚护理。 采用该品牌先进的益生菌和修复技术，快速吸收配方，结合山金车及积雪草等成分，以抚平细纹、皱纹、浮肿、黑眼圈和炎症，使双眼青春靓丽、神采奕奕。

product_description:
Restore radiance with the Skin Authority Brightening Serum; a lightweight, hydrating treatment that seeks to minimise the appearance of discolouration and fade dark spots caused by hormones, sun damage or UV exposure.  
Powered by an Oligopeptide Complex and 10% naturally-derived AHA Glycolic Acid, the powerful serum gently exfoliates the surface layer of skin, enhancing texture and tone for a more even and refined complexion with a renewed luminosity. Suitable for all skin types.

舒适型半透明的啫喱质地，可轻松上妆，提供舒缓及抗炎作用；内含的洋甘菊精华可对抗肌肤发红，使肌肤愈合。 可修复肌肤，帮助肌肤达到自然洁净，使肤色均匀 ；内含的红葡萄叶提取物，可保护加强毛细血管壁，打造舒爽效果。 使肌肤感到舒缓，明显柔软。 - K.N

不含香料、苯甲酸脂类、有机硅等成分。

Cicactive 系列中的 Uriage肌肤修护啫喱，可修复保护肌肤。 呵护物理疗法或外部因素等引发的受损肌肤。水状胶质，可修复受损肌肤，使肌肤瞬间舒缓。
富含修复肌肤的高浓度活性成分，包括多功效有益成分Uriage温泉水等，可舒缓保护、滋润肌肤，增强皮肤屏障。本品可使肌肤表皮得到再生，修护面部和身体，使其触感柔软、肤色均匀。

product_description:
使用 Retexturizing Treatment Cream护理您的皮肤，轻质配方，加入 10% 乙醇酸以保湿皮肤，同时提高其可见的纹理和外观。
其效果是呈现容光焕发的皮肤，抗氧化混合物专业化地去角质，除去无光泽的死皮细胞，改善水分平衡，同时极大地改善肌肤的纹理，使皮肤更光洁。 除了自由基之外，还加入了辅酶Q10和磷脂复合物，使皮肤猝火并保湿。 色变消失，皮肤获得更新，变得更清爽。 乙醇酸可以使其他抗老化成分得到更快，更深入和更有效地吸收。

product_description:
資生堂百優抗皺晚霜在您入睡時保護您的肌膚，抵抗肌膚老化。 
抗老乳霜質感豐厚，包含無患子果皮提取, 抑制刺激皺紋生成的酶的產生，是您的肌膚更容易對抗老化問題，明顯淡化現有的皺紋和細紋。給予普通和乾性肌膚充分補水，使肌膚更柔軟嫩滑。 
 使用方法:

Target signs of ageing with the MONUPLUS Super Serum Duo. Combining effective natural ingredients with the brand's skincare expertise, the kit promises to reignite a youthful-looking glow.
Anti-Ageing Super Serum Day (15ml)
An innovative concentrate formulated to restore a youthful-looking complexion. Infused with a blend of Hyaluronic Acid, Vitamin C and Glycerin, the radiance-reviving serum delivers an instant boost of vitality and reduces the appearance of fine lines, whilst evening skin tone to reveal a rebalanced, glowing complexion. Ideal for use throughout the year, or to revitalise skin before special events and weddings.
Anti-Ageing Super Serum Night (15ml)
Combat signs of ageing with the powerful night serum, a revolutionary concentrate developed to uplift skin and restore vitality whilst you sleep. Fortified with a blend of natural ingredients to improve the skin's function, whilst wrinkle-fighting Retinol firms and minimises the appearance of fine lines. Suitable for use as part of your skincare regime, or for a boost of vitality prior to special occasions for a rebalanced, glowing complexion.
name: Super Serum Duo

product_description:
Uriage  温和胶状磨砂膏，使肌肤重新焕发活力。 专门为中性皮肤及干性皮肤制作。其洁肤配方包含了去角质微珠和芙蓉花果酸（α-羟基酸），可轻松去除皮肤表面的死皮及暗沉细胞，一步到位刺激细胞再生。
内含的Uriage温泉水富，是一种来自法国阿尔卑斯山的多功效有益成分，可保护舒缓肌肤、强化皮肤屏障，使肌肤水润亮泽，质地细腻。 使肌肤清爽洁净、避免了肌肤过度干燥或紧绷。

Utilising the latest in Korean skincare trends, Mizon’s Black Clean Up Pore Heating Gel reacts with skin temperature to effectively melt away the appearance of blackheads.
Offering a targeted solution to congested and oily skin, the innovative gel formula gently massages the epidermis with a Heating Gel Technology that helps to dissolve dead cells and impurities, resulting in unclogged and cleansed pores. Ideal for areas prone to blackheads including the nose and T-zone, it leaves skin feeling smooth, supple and deeply purified.
name: Black Clean Up Pore Heating Gel 20ml

Infused with an ultra-hydrating cocktail of Rosehip, Evening Primrose and Blackcurrant, the fast-absorbing treatment deeply moisturises skin, whilst antioxidant-rich Sea Buckthorn and Cranberry Seed defend against dryness. The versatile face oil can be used alone or blended with face cream to leave your complexion rejuvenated and replenished. Complete with a pipette for mess-free application.

使眼睛周围的肌肤光滑明亮，超级滋润。

The formula is fortified with Moringa, which helps to replenish the hydration levels of skin in need, whilst Allantoin naturally calms and protects against external aggressors. Expect comfortable and healthy skin.

Revive the complexion with the MAGICSTRIPES Hyaluronic Treatment Mask; a powerful Hydrogel Mask boasting anti-ageing and moisturising properties. Crafted from 100% natural cotton fabric, the mask is completely biodegradable and is the perfect construction for containing an array of vegetable ingredients.

Concentrated with Hyaluronic Acid, the mask works to visibly reduce the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles, creating an overall more youthful appearance. The mask is enriched with Trehalose, popular for its ability to improve the resistance of the skin to climatic changes. The treatment aims to leave skin thoroughly moisturised, nourished and visibly firmer.

Eye Complex 旗下的Baxter of California，可将眼部浮肿及黑眼圈降到最低。 使眼部周围肌肤变得柔滑、色调细腻。非常适合遮盖熬夜一族！
适合所有皮肤类型。本品不含香料。Baxter of California是一款专为男士设计的眼部保湿乳液。 内含多种海洋元素，可对抗早衰；其他成分如：营养肌肤的没药醇、玫瑰籽油、芦荟凝胶等，可对抗眼部浮肿，舒缓滋润眼部肌肤。

REN 永葆青春SH2C 精华液，使您容光焕发，肌肤光滑、年轻靓丽。 令肌肤瞬间更紧致、同时减少细纹，使肌肤持久年轻。
本款精华液，内含玻尿酸，可补充肌肤水分，令肌肤饱满充盈，适合所有皮肤类型。 本产品可提高皮肤细胞寿命、促进晒伤皮肤自我修复。提高维生素C含量、改善肤色，令肤色亮泽。
内含来自酵母的六肽，可刺激肌肤再生；及合成蛋白质，使肌肤紧实。 天然肽使肌肤光滑细腻、补充天然胶原蛋白，淡化细纹。
使用说明：
name: 永葆青春 Sh2C精华液（30ml）

product_description:
PAYOT晚间修复霜 是一种晚间紧肤润肤霜。 它会使肌肤在夜间感到舒适，在皮肤重生过程中重塑脸部轮廓。
该晚间修复霜质地丰富，使皮肤感觉舒适柔软、可为皮肤提供大量的有益成分。其成分包括：抗氧化维生素E、透明质酸、Acti-Lift 合成物。可 提升皮肤弹力、抚平皱纹、使肌肤恢复活力。
第二天早上您会感觉肌肤清新、肤色柔和、皮肤得到深度滋养。

CODAGE 5号抗衰老精华（30ml）专为修复并防止衰老迹象而配制，直击细纹、皱纹和皮肤细胞结构等问题。 这款产品由品牌的法国制药专家团队配制而成，混合了多种高效成分，令肌肤更加紧致光滑。 - K.R
Hy2 - 具有补水锁水的深层滋润功效，有助于减缓水分流失。 这种成分还能够促进胶原蛋白，丰盈并紧实肌肤，令肌肤更年轻。
Ao3 - 这一富含抗氧化因子的成分具有修复和保护功效功效，可以保护肌肤抵御自由基和紫外线的伤害，并修复肌肤已有的损伤。
Ru3 - 这一抗皱成分混合了多种抗衰老因子。 减少面部微小的收缩，抚平并减少细纹与皱纹，一有迹象便立即作用。 具有抗氧化功能，防止肌肤衰老，同时刺激胶原蛋白生成，令肌肤丰盈紧致，呈现年轻魅力。
Ri3 - 这一成分专门针对细纹和皱纹，能够紧致并强韧肌肤结构，防止肌肤进一步衰老。
Lf1 - 立即提拉肌肤，令肌肤迅速由内而外地紧致，长久呈现年轻态。
name: 5号抗衰老精华（30ml）

product_description:
我们采用专利皮肤修护系统，刺激胶原蛋白的合成，更新娇嫩的眼部周围肌肤。 内含咖啡因和 Tiger 香草，增加肌肤弹性，使肌肤紧致；散光剂，可淡化肌肤细纹和黑眼圈。
每天洁面及爽肤后，涂抹少量到眉骨和眼睛下方，然后轻轻拍打。
阿伏苯宗（3.0％），甲基水杨醇（4.0％）、水杨酸（5.0％）

橄榄油、雷公根和甜杏仁油的滋养融合可保护肌肤皮脂免受环境侵害，同时恢复自然弹性，呈现柔润饱满肤色。 肌肤清爽、舒适和滋润。

product_description:
Reignite your complexion with the Lancer Skincare Radiance Awakening Intense Mask; a rich, velvet-textured face mask to revitalise and replenish overnight while your skin is at its most receptive to treatment.
Fortified with an exclusive LES-10 Complex brimming with vitamins and antioxidants, the smooth formula melts into skin to deliver essential moisture and nutrients, working to minimise the look of discolouration and combat environmental aggressors that cause dullness and fatigue.
A Triple Tone Neutralising Complex with extracts of Silver Vine and Chinese Plum directly targets redness and ashy tones, resulting in a more even and uniform visage, as well as helping to reduce visible signs of glycation that contributes to skin yellowing as you age.
Suitable for all skin tones and types, awaken to a more balanced and refined complexion with a renewed radiance.

配方不油腻，可完美涂抹，不会阻塞毛孔，可轻松上妆，无人工晒黑的难闻味道。涂抹后，为您打造华丽的自然肤色。 超保湿配方，利用产品的保湿性，帮助延长自晒黑时间，使美黑的肤色均匀地变淡。从而使闪亮的阳光肤色持续更久。 本款美黑产品快干、不黏糊，令肌肤柔软光滑，打造完美底妆。 为您展示闪亮的自然美黑的肤色。 - K.N

以具有滋补功效的红花、坚果和锦缎Rose油的混合物强化，这款快速吸收配方可自然滋养和保湿肌肤，同时舒缓和镇静干燥、发红的肌肤，获得持久舒适。 适合敏感肌肤，清晨来临之际您的肤色会亮丽而有健康光泽。

product_description:
使用Gatineau营养活性调节精华霜应对皮肤紧绷和皮肤皲裂。
  恢复青春皮肤的柔软和光泽。

product_description:

product_description:
Freshly handmade in the UK with high-quality and natural ingredients, STEAMCREAM's 'Berry Good' Moisturiser is a lightweight whipped emulsion that can be used on the face, hands and body.
Developed with the brand's unique STEAM process, the finest ingredients have been fused together by a shot of steam to create a gentle, fast-absorbing emulsion that delivers long-lasting hydration.
Harnessing the nourishing powers of Orange Flower Water, Cocoa Butter and Almond and Jojoba Oils, the ultra-moisturising formula softens and replenishes, leaving skin smooth, restored and rejuvenated from top to toe.
Presented in a reusable, decorative tin crafted from recyclable materials to reduce energy use and respect the environment. STEAMCREAM follows a strict no-animal testing policy and is approved by the Vegan Society.

product_description:
The ALGENIST Genius White Brightening Anti-Ageing Cream is a rich, creamy moisturiser that infuses skin with moisture while helping alleviate the look of premature signs of ageing.
Developed upon extensive biotechnological research, the advanced formula contains age-defying Alguronic Acid that improves firmness and density to smooth wrinkles, while the proprietary AlgaBright Complex dramatically improves skin tone and clarity.
Dark spots and discolouration is effectively lifted, with Ascorbyl Glucoside providing essential antioxidant properties to tackle free radical damage and inhibit melanin production. As a result, your complexion appears more even and refined, with a soft, supple texture and healthy looking luminosity.

使肤色自然美黑、均匀。

Target signs of ageing with the ALGENIST Power Advanced Wrinkle Fighter 360° Eye Serum; a breakthrough formula that utilises high-quality, effective ingredients to improve tone and texture around the delicate eye contour.

Delivering superior anti-ageing properties, the powerful solution combats dark circles and puffiness, whilst expertly minimising the look of creases, wrinkles and crow's feet to reveal a smoother, more refined appearance. Eyes appear bright, youthful and rejuvenated with a fresh, dewy glow.

Fine Lines
Wrinkles
Firmness
Density
Sagging
Texture
Dehydration
Dullness
Discolouration
Clarity
Resilience
Enlarged pores

深层、持久保湿
皮肤科护肤品

product_description:
The GLOV Hydro Cleansing Magnet Set is an effortless, efficient and simple way to cleanse skin without the need for a cleanser, perfect for everyday pampering. Presented in branded gift packaging, the kit provides an innovative solution to leave skin feeling refreshed and purified.
Comfort Hydro Cleanser
The Comfort Hydro Cleanser is an effortless, efficient and simple way to cleanse skin without the need for a cleanser, ideal for removing stubborn and heavy makeup in difficult-to-reach areas. Utilising advanced microtechnology, the ‘heavy duty’ cleansing glove contains refined fibres up to 30 times thinner than a cotton pad, which boast electrostatic properties to absorb makeup, dirt and excess oil like a magnet. The larger, square shaped design is perfect for the eye contour and covering larger surface area across the neck and décolletage.
1 x Magnet Cleanser Soap - to powerfully clean the GLOV after each use for optimum efficiency and lifespan.
1 x Travel Hanger - with suction cup to hang the GLOV up after each use.

舒缓和减轻肌肤的刺激感。 Murad 穆勒去红血丝敏感肌肤舒缓精华蕴含有透明质酸和卵磷脂，可增强肌肤的保护功能，防止肌肤受环境压力的影响。 糖脂和从植物中提取的天然保湿因子可使肌肤保持重要的水分，甘菊和山金车花能够舒缓和软化肌肤。

product_description:
The GLOV Hydro Cleansing Platinum Set provides everything you need for an effortless, simple and all-round cleanse without the need for a cleanser. Presented in branded gift packaging, the kit provides an innovative solution to leave skin feeling refreshed and purified. Suitable for all skin types.
On-The-Go Hydro Cleanser
Utilising advanced microfibre technology, the cleansing glove contains refined fibres up to 30 times thinner than a cotton pad, which boast electrostatic properties to absorb makeup, dirt and excess oil like a magnet without the need for a facial cleanser. The delicate and naturally antibacterial glove delivers a light yet effective clean with a gentle peeling effect to unveil skin that feels fresher and revitalised.
Comfort Hydro Cleanser
The Comfort Hydro Cleanser is a larger, square shaped design perfect for the eye contour and covering larger surface area across the neck and décolletage. Ideal for removing stubborn and heavy makeup in difficult-to-reach areas, the ‘heavy duty’ cleansing glove contains refined fibres up to 30 times thinner than a cotton pad, which boast electrostatic properties to sweep away dirt, excess oil and makeup including waterproof mascara.
Quick Treat Cleanser
Perfect for quick cleansing and fixes, the Quick Treat Cleanser is a compact version that fits in your purse for any-time any-place cleansing. The micro fibre tool effortlessly sweeps away mascara smudges or lipstick marks for clean and flawless results.

內含自古印加帝國時期被沿用至今的野生美登大果樹皮萃取，能提升肌膚的防禦修復力；康普茶發酵萃取物有助平滑細緻肌膚、淡化暗沉並均勻膚色；經特殊處理微細化的珍貴金粉，能輕易被肌膚吸收並有助將滋養成分帶入肌深層。

使用爽膚水後立即塗抹此精華，然後使用保濕面霜。

OSKIA Renaissance 文艺复兴系列 360 极致美白面霜可有效减缓肌肤衰老。这款面部保湿霜以所蕴含的维他命 A、C、E 和 F 而自诩，可将其用作强劲的抗衰老诀窍。 能够增强肌肤的弹性，明显淡化细纹，彻底地增强肌肤的水合作用。 让您的肌肤更有光泽，使其看起来更加健康。
适用于所有类型的肌肤，具有强化作用的活性成分可显著淡化色素沉着和消退肌肤变色，以使肤色更均匀，让肌肤恢复其自然光泽。 其强劲的营养成分可为肌肤补充营养，改善肤质，受自由基支持的抗氧化剂和自然的 SPF 8 保护膜可有效保护肌肤免受有害紫外线的伤害。
name: Renaissance 文艺复兴系列 360 极致美白面霜（40ml）

product_description:
UriageToléderm保湿滋润舒缓霜 ，可舒缓放松肌肤，使肌肤感觉舒适。这 款保湿乳液，专门针对超敏感、不耐受皮肤，和干性皮肤、极干性皮肤配制。
本产品可舒缓皮肤敏感、缓解皮肤紧绷；藻聚糖醛酸和Uriage温泉水，可深度滋润肌肤。 配方温和，具有预防性和治疗性；内含最小的活性成分，具有最大耐受性；修复敏感肌肤，使肌肤舒适，为肌肤补充水分。 可减少肌肤过敏性，同时提高皮肤抵抗力，使肌肤可抵御外界侵害。 呵护肌肤，使肌肤感觉舒适。 尤其适用于冬季或夏季过后，皮肤出现脱水时。
name: Toléderm保湿滋润舒缓霜（适用于敏感肌肤或不耐受肌肤或极干性皮肤）（50ml）

product_description:
Lancer Skincare presents the Younger Revealing Mask Intense Refill; an innovative, iron-based face mask treatment that features an advanced anti-ageing formula specially designed to be used alongside the interactive magnetic removal tool.
The silicone-encapsulated mineral powder acts as an ideal delivery method for Hydroxypinacolone Retinoate, which stimulates cell renewal and encourages natural collagen development for firmer and plumper looking skin with enhanced elasticity.
A small, electro-magnetic current is created when the magnet removes the mask, resulting in the age-defying active ingredients being left behind to ensure maximum penetration. Skin is left feeling clarified, revitalised and refreshed with the look of fine lines and wrinkles reduced.
name: Skincare Younger Revealing Mask Intense Refill

product_description:
使用The Method: Cleanser Blemish Control來控制您的皮膚，它是一種緊緻活膚潔面乳，能夠徹底清潔皮膚，同時控制生痘。 
專為瑕疵皮膚配方，該潔面乳使用水楊酸和溫和的去角質磨砂粒子以去除死皮、碎屑和微生物導致的痤瘡；打開並清潔毛孔深處，以減少多餘的皮脂，令肌膚感覺清爽和乾淨。它的微量茶樹油和薄荷油成分有助於保持皮膚健康。皮膚可獲得良好的控制和深層清潔。
name: Method: Cleanser Blemish Control (120ml)

product_description:
Treat dry lips to the AromaWorks Rejuvenate Lip Balm; an ultra-hydrating formula that utilises the finest natural ingredients to restore soft, smooth lips.
Harnessing the nourishing powers of Shea Butter and a blend of Moringa, Jojoba, Rose and Neroli Oils, the non-greasy balm moisturises and replenishes lips for long-lasting comfort.
name: Rejuvenate Lip Balm 10ml

product_description: Manuka Doctor 麦卢卡医生的这款面部修复护理油可起到改善肤色的效果，富含有丰富脂肪酸的专家级配方可有效提亮肤色，让肌肤看起来更年轻。 这款护理油适合各种肌肤类型，其主要活性成分麦卢卡精油可通过平衡肌肤的水分来提高肌肤的弹性，令肌肤恢复原有的丰盈。 减少细纹和皱纹，而所蕴含的纯天然水果萃取物和精油营养混合物可软化肌肤，增强肌肤的水合作用。 这款护理油可轻松被肌肤吸收，而不会有任何油腻感，能显著改善肌肤，让您容光焕发。
name: Doctor 麦卢卡医生面部修复护理油 30 ml

product_description:
Shiseido Men's Deep Cleansing Scrub含有清洁颗粒，能深入清洁毛孔，去除污垢和杂质，从而消除黑头。
这款磨砂膏能温和擦亮肌肤，清除表层皮屑，治理粗糙肌肤，还您洁净、清爽和柔软的肌肤。 - K.R
name: Mens Deep Cleansing Scrub (125ml)

product_description:
Experience a revitalising cleanse with Polaar Shine Control Face Cleanser, a soap-free face wash that performs a gentle yet effective cleanse.
Lifting away dirt and impurities, the non-foaming facial cleanser eliminates grime from skin without over-drying, and expertly controls oil and sebum production to promote a shine-free, mattified complexion. Skin is left feel refreshed, revived and toned.
name: Shine Control Face Cleanser 100ml

product_description:
Refresh and revitalise with the Gentlemen's Tonic Advanced Derma Care Hydro Fresh Cream Cleanser; a non-foaming formula that works to eliminate dirt and pollution without stripping moisture.
Harnessing the powers of Sweet Almond Oil and Betaine (a naturally-derived amino acid), the lightweight cleanser penetrates deep into skin to dissolve impurities, unclog pores and clear hair follicles. Bacteria-banishing Bergamot Essential Oil controls excess sebum production so you can experience smooth, soft skin with increased suppleness.
name: Tonic Advanced Derma Care Hydro Fresh Cream Cleanser 100ml

product_description:
Promote a clean and clear complexion with the Purity Face Cleanser from AromaWorks. Designed to remove all traces of makeup and dirt, the cleanser boasts ‘Actiglow C’, which works to condition the skin resulting in a smooth, touchably soft finish.
Infused with a nourishing blend of essential oils such as Apricot and Jojoba, the cleanser delivers intense hydration to the skin, helping to visibly relieve eczema and psoriasis. Vitamin E, Cocoa Butter and Neroli work harmoniously to moisturise skin, whilst reducing the appearance of fine lines and imperfections such as scars, acne and blemishes.
The gentle cleanser is suitable for even the most sensitive skin types and will leave the complexion ultra-clean and visibly clearer.
name: Purity Face Cleanser 100ml

product_description:
Protect and hydrate your skin with the Zelens Intense Defence Serum, a lightweight formula that works to keep skin safe from environmental factors, including three kinds of free radicals.
Rich in antioxidants, the potent serum combines 18 active ingredients, including Ginkgo Biloba and Vitamin E, and forms a protective barrier on skin; it defends against harmful free radicals and supports collagen to keep the complexion looking firmer and younger. Its hydrating nature improves skin texture, helping to reduce the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles.
name: Intense Defence Serum 30ml

product_description:
这款 Caudalie Dry Skin Care 套装适合需要温柔呵护的干性、受损的肌肤，它包含三件有效和奢华的产品，可以令您的肌肤营养丰富、水润亮泽。 K.D.
 Caudalie Vinosource Moisture Recovery霜40ml 这款 Caudalie 葡萄源滋润修复霜可以安慰和深层滋养肌肤。 它可以恢复水脂层、增强肌肤的屏障功能。
 Caudalie Vinosource 急救精华液 30ml 这款Caudalie葡萄源急救精华液可以捕获和持续深层滋润肌肤，令肌肤恢复水分平衡，感觉起来柔软水嫩。 
Caudalie 即时发泡Cleanser 150ml用Caudalie即时发泡Cleanser清除肌肤的杂质。 这是一款轻型洁面乳，可以转换成空气泡沫，清除毛孔的所有彩妆、污垢和油脂痕迹，深层而温和地清洁肌肤。
name: Dry Skin Care套装

product_description:
Purify and tone congested skin with the Black Clean Up Pore Water Finisher from South Korean skincare brand Mizon.
Non-irritating, the plant-based toner gently exfoliates to effectively draw out dirt and impurities from deep within pores to ensure a superior clean. Enriched with Papaya Fruit and Gypsophila Root extracts, it effectively balances skin’s natural pH, regulates sebum production and maintains moisture levels. Expect a smooth, deeply cleansed and shine-free complexion with the appearance of pores visibly reduced.
name: Black Clean Up Pore Water Finisher 150ml

product_description:
使用Peter Thomas Roth Oiless Oil 100% Purified Squalane来滋养您的皮肤，同时让您感到清爽，没有任何油腻感。 此款轻盈型润肤产品适合所有皮肤类型使用，能够温和地柔化您的皮肤，同时可以显著消除细纹和皱纹的出现。
本产品的成分有从甘蔗中提取的角鲨烷油脂，可以深入渗透到您的肌肤中，强效快速补水，同时仍然能让您的皮肤保持透气的状态。 除了滋养功效之外，皮肤弹性也会得到改善，能够让您的皮肤更为紧致光滑，看上去更为年轻。 - L.M.使用说明：
name: Thomas Roth Oiless Oil 100% Purified Squalane

product_description:
Reignite a youthful glow with Manuka Doctor's Brightening Facial Oil; a luxurious, fast-absorbing formula that works to restore a luminous, fresh complexion.
Fortified with a deeply nourishing, antioxidant-rich blend of Argan, Rosehip and Avocado Oils, the anti-ageing treatment defends against oxidative damage and environmental aggressors, whilst a dose of Manuka Oil leaves skin smooth, refined and even toned. Boosts elasticity and minimises the appearance of age spots.
name: Doctor Brightening Facial Oil 25ml

product_description:
Brighten up tired peepers with the Advanced Overnight Hydrating Eye Repair from skinChemists. Featuring a cooling metal rollerball applicator, the intensely hydrating serum is specifically formulated to soothe and nourish the delicate eye area.
Utilising advanced skincare technologies, the formula features the unique Beautifeye complex, derived from the Persian Silk Tree, which has been clinically proven to help fade the appearance of dark circles and eliminate puffiness by stimulating blood flow. Gransil DMCM-5 absorbs facial oil and leaves a matte finish, whilst Aquaxyl boosts the natural levels of Hylauronic Acid for long lasting hydration. Skin is left looking plumped and refreshed, with the appearance of fine lines reduced.
name: Advanced Overnight Hydrating Eye Repair 15ml

product_description:
Uriage Isoliss滚涂式抗皱眼霜 ，可延缓眼部衰老迹象。本产品功效强大，保护肌肤免遭日常因素的损害，如：疲劳、压力、污染等。
采用了独特的滚动式按摩涂抹，富含该品牌的温泉水（原产地为法国阿尔卑斯山），可加强皮肤天然屏障，同时减少细纹、皱纹和鱼尾纹，使眼部肌肤更光滑、轮廓更精致。
减少黑眼圈和眼部浮肿，使眼部皮肤年轻靓丽。
name: Isoliss 滚涂式抗皱眼霜 (15ml)

product_description:
Smooth and refresh the delicate eye area with the Advanced Bee Venom Collagen Eye Repair Serum from skinChemists. Featuring a cooling metal rollerball applicator, the advanced formula utilises the plumping effects of potent Bee Venom and leaves skin feeling firmer and the appearance of dark circles is reduced.
It’s bursting with active ingredients including Coloursoft and Gransil DMCM-5, which deeply hydrate and help to blur the appearance of fine lines. Ronaflar and Timron Super Sheen work to even skin tone, whilst Hyaluronic Acid aims to maintain moisture levels and encourage cell cohesion and collagen synthesis. Suitable for everyday use, peepers are left looking radiant and revitalised.
name: Advanced Bee Venom Collagen Eye Repair Serum 15ml

product_description: RENU 瞬间舒缓面膜将抚平细纹，紧实面部轮廓，面色焕发光彩润泽。 富含人参和镁成分， 能温和地放松肌肉，让肌肤柔滑，具有爽肤和紧实的功效；特别添加了维生素C和维生素B5，让肌肤焕发自然光采。 这款面膜具有密集补水、亮白肤色的功效，非常适合晚上派对结束后使用。 - L.M.
name: 瞬间舒缓面膜（100ml）

product_description: Shiseido The Skincare Essentials Instant Eye & Lip MakeUp Remover能有效去除最为顽固的化妆品。 这款卸妆产品蕴含木糖醇，能留住唇部和眼部肌肤必需的水分，令肌肤清新顺滑。 -SA
name: The Skincare Essentials Instant Eye & Lip MakeUp Remover (125ml)

product_description:
使用Aromatherapy Associates Anti-Age 瞬时 Skin Firming Serum可迅速恢复肌肤的紧致和光泽，它是一款作用神速的保护性精华液，其专门配方可消除细纹。 它可产生瞬时的光泽与紧致效果。
Aromatherapy Associates Anti-Age 瞬时 Skin Firming Serum 的配方中含有落叶松、海藻和石榴籽油；保湿性的落叶松和海藻提取物可使您的肌肤饱满，有健康的色调；而具有恢复活力作用的石榴籽提取物可保护肌肤免受环境的侵害。
使用说明：
name: Associates Anti-Age瞬时Skin Firming Serum（30ml）

product_description:
Perk up and restore dull, mature skin with the Advanced Snail Serum from skinChemists. Utilising an innovative age-defying formula, the elixir is rich in antioxidants, vitamins and essential oils to help smooth and plump for a more flawless looking complexion.
Its unique formula is enriched with naturally protective Snail Secretion, which aims to combat signs of ageing by reducing visible dark spots and to form a barrier against free radical damage. Hyaluronic Acid helps to boost moisture levels, whilst Starflower Oil is rich in fatty acids that aim to replenish skin tissue. Fine lines appear reduced and skin has a healthy glow.
name: Advanced Snail Serum 30ml

product_description: 使用 TANWORX 美黑泡沫（正常至中等），让肌肤持久美黑。 这款美黑泡沫非常易于涂抹，不留痕迹，能够立即加深肤色，逐渐散发健康的古铜光泽。 采用有色配方，因此在涂抹时能够清楚看到已涂抹的区域，达到均匀自然的美黑效果。 -SA
name: 美黑泡沫 - 正常至中等（150ml）

product_description:
Radical Skincare 多效亮白精華含有抗氧化劑和活性舒緩成分，可實現最大的保護和修復功能，是減少表面瑕疵的理想選擇，同時還可讓肌膚彈潤亮白。這款抗衰老精華還可用作皮膚磨砂膏，產品特別採用獨特的Trylacel 技術，內含維生素C 和海藻提取物，可抑制暗斑和瑕疵的出現，讓肌膚活力重現，如獲新生。 KD 
 使用說明：
name: Skincare 多效亮白精华

product_description:
Illuminate, hydrate and refine the complexion with Rose Quartz Age Defence Youth Facial Oil from skinChemists. The innovative oil is designed to give the skin an extra boost, resulting in a vibrant and healthy looking glow. Infused with Rose Quartz, the treatment works to reveal soft, fresh and youthful looking skin.
Rich in Rose Otto Oil, a divinely fragranced, multi-beneficial ingredient, the formula works to rebalance combination skin types whilst also providing essential nourishment and hydration to drier, or more mature complexions. Anti-bacterial and anti-oxidant properties aim to repair and protect the skin, visibly firming and toning. Finished with a blend of Almond and Olive Oil, popular for keeping skin fresh and clear and for offering long-lasting hydration.
Housed in elegant glass packaging with a stylish pipette applicator for hygienic application and a super-luxe feel.
name: Rose Quartz Age Defence Youth Facial Oil 15ml

product_description:
KORRES Almond Blossom保湿霜专为干性皮肤及特干燥皮肤设计。 可滋养水润肌肤、舒缓敏感型肌肤，令肌肤舒适放松。
富含希腊有机杏仁花及黑燕麦萃取物等成分，可被肌肤快速吸收。其奶油质地可强化肌肤天然保湿屏障、抗氧化保护功效可使肌肤免受环境侵害。其他成分如：低分子透明质酸，可持久保湿、深层滋润肌肤。
name: Almond Blossom保湿霜（适合干性皮肤及极干皮肤）40ml

product_description:
Renew and revitalise with the NUXE Nuxellence® Eye Area Contour; a unique treatment that utilises light-reflecting particles, resurfacing powders and 'soft focus' silicone spheres to restore luminous, youthful-looking eyes.
Infused with Hyaluronic Acid and Passionflower, the lightweight, quick-absorbing formula delivers long-lasting moisture and hydration, whilst helping to minimise the appearance of fine lines, wrinkles and crow's feet for a smoother, more refined texture.
The anti-ageing treatment gives a subtle apricot tint that adjusts to suit individual skin tone and dries to a powdery, matte finish. Features a massage tip applicator to soothe, rejuvenate and combat signs of fatigue. Expect a flawless, radiant eye contour.
name: Nuxellence Eye Area Contour 15ml

product_description:
Treat your skin to the nourishing properties of Borghese Effetto Immediato Spa Soothing Tonic, a cleansing and calming facial mist specially formulated for dry, delicate skin.
Working to cleanse away last traces of makeup, the rebalancing formula combines Calendula, Butcher’s Broom and Sage with Hyaluronic Acid to intensely hydrate the complexion whilst prepping it for the next steps in your skincare regime. After use, skin feels fresh, clean and comfortable.
name: Effetto Immediato Spa Soothing Tonic (248ml)

product_description:
Aromatherapy Associates Renew Moisturising Lip Balm creates silky-soft, smooth lips.
The luxurious formula has many benefits, including:
• Ancient healing and soothing properties of Calendula.
• Protects lips from moisture loss and over exposure to the outdoor elements.
• Relieves dryness and adds a natural, healthy-looking sheen.
name: Associates Moisturising Lip Balm 7ml

product_description:
使用 Eucerin® Anti-Age Hyaluron-Filler Day Cream for Normal to Combination Skin SPF15 + UVA Protection，恢复和保持年轻的肌肤。这是一种经过皮肤测试的抗衰老配方，致力于让下垂的肌肤丰满起来，并通过 UVB 和 UVA 过滤防护防止早衰。
随着皮肤的衰老，天然存在的透明质酸水平大大降低，导致皱纹和皮肤表面细纹的形成。 为了解决这一问题，高级日霜添加了高、低透明质酸和生物活性甘氨酸皂苷（一种支持肌肤自身透明质酸的成分），由内而外有效地抚平皱纹，实现明显更顺滑、更青春的肌肤。
这种创新的融合适用于中性至混合性肌肤，避免早衰并预防最深的皱纹。 也可兼作一款优秀的底妆。 - K.N
name: Anti-Age Hyaluron-Filler Day Cream for Normal to Combination Skin SPF15 + UVA Protection (50ml)

product_description:
Restore luminosity with the Su-Man Facial Glow Rejuvenating Mask; a radiance-reviving, ten-minute treatment that works to hydrate and rejuvenate lack-lustre skin.
Fortified with Advanced Bio Cellulose Technology, the face mask has been fermented in Coconut Water and produced at a low temperature for maximum effect, allowing ingredients to absorb into the deeper layers of skin for immediate and long-term benefits.
With a unique design that hugs facial contours, its nourishing blend of Orchid Extract, Brown Algae and Sea Water mineral concentrate delivers intense moisture, whilst helping to minimise the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles. Expect a soft, supple complexion with a youthful glow.
name: Facial Glow Rejuvenating Mask - 4x30ml

product_description: 一步到位唤醒您的倦怠双眼。 这款Shiseido Men's Eye Soother蕴含薄荷醇成分，能清凉眼周肌肤；同时淡化疲态和岁月痕迹。 本品专门针对黑眼圈、浮肿和细纹，具有抗衰老和抗皱功效，有效维持健康肤色。 - K.R
name: Mens Eye Soother (15ml)

product_description:
Shiseido推出的这款Daily Bronze Moisturizing Emulsion能赋予肌肤完美的古铜色泽。 本品温和滋润，适合所有肌肤类型，能逐步在面部和身体肌肤上打造出令人羡慕的金黄色泽。 有效软化肌肤，令肌肤极致丝滑；易于吸收，非常适合晒黑肌肤，有效维持美黑肤色，同时恢复肌肤的完美润泽质感。 添加的基安达宁成分能有效抵御环境因素的侵害。 - K.N.
请注意：本品不含防晒成分，不具有防晒功能
name: Daily Bronze Moisturizing Emulsion (150ml)

product_description: 資生堂 超時空唇部眼部乳霜（15ml）是一款含有保濕成分的產品，幫助減少唇週，和眼部的皺紋。這款產品含有資生堂專利的成分幫助減少在嘴周和眼周生成的皺紋。這款產品的成分能夠使肌膚更加緊緻和柔滑使肌膚散發自然光澤。
name: 超时空唇部眼部乳霜（15ml）

product_description: Shiseido Men's Deep Wrinkle Corrector能有效减少和预防皱纹出现。 本品成分丰富、功效显著，能深入渗透肌肤，平滑皱纹，紧致肌肤。 富含Damage Defence Complex成分，能巩固肌肤的天然保护屏障，帮助肌肤焕发年轻闪亮的光彩。 - K.R
name: Mens Deep Wrinkle Corrector (30ml)

product_description:
PAYOT滚擦式塑型护理液  是一种抗衰老凝胶精华液。该精华液可护理肌肤、重塑您的面部、颈部、肩部。
该精华液含肽类、抗氧化剂、透明质酸、Acti-Lift 合成物。凝胶可提升皮肤弹力。精华液从滚擦端挤出，且该滚擦端可对皮肤进行轻柔的按摩，以刺激肌肉、提高皮肤整体功效。 这样，面部轮廓将得到重塑。
這款資生堂肌膚清潔面膜能使您的肌膚散發自然光澤,和重新恢復緊質. 成分中含有深海礦物泥來疏通被堵住的毛孔,同時含有桉樹油鎮定肌膚。這款泥膜適用於各種肌膚和年齡層，它將會使您的肌膚看起來年輕和煥然一新。

The Christian BRETON Slim and Lift Face Sculptor is a powerful, multi-dimensional treatment to tackle the look of puffiness, sagging skin and wrinkles.

energy bank™ 系列所含的丰富能量令人在清晨身心俱爽。 这一系列包含各种天然面部、身体和沐浴产品。A.B.

product_description:
Transform skin with the DermaTx Clarify Microdermabrasion System; a hand-held device with a targeted specialist cream that has been expertly designed to combat acne, blackheads and enlarged pores. Ideal for oily and congested skin types.
The DermaTx Facial Tool utilises advanced micro-pulsing vibrations to deeply massage and exfoliate skin, resulting in a smoother and more refined looking surface layer, while the foam brush head optimises the transferal of the Clarify Microdermabrasion Cream.
This professional grade treatment contains ultra-refined mineral crystals to gently buff away dead skin cells and unclog pores, effectively stimulating microcirculation and cell renewal for skin that looks polished and revitalised.
An advanced blend of 2% Salicylic Acid and Retinol-rich Vitamin A works to absorb excess sebum production and clear away impurities, while the combination of Manuka and Tea Tree Oils seek to combat bacteria and decongest skin for skin that feels refreshed, soothed and clarified.
The advanced system is an at-home alternative to professional microdermabrasion treatments, delivering effective results to reveal a purified, refined and more even complexion with the look of breakouts and blemishes reduced.
The Set Contains: 
1 x Clarify Microdermabrasion Cream (75ml)
1 x Water Resistant Facial Tool
1 x Cradle
1 x Exfoliating Foam Head
1 x Manual
1 x FREE Cleansing Brush Head 
Please Note: It is recommended that the attachment heads are changed regularly, at least every three months.

Hy3 - 具有补水锁水的滋润功效。 这种成分还能够促进胶原蛋白，丰盈并紧实肌肤，令肌肤更年轻。

Ao3 - 这一富含抗氧化因子的成分具有修复和保护功效功效，可以保护肌肤抵御自由基和紫外线的伤害，并修复肌肤已有的损伤。

The addition of Hyaluronic Acid and Glycerin ensures skin feels hydrated and comfortable, forming a protective barrier against dryness and inflammation. Suitable for daily use, the anti-ageing serum leaves your complexion looking healthy, smooth and replenished.
