product_description:
Revive your skin whilst you sleep with Mizon Snail Wrinkle Care Sleeping Pack, an overnight face mask that works with your skin's natural renewal process to promote smoother, younger-looking skin.
Infused with 50% Snail extract and a host of hydrating and skin-plumping ingredients, the slightly tacky mask works in synergy with your skin overnight, delivering peptides and herbal and botanical extracts to help increase elasticity and moisture for a healthier, firmer-looking complexion come morning. Suitable for all skin types, the gentle mask contains nourishing Glycerin, Olive Oil and Shea Butter to leave the face feeling smooth and comfortable.
name: Snail Wrinkle Care Sleeping Pack 80ml

product_description:
使用 Dr. Brandt 柏瑞特医生毛孔清透洁面乳，可有效祛除杂质、油脂和化妆品残留物，细致并打开堵塞的毛孔，让肌肤感觉超级清爽；这款非干燥型洁面乳配方中含有水杨酸、茶树精油和柳树皮。
配方中含有的水杨酸可祛除角质和坏死的肌肤细胞，保持毛孔清洁，防止堵塞；茶树精油是一种重要的抗菌剂；柳树皮可净化肌肤， Dr. Brandt 柏瑞特医生毛孔清透洁面乳是油型肌肤/混合型肌肤的理想选择，通过深度清洁可强效细致毛孔。
使用说明：
name: Brandt 柏瑞特医生毛孔清透洁面乳（105 毫升）

product_description:
使用 Iluminage's Skin 活肤手套有助于对抗衰老的早期迹象，这对抗衰老无指手套已注入获专利的铜技术，该技术经临床证明可以减少手部皱纹和老年斑的出现。
这款柔软丝滑的手套精心嵌入高科技铜（肌肤中含有的天然复合物，研究证明它在肌肤自然更新过程中起重要作用），这款丝滑手套有助于持续改善肤色和肤质，白天和晚上均可舒适佩戴。 这款丝滑不刺激的手套可进行机洗。 长时间佩戴，可让手部肌肤更加丰盈，使其看起来更光滑、更年轻。
name: 活肤美容手套 M/L

product_description:
Triumph & DisasterNo Dice 防晒霜SPF 50可保护您的肌肤不受有害紫外线的侵害，高防护面部防晒乳液形成肌肤的屏蔽，
不会过于油腻或弄脏衣物。
87％的天然成分配方中含锌和氧化Titanium，有自然防晒效果，同时Green Tea和Jojoba酯类具有抗氧化剂和保湿性能，防晒霜则可以有效保护并强化肌肤。 其非美白和被肌肤快速吸收的质地可完美地融入肌肤，不留痕迹，同时可提供出色保护，不会刺激肌肤或阻塞毛孔。
Skin是在阳光下受到保护，避免过早老化。
name: & Disaster No Dice 防晒霜 SPF 50 100ml

product_description:
The Method: Nourish Moisturiser Blemish Control專門用於油性皮膚，提供長效保濕，去除衰老的跡象，不會堵塞毛孔或造成粉刺。 
輕薄、無油的護理增強肌膚的鎖水能力。水楊酸消除瑕疵致病細菌，從內至外的精緻清潔，使肌膚的外觀精緻而平滑。 
獨特的二肽發揮其作用，以減少皺紋的出現，呈現出更年輕、煥發光澤的膚色並增加柔軟度。用後肌膚會得到恢復，變得清爽，重新煥發光采。
name: Method: Nourish Moisturiser Blemish Control (50ml)

product_description:
Green People Foaming Face Wash 含有绿茶、金缕梅和玫瑰天竺葵，是一种温和的天然洗面奶，适用于所有肌肤类型。 这款无皂洗面奶经有机认证，可清洁肌肤或污染物和杂质。
Green People Foaming Face Wash 令肌肤感觉超级清新纯净，可深层洁净肌肤并去除杂质。 本品还具备天然爽肤特性，有助于预防和减少粉刺。
Green People 使用非空运的可回收包装。 产品只含有少量手工制作的纯天然有机成分，确保收到产品时尽可能新鲜。 本品也适用于严格素食者和素食主义者。
使用说明：
name: People Foaming Face Wash (100ml)

product_description:
NUXE Nirvanesque Cream - Normal Combination Skin可有效预防皱纹出现。 本品为您提供舒适的护肤体验，能防止肌肤紧张或失去韧性，预防出现蠢蠢欲动的可怕皱纹和细纹。
这款护肤霜蕴含蓝莲子、牡丹和澳洲坚果油，再结合其强大的滋养功效，能卓效平和肌肤，舒缓哪怕是最干燥的肌肤部位。 NUXE坚信植物成分的强大力量，秉承功效与快感相结合的研制理念，从而打造出这些深受喜爱的产品。-SA
使用说明：
涂抹于洁净的肌肤
name: Nirvanesque Cream - Normal Combination Skin (50ml)

product_description:
利用Murad Skin Smoothing Polish温和去角质，这款丰富乳霜磨砂膏可疏通毛孔，展现明亮、健康的肌肤。 利用抛光微珠配制，以擦洗表面，去除积聚的杂质、死皮细胞和多余油脂，同时石榴酸可收紧毛孔，获得精致肌肤。
加入金缕梅和肉桂提取物，该磨砂膏可平衡油性、易生暗疮肌肤而不剥离水分。 抗氧化剂石榴籽油可保护肌肤免受自由基的伤害，防止暗哑，还您光滑、柔软和光彩照人的肌肤。 E.N.
name: Skin Smoothing Polish (100ml)

product_description:
JASON Vitamin K Plus Intensive Nourishing Skin Cream 可减轻褪色并最大限度地减少细血管丝和淤血。 这款面霜适用于淡化红肿和黑眼圈，令肌肤柔软光滑。
JASON Vitamin K Plus Intensive Nourishing Cream 富含马栗、金盏花和松果，可减少血管破裂和瘀斑，并在最大程度上缓解皮肤发红和黑眼圈。 这款独特的护肤霜可滋养滋润干性肌肤，令肌肤如丝般柔软水嫩。
使用说明：
name: Lightening Vitamin K Cream Plus (60g)

product_description:
能迅速清潔化妝品和雜質，同時不影響肌膚表皮的生態系統。清爽的質地適合所有肌膚類型；特別是容易泛油光的肌膚。 
溫和有效，讓肌膚徹底清潔，純淨無暇。修復肌膚表皮生態系統，讓肌膚更健康清潔，同時讓肌膚清爽，富有光澤。 
獨家技術： 
使用說明：
name: Esthederm 雅诗敦无粒子洁面凝胶 (150ml)

product_description:
您梦想着拥有剔透的肤色吗？ 那么请尝试使用 Alpha-H 金水舒缓精华面膜。 它可有效祛除死皮细胞，为肌肤深层补水，令全新的细胞丰盈而有活力，让您的肌肤看起来更丰盈水润，更有光泽。
Alpha-H 金水舒缓精华面膜含有 15% 乙醇酸，能够让您的肌肤焕然一新，有效淡化细纹、皱纹、色斑和疤痕，小麦胚芽油具有滋养肌肤的功效，能增强肌肤的弹性。 蜂蜜可舒缓和减少红血丝，而玫瑰和薰衣草精油具有平静和修复肌肤的功效，这款面膜非常适合参加宴会前护理肌肤或用于瞬间改善肤色。
使用说明：
name: 金水舒缓精华面膜（100g）

product_description:
Peter Thomas Roth南瓜酵素面膜具有去角质、去除死皮、增添肌肤光泽的三重功效，令肌肤焕然新生。 有效对抗暗沉、老化和充血的皮肤，采用创新配方，均匀肤色，同时抚平细纹和皱纹，令肤色展现年轻光泽。
这款产品混了多种功能强大的成分，能有效去除肌肤的缺陷，包括：能够轻柔去除角质的天然成分南瓜酶；能够去除表层暗沉细胞的焕肤成分阿尔法羟基酸，和微晶磨皮治疗中使用的润肤剂铝氧化物晶体，令肌肤柔滑，容光焕发。 期待重现活力的肤色，更少的细纹和皱纹。 - K.N.
name: Thomas Roth南瓜酵素面膜

product_description:
Tackle dry, lacklustre complexions with the H2 Elemental Energy Firming Foam Mask, the latest skincare innovation from Perricone MD.
Utilising the proprietary H<sub>2</sub> Energy Complex™, the ultra-refined formula harnesses the smallest molecule in the universe – Hydrogen – to deliver maximum hydration without leaving behind greasy residue or feeling heavy. It deeply penetrates the surface layers of skin, working to optimise water retention levels for long-lasting results.
The face mask immediately moisturises and nourishes with a unique gel-to-foam texture, which works to effectively reset skin for renewed vitality and radiance. Your complexion appears brighter and refreshed, while feeling firmer and more supple.
name: MD H2 Elemental Energy Firming Foam Mask 100ml

product_description:
Soothe sensitive skin with the yes to Cotton Comforting Facial Moisturiser; a lightweight, quick-absorbing formula that works to nourish and hydrate your complexion.
Infused with Cotton Seed Oil, the antioxidant-rich cream replenishes and rejuvenates delicate, allergy-prone skin, whilst protecting against daily environmental aggressors for long-lasting comfort. Skin is soft, supple and radiant without greasy residue. Housed in a pump bottle for mess-free application.
name: to Cotton Comforting Facial Moisturiser

product_description:
Institut Esthederm 雅诗敦高效防护防晒面霜让您尽享更多的阳光，它可最大限度地减少肌肤的不良反应。 这款防晒乳能够保护细胞 DNA，防止明显的光照衰老迹象，优化细胞的能量环境。
其高度保护配方蕴含有丰富的抗炎活性成分，有助于降低超敏肌肤的敏感性，确保肌肤具备最佳阳光耐受力。
name: Esthederm 雅诗敦高效防护防晒面霜 50ml

product_description:
Submerge skin in nourishment with the Spa Magik Organiks Wrinkle Therapy Peel & Reveal Marine Mask; an anti-ageing formula that refines the complexion.
Simply combine with water and the formula transforms into a rich face mask that dries within fifteen minutes and can be peeled away effortlessly. Enriched with Vitamin C and Algae extract, the mask envelops skin in a supercharge of nutrients that works to reveal a radiant complexion. Once peeled away, wrinkles and fine lines are visibly reduced, leaving the complexion smooth and youthful.
name: Magik Organiks Wrinkle Therapy Peel & Reveal Marine Mask

product_description: skinChemists 眼部紧肤精华将提亮并紧致眼部轮廓周围的娇嫩肌肤，让双眸明媚动人。 富含多种高效紧致成分和淡化成分，它可以抚平细纹，减少眼袋和黑眼圈的出现。 - L.M.
name: 眼部紧肤精华（12ml）

product_description:
Target signs of ageing with the ALGENIST Firming and Lifting Eye Gel; a breakthrough formula that utilises high-quality, effective ingredients to restore a smooth, youthful-looking eye contour.
Synergising unique ProPeptide3 and the brand's patented Alguronic Acid, the weightless, fast-absorbing gel tightens and tones the delicate skin around the eyes for a firmed, refined appearance. Helps to minimise the look of fine lines, wrinkles and crow's feet, whilst moisturising and hydrating skin without sticky residue.
name: Firming and Lifting Eye Gel 30ml

product_description:
Transform your complexion with the First Aid Beauty 3-in-1 Superfruit Color Correcting Cushion, a skin-correcting formula with sponge-drenched delivery system.
Housed in a compact, the packaging contains a pigment-soaked cushion that allows you to 'squeeze out' product by tapping on the saturated sponge with the application puff. Infused with weightless, colour-correcting pigments that help to counteract dullness, neutralise redness and even skin tone, the formula blends easily onto skin and diminishes the appearance of common skin concerns. The Green hue combats redness, the pink colour evens skin tone, and the purple tone reduces dullness.
Enriched with beneficial ingredients, it combines a superfruit blend of Dragon Fruit, Kiwi and Blueberry extracts to calm and nourish, whilst Niacinamide and Beeswax promote bounce, tone and softness. Skin tone looks balanced, hydrated and corrected.
name: Aid Beauty 3-in-1 Superfruit Color Correcting Cushion

product_description: Cleanse and refresh skin with Purifying Astringent Pads from Wilma Schumann. Ideal for normal to acne prone skin, the exfoliating pads work to remove excess oil, dead skin cells and makeup wedged deep into pores to leave skin clear and smooth. Specially formulated with an antibacterial solution of Salicylic and Glycolic Acids, they’re gentle enough for daily use and super convenient for a clean and clear complexion.
name: Schumann Purifying Astringent Pads (60 Pads)

product_description: Designed specifically for men, the Polaar Purifying Face Scrub works to cleanse and nourish the skin, leaving you with a soft, crystal clear complexion. It removes dead skin cells, rebalances sebum levels, removes excess oils and prevents ingrown hairs on the face, meaning that your skin is left in perfect condition. K.D.
name: Purifying Face Scrub 100ml

product_description:
Jack Black Pure Clean Daily Facial Cleanser 是一款二合一洁面爽肤水。 其不含硫酸盐的表面活性剂轻盈配方能渗透肌肤，去除积聚的污垢和油脂，呈现洁净、滋润和清新的肤色。
这款洁面爽肤水采用该品牌的 PureScience® 复合物配制而成，富含舒缓的金缕梅、经认证的有机鼠尾草叶和迷迭香，令肌肤愈合并减少红肿。 做好剃须准备，防止毛发向内生长，避免灼热和刺激感；提拉胡须，以便剃得更光；同时洋甘菊能舒缓肌肤，保持持久舒适。 E.N.
name: Black Pure Clean Daily Facial Cleanser (177ml)

product_description:
The ALGENIST Genius White Brightening Moisture Softener Toner helps to combat dullness and sallow skin with a selection of powerful biotechnological ingredients that intensively hydrate and revitalise.  
Gentle enough for all skin types, the refined formula balances age-defying extract of Alguronic Acid with an exclusive AlgaBright Complex, which work in tandem to soothe and purify without disrupting skin’s natural moisture levels. Non-abrasive brightening agents help alleviate the look of discolouration and dark spots including sun damage, while the appearance of fine lines are smoothed. Ideal for sensitive skin, it leaves your complexion feeling soft and supple with a more even and luminous tone.
name: Genius White Brightening Moisture Softener Toner 150ml

product_description:
Elemis 水疗蜡烛，为您的房间打造一个平静温暖的氛围。 这种蜡烛由天然蜡制成，投射出时尚的闪烁光。
散发出乳香、没药、肉桂、柑橘、鼠尾草、丁香、黑胡椒等的气味。
燃烧时间：  120小时
name: 水疗蜡烛

product_description:
Brighten and refine your skin with MÁDARA Brightening AHA Peel Mask, an exfoliating formula infused with Alpha Hydroxy Acids to perform deep cleansing action whilst sloughing away dead skin cells to promote a radiant and smooth complexion.
Combining Fruit Acids and Vitamin C with Lactic Acid and Elderflower, the mask performs gentle exfoliation to remove dulling dead skin whilst decongesting pores and diminishing the appearance of age spots and lines. Its smoothing and brightening properties help to illuminate dull, tired skin. Expect a soft, smooth and renewed complexion with a healthy glow.
name: Brightening AHA Peel Mask 60ml

product_description:
men-ü 便攜D-TOX“深層清潔”面膜可去除雜質和控製過多的油脂與油光。本品的獨特配方包括強效成份，包含高嶺土、金縷梅和氧化鋅，去死皮，疏通堵塞的毛孔，展現健康的肌膚。該快乾型面膜適合中性、混合性或油性肌膚，可深度清潔，令肌膚更加柔滑緊緻。 EN 
 使用說明：均勻塗抹於清潔後的肌膚，停留5-10分鐘，等待乾燥。用溫水徹底清洗，用毛巾拍幹。每週兩次，效果最佳。
name: D-TOX 便携面膜 (15ml)

product_description:
Experience intense hydration with Time Bomb's Complexion Cocktail with a shot of H2Omega, a refreshing fluid formula that helps to counteract dehydration by replenishing moisture and essential fatty acids.
Perfect for dry, parched skin, the solution's fluid texture enables water soluble essential fatty acids to be instantly absorbed into skin which hydrate and quench to leave the complexion dewy, supple and fresh. Utilising a host of moisturising ingredients, the formula contains a proprietary Hyaluronic Acid Complex that helps attract and retain optimal moisture, and a shot of “H2Omega” that combines Chia Oil with Coconut Oil to deliver rich omegas whilst intensely hydrating.
Skin feels incredibly hydrated, refreshed and supple.
name: Bomb Complexion Cocktail with a Shot of H2Omega 100ml

product_description: 原始純粹蒟蒻面部海綿撲 只使用100% 頂級食品級蒟蒻植物根。 蒟蒻因1500 多年以來日本人用於增進健康而聞名，最早在六世紀用作藥材。  • 100% 天然海綿 • 溫和剝落 • 100% 無染色 • 100% 無添加劑 • 100% 生物可降解 • 天然可持續 • 環保安全自然潤澤植物纖維，具有天然鹼性，因此可平衡肌膚雜質和油脂的酸性。海綿的獨特網狀結構，輕輕按摩肌膚，並刺激血液流動和肌膚細胞新生。使肌膚乾淨舒適，自然清爽！ 除非您真正想要，否則無需使用其他潔面乳或潔面皂。如果您選擇使用其他潔面乳或潔面皂，您可以減少平時的用量，因為海綿將產生更多泡沫，可以更加深入清潔。
name: 100% 纯粹

product_description:
Chantecaille 眼部玫瑰卸妆乳  ，带您体验舒缓的肌肤清洗。这款温和有效的清洁乳液，可熟练地卸去娇嫩眼周围的化妆品。  
内含大量舒缓的、富含维生素的植物萃取物成分。配方混合了软化的纯净玫瑰水及具有镇静作用的洋甘菊，可对敏感肌肤进行温和的清洗。内含芦荟，可滋润肌肤、减少肌肤泛红；甘草提取物，具有舒缓特性，使双眼清新放松。
不含动物性成分、邻苯二甲酸盐、硫酸盐洗涤剂、矿物油、对羟基苯甲酸酯、凡士林、棕榈油、合成色、合成香料、转基因生物等成分。
name: 眼部玫瑰卸妆乳

product_description:
Treat your complexion to the Fabulous Dynamic Cleanse and Moisture Duo from bliss. Combining a luxurious face wash and ultra-hydrating cream, the kit will leave skin fresh, soft and replenished.
Fabulous Foaming Face Wash (197ml)
Refresh your complexion with the gentle yet effective 2-in-1 cleanser and exfoliator. Carefully buffs away dead skin cells with the round exfoliating beads, as well as removing make-up, dirt and impurities. Enriched with Rose Hips, Chamomile and Passion Flower, it calms and soothes your skin to leave it wonderfully clean and clear. A bliss best-seller, it's the perfect multi-tasker.
Drench 'n' Quench Moisturiser (50ml)
A cream-to-water moisturiser that utilises the brand's unique Hydrozome™ technology to drench skin with over 10,000 marine micro-droplets for optimum hydration. Refreshing and lightweight on the skin, the cream can be used morning and evening to replenish, nourish and lock in moisture.
name: Fabulous Dynamic Cleanse and Moisture Duo (Worth £49.00)

product_description:
用丹尼斯·格罗斯博士Hydra-Pure®无油Moisture 令您的肌肤营养丰富、湿润而不油腻。 这款轻质保湿乳的配方蕴含专有的螯合物，混合了保护肌肤免受有害元素的化合物，可以快速吸收，滋润您的肌肤，同时抗氧化剂、肽和维生素的混合有助于减缓明显的的衰老迹象而不会造成刺激。
它非常适合油性、混合性和暗疮皮肤，可保护、修复和平衡肌肤，令肌肤柔软、光滑柔顺，看起来更加年轻。 - L.M. 使用说明：早晨和晚上 Smooth地涂抹到清洁、干燥的皮肤上。

Leave skin revitalised and glowing with the Advanced Retinol Serum from skinChemists. The unique formula is composed with Retinol and Hyaluronic acid, renowned for their anti-oxidant properties that protect the skin from external aggression, leaving it refreshed and purified with a visible glow.
Encapsulated Retinol within the serum is released slowly and works to increase cell production at the top layer of the skin, leaving it visibly smoother and more youthful looking. An increase in collagen production helps to visibly plump the skin and reduce the appearance of hyper-pigmentation caused by sun damage.
name: Advanced Retinol Serum 30ml

product_description:
PAYOT 柏姿营养重组霜可有效舒缓和保护干燥的肌肤，它是一款含有丰富极致营养成分的保湿霜，可帮助肌肤恢复应有的柔软，为干燥或极其干燥的肌肤补充水分。
这款面霜采用一系列解肌成分，其人造油脂复合物能够为肌肤提供所需的重要营养成分，而日本粗草萃取物（是一种荣获专利的活性成分）可增强保湿效果。 可强化滋养和强化肌肤的保湿层，增强肌肤对外界侵害因素的抵御能力。
使肌肤恢复应有的柔软度和活力，让您拥有所期待的丰盈和舒适感。
name: 柏姿滋养重组霜（适用于干燥肌肤） 50ml

product_description: Jurlique 玫瑰衡肤喷雾是一款令人神清气爽的喷雾，经过特殊配方，让肌肤变得水润嫩滑。 100毫升的瓶装可以轻松装入包内，非常易于携带，当您需要恢复清爽或需要滋润疲倦的肌肤时，可以直接将这款细致的喷雾喷于面部。 Jurlique 玫瑰衡肤喷雾富含玫瑰和草芙蓉，有助于恢复肌肤的健康平衡，使其重焕活力。 Jurlique 品牌对生命、能量和美的追求都集中体现在这款玫瑰衡肤喷雾。
name: 玫瑰衡肤喷雾（100ml）

product_description:
PAYOTExpress 3合1 洁面湿巾尤其适用于旅行者。可轻松快速地擦掉灰尘及异物，而不会使皮肤失水。
添加有蔓越莓提取物、橄榄石、乙二醇和、菱新石，使本品功效显著增强。这款湿巾可轻柔地去除所有化妆痕迹、令肌肤长效保湿、肤色清新、肌肤得到重新调整。 适合所有肌肤类型，可涂抹在嘴唇及眼睛上。
name: Express 3合1 洁面湿巾

product_description:
Treat troublesome skin to The Jojoba Company's Redness Reducing Balm; a lightweight, quick-absorbing formula that works to restore a calm, comfortable complexion.
Infused with a host of beneficial ingredients, including Green Tea, Chamomile and Cucumber, the antioxidant-rich balm helps to relieve irritation whilst minimising the appearance of redness and soothing inflamed skin. Ideal after waxing, cosmetic or laser surgery. Can also be used as a daily moisturiser to replenish and rejuvenate.
name: Jojoba Company Redness Reducing Balm 85ml

product_description:
This complete skincare set from MONU contains seven products to experience a full regime with MONU. Aimed at normal skin types, the MONU Little Beauty Bag contains:
Active Cleanser (50ml)
This milk cleansing lotion thoroughly cleans whilst leaving your skin well-balanced and soft. Calendula extract helps to soothe inflammation, and the Jasmine Essential Oil leaves a fresh, clean scent on your skin.
Active Toner (50ml)
A refreshing toner that tightens pores and prevents breakouts with its Witch Hazel ingredient. Removes residue left from cleansing lotion and leaves your skin feeling fresh and toned.
Skin Perfector (30ml)
Smoothes and radiates skin to give it a perfected look. Makes a fantastic makeup base.
Night Renewal Complex (30ml)
Wake up to rejuvenated skin as this active cream helps to smooth and firm skin while you sleep.
Micro Exfoliant (30ml)
Reveals a radiant flawless looking complexion. Dual-action microdermabrasion properties help to intensively cleanse the skin.
Aromatic Mask (30ml)
Deep cleansing and moisturising, this velvety smooth face mask warms on application to penetrate deep into the skin. Beeswax and coconut oil infused to soften and smooth.
Eye Cool Gel (15ml)
Instantly revive tired looking eyes with MONU's Eye Cool Gel. Reduces puffiness and dark circles whilst toning tired eyes.
name: Little Beauty Bag - Normal

product_description: PAYOT的Elixir细化毛孔和控油精华液通过三重功效改善混合和油性肌肤。 随着毛孔和油光的明显减少，Skin瞬间得到改善。 适合所有肌肤类型，Elixir与活性玻尿酸，少量元素，生物糖胶，Pomegranate提取物和菠萝提取物结合，达到迅速控油效果。 肌肤吸收精华液后，呈现天鹅绒般年轻亮泽的肤色。
name: ElixirFace精炼精华液 30ml

product_description:
MONU 的超滋潤晚霜是一款獨特有效的面霜，夜間可為肌膚提供超強水潤和滋養。它使用天然成份月見草油、維生素A、C 和E 及蜂王漿，促成膠原產生，同時增強肌膚的自然光澤。此面霜還包含氨基酸，額外保護肌膚，提亮膚色，讓肌膚超柔軟，更顯年輕。 KD 
 使用說明：
name: 超滋润晚霜 (50ml)

product_description: RENU Deep Repair Complex will help to give your complexion a younger-looking appearance. Specially formulated to firm and plump the skin, it will reduce fine lines and wrinkles, whilst enhancing your skin with a radiant glow. Enriched with a blend of floral essential oils, it also contains active ingredients which stimulate collagen contraction. Free from parabens, it will also hydrate and nourish your skin to keep it feeling soft and supple. - L.M.
name: Deep Repair Complex (15ml)

product_description:
Treat your skin to the restorative properties of Zelens Z Recovery Intensive Repair Balm, a concentrated rescue formula that supports skin's natural repair process after facing daily environmental aggressors.
Enriched with a host of high potency active ingredients, including Hyaluronic Acid, Rosemary Leaf and Sunflower Oil, the antioxidant rich cream helps to strengthen the skin's natural barrier whilst relieving unpleasant sensations or irritated patches. Moisture is replenished and skin is left feeling soft, supple and comfortable.
name: Z Recovery Intensive Repair Balm 50ml
Thomas Roth AHA/BHA Acne Clearing Gel 100ml

product_description:
UriageIsofill 抗衰老精华液，功效强大，可对抗皱纹。内含双倍浓缩活性成分，使您收获最佳效果。
本款精华液可被肌肤快速吸收，深入渗透肌肤，自然刺激胶原蛋白和透明质酸的再生， 对抗细纹和皱纹，使肤色更年轻，皮肤更精致。内含生物活性 ISO 3-R 聚合物，可多重抗老化，包括使肌肤致密、重新激活皮肤抗氧化能力，从内部使肌肤饱满充盈等。 肤色晶莹剔透、肤质得到改善。
name: Isofill 抗衰老精华液（30ml）

product_description:
Work towards achieving smoother, sleeker skin with the Murad White Brilliance Cleansing Cream, especially formulated to dynamically improve skin’s radiance and glow. Combining 3x White Technology with advanced Vitamin C, the gentle exfoliators and botanical extracts help to inhibit melanin production and promote cell turnover, allowing the complexion to be replenished.
Naturally combining Sodium PCA with a Patented Skin Repair System, the highly progressive formula of this cream helps heal and repair skin, ensuring maximum health and growth. C.R
name: White Brilliance Cleansing Cream 135ml

product_description:
UriageRoséliane红血丝修护卸妆水，带您体验清爽的肌肤清洁。 凝胶质地，适用于易出现红血丝的敏感面部和眼部肌肤的清洁。
内含舒缓的Uriage温泉水和乳木果油，无皂配方可温和清洁肌肤。将脸和眼睛的化妆品及污垢去除，无需冲洗。 内含的植物提取物和杏仁油混合物，确保肌肤清新洁净。 令肤色干净柔软。
name: Roséliane 红血丝修护卸妆水(250ml)

product_description:
第一款高浓度欧莱雅Age Perfect加强精华液用来对抗更年期前后和期间的三种主要衰老的迹象。 通过细化肌肤轮廓，肤色会变得更加光滑，柔软，年轻。
针对暗沉，干燥，令有细纹的肌肤更加年轻。 欧莱雅Age Perfect强效精华液采用含有胶原质和保湿成分的创新配方。 能在缺乏雌激素的更年期滋养肌肤，令肌肤光泽水润。
name: Paris Age Perfect加强滋养精华液30ml

product_description:
使用男士专用的 Works with Water 'Help: Clear Skin Soluble Supplement'，重获对肌肤的信心。该产品是英国首款 100% 纯天然的护肤营养品，可消除瑕疵，改善肤色，而无需在浴室忙碌于繁琐的化妆过程。
这种可溶性配方适合所有肌肤类型，包括敏感型，以及受痤疮、皮肤色素沉着和酒渣鼻困扰的肌肤；含有经科学证明的成分，有助于减少皮肤瑕疵的出现和复发。
作用原理是什么？
该营养品含有 PravENAC™，这是一种富含高蛋白乳铁蛋白的专用营养成分。 乳铁蛋白是一种从乳蛋白中提取的经临床证明的生物活性物质，可减缓在皮肤上生成杂质的细菌繁殖。 其凭借强大的抗微生物作用，有助于减少瑕疵和疤痕的大小，同时加快当前粉刺的愈合时间。 该产品还含有芦荟，可舒缓和滋养发炎的肌肤。 可呈现更柔滑、更健康、更均匀的肌肤。
服用方法
这种可溶性营养品很容易融入日常的生活方式中，只需添加到您最喜爱的饮料或易消化的食物（无论冷热）中，这也是控制皮肤上粉刺的一种自然方式。
短短几个星期之后，皮肤看起来就会更健康，且发红、瑕疵和刺激感会减轻。 - K.N
name: with Water Men's Help: Clear Skin Soluble Supplement (14 x 3.5g)

product_description:
Achieve instant skin rejuvenation with the KORRES Castanea Arcadia Serum; a potent solution that targets signs of ageing in all dimensions.
The high efficacy formula is based on the anti-ageing molecule Active HALupeol™, which works in synergy with Castanea Arcadia extract; an ultra-strong antioxidant. Simply smooth over the visage and the serum envelops skin in a veil of long-lasting moisture, due to the addition of Hyaluronic Acid. The depth, width and surface size of fine lines and wrinkles are visibly reduced, revealing a youthful complexion with skin that is smooth and resilient.
An anti-ageing blend of Red Rice Extract and a Natural Polypeptide visibly firms skin to combat loss of elasticity, whilst an antioxidant dose of Vitamin C leaves the complexion bright and radiant. Expect the serum to perform both preventative and corrective action against signs of ageing, leaving skin healthy and enviably youthful with continued use.
name: Castanea Arcadia Serum 30ml

product_description:
Phytomer舒缓防护面膜，可改善肤色、保护皮肤。 这种防护面膜的组合成分，在使用期间及使用后可舒缓敏感肌肤，使肌肤柔嫩细腻。
医疗试验证明：Phycosaccharide 资源特别针对消炎；高岭土提取物，使肤色改善、肌肤容光焕发。 具有舒缓性，可减少皮肤红肿和疼痛。本品经优化混合而成，可快速修复受损皮肤，使肌肤柔软顺滑。 C.R

Meet the needs of dehydrated skin with the Dermovia LACE YOUR FACE Compression Facial Treatment Mask - Hydrating Rose Water; an effective sheet mask that sits on the contours of the face and nourishes all skin types.
Concentrated with pure Rose Essence, the potent face mask delivers an effective veil of moisture to skin, leaving the complexion smooth and visibly glowing. Hydrolyzed Collagen and Hyaluronic Acid work in synergy to combat visible signs of ageing, relieve stressed skin and improve skin’s texture.
Complete with Cucumber extract, the face mask offers a natural soothing and cooling effect, leaving the complexion feeling refreshed, soft and comfortably hydrated.
name: LACE YOUR FACE Compression Facial Treatment Mask - Hydrating Rose Water (4 Pack)

product_description:
利用 NEOM Real Luxury™ 日常减压沐浴油 放松身心，这款奢侈沐浴油富含红花油，可缓解压力，令肌肤如丝般柔软。
这款强力滋养、镇静配方融合二十四种最纯净的精油，包括薰衣草、茉莉和巴西紫檀木以解除身心压力。 只需添加到浴缸内，即可体验它的抚慰、治愈香气。
您的心情将变得轻松，肌肤获得滋养和滋润。 - K.N.
注意：怀孕期间不建议使用。 如果患有某种疾病，使用前请咨询医生。 不要在破损肌肤上使用。 只适合成人使用 放在儿童接触不到的地方。 不适合眼睛周围部位。 可能会发生自然沉降。 不要在阳光直射处存放。 使用后清洗浴缸。

Chantecaille 焕采青春露  ，可在睡眠过程中明显减轻肌肤疲劳。 本品内含浓缩了两倍的视黄醇及亮白植物萃取物等，可有效减少细纹和肤色不匀，同时滋养肌肤。
内含维生素C和绿色不含咖啡因的咖啡，可使色素沉着的肌肤明亮、焕发光釆。 大豆提取物可提高维生素A的功效、滋润皮肤、减少肌肤干燥。 尤其适用在肌肤的最佳时间段（睡眠过程中），使肌肤再生。
name: 焕采青春露（含植物性微粒）

product_description:
控油保湿面霜50 ml
本品清爽不油腻，可滋润肌肤，使肌肤无油光。 确保肤色健康。 主要成份：海洋Oxhylium，为肌肤补氧，排除肌肤毒素，使肌肤重现活力。 Pheohydrane：可滋润肌肤。 海洋寡糖：有助于调节皮脂分泌，去除肌肤细菌、消除肌肤表面多余皮脂。  具有抗炎作用。 - SC
name: 控油保湿面霜（50ml）

product_description:
Relax after false tan application with the Gold Label Jumpsuit from Bronzie. Gliding comfortably over freshly tanned skin, the jumpsuit is designed to reduce the possibility of unwanted tan lines, as well as preventing stains on clothing and bedding.
Ideal for general lounging but perfect for post tanning, the velour onesie is a deluxe, easy-wear garment that comprises an adjustable hood, zip fastening, breathable under-arm panel and a drawstring waist. Sit back, relax and enjoy your tanning experience.
name: Gold Label Jumpsuit - S-M

product_description:
Erno Laszlo蓝藻紧致晚霜专为紧致肌肤而设计，利用晚间时间修复肌肤，舒缓镇定抗敏并且全面紧致、抗老化、恢复肌肤弹性以及淡化细纹，再现紧致光采肌肤。特别适合干性或脱水状况皮肤。
配方包含取自天然深海纯净水源的Spirulina Maxima 巨大螺旋藻，蕴含多达70多种养分，促进胶原蛋白生长。包含天然叶绿素及藻青素所组成的蓝色基因体、氨基酸、蛋白质、维他命B12及抗氧物等。“紧实重塑三胜肽”为改良式强效三胜肽，与肌肤具有更好的亲合效果，滋润好吸收，还原肌肤平滑纹理，使肌肤看起来更年轻。
使用方法：
在基础清洁、化妆水及保湿调理程序后立即滋养防护。用指尖轻轻从脸部中央往上和往外均匀涂抹，延伸至后颈部和肩部，让乳液跟肌肤融合吸收。
name: Laszlo蓝藻紧致晚霜50ml

product_description:
使用方便，特別適用於生活節奏快速、工作繁忙的都市人群， First Aid Beauty溫和卸妝潔面巾富含洋甘菊，蘆薈，紅沒藥醇等成分，溫和高效的去除彩妝，灰塵和污垢，吸收皮膚多餘油脂。運動健身後使用，能令肌膚實時舒緩清爽， 容易使用又方便攜帶，能快速卸妝去污，爽膚滋潤，用後不油膩。配方含有天然植物萃取抗氧化劑，有效清除體內的自由基。 
 *不含羥基苯甲酸酯類防腐劑、有害化學物質和著色劑。適合敏感肌膚。
name: Aid Beauty温和卸妆洁面巾(30抽)

product_description:
Renew and regenerate with the NUXE Nuxuriance® Ultra Anti-Ageing Cream SPF 20; a lightweight, quick-absorbing formula that promotes a luminous, youthful-looking complexion.
Fortified with Saffron and Bougainvillea Bi-floral Cells, the innovative cream hydrates, plumps and redefines facial contours to reveal a smoother, denser appearance. Provides protection against UVA and UVB rays, whilst enhancing radiance and infusing skin with a luxurious fragrance of Orange Blossom, Raspberry and Sandalwood.
name: Nuxuriance Ultra Anti-Ageing Cream SPF 20 30ml

product_description: Clear and prevent spots with the Dead Sea Spa Magik Spot On Gel. Powered by Dead Sea minerals and soothing plant extracts, the fast-absorbing gel provides antiseptic benefits to banish spot-causing bacteria, whilst minimising redness, blemishes and inflammation to restore calm, comfortable skin. Can be used under or over make-up.
name: Sea Spa Magik Spot On Gel 15ml

product_description:
The H<sub>2</sub> Elemental Energy De-Puffing Eye Gel from Perricone MD is a powerful treatment that delivers maximum results without feeling thick or heavy.  
Part of the innovative new Elemental Energy skincare range, it’s based around a proprietary H<sub>2</sub> Energy Complex™ that utilises Hydrogen – the smallest molecule in the universe – to stimulate cellular energy and deeply penetrate the surface layers of skin with intensive, purified hydration.
The ultra-lightweight formula is gentle yet effective, veiling the eye contour to provide an instant cooling sensation, helping to reduce the appearance of puffiness and fine lines. As a result, the delicate eye area appears brighter and replenished with a youthful looking vitality.
name: MD H2 Elemental Energy De-Puffing Eye Gel 15ml

product_description: Murdock London 日用潔面乳(150ml) 適用於最敏感的皮膚，可讓皮膚重現活力，倍感舒爽。產品配方含有羅勒、薄荷、蘆薈、迷迭香、百里香和小麥提取成分，可溫和祛除雜質並抑制發炎，讓皮膚倍感平緩舒適。產品具有舒緩皮膚、促進細胞再生的功能，讓您的面容倍感潔淨和滋養。 - LM  使用說明：
name: London 日用洁面乳 150ml

product_description:
First Aid Beauty急救修復防曬面霜是一款多功能保濕霜，特別適合混合型、中性或油性肌膚，抗衰老同時保濕滋養保護肌膚。是美容產品中的必備品，防曬係數SPF30有效過濾有害UV射線，防止皮膚光老化。富含自我修復因子Homeostatine®可以有效對抗肌膚老化，祛除皺紋，平滑細紋，熊果酶成份可提亮、均勻膚色。集防曬、滋潤、提亮、保濕及抗氧化功能於一身，是一款功能全面的面霜，使用後擁有更柔嫩年輕的水潤肌膚。 
 *不含羥基苯甲酸酯類防腐劑、有害化學物質和染色劑。適合敏感肌膚。 
 功效：
name: Aid Beauty 5合1急救修复防晒面霜(50ml)

product_description: 使用 Rio 面部提拉仪可轻松告别细纹和褶皱，让皮肤更加紧致。本品采用感应电面部收紧法形成 EMS（肌肉电刺激），以便达到紧致肌肤、排毒和促进循环的功效，设备还可进行电流注入护理，以便实现胶原蛋白和视黄醇的皮肤导入，进而改善皮肤老化问题。- L.M.
name: 面部提拉仪

product_description:
Experience a balancing cleanse with SAMPAR Daily Dose Foaming Cleanser, a gentle face wash that effectively lifts away dirt, makeup and excess sebum to promote a purified and clarified complexion.
Combining a cocktail of essential oils with Lime Blossom Water, the face cleanser transforms into a comforting lather, delicately eliminating impurities and product build-up whilst restoring natural balance. It banishes toxins and soothes skin to leave the complexion feeling fresh and comfortable. It also utilises an Urban Advance Complex (comprising Shea Butter Serum, Mint Endorphin and Probiotic Sugar) for expert antioxidant protection.
name: Daily Dose Foaming Cleanser 125ml

product_description:
Rejuvenate your complexion with Cocoa Noir Nature’s Own Light Facial Moisturiser from Dr Botanicals. Rich in botanical extracts, the vegan friendly moisturiser is designed to supply hydration to skin, ideal for those with especially dry skin, visibly brightening a complexion.
Formulated with a vitamin rich blend of Seabucktorn Fruit oil, Shea Butter and Alpine Rose, the innovative moisturiser promotes skin hydration with the added benefit of soft and smooth skin. The formula also offers a calming feel to irritated or sensitive skin. The face is left visibly brighter and radiant, with a healthy looking glow.
name: Botanicals Coco Noir Natures Own Light Facial Moisturiser 50ml

product_description:
Murad 抗衰老紧致霜将改善肌肤状况，首次使用肌肤紧致度便可以提升高达61%。 这款多效护肤产品能够改善肤质，带给您更柔嫩光滑的肌肤。
Murad 抗衰老紧致霜是一款专利护肤产品，首次使用肌肤紧致度便可以提升高达61%。 具有紧致功效的二醇化合物能够恢复肌肤肤色和弹性，保持年轻，同时乙醇酸能够去除角质，让肌肤变得更柔嫩光滑，看起来更健康。
使用说明：
name: 抗衰老紧致霜（30ml）

product_description:
Achieve a crystal clear complexion with the Micro Magic Microdermabrasion Treatment from bliss. Based on indulgent spa rituals, the cream-based formula has been fortified with fine Volcanic Pumice to gently exfoliate skin, removing dead cells and impurities that cause dullness and congestion.
Suitable for use twice weekly, the refined scrub contains a delicate blend of Aloe and Peppermint, which help refresh and revitalise while minimising the look of redness. Skin feels clean, polished and supple with a renewed vitality.
name: Micro Magic Microdermabrasion Treatment 85g

product_description:
配有天然成分（包括维生素 E）的Men Rock胡须油旨在滋养和滋润胡须和它下面的皮肤。 这款胡须油具有一种有故事的香味，就像淡淡的古龙水和胡须软化剂。 适合所有肌肤类型。 - E.D
- 使用前摇匀。
- 滴几滴到手上，轻轻按摩到胡须上。
- 避免接触眼睛，不要咽下。

product_description:
采用法国制药专业知识配制，CODAGE推出 "处方 - 肌肤康复"  。 凭借强力混合活性成分，该焕发光采套装承诺滋润和修护肌肤，同时可对抗疲劳、压力迹象和季节变化影响。 作为焕发肌肤青春的完美伴侣，该系列产品可改变暗哑、疲惫的肌肤，令肌肤恢复青春活力。 E.N. 
擦洗霜 (7ml)
一款可提供终极去角质体验的丰富乳液。 它的独特配方富含精米颗粒，可有效作用，以减少杂质和死皮细胞，展现散发光泽，健康自然的肌肤。 它足够温和，甚至可用于最敏感肤质，这款轻盈乳霜可增强肌肤弹性，支持细胞更新，同时让您拥有丝般柔滑肌肤和均匀肤色。
 N.03 Radiance活力精华液 (10ml) 
利用这款疲劳战精华液改变暗沉、缺乏光彩的肌肤。 加入恢复滋润和刺激胶原蛋白成分HY1，以丰盈和紧致肌肤，令肌肤焕发青春光采。 富含抗氧化剂的AO3可为肌肤抵御自由基和紫外线伤害，同时抗衰老成分混合物可抚平细纹和皱纹。
 N.10 Anti-Ageing活力精华液（5ml）
这款精华液专为消除衰老迹象，针对浮肿、黑眼圈和细纹而配制。 加入强力混合成分，包括可提高胶原蛋白产生和丰盈肌肤的Hy3以获得年轻肌肤，尤其是娇嫩的眼部区域。 其针对色素沉着的Cn3复合物，可均匀肤色，同时Dx3可修复受损肌肤，令肌肤焕发光彩。
日霜 (15ml)
利用抗污染过滤成分和抗氧化活性成分配制，该护肤霜可帮助肌肤全天抵御环境侵害因素，令肌肤滋润水嫩，光彩照人。 它的精细、乳霜质地可迅速被肌肤吸收，缓解紧绷并防止形成表情纹，令肌肤恢复神采，健康滋润。
晚霜(15ml) 
该乳液可在睡眠的同时修复肌肤，支持肌肤的天然再生过程。 其强大、净化配方含有透明质酸，可刺激胶原蛋白的产生并抚平皱纹。该保湿霜适合所有肤质，可在一夜之间让您拥有活力焕发和散发健康光泽的肌肤。
name: - 肌肤康复

product_description:
利用Weleda改善Toner净化和焕发您的肌肤，这是使用您的肌肤护理方案的最佳准备！ 金缕梅提取液舒缓和护理您的肌肤，同时改善毛孔。 本产品适用于所有肌肤类型。
由于肌肤本身无法清除杂质，因此深层清洁是任何年龄进行有效面部护理的基础，因此请利用Weleda改善Toner清除污垢，净化肌肤。 该Weleda清洁系列利用有机生长的原料调制而成，可清洁肌肤，而不会令其干燥。 该产品为100％纯天然，不含合成香料、色素和防腐剂。 适于卸妆使用。
使用说明：

使用 Murad 即刻亮泽眼霜，提亮眼周肌肤。 采用经过临床证明的独特的配方，只需15分钟，便可减少高达30％的黑眼圈，这款抗衰老眼霜将带给您更年轻的肤色。
富含创新的 Resilient-C 复合物™，其功效是普通维生素C的50倍，这款眼霜可以尽量减少细纹和皱纹，利用发散光消除黑眼圈，还特别添加了橘子油为肌肤补水，使其柔嫩光滑。 只需一瓶，便可获得神采奕奕的年轻双眸。 K.D.

product_description:
Reignite a youthful glow with the Vitamin C Elixir from Wilma Schumann, a rich emulsion that works to deliver high levels of Vitamin C directly to the skin.
Providing powerful antioxidant benefits, the fast-absorbing treatment defends against environmental aggressors, while infusing skin with a refreshing, revitalizing fragrance. Helps to support collagen production and improve skin texture, revealing a smoother, softer complexion with restored luminosity.
name: Schumann Vitamin C Elixir 21ml

product_description:
Organic skincare specialists ila-spa present the Face Mask for Glowing Radiance, a luxurious plant-based treatment that aims to enhance skin’s natural radiance and restore optimum hydration levels, enriched with botanical extracts and essential oils.
Argan and Rose Stem Cells seek to encourage cell regeneration, combating signs of premature ageing by reducing the look of dark spots and fine lines, whilst Mineral Rich Clay absorbs excess sebum without stripping away essential oils and adds an intensive dose of moisture.
Sinking deep into skin, Ional Minerals and Trace Elements are minute molecules that work to nourish and replenish skin. Suitable for all skin types, it’s an indulgent yet natural face mask that leaves skin feeling refreshed and healthier-looking with a renewed glow.
name: Face Mask for Glowing Radiance 50g

product_description:
利用Weleda Pomegranate紧肤日霜减少衰老迹象。 该护肤霜可被迅速吸收，并且使用天然自由基阻止成分，以保护肌肤免受有害环境因素影响。
Weleda Pomegranate紧肤日霜可迅速渗透并通过中和自由基防止外界因素侵害肌肤。 宝贵的石榴籽油、坚果油和澳洲坚果油成分可滋养老化肌肤。 这款润肤霜由90％有机成分构成。
该抗氧化剂护理霜是应对肌肤自然老化的理想伴侣。 含有机生长的石榴和金色粟米等珍贵成份，它可减少皱纹，拉紧肌肤并激活其再生过程。 淡淡清香会激发所有感官。
使用说明：
name: Pomegranate紧肤日霜（30ml）

product_description:
The Hydra Gel Masque Variety Pack from Wilma Schumann contains four, single use masques each designed to produce different results. Add the unique masques to your weekly skincare routine to give your skin a boost. Saturated with hydrating, soothing and nourishing ingredients, each masque is designed to target your specific skin concerns.
Aloe Vera Hydra-Gel Masque (Green):
The Aloe Vera masque is ideal for soothing and hydrating irritated or sensitive skin. A blend of Aloe Vera, Collagen and Hyaluronic Acid work harmoniously to calm irritated skin, including any red marks. Perfectly suited for sensitive skin, after sun exposure or after exfoliation.
Deep Sea Soil Hydra-Gel Masque (Black):
The Deep Sea masque is designed to nourish and aid skin in its natural repair process. A blend of Aloe Vera, Collagen and Hyaluronic Acid, alongside Deep Sea Soil provide intense nourishment and hydration for skin. Ideal for mature skin or skin damaged by environmental factors.
Red Wine Hydra-Gel Masque (Pink):
The Red Wine masque has been intelligently designed to help combat free radicals and damage caused by the sun’s harmful rays. Enriched with Resveratrol and a blend of other anti-oxidant ingredients, the masque offers visible anti-ageing skin benefits. Ideal as a first line of defence against skin exposed to free radicals and environmental damage.
Collagen Hydra-Gel Masque (White):
The Collagen masque provides deep hydration to the skin. A combination of Collagen, Allantoin and Hyaluronic Acid allow the masque to boost the skins moisture levels, leaving skin thoroughly hydrated and nourished. This masque is best suited for particularly dry skin or for use in colder or dryer climates. Also ideal after exfoliation or use of a scrub.
name: Schumann Hydra-Gel Masques Variety Pack (4 Masques)

product_description:
Reveal a renewed complexion with the ALGENIST Multi-Perfecting Detoxifying Exfoliator; a gentle yet effective scrub that smoothes the skin and visibly evens skin tone.
Formulated with an exfoliating granular mineral from microalgae, the clay-based formula resurfaces the complexion and works to reduce the appearance of enlarged pores. The exfoliator is also enriched with a skin-loving blend of Salicylic Acid and Oligosaccharides, which works to renews the skin’s surface and promote a brighter and more radiant complexion.
Expect a luminous visage that is smooth and perfected.
name: Multi-Perfecting Detoxifying Exfoliator 80ml

product_description:
Dramatically boost skin’s hydration levels with ALGENIST SPLASH Absolute Hydration Replenishing Gel Moisturiser; an anti-ageing treatment that ensures the complexion is comfortable and radiant.
Intelligently combining Alguronic Acid and Algalyte Complex, the hydrating formula absorbs quickly and offers skin an essential veil of moisture. The effective moisturiser boasts an array of energising electrolytes, which awaken the visage, whilst reducing the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles. Expect dry skin to be instantly eliminated and the complexion to appear smooth, supple and rejuvenated.
name: SPLASH Absolute Hydration Replenishing Gel Moisturiser 60ml

product_description:
Weleda Aknedoron沐浴液温和但有效地让肌肤焕发活力。 利用精心挑选的成分，这款乳液可有效清洁肌肤，但不会剥离皮肤的天然油脂膜，同时可恢复皮肤的天然酸碱度平衡。
利用全天然成分配制，包括具有清爽提神功效的橙子、柚子、薰衣草和迷迭香精油；具有抚慰功效的金盏花和洋甘菊；以及向日葵和橄榄油，Weleda Aknedoron 沐浴液经专门配制，以深层清洁和清爽问题肌肤 -适合炎热天气或旅行时使用。 利用金盏花的抗炎和抚慰特点，这款清爽乳液令肌肤重焕活力并获得舒爽。 适合素食主义者。 
使用说明：
name: Aknedoron 沐浴液（100ml）

product_description:
Protect skin from daily struggles and stresses with the this works Stress Check Face Oil; a calming formula that works to refresh and rejuvenate the complexion.
Enriched with a Superblend of pure Botanical Oils, Vitamin C, E and Omega 3, the hydrating formula seeks to neutralise stressed, out-of-sync skin. The formula boasts a natural fragrance that balances Neroli, Patchouli, Lavender and Camomile. This encourages feelings of wellbeing and aids in relieving both mental and physical tension and stress.
Fast absorbing, the lightweight oil effortlessly melts into skin and reduces the appearance of redness and minor irritation. Expect skin that is radiant and refreshed.
name: works Stress Check Face Oil 30ml

product_description:
Treat your complexion to the Cowshed Calendula Refining Facial Scrub; a weekly treatment that works to cleanse, soften and smoothen all skin types.
Infused with ultra-fine Walnut Shell particles, the exfoliator gently buffs away dead, dull skin cells, whilst a revitalising blend of Aloe Vera, Calendula and Rose Absolute Essential Oil improve skin texture and tone. Your complexion is refreshed and hydrated with restored luminosity.
name: Calendula Refining Facial Scrub 50ml

product_description: The British Barbers' Association Face Moisturiser offers a lightweight, non-greasy formula that quickly absorbs to deliver dry and wanting skin with hydration, nutrients and vitamins. Fortified with soothing Irish Moss, it effectively balances moisture levels with extracts of English Chamomile and Aloe helping to soothe the look of inflammation and redness. Reinforcing skin’s natural lipid barrier, skin feels protected, smooth and softened.
name: Barbers' Association Face Moisturiser 100ml

product_description:
Rescue stressed out skin with the this works Stress Check Face Mask; a daily facial treatment that works to calm irritated skin.
Enriched with Peppermint and a signature ‘Bio-Boost’ botanical oil blend, the face mask delivers an immediate cooling sensation that is comforting on stressed out skin. Tumeric Oil, Giant Hysop extract and Rose Root work in synergy to protect skin from internal and external stressors. The face mask is complete with an aroma-therapeutic blend of Neroli, Lavender and Camomile, which deliver a relaxing aroma to relieve mental and physical tension and stress.
Gliding over skin, the easy to apply face mask reveals a revived, hydrated and radiant complexion.
name: works Stress Check Face Mask 50ml

product_description:
Elemis 型前胶原石英提升精华液是型前胶原中的珍品，可立即对皮肤产生提升和紧致效果，从而减少细纹和皱纹的出现。
除了宝贵的矿物质石英和菱锰矿，这种强效轻质精华液中还含有最纯的海扇藻提取物浓缩液，可提高细胞机能并改善天然细胞防御机制。
Elemis 型前胶原石英提升精华液可形成蛋白质网络，从而逐渐发挥感觉得到的直接紧致效果。 会使皮肤看起来更年轻，更紧致，更光滑。

name: 型前胶原石英提升精华液 - 新品 (30ml)

product_description:
Transform the appearance of your skin whilst you sleep with Mavala's Skin Vitality Sleeping Mask Baby Skin Radiance, a brightening face mask that works overnight to promote smoother, illuminated, silky soft skin.
Creating a lightweight film that enables effective penetration of active ingredients, the cream mask will improves skin's texture and radiance whilst having a detoxifying and smoothing effect. It contains Glycolic Acid that performs gentle peeling action, and Swiss Apricot extract for antioxidant, toning and exfoliating properties. Working through the night, the mask will renew and replenish without over-stripping, and will leave skin feeling velvety soft and glowing come morning. Expect a renewed and revitalised complexion.
name: Skin Vitality Sleeping Mask Baby Skin Radiance 65ml

product_description:
Treat your skin to Cowshed's Rose Replenishing Night Cream; a fast-absorbing, deeply moisturising formula that infuses skin with a delicate floral fragrance.
Enriched with Rose Absolute, Carrot Seed Oil and Rose Geranium Essential Oil, the luxurious cream works to hydrate and regenerate skin whilst you sleep, revealing a soft, smooth and rejuvenated complexion come morning.
name: Rose Replenishing Night Cream 50ml

product_description:
艾麗美男士全效活膚眼霜 
這款輕薄的抗老眼霜在一個週期內就能夠有效的減輕37%的皺紋並且增加82%的肌膚保水度。
name: 艾丽美男士全效活肤眼霜

product_description:
bliss三合一氧Radiance修护Face保湿喷雾让您重新焕发健康光泽；它是一款轻盈、清爽的喷雾，可以根据需要在面部和颈部经常使用。
以多功效C.P.R.强化 技术（清洁、保护和恢复活力）和有强大功效的维生素C，这款亮丽配方对抗肤色不均，使肌肤瞬间补充水分。
利用黄瓜和十字花科提取物的抗氧化功效，这款无油腻的薄雾可抵御环境污染的损害，而甘草精华则可以增强弹性，透明质酸将使肌肤光滑、饱满。 可在彩妆之前或之后使用。

使用 Organic Surge 加倍 Care 深层 Smoothing 精华液;重燃健康的光泽；它是一个创新的配方，致力于改善肤色暗沉和不均。
以透明质酸强化从而提供最佳的保湿效果，这款快速吸收的精华液利用马达加斯加天神草提取物的功效，减轻皱纹，呈现出一个更光滑、更精致的肤色。 芦荟的含量可舒缓炎症和敏感肌肤，因此您可以体验到重新焕发光彩的，如丝般柔软、舒适的肌肤
name: Surge加倍Care深层Smoothing精华液（30ml）

product_description:
Maintain healthy moisture levels with The Jojoba Company Hydrating Day Cream; an effective hydrator that ensures skin looks and feels healthy.
Eliminating areas of dryness, the facial moisturiser delivers a veil of intense and lightweight hydration to skin. The formula is effortless to apply and quickly absorbed, without leaving behind an uncomfortable greasy residue. An intelligent combination of Siberian Ginseng and Beta Gluten offers long-lasting moisture that is able to protect and nourish the complexion.
Expect supple skin that is comfortably hydrated and ultra-soft.
name: Jojoba Company Hydrating Day Cream 50ml

product_description:
准备睡觉时用 bliss 全效青春果酸焕肤棉 擦去细纹和瑕疵！  焕肤棉片甚至在您睡觉的时候继续舒缓和滋润肌肤！
bliss 全效青春果酸焕肤棉是焕肤的最方便的方式！ 焕肤棉片让您每晚只需一个步骤即可，无需冲洗面部。 这些巧妙的小棉片可以在整个晚上逐渐释放去角质乙醇酸，温和地更新肌肤。 这些超级温和的棉片蕴含具有舒缓功效的金缕梅和甘草提取物，适合所有肌肤类型。 Perfect抗皱纹、黑斑和不均匀的纹理。
使用说明：
name: 全效青春果酸焕肤棉！ 焕肤棉片（30片）

product_description:
Combat the appearance of aging with the Collagen Hydrating Serum from Wilma Schumann. The intelligent formula is designed to fight the signs of aging, visibly reducing the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles while also providing luxurious moisture to the face.
The natural collagen serum offers exceptional hydration, leaving skin thoroughly moisturized and smooth, as well as working to visibly firm the skin, increasing suppleness for a more youthful looking complexion. The serum is gentle on skin and is ideal for daily use.
name: Schumann Collagen Hydrating Serum 30ml

product_description:
LUMINESCE 细胞嫩肤精华 ，打造年轻肤色。这款强大的抗衰老配方，可恢复肌肤光釆、为肌肤深层补水。
采用创新型 APT-200™ 技术 （一种正在申请专利的成体干细胞生长因子聚合物），可促进肌肤的自然更新过程、减少细纹和皱纹； 内含的维生素和抗氧化剂等成分，可深度滋养保护肌肤。 本品可被肌肤快速吸收，适合每天使用，使肌肤再生，重焕活力、光滑柔嫩。 E.N.

skinChemists 除皺面部精油可恢復肌膚活力。此精油富含專業混合的維生素，可提亮、加強和保護肌膚，還包含增強肌膚自然屏障功能和具有再生功能的玫瑰莖桿細胞提取物。這款奢華精油具有出色的軟化、順滑和再生特性，可深入滋潤肌膚，讓肌膚健康年輕。 - LM 
 使用說明：
name: 除皱面部精油 (30ml)

product_description:
Murad转化Powder是清洁和去角质双效产品，利用最先进的科学和自然精华研制而成。 其独特的粉末与水接触时变成泡沫，它由生物酶配制而成，可温和擦洗肌肤表层，去除表面油污、杂质和死皮细胞，获得明亮、精致的肌肤。
加入水杨酸和南瓜籽提取物以疏通毛孔，同时溶解的微珠可恢复光滑，令肌肤感觉丝般柔软。 适合易生暗疮的肌肤，该奢华清洁剂渗入肌肤深层，让您获得健康、无瑕疵的肌肤。 E.N.

Burt’s Bees presents the Nature Wrapped Up Gift Set, a collection of best-selling treatments to pamper from top-to-toe. Expertly formulated with all-natural ingredients extracted straight from the hive, the lush set contains a lip balm, hand cream, foot cream and body lotion plus a free sample of a moisturising night cream. Unwrap the gift of Mother Nature!
Beeswax Lip Balm with Vitamin E & Peppermint (4.25g)
Nourish and condition sore, cracked lips with this indulgent natural lip balm, bursting with Coconut and Sunflower Oils as well as essential fatty acids and vitamins. Whilst Beeswax seals in hydration, extract of Peppermint adds a refreshing tingle. Expect a softened and hydrated pout with this best-selling balm.
Shea Butter Hand Repair Cream (50g)
Rejuvenate tired hands with this lavish, non-greasy cream. Enriched with sunflower oil and nourishing shea butter, its natural formula nourishes and moisturises dry, chapped hands, whilst conditioning and strengthening nails. A blend of botanical oils, including Macadamia Nut, Rosehip, Lavender, Neroli and Borage to replenish skin, leaving hands soft and silky smooth.
Coconut Foot Cream (20g)
Transform tired feet with this luxurious foot cream. Enriched with Coconut Oil, an intensely moisturising ingredient to rejuvenate dry, cracked and hard skin, it leaves feet feeling smoother and hydrated. Refreshing Peppermint Oils and a hint of Rosemary will soothe skin to deliver long-lasting comfort.
Milk & Honey Body Lotion (70g)
Suitable for normal to dry skin, this lightweight, fast-absorbing lotion delivers long-lasting moisture to the entire body. Nourishing Milk Powder and Honey soften skin, whilst an effective blend of Coconut and Grape Seed Oils provide essential nutrients so you can experience rejuvenated skin with a smoothened texture.
name: Bees Nature Wrapped Up Gift Set

product_description:
Restore a smooth, supple complexion with the Perricone MD Cocoa Moisture Mask; an ultra-nourishing, anti-ageing treatment dedicated to hydrating, firming and tightening skin.
Infused with Cocoa-Enriched Microcapsules that transform from off-white to brown during application, the luxurious cream helps to minimise the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles, whilst toning and lifting skin to reveal defined, refined facial contours.
Expect a soft, youthful-looking complexion with renewed radiance and elasticity.
name: MD Cocoa Moisture Mask 59ml

product_description:
Reignite a youthful glow whilst you sleep with the Time Bomb Overnight Peel and Reveal; a two-step treatment suitable for weekly use.
Ideal for all skin types, the radiance-reviving treatment combines a gentle exfoliating serum and cream that work in tandem to deliver the benefits of a chemical peel and mechanical dermabrasion in one simple system. Restores a smooth, fresh and glowing complexion.
Step 1: Peel AHA Serum (Chemical Exfoliation)
When applied before bed time, the powerful serum effectively dissolves dead, dull skin cells on the skin's surface without over-drying or uncomfortable tightness. Combines chemical and fruit acids, including Lactic, Citric and Glycolic.
Step 2: Reveal Dermabrasion Cream (Mechanical Exfoliation)
Simply use in the morning to remove the loosened layer or skin. Formulated with dermatological grade, fine-edged micro crystals, the cream gently lifts off cells dissolved by step one, revealing a smooth, radiant complexion and polished finish.
name: Bomb Overnight Peel and Reveal (25ml/40ml)

product_description:
Freshly handmade in the UK with high-quality and natural ingredients, STEAMCREAM's 'The First Noel' Moisturiser is a lightweight whipped emulsion that can be used on the face, hands and body.
Developed with the brand's unique STEAM process, the finest ingredients have been fused together by a shot of steam to create a gentle, fast-absorbing emulsion that delivers long-lasting hydration.
Harnessing the nourishing powers of Orange Flower Water, Cocoa Butter and Almond and Jojoba Oils, the ultra-moisturising formula softens and replenishes, leaving skin smooth, restored and rejuvenated from top to toe.
Presented in a reusable, decorative tin crafted from recyclable materials to reduce energy use and respect the environment. STEAMCREAM follows a strict no-animal testing policy and is approved by the Vegan Society.
name: The First Noel Moisturiser 75ml

product_description:
Pai Deep Cleanse Duo 旨在去除杂质，而不剥离水分或肌肤的天然油脂。 呈现无污垢和彩妆的肌肤，令肌肤如丝般柔滑。 E.N. 
Pai Perfect Balance Blemish Serum Copaiba and Zinc
这款精华液采用抗菌、消炎和抗氧化成分的共混物配制而成，可有效地消除当前皮疹，同时保护皮肤远离皮疹烦恼。 这款精华液可减少皮脂分泌，调节油脂分泌并避免毛孔堵塞。 富含透明质酸，以保持健康的水分含量，让您能够温和地亮化肤色，而不会太干燥。

Pai Copaiba Deep Cleanse AHA Mask
使用 Copaiba Deep Cleanse AHA Mask，改善和再生暗沉肌肤。 富含高浓度果酸 (AHA)，可深层清洁肌肤并赋予活力，疏通毛孔。 这款亮肤面膜可改善肤色和肌理，实现柔滑水嫩的肌肤。

product_description:
Achieve a visible eyelift with the MAGICSTRIPES 64 Eyelid Lifting Stripes in Small; a pack of skin-friendly, silicone strips that stick to eyelids and offer a younger looking appearance. Creating instant, pain-free results, the transparent patches deliver a refreshed, radiant look without the need for surgery.
The correction patches create a youthful appearance by lifting the lid and creating fresh-faced results. Makeup can be applied as usual over the strip, for lifted eyes during every occasion. The strips are incredibly discreet so can be your secret weapon.

product_description:
利用 First Aid Beauty Eye Duty三重补救让双眼重现青春风采，这款抗衰老眼部护理产品旨在瞬间亮白、消肿、平滑眼窝部位，同时可提供滋养和长期护肤功效。
含有抗衰老成分，包括维生素A棕榈酸酯，以支持肌肤的天然胶原蛋白，以及甘草以减少黑眼圈，"中/深色"专为那些具有青铜、黝黑的肌肤设计，涂用之后，瞬间亮白整个眼部，拥有天然透明色泽。 光反射颜料塑造亮白、年轻肌肤，而咖啡因可增加血流量，以减少浮肿。 长期功效：改善下眼睑浮肿、黑眼圈和细纹。
其独特的不锈钢涂抹器模仿小指的形状，提供微刺激，同时轻松混合产品；眼睛将瞬间明亮，拥有天然、年轻光彩。 - K.N.

product_description:
適合所有肌膚類型，Erno Laszlo凝時新生柔潤眼霜可促進新陳代謝，改善六大眼周問題，為雙眸點亮睛採。 
眼周嬌嫩的肌膚需要特別的調製。 Erno Laszlo制定的眼睛護理產品配方能明顯地降低浮腫，黑眼圈和撫平細紋，是眼部護理產品中的高級營養品。凝時新生柔潤眼霜含有豐富的胡蘿蔔籽油和向日葵籽油能深層濕潤肌膚，透明質酸鈉及乳酸能使肌膚處於平滑與健康的狀態，並能使眼周脆弱肌膚消除細紋和皺紋。 
 使用方法 : 
潤膚後立即使用。用無名指沾取適量輕拍於眼骨，並從外眼角到內眼角塗抹於眼周。可接著使用適用您膚質的護膚品。  注意事項： 僅限外用。避免觸及眼睛。避免兒童抓拿。置於陰涼乾燥處保存。

product_description:
使用 skinChemists 蜂毒精油，和暗沉、衰老的肌肤说再见。 这款精油特别添加了蜂毒成分，它能够促进血液循环，丰盈肌肤，减少细纹和皱纹；富含能防止胶原蛋白流失的高山玫瑰干细胞和为肌肤提供深层滋养的麦卢卡蜂蜜。
同时，杏仁油和巴巴苏油内含丰富的必需脂肪酸和维生素，能够促进细胞再生，舒缓肌肤。 这款丰富滋养的多效精油能够对抗衰老的迹象，改善肌肤的整体状况。 - L.M.

product_description: Add sumptuous colour to your pout with the I Heart Eight Hour Limited Edition Lip Palette from Elizabeth Arden. Housed in a mirrored compact with a lip brush for precise, mistake-free application on-the-move.

product_description:
CODAGE 2号控油修复精华液（10ml）专为容易出现瑕疵的油性肌肤而配制，调节油脂分泌，去除表皮油光，展现完美无瑕的肤色。 这款产品由品牌的法国制药专家团队配制而成，混合了多种高效成分，具有抗菌功效，舒缓并修复受损肌肤。 - K.R
Ma3 - 这一带有祛斑功效的成分能够调节油脂分泌，缩小毛孔，防止细菌积累和毛孔堵塞，并去除油光。
Ac3 - 这一成分具有消炎、抗菌、调节皮肤细胞的三重功效，可谓是皮肤瑕疵的救星。 调节油脂分泌，防止毛孔堵塞，令肌肤更加清爽光滑。
Re3 - 这一强大的成分混合了多种修复因子，可以让受损的肌肤细胞重新恢复健康状态，并促进肌肤细胞的自然更新。
Dx3 - 这一成分能够促进排毒，去除有害毒素，同时为肌肤增添一层保护屏障，防止其他有害物质进入。 修复受损的蛋白质，为肌肤细胞注入能量，令面色润泽。

product_description:
使用 Astalift Revitalizing Moisture Emulsion，呵护肌肤。这是一种创新配方，利用红色素"虾青素"，抵御自由基损伤并促进胶原蛋白的生成。 Astalift 由 FUJIFILM 打造，是一个屡获殊荣的美容品牌，采用类似于防止照片褪色的先进抗氧化技术，尽可能减少雀斑并减轻肌肤衰老。
这种独特的共混物可强化肌肤保湿，拥有轻盈的流体质地，旨在平衡肌肤油脂和水分吸收，从肌肤深处保留水分。 这款活力乳液具备深层保湿功效，可保护肌肤免受外界侵害，同时保持最佳的保湿水平。 - K.N

product_description: 質感輕盈，極易吸收的滋潤面霜，注入了雛菊、洋甘菊及玫瑰的天然活性成分，珍貴的純天然植物精油的使用，能有效延緩和減少肌膚衰老，使肌膚平滑細嫩，散發年輕光彩，是維持肌膚平衡的理想之選

Fortified with extracts of Willow Bark and Bearberry Leaf, the silky gel formula delivers long-lasting hydration to combat dullness and dark spots, resulting in bright, youthful-looking skin with restored luminosity. Helps to minimise the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles, whilst soothing and smoothing all skin types to reveal refined, rejuvenated complexion come morning.

Its dose of H2O-activated Vitamin C brightens and regenerates dull skin, whilst warming spices relax and rejuvenate the senses. Formulated and hand-blended in micro-batches for ultimate freshness and efficacy, you can expect a smoother, more refined complexion with restored luminosity.

product_description:
使用 BAKEL Suncare Very High Protection Face and Eye Area SPF50+ (50ml)，保护肌肤免遭晒伤。 这款防晒霜采用神经酰胺配方，可抵御肌肤衰老，同时改善肤色和弹性。 此外，本品还含有麦芽提取物，以支持胶原纤维和牛油果油滋润和紧致肌肤。 这款乳液拥有针对紫外线的物理和化学过滤剂，已被科学证明能有效地保护肌肤。 – I.M
Bakel 的所有产品均利用 100% 天然活性成分，确保接触肌肤的任何成分均具备高品质，且天然纯净。 Bakel 的每款产品均不含香料、酒精、人工色素、防腐剂或动物衍生物，且经过皮肤测试，过敏风险最低。 Bakel 产品建立在客观确认和科学证明之配方的坚实基础之上，适用于所有肌肤类型并可抵御肌肤衰老的主要原因。
name: Suncare Very High Protection Face and Eye Area SPF50+ (50ml)

 *不含羥基苯甲酸酯、有害化學物質和著色劑。適合敏感肌膚。

使用 Green People Oy！温和清洁肌肤，去除污垢及彩妆。 Cleanse & Moisturise。 所含益生元可抵御肌肤上的有害细菌，并支持有益菌。 不含苯甲酸酯类、邻苯二甲酸盐和人工香料，令肌肤完美洁净、镇静舒缓。

α葡萄糖橙皮苷，具有抗氧化作用，可减轻黑眼圈*；浮游生物提取物，使肌肤更光滑、更紧致。*
使眼睛周围的肌肤光滑明亮，超级滋润。

bliss毛孔清洁器套件可提高肤色。 该套件可去除杂质，使肌肤光滑，肤色改善，其功效仅次于家庭美容师。
bliss毛孔清洁器，利用声波帮助改善肌肤外观。 皮肤中的污垢导致毛孔堵塞。本品可轻柔地软化堵塞皮肤的周围组织，去除污垢及灰尘，使肤色更亮泽。 此外，它也有助于按摩护肤产品，直至肌肤表面吸收（而不是用手指按摩）。

product_description:
Protect skin from the sun's harmful rays with Riemann P20 Sun Protection Continuous Spray SPF20; a quick-drying and extremely water-resistant formula that promotes safe and gradual tanning, yet only requires a single application. The sunscreen spray is host to the same coveted formula, yet arrives in a new, easy-to-use continuous spray bottle, with a multi-angle function to ensure coverage from all angles.
Non-greasy, the protective solution sinks easily into skin, and the once-a-day application means you can enjoy days outdoors in the sun without the usual worry about burning or topping up sun cream. The sun spray effortlessly mists over the body, enveloping skin in a transparent veil of protection that boasts UVA and UVB filters to keep skin safe for up to ten hours.
Suitable for the face, body and scalp, the silky solution prevents burning and visible signs of ageing to leave skin comfortable and well cared for.

Ideal for oily to combination skin types, the gel leaves you with an intensely hydrated and refined complexion that’s significantly clearer.

product_description:
Detoxify the complexion with the KORRES Olympus Mountain Cleansing Emulsion; a three-in-one formula that is able to cleanse, tone and remove makeup both gently and effectively. The rich emulsion is designed to be massaged into skin, then conveniently wiped or rinsed away. This quickly removes all traces of daily dirt, oil and makeup in one simple sweep.
The rich emulsion is fortified with a protective blend of Citrus Flavonoids, Broccoli and soothing Aloe Leaf Extract, which shields skin from toxins and environmental pollution, whilst an essential dose of Greek Mountain Tea offers antioxidant properties. A hydrating addition of Vegetable Squalane ensures the visage remains hydrated throughout the cleansing process. Complete with Provitamin B5, the cleanser leaves the face clean, comfortable and soothed.
Please Note: Formulated with Squalane that is plant derived.

product_description:

product_description:

其创新型配方采用紫外线 InCellium 技术，可过滤掉太阳有害的中波紫外线和长波紫外线，具有深层保护作用，有助于在各种阳光强度环境中全面保护肌肤。 它还蕴含有细胞水，可优化细胞能量环境，具有修复功能，让肌肤变得更加紧致有弹性，有效防止肌肤光照衰老，保护细胞 DNA，明显舒缓和淡化皱纹和细纹。

product_description:
多年来的损失多年来肌肤紧致度减少，而欧莱雅Perfect钙原因子晚霜有助于使松弛和有皱纹的肌肤恢复弹性。 钙原因子能够改善肌肤的防御功能，恢复其保湿系统。
在消费者测试中，81％的女性感觉肌肤不再那么脆弱，而高达85％的人则表示使用欧莱雅Perfect钙原因子晚霜以后肌肤更加紧致。 本品采用专利技术增加肌肤弹性，即使是成熟型肌肤类型也能恢复年轻活力，容光焕发。

product_description:
Peter Thomas Roth 24K黄金面膜能够令肌肤顺滑，重现青春活力，这款奢华的抗皱护理产品特别添加了24K黄金，可以提亮、紧致肌肤。
这一创新配方能够帮助减少肌肤的细纹和皱纹，特别混合了多种有效成分，包括让肌肤容光焕发的胶体金，具有提拉紧致功效的咖啡因，以及富含镁元素的宝石成分，为肌肤注入能量，减少压力导致的老化。
这款面膜添加了透明质酸和甘油这两种保湿成分，能够提拉顽固皱纹，注入水活力，深层滋养，呵护肌肤。 期待肌肤如丝般柔滑，重现青春活力，容光焕发。 - K.N.
主要成份及益处： 
纯24K黄金 - 令肌肤容光焕发，保湿锁水，维持肌肤的胶原蛋白并抑制弹性蛋白的分解，令肌肤紧致。
胶体金 - 又名"活性黄金"：可以提拉紧致肌肤，恢复弹性。
咖啡因 - 众所周知，咖啡因是一种具有紧致塑形功效的抗氧化剂。
橄榄石 - 一种古老的绿宝石，蕴含丰富的镁元素，可令肌肤重新恢复活力，减少细胞氧化并抵抗压力带来的衰老。
透明质酸和甘油 - 这两种保湿成分能够丰盈肌肤，并吸收空气中的水份为肌肤注入水活力，密集补水锁水。

product_description:
通过 Dr. Nick Lowe 的 acclenz™ 控油日霜，可使面部皮肤没有油光；Nick Lowe 是国际公认的世界一流皮肤病学和护肤专家之一。
这种吸收迅速的保湿霜采用柳树皮、烟酰胺及维生素 A、C、E，有调控出油量，减轻皮肤易留瘢痕的状况，以及促进细胞再生的作用，从而使面部皮肤看起来健康、轻松舒适、水分得到补充。
水杨酸是一种高效羟基酸，有助于最大程度地减少瘢痕的出现，从而显露出未受自由基损害的干净光滑的皮肤。 可为化妆品的涂抹化出完美的底妆。

Dx3 - 这一成分能够促进排毒，去除有害毒素，同时为肌肤增添一层保护屏障，防止其他有害物质进入。 修复受损的蛋白质，为肌肤细胞注入能量，让面色更加润泽。
Ec3 - 融合了多种对肌肤有益的成分，改善肌肤，效果卓著，令肌肤容光焕发。 促进细胞更新，滋润锁水，富含抗氧化因子，有助于保护细胞。
