product_description:
Smooth unruly wrinkles and stubborn expression lines with Peter Thomas Roth Un-Wrinkle Fast-Acting Serum; an innovative treatment that works to visibly smooth and diffuse deep set imperfections within 3 days.
Suitable for all skin types, the fast-acting serum contains a dynamic blend of synthetic snail venom conopeptide, an ingredient that mimics the muscle relaxing effect of Cone Snail Venom for a relaxed, smooth appearance, and genuine diamond dust, a powerful component that manipulates light to create a soft focus effect and blur imperfections.
Boasting 12 neuropeptides, the miracle treatment will prevent as well as cure, boosting the skin's volume and smoothing the texture for noticeably visible results. Works on the most unruly areas, including: forehead, eyes, nose and mouth. Expect smooth, plumped up, younger looking skin. - K.N.
name: Thomas Roth Un-Wrinkle Fast-Acting Serum

product_description:
Menage Skincare Survival Kit provides three skincare favourites helping to keep skin protected and energised, in a practical, roll up style wash bag. Ideal as a gift or for travelling, open the wash bag and hang it up for easy organisation of the Menage skincare essentials.
Deep Pore Cleansing Face Scrub (100ml): The natural volcanic scrub revitalises and brightens the face, as well as giving it a smoother appearance. The low lather micro foam helps to thoroughly hydrates skin.
Anti-Ageing Moisturiser (100ml): The fast absorbing moisturiser provides invisible hydration, creating a matte-look for everyday use. The treatment also combines 5* UVA protection to prevent skin ageing and Vitamin A’s including skin-repairing retinoid molecules, leaving skin nourished and smooth looking.
Anti-Fatigue Eye Roll-On (15ml): The eye roll-on is enriched with caffeine to help combat the appearance of tired eyes. The invisible cooling serum instantly absorbs and aims to reduce the appearance of fine lines, dark circles and under eye bags.
name: Skincare Survival Kit

product_description:
来自 Dr. Brandt 的'Needles No More'针对额头和眉毛之间的衰老迹象提供护理。 利用三重混合皱纹缓和剂配制，这款革命性护肤霜深入渗透肌肤，消除皱纹和鱼尾纹。
利用缩氨酸技术研发，这款快速吸收护肤霜提供了即时紧肤效果，防止未来表情纹的形成，以减少皱纹，令肌肤光滑细腻，焕发青春。 E.N. 
功效：
15分钟后 - 100％报告眼睛周围肌肤有限制提升。
1小时后 - 96％报告鱼尾纹变得光滑。
4周后 - 100％报告该产品明显改善表情纹的外观。
name: Brandt Needles No More（15克）

product_description:
Lift dirt and impurities from skin with the Spa Magik Organiks Wrinkle Therapy Moisture Melt Cleansing Balm; a gentle yet effective cleanser that leaves skin youthful and refreshed.
The lightweight balm effortlessly massages into skin and the oil-rich formula is able to sweep away all traces of makeup, impurities and daily dirt. Enriched with Organic Oils and Sea Minerals, the luxurious cleanser protects and nourishes skin, as well as delivering anti-ageing benefits.
Expect dirt to simply melt away and skin to feel soothed and ultra-clean.
name: Magik Organiks Wrinkle Therapy Moisture Melt Cleansing Balm

product_description: Soothe and repair very dry skin types with the MÁDARA Comforting Toner. Enriched with Northern Camomile and Rose Water, the organic formula works to intensively hydrate skin whilst regulating pH levels to balance excess oil production. The appearance of pores is minimised and skin is left feeling smoother and softened, perfectly prepped for further treatments.
name: Comforting Toner 200ml

product_description: Pai Age Confidence蓝蓟&苋菜红面油采用有机原料重塑肌肤健康与自然光泽。富含维他命，omega和必要营养成分，保持肌肤水分，肌肤更加顺滑。98%有机油提取自10种强大的植物活性成分，带来持久舒润，缓解肌肤紧张和发炎症状。
name: Age Confidence：年龄秘密蓝蓟&苋菜红面油

product_description:
Oskia 醒膚亮彩精華質地輕薄，散發內在光彩，蘊含可煥發青春活力的營養成份，積極提亮、緊緻和均勻膚色。 
本品為活力和復活精華，含品牌標誌性成份MSM，以及瑞士蘋果梗、蜂斗菜和牛奶勝肽。此清新精華可撫平細紋和皺紋，對抗每天的環境傷害，讓肌膚更加健康平滑，年輕有光澤。 
使用說明：
name: 醒肤亮彩精华 30ml

product_description:
Crabtree & Evelyn 水泽香花香皂套装包含3块100克的香皂，富含多种滋养成分，彻底清洁肌肤，散发淡淡的清香。 这款剃须皂不含基苯甲酸酯类和矿物油，采用传统法国混合工艺，带给您真正奢华的剃须体验。
融合了乳木果油和多种保湿精油，让您的肌肤如丝般柔软水嫩。 K.D.
name: & Evelyn 水泽香花香皂套装（含3块香皂）（300g）

product_description:
Up your beauty stakes with this gorgeous MONU Little Beauty Bag for Dry/Sensitive Skin. This collection includes seven essentials that care for and soothe dry and sensitive skin to leave it feeling refreshed and full of vitality.
Used by professional therapists, MONU have perfected their unique beauty treatments using only the purest ingredients to deliver beautiful products that care for your skin. MONU Little Beauty Bag includes all of the very best skin saving products specially formulated for dry and sensitive skin.
Gentle Cleanser (50ml)
A gentle cleanser enriched with Wheat Germ, Peach Kernel, Coconut Oils and Aloe Vera to clean your skin and leave it feeling soft.
Gentle Toner (50ml)
A hydrating, soothing and refreshing toner that removes all traces of cleanser.
Moisture Rich Collagen Cream (30ml)
A luxurious hydrating cream that does wonders for skin's main problems. Plant flavonoids prevent premature ageing, marine collagen smooths out fine lines, and Shea Butter improve the skin's barrier.
Extra Rich Night Cream (30ml)
This luxurious night cream intensively firms, nourishes and restores your skin whilst you sleep.
Micro Exfoliant (30ml)
Reveals a radiant flawless looking complexion. Dual-action microdermabrasion properties help to intensively cleanse the skin.
Hydrating Mask (30ml)
A deep cleansing, moisturising face mask that will leave your skin feeling renewed.
Directions for use: Apply a thin layer to the face and neck and leave on for 10 minutes. Remove thoroughly and follow with your usual skincare regime. Use 1-2 times per week.
Collagen Eye Cream (15ml)
This gentle eye cream is enriched with Arnica and Marine Collagen to reduce puffiness, dark circles and fine lines. Paraben free formula.
Directions for use: Apply a small amount to the brow and upper cheek bone. Use every morning and evening.
name: Little Beauty Bag - Dry

product_description:
freezeframe 睫毛生长染色膏是一款逐渐增色的睫毛染色膏，同时具有促进睫毛增长的效果；采用独特配方，能够加深睫毛颜色；使用6周，睫毛长度还能增长高达72%。 这款产品使用起来非常简单迅速，只需像睫毛膏一样涂抹便可，无需出门，便可享受沙龙般的妆效。
染色是一个循序渐进的过程，但每次使用都有明显效果；非常适合在涂抹普通睫毛膏之前使用，打造纤长浓密的睫毛。 睫毛生长染色膏也非常适合替代睫毛膏使用，无需涂抹睫毛膏，便可拥有更深、更长的睫毛。 K.D.
name: 睫毛生长染色膏

product_description: The Moisture Protectiv™ Day Crème from Wilma Schumann is a daytime moisturizer that provides skin with a complete environmental defence system. The light, non-greasy formula is ideal for protecting and offering hydration for the face, neck and bust area. Boasting SPF20, the crème has been tested and approved for UVA and UVB broad spectrum protection.
name: Schumann Moisture Protectiv™ Day Crème SPF20 105ml

product_description:
Erno Laszlo 去角质排毒水凝胶面膜可有效提亮暗沉的肤色。 将这款创新的像水凝胶一样的面膜可形成于面部轮廓相同的形状，其富含维他命和精油的植物萃取物可有效渗透到肌肤深层。
它所含的强效木炭可有清除毛孔中的杂质和污垢，而 AHA 水果混合物可分解死皮细胞，让肌肤看起来更清爽健康。 猕猴桃提取物可促进胶原蛋白的自然形成，有助于修复破损的细胞，使肌肤恢复最佳的水合作用水平。 本品适用于各种类型的肌肤，包括容易生痤疮和混合型肌肤，带给您所期待的焕活和抗氧化效果，让您的肌肤荣光焕发。
不含任何邻苯二甲酸、对羟基苯甲酸酯、矿脂、硫酸盐和矿物质油 。
name: Laszlo 去角质排毒水凝胶面膜（1 片装）

product_description:
Green People Day Solution SPF 15 含有机芦荟、绿茶和甘菊，适合所有肌肤类型，包括最敏感的肌肤。 这款温和的日霜具备滋养和保护作用，有助于防止早衰。
使用 Green People Day Solution SPF 15，滋润肌肤并实现再平衡。 这款日霜凭借天然 SPF 15 防晒可防止细胞损伤，令肌肤清凉、泰然自若。
Green People 使用非空运的可回收包装。 产品只含有少量手工制作的纯天然有机成分，确保收到产品时尽可能新鲜。 这些产品也适用于素食者和素食主义者。
使用说明：
name: People Day Solution Spf15 (50ml)

product_description:
Restore a youthful appearance to the visage with the First Aid Beauty Skin Lab Retinol Serum 0.25% Pure Concentrate; a gentle yet effective formula developed for those with sensitive skin, or those first introducing their skin to retinol treatments.
Boasting a 0.25% concentration of pure Retinol, alongside First Aid Beauty’s proprietary Skin Saver Complex, the formula is able to deliver the benefits of retinol, without causing irritation. The blend of Retinol and advanced peptides reduces the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles, to restore a smooth appearance to skin’s texture.
The serum is enriched with Hyaluronic Acid, Vitamin C and Aloe, which work in synergy to offer a soothing and comforting feel, whilst supporting skin’s health and alleviating irritation associated with retinol-based products. After use, skin appears refreshed, rejuvenated and enviably youthful.
name: Aid Beauty Skin Lab Retinol Serum 0.25% Pure Concentrate 30ml (Sensitive/Beginner)

product_description:
Achieve a close, comfortable shave with the Arabian Pomegranate Shaving Oil from Carsons Apothecary; a brand who combine traditional formulas with high performance results. Developed for use pre and post shave, the protective oil softens and lifts hairs, whilst hydrating and conditioning skin to prevent moisture loss.
Infused with a nourishing blend of Rosehip, Grapeseed and Sweet Almond Oils, its caring formula allows the razor to glide effortlessly over skin with minimised friction, nicks and burns, whilst delivering a masculine fragrance of pomegranate and Middle-Eastern musk. Skin is left soft, smooth and restored.
name: Apothecary Arabian Pomegranate Shaving Oil

product_description:
Decongest normal, oily and combination complexions with the Alpha-H Micro Cleanse Super Scrub; an award-winning exfoliator with 12% Glycolic Acid to improve skin texture and tone.
Fortified with Jojoba Beads, the face scrub effortlessly dissolves debris and dead skin cells to unclog pores and eliminate blackheads, whilst smoothening the appearance of lines, wrinkles and stress. A stimulating blend of Caffeine, Cucumber and Peppermint Oil cools and invigorates skin.
Ideal for dull, sun damaged and ageing skin, the microdermabrasion treatment can be used as a mask to reveal a plump, fresh complexion with a youthful glow. Increases absorption of further skincare products.
name: Micro Cleanse Super Scrub 100ml

product_description:
使用 Garnier Pure Active Deep Pore Wash修复痘痘敏感性肌肤 ，这是一款浓缩凝胶洁面胶，能够清洁肌肤，消除痘痘，淡化痘印。
洁面乳能够清除杂质，去除死皮细胞。含有的水杨酸，天然活性取自蓝莓的"HerbaSoothe"能够有效疏通毛孔，减少肌肤表面油脂，淡化痘印。 Skin感觉纯净，痘痘能够得到有效控制。
肌肤将更加清爽，毛孔不堵塞，感觉清新自然。 - K.N
name: Pure Active Deep Pore Wash (200ml)

product_description:
James Read水洗式美黑乳，霜状美黑配方，适用于身体及面部，缔造出自然阳光肤色。
本款彩色乳液具有转换及防水配方，可瞬间改变肌肤颜色，缔造完美的阳光金色肌肤，非常适合补足现有的棕褐色或使黄褐色线条尽显无遗。 本款美黑乳可快干，能迅速稳定肤色，方便冲洗。 富含芦荟、尿囊素、辅酶Q10等，可深度滋润营养肌肤。
name: Read 水洗式美黑乳 150 ml

product_description: Revitalise sensitive skin with the Jeju Sandorong Jelly Mask from Korean beauty brand Skin79. Formulated with Cupra Cellulose and Aloe Vera, the hydrogel-textured mask veils skin with a soothing, jelly-like substance for an ultra-cooling experience akin to the refreshing waters of the Jeju sea. Ideal for alleviating skin irritations and redness, it unveils a softened, comfortable and hydrated complexion with a more even tone.
name: Jeju Sandorong Jelly Mask 33ml - Aloe

product_description:
可用 NAOBAY (Natural And Organic Beauty And You) 的面部控油洁肤凝胶温和地使面部皮肤更有活力。这种豪华配方护肤品特为满足混合型皮肤和油性皮肤而研制，接触水时会变成轻质泡沫，可清除杂质和过多的皮脂。
这种洁肤凝胶富含有滋养作用的天然收敛剂提取物和芦荟的混合物，既有清除可引起瘢痕的细菌的作用，又能形成完美的无油光面层。 适合在早晨和傍晚使用，会使面部皮肤纯净、明亮并恢复平衡，还有持久的控油效果。
name: 面部控油洁肤凝胶 (200ml)

product_description:
使用Lift & Plump Sheet Mask重新發現您皮膚的年輕活力。 
該飽和片狀面膜專用於皮膚提升，獲得緊緻的肌膚外觀，它的一系列抗衰老成分可以給您一個容光煥發的年輕膚色。它含有棕櫚酰五肽-3和蘋果莖幹細胞的化合物，外加天然保濕劑，各種成分的共同作用可以增進水分，獲得緊緻肌膚的外觀。您將會獲得一個明顯緊緻、年輕和重新煥發活力的肌膚。

用 PAYOT 夏缇光亮SPF 30  滋润和保护肌肤。这是一款加入了防晒剂的亮白日霜，可以使肌肤免受有害光线的伤害，避免早衰。
这款丝滑润肤乳适合所有肌肤类型，可以毫不费力地涂抹到肌肤上，它提供多种有益的成分，包括增白维生素C和令肌肤饱满充盈的透明质酸。 它的统一特性有助于拉平肤色、减少黑斑，同时避免过早的肌肤衰老。
 Skin重焕青春活力、洁净如昔。
name: 夏缇光亮 SPF 30 50ml

product_description:
这款 Crabtree & Evelyn 剃须皂能够产生丰富的泡沫，专为创造彻底舒缓的剃须体验而设计，另外还融合了印度檀香，散发着独具男性魅力的香味。 这款奢华的剃须皂附带一个可重复使用的柚木盒，富含维生素E，能够深入护理并滋润肌肤，让肌肤触感如丝绸般柔软。
适合所有年龄段的男性，最好配合剃须刷使用，以获得最佳效果。 K.D.
name: & Evelyn 印度檀香剃须皂木盒套装（100g）

product_description:
Say goodbye to dull, tired eyes with the Advanced Miracle Formula F Eye Serum from skinChemists. Designed to make eyes smoulder, the innovative serum delivers intense hydration, whilst visibly lifting and firming the delicate skin around the eyes.
Concentrated with Hyaluronic acid, the formula is a miracle worker in skin hydration, working to maintain moisturise by improving cell cohesion and collagen synthesis. The treatment is blended with the natural peptide, Peptamide™ 6 Plus, the serum contains the power to visibly firm and plump the skin, helping to reduce the appearance of fine lines and visibly improve elasticity. Resulting in a brighter, more youthful visage.
name: Advanced Miracle Formula F Eye Serum 8ml

product_description: DELAROM 橘子果糖身体磨砂膏将带给您舒适的放松享受。 这款磨砂膏添加了甜橙精油，能温和地去除死皮细胞，防止肌肤变得干燥。 天然正宗的磨砂能够轻柔地按摩肌肤并逐渐融化，让肌肤变得如天鹅绒般柔嫩水润并散发迷人的香味。 -SA
name: 橘子果糖身体磨砂膏（200ml）

product_description:
飞机旅行者套装是一款三件套。属于Jack Black中最好的日常护肤品。其包装为附有签名的网袋。 本套装含所有您需要的清洁品、剃须品、保湿护肤品。
本套装的包装超方便，可满足面部、身体、及剃须之需。所含产品均符合航空公司批准的尺寸。 且方便随身携带、无后顾之忧，因此也可作为很好的礼物赠送他人。
该套装包括以下产品：
name: Black飞机旅行者套装（4件套）

product_description:
Transform your skin with Mizon Collagen Power Firming Enriched Cream, an intensely moisturising formula enriched with 54% Marine Collagen to perform a firming effect. 
Combining deeply hydrating benefits with anti-ageing action, the moisturiser expertly firms and plumps the appearance of skin to reduce fine lines, and its dose of Adenosine improves elasticity for a younger, suppler-looking complexion. Infused with a host of beneficial ingredients, including Peptides, Hyaluronic Acid and a cocktail of plant oils, the cream deeply hydrates whilst regenerating damaged skin. Expect soft, smooth and younger-looking skin.
name: Collagen Power Firming Enriched Cream 50ml

product_description: 用Laidbare油性Skin Duo 令肤色更白皙透亮。 这款方便的二件套包括一个面膜和一个面霜，适合容易长粉刺和斑点的肌肤。 它会舒缓和镇静肌肤，令肌肤呈现哑光的外观。 - L.M.
name: Duo

product_description:
让 Polaar 冰爽奇迹瞬时活肤多效眼霜激活眼周肌肤，采用冰爽配方和滚珠设计，提亮双眸，让眼周肌肤更光滑清爽，神采奕奕。 
Polaar 冰爽奇迹瞬时活肤多效眼霜有何功效？这款滚珠眼霜将为眼部肌肤注入活力和弹性，散发迷人光泽，同时还能促进睫毛增长，带来假睫毛般的纤长效果。 活肤成分能够立即消除眼周浮肿，去除眼袋、黑眼圈和疲态，让双眸神采奕奕。 
Polaar 冰爽奇迹瞬时活肤多效眼富含哪些成分？富含西伯利亚人参精华，这一滋补成分具有活肤功效，让眼周肌肤焕然一新；另外四肽成分还将显著缓解氧化压力，保持眼周肌肤的弹性。 -SA
name: 冰爽奇迹瞬时活肤多效眼霜（10ml）

product_description: 下一代眼部护理霜， 绝对眼霜SPF 15集三肽技术、广谱UVA/UVB防晒和抗氧化Enznogenol于一体，以保护和紧致娇嫩的眼部肌肤，同时刺激胶原蛋白产生并减少黑眼圈。 凉爽陶瓷涂抹棒可精确涂抹目标部位，收到瞬间紧肤、清爽和缓解疲劳的功效。
name: (20ml)

product_description:
Australian Bodycare's Home Waxing Kit is a six piece collection that combines everything you need to achieve salon professional hair removal results at home. The wax kit includes a hand held roller wax heater with two roller wax cartridges, disposable paper strips for wax removal and two skincare products to prep and moisturise skin. Expect soft, smooth, salon-worthy results in your own home.
1 x Hand Held Roller Wax Heater:
A cartridge holding wax heater. Dispense wax by rolling across the targeted area. Always roll in the direction of hair growth.
2 x Roller Wax Cartridges (1 Small, 1 Large):
One large cartridge for delivering wax to larger surface areas such as legs and arms. One small cartridge for use on more intimate areas such as bikini line, underarms and eyebrows.
1 x Disposable Paper Strips (100):
Disposable paper strips to remove wax from targeted area.
1 x Body Lotion (100ml):
A gentle antiseptic to rehydrate skin. Specially formulated with Tea Tree Oil, this lightweight lotion delivers nourishing ingredients which work to revive dry skin and retain the skin's natural moisture levels. Experience soft and supple skin that is comfortable. Absorbs quickly into skin. Perfect for use after waxing.
1 x Small Pack Wipes (24):
Alcohol and fragrance free wet wipes suitable for use anywhere. Formulated with 1% Tea Tree Oil which works as a natural antiseptic, the wipes cleanse the skin and remove bacteria from surfaces, including stubborn makeup. Effective and convenient. Perfect for preparing the skin for wax treatments.
name: Bodycare Home Waxing Kit

product_description: Shiseido Men's Total Revitalizer质地轻盈，具有多重功效，能提供整日抗衰老保护。 这款滋润精华霜能锁住水分，亮白平滑肌肤表面，从而减少当前的岁月痕迹。 - K.R
name: Mens Total Revitalizer (50ml)

product_description: 使用 TANWORX 美黑泡沫（深色至超深色），让肌肤持久美黑。 这款美黑泡沫非常易于涂抹，不留痕迹，能够立即加深肤色，逐渐散发健康的古铜光泽。 采用有色配方，因此在涂抹时能够清楚看到已涂抹的区域，达到均匀自然的美黑效果。 -SA
name: 美黑泡沫 - 深色至超深色（150ml）

product_description:
利用 skinChemists Bee Venom Treatment Set体验极致抗衰老功效。 放于化妆盒内，该组合套装结合三种护肤产品，加入含紧致功效的蜂毒，令肌肤更加紧致、丰盈和年轻。 - K.N.
 Bee Venom面部精华霜 ： 
结合实际蜂毒与aquaxyl和透明质酸，该面部精华霜可改善皮肤各层之间营养输送，增加血液循环，同时紧致饱满肌肤，并平滑细纹和皱纹。
 Bee Venom Duo Moisturiser  ： 
这款保湿霜结合真正蜂毒与麦卢卡蜂蜜和透明质酸以强效滋养和滋润肌肤。 它刺激胶原蛋白的产生，以促进获得更年轻的肌肤。
Bee Venom眼部精华霜：
这款青春焕发眼部精华液结合真实蜂毒与透明质酸抵御娇嫩眼部肌肤的黑眼圈和浮肿。 眼睛更显年轻，精神十足。
name: Bee Venom Treatment Set（价值£184.79）

product_description:
Essential skincare delivers highly effective day-to-day products to restore your natural radiance.
Massage one to two pumps over the face and neck using fingertips, morning and night. Apply after serum and before moisturiser.Sensible cautions: For very sensitive skins, skin patch test 24 hours before use. Natural sedimentation may occur. Avoid direct contact with eyes. Keep out of reach of children. Store away from heat and light. Once opened, best used within 6 months.
name: Associates Nourishing Facial Oil 15ml (Rose & Sandalwood)

product_description:
Dr. Brandt的Laserfx Perfect精华液是一种家庭护肤解决方案，旨在最大限度地减少衰老迹象。 利用七肽和再生植物提取物积雪草配制而成，以刺激胶原蛋白的产生，改善肤质，从而获得柔软、精致的肌肤和健康天然光泽。
这款深层渗透、轻质、屡获殊荣的精华液有助于减少细纹和皱纹，恢复更年轻、光滑的肌肤，同时可掩盖疤痕和缺陷。 通过下一代Fraxel激光治疗仪，您的肌肤将脱胎换骨，焕然一新。 E.N.
name: Brandt Laserfx Perfect精华液（30ml）

product_description:
使用 Eucerin® Aquaporin Active for Dry Skin，呵护肌肤。这是一种经过皮肤测试的保湿配方，用于提供深层、持久保湿，实现柔软水嫩肌肤。
滋润是健康肌肤的关键因素。这就是为什么 Aquaporin Active 系列产品使用肌肤自有的输送渠道（水通道蛋白），赋予所需要的水分。 这款溶液拥有独特的专利配方，通过在肌肤细胞之间输送水分，实现最佳的、持久的滋润肌肤。
这款创新的润肤乳有助于缓解紧绷感和不适，令肌肤重获充分滋润，感觉柔软水嫩。
二十四小时保持清新亮泽。 快速吸收 - 理想的底妆。 - K.N
name: Aquaporin Active Hydration for Dry Skin (50ml)

product_description:
经INIKA认证的有机浓缩玫瑰果油适用于中性皮肤及混合型皮肤。可修复肌肤、令肌肤舒适健康、重焕光釆。
本产品可被肌肤快速吸收，将面部和颈部的疤痕、皮肤发红、细纹和皱纹等降到最低；内含冷榨油、脂肪酸、抗氧化剂等，可抚平肌肤、滋润肌肤。为您打造完美妆容做好准备。
本品包含四种澳大利亚本土植物：卡卡杜李子、檀香木、Riberry、皇冠。可对抗早衰、使肤色均匀、减少痤疮炎症。

Revive tired, weary eyes with Christian BRETON Anti Fatigue Eye Care, a cooling gel formula that helps to relieve signs of ageing and fatigue around the delicate eye area.
Targeting puffiness, dark circles and fine lines, the non-oily gel delivers a cooling sensation upon application, and melts in effortlessly to moisturise and revitalise the eye contour. Its calming, decongesting properties promote brighter, younger-looking skin around the eyes with long-lasting benefits.
name: BRETON Anti Fatigue Eye Care 15ml

product_description:
IOMA present the Travel Collection; a four-piece kit that combines a luxurious cleanser, quick-absorbing body cream, gentle exfoliator and anti-ageing moisturiser. The perfect companion for purifying and replenishing the face and body on-the-move.
Youthful Pure Cleansing Water (30ml)
Working to eliminate dirt, make-up and impurities without over-drying, the soothing formula calms even the most sensitive skin types to restore a revitalised, comfortable complexion. With a silky texture that glides effortlessly over the face, the fragrance-free cleanser is enriched with Chamomile and Ricin Oil to soften, smoothen and refine your complexion, whilst antioxidant-rich Mallow Extract protects and repairs. Skin will be left hydrated, toned and purified.
Voluptuous Body Cream (30ml)
A luxurious formula that restores silky smooth, comfortable skin on the entire body. Its rich formula harnesses Idealift biotechnology, boosting elasticity and improving the skin's overall appearance with long-lasting effect. Fast-absorbing and lightweight, its dose of Sweet Almond Oil and White Lupin Extract hydrates and moisturises, whilst protecting from environmental aggressors. Skin is left visibly brighter and velvety soft.
Gentle Exfoliating Emulsion (15ml)
An exfoliator that works to deeply cleanse whilst refining skin's texture. Fortified with Silica particles, the cream emulsion scrub gently yet effectively sloughs away dead skin cells whilst dissolving the oxidised tip of blackheads and regulating sebum secretions, so skin looks clear and more refined. Performing a deep clean, the exfoliator effectively lifts away impurities and its dose of Burdock helps tighten pores for a purified complexion. Skin looks refined, balanced and clean.
Youthful Moisture Cream (10ml)
An anti-ageing formula that works to protect from the first signs of ageing. Deeply hydrating, its lightweight, fluid texture absorbs quickly to soften the appearance fine lines and wrinkles. Formulated with Matrixyl™ 3000 biotechnology to help boost cellular activity and redensify the complexion, whilst a dose of Vitamin C minimises dark spots, revealing a radiant, younger-looking complexion without greasy residue.
name: Travel Collection 85ml

product_description:
Restore skin’s natural radiance with the Christian BRETON Perfect Skintone Serum; a skin-brightening formula that seeks to reveal a clear and uniform complexion.
Suitable for all skin types, the potent serum boasts a breakthrough formula that revives a radiant appearance. The formula reduces the appearance of dark spots and discolouration, whilst delivering a brightening effect that ensures the visage is luminous.
After use, skin is clear and clarified, boasting a youthful glow.
name: BRETON Perfect Skintone Serum 30ml

product_description: Remove dead surface skin cells and dirt with the Facial Scrub from Anthony. The unique formula is free from harsh grit and contains Bora Bora white sand, which gently exfoliates dead skin, dirt and grime that accumulates on the skin’s surface. Ideal for even the most sensitive skin, the scrub is infused with Aloe Vera, Algae and Chamomile which work the soothe skin, leaving it feeling refreshed. Also works to lift beard hairs before shaving, helping to avoid ingrown hairs and razor burn.
name: Facial Scrub 60ml

product_description: Working to remove dead surface skin cells and dirt, the Facial Scrub from Anthony gently exfoliates skin with its scrub formula. Containing perfectly rounded micro beads, they remove surface debris without scraping or irritating skin. Skin is left clean and bright with an even skin tone.
name: Facial Scrub 237ml

product_description:
Pamper your pout with the Christian BRETON Sweet and Delicious Lip Balm; a delectable, creamy treatment to nourish and hydrate.
The rich formula envelopes lips with essential moisture and a sheer pink hue, helping to naturally enhance shape and volume for a plumping effect. From the first application, lips feel smooth and imbued with a subtle shine, with enhanced protection against chapping, cracks and sores caused by dryness.
Housed in a convenient mirrored compact, ideal for stashing in your handbag for on-the-go applications.
name: BRETON Sweet and Delicious Lip Balm 4.5g

product_description:
Institut Esthederm 雅诗敦平静肌肤面霜适合护理娇嫩的肌肤，可通过舒缓和增强肌肤抵抗力来保护肌肤，有效中和外界环境侵害因素带给肌肤的不良影响。
其快速吸收的配方采用紫外线 inCellium 技术，可有针对性地减轻因外界因素而导致的敏感肌肤局部红肿，最大化减轻麻刺感和不舒适的感觉，有效平静舒缓肌肤。
本品采用该品牌创新型的细胞水技术，通过采用与肌肤中自然水分相同的细胞水促进细胞活动，增强肌肤的重要功能，以防止肌肤老化，永葆青春。
name: Esthederm 雅诗敦平静肌肤面霜 50 毫升

product_description:
Recipe for Men - 保湿面霜 75ml 
这款保湿面霜专门针对男性肌肤而配制，质地轻盈不油腻。 咖啡因能够消除浮肿，带来清爽的感觉，另外，生姜和桂皮成分能有效减少皮肤多余油脂，展现完美无油光的肤质。 Recipe for Men 采用富含维生素、矿物质和草药精华的特别配方，让肌肤变得柔嫩、滋润、重焕活力。
name: for Men - 保湿面霜 75ml

product_description:
你好健谈的朋友！ 本款bliss唇膏是唯一能够迅速上色，持久保持的配方，能够全天进行补水，使嘴唇光滑年轻！
bliss唇笔Perfect适合所有年龄段女性，能瞬间令嘴唇饱满闪耀，令双唇光滑年轻。 薄荷味配方含有缩氨酸成分，令嘴唇饱满，有使双唇充盈和柔软的双重功效。 这是获得丰满双唇最简单的方法！
使用说明：
name: Fabulips丰盈唇笔（1.4克）

product_description:
这种 Gatineau 完美设计高效丰盈霜可作为容颜"建筑师"，率先采用最新化妆品提升效果技术。 五官立即就会明显变得光滑，皮肤也会更加紧致。
这种 Gatineau 完美设计高效丰盈霜富含 Volulift（是一种特别新颖的复合制剂），可通过水分使细胞再次变得饱满，从而改善面部轮廓，因而有助于使皮肤更加丰盈。
这种丰盈霜有 3D 紧致效果，可巩固皮肤再次变得紧致的效果，而 3D 提升效果则会立即产生皮肤张机效果。 其质地成分丰富而细腻，色如玫瑰花瓣，既能迅速吸收，又能给人以皮肤得到支撑并且极其舒适的感觉。
使用说明：
name: Defilift 完美设计高效丰盈霜

product_description:
Transform lack-lustre skin with the Time Bomb InstaWOW Bubbling Face Mask; a self-foaming, energising treatment that expertly cleanses and hydrates dull, dry complexions.
Harnessing the powers of Glycerine, the revitalising face mask effortlessly dissolves dirt, make-up and pore-clogging impurities, whilst delivering instant moisture and hydration to reveal smoother, more refined skin with a luminous glow. Citrus Extracts combat uneven tone and texture for a clarified, rejuvenated complexion.
name: Bomb InstaWOW Bubbling Face Mask 50ml

product_description: 裴禮康葉綠素面膜使用植物營養微囊劑配方，可深入清潔皮膚和解毒。此面膜可改善沒有光澤、暗沉和疲勞肌膚、變粗的毛孔、細紋和粗糙的肌膚紋理，改善膚色。 -SA
name: MD 裴礼康叶绿素面膜 59ml

product_description:
菲迪曼控油净肤面膜 精心研制让您轻松滋养和保护您的皮肤。 天然成分减少表面油光和皮肤紧张，柔和、芳香的补水成分则缓解肌肤毛孔堵塞和污染爆发。
这一极度敏感面膜内含希蒙得木油性水分和绿泥紧缩毛孔成分，快速消除毒素，还您健康、明亮肌肤。 面膜使用时仍然保持质感，富有延展性，非常适混合性皮肤。 C.R

The DermaTx Brighten Microdermabrasion Cream has been expertly designed to be used in conjunction with the DermaTx Microdermabrasion Face Tool, which utilises advanced micro-pulsing vibrations to deeply massage and exfoliate skin. Ideal for dull, fatigued skin.
This professional grade treatment contains Corundum Crystals to gently buff away dead skin cells that cause dullness, effectively stimulating microcirculation and cell renewal for skin that looks polished and revitalised.
Sabiwhite™ acts as a natural skin brightener, while antioxidant-rich Vitamin C seeks to fade discolouration and age spots. The addition of age-defying Retinol helps to accelerate natural collagen production levels, minimising the look of fine lines and wrinkles.
The advanced system is an at-home alternative to professional microdermabrasion treatments, delivering effective results to reveal a cleansed, rejuvenated and smoother looking complexion with a youthful-looking glow.
name: Brighten Microdermabrasion Cream 75ml

product_description:
茱莉蔻植萃活齡喚膚霜提升你的美麗法則，蘊含天然活性成分，有助於皮膚清潔促進細胞更新，給予肌膚白亮勻透的光澤感. 
茱莉蔻致力於生命、活力、美麗的結合，所有這一切都可以在茱莉蔻植萃活齡喚膚霜中體現出來。減少毛孔的粗大，皮膚紋理不均勻，和膚色不均等問題，內含金盞花，馬栗樹皮樹提取物的生命活力，帶你給肌膚明亮和健康的光澤. 
使用說明:

采用正在申请专利的先进突破性 PTR Firma-CELL-4 技术，由四种分子活性肽组成，包括 Argireliner（六胜肽）、SYN-COLL、五胜肽和寡肽，这些成分共同作用可缓解深皱纹和细纹，让肌肤再现年轻光彩。Firma-CELL-4 可渗透到不同表皮层，促进胶原蛋白和弹性蛋白的合成，视黄醇可紧致提拉肌肤，令肌肤光滑透亮。Firma-CELL-4、乙醇酸、维生素 A、C（抗坏血酸）和 E 提供革命性的呵护。
name: Thomas Roth 彼得罗夫极轻柔防衰老细胞修护霜（娃娃小脸霜） 43g

product_description:
Achieve a close, comfortable shave with the Exotic Oud Shaving Oil from Carsons Apothecary; a brand who combine traditional formulas with high performance results. Developed for use pre and post shave, the protective oil softens and lifts hairs, whilst hydrating and conditioning skin to prevent moisture loss.
Infused with a nourishing blend of Rosehip, Grapeseed and Sweet Almond Oils, its caring formula allows the razor to glide effortlessly over skin with minimised friction, nicks and burns, whilst delivering a masculine fragrance of Arabian oud layered with citrus tones. Skin is left soft, smooth and restored.
name: Apothecary Exotic Oud Shaving Oil

product_description:
this works No Wrinkles时间剂量面膜 (75ml) 是一款完美的面膜，旨在滋润您的肌肤、减少皱纹的出现，可以取得现时和长远的效果。 这款面膜具有时敏和奇妙的去角质配方，可以用三种不同的方式使用；敷用 10 分钟或 20 分钟或用作通宵美容面膜。 - E.D
主要优点： 
10分钟 - Perfect于需要增强信心的时候，这种使用方法可以立即滋润肌肤，使您的肌肤看起来健康而饱满。
20分钟- 在这儿20分钟内，配方中的越桔、甘蔗、糖枫、橙、柠檬酸有时间去除死皮细胞。 结果？ 令肌肤变得晶莹剔透、焕然一新、更加水嫩。
通宵 - 可以收获将这款面膜用作深层保湿系统的好处，该系统采用了目前的活性剂（如紫草根和仙人球）， 确保您醒来时拥有晶莹剔透、焕然一新以及散发健康光泽的肌肤。
name: works No Wrinkles时间剂量面膜 (75ml)

product_description:
Elizabeth Arden Flawless Future Eye Gel Powered by Ceramide可有效减少开始出现的岁月痕迹，这款活肤眼霜能瞬间提亮眼周肌肤，防止出现紧张疲劳痕迹和黑眼圈。
本品蕴含神经酰胺、保护性蛋白复合成分和强效亮肤成分，帮您保持清新面容；专业眼科涂嘴带给肌肤清凉感觉，同时有效减少鱼尾纹。
它还含有海藻精华复合成分，能减少眼部的黑眼圈和浮肿，重新焕发年轻光彩。 -SA
name: Arden Flawless Future Eye Gel Powered by Ceramide (15ml)

product_description: Unique and effective, the Cosmetics 27 by ME - Skinlab Plasma is a bio-lifting cell restoring mask designed to give you younger looking, naturally radiant skin. Containing natural extracts of Centella Asiatica, it should be applied to the face a 'second skin' in order for it to regenerate and restructure the skin whilst rebalancing and re-activating cellular functions. Your complexion will be left feeling as good as new! K.D.
name: 27 by ME - Skinlab Plasma (4.23ml)

product_description:
本品经科学证明，可滋润敏感的眼部肌肤，不导致发红或发炎。
质地轻薄，帮助减少眼下虚肿。
配方包含柔滑棉花提取物，帮助肌肤再生外表皮，将潜在刺激降至最低，例如粗糙的肥皂或洁肤剂。同时，大米提取物滋润肌肤，而芦荟可舒缓肌肤。
包含以抗炎性出名的白艾草提取物和包含认为可减少发炎的丹宁酸的小米草。
name: Bees 小蜜蜂抗敏感眼霜 10g

product_description:
資生堂盼麗風姿抗皺修護眼霜幫助消除眼周明顯的歲月痕跡，是肌膚順滑，緊緻，使肌膚看起來更加年輕。 
對抗眼部肌膚各種問題的一款豐潤眼霜，針對引發各種皺紋的根源，改善眼部周圍的五種類型皺紋。能不斷地為肌膚注入瑩潤滋養，使眼部周圍肌膚平滑、光澤，更顯年輕。 
同時，營養成分是混合了生物透明質酸和羥脯氨酸立刻為肌膚提供充足的水分，為肌膚提供自然的膠原蛋白。您的眼睛將會看起來更加順滑。 
 使用方法:

Eucerin® 优色林超敏感肌肤舒缓护理液是一款专门针对超敏感肌肤而设计的日晚霜，可在瞬间平静肌肤，消除干燥肌肤的红血丝，让肌肤得到持久舒缓。 其创新的配方含有活性成分 SymSitive，可瞬间减轻肌肤的灼热感、刺痛和麻刺感，舒缓肌肤。 SymSitive 可预防肌肤的过度反应，随着长时间的使用，可有效增强肌肤的耐受性，帮助提高肌肤对压力源的抵抗力。 面霜中的特殊蜡质可让肌肤感觉滋润，因此您可以感觉肌肤更水润，刺激感减轻。 E.N. 
敏感肌肤系列的所有产品均采用防污染包装材料，以防止配方受污染和氧化。 真空包装配备有抑菌过滤器，连接处经过超精细的焊接，以提供良好的封闭性，开口经过严格密封。
name: 优色林超敏感肌肤舒缓护理液（50 毫升）

product_description:
The GLOV Comfort Hydro Cleanser is an effortless, efficient and simple way to cleanse skin without the need for a cleanser, ideal for removing stubborn and heavy makeup in difficult-to-reach areas.   
Utilising advanced microtechnology, the ‘heavy duty’ cleansing glove contains refined, star-shaped fibres up to 30 times thinner than a cotton pad, which boast superior electrostatic properties to absorb makeup, dirt and excess oil like a magnet. The larger, square shaped design is perfect for the eye contour and covering larger surface area across the neck and décolletage.
Suitable for every skin type and contact lens wearers, the delicate and naturally antibacterial glove delivers a light yet effective clean with a gentle peeling effect to unveil skin that feels fresher and revitalised. Simply use the make up removing tool with water for an instantly purified and smooth complexion.
name: Comfort Hydro Cleanser

product_description: Shiseido BioPerformance Advanced Super Revitalizer Cream Whitening Formula能有效抵抗有害环境因素的侵扰。 这款奢华的高浓缩活肤霜能明显减少细纹，改善粗糙干燥肌肤，补充肌肤水分，预防肌肤早衰。 -SA
name: BioPerformance Advanced Super Revitalizer Cream Whitening Formula (50ml)

product_description: My PAYOT 亮白日霜是 PAYOT 的一个品牌产品，令肌肤再次焕发健康光泽 。 这款日霜可被肌肤快速吸收。含枸杞和巴西莓浆果的超果粒，可刺激血液循环、令肌肤亮泽；成分维生素 B5 可提供最佳的保湿功效，还您一个更亮泽、更年轻的肌肤。 本品适合所有肌肤类型。配方可使肌肤重新焕发光泽、滋养肌肤、修复肌肤，使肌肤饱满充盈。
name: PAYOT 亮白日霜50ml

product_description:
Elizabeth Arden 金致甦活霜 SPF30 将为肌肤注入水活力和营养。 富含多种矿物质和视黄醇，经过临床证明，能够有效减少细纹和皱纹，均匀肤色。
生活总在不断变化，我们的肌肤也是如此。 随着年龄的不断增长，肌肤会逐渐流失脂质、矿物质和其他必须营养成分，而且对肌肤非常重要的胶原蛋白水平也将降低，失去弹性。 细胞新陈代谢变缓。 肌肤将变得干枯暗沉，出现肤色不均和细纹等问题。 Elizabeth Arden 金致甦活霜 SPF30 富含具有补水功效的神经酰胺、营养丰富的海洋矿物质以及高效视黄醇，促进肌肤自然生成胶原蛋白，使肌肤恍然一新，散发水润光泽。
经过女性顾客测试结果显示：
name: Arden 金致甦活霜 SPF30（50ml）

product_description:
Treat stressed, delicate complexions to May Lindstrom Skin The Blue Cocoon Beauty Balm Concentrate; a multi-tasking, mystical blue balm that transforms into a fluid potion upon contact with skin.
Infused with Blue Tansy and Camellia Oils, the lightweight, silky formula delivers instant relief to even the most troubled, sensitive skin; it helps to reduce redness and irritation whilst nourishing and protecting for long-lasting comfort.
Ideal for the eye and lip area, its moisturising blend of Shea Butter and Marula Oil softens and conditions skin, whilst aromatic oils soothe and relax the senses. Formulated and hand-blended in micro-batches for ultimate freshness and efficacy, you can expect a calm, supple complexion without unwanted residue.
name: Lindstrom Skin The Blue Cocoon Beauty Balm Concentrate

product_description: Dr. Hauschka 舒缓强效修复精华专为敏感、易受刺激的肌肤而配制，能够迅速镇静并强韧肌肤。 这款产品特别添加了疗伤绒毛花和伽蓝精华，配合黑电气石，稳定并舒缓受刺激的肌肤；富含冰叶日中花精华，镇静并舒缓肌肤；另外，玫瑰纯露还能保持肌肤的水油平衡。 显著减少红血丝的出现，让肤色更加自然均匀。 - L.M.
name: Hauschka 舒缓强效修复精华 40ml

product_description:
Comfort dehydrated lips with the Hemp Hemp Lip Balm from MÁDARA. Offering protection from the first application, the rich lip balm ensures lips remain soft and ultra-hydrated.
Enriched with a lip-loving blend of Olive oil, Shea butter and Hemp oil, the nourishing formula energises skin’s protective barrier. The lip treatment is rich in fatty acids that offer potent anti-ageing effects, as well as antioxidants. Meeting the needs of dry and chapped lips, the balm offers long lasting moisture and comfort. Complete with a subtle, green and citrus fragrance, with hints of nutty hemp.
name: Hemp Hemp Lip Balm 15ml

product_description: PAYOT 柏姿男士深层清洁卸妆啫喱可有效焕活您的肌肤。 这款爽肤型泡沫洁面啫喱专门为男士而设计，它蕴含有祛角质微粒，可有效祛除污垢和死皮细胞，与此同时，铜离子和铁离子可有效净化和深层清洁毛孔，让您的肌肤看起来更加细嫩健康，并带有哑光效果。 为剃须做好准备，增强其他护肤品的功效，包括保湿霜。
name: 柏姿男士深层清洁卸妆啫喱 150ml

product_description:
IOMA活力抗衰老面霜，质地柔滑，盖子内含保湿传感器，使肌肤看起来年轻靓丽。 这款抗衰老面霜，蕴含高浓度的活性成分，可滋润肌肤、清热解毒，使肌肤再生、保护肌肤。 其目标是抚平细纹和皱纹，拉紧提升肌肤、使肌肤容光焕发。
该专利技术传感器可测量皮肤水合水平，确定您的肌肤应该涂抹的面霜量。 当传感器放置在脸颊，LED指示灯亮起，显示您所需的涂抹频率。 长期有效地使用本品，可改善肤质 。 – E.W.

使用玉蘭油新生塑顏膚色糾正保濕霜可打造光彩柔滑的完美肌膚，本品可快速改善面部肌膚，僅需2 週即可減少皺紋的出現。本品可快速減少瑕疵的出現，該系列分為3 個不同色度，完美適用於所有膚色。這款保濕霜包含一種重要的葡萄糖胺複合物，還特別添加SPF 15 防護成分，可有效阻擋UVA 和UVB 有害光線，令您的皮膚得到全天候的強化和保護。 KD 
 使用說明：
name: 玉兰油新生塑颜肤色纠正保湿霜 - 中等肤色 (50ml)

product_description: BAKEL乳糖抗衰老精华内含三种专有活性成分，其独家抗衰老配方滋养和保护面部肌肤，使面部肌肤紧致。 精华液将具备滋养作用的蔬菜甘油和具有抗氧化作用的乳糖酸相结合，借助葡糖酸内酯能有效地改善皮肤血管肿胀，保护皮肤免受因太阳曝晒引起的皮肤瑕疵。 您的皮肤将会拥有更加健康的肤色，更好的质感，更佳的保护。Bakel 所有产品均使用 100% 天然活性成分，确保您肌肤接触的所有成分均健康、天然和纯净。 Bakel 的每款产品均不含香料、酒精、人工色素、防腐剂或动物成分，且所有产品经过皮肤测试，过敏风险降到最低。 Bakel 产品配方建立在客观和科学验证基础之上，适用于所有肌肤类型，可抵御各种致肌肤衰老各种主要问题。 - K.N化妆品成分和作用：甘油（植物性）=  滋养 乳糖酸= 抗氧化葡萄糖酸内酯= 紧致肌肤

Intensively replenish skin with the Lancôme Hydra Zen Night Mask; a powerful overnight treatment with an exquisite hybrid texture.
Let the stress of the day melt away as the rich mask rapidly absorbs into skin, with the refreshing sensation of a serum combined with the relaxing application ritual of a mask. Especially developed to combat signs of visible stress and fatigue, it delivers essential hydration and nourishment, working to improve the look of fine lines, dullness and puffiness.
Awaken to a complexion that feels plumped and refreshed, with a luminous and more even looking tone.
name: Hydra Zen Night Mask 75ml

product_description:
Rewind the years with the Chin & Cheek Lifting Mask from MAGICSTRIPES. The innovative, single use masks are designed to visibly reduce fine lines in the cheek and chin area, leaving behind smooth and youthful looking skin.
The cooling mask also provides a lifting boost, visibly tightening and lifting loose skin within this area. The lifting effect mirrors a stimulating facial massage, activating the natural blood circulation in the face and therefore promoting the absorption of the effective ingredients.
name: Chin & Cheek Lifting Mask x 5 Sachets

product_description:
Ultrasun Family SPF 30 - Super Sensitive可有效保护您和您家人的肌肤，提供全天的防晒保护。
本品的特制配方不含油脂、乳化剂和香料，非常适合儿童的娇嫩肌肤，并能预防日晒造成的痱子等不适反应。 只需涂抹一次即能提供全天保护，让您有充分时间和家人享受阳光。 与其它Ultrasun产品一样配备了真空瓶压嘴，能有效避免产品变质或受到污染，让您能更长久地使用。
name: Family SPF 30 - Super Sensitive (150ml)

product_description:
使用 Jack Black Bump Fix Solution，避免剃须后的刺激感。这是一种修复配方，可抚慰肌肤，防止剃刀碰撞和向内生长的胡须。
本配方含 2% 水杨酸和乳酸的独特共混物，可有效去除死皮细胞，令胡须顺滑。胡须打结是造成剃刀碰撞和胡须向内生长的一大原因。 Bump Fix 可深层补水，帮助清洁堵塞的油性毛孔，防止斑点和黑头的产生，同时舒缓干燥和刺激感。 最佳的剃须后护理。
name: Black Razor Bump and Ingrown Hair Solution 177ml

product_description:
Jack Black 推出急救蛋白精华液；其获奖的快速吸收配方可为面部和眼部肌肤带来多重益处。
这款高效精华蕴含有 Matrixyl 3000®，是一种独特的胶原蛋白激活肽，可有效应对细纹、皱纹和缺乏弹性的肌肤，而有机绿茶可为肌肤提供抗氧化保护，有效应对自由基的损伤。
它将 Omega-3 脂肪酸与该品牌荣获专利的 Renovage® 成分完美集合，以实现超级抗氧化功效，而其丝滑的液体质地可使其渗透到肌肤深层，最大化淡化暗斑和色素沉着，让肌肤更加光滑细嫩。
name: Black 急救蛋白精华液（60ml）

product_description:
this works 温和洁肤洗面奶（120ml）适合所有肌肤类型，帮助肌肤恢复平衡，去除化妆品残留和杂质，带给您水润柔嫩的肌肤。
特别添加了富含维生素A的玫瑰果油，另外，具有抗菌功效的乳香和桉树精华还能彻底清洁肌肤。 这款奢华的洗面奶采用温和配方，不会损伤肌肤，不干燥，让您的肌肤更加柔嫩，容光焕发。 - L.M.

使用说明：
name: works 温和洁肤洗面奶（120ml）

product_description:
这款 Olay 多效紧致毛孔 CC 霜拥有 BB 霜的完美功能，最适合于白皙的肌肤，可瞬间提供完美无瑕的妆容。 这种肤色校正霜是一款重要的产品，拥有 7 项强大的抗衰老优势，有助于完善肤色，让您拥有更青春的肌肤。 - E.D
- 最大程度减少细纹，因为本品可明显减少细纹和皱纹的产生。
- 滋养保湿，赋予肌肤活力四射的健康亮泽。
- 色调增强，有助于平衡色泽并减少老年斑。
- 温和去角质，顺滑和抚平肌肤质地。
- 毛孔细化，尽量减少毛孔粗大的情况。
- 微妙的紧肤作用，滋润肌肤，使其更加紧致。
- 通过抗氧化剂混合成分，有助于防止对肌肤表层的自由基损伤。
name: 多效紧致毛孔 CC 霜 - 白皙/中等偏黄肤色（50ml）

product_description:
Elizabeth Arden Flawless Future Moisture Cream SPF30 PA++ Powered by Ceramide可卓效滋润您的肌肤。 这款润肤霜能减少暗疮、平滑毛孔，令肌肤水嫩光滑、肤色均匀，有瞬间亮白肌肤的功效。 <iframe width="400" height="225" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/mdvz7FPWccI&list?rel=0" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen></iframe>
本品质地轻盈、可日常使用，特别适合忙碌一族；其蕴含神经酰胺、保护性蛋白复合成分和强效亮肤成分，令肌肤重新焕发健康光泽。 -SA
name: Arden Flawless Future Moisture Cream SPF30 PA++ Powered by Ceramide (50ml)

product_description: 使用 Tanworx 美黑乳 - 深色至超深色（200ml），让肌肤持久美黑，散发古铜亮泽，同时还能滋润肌肤。 这款美黑乳能够立即加深肤色，逐渐散发长效持久的古铜光泽，同时肌肤还将变得光滑柔嫩，重现活力。 -SA
name: 美黑乳 - 深色至超深色（200ml）

product_description:
Catering for all skin types, the Jack Black Clean Break™ Oil-Free Moisturiser delivers intense moisture and hydration for super smooth, healthy-looking skin.
Powered by an organic botanical blend of Basil, White Tea and Sea Kelp, the antioxidant-rich formula defends against free radical damage and environmental aggressors, whilst Niacinamide combats uneven skin tone and texture. A dose of Sodium Hyaluronate leaves skin replenished and revitalised without greasy residue.
name: Black Clean Break Oil-Free Moisturizer

product_description: 利用来自Green People的水果磨砂洁面膏恢复活力四射、光彩照人的肌肤 。 富含有机杏、佛手柑和柑橘成分，每周护理磨砂肌肤表面，消除死皮细胞、污垢及杂质，展现细嫩、柔滑的肌肤，且不会过度干燥。 带来令人神清气爽的柑橘香气，并保持肌肤的天然油脂，让您体验经过平衡调理、美丽亮白、天鹅绒般柔软的肌肤。 E.N.
name: People水果磨砂洁面膏（50ml）

product_description:
Antipodes 欣悅高蛋白乳液質地光滑，適合夜間使用，有助於修復乾燥受損的肌膚。該款有機乳液富含喜馬拉雅枸杞。這種鮮果中含有19 種氨基酸，有助於改善肌膚的外觀。 
天然乳清配方活力醒膚，搭配富含必需脂肪的黑醋栗、芙蓉花，富有漿果香氣，給人純淨愉悅的芬芳。 
適用於普通和偏乾性皮膚，乳清有助於肌膚恢復彈性，帶來自然光彩，保護肌膚。 -SA 
 使用說明： 夜間日常皮膚清潔後，塗抹於面部、頸部和胸前裸露皮膚。
name: 欣悦高蛋白乳液

product_description:
Astalift Jelly Aquarysta Rejuvenating Concentrate Serum 是一款独特的抗衰老产品，旨在减少细纹、皱纹和黑斑。 Astalift 由 FUJIFILM 打造，是一个屡获殊荣的美容品牌，采用类似于防止照片褪色的先进抗氧化技术，减少雀斑并减轻肌肤衰老。
胶冻的创新配方含有肌肤中的一种重要结构蛋白——胶原质，也是照相胶片中使用的一种关键成分。 FUJIFILM 已将纳米技术专长用于研发胶片的颜色，并将其应用于胶冻，使得高浓度的滋养成分可渗透至肌肤。 该品牌的图像分析技术知识也被用于开发可增强肤色的产品。 大马士革玫瑰可有效地丰润肌肤，呈现更青春的亮泽肤色。 E.N.
name: Jelly Aquarysta Rejuvenating Concentrate Serum (40g)

product_description:
Combat signs of ageing with the Wrinkle Killer Anti-Ageing Serum from skinChemists. The lavish treatment is designed to smooth the skin in a three step process of freezing, firming and hydrating to leave you with a more youthful looking complexion.
Targeting problem areas such as the eyes, forehead and mouth, the innovative serum is enriched with the active ingredient Syn-Ake, a potent peptide that mimics the effects of snake venom. Concentrated spheres of the peptide work to painlessly prevent muscle contractions, which lead to fine lines and wrinkles. Enriched with Aloe Vera and Allantoin, natural elasticity and firmness is restored and skin is left hydrated and smooth.
name: Wrinkle Killer Anti-Ageing Serum 50ml

product_description:
针对痘痘敏感性肌肤使用Garnier Pure Active EXFO-Brusher Face Wash，一款含有去角质刷子的纯净洁面乳。
洁面乳能够清除杂质，去除死皮细胞。含有的水杨酸，天然活性取自蓝莓的"HerbaSoothe"能够有效疏通毛孔，减少肌肤表面油脂，淡化痘印。 抛光刷子是温和清除去角质的最佳工具；皮肤因而感觉柔软，焕然一新，充满抵御细菌侵入的营养。 - K.N
name: Pure Active Exfo-Brusher Face Wash (150ml)

product_description: This cream, developed by Dr. Luigi Polla, was specifically made to hydrate and soften the skin. This moisturizing cream provides instant relief from dry, chapped, uncomfortable skin. This cream is ideal for hands, elbows, knees, feet and other areas that need an extra dose of moisture and protection.
name: Forever Dry Skin Balm

product_description: Shiseido IBUKI Protective Moisturizer能有效淡化毛孔、痘痘和暗疮。 本品含有红色和金色反光粉末，瞬间令肌肤焕发健康光泽、面貌一新。 -SA
name: IBUKI Protective Moisturizer (75ml)

product_description: Treat skin to the yes to Argan Oil Mud Mask; a luxurious face mask that contains the powerhouse natural ingredient Argan Oil to intensively brighten and moisturise skin. Simply sit back and indulge in a spa-like experience as the detoxifying mask works its magic to unveil a radiant and softened complexion.
name: to Argan Oil Mud Mask

product_description: Shiseido BioPerformance Super Corrective Serum能抵御皱纹，改善松弛和暗沉肌肤。 本品能恢复胶原蛋白、弹性蛋白和透明质酸的再生能力，令肌肤焕发年轻光彩。 其蕴含的革命性新生肌活因子（Bio-Corrective Complex）能提升肌肤亮度，令肌肤更显光滑润泽。 -SA
name: BioPerformance Super Corrective Serum (30ml)

product_description:
Awaken to nourished skin with the Overnight Multi Action Treatment from Perricone MD; an advanced anti-ageing face cream that works to tone, firm and revitalise with a proprietary blend of patented sciences and natural extracts.
Expertly developed to treat skin at night when it needs intensive nourishment, the soothing moisturiser has a rich, intensively hydrating formula that effortlessly absorbs without feeling greasy. Fortified with antioxidant-rich Alpha Lipoic Acid, it works to refine the surface layer of skin, diminishing the look of fine lines and enlarged pores, while DMAE delivers a visible lifting and tightening effect.
Suitable for daily use, unveil a replenished, refreshed and smoother feeling complexion with a renewed radiance.
name: MD Overnight Multi Action Treatment 59ml

product_description:
Deeply cleanse skin with the Carbon Neutral Charcoal Purifying Pod Mask from FACEINC by nails inc.
Ideal for congested, acne prone and oily skin types, the powerful formula harnesses a blend of Moroccan Lava Clay and activated Charcoal to draw out impurities from skin, absorb excess oil and effectively unclog pores.
Suitable for use on the hands, face and body, the single shot treatment leaves skin feeling intensively purified, balanced and refreshed with a youthful looking glow.
name: by nails inc. Carbon Neutral Charcoal Purifying Pod Mask 10ml

product_description: L'Oréal Paris Skin Perfection Purifying Micellar Water，适用于敏感性皮肤的高效清洁水。 化妆师专用的"胶束"溶液，快速去除所有化妆痕迹，如磁铁一般吸附肌肤表面，捕捉并吸除多余油脂和杂质。 极致温和，让您的皮肤倍感舒缓、紧致。 超低致敏。 不含酒精。 通过了皮肤科专家的临床试验。 - S.C
name: Paris Dermo Expertise Skin Perfection 3 In 1 Purifying Micellar Solution (200ml)

product_description:
这款 Nuxe Creme Fraiche 精华液可以提供 24 小时滋润，非常适合需要一些保湿的干性、敏感型肌肤。 这款精华液具有舒缓、镇静的功效，其轻盈的质地很容易为肌肤吸收，使肌肤如丝绸般柔软。
这款精华液适合用于眼部轮廓区域，可有效镇静剃刀烧伤，其配方蕴含透明质酸和海蓬子，可以提高水分水平，令肌肤整天都超柔软和水润。
name: Creme Fraiche精华霜（适合 Dry 至非常 Dry Skin）(30ml)

product_description: Drench skin with the Aragospa Aqua Mist from Korean brand Skin79; an ultra-lightweight, refreshing facial mist to rejuvenate and moisturise. Fortified with a Multi-Layered Water Holding System™, it contains Jeju Aragonite Thermal Water to delivers essential minerals and hydration with a layered water wall ensuring long-lasting results and a toned, brightened and refined complexion.
name: Aragospa Aqua Mist 120ml

product_description:
Dr. Hauschka 新生强效修复精华专为失衡的肌肤而配制，是熟龄肌肤的理想选择。
这款多效产品特别添加了圣母百合、银杏和山楂果精油，配合蓝电气石、琥珀和黄金，促进肌肤天然的新陈代谢，还可以对抗皱纹和干燥等肌肤问题。 - L.M.
name: Hauschka 新生强效修复精华 40ml

product_description:
Awaken your complexion with the anti-ageing Rejuvenate Face Serum Oil from AromaWorks. Delivering a floral aroma, the luxurious oil designed to provide you with a more youthful looking complexion.
The oil targets visible signs of ageing such as fine lines, wrinkles and any discolouration. Infused with Sea Buckthorn oil, Sandalwood and Neroli, the formula is able to reduce the appearance of these, whilst visibly plumping skin to deliver a younger look. A nourishing blend of Coconut, Jojoba and Moringa oil also work harmoniously to moisturise the face and boost the complexion with Vitamin A and C. Skin is left visibly more radiant. Ideal for mature skin types.
name: Rejuvenate Face Serum Oil 30ml

product_description:
Care for exhausted skin with the Mizon Night Repair Seruming Ampoule Serum; an anti-ageing treatment that revitalises the complexion whilst skin is most receptive to repair. Simply apply a few drops before going to bed and awake to youthful skin.
The potent formula is fortified with Lecithin, which boosts skin’s regenerative ability and reduces the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles to deliver a stress-free appearance. Vitamin E combines with antioxidants and an effective peptide to visibly improve skin’s elasticity and ensure the face is youthful and supple. Harnessing the powers of Lathyrus Japonicas Wild extract and Natto Gum, the serum also works to prevent future signs of ageing.
Delivering a veil of moisture, the serum controls skin’s hydration levels and eliminates the need for a moisturiser. The ampoule treatment is complete with a dose of Adenosine and Niacinamide, which work harmoniously to brighten skin’s appearance and leave the complexion ultra-smooth. Expect to wake to younger looking skin that is clear and radiant.
name: Night Repair Seruming Ampoule Serum 30ml

product_description: Dr. Hauschka 眼霜适合所有肌肤类型，呵护娇嫩的眼周肌肤，有效增加眼部肌肤弹性，减少细纹和皱纹。 特别添加了胡萝卜、金盏花和疗伤绒毛花提取物，舒缓并保护肌肤；富含杏仁油、荷荷巴油和蜂蜡，让肌肤变得嫩滑水润。 让娇嫩的眼周肌肤呈现年轻活力。 - L.M.
name: Hauschka 眼霜10ml

product_description:
Dr. Brandt 柏瑞特医生毛孔清透净颜滋养霜是一款控油面霜，可帮助打通堵塞的毛孔，清理和缩小毛孔，补充水分，对毛囊角化症有治疗作用，本品是油型/混合型肌肤的理想选择。
Dr. Brandt 柏瑞特医生毛孔清透净颜滋养霜配方中含有茶树精油，是一种重要的抗菌剂；水杨酸可祛除杂质和坏死的肌肤细胞，保持毛孔清洁，防止堵塞；玻璃酸可吸收和保持水分，增加肌肤的丰盈度， 可有效清理和缩小毛孔。
使用说明：
name: Brandt 柏瑞特医生®毛孔清透净颜滋养霜（50 克）

product_description: 利用来自Green People的Zap & Clear斑点控制精华液消除斑点和缺陷。 搭配黑色柳树皮成分，其强效配方提供深层清洁，以消除导致发炎的细菌和死皮细胞，令肌肤清爽洁净。拥有适合旅行的包装尺寸，它混合芦荟、洋甘菊、茶树成分，在旅途中舒缓痤疮和刺激，同时抚慰容易发红的肌肤，恢复持久舒适。 E.N.
name: People Zap & Clear斑点控制精华液（10ml）

product_description:
德国世家再生精华可促进肌肤再生，使肌肤更光滑更柔软，非常适合成熟或衰老的皮肤。富含抚平皱纹的温柏籽和高凉菜提取物，还包含可细化和保护肌肤的抗氧化红三叶草。- L.M.
使用说明： 早晚洁面和爽肤后涂在肌肤上。
name: Hauschka 德国世家再生精华 30g

product_description:
可用 Chantecaille 的升级版生物提升霜重新发现皮肤保持年轻的能力；这是一种新颖的抗衰老面霜，可处理主要衰老迹象，以使皮肤看起来明亮，得到补水并且更加光滑。
这种有补水作用的配方护肤品是原面霜的增效版，可以防止失去密度、弹性，防止出现皱纹和防止失去水分为目标发挥作用。 这种面霜采用高效抗氧化生育三烯酚，可对皮肤的保护层进行专业级恢复，以使水分被锁定，还采用主要成分是植物的白茅，既能强效补水，又能发挥提升作用。 这种柔滑的精华霜主要通过纯玫瑰水配制而成，已用新颖的技术和五种植物（生物嫩肤因子、车前子、无咖啡因咖啡、月桂树干和覆盆子）干细胞强化，以便进一步淡化皱纹，丰盈肌肤并补充水分，以及增大容积并提高亮度。
这是相对于原配方的增效版配方，其修复和舒缓特性有助于使皮肤恢复年轻的外观，而六肽则可应对并进一步防止皱纹的出现。
面部皮肤看起来会重新显出轮廓，得到补水并且更加年轻。
name: 升级版生物提升霜 50ml

product_description:
Refresh and reawaken your skin with Mavala's Skin Vitality Vitalizing Alpine Micro Mist, a hydrating facial mist that delivers a veil of moisture onto skin to help wake up tired, lack lustre complexions.
Perfect for perking up skin when signs of fatigue set in, use it first thing in the morning as an invigorating wake up, or spritz over face at any time of the day as a refreshing pick-me-up. Hydrating, softening and energising, the ultra-fine spray contains decongesting Cornflower Water, and Swiss Apricot extract to help tone and exfoliate whilst delivering antioxidant benefits. Skin appears immediately glowing and feels replenished and well-rested. Can be used before makeup application, or for setting makeup in place. Delicately scented. Gas free spray.
name: Skin Vitality Vitalizing Alpine Micro Mist 125ml

product_description:
使用The Method: Polish恢復皮膚的自然光采；該款溫和去角質產品對皮膚的細緻護理使皮膚看起來清新、亮麗，更顯年輕。 
面部磨砂膏富含純礦物質和植物酶，包括褐海藻，它所包含的均勻的氧化鎂和碳酸氫鈉非研磨去角質晶體可去除無光澤的死皮細胞；每個粒子的大小和形狀都均勻一致，所以沒有割傷或劃傷皮膚的危險。去角質膏在呈現更加柔和而亮麗的肌膚同時，使皮膚做好準備以吸收其他滋養護理品。皮膚得到滋養、軟化和更新。
name: Method: Polish (120g)

product_description:
Get a natural beauty sleep with Burt's Bees Intense Hydration Night Cream; a rich, powerful treatment to transform dry, dull and lacklustre skin overnight.
Brimming with natural extracts and vitamins, the non-greasy formula quickly melts into skin, with Clary Sage helping to attract and seal in moisture for long-lasting hydration. A soothing blend of essential oils and signature Beeswax leaves skin feeling soft and supple, with the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles visibly reduced. Awaken to a replenished and regenerated complexion.
name: Bees Intense Hydration Night Cream 50g

product_description:
用StriVectin AR高级维生素A浓缩精华液增加光彩。 配方融汇了NIA-114技术，可重建天然的皮肤屏障，减少细纹和皱纹的出现。 这款轻巧而强大的精华液含有高浓度维生素A，可强化皮肤，消除衰老迹象。 缺陷变得不太明显，赋予皮肤更光滑、更细腻的质地和更均匀的色调。 E.N. 
使用指南： 早晚保湿前搽到洗净的脸上。 打圈按摩，直到精华液被完全吸进皮肤。
name: AR™AR高级浓缩精华素（30毫升/1盎司）

product_description:
Treat your skin to the reparative properties of yes to Blueberries Intense Skin Repair Serum, an anti-ageing serum that works to replenish essential fatty acids and vitamins to revive age-damaged skin.
Fortified with organic Cotton Thistle, antioxidant Blueberries and natural Alpha Hydroxy Acids from Apple, the serum delivers a veil of vitamins onto skin, helping to restore and repair whilst nourishing, calming and brightening. Fine lines and wrinkles are addressed, and dull, lack-lustre skin appears radiant, revitalised and younger-looking with a more even tone.
name: to Blueberries Intense Skin Repair Serum

product_description:
Rescue stressed dry skin with the MÁDARA SOS Hydra Recharge Cream, a soft-textured organic moisturiser that works to intensively hydrate and replenish skin.
Enriched with a potent natural blend of Northern Peony, Linseed and Hyaluronic Acid, the formula seeks to restore a youthful, healthier-looking radiance, brimming with antioxidants and vitamins to protect skin from external aggressors and environmental damage. As a result, the appearance of fine lines is reduced and your complexion is left feeling softened, nourished and calm.
name: SOS Hydra Recharge Cream 50ml

product_description:
Revive and rejuvenated weary eyes with the yes to Grapefruit Dark Circle Correcting Eye Cream, a brightening eye treatment that works to visibly diminish signs of ageing and fatigue around the eyes.
Clinically proven to reduce the appearance of dark circles in four weeks, the lightweight eye cream is infused with antioxidant and Vitamin-rich Grapefruit to brighten skin, and a dose of Liquorice Root that calms and evens skin tone for a healthier-looking, more radiant complexion. Age spots appear faded and fine lines and wrinkles are diminished. Delicate skin around the eyes looks illuminated, energised and younger.
name: to Grapefruit Dark Circle Correcting Eye Cream

product_description:
Relax the mind and body with the Real Luxury Face, Body & Hair Oil from NEOM’s Scent To Instantly De-Stress™ collection. Designed to visibly improve the health of skin, hair and the scalp, the nourishing oil leaves locks and skin ultra-soft, whilst boasting a comforting scent.
The luxurious oil comprises a natural fragrance that combines pure essential oils. Enriched with a blend of French Lavender, Jasmine and Brazilian Rosewood, the multi-tasking formula envelops skin and hair in a calming aroma that banishes feelings of stress. In addition, Vitamin E and A work in synergy to repair, protect and restore.
The Real Luxury oil is complete with a hydrating combination of Safflower and Jojoba oils, which moisturise the skin and hair to leave you thoroughly nourished.

Hydrate and nourish sensitive skin with the Living Nature Sensitive Night and Day Moisture Promo Pack. Perfect for skin prone to sensitivity, dryness and irritation, the plant-based pair work in tandem to leave you with a complexion that feels comfortable, replenished and touchably soft.
Sensitive Day Moisture Cream (50ml)
Ideally pH balanced, the lightweight and gentle moisturiser is suitable for daily use, expertly formulated to help fortify skin’s natural barrier function and replenish elasticity levels. Enriched with organic virgin Coconut and Avocado Oils, it helps minimise the look of redness and combat signs of premature ageing.  
Sensitive Night Moisture Cream (50ml)
Working overnight while skin is at its most receptive to treatment, the rich night cream penetrates skin with a natural blend of Harakeke Flax extract and Coconut Oil. Helping to eliminate trans-epidermal moisture loss, it intensively hydrates and revitalises while effectively fighting free radicals and harmful environmental aggressors.
name: Nature Sensitive Night and Day Moisture Promo Pack (2x50ml)

product_description:
PAYOTClarté 美白眼霜 是一种有针对性眼霜，可滋养双睛、抚平眼部皱纹、为娇嫩的眼部补充水分。
该款美白眼霜含亮白维生素C及饱满透明质酸。 包装轻薄卫生。轻揉地按摩本品可发挥三方面功效： 除去色素沉着痕迹、抚平 皱纹与细纹、消除浮肿及黑眼圈。
您会感到双眼舒适、充满活力。
name: Clarte 美白眼霜（15ml）

product_description:
Unlock the secret to revitalised skin with the Lifting Lace™ Revamping Meltaway Lace Eye Masks from STARSKIN.
Perfectly adhering to the delicate eye contour, the unique treatment offers the world’s first waterless lace mask, inspired by medical science and compression treatments to deliver unparalleled results to refresh and lift. Each mask has been intricately crafted from ultra-fine, stretchable cotton gauze that’s saturated in a slow-release gel concentrate, instantly infusing skin with a host of beneficial ingredients to sculpt and redefine.
Collagen, Adenosine and Sodium Hyaluronate deliver intensive moisture and create a visible plumping effect, while brightening Korean Mugwort and antioxidant-rich Green Tea soften the appearance of wrinkles and crow’s feet for a smoother, more even texture.  
Suitable for all skin types, the luxurious eye masks are effortless to apply and mess-free, leaving the eye area feeling dramatically rejuvenated and re-energised with a youthful looking glow.
name: Lifting Lace™ Revamping Meltaway Lace Eye Masks 2 x 10g

product_description:
Purify skin with the Natural Spa Factory Gel Cleanser; an iridescent, rose pink gel formula that emulsifies when applied with water.  
Enriched with multi-tasking Damascene Rose Oil, it works as a natural astringent, lifting and toning skin whilst sweeping away dirt and excess oil. It also helps to reduce the appearance of dark spots and discolouration, with naturally occurring antioxidants seeking to prevent further damage from free radicals. Non-irritating and anti-inflammatory, the lavish cleanser unveils a refreshed and revitalised complexion.
name: Spa Factory Gel Cleanser

product_description:
Achieve a radiant glow without heavy make-up with the NUXE Teint Éclat Prodigieux Tinted Moisturiser in 03 Dark. Blended with active plant and mineral pigments, skin is left smooth, radiant and hydrated.
NUXE Teint Éclat Prodigieux Tinted Moisturiser in 03 Dark contains chicory root to add a subtle colour to your skin, leaving it with a natural, glowing tint. Mineral pigments ensure that your complexion is completely even, and frangipani and jasmine flowers hydrate and protect from premature ageing. Perfect for use all year round and on all skin types, the light texture melts into the skin and leaves a natural hint of colour.
Directions of use:
name: Teint Eclat Prodigieux - Tinted Moisturiser - 03 Dark

product_description:
Treat dry skin to the Salcura Bioskin Dermaspray Daily; a lightweight formula developed for those with eczema, psoriasis, dermatitis and rosacea.
Fortified with Aloe Vera, Tea Tree and omega-rich Sea Buckthorn, the 98% natural spray penetrates quickly and deeply to soothe and calm itching skin, whilst promoting healthy skin growth and supporting the natural barrier function. Almond and Olive Oils are blended with English Lavender to moisturise, hydrate and restore soft, comfortable skin all-over the body.
name: Bioskin Dermaspray Daily (100ml)

product_description:
利用 Garnier Pure 2-in-1 Wipes 清爽您的肌肤，这是一包柔软、折叠的清洁湿巾，旨在净化肌肤，同时减少缺陷。
加入水杨酸和丰富的矿物质，该洁面湿巾可有效卸妆和去除杂质，同时对抗色斑和肌肤缺陷。
肌肤获得清洁、净化和疏解。 - K.N.
name: Pure 2-in-1 Wipes（25片）

product_description:
Reveal a glowing complexion with the Illumino Face Oil from Colbert MD. Delivering a soothing sensation, the luxurious facial oil seeks to improve skin's tone, texture and radiance.
Enriched with a soothing blend of Retinol and Vitamin C Esters, the formula offers comfort to the complexion, whilst Colbert MD’s unique Triad Delivery System™ transports the oil deeper into skin to achieve optimum results. The facial oil contains a cocktail of Yangu, Marula and Passionfruit Oil, which work in synergy to visibly improve skin’s elasticity, suppleness and moisture. Expect a youthful complexion that is luminous.
name: MD Illumino Face Oil 30ml

product_description:
Complete your skin care regime with Gatineau Gentle Silk Toner. Suitable for even the most sensitive skin, it removes any last traces of make-up and closes up your pores, leaving you with a soft, smooth and refined complexion.
Directions for use: Apply at night to the face and neck after cleansing, using a cotton wool pad.
name: Gentle Silk Toner

product_description:
请用 Gallinée La Culture 补水面霜护理面部皮肤；这是一种深层滋养配方护肤品，甚至能保证会使敏感型皮肤得到滋润、软化并恢复活力。
这种吸收迅速不油腻的面霜，采用该品牌的益生元、益生菌和乳酸的三合一复合生物制剂，可发挥最佳水合作用，而抗氧化剂桃金娘提取物（购自法国地中海地区）则可以保护和强化皮肤的微生物群系，以恢复面部皮肤明亮健康的样子。 这种面霜可以化出完美无瑕的底妆。
name: La Culture 补水面霜 (30ml)

product_description:
可用 Dr. Nick Lowe 的 acclenz™ 毛孔收缩面部磨砂膏使面部皮肤更光滑，更干净；Nick Lowe 是国际公认的世界一流皮肤病学和护肤专家之一。
这种磨砂膏特为满足易留瘢痕的皮肤的需求而研制，富含环保去死皮珠子，有磨掉死皮细胞和清除起痘细菌的作用，从而使面部皮肤更有活力，焕然一新，明亮红润。
通过甘油和时控释放水杨酸的混合物，可获得最佳补水效果，而桉树叶提取物则可以作为抗微生物制剂，以抑制细菌的生长。 皮肤会柔软而干净，并已准备好接纳其他护肤品。
name: Nick Lowe acclenz 毛孔收缩面部磨砂膏 (50ml)

product_description: 如果您正因睡眠不足造成皮肤问题而困扰，this works 去皱活力眼霜（15ml）将是您紧实肌肤、缓解疲态的理想护肤产品。 这款眼霜能有效防止眼部倦容和浮肿，在睡眠时淡化眼部区域的黑眼圈，抚平眼周皱纹。 这款强大的精华液融合了波斯合欢树精华的强大功效，在晚间促进肌肤排毒；另外还富含多种滋润的精油和植物提取物，促进细胞更新。 - SA
name: works 去皱活力眼霜（15ml）

product_description:
通过所有天然提取物的营养混合，Weleda鸢尾Hydrating晚霜在夜间修复阶段加强保湿和肌肤平衡，令肌肤在早晨柔软水嫩，舒适放松。
提供肌肤的油脂和水分含量天然再生功效，Weleda鸢尾Hydrating晚霜令肌肤感觉滋润、光滑。 吸收具有愈合功效的植物洋甘菊、金盏花成分，令肌肤变得柔软，而纯蜂蜡和杏仁油成分包裹温暖的肌肤，令肌肤光滑和平静。
使用说明：

Skin Doctors  pH值平衡洁面乳 ，使肌肤重焕光釆。 深层洁肤配方，内含乳酸和椰油酰胺丙基等成分，可温和地去除死皮细胞及晦暗的皮肤细胞、疏通毛孔、保持皮肤pH值平衡、提高其他护肤品的吸收率。
改善痤疮疤痕、瑕疵、细纹等；内含α-羟基酸，用以减少多余油脂、污垢和杂质，并使肌肤富有活力、肤色晶莹剔透。 大量的鳄梨油提取物，可营养滋润肌肤，使肌肤再生，展示完美无瑕的、富有青春活力的肌肤。 适合每天使用。 E.N.
name: Doctors pH值平衡洁面乳100 ml
